# language_name:        Chin<br>Matu
# closest ISO 639-3:    hlt
# year_short:           2005
# year_long:            Not available
# title:                The New Testament in Chin<br>Matu
# URL:                  http://www.bible.is/CNKBSM/Matt/1
# copyright_short:      BSM 2005
# copyright_long:       Not available
40001001	He tah Jesuh Khrih kah Patuer thli thoepna ni . Ahih tah Devid cadil la awm tih Devid tah Abraham cadil la awm .
40001002	Abraham capa Isak , Isak capa Jakob , Jakob capa Judah oen a boenhui , Judah capa Perez oen Zerah ( a manu tah Tamar ) , Perez capa Hezron , Hezron capa Ram , Ram capa Amminadab , Amminadab capa Nahshon , Nahshon capa Salmon , Salmon capa Boaz ( a manu Rahab ) , Boaz capa Obed ( a manu Ruth ) , Obed capa Jesi , Jesi capa Devid Sengpahrang .
40001006	Devid dung kalawng Israel thlaangphun Babilon ram ah tamnaa la a khuen toe Patuer hue tah adangkah angla awm : Devid capa Solomon ( a manu tah Uriah kah a yu te ) , Solomon capa Rehoboam , Rehoboam capa Abijah , Abijah capa Asa , Asa capa Jehoshafat , Jehoshafat capa Joram , Joram capa Uzziah , Uzziah capa Jotham , Jotham capa Ahaz , Ahaz capa Hezekiah , Hezekiah capa Manasseh , Manasseh capa Amon , Amon capa Josiah , Josiah capa Jehoiakhin oen a boenhui .
40001012	Babilon ah tamnaa la a awm coeng kalawng Jesuh a cuun toe tah adangkah angla awm . Jehoiakhin capa Shealtiel , Shealtiel capa Zerubbabel , Jerubbabel capa Abiud , Abiud capa Eliakim , Eliakim capa Azor , Azor capa Zadok , Zadok capa Akhim , Akhim capa Eliud , Eliud capa Eliazar , Eliazar capa Matthan , Matthan capa Jakob , Jakob capa Josep , Josep lawng Meri a yuna tih Meri lawng Messiah a ti u Jesuh te a cuun .
40001017	Tedawngah Abraham kalawng Devid toe dung thlailii , Devid kalawng Babilon ah tamnaa la a awm toe dung thlailii , tamnaa la a awmna kalawng Messiah a cuun toe ah dung thlailii awm .
40001018	Jesuh Khrih a cuunna tah hetila ni . A manu Meri te Josep ham a kang pe , tede yuvaa la a awm haih hih thlan ah Ciim Muithla rang oen camaw ka cuun ai tila a ming ,
40001019	Josep tah thaihu adoengla aka sai thlaang la awm tih Meri te thlaang lak ah yah lawh sak ham ngaih nawh tih ahuepla toeng ham kamthlah .
40001020	He kawng he a poek lii vengah Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng ahih tengla a mang ah a pho pe tih “ Devid cadil Josep , Meri te yuna ham rih boel , Metihtiah a bung a vawn he Ciim Muithla rang oen ni .
40001021	Ahih lawng capa a cuun vetih a miing ah Jesuh tila na sak ai , metihtiah a thlaang thli te a thawlhna kalawng a thlawn ai . ” a tina .
40001022	Bawipa lawng tawngha hawna oen a thui oepsoeh te a soepna hamla he thaihu boeih he va thoeng hang .
40001023	Hulaa cuem pakhat tah vawn vetih capa a cuun ai , a miing tah Immanu-el a sak u ai ” ( Immanu-el thuingaihna tah “ Pathen mami tengah tengah awm ” tina ni . )
40001024	Josep tah a ihna kalawng tho tih Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng a thui pe angla Meri te a yuna .
40001025	Tede a capa a cuun thlan ah tengcehna nawh . Josep lawng a capa te Jesuh tila miing a sak .
40002001	Herod he Sengpahrang la a awm vengah Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui ah Jesuh tah thang , Adiw raih thlan ah aisi aka noek thai thlaang khatsut khawlaw ben kalawng Jerusalem la law u tih .
40002002	“ Judah sengpahrang la aka awm ham camawca te meah a awm ? Ahih kah aisi khawlaw ben ah a thoeng te ka huh u tih ahih te bok hamla ka law ” tila a doet u .
40002003	Herod sengpahrang lawng he awl he a yaak vengah lakueng tangkiik , Jerusalem khaw kah thlaang boeih khaw lakueng u .
40002004	Herod lawng khawsoeih ahaamca boeih oen phungawl cangpueikung boeih te a khue tun tih , “ me ah nuem Messiah te a thang ? ” tila ahimi te a doet .
40002005	Ahimi lawng , “ Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui ah thang ai “ tila a thui pe u . ” Tawngha lawng a thut oepsoeh tah he tila awm .
40002006	“ Judah ram kah Bethlehem khawpui , nang tah Judah ram khawpui thli la kah ayiit koek la na awm roe nawh , na khui kalawng uktemkung pakhat law vetih ka thlaang Israel thli te a uk ai , ” ti .
40002007	Tedawngah Herod lawng khawlaw thlaangcuih thli te ahuepla a khue tih aisi a thoengna atue atang te acek aneh la a doet .
40002008	Tecoengah Herod lawng ahimi te Bethlehem la a tuih tih , “ Cet u lang camawca te atheenla tlap uh , na huh u atah van thui uh , kai khaw ka cet silang ahih te ka bok van ai , ” tila awl a uen .
40002009	Herod lawng a tina angla cet u tih khawlaw benkah a huh u aisi te a huh koep u vengah awmngaih u tangkiik . Ahimi haiah aisi lawng cet tih camawca a awmna huen a pha ah duem .
40002011	Im khuila kuun u tih camawca oen a manu Meri te a huh u vengah khuklu oen cuengkueng u tih buekuep ruila ahih te a bok u . A khuen u kutdo khawhbu te a awng u tih sui , frankinsen oen mura te a peek u .
40002012	Pathen lawng ahimi te Herod tengla mel koep nawh ham a mang ah ngaithuen awl a thui pe dawngah lawngpui tloe kalawng amah ram la voei koep u .
40002013	Ahimi a ceh coengah , Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat Josep mang ah a tueng pe tih , “ Herod lawng camawca te ngawn hamla a tlap poen ai . Tedawngah tho lang camawca oen a manu te lo langtah Iyipt ram la pooeng puei loeih , kai lawng mel koep ham kavan thui thlantoe te ah awm uh , ” a tina .
40002014	Josep lawng tho tih camawca oen a manu te a lawh tih yiinthuem ah Iyipt ram la a pooeng puei ,
40002015	Herod a duek thlantoe Iyipt ram ah awm u . He tila a awmna he tah , Bawipa lawng tawngha hawna oen a thui oepsoeh , “ Ka Capa te Iyipt ram kalawng ka khue koep ” a ti te asoepna ham ni .
40002016	Khawlaw thlaangcuih thli lawng a thai a latna te Herod lawng a ming vengah caalla a thin sa . Khawlaw thlaangcuih thli lawng a thui aisi a thoengna tue kalawng a tuemtang heet tih Bethlehem khawpui oen khaaw teng khaaw vai kah camaw tawngpaca kumhih hui boeih te ngawn hamla awl a peek .
40002017	He tila tawngha Jeremiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te soep . A thui oepsoeh awl tah , :
40002018	“ Ramah khaaw ah awl a yaak u , thinphat lungnat rungrahna awl ni . Rachel lawng a ca thli te a rah , A ca thli a duek boeih poen dawngah rap tih a reemhalna ham thloepthloei thai la awm tlaih nawh . ”
40002019	Herod a duek coengah , Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat tah Iyipt ram ah aka awm Josep mang ah a tueng pe tih ,
40002020	“ Tho langtah camaw oen a manu te Israel ram la meel puei koep loeih , camaw ngawn ham aka tlap hue te duek boeih poen , ” a tina .
40002021	Tedawngah Josep lawng tho tih Camaw oen a manu te a lawh tih Israel ram la a mel puei .
40002022	Tede Arkhelas lawng ana pa Herod yuengla Judia ram ah Sengpahrang a bi tite Josep lawng a yaak vengah te huen la ceh ham a rih . A mang ah a thuituen angla Galili peng la te cet ,
40002023	Nazaret a ti u khawpui ah te poe awm . “ Ahih te Nazaret thlaang ti u ai , ” tila tawngha thli lawng a thui oepsoeh te soep .
40003001	Teveng tue ah Baptisma pekung Johan tah Judia ram ramhum huhang la law tih phungthui a tong .
40003002	“ Vaan ram ayoeii poen dawngah na thawlhna yut u loeih , ” tila a thui .
40003003	Tawngha Isaiah lawng , “ Thlaang pakhat lawng ramhum huhang ah paang tih , ‘ Bawipa hamla lawngpui te roekbah uh , A cehna ham lawngpui te adoengla sai uh , ” tila a thui . oepsoeh te tah Johan he poen ni .
40003004	Johan lawng kala-uk mul oen a tah hiacuu te a buen a naak tih , a hingcen ah saphaw cihin a naak , khaurang oen khawitui te buh la a caak .
40003005	Jerusalem kah thlaang thli Judia ram tawm kah thlaang thli oen Jordan tuiva tengvaai ram tawm kah thlaang thli a tengla law u .
40003006	Ahimi lawng a thawlhna boeih te a phawng u tih , Jordan tuiva ah ahimi te Johan lawng Baptisma a peek .
40003007	Farasi thlaang oen Sadusi thlaang thli Baptisma dang ham a law u te Johan lawng a huh vengah ahimi te , “ Ruul hue , aka law ham koei Pathen kah dantatna kalawng na loeih u thai ai tila a-u lawng avan thui u ?
40003008	Na thawlhna na yut u te athaih theen oen tueng sak uh .
40003009	Abraham tah cuunkung patuer ni tila thui mailai oen dantatna kalawng ka loeih ai tila poek hau u boel . Pathen lawng he kah lungto thli he a lawh vetih Abraham cadil la a sai thai ti he kavan thui u .
40003010	Thingkung boeih te ayung ah vungna hamla haica tah a toen sut poen . Thaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung vetih hai dawngah a phuum ai .
40003011	Thawlhna na yut poen tite tuengna ham kai lawngtah tui oen Baptisma kan peek u . Tede kai hu ah aka law thlaang lawngtah Ciim Muithla oen hai oen ah Baptisma m'peek u ai . Ahih tah kai lak ah lenduet tih kai tah ahih kah khawmuek pawm ham pateng ka koeih nawh .
40003012	A kut dawngah caang yahna raa a pawm vetih caang te aciimla a yah ai , caangtak te thaidi dawng a khueh ai , tede caanghii te tah aka duek thai tlaih nawh hai dawngah a phuum ai , ” a tina .
40003013	Teveng tue ah Jesuh tah Jordan tuiva ah Baptisma dang hamla Galili kalawng Johan tengla va law .
40003014	Tede Johan lawng a thana tih , “ Kai he man nang lawng Baptisma nan peek sui , kai tengla nang na law lat oh kai , ” a tina .
40003015	Tede Jesuh lawngah , “ tahe ah sai hawn , “ Pathen lawng khuek te sai hawn sih , ” a tina . Tedawngah Johan lawng a roei .
40003016	Jesuh tah Baptisma a huh coeng khoeng ah tui dawng kalawng tho hang . Tevengah ahih ham vaan te awng u tih , Pathen kah Muithla tah akhuu angla rum thuk tih ahih sawah a cuuk te a huh .
40003017	Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawng , “ He tah ka lungvatna ka Capa ni , ahih sawah ka kaw hoe tangkiik . ” tila a thui .
40004001	Tecoengah Muithla lawng Jesuh te Seitan kah suek-halhna tawng ham ramhum huhang la a ceh puei .
40004002	Khawhin sawmlii yiin daai buh a mueh dawngah Jesuh tah a bung pawng poen .
40004003	Tecoengah Seitan lawng ahih tengla law tih , “ Nang he Pathen Capa tangtang la na awm atah , lungto thli he buh la coeng sak lah ” a tina .
40004004	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Caciim lawngah , ‘ thlaang he buh bueng oen hing thai nawh , tede Pathen huikaa khui kalawng aka thoeng awl oen ni a hing ’ ti ; ” a tina .
40004005	Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te aciim Jerusalem khawpui kah Tempal bok-im imphu ah a ceh puei tih .
40004006	Ahih tengah , “ Nang he Pathen Capa la na awm tang atah sungpung thuk lah , metihtiah Caciim dawngah , ‘ Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang hue te nang ham awl a peek vetih na khow pateng lungto dawngah na khuek nawh ham nang te a kut oen n'dawm u ai , ’ tila awm ” a tina .
40004007	Jesuh lawngah , “ Caciim lawng , ‘ Bawipa na Pathen te noekdak boel , ti de lah koen , ’ a tina .
40004008	Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te a sanghlang tlaangsawm pakhat la a luui puei tih , dilai dawngkah ram boeih oen te ram kah a bawilenna boeih te a huh sak .
40004009	Seitan lawngah , “ Khuklu oen na cuengkueng tih kai he nan bok atah he thli boeih he kan pe ai , ” a tina .
40004010	Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ Seitan , atloela cet ! Caciim lawngah , ‘ Na Bawipa Pathen bueng te bok lang , amah kah bii bueng te bi peh , ’ ti ” a tina .
40004011	Tecoengah Seitan lawng Jesuh te a ceh taak , vanthlaang thli law-u tih Jesuh te a bawm a ceem u .
40004012	Johan thawngim ah a thlaak u tite Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah Galili peng la cet .
40004013	Ahih lawng Nazaret ah awm ohla Kapernaum khaaw ah awm hamla cet . Kapernaum khaaw tah Zebulun oen Naptali thlaangphun kah ram khui Galili tuilii keeng ah awm .
40004014	He tila a awm he tah Tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh te asoepna ham ni . A thui oepsoeh tah ,
40004015	“ Zebulun oen Naptali ram Tuitunlii la cehna lawngpui , Jordan tuiva khatben rall , Gental thli kah ram Galili !
40004016	Yiinna khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng aang abohlang a huh u ai . Duekna yiin khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah aangna va pai ai , ” tila a thui te ni .
40004017	Teveng tue kalawng ah Jesuh lawng , “ Vaan ram tah ayoeica poen dawngah , na thawlhna yut u loeih , ” tila phungthuina a tong cuek .
40004018	Jesuh lawng Galili tuiliikeeng ah a yingyawi vengah tui aka hawi boeinau rawi Simon ( Piter a ti u te ) oen a manau Andru , tuilii ah lok oen nga a heeng hih te a huh .
40004019	Jesuh lawng te rawi te , “ Ka hu ah bang hih lah , thlaang tukung la kan coengg sak hih ai , ” a tina .
40004020	Ahih rawi lawng lok te a voeih pak tih a hu ah bang pahoei hih .
40004021	Te kalawng cet phai tih thlaangtloe boeinau rawi Zebedi capa Jeem oen Johan te a huh . Te rawi boeinau tah ana pa Zebedi oen lowng khuiah awm haih tih lok a baw u . Te rawi te Jesuh lawng a khue ;
40004022	Te rawi lawng ana pa oen lowng te a ceh tak tih a hu ah bang pahoei hih .
40004023	Jesuh tah Galili peng tawm ah cet tih Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei , Vaan ram kawng Awlthang Theen a thui , thlaangtlo oen natna soeprep aka tlo thli te a hoeih sak .
40004024	Ahih kawng awlthang te Siria ram pum ah thaang khok tih aka tlo thli , tlawhnatna oen patang raina soeprep aka khang , raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang thli , raaihum tlawhna aka tlo , aka khawn thli boeih te avan law puei u tih Jesuh lawng a hoeih sak boeih .
40004025	Galili peng oen Dekapolis peng ( khaaw paha a ti u peng ) , Jerusalem Judia peng oen Jordan tuiva khatben rall kah thlaangping broe lawng ahih hu ah bang u .
40005001	Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a huh vengah , tlaangsawm la luui hang tih te ah te ngawl . A hubang hue lawng ahih te a veel u .
40005002	Tecoengah ahimi te riingtuuk thaihoen hamla a tong :
40005003	“ Thlaang soep nawh la ka awm tila aka ming tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Vaan ram tah ahimi kah ni !
40005004	“ Kawthe oen aka rung aka rap thli tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Pathen lawng ahimi te a thloep a hoelh ai !
40005005	“ A kaw aka daw thlaang tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Pathen lawng a kam pe tangte te a paang ai !
40005006	“ Pathen kawngaih te amami ngaihna bo koek la sai ham aka khueh tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Pathen lawng ahimi kah kawngaihna te a soep pe sak ai !
40005007	“ Thlaang reenna kaw aka poek tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Pathen lawng ahimi te a reen van ai !
40005008	“ Thinkaw lungbui aka ciim tah yotheen kam-awmna aka lawng thlaang la awm ; Ahimi lawng Pathen te a huh u ai !
40005009	“ Roeproeina aka sai tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Pathen lawng ahimi te ka ca a tina ai !
40005010	“ Pathen kawngaihna a sai dawngah heemtekna aka ming thli tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ; Vaan ram tah ahimi kah ni !
40005011	“ Kai kah hubang la na awm u dawngah nangmi te thlaang lawng thuitheetna , heemtekna , athe thaihu soeprep oen hoem awl n'peel u vengah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u .
40005012	“ Awmngaih u langtah na kaw hoe sak uh , nangmi ham vaan ah kutdo abohlang awm , he tila ni nangmi na awm thlan vengkah tawngha thli khaw aheem atek u roe poen .
40005013	“ Nangmi tah thlaangphun boeih ham lungkeh la na awm u . Tede lungkeh he a aalna a moelh atah aal sak koep ham coengg thai tlaih nawh , apoeila awm poen , tedawngah ram la voeih tih thlaang lawng a caawt mailai ham ni a awm poen .
40005014	“ Nangmi tah dilai pum boeih ham aangna la na awm u . Tlaangsawm ah a phueng u khawpui tah n'tu lawngkhaw thlipdah thai nawh .
40005015	A-u lawngkhaw hai a vaang vengah beelphai oen muek khoep vai nawh , haivangna dawngah a vaang tih im khuiah aka awm boeih te a thue .
40005016	Tetihvan la nangmi kah aangna te thlaang haiah aang sak ham awm , te tila thaihu theen na sai u te ahimi lawng a huh u vetih vaan ah aka awm nangmi na Pa te a thangpawm u thai ai .
40005017	“ Mosi kah phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cangpueina te phe hamla kai he va law tila poek u boel . Te thli te phe hamla ka law nawh tih soep sak ham ni ka law .
40005018	He he poek khuep uh . Vaan oen Dilai aboet thlantoe phungawl dawngah ayiitkoek awllung pakhat mai te khaw ha-ata manawh . Te phungawl dawngah aka awm boeih te soep ai .
40005019	Tedawngah a-u khaw phungawl dawngkah ayiitkoek te khaw vai ohla awm tih thlaangtloe te khaw vai nawh ham a cang puei atah Vaan Ram ah ayiitkoek la awm van ai . Tede a-u khaw Phungawl te a vai tih thlaangtloe te khaw vai hamla a cang puei atah Vaan Ram ah abokoek la awm van ai .
40005020	Tecoengah kavan thui u , Pathen kawngaih saina dawngah phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thli lak ah uep-awm ngaai la na awm u nawh atah Vaan ram khuiah na kuun thai manawh .
40005021	“ Thlaang ngawn boel , na ngawn atah awlcekbawi haiah na pha ai , ” tila yan vengkah awl te na yaak u poen .
40005022	Tede tahe ah kavan thui u , “ A-u khaw a maya manau tengah a thin a sa atah awlcekna ah a pha ai . A-u khaw a maya manau te tula na thuum nawh a tina atah awlcekna yung a pha ai , a-u khaw a maya manau te thlaangngau paathuu a tina atah rih awmna hell hai khuiah a thlaak ai .
40005023	Tedawngah Pathen tengla bokna-thaang dawngah na kutdo te ka pe ai na ti vengah na maya manau pakhat khat lawng na sawah thinsana a khueh te na ming atah ,
40005024	Bokna-thaang haiah na kutdo te khueh de langtah , aloela cet lang na maya manau oen roeproeina sai , tecoengah law koep langtah na kutdo te Pathen tengah peh .
40005025	“ Thlaang pakhat khat lawng taya n'cawi tih awlcekna yung la n'ceh puei atah yung na pha thlan atue a awm vengah ahih oen roepna sai . Te huen na pha atah nang te awlcekbawi tengah m'peek vetih awlcekbawi lawng palik tengah patoeng m'peek vetih thong ah n'thlaak ai .
40005026	Atak tang kavan thui u , sah ham koei laiba na sah boeih thlantoe thong khuiah na awm ai .
40005027	“ Hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel tila a thui te na yaak u poen ; ’
40005028	Tede kai lawng tahe kavan thui u , A-u khaw hutaa te samphaih ngaihna mik oen a dan atah a thinkaw oen hutaa te a samphaih puei poen .
40005029	Tedawngah na bantang mik lawng n'thawlh sak atah koeih lang voei hawn ! na pum boeih hell la atlaak lak atah na mik na taal te nang hamla theen ngaai .
40005030	Na bantang kut lawng n'thawlh sak atah , tloek poet lang voei hawn ! na pum boeih hell la a tlaak lak atah na kut na khow pakhat khat a taal te nang hamla theen ngaai .
40005031	“ A-u lawngkhaw a yu te a thlaak atah yu thlaakna ca te pe seh ! tila a thui te na yaak u poen , ”
40005032	Tede tahe ah kavan thui u , a-u lawngkhaw a yu te acuk ahalh nawh maiah a thlaak tih te hutaa lawng vaa a sak koep atah ahih lawng a yu te a samphaih sak . Te hutaa aka yuna thlaang te khaw thlaang yu sawah samphaih poen .
40005033	“ Na awlkam te phe boel , Tede Bawipa tengah na awlkam angla sai uh , tila yan vengkah thlaang thli lawng a thui te na yaak u poen .
40005034	Tede tahe ah kavan thui u , awl na kam u vengah tapvoepna oen awl kam u boel , vaan phoei oen tapvoep boel . Metihtiah vaan tah Pathen kah ngawlhcoen ni .
40005035	Dilai miing phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel , ’ dilai tah Pathen kah khowtloengna huen ni . Jerusalem phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel , metihtiah aka lenduet Sengpahrang kah khawpui ni .
40005036	Na luu phoei oen khaw tapvoep boel , metihtiah na luu dawngkah samthaam pakhat pateng abawk oen amuuem la na sai thai u nawh .
40005037	Soeng , soeng nawh ti bueng mah te thui uh , te voel tah Seitan tengkah awl poen ni .
40005038	“ Mik yuengah mik van , naw yuengah naw van , ” a ti te na yaak u poen .
40005039	Tede tahe ah kavan thui u , “ Nangmi sawah athe aka sai te thung u boel . Thlaang pakhat khat lawng bantang ben na beeng te avan bel atah banvoei ben na beeng te khaw bel sak .
40005040	Thlaang pakhat khat lawng na angki te lawh ham a ngaih tih awlcekna yung ah m'pha puei atah , na khawtt-angki oen tawm pe baal de .
40005041	Thlaang pakhat khat lawng nang te amangkhak la thalrih te meng khat m'phueih sak atah meng hih toe phueih pe hawn uh .
40005042	Thlaang lawng thaihu avan bih atah pe uh , thaihu pu ham aka ngaih te pu uh .
40005043	“ Na paya thli lungna uh , na raal thli thina uh ! a ti awl te na yaak u poen .
40005044	Tede kavan thui u , Na raal thli te lungna lang nangmi aka thekhana thlaang thli ham thangthui pe uh .
40005045	Te atah Vaan ram ah aka awm na Pa kah a ca la na awm u ai . Ahih lawng atah thlaangthe thlaang theen sawah avan at la khaw a see sak , atheen aka sai oen athe aka sai sawah avan at la khaw a tlan sak .
40005046	Nang aka lungna bueng te na lungna atah metila Pathen lawng kutdo m'peek ai ? Mangmu cawikung hue lawng pateng te tila a sai u van !
40005047	“ Nang lawng na paya bueng te na voemtoei atah thlaang mailai lak ah athloeila na sai n'tu aka awm ? Pathen aka bok nawh thlaang thli lawng pateng te ang te a sai van !
40005048	Vaan kah na Pa a soep van angla nangmi khaw na soep u van ham awm . ”
40006001	“ Thaihu theen na sai u boeih te thlaang yahawh lawng hu seh tila rangpui haiah sai nawh ham ngaithuen uh . He ang thli he rangpui haiah na sai u atah vaan ah aka awm na Pa tengkah kutdo n'tu khaw na dang u manawh .
40006002	Tedawngah thlaang kah angoe angaih thaihu te na do na dan vengah thlaangthaipalat hue lawng sinakok oen lawngpui cumruum ah oekthloen ruila a sai u angla nangmi lawng na sai boeih te tueng sak u boel . Ahimi lawng thlaang kah koeh ngaih ah a sai ni . Atak tang kavan thui u , ahimi lawng a ngaih te asoepla a dang poen .
40006003	Tede thlaang lawng angoe angaih te nangmi lawng na peek u vengah na paya theenkoek lawng pateng te kawng te ming boel seh .
40006004	Namah bueng lawng ming ham sai u lang , te tila ahuepla na sai boeih aka hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai .
40006005	“ Na thangthui u vengah thlaangthai-palat hue angla thangthui u boel ! Ahimi lawng thlaang boeih kah huhna koei sinakok oen lawngpui cumruum ah pai tih thangthui ham a ngaih u tangkiik . Atak tang kavan thui u , a sai phu dang ham koei te asoepla a dang u poen .
40006006	Tede nangmi lawng na thangthui u vengah im khuila kuun uh , thawh khai u lang mik oen huh nawh na Pa tengah thangthui uh . Ahuepla na sai boeih hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai .
40006007	“ Na thangthui u vengah Pathen aka ming nawh hue angla awl mailai yahawh thui u boel , ahimi lawngtah asanhlang thangthui dengah Pathen lawng a yaak ai ” tila a poek u .
40006008	Ahimi angla sai u boel ; Nangmi lawng na ngoe boeih te na bih thlan ah na Pa lawng a ming boeih poen .
40006009	Tedawngah na thangthui u vengah : ‘ Vaan ah aka awm kaimi na Pa , Na miing ciim tah hinyah la awm hawn seh ;
40006010	Na ram va pai hawn seh ! Vaan ah na kawngaih a sai u angla dilai dawngah na kawngaih sai u van hawn seh ,
40006011	Tihin kah angoe caak awkk te kaimi m'pe lah .
40006012	Thlaangtloe lawng kaimi sawah a saithawlh te khawdawp ka ngaai u angla , Kaimi kah saithawlh he khawdawp van ngaai lah .
40006013	Noekdakna aka rai hlang kaimi sawah pha sak ohla , Seitan kut khui kalawng n'deem sak u lah , tila thangthui uh . ’
40006014	“ Nangmi sawah thlaangtloe lawng a sai thawlh te khawdawp na ngaai u atah vaan ah aka awm na Pa lawng na saithawlh te khawdawp avan ngaai van ai .
40006015	Tede thlaangtloe kah saithawlh te khawdawp na ngaai nawh atah vaan kah na Pa lawng na saithawlh te khawdawp van ngaai manawh .
40006016	“ Buh na yeh u vengah thlaang-thaipalat hue angla haithelatt la awm u boel . Ahimi lawng buh a yeh u te thlaang lawng ming seh a ti u dawngah haithelatt la awm u . Atak tang kavan thui u , ahimi lawng kutdo te asoepla a dang poen .
40006017	Buh na yeh u vengah na mik-hai khaw sil u lang na sam khaw thiik uh ,
40006018	Te tila buh na yeh u te a-u lawngkhaw ming nawh vetih mik huh nawh na Pa bueng lawng a ming ai . Ahuepla saina boeih hukung na Pa lawng kutdo m'peek u badai .
40006019	“ Kuum-akett oen thii-ekk lawng a caak thai ; thlaanghuuen lawng a muk tih a huen thaina dilai ah na kaawn tung u boel ;
40006020	Kuum-akett oen thii-eek lawng a caak thaina nawh thlaanghuuen lawng a muk tih a huuen thaina nawh vaan ah na kaawn te tung uh .
40006021	Na kaawn a awmna huen ah na kawpoek khaw awm van ai .
40006022	“ Mik he tah pum boeih kah haithoei la awm . Na mik acaih atah na pum boeih aangna oen be ai ;
40006023	Tede na mik a theen nawh atah na pum boeih yiinna khuiah awm ai . Tedawngah na khuikah aangna lawng a yiin khoep boeih atah te yiinna tah metila rih ham a awm tangkiik ai .
40006024	“ A-u lawngkhaw bawi pahih kah bii te bi thai manawh . Pakhat te a thina vetih pakhat te a lungna ai . Pakhat te a hinyah vetih pakhat te a huhsit ai . Pathen oen tangka kah bii te pahih bokla na bi thai manawh .
40006025	Tedawngah kavan thui u ; Na hingna ham caak awkk oen na pum ham himbai hinaak poek oen lakueng u boel . Atak tang atah ; caak awkk lak ah hingna he awlpui ngaai nawh aw ? Himbai hinaak lak ah pum he awlpui ngaai nawh aw ?
40006026	Vaan ah aka sawng va thli ke bueh u lah ! ati amu khaw tue u nawh ; caang khaw aat nawh tih thaidi khuiah khaw tung u nawh . Tede vaan ah aka awm nangmi na Pa lawng te thli te a cawm acah ! Va lak ah nangmi he awlpuila na awm u nawh aw ?
40006027	Nangmi lawng lakuengna oen na hingna na cot sak u thai bet aw ?
40006028	“ N'tu ah himbai hinaak kawngah na lakueng u ? Bueh u lah ! ramhum kah raipai ke metila a roeng hang : bii khaw bi u nawh ; Himbai hinaak khaw tak u nawh .
40006029	Tede , kavan thui u , bawilenkoek Solomon sengpahrang kah a bawilenna oen himbai hinaak lawngah raipai pakhat kah a theenna te pha nawh .
40006030	Tihin ah po tih thangvuen ah tlumtloei , hai dawngah phuum ham aka awm ramhum ah aka po mailai sul-aram Pateng khaw thoekcaukung tah Pathen ni ; Ahih lawng nangmi tare te thoekcau muehla awm ai aw ? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he !
40006031	“ Tedawngah n'tu nuem ka caak vetih n'tu nuem ka awkk ai , n'tu ka bai ka naak ai tila lakueng u boel ?
40006032	He ang thaihu he Pathen aka bok nawh hue kah thoehtham thaihu ni , he ang thaihu na ngoe boeih te vaan kah nangmi na Pa lawng a ming boeih .
40006033	Tedawngah thaihu tloe boeih lak ah Pathen Ram oen Pathen lawng sai sak ham a ngaih te lamhacuekla tlap u lang tecoengah na ngoe thaihu tloe boeih te Pathen lawng avan tawm badai .
40006034	Tedawngah thangvuen ham lakueng u boel ; thangvuen lawng amah ham khoekla lakueng badai . Hin at kah arai acaangna sawah atloe thap patoeng ngoe nawh .
40007001	“ Pathen lawng awl n'cekna nawh hamla thlaangtloe te awl cek boel ,
40007002	Thlaangtloe awl na cek van angla Pathen lawng nang te awl n'cek van ai , Thlaangtloe sawah nuehtahna na hawna van angla na sawah Pathen lawng a hawna van ai .
40007003	N'tu ah namah mik ah thingboeng aka awm te huh ohla na maya manau mik ah aka awm muenmawi adiikca mai te na huh .
40007004	Namah mik ah thingboeng a awm lal maiah metila na maya manau mik ah aka awm muenmawi te kavan lo ai na tina mai lauh ?
40007005	Nang thlaangthaipalat Namah mik kah thingboeng te lamhala lo de langtah tecoengah na maya manau mik kah muenmawi adiik te aciimcala na huh vetih na lawh pe thai ai .
40007006	“ Aciim thaihu te ui pe boel . Te thli lawng va meel vetkat vetih namah te ng'ngeh ai . Awk haiah latha te tloeng pe boel . A khow oen ni a caawt mailai poen ai .
40007007	“ Bih lah m'peek ai , tlap lah na huh ai , khooek lah thawhka avan awng ai .
40007008	A-u khaw aka bih tah a peek ai , aka tlap lawngtah a huh vetih thawhka aka khooek tah a awng pe ai .
40007009	Na ca lawng buh avan bih vengah lungto aka pe thlaang pakhat mai khaw na awm ai aw ?
40007010	Nga avan bih vengah ruul na peek ai aw ?
40007011	Thlaangthe la na awm u de na ca thli te thaihu theen peek ham na ming u atah van ah aka awm nangmi na Pa lawng aka bih thli tengah metihtlukla thaihu theen te a peek tare ai .
40007012	“ Thlaangtloe lawng na sawah thaihu theen sai seh tila na ngaih van angla thlaangtloe tengah sai van lah ; He tah Mosi Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah thuituen ngaihna tangtang ni .
40007013	“ Thawhka ceek khuiah kuun u lah , metihtiah hell thawhka tah kau tih cehna lawngpui khaw yoei koek doek la a awm dawngah thlaang yahawh lawng a vai u .
40007014	Tede hingna thawhka tah ceek tih a cehna lawngpui khaw rai tangkiik tih thlaang ayawlca bueng lawng a huh .
40007015	“ Tawngha rawlrap hue te ngaithuen uh ; Ahimi lawngah nangmi tengla te ahan huhna atah tuu angla law u vetih a thinkaw khui atah metaang tluung angla awm u ai .
40007016	Nangmi lawng ahimi te athaih oen na noek ai . Thliingkung lawng misur thaih nooek nawh tih thliingkung dawngah thaidut khaw thaih nooek nawh .
40007017	Thingkung theen lawng athaih theen thaih tih thingkung the lawng athaih the thaih van .
40007018	Thingkung theen lawng athaih the thaih nooek nawh tih thingkung the lawngkhaw athaih theen thaih nawh .
40007019	Athaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung tih hai dawngah a phuum u .
40007020	Tedawngah nangmi lawng tawngha rawlrap hue te a saina oen na noek u ai .
40007021	“ Bawipa , Bawipa tila ka tengah aka ti thlaang boeih lawng Vaan ram khuiah kuun boeih manawh , tede Vaan ah aka awm a Pa kawngaih aka sai thli bueng lawngah kuun ai .
40007022	Awlcekna Khawhin apha vengah thlaang yahawh lawng ka tengah Bawipa , Bawipa ! na miing oen ah Pathen awl ka thui u , na miing oen ah raaithe thli ka hek u tih kawpoekraina ka sai u ! ti ai .
40007023	Tevengah ahimi te , “ kan ming nawh , atloela cet uh , thlaangthe thli ! ” ka tina ai .
40007024	“ Tedawngah a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih aka vai tah lungnu dawngah im aka sa thlaangcuih oen lo u .
40007025	Rawnu tlanthiim , tuiphu tho tih thlipui lawng im te a linglok , tede im te lungnu dawng acakla a sak tih tlim nawh .
40007026	“ Tede a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih aka vai nawh tah divin dawngah im aka sa thlaangngau oen lo u .
40007027	Rawnu tlanthiim , tuilet tho tih thlipui lawng im te a linglok vengah tlim . Te kah im a tlim te metila rih ham a awm tangkiik .
40007028	Jesuh lawng he awl ha thui boeih coengah thlaang yahawh tah a cangpueina dawngah a kawpoek rai u .
40007029	Ahih lawng phungawl cangpueikung hue angla cang puei nawh tih saithaina aana aka khueh hue angla a cang puei .
40008001	Tlaangsawm kalawng Jesuh a rum thuk vengah , thlaangping yahawh lawng a hu ah a vai u .
40008002	Tevengah haibe aka na thlaang pakhat a tengla law tih khuklu oen cuengkueng tih buekuep ruila , “ Bawipa , na kawngaih atah nan hoeih sak thai . ” a tina .
40008003	Jesuh lawng a kut a phawh tih a tek coengah , “ Ka kaw tla ; Ciim hawn loeih ! ” a tina . Kawlkalh ah haibe natna hoeih pahoei .
40008004	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Hutung lah ! a-u tengah khaw thui boel , khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah na pum te nueh , tecoengah thlaang rangpui tengah ka hoeih poen tila tuengsakna ham Mosi phungawl angla luciik thawthuengna te nawn lah ” a tina .
40008005	Jesuh tah Kapernaum khaw a pha vengah Rom raalbawi pakhat lawng a tengah reenna a bih .
40008006	“ Bawipa , ka tuihyoeihthlaang tah tlo tih im ah ral sut , a tlawh nauh tangkiik tih tat khaw tat thai nawh ” a tina .
40008007	Jesuh lawng , “ ka law silang ka hoeih sak ai ” a tina .
40008008	Raalbawi lawng , ‘ Bawipa , tih mai boel seh ; Kai tah thlaangkoeih pavaih nawh dawngah ka im la nang na law ham tah ka koeih nawh . Awl bueng mah m'pe mai , ka tuihyoeihthlaang te hoeih badai ” a tina .
40008009	“ Kai khaw ka sawkah Bawihaam thli kut huiah ka awm tih kai kut huiah raalkap thli awm patoeng van baal . Pakhat khat te kai lawng cet lah ! ka tina atah cet tih atloe pakhat te law lah ’ ka tina atah va law , ka tamnaa te he he sai lah ka tina atah a sai . ” a tina .
40008010	He awl he Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah , a kawpoek la rai tih a hu ah aka vai thlaangping hue tengah , “ Atak tang kavan thui u , he ang oengcakna he Israel thlaang tim ah khaw ka hu nawh hun ” a tina .
40008011	Nangmi tengah kavan thui u , khawlaw khawtlaak ben kalawng thlaang yahawh law u vetih , Abraham , Isak , Jakob mi oen Vaan ram kah poei buh veelna ah ngawl u haih ai .
40008012	Tede Vaan ram aka paang ham koei thlaang hue te Vaan adau ben rungrahna oen naw tahna huen yiinna khuila a voeih ai .
40008013	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng raalbawi te , “ im la meel loeih , ” na oengna angla coengg hawn seh ” a tina . Raalbawi kah tuihyoeihthlaang tah teveng tue roe ah hoeih pahoei .
40008014	Piter im la Jesuh a ceh vengah Piter mase hutaa te tlo tih ihkhun dawngah a ralh te a huh .
40008015	Jesuh lawng a kut ah a phoeih tih a tlawhna hoeih pahoei . Tho hang tih Jesuh te a do a dan .
40008016	Thlemben tue a pha vengah , a kaw ah raaithe oen aka be thlaang thli te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u . Jesuh lawng a awl kam-at oen raaithe thli te a hek tih thlaangtlo boeih te khaw a hoeih sak .
40008017	Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah , “ Amah lawng mami kah natna te a lawh tih mami kah tlawhthe te a phueih ” tila tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te asoepna ham ni .
40008018	Jesuh lawng a teng-avai kah thlaangping te a huh vengah Galili tuilii khatben rall la ceh ham a hubang hue te awl a peek .
40008019	Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat a tengla law tih , ‘ Saya , ’ na cehna roekk ah ka law van ai ” a tina .
40008020	Jesuh lawng , “ Metaang lawngkhaw a awmna ham ungrawm a khueh tih , va lawngkhaw bu a khueh , tede Thlaanghing Capa lawngtah ihna huen oen duemdawngna kangna khaw khueh nawh . ” a tina .
40008021	Atloe hubang pakhat lawng atah , “ Bawipa , im la ka cet de silang tah a pa rawkk te ka kuem de ai , ” a tina .
40008022	Jesuh lawng , “ Ka hu ah bang hawn , thlaangduek lawng amami thlaangduek puei te kuem noen seh , ” a tina .
40008023	Jesuh tah lowng khuila kuun tih , a hubang hue khaw ahih oen cet haih u .
40008024	Kawlkalh ah tuilii dawngah thlipui tho tih lowng te tuilet lawng a khup dalh . Tede Jesuh tah ditdit ip .
40008025	A hubang hue a tengla cet u tih a thawh u . Bawipa , kaimi he , n'thlawn lah , ka duek u poen ai he , a tina u .
40008026	Jesuh lawng , “ N'tu ah tila na rih u aih ? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he ! ” a tina . Tecoengah ahih lawng tho tih thlipui oen tuilet te duem ham awl a peek ; kawlkalh ah thlipui oen tuilet te duem tih tuilii te dipsipla awm .
40008027	Thlaang boeih lawng a kawpoek la rai u tih , “ He thlaang he me ang thlaang kai ? khawthlii oen tuilet lawngkhaw a awl a ngaai pe mai ! ” ti u .
40008028	Jesuh tah tuilii khatben rall kah Gadara ram la a law vengah thlaang a upna lungkaw khui kalawng raaithe oen aka be thlaang pahih Jesuh tengla va law . Te rawi tah a kaw khuiah raaithe awm tih a tluung thakbat dawngah te kah lawngpui benla a-u lawngkhaw ceh ham a rih .
40008029	Ahih rawi lawng , “ Nang Pathen Capa , kaihih sawah n'tu sai ham na ngaih ? Atue akhoek thlan ah kaihih he dantat hamla na law aw ? ” tila paang hih .
40008030	Te huen kalawng ceh hot athlana ah awk yahawh a vuelh u .
40008031	Raaithe hue lawng Jesuh tengah , “ Kaimi he kan hek ai na ti oh atah awk kaw khuiah n'kuun sak u hawn ” tila a bih u .
40008032	Jesuh lawng , “ Cet uh , ” a tina . Tedawngah ahimi lawng co u tih awk kaw khuila kuun u . Awk boeih te cehthleeng ah plit tih tuilii ah tla tih duek boeih .
40008033	Awkdoen hue lawng aloela heeng u tih khawpui khuila kuun u , raaithe aka be thlaang pahih kawng oen a huh thli boeih te a thui u .
40008034	Tedawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih tah Jesuh te huh ham cet u ; Jesuh te a huh u veng atah te ram kalawng atloela ceh ham reenna a bih u .
40009001	Jesuh te lowng khuila kuun , tuilii ah kat tih khatben tuirall amah khaw la te meel koep phai .
40009002	Te huen ah aka khawn thlaangtlo pakhat te ihphah dawngah avan kawh u tih Jesuh tengla avan khuen u . Jesuh lawng ahimi kah oengna te a huh vengah , aka khawn thlaang te , “ Ka capa , na ngai mawng sak ! na thawlhna boeih khawdawpngaai la awm poen ” a tina .
40009003	Tevengah Mosi phungawl cangpueikung khatsut hue lawng amami kaw khuiah , “ He kah thlaang lawng Pathen thekhana awl a thui nawh pai he ! ” ti u .
40009004	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah kawpoek te a ming tih , “ N'tu kawngah te ang thaihu the te na poek u ?
40009005	Na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen ti he aw aka yoeii bet , tihnawhtah , tho lang cet loeih ! ti he aw aka yoeii bet ?
40009006	Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai sawah thawlh khawdawp ngaai thaina a khueh ti he kan ming sak u ai , ” a tina tih aka khawn thlaang te “ Tho lah , na himbai te lo lang im la cet loeih ! ” a tina .
40009007	Te thlaang lawng tho tih im la cet .
40009008	Thlaangping lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a ngai hang u tih te ang saithaina thlaanghing tengah aka pe Pathen te a thangpawm u .
40009009	Te huen kalawng Jesuh te cet phai tih Matthai a ti u mangmu cawikung amah yungim ah aka ngawl te a huh . Jesuh lawng , “ Ka hu ah va bang lah ” a tina . Matthai lawng tho tih a hu ah bang .
40009010	Jesuh te Matthai im ah buh a caak vengah mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaangthawlh broe lawng Jesuh oen a hubang hue te buh haih a veel puei u .
40009011	Farasi khatsut lawng te tila buh a veel haih u te a huh vengah a hubang hue te , “ N'tu ah na saya lawng mangmu cawikung oen thlaangthawlh hue oen ah buh haih a caak ? tila a doet .
40009012	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awldoetna te a yaak tih , “ Sading thlaang lawng sibawi ngoe nawh , tede thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni angoe , ” a tina .
40009013	Va cet u lang , “ Ramsa oen thawthuengna lak ah reenna lungbui te ni ka ngaih , ” tila caciim lawng a thuingaihna te poek u lah ! Thlaangdoeng khue ham ka law nawh tih thlaangthawlh khue ham ni ka law ” a tina .
40009014	Tecoengah Baptisma pekung Johan kah hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih , “ N'tu ah kaimi oen Farasi hue lawng atah buh ka yeh u tih nang kah hubang hue lawngtah buh a yeh u nawh ? ” tila a doet u .
40009015	Jesuh lawng , “ Yuluipoei ah yulokung a awm khuiah poei aka bur kamyin thli te a kaw the u ai aw ? Tede ahimi teng kalawng yulokung te athlala a khuenna khawhin apha vengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai .
40009016	A-u lawngkhaw angki pawn te hisa athaai oen baw vai nawh , hisa athaai oen a baw atah angki ruem te a doek vetih a puut kau tare ai .
40009017	Te tih van angla a-u lawngkhaw , misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap ruem dawngah thloen nawh , athloen atah saphaw te puut ai , misurtui khaw ceu thloep vetih saphaw te khaw pawn ai . Tedawngah misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap athaai dawngah a thloen , te atah pahih bok la sueng ai , a tina .
40009018	He awl he Jesuh lawng a thui lii vengah Judah bawi pakhat te a tengla va law , a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih , “ Ka canu tapekca roe ah duek ; va law lang a sawah na kut tloeng pe lah , ahih tah hing koep badai , ” a tina .
40009019	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng tho tih a hu ah a vai , a hubang hue khaw ahih oen cet haih u .
40009020	Kum thlaihih khui thi suntlaak tlawhna oen aka tlo hutaa pakhat Jesuh kah a hu ben kalawng va law tih ahih kah baidung te a tek .
40009021	Te hutaa lawng , “ A baidung hmoi bueng mah ka tek mai kawinih ka hoeih sui de , ” tila a thinkaw ah a poek .
40009022	Jesuh lawng a hu benla mang tih hutaa te a huh vengah , “ Ka canu na ngaai mawng sak ; na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen , ” a tina . Teveng tue roe ah hutaa te hoeih pahoei .
40009023	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng Judah bawi im khuila kuun . Rawkk im ah riingding aka tum hue oen curumngang la aka awm hue te a huh vengah ,
40009024	“ Cet u lah ! hutaaca he a duek moenih , aka ip ni ! ” a tina . Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a nuihna u .
40009025	Thlaangping te a ceh boeih coeng khoeng ah Jesuh lawng hutaaca kah akhann khuila kuun , a kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh vengah hutaaca te tho .
40009026	He awlthang he a teng avaai kah ram pum boeih ah thaang khok .
40009027	Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih a ceh phai vengah mikpum thlaang pahih lawng a hu ah a vai hih tih , “ Devid Capa , kaihih he n'reen lah ! ” tila paang hih .
40009028	Jesuh te im khuila a kuun vengah mikpum rawi te a tengla va law hih . Jesuh lawng . “ Kai lawng kan hoeih sak thai ti he na oeng hih aw ? ” tila a doet . “ Oeih , Bawipa ! kan oeng ” a tina hih .
40009029	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih rawi kah mik te a tek pe tih , “ Na oeng hih angla coengg hawn seh , ” a tina .
40009030	Ahih rawi kah mik tah tueng koep . Jesuh lawng te rawi te “ He he a-u tengah khaw thui roe roe boel , ” a tina .
40009031	Tede te rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh kah awlthang te ram pum boeih ah a heh khonghak .
40009032	Te kah thlaang pahih te a mel vengah , thlaangvaang hue lawng raaithe aka khueh awlmueh thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u .
40009033	Jesuh lawng raaithe te a hek pe coeng khoeng ah te thlaang lawng cal thai koep tih te kah thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u . “ Israel thlaang tim ah he ang he n'hu vai u nawh ” ti u .
40009034	Tede Farasi hue lawngtah , “ Raaithe hek thaina huham Jesuh aka pekung he Raaibawi ni , ” ti u .
40009035	Jesuh lawng khawpui oen vangca boeih la cet tih a hiil . Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei . Vaan ram kawng Awlthang Theen a phawng , tlawhnatna soeprep oen ah aka tlo thlaang boeih te a hoeih sak .
40009036	Jesuh lawng thlaang yahawh te a huh vengah doenkung aka awm nawh tuu angla , bawmkung taal tih lakueng rihna oen khawdeng ming ruila a awm u te a huh vengah a reen tangkiik .
40009037	Tedawngah a hubang hue tengah tila a thui , “ Caang ah ham yahawh hlang de aka aat ham thlaang yawlca ,
40009038	Caang aka aat thlaang yahawh avan tuihna ham lotoenkung tengah thangthui uh , ” a tina .
40010001	Jesuh lawng a hubang paha thlaihih hue te a khue tun tih , raaithe hek thaina , tlawhna oen natna soeprep hoeih sak thaina te a peek .
40010002	A hubang paha thlaihih hue kah a miing tah , “ lamhacuekla Simon ( Piter a ti u te ) oen a manau Andru ; Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen a manau Johan ;
40010003	Filip oen Bartalomiu , Tawmas oen mangmu cawikung Matthai , Alfias capa Jeem , oen Tadias ;
40010004	Phunkuup Simon oen Jesuh sawah paipi thleepkung Judah Iskariot , he hue ni .
40010005	Jesuh lawng a hubang paha thlaihih hue te he tila awl a uen tih a tuih u ; “ Gental ram oen Samaria ram khawpui boeih ah cet u boel .
40010006	Te lak ah Israel thlaangphun aka auh tuu tengah cet uh . ”
40010007	Cet u lang , “ Vaan ram tah yoeiica poen ” tila phawng uh .
40010008	Thlaangtlo hoeih sak uh , thlaangduek thawh sak koep uh , haibe natna hoeih sak u lang raaithe thli te hek uh . Ayoela na dang u te ayoela pe u van .
40010009	Sui , ngun oen ruhum tangka khaw na angkithlep dawngah khuen u boel ;
40010010	Yin cehna sawngsa khaw , Angki , khawmuek oen cawnghol khaw ahoei khuen u boel . Bii aka bi tah angoe boeih te peek la awm badai .
40010011	Khawpui khaw vangca vangnau khaw na pha u vengah awmngaihcala n'do tih aka pah sak ham koei im te tlap u lang na voei thlantoe te im ah cam uh .
40010012	Im khuila na kuun u vengah , “ Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh , ” tina uh .
40010013	Te imkhuikaw lawng nang te n'do tih m'pah sak atah na voemtoeina awl ngaimawngna tah te im khuiah awm hawn seh ! ; tede nangmi te n'do nawh tih m'pah sak nawh atah na voemtoeina awl ngaimawngna te lat koep uh .
40010014	Khatsut imkhuikaw , tihnawhtah khaaw pakhat khat lawngah nangmi te n'do nawh tih na awl thui te khaw a hutung nawh atah ceh taak lang na khow dawngkah laidiik te khoek pe uh ,
40010015	Atak tang kavan thui u , “ Awlcekna khawhin ah te khaaw kah thlaang thli lak ah Sodom oen Gomorrah khaaw kah thlaang thli te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai ai , ” a tina .
40010016	“ Hutung u lah ! metaang tim ah tuu angla nangmi he kan tuih u . Tedawngah ruul angla na cuih khueh u lang akhuu angla na kaw daw sak uh .
40010017	Ngaithuen uh , nangmi te tuuk hamla thlaang va law ai , awlcekna yung la n'khuen u vetih sinakok bok-im ah khaw m'bawh u ai .
40010018	Kai kawng dawngah awlcek ham ukkung thli oen sengpahrang haiah n'khuen u vetih ahimi oen Gental hue tengah Awlthang Theen na phawng u ai .
40010019	Nangmi te awlcek ham n'khuen u vengah n'tu ka thui ai , metila ka thui ai tila lakueng u boel , atue a pha vengah na thui ham koei te m'peek badai .
40010020	Na thui ham koei awl te tah nangmi awl nawh ni . Te awl tah Pa Pathen Muithla lawng nangmi dawng kalawng a thui ai .
40010021	“ Thlaang lawngah a maya manau te duek sak hamla thlaang kut ah a peek u ai , te tih van angla ana pa lawng a ca thli tengah a sai van ai ; a ca thli lawngkhaw a manu oen ana pa te a raalna vetih ngawn sak hamla thlaangtloe kut ah a peek u ai .
40010022	Kai kawng dawngah thlaang boeih lawng nangmi te n'thina ai ; tede a-u khaw aboettoe ueh atah Pathen lawng a thlawn ai .
40010023	Khaaw pakhat ah nangmi te n'heemtek tih ng'ngawn u atah khaw tloe la heeng uh . Atak tang kavan thui u ! Thlaanghing Capa a law thlan ah Israel ram boeih ah bii na coeng u manawh .
40010024	“ Sengcamoe lawng saya sawah awm nawh . Bawi sawah tamnaa lawngkhaw awm nawh .
40010025	Tedawngah sengcamoe lawng saya angla , tamnaa lawng a bawi angla a awm atah a kaw a tluep ham awm mai . Imkhuikaw kah a luu koek te Beelzebul tila a khue u atah , a cakaw hue tare tah te lak ah anauh ngaai miingthe oen a khue u ai ! ” a tina .
40010026	Tedawngah thlaang te rih u boel . Tahe ah thuh elh la aka awm boeih he phumpho vetih awlhuep boeih te ming la awm ai .
40010027	Yiin samangting ah kavan thui he hingthun khawse ah thui koep uh ; ahuepla na yaak te imphu kalawng phawng uh .
40010028	Pum bueng a ngawn thai tih muithla aka ngawn thai nawh thlaang te rih u boel . Pum oen muithla pahih bokla hell khuiah aka ngawn thai Pathen te rih uh .
40010029	Pheksa seen pakhat oen variit pahih na lai thai . Tede variit pakhat Pateng na Pa lawng ming ohla dilai ah tla tih duek nawh .
40010030	Nangmi tare tah na luu dawngkah samthaam Pateng khaw a toek boeih .
40010031	Tedawngah rih u boel , nangmi tah variit yahawh lak ah na phu awm ngaai . ”
40010032	“ A-u khaw kai kah thlaang la a awmna te thlaangping haiah a pai puei khak atah vaan kah a Pa haiah ahih te ka pai puei van ai .
40010033	Tede a-u khaw thlaangping haiah kai aka hoett tah vaan kah a Pa haiah ahih te ka hoett van ai .
40010034	“ Kai he dilai dawngah roepna awm sak hamla va law tila poek u boel , roepna awm sak ham ka law nawh , samsen ni kavan khuen .
40010035	Kai tah a capa oen ana pa , a canu oen a manu , a la-nga oen a manii raal u sak ham ni ka law .
40010036	Thlaang pakhat ham aka nauh koek raal tah amah cakaw ni .
40010037	“ A-u khaw kai lak ah a manu oen ana pa te a thintlawhna ngaai atah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh : A-u khaw kai lak ah a capa oen a canu te a thintlawhna ngaai atah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh .
40010038	A-u khaw amah kah thinglam te a kawh tih ka hu aka vai nawh tah kai kah hubang la koeih nawh .
40010039	A-u khaw a hingna dang ham aka yawm tah a hingna a thlawng ai ; a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a hingna te a thlawng atah hingna te a dang ai .
40010040	“ A-u khaw nangmi aka do thlaang tah kai aka do thlaang la awm tih a-u khaw kai aka do tah kai aka tuihkung te a do .
40010041	A-u khaw Pathen kah celtuih aka do tah Pathen kah celtuih a do dawngah celtuih hue kah kutdo te a dang van ai . A-u khaw thlaangdoeng pakhat te thlaangdoeng la a awm dawngah a do atah ahih kah kutdo te a dang van ai .
40010042	Atak tang kavan thui u ; A-u lawngkhaw ka hubang thli yingkah huhsitkoek pakhat te kai kah hubang la a awm dawngah tuiding boengloeng khui at mai khaw a tuul atah kutdo a dang ngaai ai ” a tina .
40011001	Jesuh lawng a hubang thlaangha thlaihih tengah he awl he a thui pe coengah te huen kalawng tho tih cang puei ham oen awlthang phawng ham a teng-avai kah khawpui boeih ah cet .
40011002	Baptisma pekung Johan lawng Jesuh Khrih kah thaihu a sai kawng te thongim kalawng a yaak vengah a hubang khatsut hue te Jesuh tengla a tuih .
40011003	“ Aka law ham koei thlaang he nang poen aw ? tih nawh atah thlaangtloe aw ka lamtoen u huen ai ? van thui lah ! ” tila Jesuh te a doet sak .
40011004	Jesuh lawng , “ Meel koep u lang , na yaak boeih oen na huh boeih te Johan tengah thui pe uh :
40011005	Mikpum lawng a mik tueng poen , Khawkheem lawng cet thai poen , haibe aka na lawng hoeih poen , haapang lawng awl a yaak , thlaangduek thli lawng tho tih khawdeng harah thli tengah Awlthang Theen phawng la awm poen .
40011006	Kai kawng dawngah uepvoetna aka khueh nawh tah yotheen kam-awmna aka dawng thlaang la awm ! ”
40011007	Johan kah a hubang hue a ceh coengah , Johan kawng he Jesuh lawng thlaangping tengah a thui pe : “ Ramhum huhang Johan tengla na ceh u vengah n'tu huh ham na ngaiuep u ? Yilh lawng a yawng tih aka tat mailai capuu aw huh na ngaih u ?
40011008	N'tu bueh hamla na ceh u ? Bai-naak theen oen aka thoeicam u thlaang te huh ham aw ? Te ang bai-naak aka buen te sengpahrang im ah ni a awm !
40011009	Van thui u lah , n'tu huh ham na ceh u ? Tawngha aw ? Oeih ! tawngha na huh u ; tede na bueh u te tawngha lak ah aka lenduet ni .
40011010	Johan he tah caciim dawngah : ‘ Pathen lawng , nangmi hamla lawngpui roekbahkung ka laipai nangmi haiah kavan tuih ai , ’ tila a thui te ni .
40011011	Atak tang kavan thui u , hutaa lawng a cuun thlaang tim ah Baptisma pekung Johan lak ah aka lenduet a-u khaw awm nawh . Tede Vaan ram ah huhsit koekla aka awm te Johan lak ah lenduet .
40011012	Johan lawng phungthui a tongcuek veng kalawng tihin toe Vaan Ram he raalna oen thekhana angaihhlangla a ming tih aka raalna thli lawng taa hamla tha a huer u .
40011013	Johan dung toe tawngha boeih oen Mosi kah Phungawl lawng Vaan ram kawng te a thui u .
40011014	Nangmi lawngah ahimi kah awl te tangna ham na ngaih u atah Johan he tah va law ai tila a thui oepsoeh u Elijah poen ni .
40011015	Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya u hawn seh !
40011016	“ Tahe san kah thlaang thli he n'tu oen nuem ka nuehtah lah ai ? Ahimi tah thaihu yoeihna huen ah aka ngawl camaw thli oen lo u .
40011017	‘ Thlaangvaang lawngah a tloe hue te , nangmi hamla yuluina riingding kavan tum u , tede na laam u nawh ! duek laa kavan sak u , tede na rap u nawh ! tila a paang thil u . ’
40011018	Johan a law vengah , ahih lawng buh a yeh tih misurtui khaw a awkk nawh dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ahih tah raaithe oen be ! ’ na ti u .
40011019	Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah ahih lawng a caak a awkk dawngah thlaang boeih lawng , “ He thlaang he bueh u lah ! caruut awlam thlaang ni , mangmu cawikung hue oen thlaangthawlh hue kah a paya ni ” na ti u . Tede Pathen cuihna tah soeng tila a saina oen a tueng sak ” a tina .
40011020	Jesuh lawng kawpoekraina yahawh hlang a saina khawpui thli kah thlaang hue lawng thawlhna a yut u nawh dawngah te khawpui thli te a toel atham .
40011021	Korazin , nang hamla khawmap tangkiik nawh pai he ! Betsaida , nang ham khaw khawmap tangkiik nawh pai he ! nangmi tengkah kawpoekraina ka sai thli he Taiar oen Sidon ah ka sai kawinih te kah thlaang hue lawng a thawlh yutna tueng sakna ham tlamhi oen a thiing u coengah amah oen amah haiphu oen phull u vetih a thawlhna yut u poen sui de .
40011022	Atak tang kavan thui u ; Awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng nangmi lak ah Taiar oen Sidon khaaw kah thlaang hue te a reen bet ai .
40011023	Nang Kapernaum namah oen namah vaan la pawmsang u ham na ngaih aw ? Hell ah thlaak la na awm ai ! Nangmi khaaw kah kawpoekraina ka sai he Sidon khaaw ah ka sai kawinih tihin toe ah te khaaw te awm hun sui de !
40011024	Atheenla ming uh ! Awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng nang lak ah Sidon khaaw te a reen bet ai ! ” a tina .
40011025	Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ Apa , dilai oen vaan kah Bawipa ! Thlaangcuih oen aka thoemthai hue tengah na thuh te aka thoemthai nawh hue tengah na tueng sak dawngah kan uem tangkiik .
40011026	Oeih , Apa , he ang he nang lawng coengg sak hamla na ngaih roe ni . ” tila a thui .
40011027	“ Apa lawng thaihu soeprep boeih m'peek poen . Apa nawh tah a-u lawngkhaw Capa te ming nawh . Capa oen amah te m'ming seh tila Capa lawng a tueng sak thlaang thli teng bueng nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw a Pa te ming u manawh .
40011028	“ Thalrih aka phuei tih tha aka hoengg thli boeih ka tengla law u lah , kai lawngah duemdawngna kan pe u ai .
40011029	Kai kah hawphueih he lo lang phuei u lah , kai tah kawdaw oen boe-ngaaina thinkaw ka khueh dawngah kai tengah cang u lah ; ngaimawngna kan pe ai .
40011030	Kai lawng kan phueih sak hawphueih tah a phueih khaw nep tih thalrih khaw yaanghoep , ” a tina .
40012001	Tecoeng adiw aih thlan ah Jesuh tah sabbath hin ah lo lak kalawng pat cet . A hubang thli buh a pawng u dawngah caangvui te a yuun u tih a caak u .
40012002	Farasi thli lawng a huh vengah , Jesuh nala “ Bueh lah , na hubang hue lawng sabbath hin ah he tila a sai u he kaimi kah Phungawl a phe , ” a tina u .
40012003	Jesuh lawng , “ Devid oen a thlaang hue lawng a bung a pawng u vengah n'tu a sai tite na tae u nooek nawh aw ?
40012004	Devid lawng Pathen im khuila kuun tih , Pathen tengah a peek u takawi , khawsoeih hue bueng lawng a caak koei takawi te Devid oen a thlaang hue lawng a caak u teta ahimi lawng Mosi phungawl eek u nawh aw ?
40012005	Te bueng ohla sabbath hin takuem ah khawsoeih hue lawng Tempal khuiah sabbath phung a eek u poepa de thawlhna la awm nawh tite na tae u nawh aw ?
40012006	Tempal lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm . ”
40012007	Caciim lawng , “ Kai tah boiava oen thawthueng lak ah reenna te ka ngaih ngaai a tite a thuingaihna awltak na ming u kawinih aka thawlh nawh thlaang thli te thawlh na peel u nawh sui de .
40012008	Metihtiah Thlaanghing Capa tah Sabbath Bawi ni ” a tina .
40012009	Jesuh tah te huen kalawng cet tih sinakok bok-im la kuun .
40012010	Te kah sinakok bok-im ah kutkheem thlaang pakhat awm . Te ah te Jesuh thawlh peel ham aka ngaih thlaang khatsut awm . Ahimi lawng Jesuh te , “ Sabbath hin ah thlaang hoeih sak ham mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih kai aw ? ” tila a doet u .
40012011	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng tuu pakhat a khueh tih Sabbath hin ah ungrawm dung khuila tla kawinih tuu te doek tih lawh ohla na awm ai aw ?
40012012	Thlaanghing he tuu lak ah a phu tlo . Tedawngah Sabbath hin ah thlaang bawmcem ham mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih ” a tina .
40012013	Tecoengah te kah kutkheem thlaang te , “ na kut yueng lah ” a tina . Ahih lawng a kut te a yueng vengah khatben kut angla theen koep .
40012014	Tecoengah Farasi hue lawng cet u tih Jesuh te ngawn hamla a teeng u .
40012015	Jesuh amah ngawn ham a teeng u te a yaak vengah te huen kalawng ah cet . Tevengah thlaangping lawng a hu ah bung a vai u . Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak .
40012016	Amah kawng te thlaangtloe tengah thui nawh ham a khaang pe .
40012017	He tila a sai he tah Pathen lawng tawngha Isaiah hawna oen : a thui oepsoeh te asoepna ham ni .
40012018	Isaiah lawng “ He tah ka lungna , ka thinkaw aka deng ka tuihyoeihthlaang ka tuek te ni . Ahih sawah ka Muithla te ka khueh vetih , doengna phung te thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng ai .
40012019	Ahih lawngtah thlaang te oelhtaih nawh vetih paang manawh . Lawngpui ah a awl a kaa te a-u lawngkhaw ya manawh .
40012020	Doengna lawng taana te a khueh thlantoe toeng ohla a sai ai . Ahih lawngtah aka tlot tawm caapu thing te khaw khemtlot nawh vetih aka duek tawm hai-im te khaw thih yip manawh .
40012021	Ahih te thlaangphun boeih lawng a uepna ai , ” tila a thui te a soepna ham ni .
40012022	Tecoengah thlaang khatsut lawng raaithe a khueh dawngah a mik pum tih awl aka mueh thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u . Jesuh lawng te thlaang te a hoeih sak dawngah awl khaw a thui thai tih a mik khaw tueng koep .
40012023	Jesuh kah a saina dawngah thlaang broe lawng a kawpoek rai u tih , “ Ahih he Devid Capa tangtang cawini ! ” ti u .
40012024	Farasi hue lawng he awl he a yaak vengah ahimi lawng ; ” Ahih lawngah raaithe a hek thai he tah ahimi ukkung Beelzebul lawng raaithe hek thaina huham tharana a peek dawngah ni , ” a tina u .
40012025	Ahimi kah poekna te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi tengah , “ Ram pakhat ah a kawpoek vai u nawh tih athloekla pek u tih raal u kawinih asanhlang cak manawh . Tih van angla khawpui pakhat tihnawhtah imkhuikaw pakhat ah pek bo u tih raal u kawinih pai thai manawh .
40012026	Tedawngah Seitan ram khuiah bu pakhat oen pakhat raal u kawinih te ram te bu la pek u poen dawngah kawlkalh ah rawk ai .
40012027	Nangmi lawngah Beelzebul lawng huham tharana a peek dawngah kai lawng raaithe a hek thai na ti u . Tetih atah nangmi kah hubang hue te raaithe hek thaina huham tharana a-u lawng a peek kai ? Nangmi kah sai thawlh he namami kah hubang hue lawng a tueng sak !
40012028	Raaithe hek thaina huham he Beelzebul kah nawh ni , tede kai he raaithe hek thaina huham tharana pekung tah Pathen Muithla ni , raaithe hek thaina lawng he nangmi sawah Pathen ram avan pha poen tite a tueng sak .
40012029	“ A tha aka ra thlaang te a piin lamha nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw a im te a muk tih a kaawn te lawh pe thai nawh ; amah te a piin coengah a kaawn te a lawh pe thai ai .
40012030	A-u khaw kai aka pai puei nawh tah kai aka raalna thlaang ni . A-u khaw kai lawng thlaang ka caawi vengah aka caawi puei nawh tah pekbokung ni .
40012031	Tedawngah kavan thui u , thlaanghing lawng me ang thawlhna khaw a sai tih Pathen thekhana awlthe awlkha phoei mai cakhaw a sawah khawdawp a ngaai pe ai , tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla thekhana awl a thui atah a sawah khawdawp ngaai pe manawh .
40012032	A-u khaw thlaanghing Capa raalna awlthe thui mai cakhaw a sawah khawdawp a ngai ai , tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla raalna awlthe aka thui tah tahe ah khaw , hailam ben toe meveng khaw a sawah khawdawp ngaai pe tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
40012033	“ Athaih theen dang ham thingkung theen khueh a ngoe . Thingkung the na khueh atah athaih the van ai . Ame ang thingkung tite athaih rang oen m'ming thai ai .
40012034	Nangmi ruul hue ; Na the u lal maiah metila awltheen na thui u thai ai ? Lungbui khuiah aka awm te kaa dawng kalawng va thoeng .
40012035	Thlaangdoeng lawngtah thaihu theen a kuem khuikah thaihu theen te a pho sak ; Thlaangthe lawngtah thaihu the a kuem khuikah thaihu the te a pho sak van .
40012036	Atak tang kavan thui u ; “ Awlcekna Hin atah thlaang boeih lawng awlpoei a thuina dawngah awlcekna a yawkk ai .
40012037	Na dok oen na tangna te mingna ham namah kah awlthui te awlcekna ham a hawna ai . ”
40012038	Tecoengah Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut oen Farasi khatsut hue lawng , ” Saya ! kawpoekraina na sai te huh ham ka ngaih u ” a tina .
40012039	Jesuh lawng “ Tahe san kah thlaangthe oen Pathen n'tu la aka sak nawh thlaang hue nangmi lawng kawpoekraina sai ham nan ceel u ? Ka sai manawh ! Atloe kawpoekraina nawh tih Tawngha Jonah kah kawpoek-raina bueng te ni na huh u ai .
40012040	Jonah tah nga bung khuiah yiin daai hin thum a awm angla Thlaanghing Capa khaw yiin daai hin thum dilai khuiah awm van ai .
40012041	Nineveh khawpui kah thlaang thli lawng Jonah kah phungthui awl a yaak u dawngah a thawlhna yut u , Awlcekna Hin ah ahimi lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh n'peel u ai . Atak tang kavan thui u , Jonah lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm .
40012042	Sheba sengpahrang Nu lawng Solomon kah cuihna awl hutung ham athlahlang amah ram kalawng va law ; Awlcekna Hin ah ahih lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh n'pup ai . Atak tang kavan thui u , Solomon lak ah aka lenduet he ah awm ” a tina .
40012043	“ Thlaang pakhat kaw khui kalawng raaithe te a co vengah , ramhum huhang a hiil tih a awmna huen a tlap : a awmna huen a dang nawh vengah ,
40012044	Ka im la ka meel koep ai , tila a poek . Tedawngah a meel koep phai vengah im aciimbiitla awm tih atheenla thaihu akuem te a huh .
40012045	Tecoengah cet koep tih amah lak ah aka the ngaai raaithe pasarih te avan law puei tih te im ah awm u . Tedawngah a hukhueng ah te thlaang tah acuek veng lak ah nauh tare . He tih van angla tahe san kah thlaangthe thli tengah awm van ai ” a tina .
40012046	Jesuh lawng thlaangping tim ah awl a thui lii vengah , a manu nucahui law u tih ahih oen awl thui a ngaih u dawngah im adau ben ah pai u .
40012047	Tedawngah thlaangping timkah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh te “ Bueh lah ! na nu nucahui nang oen awl thui a ngaih u tih adau ben ah pai u ” a tina .
40012048	Jesuh lawng , “ A nu te a-u nuem ? ka manau hue te a-u nuem ? ” a tina .
40012049	Tecoengah a hubang hue te a khi tih , “ Bueh u lah ! a nu oen ka manau hue tah ahimi he ni !
40012050	A-u khaw vaan ah aka awm a Pa kawngaih aka sai tah ka maya , ka manau , ka ngannu oen a nu ni , ” a tina .
40013001	Te hin ah Jesuh lawng te im te a thawh taak tih Galili tuiliikeeng la cet ; cang puei ham te ah te ngawl .
40013002	Ahih aka veel thlaangping a yahawh aih dawngah Jesuh tah lowng khuila kuun tih ngawl ; thlaangping hue tah tuilii-keeng ah pai u .
40013003	Jesuh lawng thuidoetna awl oen ahimi te thaihu moen a thui pe . “ Voei khat ah caangti hehkung thlaang pakhat tah caangti heh hamla cet .
40013004	Ahih lawng caangti te lo khuiah a heh vengah khatsut tah lawngpui ah tla tih va lawng a ruh boeih .
40013005	Caangti khatsut tah lungrawng sawkah dilai ah tla , dilai apam dawngah kawlkalh ah caangti tah po .
40013006	Tede khaw a ling hang atah caangpawk te khawling lawng a kaang , a yung te a dung la a thlak nawh dawngah kawlkalh ah yai tih reu .
40013007	Caangti khatsut tah thliing tim ah tla , thliingkung tah roeng hang tih caang te malh a telh .
40013008	Tede caangti khatsut tah laitheen dawngah tla tih a vui a thaih thaawn . Khatsut tah apueh yakhat , sawmruk , sawm thum toe la nawl . ”
40013009	Jesuh lawng , “ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya hawn seh ” a tina .
40013010	Tecoengah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih , “ Thlaangping tengah awl na thui vengah n'tu hamla thuidoetna awl na hawna ? ” tila a doet u .
40013011	Jesuh lawng , “ Vaan ram kawng awlhuep mingna te nangmi tengah kan peek poen , tede ahimi tah ka pe thlan .
40013012	A-u khaw aka khueh te tah a taawm pe vetih a ngoena lak ah a khueh tare ai ; tede aka khueh nawh te tah a khueh duen te a lawh pe ai .
40013013	Ahimi tengah awl ka thui vengah thuidoetna ka hawna he tah ahimi lawng a bueh u , tede hu u nawh , a hutung u , tede ya u nawh , yaakming khaw yaakming u nawh .
40013014	Tedawngah Tawngha Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh awl te ahimi tengah soep . Te awl tah : “ He thlaang hue lawng a hutung tah a hutung u de , yaakming u nawh ; a bueh tah a bueh u de hu u nawh ,
40013015	Metihtiah a kawpoek biing sut tih a haa a buem khoep u , a mik te a yiin khoep u , tih nawh kawinih ahimi mik lawng a huh vetih a haa lawng a yaak coengah a thinkaw lawng a yaakming vetih ka tengla va meel u ai , ahimi te kai lawng ka hoeih sak sui de ” tila Pathen lawng a thui te ni .
40013016	“ Nangmi tah na yotheen phoeih . Na mik lawng a huh tih na haa lawng a yaak u .
40013017	Atak tang kavan thui u , nangmi lawng na huh u he tawngha hue oen Pathen kah thlaang hue lawng huh ham a ngaih u tangkiik de hu u thai nawh ; nangmi lawng na yaak te yaak ham a ngaih de ya u nawh , ” a tina .
40013018	Tedawngah caangti hehkung thuidoetna awl thuicaihna he hutung u lang yaakming u lah .
40013019	A-u khaw Vaan ram kawng awlthang a yaak de aka yaakming nawh te tah lawngpui ah aka tla caangti oen lo u . Ahimi thinkaw ah a heh u caangti te Seitan lawng law tih a rot pe .
40013020	Lungrawng sawkah dilai apamna ah aka tla caangti tah Vaan ram kawng a yaak vengah awmngaihcala aka do koeloe thlaang oen lo u .
40013021	Tede , ahimi kah thinkaw lungbui ah Vaan ram kawng a thlengyung a thlaak nawh dawngah asan hlang hing nawh . Tedawngah Vaan ram kawng dawngah thekha raina oen heemtekna soeprep a law vengah ahimi lawng kawlkalh ah a hoett pahoei .
40013022	Thliing tim ah aka tla caangti thui-ngaihna tah Vaan ram kawng tah a yaak de dilai khawsakna dawngah lakueng tih dilai han bawilen ngaihna lawng akang ahalh khoep tih caangvui caangthaih aka thaawn nawh oen lo u .
40013023	Laitheen dawngah aka tla caangti tah Vaan ram kawng te a yaak tih aka yaakming thlaang te a thuingaihna , ahimi tah a vui athaih thaawn tih apueh yakhat , apueh sawmruk , apueh sawmthum la thaawn .
40013024	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah atloe thuidoetna pakhat a thui pe : “ Vaan ram tah amah lo ah caangti theen aka heh thlaang pakhat oen lo u .
40013025	Yiin at atah , thlaang boeih a ih coengah raal pakhat law tih caang tim ah varaamcaang a heh tih a ceh taak .
40013026	Caangkung tah roeng tih avui arai hang atah varaamcaang khaw pho van .
40013027	Lokhuehkung kah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng a tengla law u tih , Bawipa ! na lo khuiah caangti theen ni na heh de , ame kah varaamcaang he a po oh kai ? ” a tina u .
40013028	Ahih lawngah , “ Te ngoen tah raal thli lawng a heh ni , ” a tina . Ahimi lawng , “ Ka cet u silang varaamcaang te ka phuk u ai aw ? ” tila a doet u .
40013029	Lokhuehkung lawng “ Phuk u boel , ” varaamcaang te na phuk u kawinih caangkung oen na phuk renten u hau ai ” a tina .
40013030	Caang ah tue a pha thlantoe caangkung oen varaamcaang te roeng haih hawn seh . Caang ah tue a pha vengah cang-aat hue te lamhala varaamcaang te phuk , tuum u langtah hai dawngah phuum uh , te coengah caang te aat uh ! caawi u langtah ka thaidi khuiah sang uh , ka tina badai . ” a tina .
40013031	Jesuh lawng atloe thuidoetna pakhat ahimi tengah a thui pe : “ Vaan ram tah he tila awm . Thlaang pakhat lawng antammu a lawh tih a lo khuiah a heh .
40013032	Antammu tah amu-ati boeih lak ah a yiitkoek la awm . Tede po tih a roeng hang atah akung boeih lak ah aka bo koek la awm . Thingkung pakhat la pai , va thli law tih a beek dawngah bu a tuk . ”
40013033	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah atloe thuidoetna pakhat a thui pe baal : “ Vaan ram tah he tila awm . Hutaa pakhat lawng tawlru a lawh tih taa-eek hawl at dawng a phull atah a raawi sak boeih oen lo u ” tila Jesuh lawng a tina .
40013034	Jesuh lawng he thaihu boeih thlaangping tengah a thui vengah thuidoetna a hawna . Thuidoetna hawna ohla n'tu khaw thui nawh .
40013035	He tila a thui he tah Tawngha lawng , “ Ahimi tengah awl ka thui vengah thuidoetna ka hawna ai ; Dilai a suen cuek kalawng ming nooek nawh awlhuep te ka thui ai , ” tila a thui te a soepna ham ni .
40013036	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a ceh taak tih im khuila a kuun vengah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih , “ Lo khuikah varaamcaang thuidoetna te acaihla van thui lah ” a tina u .
40013037	Jesuh lawng , “ Caangti theen aka heh tah Thlaanghing Capa ni ;
40013038	Lo tah he dilai ni ; caangti theen tah Vaan ram aka paang thlaang hue ni ; varaamcaang tah Seitan kah thlaang hue ni ;
40013039	Varaamcaang aka heh raal tah Seitan ni ; caang ah tue tah dilai a boetna ; caangaatkung tah vanthlaang hue ni .
40013040	Varaamcaang te a caawi tih hai dawng a phuum angla dilai aboet tue atah te tila awm van ai .
40013041	Thlaanghing Capa lawng vanthlaang thli te avan tuih vetih thawlhna ben la thlaang aka ceh sak boeih oen thaihu the aka sai boeih te amah Ram khuiah a caawi sak vetih ,
40013042	Vanthlaang lawng ahimi te haialh dawngah a phuum ai , te huen ah rap vetih a naw a rueng u ai .
40013043	Tevengah thlaangdoeng thli tah ana pa Pathen kah Ram ah khaw angla see u ai . Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawng ya u lah ! ” a tina .
40013044	“ Vaan ram tah he oen lo u . Thlaang pakhat lawng lo ah khawh-arang a thuh te a huh . Ahih lawng atheenla a up koep tih awmngaihla im la cet . A khueh thaihu boeih te a yoeih coengah meel koep tih te kah lohuen te a lai .
40013045	“ Tecoengah Vaan ram tah he oen lo u . Thlaang pakhat lawng latha theen a tlap ,
40013046	A hih lawng latha theen te a huh vengah cet tih a khueh thaihu boeih te a yoeih coengah te kah latha te a lai .
40013047	“ Tecoengah Vaan ram tah he oen lo u . Tui aka hawi khatsut hue lawng tuilii khuiah lok te a heeng u tih nga phun soeprep te a tuuk u .
40013048	Lok dawngah nga a be atah lan la a doek u tih nga te pekbo hamla ngawl u : nga atheen te busui dawngah a sang u tih nga athe te tah a voeih u .
40013049	Dilai aboet tue atah he tila awm van ai : vanthlaang lawng law vetih thlaang theen timkah thlaangthe te a tuek coengah ,
40013050	Ahimi te haialh dawngah a phuum ai . Te huen ah ahimi lawng rap vetih a naw a rueng u ai , ” tila a thui pe u .
40013051	Jesuh lawng , “ He thaihu boeih he na yaakming u aw ? ” tila ahimi te a doet . Ahimi lawngah , “ Oeih ! ka yaakming u poen ” a tina .
40013052	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Phung-awl cangpueikung timkah thlaang pakhat , Vaan ram ah hubang pakhat la aka awm tah kaawn a khuehna im khui-kah thaihu aruem oen athaai aka sat oen lo u , ” a tina .
40013053	Jesuh lawng thuidoetna he a thui boeih coengah , te huen te a ceh taak tih ,
40013054	Amah awmna Nazaret la meel koep . Sinakok ah a cang puei tih ahih kah awl aka ya thlaang boeih a kawpoek rai u . “ He ang cuihna he me kah a huh kai ? He ang kawpoekraina he metila a sai thai kai ? ” tila te doet u patoeng .
40013055	“ Ahih he lettama capa nawh aw ? Meri he ahih kah a manu nawh aw ? Jeem , Josep , Simon oen Judah he ahih kah a manau thli nawh aw ?
40013056	He kah aka awm he a ngannu thli nawh aw ? He ang thaihu boeih he me kah a dang kai ? ” ti u .
40013057	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te hinyah u nawh . Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Tawngha tah amah awmna khawpui oen a imkhuikaw nawh atah huen tloe boeih ah a hinyah u , ” a tina .
40013058	Metihtiah ahimi lawng oengna a khueh nawh dawngah Jesuh lawng te huen ah kawpoekraina yahawh sai nawh .
40014001	Teveng tue ah Galili peng ukkung Herod lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak .
40014002	Herod lawng , “ Ahih tah aka hing koep baptisma pekung Johan tang tang ni , tedawngah kawpoekrai saithaina huham a khueh , ” tila a kut hui kah bawi hue te a thui pe .
40014003	Teveng thlan ah Herod lawng Johan te a tuuk sak tih thong khuiah a thlaak . Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah a manau Filip kah a yu Herodias kawng dawngah ni .
40014004	Voei khat ah Baptisma pekung Johan lawng Herod te , “ Herodias he na yuna ham tuueng nawh , ” a tina .
40014005	Herod lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih . Tede , Judah thlaang thli lawng Johan te tawngha pakhat ni a ti u dawngah ahimi te a rih .
40014006	Herod a cuunna hin ah Herodias canu lawng kamyin thlaang yahawh haiah laam . Herod tah a kaw hoe tangkiik tih ,
40014007	Hutaaca tengah , “ Na van bih boeih te kan pe ai , ” tila a taap tih awl a kam .
40014008	Hutaaca lawng a manu kah ceemtuh angla a bih tih , “ Baptisma pekung Johan kah a luu te beelphai dawngah tahe ah m'peh , ” a tina .
40014009	Sengpahrang tah a kawthe , tede ahih lawng kamyin boeih haiah awl a kam poen dawngah hutaaca kah a bihna angla peek ham Herod lawng awl a peek .
40014010	Tedawngah thongim khuikah Johan luu te a tloek sak .
40014011	A luu te beelphai dawngah avan khuen u tih hutaaca te a peek u , hutaaca lawng a manu tengla a khuen .
40014012	Johan kah hubang thli law u , a rawkk te a khuen u tih a up u , tecoengah ahimi lawng cet u tih Jesuh tengah a thui pe u .
40014013	Jesuh lawng Johan kawng awlthang te a yaak vengah te huen kalawng thlaang a awmna nawh a dingruena huen la lowng oen amah bueng cet . Te kawng te thlaang yahawh lawng a yaak . Tedawngah a awmna khaaw roekk kalawng law u tih lanloeih lawngpui kalawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai u .
40014014	Jesuh te lowng dawng kalawng lan la rum tih thlaangping te a huh vengah ahimi te caalla a reen tih thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak .
40014015	Thlemben tue apha veng atah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih , “ Khaw thlem poen , he huen tah thlaang a awmna nawh huen la awm , thlaangping he khaaw khui la tuih lang a mami ham caak awkk lai u seh , ” a tina .
40014016	Jesuh lawng , “ Ahimi ceh ham ngoe nawh , ’ “ Nangmi lawng caak koei pe uh , ” a tina .
40014017	A hubang hue lawng , “ Takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih bueng ni ka khueh u , ” a tina .
40014018	Jesuh lawng , “ Ka tengla van khuen u lah , ” a tina .
40014019	Thlaangping te pompih dawngah ngawlh ham awl a peek ; tecoengah takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih te a lawh , vaan la maang tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui . Jesuh lawng takawi te a eh coengah a hubang hue te a peek tih a hubang hue lawng thlaangping tengah a ree pe .
40014020	Thlaang boeih lawng a caak tih a bung hah . Tecoengah a caak coeih te a hubang hue lawng vawhphueih paha thlaihih la a caawi u .
40014021	Buh aka ca boeih tah hutaa oen camaw toek ohla tawngpataang hawng ah thlaang thong ngaa yunyan awm ai .
40014022	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a mel sak veng te ah a hubang hue te lowng khuila a kuun sak tih lamhala tuilii khatben rall la a tuih .
40014023	Thlaangping te a tuih boeih coengah Jesuh tah thangthui ham amah bueng tlaang la luui . Khaw athlem atah Jesuh amah bueng te huen ah awm .
40014024	Lowng te tuirall kalawng athlana tuiluung a pha vengah thlipui tho tih lowng te a maam khak dawngah , tuilet lawng dalh a khup .
40014025	Cinghuetaang atah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengla tui sawah cet .
40014026	Tui sawah a ceh te ahimi lawng a huh u vengah let u tih , “ Muithla ni , ” ti u tih paang u .
40014027	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a voem pahoei tih , “ Lakueng u boel ! Kai ni ; rih u boel , ” a tina .
40014028	Tecoengah Piter lawng , “ Bawipa , nang tang tang atah na teng la tui sawah ka lawna ham awl m'pe lah , ” a tina .
40014029	Jesuh lawng , “ Va law lah ! ” a tina . Tedawngah Piter te lowng khui kalawng rum tih Jesuh tengla tui sawah cet .
40014030	Tede Piter lawng khawthlii a tlawh hlang te a huh vengah a rih tih tui khuiah dalh buekk . “ Bawipa n'thlawn lah ! ” tila paang .
40014031	Jesuh lawng a kut a phawng pahoei tih ahih te a phoeih coengah , “ Na oengna yawl tangkiik ! n'tu dawngah uepvoetna na khueh ? ” a tina .
40014032	Ahih rawi te lowng khuila a kuun hih coeng atah khawthlii dip .
40014033	Tecoengah lowng khuiah a hubang hue lawng Jesuh te a bok u . Ahimi lawng , “ Nang tah Pathen Capa tang tang ni ! ” a tina u .
40014034	Ahimi lawng tuilii ah te kat u tih Gennesaret ram te a pha u .
40014035	Te kah thlaang hue lawng Jesuh te a noek u . Tedawngah a teng-avai kah thlaangtlo boeih te a khue u tih Jesuh tengla avan law puei u .
40014036	Thlaangtlo thli lawng Jesuh kah himbai hmoi te tek ham a bih u tih aka tek boeih tah hoeih u .
40015001	Tecoengah Farasi khatsut oen Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut te Jesuh tengla Jerusalem kalawng law u tih ,
40015002	“ N'tu dawngah na hubang hue lawng mami patuer thli kah cang puei awl te a eek u ? Ahimi lawng buh caak thlan ah kut sil u nawh ! ” tila a doet .
40015003	Jesuh lawng , “ N'tu dawngah , Pathen kah awlpeek te na vai u nawh tih namami kah cang puei bueng na vai u ? ” a tina .
40015004	Pathen lawng , na nu oen na pa te hinyah uh ! a-u khaw a manu oen ana pa te a tap avoep atah duek sak ham awm ” ti .
40015005	Tede nangmi kah cang puei tah thlaang pakhat mai lawngah a manu oen ana pa bawmna hamla thaihu pakhat mai khaw a khueh te , “ He tah Pathen koe ni , ” a ti atah ,
40015006	‘ A manu oen ana pa te hinyah ham ngoe tlaih nawh , ” na ti u . He tila namami kah cangpueina bueng te na vai u tih Pathen kah awlpeek te n'tu la na sak u nawh .
40015007	Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Isaiah lawng nangmi kawng a thui oepsoeh te soeng tang tang !
40015008	Isaiah lawng , “ He thlaang hue lawng awlhong oen kai ng'hinyah u , tede a thinkaw lungbui tah kai oen thla tangkiik .
40015009	Ahimi lawng thlaanghing kah sai coplap phung te kai kah awlpeek angla a cang puei dawngah , kai m'bok u he khaw a poei ni ; tila Pathen lawng ti , ” a tina .
40015010	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a tengla a khue tih ahimi te , “ Hutung u lang yaakming u lah !
40015011	Thlaang aka ciimcaih sak nawh thaihu he tah kaa khui kalawng aka kuun he nawh ni , kaa khuikah aka thoeng lawng ni thlaang he a ciimcaih sak nawh ” a tina .
40015012	Tecoengah a hubang hue ahih tengla law u tih , “ Na awlthui lawngah Farasi hue a thin a sa sak he na ming aw ? ” a tina .
40015013	Jesuh lawng , “ Vaan a Pa kah thingliing nawh thingkung boeih tah a phuk ai ;
40015014	“ Ahimi kawngah lakueng u boel ! ahimi tah mikpum aka mawt mikpum hue ni , mikpum pakhat lawng atloe mikpum te a mawt atah ungrawm khuila bok tla hih ai , ” a tina .
40015015	Piter lawng , “ Te thuidoetna awl te kaimi tengah aciimla van thui lah ! ” a tina .
40015016	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah , “ Nangmi he tahe toe thlaangtloe lak ah na cuih u thlan nawh pai he !
40015017	“ Na yaakming u nawh aw ? Thlaang kaa khuiah aka kuun thaihu boeih tah a bung khui a pha tih te kalawng naatceh la thoeng .
40015018	Tede kaa khuikah aka thoeng hang thaihu tah thinkaw lungbui khui kalawng law tih te thaihu lawng thlaang ciimcaih sak nawh .
40015019	Thlaang ngawnna , samphaihna , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna , atheen nawh thaihu saina , huuenna , hoemna , thlaang thaang the sakna , poekna atloe boeih he tah lungbui khui kalawng ni a law .
40015020	He ang thli lawng thlaang a hawt a aih , tede ahimi kah a thui angla kut silh ohla buh caakna lawng thlaang he a hawt a aih moenih , ” a tina .
40015021	Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih Taiar oen Sidon peng la cet .
40015022	Te peng kah aka awm Kanaan nu pakhat a tengla law tih , “ Devid Capa ! ” Kai he n'reen lah , ka canu tah raaithe lawng a tuuk tih nauh tangkiik , ” tila angaihhlangla paang .
40015023	Tede Jesuh lawng kam at khaw voem nawh . A hubang thli a tengla law u tih , “ Ahih he tuih loeih , mami hu ah bang tih thlaangngeu palaawn la paang khiing , ” a tina u .
40015024	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Israel thlaang aka auh tuuca ham bueng ni ka law , ” a tina .
40015025	Tevengah te kah hutaa lawng Jesuh khow kungah buekuep tih , “ Bawipa ! kai he n'reen mai hawn lah , ” a tina .
40015026	Jesuh lawng , “ Camaw kah buh te lawh tih ui m'peek pe atah soeng nawh , ” a tina .
40015027	Te hutaa lawng , “ Bawipa , na thui te soeng tak tak , tede ui lawngkhaw a Bawipa kah caboi dawng kalawng aka tla buhdik anhaai te a caak van ta , ” a tina .
40015028	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Nang tah oengcakna aka khueh hutaa ni ! na ngaihna angla coengg hawn seh , ” a tina . Teveng tue roe ah a canu te hoeih pahoei .
40015029	Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih , Galili tuiliikeeng ah cet . Tecoengah tlaang la luui hang tih ngawl .
40015030	Thlaangping lawng ah khawkheem thli , mikpum thli , aka khawn thli , awlmueh oen atloe thlaangtlo te avan law puei u tih , Jesuh kah a khow kungah a khueh u tih ahimi boeih te Jesuh lawng a hoeih sak .
40015031	Awlmueh lawng cal thai , aka khawn thli lawng theen , khawkheem lawng cet thai , mikpum lawng a mik a tueng koep te thlaangping lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u tih Israel Pathen te a thangpawm u .
40015032	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te a tengla a khue tih , “ Thlaangping he kai oen hin thum ka awm haih u poen tih tahe ah buh caak ham a khueh u tlaih nawh dawngah ka reen tangkiik , lawngpueng ah tawnba u hau ai ka ti dawngah ahimi he buh cah ohla im la tuih ham ka ngaih nawh , ” a tina .
40015033	A hubang hue lawng , “ He thlaangping he yoeh kok ham he ramhum ah ame kah buh caak khoek kaimi lawng ka dang ai ? ” tila Jesuh te a doet u .
40015034	Jesuh lawng , “ Takawi meyoeh na khueh u ? ” a tina . Ahimi lawng “ Takawi cuun rih oen nga ayawlca tah awm , ” a tina u .
40015035	Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te dilai dawngah a ngawlh sak .
40015036	Tecoengah takawi cuun rih oen nga te a lawh tih Pathen tengah uemna awl a thui coengah takawi oen nga te a eh tih a hubang hue te a peek . A hubang hue lawng thlaangping tengah a ree pe .
40015037	Ahimi lawng ahah la a caak u . A caak coeih te a hubang hue lawng vawh phueih pasarih dawngah abecala a kawh u .
40015038	Aka ca boeih te hutaa oen camaw toek ohla tawngpataang hawng ah thawnglii law .
40015039	Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te a tuih coengah lowng oen Makadan ram la cet .
40016001	Farasi oen Sadusi khatsut te Jesuh tengla law u tih a thawlhna tlap ham a ngaih u dawngah , Pathen kah thlaangtuih la na awm ti he mingna ham kawpoekraina van sai lah tila a ceel u .
40016002	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ thlemben ah khaw a pang yuuk atah , khaw theen ai na ti u !
40016003	‘ Mincang ah khaw pang tih khaw a mai atah khaw tlan ai na ti u . ’ Nangmi lawng vaan na dan u rang oen khaw theen ai , khaw tlan ai , tila na thui u thai , tede tahe kah atue noekna he tah na ming u thai nawh !
40016004	Tihin hang kah thlaang hue he me tih aihla na the tangkiik u tih Pathen khaw na ming u nawh ! Nangmi lawng kawpoekraina na van bih u ? Ka sai manawh ! Nangmi ham kawpoekraina tah Jonah kah kawpoekraina bueng te ni na huh u ai , ” a tina . Tedawngah ahimi te a thawh taak tih atloela cet .
40016005	A hubang hue lawng tuilii khatben ral la a kat phai u vengah ahimi lawng buh khuen ham a hilh u .
40016006	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah , “ Dalra u boel ; Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah tawlru te anepla ngaithuen uh , ” a tina .
40016007	Tevengah amami pakhat oen khat te , “ Mami lawng buh ng'khuen u nawh tih he awl he a thui cawini , ” ti u .
40016008	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awl thui te a ming tih ahimi te , “ Buh na khuen u nawh kawng te n'tu la na thui khiing u ? Na oengna yawl tangkiik u nawh pai he !
40016009	Tahe toe ah na yaakming u thlan aw ? Kai lawng takawi cuun ngaa ka eh tih thlaang thong ngaa ka cah te na hilh u poen aw ? Acoeih te vawh meyoeh dawngah a be ?
