40016010	Tecoengah takawi cuun rih thlaang thong lii ka cah te na hilh u poen aw ? Acoeih te vawh meyoeh dawngah a be ?
40016011	Nangmi tengah kavan thui he buh kawng nawh ni ti he n'tu ah na yaakming u nawh ? Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah tawlru te ngaithuen uh , ” a tina .
40016012	Tevengah a hubang hue lawng , ngaithuen uh , ati he takawi dawngah a hawna tawlru nawh tih Farasi oen Sadusi hue kah cangpueina ni tila a yaakming u .
40016013	Jesuh lawng Sisaria Filipi khawpui tengvaai ah cet tih te huen ah a hubang hue te , “ Thlaang thli lawng Thlaanghing Capa he a-u a ti u ? tila a doet .
40016014	Ahimi lawng , “ Khatsut lawng Baptisma pekung Johan , ” ti u , atloe hue lawng , “ Elijah , ” ti u , atloe khatsut lawng , “ Jeremiah nawh atah atloe tawngha pakhat khat cawini ti u , ” a tina .
40016015	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawng ta , kai he a-u na ti u ? ” tila a doet .
40016016	Simon Piter lawng , “ Nang tah aka hing Pathen Capa Messiah ni , ” a tina .
40016017	Jesuh lawng , “ Johan capa Simon , na yo theen phoeih , ” He awltak he thlaanghing teng kalawng na tengla law nawh , tede vaan ah aka awm a Pa kah peek ni .
40016018	Tedawngah na tengah kavan thui , Piter : nang tah lungto ni ! He lunghiim lungdangsuem dawngah ka Khrihcabu ka pai sak ai , duekna lawng Pateng taa thai manawh .
40016019	Vaan ram caabi na tengah kan pe ai ; dilai dawngah thawhka na khaih boeih te tah vaan ah khaw khaih la awm van ai , dilai dawngah thawh na awng pe te tah vaan ah khaw a awng pe van ai , ” a tina .
40016020	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah amah te Messiah ni tila a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham awl a uen u .
40016021	Teveng tue kalawng ah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah , “ Jerusalem la ka cet vetih Judah ahaamca thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen ah phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng patang n'khang sak ai , kai he ng'ngawn u ai , tede athum hin ah thawh sak koep la ka awm vetih ka hing ai , ” tila acairaula a thui pe .
40016022	Piter lawng Jesuh te atloela yawp a ceh puei tih a siim . “ Bawipa he ang thaihu he Pathen lawng thoeng sak boel seh , te ang te mevengah khaw na sawah van pha roe boel seh , ” a tina .
40016023	Jesuh lawng Piter te a mang thil ket tih , “ Seitan ! Ka teng kalawng cet lah , na poekna he Pathen teng kah law nawh tih thlaanghing ben kalawng a law dawngah , ka cehna lawngpui kanghalhkung la na awm , ” a tina .
40016024	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te , “ A-u khaw ka hu ah law ham a ngaih atah amah kawngaih te hoett selang amah kah thinglam kawh ruila ka hu ah bang seh .
40016025	A-u khaw a hingna thlawn ham aka ngaih tah a hingna te a thlawng ai . Tede a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a hingna te a sung atah hingna a dang ai .
40016026	Thlaang pakhat lawng dilai pum he pang mai cakhaw a hingna a thlawng atah n'tu nuem aphu aka awm ? Aphu awm nawh ! A hingna dang koep ham n'tu oen khaw thaw thai manawh .
40016027	Thlaanghing Capa tah ana Pa kah ruep-awmna oen amah kah vanthlaang thli oen ah va rum thuk vetih thlaang boeih te bii a bina taring ah kutdo a peek ai .
40016028	Atak tang kavan thui u , Thlaanghing Capa lawng Sengpahrang angla a law te na huh u thlantoe aka duek nawh ham koei thlaang khatsut tah he ah na awm u , ” a tina .
40017001	Hinruk a diw raih coengah Jesuh lawng Piter , Jeem oen Johan te tlaangsawm la a luui puei tih amami bueng te huen ah awm u ,
40017002	Tevengah ahimi mik huh ah Jesuh kah a muei te thawleng u : a mik-hai tah khawmik angla aang tih a bai a naak khaw bawk tih aang rawngtheng .
40017003	Tecoengah Mosi oen Elijah tah Jesuh oen ah awl a thui u te a hubang pathum hue lawng a huh .
40017004	Tedawngah Piter lawng Jesuh nala “ Bawipa , he huen ah mami awm ham theen tangkiik . Na kawngaih atah im pathum : nang ham pakhat , Mosi ham pakhat , Elijah ham pakhat he ah ka sa u ai , ” a tina .
40017005	Piter lawng awl a thui lii vengah ahimi te aka bawk tangkiik muui lawng a thiing khoep u tih muui khuikah awl lawng , “ He tah ka lungvatna ka Capa ni , ahih sawah ka kaw hoe , a awl ngaai pe uh , ” tila a thui .
40017006	Te awl te a hubang hue lawng a yaak vengah a rih tangkiik u dawngah dilai ah a mik-hai a buengkhuem tih kawpp u .
40017007	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengla law tih ahimi te a tek . “ Tho u loeih , rih u boel ! ” a tina .
40017008	Tedawngah ahimi lawng a bueh vengah , Jesuh bueng nawh tah a-u khaw hu u tlaih nawh .
40017009	Tlaangsawm kalawng a rum thuk u vengah , ahimi te , “ He kah na huh u huhthlaam he Thlaanghing Capa duekna kalawng a thawh thlantoe thui u boel , ” tila awl a uen .
40017010	Tecoengah a hubang hue lawngah , “ N'tu dawngah phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng Elijah he lamhacuekla law ai a ti u kai ? tila Jesuh te a doet u .
40017011	Jesuh lawng , “ Elijah tah lamhacuekla law tangtang vetih soeprep boeih te aroek abah oepsoeh ai .
40017012	Tede kavan thui u , Elijah tah law coeng poen de thlaang lawng a ming u nawh dawngah amami ngaikhuekla ahih te a thena u . Tetih van angla Thlaanghing Capa he khaw a thekhana u ai , ” a tina .
40017013	Tecoengah a hubang hue lawng Baptisma pekung Johan kawng ni ahimi tengah avan thui tila a yaakming u .
40017014	Ahimi lawng thlaangping tengla a mel koep u vengah , Jesuh tengla thlaang pakhat law tih a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih ,
40017015	“ Bawipa , ka capa he van reen lah ! Ahih tah raaihum tlawhna a khueh tih patang a khang tangkiik . Hai dawngah khaw , tui dawngah khaw tlim taitu .
40017016	Na hubang hue tengah ka khuen de , ahimi lawng hoeih sak thai u nawh , ” a tina .
40017017	Jesuh lawng , “ Oengna aka khueh nawh nangmi thlaangthe hue ! Metuek toe nangmi he kan awm puei u hun ai ? Meveng tue toe kan nueh u hun ai ? Camaw te ka tengla van khuen u lah , ” a tina .
40017018	Jesuh lawng raaithe te awl a peek tih camaw kaw khui kalawng raaithe te co , kawlkalh ah ahih tah hoeih pahoei .
40017019	Tecoengah a hubang hue amami bueng Jesuh tengla law u tih , “ N'tu dawngah kaimi lawng raaithe ka hek thai u nawh ? ” tila a doet u .
40017020	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawng oengcakna na khueh u nawh dawngah ni , Atak tang kavan thui u , antammu teh maimah oengna na khueh u kawinih nangmi lawng he tlaang he , he kalawng ke la thoeih lah na tina u a tah thoeih ai , nang mi lawng soeprep boeih na sai u thai ai .
40017021	Tede , he ang raaithe tah thangthuina oen buh yehna bueng nawh atah atloe n'tu oen khaw hek thai la awm nawh , ” a tina .
40017022	A hubang hue Galili la a law boeih u vengah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah , “ Thlaanghing Capa he thlaang kut dawngah a peek u ai .
40017023	Ahih te a ngawn u ai , tede athum hin ah tho koep ai , ” tila a thui . A hubang hue tah a kaw the u tangkiik .
40017024	Jesuh oen a hubang hue Kapernaum a pha u vengah , Tempal bok-im kah mangmu cawikung hue Piter tengla law u tih , “ Na saya lawng Tempal bok-im kah mangmu a peek van aw ? tila a doet u .
40017025	Piter lawng , “ Oeih , a peek , ” a tina . Piter te im khuila a kuun vengah Jesuh lawng a voem lamha tih , “ Simon , metila na poek ? A-u lawng he dilai sengpahrang tengah ram tloe kah thaihu khuen phu oen mangmu a peek ? Ram khuikah thlaang lawng aw ? Tihnawhtah ram tloe thlaang lawng aw ? ” a tina .
40017026	Piter lawng , “ Ram tloe thlaang lawng a peek ai , ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Theen , ram khuikah thlaang lawngtah peek ham ngoe nawh , ” a tina .
40017027	Tede he thlaang hue he a thinsa sak ham ka ngaih nawh . Tedawngah tuilii la cet lang nga vaih lah . Lamhacuek la na tuuk nga kah a kaa khuiah nang oen kai ham Tempal mangmu peek khoek tangka na dang ai . Te tangka te lo langtah mahih kah mangmu la ahimi te pe hawn , a tina .
40018001	Teveng tue ah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih , “ Vaan ram ah a-u aka lenduet ? ” tila a doet u .
40018002	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng camaw pakhat te a khue , ahimi haiah a pai sak tih ,
40018003	“ Atak tang kavan thui u , nangmi lawng na kaw na thaw tih camaw hue angla na awm u nawh atah Vaan ram khuiah na kuun u thai manawh , ” a tina .
40018004	Vaan ram ah aka lenduet ham thlaang tah boe a ngaai tih he camaw angla kawpoek aka khueh he ni .
40018005	A-u khaw ka miing oen he ang camaw pakhat he a do atah kai aka do thlaang ni .
40018006	“ Kai aka oeng camaw pakhat kah a oengna te a phelhna ham a-u lawng-khaw a suek atah caang neetna lungto sum bohlang a awi tih tuilii ah tla kawinih ahih ham theen bet ai .
40018007	Dilai dawngah thlaanghing kah oengna aka phelh sak thaihu yahawh hlang a awm dawngah rih ham awm tangkiik . Te ang thaihu te awm ngaikhoek ai , tede te tila thlaang kah oengna aka phelh sak thlaang ham tah caalla khawmap tangkiik !
40018008	“ Na kut tihnawhtah na khow lawng na oengna te avan phelh sak atah tloek langtah voei vik hawn ! Kut soep khow soep oen dungyan hai khuila na tlaak lak ah kut oen khow muehla hingna khuiah na kuun te theen ngaai .
40018009	Tecoengah na mik lawng na oengna te avan phelh sak atah na mik te koeih lang voei hawn ! Mik pahih oen hell hai khuiah na tlaak atah mik pakhat bueng oen hingna khuila na kuun te theen ngaai .
40018010	“ Nangmi lawng he ang camaw pakhat Pateng khaw huhsit nawh ham ngaithuen uh . Atak tang kavan thui u , ahimi doenkung vanthlaang tah Vaan kah a Pa haiah awm yoeyah u .
40018011	( Metihtiah Thlaanghing Capa tah aka auh thlawn ham va law . )
40018012	“ Tuu yakhat aka khueh thlaang lawng tuu pakhat a auh atah n'tu a sai ai tila na poek ? Ahih lawng ramtliim saino a awmna tlaangsawm ah atloe sawmkua pakua hue te a ceh taak vetih aka auh tuu pakhat te tlap ham cet ai .
40018013	Atak tang kavan thui u , aka auh tuu te a dang vengah , aka auh nawh tuu sawmkua pakua lak ah aka auh tuu pakhat te a uem ngaai .
40018014	Tih van angla vaan kah nangmi na Pa lawng he ang camaw pakhat Pateng khaw auh sak ham ngaih nawh , ” a tina .
40018015	“ Na boenhui pakhat lawng na sawah a thawlh atah a tengla cet lang a thawlhna te thui peh . Tede ahuepla namahih bueng thui hih . Na awl a ngaai atah na boenhui oen na roep hih poen .
40018016	Tede na awl te a ngaai nah atah , Caciim lawng , ” thawlh peelna boeih te aka mingpueikung pahih tihnawhtah te lak ah yahawh awm seh ! ati angla thlaangtloe pakhat khaw , pahih khaw ceh puei .
40018017	Tecoengah ahimi kah awl te a ngaai nawh atah , awlkaa boeih te khrihcabu tengah thui uh . Aboetna ah khrihcabu awl te a ngaai nawh toeng toeng atah ahih te lukih thlaang tihnawhtah mangmu cawikung hue angla poek uh .
40018018	“ Tedawngah nangmi tengah kavan thui u , dilai dawngah na piin boeih te vaan ah khaw a piin vetih dilai dawngah na thlam boeih te vaan ah khaw a thlam pe van ai .
40018019	Tecoengah atloe pakhat kavan thui u : Dilai dawngah nangmi tim kah thlaang pahih lawng me ang thaihu dawngah khaw thin-at kaw-at la na thangthui hih atah vaan kah a Pa lawng nangmi ham avan sai ai .
40018020	Thlaang pahih , pathum kai kah miing oen a tunna huen ah ahimi oen kai ka awm haih , ” a tina .
40018021	Tecoengah Piter lawng Jesuh tengla law tih , “ Bawipa , ka boenhui thli lawng ka sawah a thawlh atah , voei meyoeh toe ahih sawah khawdawp ka ngai ai ? Voei sarih toe aw ? tila a doet .
40018022	Jesuh lawng , “ Nawh ni , voei sarih bueng nawh ni , voei sawmsarih let sarih khawdawp na ngaai ai .
40018023	Metihtiah vaan ram tah he tila awm . Voei khat ah sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang kah biibina te soepsa ham a ngaih .
40018024	Atong cuek vengah , ahih kah tangka laiba aka khueh thli khuikah tangka athong asang aka ba te a tengla avan law puei u .
40018025	A tuihyoeihthlaang lawng laiba sahna khoek tangka khueh nawh , tedawngah sengpahrang lawng amah oen a yu , a ca oen a khueh thaihu boeih laiba sahna ham yooei seh ! tila awl a peek .
40018026	Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng sengpahrang haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila a bok tih , “ N'reen hawn de ! Laiba boeih te kan sah badai , ” a tina .
40018027	Sengpahrang lawng a reen dawngah ahih kah laiba boeih te a yoe pe sak tih a tuih .
40018028	Tecoengah te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng cet tih ahih kah tangka ayawlca aka ba tuihyoeihthlaang a paya te a huh . Te thlaang te a tuuk tih a khak . Laiba te , “ N'sah loeih ! ” a tina .
40018029	A tuihyoeihthlaang a paya lawng khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila , “ N'reen hawn de , kan sah badai , ” a tina .
40018030	Tede ahih lawng a thana . Laiba a sah boeih thlantoe a paya te thong ah a thlaak .
40018031	Atloe tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a reen u tangkiik tih Sengpahrang tengah cet u tih te tila thaihu a sai thli boeih te a thui pe u .
40018032	Tedawngah Sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang te a khue tih , “ Nang tuihyoeihthlaang , thlaangthe koek ! Ka tengah reenna navan bih dawngah na laiba boeih te kavan yoe sak .
40018033	Kai lawng kan reen van angla tuihyoeihthlaang na paya te na reen van ham awm , ” a tina .
40018034	Sengpahrang tah a thinsa tangkiik tih te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng laiba boeih a sah thlantoe thong ah a thlaak .
40018035	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawng thinkaw lungbui tang oen na maya manau tengah khawdawp na ngaai u nawh atah vaan kah a Pa lawng nangmi sawah khawdawp ngaai van manawh , ” tila a boetna ah a thui pe .
40019001	Jesuh lawng he awl boeih he a thui boet coengah , Galili te a thawh taak tih Jordan tuiva khatben ral Judia ram la cet .
40019002	Thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng a hu ah a vai u tih ahih lawng te huen ah thlaangtlo boeih te a hoeih sak .
40019003	Farasi khatsut lawng a tengla law u tih a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a ngaih u dawngah , “ A me ang kawng dawng maiah a khaw tawngpa pakhat lawng a yu thlaak ham mami kah phungawl lawng a ngaih aw ? ” tila a doet u .
40019004	Jesuh lawng , “ Acuekca ah Saikung lawng thlaang hutaa oen tawngpa a sai , ” tila caciim lawng a thui te na tae u nawh aw ?
40019005	Tedawngah Pathen lawng , “ He kawng dawngah tawngpa lawng a manu oen ana pa te a ceh taak vetih a yu oen awm haih ai , ahih rawi tah pumsa pakhat la coeng ai , ” ti .
40019006	Tedawngah ahih rawi tah pahih tlaih nawh ni , pumsa pakhat poen ni . Pathen lawng a tun sak haih poen te tah thlaanghing lawng pek boel seh , ” a tina .
40019007	Farasi thli lawng , “ Te atah n'tu dawngah Mosi lawng thlaang pakhat lawng a yu te thlaakna ca pe selang tuih seh , tila phungawl a peek kai ? ” tila Jesuh te a doet u .
40019008	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi tah thuituen ham na rai u tangkiik dawngah Mosi lawng na yu thlaak ham awl m'peek u . Tede acuekca vengah te tila awm nawh .
40019009	Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u , “ A-u lawngkhaw a yu te thlaangtloe oen a samphaih nawh maiah a thlaak tih yu tloe a lawh atah te thlaang lawng a yu han ah samphaih poen , ” a tina .
40019010	A hubang hue lawng , “ Yuvaa laklaw ah he tila a awm ham koei atah a yuvaa hih nawh ah theen ngaai ai , ” tila Jesuh te a tina u .
40019011	Jesuh lawng , “ He kah kan cang puei he thlaang boeih ham nawh ni . Tede Pathen lawng a peek thlaang hue bueng ham ni .
40019012	Thlaang lawng a yu a lawh thai nawh he akawng atloetloe la awm : khatsut tah a yu lawh thai nawh ham a thang puei , atloe thlaang khatsut tah yu lawh thai nawh ham a sai u tih atloe khatsut hue tah Vaan Ram kawng dawngah a yu lo u nawh . He cangpueina he aka yaakming lawngtah vai hawn seh ! ” tila a thui pe u .
40019013	Thlaang khatsut lawngah camaw hue kah a luu dawngah Jesuh lawng a kut tloeng tih thangthui pe ham a tengla avan law puei u . Tede a hubang hue lawng thlaangping te a tlung .
40019014	Jesuh lawng , “ Camaw hue te kanghalh u boel , ka tengla law u seh ! metihtiah Vaan ram tah he ang thlaang thli kah ni , ” a tina .
40019015	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah luu sawah a kut a tloeng coengah atloela cet .
40019016	Voeikhat ah thlaang pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih , “ Saya ! Dungyan hingna dang hamla me ang thaihu theen ka sai ai ? ” tila a doet .
40019017	Jesuh lawng , “ Me ang thaihu theen ti he n'tu dawngah nan doet ? Thlaang-theen pakhat bueng ni a awm . Dungyan hingna dang ham na ngaih atah awlpeek te vai , ” a tina .
40019018	Ahih lawng , “ Me ang awlpeek , ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang ngawn boel , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel , huen boel , a soeng nawh la thlaang thawlh peel boel ,
40019019	Na nu oen na pa te hinyah lang , namah pum na lungna angla na imbe te lungnah , ” a tina .
40019020	Cadawng lawng , “ He awlpeek thli he ka vai boeih poen , n'tu sai ham a ngoe hun ? ” tila a doet .
40019021	Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang soep la awm ham na ngaih atah cet lang na koeva thli te yooei boeih langtah tangka te khawdeng harah thli van peh . Te atah vaan ah kaawn theen na khueh badai , tecoengah law lang ka hu ah va bang , ” a tina .
40019022	Te cadawng tah kuirang la a awm dawngah te awl a yaak vengah a kawthe tih meel .
40019023	Tevengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah , “ Atak tang kavan thui u : Kuirang ham tah Vaan ram ah kuun ham rai tangkiik .
40019024	Kavan thui koep he ; Kala-uk pakhat phaimeet khui a kuun lak ah kuirang pakhat lawng Pathen Ram khuiah kuun ham rai bet ! ” a tina .
40019025	A hubang hue lawng te awl a yaak u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih . “ Te atah a-u lawng thlawnna a dang ai , ” tila a doet u .
40019026	Jesuh lawng ahimi te ahaitang heet tih , “ He ang he thlaanghing ham coeng thai nawh , tede Pathen ham tah thaihu boeih he coeng thai , ” a tina .
40019027	Tevengah Piter lawng , “ Bueh lah ! Kaimi lawng thaihu boeih ka ceh taak u tih na hu ah ka bang u poen , n'tu ka dang u ai ? ” tila a doet .
40019028	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah , “ Atak tang kavan thui u ; San thai a pha tih Thlaanghing Capa lawng Bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah Ruep-awmna oen a ngawlh vengah nangmi ka hubang thlaihih hue nang khaw Israel thlaangphun thlaihih te uk ham bawi-ngawlhcoen dawngah na ngawl u van ai .
40019029	Tecoengah a-u khaw kai kawng dawngah a im oen a lo , a maya manau , ngannu nganca , a manu ana pa oen a ca te aka ceh taak thlaang tah te yueng te a pueh yakhat la a dang u vetih dungyan hingna te a dang baal ai .
40019030	Tede tahe ah lamhacuekla aka awm hue he hukhuengla awm lat vetih tahe ah hukhuengla aka awm hue he lamhacuekla awm dai ai , ” a tina .
40020001	Jesuh lawng , “ Vaan ram tah he tila awm . Dumkhuehkung pakhat lawng misur dum ah bii bi sak ham thlaang aka tlap hamla mincanghi ah cet .
40020002	Thapang a peek nooek angla hin-at kutphu ngun tangka pheek at peek ham biibithlaang thli oen a kaw vai u tih ahimi te dum la a tuih .
40020003	Mincang khawnoek pakua ah dawr la cet koep tih n'tu khaw bi ohla aka pai thlaang khatsut te a huh .
40020004	Tevengah ahimi te , “ Nangmi khaw misur dum la cet u langtah bii bi uh , na thapang te ating atawkk la kan pe ai , ” a tina .
40020005	Tedawngah ahimi tah cet u . Te-coengah hingthun khawnoek thlaihih vengah khaw , khawnoek pathum vengah khaw a sawkah angla a sai .
40020006	Thlemben khawnoek pa-ngaa tawm ah ahih lawng dawr la a ceh koep vengah thlaangtloe khatsut te huen ah a pai hun te a huh . “ Ahimi te n'tu ah biibi ohla khawyung khun he ah na pai u ? ” tila a doet .
40020007	Ahimi lawng , “ Kaimi he a-u lawngkhaw bii m'bi sak u nawh dawngah ni , ” a tina u . Dumkhuehkung lawng , “ Theen , nangmi khaw misur dum la cet u lang bii bi uh , ” a tina .
40020008	Thlemben tue apha vengah dumkhuehkung lawng dumtoetkung tengah , “ Bii aka bi thli te khue u lang a thapang te pe uh . Hukhueng koek bii aka bi kalawng tong langtah lamhacuek bii aka bi toe a thapang kutphu te peh , ” a tina .
40020009	Thlemben khawnoek pa-ngaa kalawng bii aka bi thli te thapang ngun tangka pheek at rip a peek .
40020010	Lamhacuek la bii aka bi thli thapang lawh ham a law u vengah thapang yahawh ka dang ai , tila a poek u . Tede ahimi khaw thapang ngun tangka pheek at rip a dang u .
40020011	Tangka te a lawh u tih dumkhuehkung tengah caitoek u .
40020012	Ahimi lawng , “ Hukhueng koek la bii aka bi thlaang thli he tah khawnoek pakhat khui bueng a bi u . Kaimi tah khawyungkhun khawling khawlai khuiah ka bi u . Tede ahimi na peek yoeh van te kaimi nan peek u , ” a tina u .
40020013	Tevengah dumkhuehkung lawng ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat te , “ Ka puei , hutung lah ! Kan thaina moenih , hin at kutphu ngun tangka pheek at peek ham awl n'thui u nawh aw ?
40020014	Na tangka te lo langtah im la cet loeih ! A hukhueng koek aka bi he khaw nangmi kah dang yoeh van te peek ham ka ngaih .
40020015	Ka mah tangka te ka kawngaih angla ka hawna thai nawh aw ? Kai ka moeihoeih dawngah nang na lungoe aw ? ” a tina .
40020016	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Tedawng-ah hukhueng koek te lamhacuekla awm vetih lamhacuek te hukhueng koek la awm ai , ” a tina .
40020017	Jesuh lawng Jerusalem la a ceh vengah a hubang thlaihih te ahuep ahelna ah a ceh puei tih amami bueng noenoe ceh ruila ahimi tengah awl a thui pe .
40020018	“ Hutung u lah , ” “ Mami tah Jerusalem khawpui la n'cet u ai . Te huen ah Thlaanghing Capa tah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue kut ah peek la awm ai . Ahimi lawng Thlaanghing Capa te ngawn hamla thawlh a peel u vetih ,
40020019	thlaangphun tloe kut dawngah a peek u ai . Thlaangphun tloe hue lawng ahih te nuihbu kamring la a khueh u ai , athe akhana u ai , a bawh u coengah a ngawn u ai . Tede athum hin ah tho koep ai , ” a tina .
40020020	Tecoengah Zebedi kah a yu te a capa rawi oen Jesuh tengla va law . Jesuh haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih buekuep ruila a tengah a kawngaih te a bih .
40020021	Jesuh lawng ahih te , “ N'tu na ngaih , ” tila a doet . Ahih lawng , “ Sengpahrang la na law vengah ka ca rawi he na bantang ben ah pakhat , na banvoei ben ah pakhat a ngawlh hih thaina hamla awl van pe lah . ” a tina .
40020022	Jesuh lawng , “ Na van bih he na ming hih nawh ! Kai lawng ka awkk ham koei patang khangna boengloeng he na awkk thai hih ai aw ? tila te rawi boeinau te a doet . A hih rawi lawng , “ ka awkk thai hih ai , ” a tina .
40020023	Jesuh lawng , “ Nanghih lawng ka boengloeng dawngkah na awkk thai tang tang ai . Tede ka bantang ben ah ahih ngawl seh , ka banvoei ben ah ahih ngawl seh tila kai lawng ka tuek thai nawh tih te huen tah a Pa lawng a nuuen tangte thlaang hue ham ni , ” a tina .
40020024	He kawng he atloe hubang paha hue lawng a yaak u vengah te rawi boeinau sawah a thin sa u tangkiik .
40020025	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng a khue tun u tih , “ Pathen aka ming nawh ukkung bawi hue lawng a uk thlaang thli sawah huham a khueh u tih mawtkung ahaamca hue lawngkhaw atlawh ngaaila aana a khueh u .
40020026	Tede nangmi tah tila na awm u manawh . Nangmi timkah pakhat lawng alenduet la awm a ngaih atah nangmi boeih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awm seh ;
40020027	nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng pakhatna ah awm ham a ngaih atah nangmi kah sal la awm seh .
40020028	Te tila ni Thlaanghing Capa khaw thlaangtloe te bii bi sak ham law nawh tih thlaang kah bii bi ham oen thlaang yahawh te tlang ham oen ah hingna peek ham ni a law , ” a tina .
40020029	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jeriko khaaw kalawng a ceh u vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng a hu ah a vai u .
40020030	Lawngteng ah aka ngawl mikpum pahih lawng Jesuh kah a ceh tuen awl te a yaak hih vengah , “ Devid Capa ! Kai hih he n'reen lah , Bawipa ! ” tila paang hih .
40020031	Thlaangping lawng te rawi te a ho u tih duem awm hih a tina u , Tede ahih rawi lawng , “ Devid Capa ! n'reen lah , Bawipa ! ” tila angaihla paang tare hih .
40020032	Jesuh lawng pai tih te kah mikpum rawi te a tengla a khue tih , “ Nanghih ham n'tu sai sak na ngaih ? ” tila a doet .
40020033	Ahih rawi lawng , “ Bawipa ! Ka mik na van tueng sak ham ka ngaih hih ” a tina .
40020034	Jesuh lawng mikpum rawi te a reen tangkiik tih a mik te a tek pe . Teveng roe ah a mik tueng pahoei hih tih Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih .
40021001	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jerusalem pha tawm kah Olif tlaang tengah aka awm Betfat khaaw te a pha u atah Jesuh lawng a hubang pahih te a tuih tih ,
40021002	he tila awl a uen , “ Na hai kah khaaw la cet hih langtah la pakhat a kiing te na huh hih pahoei vetih a tengah a ca awm ai . Rui te thlam pe hih lang la te ka tengla bok van mawt hih .
40021003	A-u lawngkhaw n'kaana atah , ‘ Bawipa lawng angoe ’ tina hih . Te atah ahih lawng avan thlah pahoei badai ” a tina .
40021004	He awl tah tawngha Isaiah lawng , Zaion khawpui te thui pe uh , Bueh lah , na sengpahrang tah law lii poen ! Ahih tah boe-ngaaina oen Lacano pakhat te a cit vetih law ai ” tila a thui oepsoeh te asoepna ham ni .
40021006	Tedawngah a hubang rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh kah a thui angla a sai .
40021007	La oen a cano te avan khuen hih tih la pum ah a himbai te a dawk u tih Jesuh te a cit sak u .
40021008	Thlaangping lawng lawngpui ah a himbai a phaih pe u tih thlaangtloe khatsut lawngtah thingbuuk te a kawi u tih lawngpui ah thinghu a phaih pe u .
40021009	Jesuh kah a haiah aka cet hue oen a hu ah aka vai thli lawng , “ Devid capa te thangpawm uh ! Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh ! Pathen te thangpawm uh , ” tila paang u .
40021010	Jerusalem khawpui la Jesuh a kuun phai vengah a khaaw pum hinghuen tih “ He thlaang he a-u kai , ” tila a doet u .
40021011	Tevengah thlaangping lawng , “ He thlaang he tah Galili ram Nazaret khaaw kah tawngha Jesuh ni , ” a tina u .
40021012	Jesuh lawng Tempal khuila kuun tih te huen kah thaihu aka yooei oen aka lai thli te boeih a hek . Tangka aka thaw thli oen akhuu aka yooei hue kah caboi oen ngawlhna boeih te a plet pe tih ,
40021013	ahimi tengah , “ Caciim dawngah Pathen lawng , ‘ Ka Tempal bok-im he thangthuina im ni ti u ai ’ tila a thui . Tede nangmi lawng thlaanghuuen yingreelna a huen la na hawn u . ” a tina .
40021014	Mikpum oen khawkheem Tempal khuiah Jesuh tengla law u tih ahimi te a hoeih sak .
40021015	Kawpoekrai thaihu a saina thli oen Tempal khuiah camaw thli lawng , “ Devid capa tah thangtheen sak uh ! ” tila a paang u te khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawng a yaak a vengah a thin sa tangkiik u .
40021016	Tedawngah Jesuh te , ahimi kah a paang awl he na yaak aw ? tila a doet u . Jesuh lawng , “ Ka yaak ta , Caciim dawngah ‘ Camaw oen nauseen hue teng kalawng thangtheenna awl na thoeng sak ’ tila a thut u te na tae vai nawh aw ? ” a tina .
40021017	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a ceh taak tih Jerusalem kalawng Bethani la cet tih te ah te ip .
40021018	Avuen mincanghi ah Jesuh tah Jerusalem khawpui ben la a mel koep vengah lawngpueng ah a bung pawng .
40021019	Lawngteng kah thaidut thing te a huh tih a kung la cet , a thing dawngah a ram hawng te a huh . Tedawngah thaidut thing te . “ Meveng khaw na thaih koep thaih manawh , ” tila a tap . Kawlkalh ah thaidut thing te duek rup tih reu pahoei .
40021020	Te tila a awm te a hubang hue lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih , “ Metila kawlkalh ah thaidut thing a duek rup tih a reu pahoei mai ? ” tila a doet u .
40021021	Jesuh lawng , “ Atak tang kavan thui u , uepvoetna khueh ohla , na oeng u tang tang atah he thaidut thing sawah ka sai he nangmi lawngkhaw na sai thai u van ai . He bueng ohla he kah tlaang Pateng , ‘ Thoeih lang tuilii khuila tla lah , ’ na tina atah tla thai ai .
40021022	Na oeng u tangtang atah thangthuina rang oen na bih u boeih te na dang u ai , ” a tina .
40021023	Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la law koep tih a cang puei lii vengah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah ahaamca thli a tengla law u tih , “ Mekah saithaina aana oen he ang he na sai ? A-u lawng saithaina aana he m'peek ? ” tila a doet u .
40021024	Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Awl pakhat kan doet u vetih awl nan thung thai u atah ame kah saithaina aana oen he ang thaihu ka sai tite kavan thui u ai , ” a tina .
40021025	“ Johan lawng Baptisma a peek te ame kalawng a law ! Pathen ben kalawng aw ? Thlaanghing ben kalawng aw ? tila a doet . Ahimi lawng , ‘ Pathen ben kalawng va law n'ti kawinih n'tu ah Johan te na oeng u nawh , ’ ti ai .
40021026	“ Thlanghing ben kalawng ni a law n'ti kawinih Johan te thlaang boeih lawng tawngha ni a ti u dawngah thlaangping he mami lawng rih ham awm , ” ti u .
40021027	Tedawngah , “ Ka ming u nawh , ” a tina u . Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Te atah kai lawngkhaw ame kah saithaina aana oen he ang thaihu ka sai ti he kavan thui van manawh , ” a tina .
40021028	Jesuh lawng , “ Metila na poek u ? Thlaang pakhat lawng capa pahih a khueh . A capa ahaamca tengla cet tih , Ka ca ! tihin ah misur dum la cet langtah bii bi lah ’ a tina .
40021029	A capa ahaamca lawng , ‘ Ka ngaih nawh , ka cet manawh ’ a tina tih a thana de a kaw a poek koep tih dum la cet .
40021030	Tecoengah a capa ano tengla cet tih misur dum ah bii bi ham a tuih . A capa lawng , ‘ Oeih , a pa ! ka cet ai ’ a tina . Tede cet nawh .
40021031	He kah a capa pahih khuiah a-u lawng ana pa kah awl a ngaai ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawng , “ A capa ahaamca lawng , ” a tina u . Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah , “ Atak tang kavan thui , mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaanghalhnu thli lawng nangmi te n'khall vetih Vaan ram la ng'kuun taak u poen ai , ” a tina .
40021032	Metihtiah Baptisma pekung Johan tah nangmi tengla law tih lawngdoeng te n'huh sak u poen de nangmi lawng na tangna u nawh . Tede mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaanghalhnu thli lawngtah a tangna u . Te te nangmi lawng na huh u poen de na kawpoek khaw na thaw u nawh , ahih te na tangna u nawh , ” a tina .
40021033	Jesuh lawng “ Atloe thuidoetna he hutung u lah , misur dum khuehkung pakhat awm tih dum te vawng khoep a thung , misurtui a suina ham ungrawm a to , misurdum toetna ham paw a sak . Tecoengah misur dum te tah bii aka bi thli te a vat tih amah tah khawlawng thla la cet .
40021034	Misur thaih bit tue veng atah dum aka vat thli tengah a tamnaa thli a tuih tih a dang ham koei dum khang la misur thaih te a bih sak .
40021035	Dum aka vat thli lawng dum khuehkung kah a tamnaa thli te a tuuk u tih pakhat te a bawh u , pakhat te a ngawn u tih pakhat te tah lungto oen a de u .
40021036	Dum khuehkung lawng lamha kah lak ah a tamnaa yahawh ngai a tuih koep . Dum vatkung thli lawng ahimi te lamhacuek vengkah angla a sai u .
40021037	A hukhueng ah dum khuehkung lawng a capa te ahimi tengla a tuih ‘ Ka capa he tah a hinyah u ngai badai ’ tila a poek .
40021038	Tede dum aka vat hue lawng a capa te a huh u vengah “ He tah dum khuehkung kah capa , ro aka pang ham ni . Law uh , ngawn silang a ro thaihu lawh pe u sih . ” ti u .
40021039	Tedawngah a tuuk u tih dum adaubenla a khuen u tih a ngawn u .
40021040	Jesuh lawng , “ Tetih atah dum khuehkung a law vengah dum aka vat thli te metila a tina ai ? ” tila a doet u .
40021041	Ahimi lawng , “ Te ang thlaangthe thli te a ngawn vetih misur thaih bit tue a pha vengah dum khang atheenla aka pe thai te a vat ai , ” a tina u .
40021042	Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Caciim lawng : ‘ Imsakung thli lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lungto te , aphu aka awm koek imkil lungto la awm , he tah Bawipa lawng a sai tih mami mik huh ah kawpoekrai la awm , ’ tila a thui te na tae vai u nawh aw ? ” a tina .
40021043	Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u , “ Pathen Ram tah nangmi teng kalawng a lawh vetih thaih theen aka thaih sak koei thlaangphun tloe tengah a peek ai , ” a tina .
40021044	“ A-u khaw he lungto dawngah aka tla tah adiik anuui la rek vetih he lungto lawng a neet te tah adiik avaai la coengg ai , ” a tina .
40021045	Jesuh kah thuidoetna awl he khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi thli lawng a yaak vengah ahimi kawng ni a thui tila a ming u .
40021046	Tedawngah Jesuh te tuuk ham kamthlah u . Tede thlaangping lawng Jesuh he tawngha ni a ti u dawngah thlaangping te a rih u .
40022001	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te thuidoetna awl koep a thui pe .
40022002	“ Vaan ram tah he tila awm . Voeikhat ah Sengpahrang pakhat lawng a capa kah yului poei sai ham kamthlah .
40022003	A hih lawng a ceel thlaang thli te poei ah law ham a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a tuih tih a khue sak . Tede ahimi lawng law ham ngaih u nawh .
40022004	Tecoengah poei bur ham a ceel thlaang thli te khue ham atloe tuihyoeihthlaang thli te koep a tuih tih , “ Poei buh veel ham coekroek la awm poen ; vaitawtaal thli oen boiava a thau thau thli khaw ka ngawn boeih poen , thaihu soeprep khaw coekroek la ka sai poen . Yului poei la law u loeih , tina uh , ” a tina .
40022005	Tede a ceel thlaang hue lawng n'tu la sak ohla amami ngaih la cet u . Khatsut tah lo la cet u , khatsut tah dawr la cet u tih ,
40022006	khatsut lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a tuuk tih a bawh u , a ngawn u .
40022007	Sengpahrang tah a thin sa soeh tih a raalkap thli te a tuih tih thlaang aka ngawn thli te a thup sak boeih coengah khaaw te hai oen a dawi sak .
40022008	Tecoengah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue te a khue tih , “ Yului poei tah coekroek la awm poen de ka thlaangceel thli he hinyahna dang ham koeih u nawh .
40022009	Tahe ah lawngpui cumruum ah cet u lang poei ah thlaang a yahawhna ham na huh thlaang boeih te van ceel uh , ” a tina .
40022010	Tecoengah a tuihyoeihthlaang hue lawng lawngpui boeih ah cet u tih a huh sarui thlaangthe thlaang theen boeih te a cawi tih yuluina im ah thlaang be-toet sut .
40022011	A ceel thlaang thli te bueh ham sengpahrang lawng a law vengah yului poei himbai bai ohla aka awm thlaang pakhat te a huh .
40022012	Sengpahrang lawng , “ Ka puei , yului poei himbai bai ohla metila he poei khuiah na kuun thai ? tila a doet . Tede ahih lawng n'tu khaw thui thai nawh .
40022013	Tecoengah sengpahrang lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te , ‘ Ahih he a kut , a khow te piin pe u lang adau ben yiinna khuila voei uh . Te huen ah rap vetih a naw a tah ai , ’ ti ” tila a thui pe u .
40022014	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ A thlaangceel tah yahawh de a tuek thlaang tah yawlca , ” tila hukhueng koek ah a thut .
40022015	Farasi hue lawng Jesuh tengla cet u tih awldoetna oen a thawlhna tuuk pe ham kamthlah u .
40022016	Tecoengah amami kah hubang khatsut hue oen Herod kah thlaang khatsut hue te Jesuh tengla a tuih u tih , ahimi lawng , ” Saya , nang lawngtah awl doeng na thui tila ka ming u . Pathen kah kawngaihna a kawng he khaw thlaang lawng metila a poek ti khaw rih ohla na cang puei tih a-u kah mik-hai khaw na bueh nawh .
40022017	Tedawngah na poekna van thui lah , Rom Sengpahrang tengah mangmu peek he mami kah Phungawl lawng a ngaih aw , ngaih nawh aw ? ” tila a doet u .
40022018	Ahimi kah kamthlahna athe khawkhan te Jesuh lawng a ming dawngah ahimi te , “ Thlaangthaipalat hue , n'tu dawngah kai he kamah awl dawngah tuuk ham na ngaih u ?
40022019	Mangmu peek ham tangka te n'nueh u lah , ” a tina . Ahimi lawng tangka te a tengla a khuen u tih Jesuh lawng ,
40022020	“ A-u kah a mueime oen a miing aka awm ? ” tila a doet u .
40022021	Ahimi lawng , “ Sengpahrang kah a muei oen a miing awm , ” ti u . Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Tetih atah sengpahrang koe te sengpahrang pe u langtah Pathen koe te Pathen pe uh , ” a tina .
40022022	Te awl te a yaak u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik u tih Jesuh teng kalawng atloela cet u .
40022023	Te khawhin vengah te duek coengah thawhkoepna awm tlaih nawh aka ti Sadusi thlaang khatsut Jesuh tengla law u tih awl a doet u . ( Ahimi lawngtah thawhkoepna awm nawh ti u ) .
40022024	Ahimi lawng , “ Saya , Mosi kah cangpueina dawngah thlaang pakhat a ca cuun ohla a duek atah a manau lawng a yu te a yuna roe roe ai . Te tila a yuna tih a ca a cuun hih atah aka duek tangte a maya kah a ca la awm ai , ” ti .
40022025	Tahe ah boenhui pasarih awm u . Aham koek lawng a yu a lawh de a ca cuun ohla duek , a yu te a manau lawng a paang .
40022026	A manau pabe khaw , a pathumna te khaw duek . Te tila boenhui pasarih te duek boeih .
40022027	Ahukhueng atah te hutaa khaw duek van .
40022028	Boenhui pasarih lawng a yuna dawngah thawhkoepna hin ah a-u kah a yu la a awm ai ? ” tila a doet u .
40022029	Jesuh lawng , “ Na poek thawlh u ! Nangmi lawng Caciim oen Pathen kah huham tharana na ming u nawh dawngah ni .
40022030	Metihtiah thlaangduek a thawh koep vengah tah vaan ah aka awm vanthlaang angla awm vetih yuvaa tila awm tlaih manawh .
40022031	Thlaangduek thawhkoepna kawngah Pathen lawng a thui awl te vai khat khaw na tae u nawh aw ?
40022032	Pathen lawng , ‘ Kai tah Abraham Pathen , Isak Pathen , Jakob kah Pathen la ka awm ! ti . Aka hing thli kah Pathen la awm tih aka duek thli kah Pathen nawh ni , ’ tila a thui .
40022033	Te awl te thlaangping hue lawng a yaak vengah ahih kah cangpueina dawngah te a kawpoek rai u tangkiik .
40022034	Sadusi thlaang hue awl thui thai nawh la Jesuh lawng a voem te Farasi hue lawng a yaak vengah ngawl tun u tih ,
40022035	Ahimi timkah Phungawl aka ming thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh kah a thawlhna tuuk pe a ngaih dawngah ,
40022036	“ Saya , Phungawl dawngah me ang awlpeek he aka lenduet ? ” tila a doet .
40022037	Jesuh lawng , “ Na Bawipa Pathen te na thinkaw lungbui boeih , na hingna boeih oen na thoemna , na tharana boeih oen ah lungnah . ’
40022038	Tete aka lenduet oen awlpuikoek awlpeek mi .
40022039	Pahihna awlpeek aka lenduet tah pakhatna angla , “ Na imbe te namah pum na lungna angla na lungna ai . ’
40022040	Mosi kah Phungawl boeih oen tawngha hue kah cangpueina thli boeih te he awlpeek pahih dawngah cui boeih poen ” a tina .
40022041	Farasi hue thik-at la a ngawlh tun u vengah Jesuh lawng .
40022042	“ Messiah kawng he metila na poek u ? A-u kah cadil la a awm ? tila ahimi te a doet . Ahimi lawng , “ Devid cadil ni , ” ti u .
40022043	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Tetih atah n'tu dawngah Ciim Muithla lawng Devid nala Messiah te ka Bawipa ni , ” tila na thui ai , a tina kai ? ” Devid lawng ,
40022044	“ Bawipa lawng ka Bawipa tengah , Na raal thli na khowtang ah ka khueh thlantoe Ka bantang ben ah ngawl lah , ” a tina , ti .
40022045	Devid lawng , “ Bawipa ” a tina atah metila Messiah te Devid cadil la a awm thai ai ? tila a doet u .
40022046	Jesuh kah awl doet te a-u lawng-khaw a thung u thai nawh dawngah te hin kalawng a-u lawngkhaw awl doet ha u tlaih nawh .
40023001	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue oen a hubang hue tengah awl a thui .
40023002	“ Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue he tah Mosi kah Phungawl aka thuicaih thlaang hue ni .
40023003	Tedawngah avan thui boeih tah na sai u ham oen na vai u ham koei ni , tede ahimi kah sai te oett u boel , ahimi lawng a thui angla te sai u nawh .
40023004	Thlaangtloe ham tah thalrih te a tloeng pe u tih arih tangkiik la a phueih sak u , tede amami lawngtah thlaangtloe kah thalrih bawm ham a kutdawn oen Pateng dawm u nawh .
40023005	Thlaang kah huh theenna ham bueng thaihu soeprep a sai u . A luu oen a baan dawngah a yeen u Caciim bu ke bueh u lah ! metihtlukla a bo tih a himbai hmoi metila a san .
40023006	Poei saina oen sinakok atah atheenkoek huen ah ngawlh a ngaih u tih ngawlhna te a kam oepsoeh u .
40023007	Thlaang yahawh a awmna dawr ah thlaang kah hinyahna oen koehna te a ngaih u tih ‘ Saya ’ tila khue ham a ngaih u .
40023008	Tede nangmi tah , ‘ Saya ’ tila khue ham ngaih u boel , nangmi tah boenhui la na awm u dawngah , ‘ Saya ’ tila khue ham pakhat bueng ni na khueh u .
40023009	Tecoengah Vaan ah aka awm Pa pakhat bueng na khueh u dawngah he dilai han ah a-u khaw ‘ Apa ’ tila khue u boel .
40023010	Nangmi lawng ‘ Ukkung ’ tila khue khaw ngaih u boel . Ukkung pakhat bueng na khueh u te tah Messiah ni .
40023011	Nangmi timkah aka lenduet te nangmi kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai .
40023012	A-u khaw amah oen amah aka pawmsang u tah adangla a thlaak vetih a-u khaw boe ngai la aka awm tah aka lenduet la a pawmsang ai , ” a tina .
40023013	“ Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue ! nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue , nangmi lawng Vaan ram thawhka te thlaang kuun thai nawh ham na khaih khoep u tih namami khaw na kuun u nawh ; kuun aka ngaih thli ham khaw awng ham na ngaih u nawh .
40023014	( “ Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue , nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue , huhai thli te na thai na latna u tih a im te na lawh pe u . Thlaang huh atah asanhlangla na thangthui u . He tila na awm u dawngah Pathen kah dantatna a tlawh ngaai la na dang u ai . ” )
40023015	“ Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue ! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik . Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Thlaang pakhat thinkaw thaw sak hamla tuitunlii ah lowng oen na cet u tih ram pum na hiil u . Thlaang pakhat na dang u vengah namami angla hell ah arepla patang khang ham na sai u .
40023016	“ Nangmi mawtkung mikpum hue ! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik . Nangmi lawng , ‘ Thlaang pakhat lawng Tempal bok-im a phoei tih awl a taap atah ahih kah awltaap te cak nawh , tede Tempal bok-im khuikah sui te a phoei tih awl a taap atah a awl taap te cak . ’ tila na cang puei u .
40023017	Mikpum thlaangngau hue ! N'tu awlpui ngaai ? Sui aw ! Tihnawhtah sui aka ciim sak Tempal bok-im aw ?
40023018	Tecoengah nangmi lawng , ‘ Thlaang pakhat lawng bokna a phoei tih awl a taap atah ahih kah awltaap te cak nawh ; tede thaang dawngkah kutdo te a phoei tih awl a taap atah cak , ’ tila na cang puei u .
40023019	Na mik pum u tangkiik nawh pai he ! N'tu awlpui ngaai ? Kutdo aw , kutdo aka ciim sak bokna te aw ?
40023020	Tedawngah a-u khaw boknathaang te a phoei tih awl a taap poen atah boknathaang dawngah kah kutdo te khaw a phoei haih poen tih ,
40023021	Tempal bok-im te a phoei tih awl a taap poen atah Tempal bok-im oen a khuiah aka awm Pathen te khaw a phoei haih poen .
40023022	Tecoengah thlaang pakhat lawng vaan te aphoei tih awl a taap atah Pathen kah ngawlhcoen oen te ngawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl te khaw a phoei haih poen .
40023023	“ Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Farasi hue ! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik . Nangmi lawng cuenruek-an , sawngsing , sungii , oen tawian thli Pateng Pathen te paha ah pakhat na peek u ; tede Phungawl lawng awlpui la n'cang puei doengna , thlaang reenna oen ueppang , koei la awmna te tah na hadalhna u . He ang thli he na sai hamla awm tih atloe te khaw dalrana ohla sai ham awm .
40023024	Nangmi mawtkung mikpum hue ! Nangmi lawng pildiik pakhat mai Pateng awkk hau nawh ham tui te na cii u , tede kala-uk tah na doelh u .
40023025	“ Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue , nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik . Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Nangmi lawng boengloeng oen beel te asaw ahan tah na silh u tih akhui tah athe thaihu , mah kawngaih saina oen betoet .
40023026	Mikpum Farasi hue ! Boengloeng te akhuiben sil lamha uh , te atah adauben khaw ciim badai .
40023027	“ Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue ! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik . Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Nangmi tah ahan kah a bawk oen a thluk u thlann oen na lo u ; ahan ben atah dan theen tangkiik , tede akhuiben atah arong athaang duekrawkk oen ah betoet .
40023028	Tih van angla nangmi khaw asaw ahan atah thlaangdoeng angla na awm u , tede na kaw khui atah thailatna , thawlna soeprep oen ah na betoet u .
40023029	“ Phungawl cangpueikung oen Farasi hue ! Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Tawngha hue ham thlann te atheen theen la na sai pe u tih thlaangdoeng thlaangciim hue kah lungsuem te atheenla na thoei na cam pe u .
40023030	Tecoengah nangmi lawng ‘ Yan kah nu haam pahaam thli san vengah mami ng'awm u kawinih ahimi kah a sai angla n'sai u nawh vetih tawngha thli khaw ng'ngawn u nawh sui de , ’ na ti u .
40023031	Tedawngah namami roe lawng tawngha thli aka ngawn hue kah cadil la na awm te na tueng sak u poen .
40023032	Tedawngah na patuer hue kah a sai thaihu thli te nangmi lawng sai langtah coeng ngala u hawn .
40023033	Nangmi ruul hue , ruul kah cadil hue ! Metila hell khui tlaakna kalawng ka loeih u thai ai tila na ngaiuep u ?
40023034	Tedawngah kavan thui u : nangmi tengah tawngha oen thlaangcuih hue oen ah cangpueikung kavan tuih ai ; nangmi lawng khatsut te na ngawn u ai , khatsut te sinakok bok-im khuiah na bawh u vetih ahimi te khaaw tloe la na vai reroe u ai .
40023035	Tedawngah , thawlhna aka khueh nawh hue na ngawn u dawngah dantatna nangmi tengah avan pha ai . Thlaangdoeng Abel kalawng Tempal bok-im oen bokna-thaang laklaw ah na ngawn u Berikhiah capa Zekhariah toe te na ngawn u dawngah thisen phu dantatna nangmi tengah avan pha ai .
40023036	Atak tang kavan thui u : thlaangdoeng hue na ngawn u dawngah thisen phu dantatna te tahe san kah thlaang hue tengah avan pha ai .
40023037	Jesuh lawng , “ Aw , Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Tawngha hue te na ngawn u tih nangmi tengla Pathen lawng avan tuih celtuih hue te lungto oen na de u , Aainu lawng a ca thli a phe thlip ah a yiing sak angla kan thlip kan dah ham ka cai de na ngaih u nawh .
40023038	Tedawngah na Tempal bok-im te a hoett vetih ahong ahii dingrak la awm ai .
40023039	Kavan thui u : tahe kalawng hailam toe , ‘ Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh , ’ na ti u thlantoe kai he nan hu koep u tlaih manawh , ” a tina .
40024001	Jesuh lawng tho tih Tempal bok-im kalawng a ceh vengah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih Tempal bok-im oen ah tuhkai u la a sak thli te a nueh u .
40024002	Jesuh lawng , “ Oeih , nangmi lawng he ang thli boeih he na huh u . Atak tang kavan thui u ; he Tempal bok-im kah lungto pakhat maikhaw a awmna huen ah awm manawh ; apum boeih la a dawng u ai , ” a tina .
40024003	Jesuh lawng amah bueng Olif tlaangsawm ah a ngawlh vengah a hubang hue amami bueng ahuepla a tengah law u tih , “ He ang thli he metuek vengah a thoeng ai ? Van thui lah ! ” Na lawna ham atue oen tahe kah san a boetna yoeii poen ti he mingna ham me ang miknoekna a awm ai ? ” tila a doet u .
40024004	Jesuh lawng , “ A-u lawngkhaw n'thaina u nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
40024005	Thlaang yahawh lawng ka miing oen law u vetih ‘ Kai he Messiah ni , ’ ti ai , thlaangping yahawh hlang te a thai alatna ai .
40024006	Ayoeica kah raal kahna awl oen athla hlang kah ceemraal thawhna awlthang te na yaak u ai , tede lakueng u boel . Te ang thaihu thli te a thoeng ham roe ni , tede aboetna a pha poen tila thuingaihna nawh ni .
40024007	Ram pakhat oen pakhat kaap u ai , thlaangphun pakhat oen pakhat thekyak u ai . Dilai pum ah khawkha vetih likluei hinghuen ai .
40024008	He ang thli boeih he camoe awm tawm tamtuencuek bung-tlawh angla ni a awm .
40024009	“ Tecoengah nangmi te thekhana ham oen ngawn hamla n'tuuk u vetih thlaangtloe kut ah nangmi te n'peek ai . Kai kawng dawngah thlaang boeih lawng n'thina u ai .
40024010	Tevengah thlaang broe lawng a oengna te a hoett u ai . Ahimi lawng pakhat oen pakhat sawah paipi a thleep u vetih pakhat oen pakhat thi u patoeng ai .
40024011	Tecoengah tawngha rawlrap thli yahawh hlang pho vetih thlaang thli te a thai alatna u ai .
40024012	Thawlhna puung tare vetih thlaang yahawh kah lungna thinkaw khaw dingreel poen ai .
40024013	Tede a-u khaw aboettoe acakla aka pai tah thlawn la awm ai .
40024014	Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih kah sausi la a awmna ham Vaan Ram kawng Awlthang Theen he dilai pum kah thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng u vetih tecoengah aboetna te a pha ti .
40024015	“ Tawngha Deniel lawng a thui oepsoeh ‘ Rih koei tuiilehkap thaihu , ’ lawng huenciim ah a pai te na huh u ai . ( Caciim aka tae lawng he kah a thuingaihna he yaakming uh )
40024016	Tevengah Judia ram kah thlaang thli lawng tlaangsawm la heeng u seh .
40024017	Imphu ah aka awm lawng im khuikah thaihu thli lawh ham rum boel seh .
40024018	Lo ah aka awm lawng himbai hinaak lawh ham im la meel re boel seh .
40024019	Te kah atue khawhin tah hutaa bungpum tattloel oen cacuun naukem thli ham metila khaw amap sut ai .
40024020	Nangmi lawng na heengna atue he sikding tue oen Sabbath khawhin ah a thoengna nawh ham Pathen tengah thangthui uh !
40024021	Metihtiah dilai suen cuek kalawng tihin toe ah aka awm , me ang patangraina boeih lak ah teveng tue ah aka awm te rih ham awm ngaai . Te ang patangraina te a awm khaw awm koep tlaih manawh .
40024022	Tede Pathen lawng te kah atue te a toi sak poen ; te tila atue toi sak nawh kawinih a-u khaw deem manawh . Tede Pathen lawng a thlaang tuek hue hamla atue a toi sak ai .
40024023	“ Tevengah a-u lawngkhaw nangmi te ‘ Bueh lah , Messiah tah he ah awm , ke ah Messiah awm , ’ a ti vengah tangna u boel .
40024024	Metihtiah Messiah rawlrap oen tawngha rawlrap thli pho u vetih a coengg thai atah Pathen kah thlaangtuek Pateng thailatna ham kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu a lentloe a sai u ai .
40024025	Hutung u lah ! Atue atang a pha thlan ah kavan thui oepsoeh u poen he .
40024026	“ Thlaang lawng ‘ Bueh lah , Messiah tah ramhum huhang ah awm , ’ a ti u vengah cet u boel . ‘ Bueh lah , he huen ah thuh u , ’ a ti vengah khaw tangna u boel .
40024027	Metihtiah khawlaw ben kalawng khawtlaak toe mik patap ah khaw thlap apha angla Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai .
40024028	“ Duek rawkk awmna huen roekk ah langta lawng tun van ai .
40024029	“ Te tila raina khawhin akhum coeng khoeng atah khaw yiin khoep ai , thla lawngkhaw hop ai , vaan kalawng aisi tla ai , vaan kah huham tharana thli boeih lawng hinghuen ai .
40024030	Tevengah Thlaanghing Capa kah miknoekna vaan ah tueng ai ; Thlaanghing Capa lawng tharana huham “ oen ruep-awmna oen ah ” muui dawng a rum thuk te a huh u vengah dilai thlaang boeih lawng rap ai .
40024031	Pengsara angaihhlangla a tum vetih dilai a kil palii ah vanthlaang thli te a tuih ai , dilai a boetna kalawng khatben toe kah a thlaangtuek thli te ahimi lawng a cawi ai .
40024032	“ Thaidut thing dawngah cuihna lo uh . Thaidut thing tah a ke hingsuep tih a ram thaai a cawn hang vengah khawhaal tue yoeii poen tila na ming u .
40024033	Te tih van angla he thaihu boeih na huh u vengah a lawna atue tah yoei poen tila ming uh .
40024034	He he hilh u boel : tahe kah aka hing hue a duek boeih thlan ah he kah thaihu boeih he thoeng ai .
40024035	Vaan oen dilai tah khum boeih ai , tede ka awl tah meveng khaw khum manawh .
40024036	“ Te khawhin oen atue te a-u lawng-khaw ming nawh ; vaan kah aka awm vanthlaang oen a Capa lawngkhaw ming nawh ; A Pa bueng lawng ni a ming ,
40024037	Noah dung vengkah angla Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah awm van ai .
40024038	Tuiliw a law thlan , Noah te lowng khuila a kuun hin toe thlaang thli lawng a caak a awkk u tih awmtheen a boenn u .
40024039	Te tila tuiliw lawng a khuk u thlantoe n'tu aka thoeng ai tite ahimi lawng ming u nawh . Tetih van la Thlaanghing Capa a law vengah awm van ai .
40024040	Teveng tue ah lo ah thlaang pahih lawng bii a bi hih ai . Tevengah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai .
40024041	Hutaa pahih lawng sum a deng hih ai . Pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai .
40024042	“ Bawipa a lawna atue khawhin te na ming u nawh dawngah ngaithuen oepsoeh uh .
40024043	Imkung lawng thlaanghuuen a lawna atue te ming kawinih atheenla a toet huertue vetih thlaanghuuen lawng im te muk thai manawh tite na ming u .
40024044	Tedawngah nangmi lawng ngaithuen oepsoeh uh , metihtiah nangmi lawng na poek nawh atue vengah Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai .
40024045	“ Te tih atah a-u uep-awm tih aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la aka awm ai ? Te tah a bawi lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli cawmcah ham oen ah atue atang vengah ahimi caak awkk pekung la a khueh te ueppang koei aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai .
40024046	Ahih lawngah bii atheenla a bi lii te a bawi lawng a law vengah a huh atah metihtlukla te tuihyoeihthlaang tah a awmngaih ai ?
40024047	Tedawngah atak tang kavan thui u : te kah tuihyoeihthlaang te a bawi lawng a koeva boeih te khoembelkung la a khueh ai .
40024048	Tede ahih lawng uepvoet koei tuihyoeihthlaang la a awm atah , ka bawi he law yue thlan hun ai ti vetih ,
40024049	atloe tuihyoeihthlaang te a bawh apai vetih , yuuruui buh hah hue oen a caak a awkk haih u ai .
40024050	Tecoengah ahih lawng a poek a sam nawh khawhin oen a ming a tung nawh atue ah a bawi tah law koep ai .
40024051	A bawi lawng ahih te ram la a voeih vetih thlaangthaipalat thli lawng a dang koei te a dang sak van ai . Te huen ah rap vetih a naw a rueng ai .
40025001	“ Vaan ram tah yulokung cadawng do hamla haiim a khuen tih aka cet hulaa paha oen lo u .
40025002	Te thli timkah hulaa pa-ngaa hue tah cuih tih pa-ngaa hue tah cuih nawh .
40025003	Aka cuih nawh hutaa pa-ngaa he lawng haiim tah a khuen u de haitui ahoei akai khuen u nawh .
40025004	Aka cuih hulaa hue lawngtah hai-im dawngah haitui abepirla a thloen u coengah haitui ahoei akai a khuen u .
40025005	Yulokung cadawng te a law yue nawh dawngah hulaa hue tah ip muelh u .
40025006	“ Yiinthuem veng atah ‘ Yulokung cadawng law poen ! Tho u lang do uh , ’ tila paang awl a yaak .
40025007	Hulaa paha hue te tho u tih haiim vaang ham kamthlah u .
40025008	Tevengah hulaa aka cuih nawh hue lawng aka cuih hulaa hue tengah ‘ Kaimi kah hai duek poen ai , haitui van thloen thoem u lah , ’ a tina u .
40025009	Hulaa aka cuih he lawng ‘ Coengg thai manawh , kaimi ham oen ah nangmi ham haih tah haitui khoek manawh . Dawr la cet u lang namami ham lai uh , ’ a tina u .
40025010	Tedawngah hulaa aka cuih nawh hue lawng haitui lai ham dawr la a cehna ruet ah yulokung tah va pai parak . Ngaithuen oepsoeh la aka awm hulaa hue lawngtah yulokung oen yului poei khuila kuun u tih thawh a khaih khoep u .
40025011	Tecoengah hulaa atloe hue te avan pha u tih ‘ Bawipa , Bawipa kaimi ham thawh van awng u de lah ! ’ a tina u .
40025012	Yulokung lawng ‘ Kavan awng manawh , nangmi te kan ming nawh , ’ a tina .
40025013	Jesuh lawng , “ Te tila khawhin oen atue te na ming u nawh dawngah ngaithuen oepsoeh lang ring uh , ” tila ahukhueng ah a tina .
40025014	Jesuh lawng “ Vaan ram tah he tila awm . Thlaang pakhat lawng athlahlang la yin ceh ham kamthlah tih a ceh thlan vengah a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a khue tih a thaihu boeih te a kuem sak u .
40025015	Amami kah sai thai khoek ah pakhat rip te tangka thong ngaa a peek , atloe pakhat te thong hih a peek , atloe pakhat te thong khat a peek tih yin la a ceh taak .
40025016	Tangka thong ngaa aka dang tuihyoeihthlaang lawngtah cet pahoei tih tangka te bii a bina tih apueh thong ngaa a dang .
40025017	Tih van angla tangka thong hih aka dang lawngkhaw apueh thong hih a dang .
40025018	Tede tangka thong khat aka dang te lawngtah dilai a to tih a bawi kah tangka te a up .
40025019	“ Atue sanhlang a awm coeng atah a bawi te va meel koep tih ahimi kah tangka hawna te cayin a sai u .
40025020	Tangka thong ngaa aka dang te va kuun tih apueh thong ngaa a peek . ‘ Bawipa tangka thong ngaa nan peek . Bueh lah ! Apueh thong ngaa ka dang tih kan peek , ’ a tina .
40025021	A bawi lawng ‘ Nang tah , ueppangna koei tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm ! Thaihu yoehca dawngah ueppang koei la na awm dawngah thaihu yahawh kuemkung la kan khueh ai . Law langtah ka awmngaihna khuiah kuun van , ’ a tina .
40025022	Tecoengah tangka thong hih aka dang tuihyoeihthlaang lawng law tih ‘ Bawipa nang lawng tangka thong hih nan peek . Bueh lah ! Tahe ah apueh thong hih ka dang tih kan peek , ’ a tina .
40025023	A bawi lawng ‘ Theen tangkiik , Nang khaw tuihyoeihthlaang ueppang koei la na awm . Thaihu yoehca dawngah ueppang koei la na awm dawngah thaihu yahawh kuemkung la kan khueh ai . Law lang ka awmngaihna khuiah kuun van lah , ’ a tina .
40025024	Tecoengah tangka thong khat aka dang te kuun tih ‘ Bawipa nang tah amangkhak thlaang la na awm tite kan ming ; na tuhna nawh huen ah na ah tih na hehna nawh huen ah na cawi tite kan ming .
40025025	Tedawngah kan rih tangkiik tih tangka te dilai khuiah ka up . Bueh lah ! He he namah koe tangka ni , ’ a tina .
40025026	Tevengah a bawi lawng ‘ Nang aka thekoek tuihyoeihthlaang thayong bi ngak ! Caangti ka tuhna nawh huen ah ka ah tih ka hehna nawh huen ah a thaih ka yuun tite na ming tang tang aw ?
40025027	Na ming atah n'tu dawngah ka tangka te ka meel koep vengah apuehla dangna ham tangka khuehna bengh ah na khueh nawh ?
40025028	Tahe ah ahih tengkah tangka te lo u lang tangka thong ha aka khueh te pe uh .
40025029	Metihtiah aka khueh moek thlaang tengah a tawm athap pe vetih apueh la a khueh ai . Tede aka khueh nawh thlaang tengkah a khueh duen te a lawh pe ai .
40025030	He kah tuihyoeihthlaang n'tu la aka thuum nawh he adauben yiinna khuila daawng u langtah te huen ah rap selang a naw cak cak rueng seh , ’ a tina .
40025031	Jesuh lawng “ Thlaanghing Capa tah Sengpahrang angla vanthlaang thli boeih oen law vetih a bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah ngawl ai .
40025032	Thlaangphun boeih lawng a haiah tun u ai . Tecoengah tuudoen lawng me-ee timkah tuu te a pekthlee angla ahih lawngkhaw thlaang thli te bu hih la a pek abo ai .
40025033	Ahih lawng thlaangdoeng hue te a bantang ben ah a khueh vetih thlaangthawlh hue te a banvoei ben ah a khueh ai .
40025034	Tecoengah Sengpahrang lawng a bantang ben ah aka awm hue te , ‘ Law uh , nangmi a Pa kah yotheenna aka paang hue ! Law u lang dilai suen cuek veng kalawng nangmi ham a roek abah sut Vaan ram te paang u lah .
40025035	Metihtiah ka bung a pawng vengah buh nan cah u ; tui ka halh vengah tuiding nan tuul u ; kamyin la ka awm vengah na im ah nan luui sak u ;
40025036	hinaak himbai ka taal vengah nan bai nan naak sak u ; Ka tlawh ka nat vengah nan khuut nan ceem u ; thongim ka tlaak vengah nan hip u ; ’ a tina ai .
40025037	Tevengah thlaangdoeng hue lawng , ‘ Bawipa , mevengah na bung a pawng te kan huh u tih buh kan cah u ; tui na halh te mevengah kan huh u tih tui kan tuul u ?
40025038	Mevengah kamyin la na law tih im ah kan pah sak u ; mevengah hinaak himbai na taal te kan huh u tih kan naak kan bai sak u ?
40025039	Mevengah na tlawh na nat , mevengah thongim ah na awm te kan huh u tih kan hip u ? ’ tila a tina u ai .
40025040	Sengpahrang lawng , ‘ Atak tang kavan thui u ; He kah ka boenhui huhsit koek pakhat tengah na sai u te ka sawah na sai u poen ni , ’ a tina ai .
40025041	“ Tecoengah Sengpahrang lawng a banvoei benkah aka awm hue tengah ‘ Nangmi Pathen lawng a kawsina ’ thlaang thli ka teng kalawng atloela cet uh . Seitan oen a hubang hue ham aroek abah pe sut dungyan haialh khuila cet uh .
40025042	Metihtiah ka bung a pawng vengah buh nan cah u nawh ; tui ka halh vengah tui nan tuul u nawh ;
40025043	Kamyin la ka awm vengah na im ah nan pah sak u nawh ; hinaak himbai ka taal vengah nan bai nan naak sak u nawh ; ka tlawh ka nat vengah khaw , thongim ka tlaak vengah khaw nan khuut nan ceem u nawh , ’ a tina ai .
40025044	Tevengah ahimi lawng ‘ Bawipa , mevengah na bung a pawng , tui na halh , kamyin la na awm , hinaak himbai na taal , na tlawh na nat tih thongim ah na awm tih atliingla na awm te kan huh u tih kan khuut kan ceem u nawh , ’ a tina u ai .
40025045	Sengpahrang lawng ‘ Atak tang kavan thui u : He thlaang huhsit koek timkah pakhat bawm ham na ngaih u nawh te kai nan bawm nan ceem u nawh poen ni , ’ a tina ai .
40025046	Tecoengah ahimi te dungyan patang raina huen ah a tuih vetih thlaangdoeng hue te tah dungyan hingna ah cet u ai , ” a tina .
40026001	Jesuh lawng he awl a thui boeih coengah a hubang hue tengah ,
40026002	“ Na ming u angla he coeng kalawng hin hih ah Kaantaak Poei awm vetih Thlaanghing Capa te thinglam dawngah ngawn hamla thlaang kut ah a peek ai , ” a tina .
40026003	Tecoengah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas kah impui ah tun u tih ,
40026004	Jesuh te ahuepla tuuk tih ngawn ham khaw a khan u .
40026005	“ Poei khawhin khui atah tu boel sih , thlaangping lawng awl puung vetih cumplaam la tho ai , ” tila ahimi lawng a thui u .
40026006	Jesuh tah Bethani khaaw kah haibe aka na Simon im ah te awm .
40026007	Buh a caak lii vengah hutaa pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih riimtuui phutlo alabasta uum dawngah abepirla avan khuen tih Jesuh te a luu ah a suep .
40026008	Te tila a sai te a hubang hue lawng a huh u vengah a thinsa u tih , “ N'tu ham he tila apoeih alak he !
40026009	He riimtuui he tangka yahawhla a yoeih vetih khawdeng harah a peek makawi ! ” ti u .
40026010	Te tila a hubang hue lawng a thui u te Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah ahimi nala “ N'tu hamla he hutaa he na lawl na la u ? Ka sawah ahih lawng thaihu theen a sai poen ni ,
40026011	Khawdeng harah thli tah nangmi tengah awm poepa ai , tede kai tah nangmi tengah ka awm poe manawh .
40026012	He kah hutaa lawng ka pum riimtuui oen avan suep he ka rawkk kuem ham a kamthlahna ni .
40026013	Atak tang kavan thui u : dilai saw peng tawm ah he awlthang a thuina huen roekk atah ahih kah thaihu sai he amah hilhna nawh ham a thui yoeyah u van ai .
40026014	Tecoengah a hubang thlaihih tim kah Judas Iskariot aka miingna te khawsoeih ahaamca hue tengla cet tih ,
40026015	“ Jesuh he a sawah paipi ka thleep tih nangmi kut ah kan pe kawinih n'tu nan peek u ai ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawng tangka sawmthum te a toek u tih Judas te a peek u .
40026016	Teveng kalawng Judas lawng Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek thai ham atue theen a ring .
40026017	Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei acuek hin ah a hubang hue Jesuh tengla law u tih , “ Nang hamla Kaantaak buh he ame huen ah ka sai u ai ? tila a doet u .
40026018	Jesuh lawng , “ Khawpui khuikah thlaang pakhat im la cet u lang ‘ Saya lawng : Kai ham atue a pha poen ; ka hubang hue oen na im ah Kaantaak buh veelna ka ca sai u ai , ti ’ tila thui pe uh , ” a tina .
40026019	A hubang hue lawng Jesuh kah a thui angla Kaantaak buh te aroek abah u .
40026020	Khaw a thlem veng atah Jesuh oen a hubang thlaihih hue buh a veel u .
40026021	Thlem buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh lawng , “ Atak tang kavan thui u : nangmi timkah pakhat lawngah ka sawah paipi a thleep ai , ” a tina .
40026022	A hubang hue tah a kawthe u tangkiik tih pakhat coengah pakhat lawng , “ Bawipa , kai aw ? ” tila a doet u .
40026023	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai oen buh beel aka puei haih lawng ka sawah paipi a thleep ai .
40026024	Thlaanghing Capa tah duek ai tila Caciim lawng a thui angla ahih tah duek ai , tede Thlaanghing Capa sawah paipi ’ aka thleep thlaang ham tah khawmap ! Te thlaang te cuun ohla awm kawinih ahih ham theen bet sui de ! ” a tina .
40026025	Paipi thleepkung Judah lawng , “ Saya , kai aw ” tila a doet . Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla soeng , ” a tina .
40026026	Buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh lawng takawi pheel at te a lawh tih a thangthui coengah takawi te a eh tih a hubang hue te a peek . “ He tah ka pum ni ; lo u langtah ca uh , ” a tina .
40026027	Tecoengah boengloeng te a lawh tih Pathen teng awmngaih ciil a thui coengah a hubang hue te a peek . “ Nangmi boeih lawng aw uh , ” a tina .
40026028	“ He tah ka thi ni . Pathen kah awlkhueh thaai acakna oen thlaang boeih kah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina hamla ka hok ka thisen ni .
40026029	Atak tang kavan thui u : A Pa Ram ah nangmi oen haih misurtui a thaai awkk ham khawhin a pha thlantoe tahe kalawng misurtui he ka aw koep tlaih manawh , ” a tina .
40026030	Tecoengah laa raawl at a sak u tih Olif tlaang la luui u .
40026031	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Caciim lawngah , ‘ Pathen lawng tuudoen te a ngawn vetih tuu boeih tah pathengg payaangla awm ai ’ tila a thui angla , ‘ N'tu yiin roe ah nangmi lawng kai he nan heng taak u vetih nan ceh taak u ai . ’
40026032	Tede duekna kalawng ka thawh koep coengah Galili la nangmi haiah ka cet ai , ” a tina .
40026033	Piter lawng , “ Thlaangtloe boeih lawng nang te n'hoett sut tih ng'heng taak cakhaw kai lawngtah kan heng taak roe manawh , ” tila Jesuh te a tina .
40026034	Jesuh lawng Piter tengah “ Atak tang kavan thui : n'tuu yiin ah aai a khaawk thlan vengah nang lawng kai he ka ming nawh ’ tila voeithum toe na basa ai , ” a tina .
40026035	Piter lawng , “ Nang oen duek haih ham toe awm mai cakhaw kan ming nawh tila ka thui roe manawh , ” a tina . A hubang atloe hue lawngkhaw te tila a thui u van .
40026036	Tecoengah Jesuh tah a hubang hue oen Ketsaman a ti u ahuen la cet u tih ahimi te , “ Ke huen la ke ka cet silang ka thangthuina ruet ah he ah he anna ngawl uh ! ” a tina .
40026037	Jesuh lawng Piter oen Zebedi capa rawi te a ceh puei . A kaw caalla the tih lakueng sut .
40026038	Tecoengah ahimi nala “ Ka kaw a the uett ah ka duek kaw la hut . He ah awm u lang n'hak puei ’ u lah , ” a tina .
40026039	Jesuh lawng ahimi oen athla betna huen la cet , dilai ah buekuep tih “ A Pa , acoengg thai atah he kah patang khangna boengloeng he van khoe mai hawn ! Tede kai kah kawngaih angla awm boel selang nang kah kawngaih angla awm hawn seh , ” tila thangthui .
40026040	Tecoengah a hubang pathum tengla ava mel vengah ahimi a ih muelh u te a huh tih Piter tengah , “ Metila nangmi pathum hue he khawnoek pakhat khui maikhaw na hak u thai nawh aw ?
40026041	Suek-halhna na taa thaina ham hak u lang thangthui uh . Thinkaw lawngtah a ngaih de pumsa tah a tha yoek sut ” a tina .
40026042	Jesuh tah cet koep tih “ A Pa , he kah patang khangna boengloeng he awkk ohla khoe thai koeila a awm nawh atah , na kawngaih angla awm hawn seh , ” tila thangthui .
40026043	A hubang hue tengla Jesuh a mel koep vengah ahimi a ih muelh te a huh ; a mik khaw daai u thai nawh .
40026044	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a ceh taak tih apathumna ah a thangthui nooek angla thangthui koep .
40026045	Tecoengah a hubang hue tengla mel koep tih “ Na ip tih na duem u huen aw ? Bueh u lah ! Thlaanghing Capa tah thlaangthawlh thli kut ah peekna atue tah a pha poen .
40026046	Tho uh , Cet u poen sih . Bueh lah , ka sawah paipi aka thleep thlaang te avan pha poen he , ” a tina .
40026047	Jesuh lawng awl a thui pe vengah te a hubang paha thlaihih tim ah aka thuum van Judas te avan pha . Ahih lawngah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng a tuih u thlaangping , samsen oen boelhoen aka pawm thli te avan law puei .
40026048	Paipi thleepkung lawng thlaangping tengah miknoekna te a thui pe oepsoeh tih , “ Kai lawng ka mok thlaang te nangmi lawng tuuk ham na ngaih thlaang te ni , ahih te tu uh , ” a tina .
40026049	Judas lawng a paipuek ah Jesuh tengla cet pahoei tih “ Saya , na sawah ngaimawngna awm seh , ” a tina tih a mok .
40026050	Jesuh lawng , “ Ka puei , na sai ham koei te aloela sai hawn , ” a tina . Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tuuk tih a khih u .
40026051	Jesuh oen aka awm haih thlaang pakhat lawng a samsen te tiingim dawngkah a suh tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah a tamnaa haa te pat a tloek .
40026052	Jesuh lawng , “ Na samsen te tiingim khuila sang koep . Samsen aka hawna tah samsen oen duek van ai .
40026053	Kai lawng a Pa tengah bawmna ka bih kawinih raalkapbu paha thlaihih lak ah yahawh ngaai vanthlaang te ka tengla avan tuih pahoei ai ti he na ming nawh aw ?
40026054	Tede te tila awm kawinih , he ang thaihu a awm ham Caciim lawng a thui te metila a soep thai ai ? ” a tina .
40026055	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te , “ Nangmi lawng kai he thlaanghuuen angla tuuk ham pawmcunghaiha , samsen oen boelhoen na pawm u tih na law u ? Khawhin roekk Tempal bok-im ah ka ngawl tih kan cang puei u vengah a-u lawngkhaw nan tu u nawh .
40026056	Tede he tila thaihu boeih a awm he tah tawngha hue lawng Caciim dawngah a thut te asoepna ham ni , ” a tina u . Tevengah a hubang boeih lawng Jesuh te a ceh taak tih a heeng taak u .
40026057	Jesuh aka tu thlaangping lawng Jesuh te Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas im la a ceh puei u . Te huen ah Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen Judah ahaamca boeih tun u .
40026058	Piter lawngah a thla bet ngai kalawng Khawsoeih Bawi kah a talawng vawng-up khui toela Jesuh te a hu yut tih a vai . Metila nuem a sai u lah ve tite ming ham a ngaih dawngah ahih lawng talawng vawng-up khuila kuun tih raaltoeng thli oen haih ngawl .
40026059	Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Khonsil ah aka thuum boeih lawng Jesuh te ngawn thai ham a thawlhna a tlap pe u ;
40026060	tede a thawlhna pakhat khaw hu u nawh . Hoem awl oen thawlh aka peel tah awm moen mai de a thawlhna tehca khaw hu thai nawh . Ahukhueng atah thlaang pahih law hih tih .
40026061	“ He thlaang lawng ‘ Pathen kah Tempal bok-im te ka phe vetih hin thum ah ka sak koep ai , ’ ti ” tila a thui hih .
40026062	Khawsoeih Bawi lawng pai hang tih , “ He rawi lawng thawlh n'peel he na oelh ham koei awm nawh aw ? ” tila Jesuh te a doet .
40026063	Tede Jesuh lawng n'tu khaw thui nawh . Khawsoeih Bawi lawng pai koep tih , “ Aka hing Pathen miing ka phoei tih kan doet : Nang he Pathen Capa Messiah tang aw thui lah ? ” a tina .
40026064	Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla soeng ! Tede nangmi boeih tengah kavan thui u ; tahe kalawng Thlaanghing Capa tah Thara koek bantang ben ah ngawl vetih vaan kah muui dawngah a rum thuk te na huh u ai , ” a tina .
40026065	Tevengah Khawsoeih Bawi lawng a himbai te a pheuh tih , “ Pathen thekhana poen ni ! Atloe sausi ngoe tlaih nawh . Pathen thekhana awl na yaak u boeih poen !
40026066	Metila na poek u ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawng , “ A thawlh dawngah duek ham awm , ” ti u .
40026067	Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a mik-hai ah a tumthoeih u tih a bawh u ; a bel u . Tecoengah aka bel hue lawng ,
40026068	“ Messiah ! Nang a-u lawng m'bel ; van thui lah , ” a tina u .
40026069	Piter lawng talawng adauben vawng-up khuiah a ngawlh vengah Khawsoeih Bawi im kah tuihyoeihnu pakhat a tengla law tih , “ Nang khaw Galili thlaang Jesuh oen aka awm haih van ni , ” a tina .
40026070	Tede Piter lawng ahimi boeih haiah basa tih , “ N'tu kawng nuem na thui , ka ming moenih , ” a tina .
40026071	Tecoengah Piter tah talawng thawhka ben la te cet . Atloe tuihyoeihnu pakhat lawng a huh tih te kah thlaang thli tengah , “ He thlaang he Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh oen aka awm haih thlaang ni , ” a tina u .
40026072	Piter lawng basa koep tih , “ Awl ka taap , te thlaang te ka ming nawh , ” a tina .
40026073	Raih a awm coengah te huen kah aka pai thlaang hue lawng Piter tengla law u tih “ Nang khaw ahimi timkah thlaang van ni , na awlcal thingkaa dawngah ming u poen , ” a tina u .
40026074	Tecoengah Piter lawng “ Awl ka taap tih awltak ka thui . Ka thui awl he a soeng nawh atah Pathen lawng dan m'pe seh ! Te thlaang te ka ming roeroe nawh , ” a tina . Te tila a thui coeng khoeng atah aai khawk pahoei .
40026075	Jesuh lawng , “ Aai a khawk thlan vengah voeithum toe kan ming nawh nan tina ai , ” a tina awl te Peter lawng a poek lot vengah adaubenla te cet , a kawsi la dung tih rap .
40027001	Mincanghi atah Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue boeih lawng Jesuh te ngawn ham khaw a khan u .
40027002	Ahih te thiirui oen a khih coengah a ceh puei u tih Rom ram ukbawi Pilat kut ah a peek u .
40027003	Paipi thleepkung Judas lawngah , Jesuh te ngawn hamla khaw a khan u te a yaak vengah yut tih tangka sawmthum te Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue tengah a baal koep .
40027004	“ Ka thawlh tangkiik , thawlhna aka khueh nawh te duek sak hamla a sawah paipi ka thleep hau poen , ” a tina . Ahimi lawng , “ Kaimi lawng n'tu ka tina ai ? Namah ngaih poen ni , ” a tina u .
40027005	Judas lawng tangka sawmthum te Tempal bok-im khuiah a voeih sut tih cet , te coengah kaiawk tih duek .
40027006	Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng tangka te a ruh u tih , “ He kah tangka he thisen phu tangka la a awm dawngah Tempal bok-im kah tangkakong khuiah khueh ham mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh , ” ti u .
40027007	Te kah tangka kawng te a thui u tih kawtlaakna a khueh coeng atah thlaangphun tloe kah phuel la khueh ham ah Ambawpkung kah Lohuen te laina ham tangka te a hawna u .
40027008	Tedawngah te lohuen te , “ Thisen huen ” tila tihin toe ah a thui u .
40027009	Te tila tawngha Jeremiah lawng a thuisut awl te soep poen . Tawngha Jeremiah lawng , “ Israel thlaang thli lawng ahih kah phu ting la kawtlaakna oen aphu a kheh u tangka sawmthum te ahimi lawng a lawh u tih , Bawipa lawng awl n'peek angla ,
40027010	Ambawpkung kah lohuen te laina ham tangka te a hawna u , ” tila a thui te ni .
40027011	Rom ram ukbawi haiah Jesuh a pai vengah ram ukbawi lawng , “ nang he Judah sengpahrang tang aw ? ” tila a doet . Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla ka awm , ” a tina .
40027012	Tede Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng thawlh a peel u te Jesuh lawng khat khaw thung pe nawh .
40027013	Tedawngah Pilat lawng , “ Nang he ahimi lawng thawlh he yoeh m'peel u he na ya nawh aw ? ” tila a doet .
40027014	Tede Jesuh lawng kaam at khaw a thung pe nawh dawngah ram ukbawi tah a kawpoek rai tangkiik .
40027015	Rom ram ukbawi lawng Kaantaak Poei veng roekk ah rangpui lawng loeih sak ham a ngaih thongtla pakhat te a thlah pe .
40027016	Tevengah a thaang aka the soeh thlaangthe Jesuh Barabbas aka miingna thongtla pakhat awm .
40027017	Thlaang rangpui a tun soep vengah Pilat lawng , “ A-u thlah sak ham na ngaih u ? Jesuh Barabbas aw , tih nawh atah Messiah a ti u Jesuh aw ? ” tila a doet .
40027018	Ahimi lawng Jesuh he a uett u dawngah aana aka khueh Judah hue lawng ka kut ah avan pha sak u tite ahih lawng atheenla a ming .
40027019	Awlcekna yung ah Pilat a ngawlh vengah a yu lawng , “ Thawlhna aka khueh nawh te kah thlaangdoeng sawah n'tu khaw sai boel . Ahih kawngah tiyiin ka mang ah ka patang tangkiik , ” tila awl a tah .
40027020	Khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Judah ahaamca hue lawng Barabbas te thlah tih Jesuh te ngawn hamla Pilat tengah bih ham ah rangpui te a ceemtuh .
40027021	Pilat lawng “ He rawi pahih khuiah a-u thlah sak ham na ngaih u ? ” tila rangpui te a doet . Ahimi lawngah , “ Barabbas ” ti u .
40027022	Pilat lawng ahimi te , “ Te atah Messiah a ti u Jesuh he metila ka sai ai ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi boeih lawng , “ Thinglam dawngah ngawn ” a tina u .
40027023	Tede Pilat lawng , “ N'tu thawlhna a sai ? ” tila a doet koep u . Tevengah te thli lawng , “ Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! ” tila angaihhlangla paang u .
40027024	Pilat lawng he tila awl doett khiing he coeng thai manawh , cumplaam la tho tih so tare poen ai tite a huh vengah tui a lawh tih rangpui haiah a kut te a silh . “ He thlaangdoeng kah duekna kawngah kai ka thuum nawh ! Namami kah sai ni ! ” a tina .
40027025	Tevengah rangpui lawngah , “ Ahih kah duekna kawngah dantatna tah kamami oen ka cadil thli sawah tla hawn seh , ” ti u .
40027026	Tecoengah Pilat lawng ahimi ham Barabbas te a thlah pe tih ; Jesuh te cungpoelh oen a bawh sak u tih thinglam dawngah ngawn ham ahimi kut ah a peek .
40027027	Tecoengah Pilat kah raalkap hue lawng Jesuh te ram ukbawi kah impui la a khuen u tih raalkap bu khat lawng a voel khoep .
40027028	Ahimi lawng a himbai te a pit pe u tih himbai ling a bai sak u .
40027029	Tecoengah thliing lumuek te a muek sak u , a bantang kut ah cawnghol a pawm sak u ; tecoengah a haiah buekuep u tih a the akhana u , “ Judah sengpahrang na hinglung vaang seh , ” tila a the akhana u .
40027030	Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tumthoeih u , cawnghol te a lawh pe u tih a luu ah a bawh u .
40027031	He tila a thena u coengah himbai ling te a pit pe tih amah kah himbai te a bai sak koep tih thinglam dawngah ngawn ham a ceh puei u .
40027032	Te tila a ceh u vengah Sairin khaaw kah Simon te a huh u tih raalkap hue lawng amangkhakla Jesuh kah thinglam te a kawh sak u .
40027033	Golgota a ti u huen te a pha u . Golgota ti he tah , “ Luuruh Huen , ” ti ngaihna ni .
40027034	Te huen ah Jesuh te misurtui oen tuikha a pawlh te a tuul u . Jesuh lawng a teng doek tih aw nawh .
40027035	Jesuh te thinglam dawngah a tai u , tecoengah talcung a suh u tih a hinaak himbai te rek ra u .
40027036	Tecoengah ngawl u tih Jesuh te a toet u .
40027037	Thawlh a peel te a thut u tih a luu sawah a tai pe u . “ He tah Judah Sengpahrang Jesuh ni , ” tila a thut pe u .
40027038	Tevengah thlaanghuen pahih khaw Jesuh oen haih bantang ben ah pakhat , banvoei ben ah pakhat thinglam dawngah a tai u .
40027039	Te kah aka cet paitai thli lawng a luu halh a voeih u tih a tamdeng kawkhahna u .
40027040	Tempal bok-im te aka phe tih hin thum ah aka sa koep ham koei ! Pathen Capa la na awm atah namah oen namah thlawn u lah saw ! Thinglam dawng kalawng rum thuk lah ! ” a tina u .
40027041	Tetih van angla khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen ah Judah ahaamca hue lawngkhaw a tamdeng u van tih ,
40027042	“ Ahih lawng thlaangtloe tah a thlawn thai de , amah oen amah tah thlawn u thai nawh ! Israel sengpahrang la awm nawh aw ? Tahe roe ah thinglam dawng kalawng a rum atah mami lawng ahih he n'tangna ai ta !
40027043	Pathen a uepna tih Pathen Capa la ka awm ti , Pathen lawng tahe ah a thlawn ai aw bueh u lah sih ! ” ti u .
40027044	Jesuh oen thinglam dawngah a tai haih thlaanghuen rawi lawng pateng khaw ahimi angla a tamdeng hih van .
40027045	Hingthun ah ram pum boeih te yiinna lawng a thiing khoep tih khawnoek pathum khui yiin khoep .
40027046	Khawvaang ben khawnoek pathum yun atah Jesuh lawng , “ Eli , Eli , Lama sabaktani ? ” tila angaihhlangla paang . A thuingaihna tah , “ Ka Pathen , Ka Pathen , n'tu ah kai nan hoett sut ? ” ti ngaihna ni .
40027047	Te huen kah aka pai thlaang khatsut lawng a yaak u vengah , “ Ahih lawng Elijah ni a khue , ” ti u .
40027048	Ahimi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng thlat cet tih himbaipeen te a lawh , misurtui ah a nuem tih cungkui dawngah a piin tih Jesuh te awkk sak ham kamthlah .
40027049	Tede atloe hue lawng , “ Awm de lah ! ahih thlawn hamla Elijah law ai nuem , bueh de lah sih , ” ti u .
40027050	Jesuh lawng angaihhlangla paang , tecoengah a mal pat yip .
40027051	Tevengah Tempal bok-im khuikah himbaiyan te asaw kalawng adang toe pahih la poet pheuh u . Dilai hinghuen tih lungnu thli boeih rek .
40027052	Thlann thawhka boeih awng u tih aka duek tangte Pathen thlaang thli boehoeng mai te tho u .
40027053	Phuel te a ceh taak u tih duekna kalawng Jesuh a thawh koep coengah Aciim Khawpui khuila kuun u tih thlaang broe haiah tueng u .
40027054	Raalbawi oen Jesuh aka toet raalkap hue lawng likluei hinghuen tih atloe thaihu thli te tila a awm te a huh u vengah lakueng rih oen thuen u tih , “ Ahih he Pathen Capa tang tang ni ” ti u .
40027055	Galili kalawng Jesuh hu ah aka bang tih amah te aka bawmcem hutaa broe nawh te ah te awm u tih ahih te athla kalawng a toet tih a dan u .
40027056	Ahimi tim-ah Meri Makdalin , Jeem oen Josep manu Meri oen Zebedi yu khaw awm u .
40027057	Thlemben apha atah Arimatia khaaw kah kuirang pakhat Josep aka miingna te avan pha . Ahih khaw Jesuh kah a hubang pakhat la awm van .
40027058	Ahih lawng Pilat tengla cet tih Jesuh kah a rawkk te a bih . Jesuh kah a rawkk te Josep kut ah peek ham Pilat lawng awl a peek .
40027059	Josep lawng Jesuh rawkk te a lawh tih himbai bawk athaithik oen a yaawl tih ,
40027060	amah ham lungkaw a thuk heet thlann thaai ah te a up . Tecoengah lungto bo hlang oen thlann thawhka te a khaih tih a ceh taak .
40027061	Meri Makdalin oen atloe Meri mi khaw te ah te thlaan ben la mang tih ngawl u .
40027062	Avuen Sabbath hin ah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Farasi thlaang thli tah Pilat oen huh u tih ,
40027063	“ Bawipa hoem thui thlaang ahih lawng te a hing vengah , ‘ Kai tah duekna kalawng ka tho koep ai ’ tila a thui te ka ming u .
40027064	Tedawngah athum hin toe thlann te atheenla a khaih tih a toet u ham awl van pe lah , te nawh kawinih a hubang hue lawng cet u vetih a rawkk te a huuen u coengah ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen tila thlaang tengah a thui u ai . Hukhueng kah thailatna he acuek kah thailatna lak ah the-eep ngaai ai , ” tila a thui pe u .
40027065	Pilat lawng “ Raalkap bu khat aka toet la na khueh u te ta : cet u langtah thlann te a toet thai khui anepla toet sak uh , ” a tina .
40027066	Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng cet u tih thlann khaihna lungto dawngah miknoekna a khueh u tih thlann te anepla a toet sak .
40028001	Sabbath hin boeih tih yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin khawthaih tawm ah Meri Makdalin oen atloe Meri te thlann bueh hamla cet .
40028002	Tevengah te bawtbet khawlai ah likluei tho tih angaihhlangla hinghuen . Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat te vaan kalawng va rum tih thlann khaihna lungto te a thoeih tih a sawah ngawl .
40028003	Ahih kah a muei asam tah khawpha angla awm tih a himbai tah rawsawng angla bawk .
40028004	Thlann aka toet raalkap thli let u tih a rih u dawngah thuen u tih thlaang duek angla awm u .
40028005	Vanthlaang lawng hutaa rawi nala “ Rih boel ; thinglam dawngah a ngawn u Jesuh te na tlap te ka ming .
40028006	Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh ; a thui angla tho poen . Law langtah a ralhna huen te bueh lah .
40028007	Tahe ah aloela cet langtah a hubang hue tengah , ‘ Ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen ; nangmi haiah Galili la cet vetih te ah ahih te na huh u ai ! ” tila thui pe uh . Kavan thui he hilh boel , ” a tina .
40028008	Hutaa rawi lawng a rih hih de awmngaihna oen phuel kalawng ah aloela cet tih a hubang hue tengah thui pe ham heeng .
40028009	Tevengah Jesuh te ahih rawi tengah law parak tih “ Nanghih sawah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh . ” a tina . Ahih rawi lawng a tengla cet , a khow ah a phoeih tih a bok .
40028010	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te “ Rih boel , cet langtah ka maya manau thli te Galili la ceh ham thui pe hih , te ah te ahimi lawng kai he n'huh u ai ” a tina .
