40028011	Hutaa hue Phuel kalawng a meel u vengah , thlann toet raalkap khatsut lawng khawpui khuila cet u tih khawsoeih ahaamca hue tengah thlann kah a huh boeih te a thui pe u .
40028012	Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng Judah ahaamca hue oen huh tun u tih khaw a poek u ; ahimi lawng raalkap thli te tangka yahawh a peek u tih ,
40028013	“ A hubang hue khawyiin ah law u tih kaimi ka ihna ruet ah a rawkk te a huuen u tila thui uh .
40028014	He kawng he ram ukbawi lawng a yaak atah kaimi lawng ka thloep u vetih nangmi te he kawngah lakueng ham awm manawh , ” a tina u .
40028015	Thlanntoet raalkap hue lawng tangka te a lawh u tih ahimi lawng a uen angla a thui u . Raalkap hue kah a thui awl te tahe toe Judah hue lawng a thui khuep u .
40028016	A hubang paha thlaikhat hue tah Galili ram la cet u tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe tlaang la te luui u .
40028017	Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a huh u vengah a bok u , tede ahimi timkah khatsut lawngtah tangna u nawh .
40028018	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengla cet phai tih . “ Dilai oen vaan kah saithaina aana boeih kai m'peek poen .
40028019	Tedawngah dilai dawngkah thlaangphun boeih tengah cet u langtah ahimi te ka hubang la van coeng sak uh ; Pa , Capa , Ciim Muithla miing ah baptisma pe uh .
40028020	Kai lawng awl kan peek boeih te a vaina u ham cang puei uh . Dilai tue aboettoe nangmi oen haih ka awm poe ai , ” a tina .
41001001	He tah Pathen Capa Jesuh Khrih kawng Awlthang theen ni .
41001002	A tongcuek vengah tawngha Isaiah lawng : “ Pathen lawng ‘ Nang hamla lawngpui tukkung Kamah kah laipai na haiah kavan tuih ai , ti . ’
41001003	Thlaang pakhat tah ramhum huhang ah paang tih , “ Bawipa ham lawngpui te roekbah uh , a cehna ham lawngpui te doeng sak uh , ” tila a thut .
41001004	Tedawngah Johan tah ramhum huhang ah va law , baptisma a peek tih phung a thui . Thlaangping thli te , “ Na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang uh . Te dengah ni Pathen lawng na thawlhna sawah khawdawp avan ngai u ai . ” a tina .
41001005	Judia peng oen Jerusalem kah thlaang thli lawng Johan kah phungthui te hutung hamla cet u . A thawlhna a phawng u tih Jordan tuiva ah ahimi te Johan lawng baptisma a peek u .
41001006	Johan lawng Kala-uk mul oen a tah himbai te a baai tih a hingcen ah saphaw cihin a naak . Ahih lawngah khaurang oen khawitui te buh la a caak .
41001007	Ahih lawng thlaangping nala te , “ Kai coengah aka law ham koei thlaang te tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni . Kai tah ahih kah khowmuek rui thlam ham Pateng ka ting ka tawkk nawh .
41001008	Kai lawngtah nangmi he tui oen ni baptisma kan peek u . Tede ahih lawngtah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma m'peek ai , ” a tina .
41001009	Tecoeng kalawng a awm raih thlan ah Jesuh tah Galili peng Nazaret khaaw kalawng va law tih Jordan tuiva ah Johan lawng baptisma a peek .
41001010	Jesuh te tui dawng kalawng a thawh hang khoeng vengah vaan te awng u tih ahih sawah Muithla akhuu angla a cuuk te a huh .
41001011	Vaan kalawng aka law awl lawngah , “ Nang tah kan thintlawhna ka Capa ni , na sawah ka kaw tluep , tangkiik ” a tina .
41001012	Tecoeng atah Muithla lawng ahih te ramhum huhang la a tuih pahoei tih ,
41001013	Te ah te khawhin sawmlii awm tih Seitan lawng a suek a halh . Ramsatlung thli khaw te ah te awm , tede vanthlaang thli law u tih Jesuh te a bawm acem u .
41001014	Johan te thong a tlaak coengah Jesuh tah Galili ram la cet tih Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen te a phawng .
41001015	“ Atue atang tah avan pha khuek poen ! Pathen ukna tah yoeii poen ! Na thawlhna yut u langtah Awlthang Theen he tangna uh ! ” tila a thui .
41001016	Galili tuikeeng ah Jesuh a ceh phai vengah tuihawi thlaang pahih Simon oen a manau Andru lok a heeng hih te a huh .
41001017	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala , “ Ka hu ah bang hih lah , thlaang tukung la kan coengg sak hih ai , ” a tina .
41001018	Tevengah lok te pak a tloeng hih tih Jesuh hu ah bang hih pahoei .
41001019	Ahih tah cet hot phai tih Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen Johan boeinau te a huh . Ahih rawi tah lowng khuiah lok te a baw hih .
41001020	Jesuh lawng a huh pahoei oen te rawi te a khue . Ahih rawi lawng ana pa Zebedi oen a bii aka bi pe thlaang thli te lowng khuiah a ceh taak hih tih Jesuh hu ah bang hih pahoei .
41001021	Jesuh oen a hubang hue Kapernaum khawpui la law u tih Sabbath hin ah Jesuh te Sinakok la cet tih cang puei ham a tong .
41001022	Jesuh lawngtah Phungawl cangpueikung hue angla cang puei nawh tih sai thaina aana aka khueh angla a cang puei dawngah ahih kah cangpueina aka ya boeih lawngtah a kawpoek rai u .
41001023	Tevengah te a kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thlaang pakhat sinakok bok-im khuila law tih rih oen thuen ruila paang ,
41001024	“ Nazaret Jesuh , kaimi he metila sai ham na ngaih ? Kaimi he phe ham aw na law ? Nang he me ang thlaang ti he kan ming : Nang tah Pathen kah laipai thlaang ciim ni ” a tina .
41001025	Jesuh lawng raaithe te , “ Awm duem lah , te thlaang kaw khui kalawng co loeih ! ” tila awl a peek .
41001026	Raaithe lawng te thlaang te a ngaih hlang la a thuen sak , rih oen thuenn doe ah paang tih te thlaang kah a kaw khui kalawng co .
41001027	Thlaang boeih te a kawpoek rai u tih khat oen khat te , “ He he me ang kai ? Cangpueina a thaai phun tloe kai aw ? He thlaang lawng raaithe te aana oen awl a peek tih ahimi lawng awl a ngaai pe , ” ti u .
41001028	Tedawngah Jesuh kawng awlthang te kawlkalh maiah Galili peng khaaw tawm ah thaang khonghak .
41001029	Jesuh oen a hubang hue , Jeem oen Johan mi khaw , sinakok kalawng tho u tih Simon oen Andru im la poe cet u .
41001030	Simon kah a mase hutaa te tlo tih ral . Jesuh te a paipuek ah ahih kah sading nawh kawng te a thui pe u .
41001031	Jesuh lawng a tengla cet tih ahih te a kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh hang . A sa ding pahoei tih ahimi te a do a dan .
41001032	Khaw a tlaak coeng thlem khup atah thlaangping lawngah thlaangtlo boeih oen raaithe aka khueh thli te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u .
41001033	Te khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih tah im haiah tun u boeih .
41001034	Jesuh lawng tlawhnatna soeprep boeih oen aka tlo thli te a hoeih sak tih raaithe thli khaw boeih a hek . Jesuh he me ang thlaang tite raaithe thli lawng a ming u dawngah Jesuh lawng raaithe thli te awl kam at khaw thui sak u nawh .
41001035	Avuen khawhin mincanghi khaw a thaih thlan ah Jesuh tah tho tih khawpui adauben ading asuekna huen la te cet tih te ah te thangthui .
41001036	Simon oen a paya thli lawng ahih te a tlap tih ,
41001037	a huh u vengah , “ Thlaang boeih lawng nang he n'tlap u ta , ” a tina u .
41001038	Tede Jesuh lawngah , “ He kah atloe khaaw teng khaaw vai la cet u sih . Ahimi tengah khaw phung ka thui ham awm . Te ham ni kai ka law roe ta , ” a tina .
41001039	Tedawngah Jesuh tah Galili peng tawm ah cet , sinakok bok-im boeih ah te phung a thui tih raaithe thli khaw a hek .
41001040	Haibe aka tlo thlaang pakhat Jesuh tengla law tih khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila , “ Na kawngaih atah nan hoeih sak thai , ” tila reenna a bih .
41001041	Jesuh lawng a reen tangkiik dawngah a kut a thueng tih a tek , “ Hoeih sak ham ka ngaih ta , hoeih loeih , ” a tina .
41001042	Kawlkalh ah haibe natna te hoeih tih ciim pahoei .
41001043	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih te he tila awl ceet ceet a uen tih a tuih pahoei .
41001044	Hutung lah ! He kawng he a-u tengah khaw thui boel . Tede khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah na pum te nueh lah ; tecoengah nang na hoeih poen tite thlaang boeih lawng a mingna ham Mosi kah awlpeek angla thawthuengna te sai , ” a tina .
41001045	Tede te kah thlaang lawng cet tih amah aciimna kawng te a thui tih khaaw tawm ah thaang khonghak . Ahih lawng he kawng he yahawh la a thui lat dawngah Jesuh tah khawpui khuila langya ah cet thai tlaih nawh poen . Khawpui adauben adingruena huen ah awm tih te la te khaw tawm kah thlaang thli te a tengla law u .
41002001	Khawhin yahawh hlang a awm raih thlan ah Jesuh te Kapernaum khaaw la meel koep tih im ah awm tila awlthang a yaak u .
41002002	Tedawngah thlaang yahawh hlang va tun u tih im khuiah ahoengna roe awm muehla thawhka keeng adauben ah Pateng khaw be khawk . Ahimi tengah te Jesuh lawng phung a thui pe .
41002003	Tevengah thlaang palii lawng aka khawn thlaang pakhat te Jesuh tengla avan kawh u .
41002004	Tede thlaang yahawh aih tih Jesuh tengla te pha puei u thai nawh . Tedawngah Jesuh a awmna tuueng kah imphu te a phe u , thlaangtlo te a himbai dawngah a ralh sak tih a thlaak thuk u .
41002005	Ahimi kah oengna te Jesuh lawng a huh vengah aka khawn thlaangtlo te , “ Ka ca , na thawlhna boeih te khawdawp kavan ngaai poen , ” a tina .
41002006	Te kah aka ngawl Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut lawng ,
41002007	“ N'tu ah he tila a thui ngam kai ? Pathen thekhana poen ni , Pathen bueng nawh atah a-u lawng thawlhna khawdawp a ngaai thai ! tila a kaw khuiah a poek u .
41002008	Ahimi kah kawpoek te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi nala te , “ N'tu kawng ah he ang thaihu he na poek u ?
41002009	He kah aka khawn thlaang he , ‘ Na thawlhna khawdawp ngaai la awm poen , ’ tina aw aka yoei bet , tihnawhtah ‘ Tho loeih , na himbai te lo langtah cet loeih , ’ tina aw aka yoei bet ?
41002010	Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai han ah thawlhna khawdawp ngaai thaina aana a khueh ti he nangmi tengah ka tueng sak ai , ” a tina . Tedawngah aka khawn thlaang nala .
41002011	“ Tho lah , na himbai te lo langtah im la cet loeih kan tina he ! ” a tina .
41002012	Ahimi boeih kah mik huh ah te thlaang lawng tho hang , a himbai te a lawh tih aloela cet . Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih , “ He ang thaihu he n'hu vai u nawh ! ” ti u tih Pathen te a thangpawm u .
41002013	Jesuh tah Galili tuiliikeeng la cet koep . Thlaangping broe lawngah a tengla a law u dawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te a cang puei .
41002014	Jesuh lawng a ceh phai vengah Alfias capa mangmu cawikung amah yungim ah aka ngawl Levi te a huh . Jesuh lawng ahih nala , “ Ka hu ah va bang lah , ” a tina . Levi lawng tho tih a hu ah bang pahoei .
41002015	Tecoeng atah Jesuh te Levi im ah buh a caak . Mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaangthawlh thli lawng Jesuh te a hu ah bung a vai u tih khatsut lawngah Jesuh oen a hubang hue te buh a veel puei u .
41002016	Te tila Jesuh lawng thlaangthawlh thli oen mangmu cawikung hue oen ah buh a veel haih u te Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut oen Farasi thli lawng a huh u vengah , “ N'tu dawngah he ang thlaang thli oen ahih lawng buh haih a caak u ? ” tila a hubang hue te a doet u .
41002017	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awldoet te a yaak tih , “ Sading thlaang lawng Siibawi ngoe nawh tih thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni a ngoe . Hinyah koei thlaangdoeng khue ham ka law nawh tih thlaang thawlh khue ham ni ka law ” a tina .
41002018	Hin at atah Baptisma pekung Johan kah hubang hue oen Farasi thli buh a yeh u . Thlaang khatsut Jesuh tengla law u tih “ Baptisma pekung Johan kah a hubang hue oen Farasi thli lawng buh a yeh u , nang kah hubang hue lawngtah n'tu kawngah buh a yeh u van nawh ? ” tila a doet u .
41002019	Jesuh lawng , “ Yului poei ah a khue kamyin thli lawng buh a yeh u ai tila na poek aw ? Yeh u manawh ! Yulokung a awm vengah ahimi lawng buh yeh u manawh .
41002020	Tede ahimi teng kalawng yulokung a khuena khawhin a pha ai , tevengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai .
41002021	A-u lawngkhaw a himbai ruem te bawna ham hisa athaai te hawna nawh ; a bawna atah hisa athaai lawng aruem te a doek vetih a puut kau tare ai .
41002022	A-u lawngkhaw misurtui athaai te saphaw-yuukhap athaai dawngah thloen nooek nawh , thloen kawinih misurtui lawng saphaw-yuukhap te a pawkk sak vetih pahih bok la misurtui te yut boeih ai , saphaw-yuukhap te khaw paw poen ai . Tedawngah misurtui athaai te saphaw-yuukhap athaai dawngah thloen ham awm , ” a tina .
41002023	Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh te caangthliw kalawng cet . A hubang hue khaw amah oen cet haih u tih ahimi lawng ceh doe ah caangvui a yuun u .
41002024	Tedawngah Farasi hue lawng Jesuh nala , “ Bueh lah ! na hubang hue lawng Sabbath khawhin ah he ang thaihu a sai u he mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh ” a tina u .
41002025	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Devid lawngah caak koei khat khaw a khueh nawh vengah n'tu a sai tite na tae u vai nawh aw ? Amah oen a paya thli a bung pawng u tangkiik ,
41002026	Devid lawng Pathen im khuila kuun phaat tih Pathen tengah a nawn u takawi te a caak . Khawsoeih bawi Abiatha dung vengah te tila a sai . Mami kah Phungawl angla kawinih Khawsoeih hue bueng lawng ni te takawi te a caak . Tede Devid lawng a caak tih a puei thli Pateng khaw a peek ” a tina .
41002027	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah , “ Thlaanghing theenna hamla ni Sabbath he a sai ; Sabbath hamla thlaanghing he sai nawh .
41002028	Tedawngah Thlaanghing Capa he Sabbath Bawi la khaw awm ” a tina .
41003001	Tecoengah Jesuh tah sinakok bok-im la te cet koep . Te ah te kut kheem thlaang pakhat awm .
41003002	Jesuh kah sai thawlhna dawngah thawlh peel ham aka ngaih thlaang khatsut te ah te awm u ; tedawngah Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaang a hoeih sak ai aw , hoeih sak nawh ai aw ti u tih ahimi lawng ayoeirepla huh ham a doen u .
41003003	Jesuh lawng te kah kut kheem thlaang te , “ Hai benla law lah , ” a tina .
41003004	Tecoengah thlaangping te , “ Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath hin ah n'tu sai sak ham a ngaih ? Thlaang bawmcem ham aw , tihnawhtah patang khang sak ham aw ? ” tila a doet . Tede ahimi lawng awl kam at khaw thui u nawh .
41003005	Jesuh te a thin sa , a teng avai ah te maang tih ahimi te a bueh , ahimi a thin len tih a thawlh u te a huh vengah khatvaang atah a kaw khaw the . Tecoengah kut kheem thlaang nala te , “ Na kut te yueng lah ” a tina . A kut te a yueng tih theen koep .
41003006	Tecoengah Farasi hue tah Sinakok bok-im kalawng cet u tih Herod kah a thlaang thli oen huh u pahoei tih ahimi lawng Jesuh te ngawn ham khawkhanna a khueh u .
41003007	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Galili Tuilii la cet u . Thlaangping broe lawngah a hu ah bung a vai u . Te kah thlaangping te tah Galili peng , Judia peng ,
41003008	Jerusalem khawpui , Idumia peng , Jordan tuiva khawcuuk ben ramri kah Taiar oen Sidon khawpui teng kalawng aka law thlaang thli ni . Jesuh kah thaihu sai te a yaak u tih ahimi boeih lawng a tengla te law u .
41003009	Thlaang a yahawh aih dawngah thlaangping lawng a tiil hau nawh ham lowng pakhat te amah hamla roekbah oepsoeh ham a hubang hue te a thui pe .
41003010	Thlaangtlo yahawh hlang te a hoeih sak dawngah thlaangtlo boeih lawng Jesuh te tek hamla tulh u the .
41003011	Raaithe aka khueh thlaang boeih lawng ahih te a huh u vengah a haiah buekuep u tih thuen ruila , “ Nang tah Pathen Capa ni . ” tila paang u .
41003012	Jesuh lawng amah te me ang thlaang tite a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham raaithe thli te awl a peek .
41003013	Tecoengah Jesuh tah tlaangsawm la luui hang tih amah kah a ngaih thlaang thli te a khue . Ahimi lawng ahih tengla law u ,
41003014	thlaang thlaihih a tuek tih ahimi te , “ Celtuih ” tila miing a sak . “ Ka tengah awm ham kan tuek u , phung aka thui la kan tuih u vetih ,
41003015	Nangmi lawng raaithe hek thaina aana khaw na khueh u ai , ” a tina .
41003016	Celtuih thlaihih a tuek hue te tah , Simon ( Piter a ti u te ) ,
41003017	Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen a manau Johan ( Jesuh lawng he rawi he Boanerzi tila miing a sak , a thuingaihna tah khawhumm ca rawi tina ni ) .
41003018	Andru , Filip , Bartalomiu , Matthai , Tawmas , Alfias capa Jeem , Taddias , Phunkuup Simon oen
41003019	Jesuh sawah paipi thleepkung Judas Iskariot , he hue ni .
41003020	Tecoengah Jesuh te im la meel . Thlaangping lawng tun u koep tih Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah buh caak ham atue Pateng awm nawh .
41003021	Te kawng te a cakaw hue lawng a yaak u tih ahih te khuutcem ham cet u . Metihtiah thlaang thli lawng “ Jesuh tah ngau poen ” tila a thui u dawngah ni .
41003022	Jerusalem kalawng aka law Phung-awl cangpueikung khatsut lawng , “ A kaw khuiah Beelzebul awm ! te tah raaithe hek thaina huham aka pe rai bawi ni ” tila a thui u .
41003023	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te amah tengah a khue tih thuidoetna awl oen a thui pe : “ Metila Seitan lawng Seitan te a hek thai ai ?
41003024	Ram pakhat ah amah oen amah athloekla pek u tih pakhat oen pakhat kaap u the kawinih te kah imkhuikaw tah pai thai manawh .
41003025	Imkhuikaw pakhat ah amah oen amah athloekla pek u tih pakhat oen pakhat raal u the kawinih te kah imkhuikaw tah pai thai manawh .
41003026	Tetih van angla Seitan kah ram khaw athloekla pek u kawinih aboet toe caak manawh , thek yak u vetih boet poen ai .
41003027	Thlaang a tha aka ra te a piin lamha nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw a im te muk tih a kaawn-ava te lawh pe thai manawh ; amah te a piin coengah ni a kaawn-ava te a lawh pe thai ai .
41003028	Ataktang kavan thui u , thlaang he a thawlhna boeih oen awlthe awlkha a thui boeih te khawdawp a ngaai pe thai ai .
41003029	Tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla te thekhana awlthe aka thui tah mevengah khaw khawdawp ngaai pe thai manawh , metihtiah dungyan thawlhna te a sai poen . ” a tina .
41003030	( Thlaang khatsut lawng , “ Raaithe te Jesuh kaw khuiah kuun ” a ti u dawngah Jesuh lawng he tila a thui pe ni . )
41003031	Tevengah Jesuh kah a manu oen a manau thli avan pha u . Im adauben ah pai u tih im khuila thlaang a tuih tih ahih te a khue sak .
41003032	Thlaangping lawng Jesuh te a veel u tih ngawl u . Ahimi lawng , “ Bueh lah , na manu oen na manau thli oen ah na ngannu thli lawng nang n'tlap u tih adauben ah awm . ” a tina u .
41003033	Jesuh lawng , “ A-u nuem ka manu ? Ka manau hue te a-u nuem ? ” a tina .
41003034	A tengah amah aka veel tih aka ngawl thlaangping te a bueh tih , “ Bueh lah ! He ah he ka manu oen ka manau thli tah awm !
41003035	A-u khaw Pathen lawng sai sak ham a ngaih te aka sai boeih tah ka manau , ka ngannu oen a nu ni . ” tila a thui pe .
41004001	Jesuh lawng Galili Tuilii keeng ah te cang puei koep ham a tong . A tengah aka tun thlaangping te ayahawh aih dawngah lowng khuila kuun tih te ah te ngawl . Lowng te tuiluung ah awm tih thlaangping tah tuiliikeeng tui tengah pai u .
41004002	Ahimi te thaihu yahawh hlang cang puei ham thuidoetna te a hawna tih ahimi nala te ;
41004003	“ Hutung u lah ! Voei khat ah lo khuehkung thlaang pakhat tah caangti tuh hamla cet .
41004004	Ahih lawng lo khuiah caangti te a tuh vengah khatsut tah lawngpui ah tla , va thli law tih kang a ruh boeih .
41004005	Caangti khatsut tah Lungrawng sawkah dilai a pamna ah tla , dilai a pam dawngah kawlkalh ah caangti te po .
41004006	Tede khaw a ling hang atah caangkung te khawling lawng a kaang , a yung a phooeng dawngah kawlkalh ah yai tih reu .
41004007	Caangti khatsut tah thliing tim ah tla , thliingkung te roeng hang , caangkung te a diik khoep tih a vui athaih awm nawh .
41004008	Tede caangti khatsut tah laitheen dawngah tla tih po , roeng hang tih a vui athaih thawn . Khatsut tah a pueh sawmthum , atloe hue te tah sawmruk , yakhat toela puung .
41004009	Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah , “ Hutung uh , yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya seh ” a tina .
41004010	Jesuh te amah bueng a awm vengah a awlthui aka ya thlaang khatsut lawng a hubang thlaihih hue oen a tengla haih law u tih thuidoetna awl te thuicaih pe ham a ceel u .
41004011	Jesuh lawng , “ Pathen Ram kah awlhuep tah nangmi tengah m'peek poen . Tede adauben ah aka awm thlaangtloe lawngtah thuidoetna awl bueng oen ni thaihu he a yaak u ,
41004012	tedawngah , ‘ Ahimi lawngah a bueh khing u de hu u nawh ; Ahimi lawngah a hutung khiing u de yaakming u nawh . Metihtiah ahimi lawng hu tih yaakming u kawinih Pathen tengla meel u vetih khawdawp a ngaai pe ai . ” tila a thui angla awm ai ” a tina .
41004013	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ He kah thuidoetna awl he na yaakming u nawh aw ? Te tih atah metila atloe thuidoetna thli te na yaakming u thai ai ?
41004014	Caangti tuhkung lawng Pathen awl te a tuh ,
41004015	Thlaang khatsut tah lawngpui ah aka tla caangti oen lo u ; Ahimi lawng awl a yaak pek vengah te Seitan lawng law tih a kaw khuiah a tuh awl te a rot pe .
41004016	Atloe thlaang thli tah dilai a pamna lungrawng sawah aka tla caangti oen lo u . Pathen awl te a yaak u vengah awmngaih la pahoei a do u .
41004017	Tede ahimi kah thinkaw lungbui ah a thlengyung a thlaak nawh dawngah asan hlang awm nawh . Tedawngah Pathen awl kawng dawngah thekha raina oen heemtekna soeprep a law vengah ahimi lawng kawlkalh ah a hoett pahoei u .
41004018	Atloe thlaang thli tah thliing tim ah aka tla caangti oen lo u . He thli lawng Pathen awl te a yaak u ,
41004019	tede he dilai khawsakna dawngah lakuengna , bawireng ham ngaihna soeprep lawng kuun tih Pathen awl te a tleng khoep dawngah ahimi tah a vui athaih awm nawh .
41004020	Tede atloe thlaang thli tah lai theen dawngah a tuh caangti oen lo u . Ahimi lawng Pathen awl te a yaak u vengah a do u tih a vui athaih thawn . Khatsut tah a pueh sawmthum , khatsut tah a pueh sawmruk , khatsut tah a pueh yakhat toela thawn . ” a tina .
41004021	Jesuh lawngah , “ A-u lawngkhaw haiim te a khuen tih beeldung oen a muek khoep aw ? Tih nawh atah ihkhun huiah khaw a khueh u aw ?
41004022	Ahuep ahel ah a thuh boeih te a tuengna huen ah pho boeih vetih muek dah la aka awm boeih te khaw a daih boeih ai .
41004023	Tedawngah yaakna haa na khueh u atah ya uh ” a tina .
41004024	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Na yaak u te anepla poek uh ! Thlaangtloe awlcekna ham na hawna a taring van te nang awlcekna ham Pathen lawng a hawna van ai , te lak ah anauh ngaai la a hawna tare ai .
41004025	A-u khaw aka khueh moek te a tawm athap pe vetih aka khueh nawh te a khueh duen Pateng khaw a lawh pe ai . ” a tina .
41004026	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Pathen Ram tah he oen lo u . Thlaang pakhat lawng a lo khuiah caangti a heh .
41004027	Khaw a yiin atah ip , mincang ah tho tih hingthun ah bii a bi , tevengah caangti tah po tih roeng hang . Tede caangti te metila a po hang tih a roeng hang tite ming nawh .
41004028	Dilai lawng akung te a roeng sak tih a thaih sak . Lamhacuek-la a raaidueng thoeng , tecoengah caangvui te thoeng tih hukhueng ah caangvui dawngah a cang te a awm sak .
41004029	Caang te hiin tih caang ah tue apha vengah thlaang lawng vin oen caang te a ah , ” tila a thui pe .
41004030	Jesuh lawng , “ Pathen Ram he n'tu oen a lawh u tila n'thui lah ai ? Thuicaihna ham me ang thuidoetna n'hawna u lah ai ?
41004031	Te tah he oen lo u . Thlaang pakhat lawng dilai dawngkah amu-ati boeih lak ah aka yiit koek antammu thaam at te a lawh tih a tue .
41004032	Tecoengah po tih a roeng hang atah tawitlim anno thing boeih lak ah aka bo koek la awm . A beek thli te abo hlang la cawn , va thli law u tih a khuup ah bu a tuk u , ” a tina .
41004033	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah yaakming thai khoek ah he ang thuidoetna atloe khaw a hawna tih Pathen awl a thui pe .
41004034	Ahih lawng thuidoetna hawna muehla ahimi tengah awl thui pe nawh , tede Jesuh he a hubang hue oen amami bueng a awm u vengah soeprep thaihu boeih te a thuicaih pe .
41004035	Te khawhin thlemben ah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala , “ Tuilii khatben rall la cet u sih , ” a tina .
41004036	Tedawngah ahimi lawng thlaangping te a ceh taak u tih Jesuh a ngawlhna lowng khuila a hubang hue te kuun u tih Jesuh te a ceh puei u . Lowng atloe thli khaw teah te awm .
41004037	Poek mueh maila , thlipui tho khuengdeng tih tuiphu te lowng khuila a kuun dawngah lowng khuiah tui be tawm .
41004038	Jesuh tah lowng a mai ben ah te awm tih luudoelh dawngah te muelh ip . A hubang hue lawng a thawh u tih , “ Saya , mami n'duek boeih poen ai he , n'tu la na sak nawh aw ? ” a tina u .
41004039	Jesuh lawng tho hang tih thlipui te awl a peek , “ Thli tlaih boel , duem loeih ! ” a tina . Tevengah thlipui lawngkhaw duem tih dipsiditla awm .
41004040	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te , “ N'tu ah he tila na rih u aih ? Tahe toe oengna na khueh u nawh hun aw ? ” a tina .
41004041	Tevengah ahimi lawng caalla a rih u tih , “ He thlaang he a-u kai ? Thlipui oen tuilet lawng Pateng awl a ngaai pe mai ! ” tila khat oen khat ti u .
41005001	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Galili tuilii khatben rall ah aka awm Kerasa peng te a pha u .
41005002	Jesuh te lowng dawng kalawng a suntlaak khoeng vengah te kah phuel lungkaw khuikah thlaang pakhat lawngah Jesuh te avan pan . Te thlaang te tah a kaw ah raaithe kuun tih , phuel ah aka awm roe ni .
41005003	A-u lawngkhaw thiirui oen khit u thai tlaih nawh .
41005004	A kut a khow ah a khih taitu u poen de a piin u vengah thiirui te khaw a bot tih a thlam . Ahih tah a tha ra soeh tih a-u lawngkhaw taa thai nawh .
41005005	Yiin daai phuel oen tlaangsawm yun ah yingyo , paang tih amah oen amah te lungto hatt oen phom u tih aat u .
41005006	Ahih lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah te ahih tah athlala awm ; tedawngah heeng tih Jesuh haiah khuklu oen a cuengkueng pe ,
41005007	angaihhlangla paang tih , “ Sawsang Koek Pathen Capa Jesuh , kai he metila sai ham na ngaih ? Pathen rang oen reenna kavan bih , dan n'tat mai boel ! ” a tina .
41005008	Jesuh lawng , “ Nang Raaithe , he thlaang kah a kaw khui kalawng co loeih ! ” a tina dawngah ni he tila a paang .
41005009	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ A-u na miingna ? ” tila a doet . Te kah thlaang lawngah , “ Kaimi tah ka piing aih u dawngah , ‘ Mob ’ ka miingna ” tila a thui .
41005010	Te kah ram kalawng te tila raaithe thli te hek nawh hamla Jesuh tengah a bih mangkhak .
41005011	Te kalawng ayoeiina tlaangthleep ah awk hui at a vuelh u te awm .
41005012	Raaithe thli lawng Jesuh tengah , “ Kaimi he awk thli tengla n'ceh sak langtah te thli kah a kaw khuila n'kuun sak u lah ! ” tila a bih u .
41005013	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a ceh sak , raaithe thli tah te kah thlaang kaw khui kalawng co u tih awk kaw khuila kuun u . Te kah awk thli te apum boeih la thong hih yun awm . Awk thli te cehthleeng ah plit u tih tuilii ah buekk dingkang .
41005014	Awk aka vuelh hue lawng heng u tih khawpui oen lo yun ah te kah awlthang te a thui soeh u . Thlaangping lawng te tila aka awm te huh hamla cet u .
41005015	Jesuh teng a pha u vengah Mob raaithe thli aka khueh thlaang lawngah himbai a bai tih lungcuih la teah a ngawlh te a huh u tih ahimi boeih lawng a rih u .
41005016	Te kah thaihu aka hu boeih lawngah raaithe lawng a tuuk thlaang tengah aka thoeng thaihu oen awk thli kawng te thlaang thli tengah a thui pe u .
41005017	Tedawngah ahimi ram te Jesuh lawng a ceh taak na ham Jesuh tengah reenna a bih u .
41005018	Jesuh te lowng khuila a kuun vengah te raaithe aka khueh thlaang lawngah , “ Na hu ah ka bang van ai ” a tina .
41005019	Tede , Jesuh lawng bang sak nawh . “ Im la cet koep langtah na cakaw thli tengah Bawipa lawng nang ham metila thaihu avan sai tih metila reenna avan khueh tite thui peh , ” a tina .
41005020	Tedawngah te thlaang lawng cet tih Khawpui Paha a ti u te a hiil tih Jesuh lawng a sai pe thaihu te a thui . Tedawngah aka ya thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u .
41005021	Jesuh te tuilii khatben rall la koep cet . Tuilii keeng ah thlaangping te tun u tih ahih te a veel khoep u .
41005022	Sinakok bok-im kah bawi pakhat Jairu te law tih Jesuh te a huh vengah a khow kungah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih ,
41005023	lunghoeih la reenna a bih , “ Ka canu tlo tih nauh tangkiik . Reenna oen law langtah a sawah na kut tloeng pe lah , te atah hoeih vetih a sa ding ai , ” a tina .
41005024	Jesuh te ahih oen haih cet . Thlaang ping lawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai u tih khatben khat bang kalawng Jesuh te a nen u .
41005025	Te ah te kum thlaihih khui thisuntlaak tlawhna a ka tlo hutaa pakhat awm .
41005026	Siibawi yahawh hlang lawng a tuui ahai tih a khueh tangka boeih khaw a khok poen de hoeikhang nawh tih nauh tare .
41005027	Ahih lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak van , tedawngah ahih lawng thlaangping tim ah Jesuh kah a hu benla te law tih ,
41005028	“ A himbai mah ka tek mai kawinih ka hoeih ngai suide , ” tila a poek .
41005029	Ahih lawng Jesuh kah himbai te a tek , tevengah thisuntlaak te khap dip pahoei tih a tlawhna hoeih poen tila a kaw khuiah a ming .
41005030	Jesuh lawng a pum dawngkah huham tharana thoeng tite a ming pahoei vengah thlaangping tengla te maang dak tih , “ A-u lawng ka himbai a tek ? ” tila ahimi te a doet .
41005031	A hubang hue lawng , “ Thlaangping lawng nang n'nen u te na huh lal maiah n'tu ah ‘ A-u lawng n'tek na ti ? ” a tina u .
41005032	Tede Jesuh lawngtah a himbai a-u lawng a tek tite ming hamla a teng-avai te a bueh .
41005033	Te hutaa lawng ahih sawah thaihu aka thoeng te a ming , tedawngah rih oen thuen ruila law tih Jesuh khow kungah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih asoengla boeih a thui pe .
41005034	Jesuh lawng , “ Ka canu , na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen . Ngaimawng la cet loeih , na tlawhna hoeih loeih seh . ” a tina .
41005035	Jesuh lawng te tila awl a thui lii vengah te , Jairu im kalawng puencawn thli law u tih Jairu nala te , “ Na canu duek poen . N'tu ah saya he kawhuet cakbat la na khueh khiing ? ” a tina u .
41005036	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah awl thui te n'tu la khaw sak nawh , Jairu nala te , “ Lakueng boel , oeng mah oeng mai lah ” a tina .
41005037	Tecoeng atah Piter , Jeem oen a manau Johan te a ceh puei tih thlaangtloe tah a-u khaw ceh puei nawh .
41005038	Jairu im te a pha u atah curumngang la awm u tih lungphit laithai oen aka rungrap thli te Jesuh lawng a huh .
41005039	Im khuila Jesuh te kuun tih ahimi nala te , “ N'tu ah curumngang la na awm u ? N'tu ah na rung na rah u ? Camaw he a duek moenih , aka ip mai ni ! ” a tina .
41005040	Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a nuihna u . Te kah aka awm thlaang thli te adauben la a ceh sak u . Camaw kah a manu oen ana pa oen ah a hubang hue pathum te a ceh puei tih camaw a helhna akhann khuila te kuun u .
41005041	Camaw te a kut ah a phoeih tih , “ Talitha , koum ” a tina . A thuingaihna tah , “ Hutaaca tho lah ! kan tina . ” tina ni .
41005042	Hutaaca te tho pahoei tih yingyawi . ( Te kah hutaaca tah kumha thlaihih law ) . Te kah aka awm boeih te a kawpoek rai u tangkiik .
41005043	Tede a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham ahimi te Jesuh lawng awl ceet ceet a uen tih , “ Caak awkk pe uh , ” a tina .
41006001	Jesuh lawng te huen te a ceh taak tih amah khaaw la te meel koep . A hubang hue lawng a hu ah a vai u .
41006002	Sabbath khawhin ah sinakok bok-im ah te cang puei ham a tong . Te ah te thlaang yahawh hlang awm tih ahih kah awlthui aka ya boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik . “ He ang thli boeih he ame kah a dang kai ? Ahih lawng a dang cuihna he me ang cuihna kai ? metila kawpoek-raina he a sai kai ?
41006003	Ahih he Meri capa , Jeem , Josep , Judas oen Simon kah a maya lettama te nawh aw ? A ngannu thli khaw he ah aka awm u te nawh aw ? ” ti u . Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te hinyah u nawh tih n'tu la sak u nawh .
41006004	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Tawngha he amah awmna khawpui oen amah kah huiakaw oen ah amah imkhuikaw thui muehla huen tloe boeih atah a hinyah u ” a tina .
41006005	Te ah te thlaangtlo ayawl sawah kut a tloeng tih a hoeih sak , te bueng nawh atah atloe kawpoek raina n'tu khaw sai nawh .
41006006	Thlaangping lawngah Oengna a khueh u nawh dawngah Jesuh tah a kawpoek rai sut . Tecoeng atah Jesuh lawng te kah vangca vangnau te a hiil tih thlaang thli te a cang puei .
41006007	A hubang thlaihih te a khue tun tih pahih , pahih ah a bok u sak tih a tuih u . Ahimi te raaithe hek thaina aana te a peek ,
41006008	“ Yin cehna ah cawnghol bueng nawh tah atloe n'tu khaw khuen u boel ; caak awkk khaw , sawngsa khaw , na angki thlep ah khaw keel u boel .
41006009	Khowmuek tah muek uh , tede angki a hoei khuen u boel . ” a tina .
41006010	Tecoengah ahimi nala te , “ Nang aka pah sak im ah te khaaw tloe la na ceh thlantoe te ah te awm uh .
41006011	Na phana khaaw pakhat ah pahna im m'pe u nawh tih na awlthui khaw a hutung u nawh atah na khow dawngkah laidiik te khoek pe uh . Te tah ahimi hamla ngaithuen peekna la awm ai , ” a tina .
41006012	Tedawngah ahimi lawng cet u tih thlaang boeih lawng a thawlhna kalawng a meel koepna ham phung a thui pe u .
41006013	Raaithe thli te a hek u , thlaangtlo thli te Olif situi a koelh u tih boeih a hoeih sak u .
41006014	Jesuh kawng awlthang te ram pum ah thaang khok tih Herod sengpahrang lawngkhaw te kawng te boeih a yaak . Thlaang khatsut lawngah , “ Baptisma pekung Johan ni aka hing koep ! Tedawngah he tila kawpoek rai saithaina he a khueh , ” ti u .
41006015	Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah , “ Elijah ni , ” ti u . Thlaang vang lawngtah yan veng kah tawngha thli angla tawngha pakhat van ni , ” ti u .
41006016	Te awl te Herod lawng a yaak vengah , “ Ahih te baptisma pekung Johan ni ! A luu ka tloek pe poen de hing koep ! ” tila a thui .
41006017	Herod amah roe lawngah tuuk sak tih thiirui oen khih coengah thongim ah thlaak ham awl a peek . He tila a sai he tah Herod lawng a manau Filip yu Herodias te a rot pe dawngah ni .
41006018	Baptisma pekung Johan lawng Herod nala , “ Na manau yu na rot pe he soeng nawh , ” a tina .
41006019	Tedawngah Herodias lawng Johan te a huhhuett tih ngawn ham a ngaih . Tede Herod lawng a oelh ataih tih ngawn thai nawh .
41006020	Herod lawngtah Johan te thlaangdoeng oen thlaang ciim ni tila a ming dawngah a rih tih ading apuek cala a khueh . Herod lawng ahih kah awlthui te hutung ham a ngaih . Tede a awlthui te a yaak veng roekk ah awmngaih thai nawh .
41006021	Hukhueng atah Herod a cuunna khawhin ah atue theen te Herodias lawng a dang . Herod lawng amah a awmna khawhin ah ukkung bawi thli , raalbawi thli oen Galili ram kah hinyah koei ahaamca thli hamla poei a sai pe .
41006022	Herodias canu lawng kuun tih laam , Herod oen a ceel bawi thli oen kamyin thli tah a kaw hoe u tangkiik . Tedawngah sengpahrang lawng hutaaca nala , “ N'tu na ngaih ? Na ngaih boeih te kan pe ai , ” a tina .
41006023	“ Navan bih boeih te kan pe ai , ka ram he keekvaang Pateng kan pe ai , ” tila awl a kam .
41006024	Tedawngah hutaaca lawng cet tih a manu nala te , “ N'tu ka bih ai ? ” tila a doet . A manu lawng , ‘ Baptisma pekung Johan luu te bih . ” a tina .
41006025	Hutaaca lawng sengpahrang tengla te aloela meel koep phai tih , “ Baptisma pekung Johan luu te tahe roe ah beelphai dawngah nan peek ham ka ngaih . ” a tina .
41006026	Sengpahrang te a kaw caalla the , tede a kamyin thli haiah awl a kam poen dawngah hutaaca lawng a bih te oelh tlaih nawh .
41006027	Tedawngah raltoeng aka pai raalkap pakhat te a tuih pahoei tih Johan kah luu te tloek tih avan khuen hamla awl a peek .
41006028	Tecoengah beel phai dawngah Johan luu te avan khuen tih hutaaca te a peek , hutaaca lawng a manu te a peek patoeng van .
41006029	Johan kah a hubang thli lawng he kawng he a yaak u vengah law u , a rawkk te a lawh u tih phuel ah a up u .
41006030	Celtuih hue te koep va meel u tih Jesuh oen huh u , ahimi lawng a saina oen a cangpueina boeih te a thui pe u .
41006031	Te ah te aka cet oen aka law thlaang ayahawh aih dawngah Jesuh oen a hubang hue te buh caak ham atue Pateng khaw khueh u nawh . Tedawngah ahimi nala te , “ Ading asuekna huen la cet u silang tah mami bueng awm u lah sih , te ah te kawlkalh khaw na duem u thai ai , ” a tina .
41006032	Tedawngah ading asuekna huen la amami bueng lowng oen cet u .
41006033	Ahimi a ceh u te thlaangping lawng a huh u tih Jesuh oen a hubang hue ni tila a ming u , tedawngah khawpui boeih kah thlaang cet u tih lanloeih kalawng anna khall u , Jesuh oen a hubang hue a phana koei a huen te ahimi haiah anna pha doen u .
41006034	Lowng khui kalawng Jesuh a suntlaak vengah thlaangping te a huh , ahimi te doenkung aka awm nawh tuu angla a awm u te a huh vengah a reen tangkiik . Tedawngah thaihu yahawh hlang a cang puei .
41006035	Khaw athlem veng atah a hubang hue a tengla law u tih , “ Khaw thlem poen , he huen he thlaang a awmna ahuen nawh ni .
41006036	Thlaangping he tuih langtah he kah a teng-avai lo yun ah khaw , vang khuiah khaw amami ham caak awkk lai u seh , ” a tina u .
41006037	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawngah ahimi te caak awkk pe uh , ” a tina . A hubang hue lawngah , “ Tangka yahnih phu caak koei ka lai u silang tah ahimi he ka kok u ai aw ? ” tila a doet u .
41006038	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Takawi meyoeh na khueh u ? Cet langtah bueh u lah ” a tina . Ahimi lawng cet tih a huh u tah , “ Takawi cuun ngaa oen nga phih awm , ” a tina u .
41006039	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala , thlaangping te athloep athloepla pompih saihiim dawngah ngawlh sak ham a thui pe .
41006040	Tedawngah thlaangping hue te yakhat ah thloep at , sawmngaa ah thloep at athaanla khok ngawl u .
41006041	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih te a lawh , vaan la maang hang tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui . Takawi te a eh tih thlaangping te rek ra ham a hubang hue tengah a peek . Nga lunghih te khaw ahimi tengah a ree pe .
41006042	Thlaang boeih lawng ahahcala a caak u .
41006043	Tecoengah takawi oen nga a caak coeih te a hubang hue lawng vawhphueih paha thlaihih dawngah abetoetla a cawi u .
41006044	Takawi aka ca te tawngpataang mah thlaang thong ngaa law u .
41006045	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a ceh sak veng te ah a hubang hue te lowng khuila a kuun sak pahoei tih tuilii khatben rall kah Betsaida khaaw la te lamhala a tuih .
41006046	Thlaangping te sadingla meel uh a tina coengah amah tah thangthui hamla tlaang la cet .
41006047	Khaw athlem vengah a hubang hue kah lowng te tuiluung ah te awm , tevengah Jesuh tah amah bueng lan ah awm hun .
41006048	Yilh lawng a maam khak tih lowng te a hubang hue lawng a kaih tloel u te Jesuh lawng a huh . Tedawngah mincang khawnoek pathum oen paruk laklaw yun atah ahimi tengla te tui sawah cet tih ahimi te a khall tawm ,
41006049	tevengah tui sawah Jesuh a law te ahimi lawng a huh u . Ahimi lawngtah , “ Muithla ni tila a poek u dawngah lakueng u tih paang u .
41006050	Ahimi boeih lawng ahih te a huh u vengah a rih u . Jesuh lawng ahimi te a voem pahoei tih , “ Lakueng u boel ! Kai ni , rih u boel . ” a tina .
41006051	Tecoengah ahimi tengah lowng khuila kuun , teveng dengah yilh law te dip . A hubang hue tah a kawpoek la rai u tangkiik ,
41006052	thlaang thong ngaa Jesuh lawng buh a kok te a thuingaihna tangtang te yaakming u nawh , a kawpoek lawngkhaw pha u thai nawh .
41006053	Tuilii khatben rall la te cet u tih Gennesaret khaaw te a pha u tih te ah te lowng te a kiing u .
41006054	Lowng dawng kalawng a suntlaak u vengah thlaangping lawng Jesuh te a noek u .
41006055	Tedawngah te kah ram pum ah aloela cet u tih thlaangtlo thli te paa dawngah a kawh u tih Jesuh a awmna ah avan law puei u .
41006056	Tecoengah Jesuh a cehna ahuen roekk ah vangca oen vangpui kah khaw , lo yun kah khaw , dawr yun kah khaw thlaangtlo thli te avan law puei u tih a himbai mah tek sak hamla reenna a bih u , aka tek boeih tah hoeih u .
41007001	Jerusalem kalawng aka law Farasi khatsut oen Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut te Jesuh tengah tun u .
41007002	A hubang khatsut lawng kut muen la buh a caak u te ahimi lawng a huh u ; a thuingaihna tah Farasi thlaang thli lawng amami siing ah kut silh ham awm a ti angla te a kut sil u nawh tina ni .
41007003	Farasi boeih oen Judah thlaang boeih lawng patuer hue kah cangpueina te a vai u ; amami kah siing angla kut a silh u nawh atah buh ca u nawh ;
41007004	dawr kah a lai thaihu khaw a silh lamha nawh atah ca u nawh . Te tila te patuer hue kah cangpueina siing atloe tloe , boengloeng , um-am oen ruhum beel oen ah ihkhun silhna boeih khaw a vai u .
41007005	Tedawngah Farasi thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawngah Jesuh nala te , “ N'tu kawngah na hubang hue lawng patuer hue kah cang puei patoeng te a vai u nawh tih kutmuen la buh a caak u ? ” tila a doet .
41007006	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi kawng he Isaiah lawng a thui oepsoeh te soeng tangtang ! Nangmi thlaang-thaipalat kawng he he tila a thut : Pathen lawngah , he kah thlaang thli lawng a awl hong oen kai n'hinyah u , tede ahimi kah thinkaw lungbui tah kai oen ah thla tangkiik .
41007007	Kai m'bok u he apoei mai ni , metihtiah ahimi lawng thlaanghing kah sai Coplap phung alam te Pathen kah phungawl angla a cang puei u ! ’
41007008	Pathen kah awlpeek te nangmi lawng na hoett u tih thlaanghing kah cangpueina te na vai u . ” a tina .
41007009	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Namami kah cangpueina acak thaina ham Pathen kah Phungawl hoett ham tah na thoem u lauh !
41007010	Mosi kah awlpeek dawngah , “ Na nu oen na pa te hinyah uh ’ ti oen ah , ‘ A-u khaw a manu oen ana pa te aka tapvoep boeih tah ngawn ham awm ’ tila awm .
41007011	Tede nangmi lawngtah ‘ Thlaang pakhat lawngah a manu oen ana pa bawmcemna ham hawna thai koei thaihu a khueh te Korban a ti atah
41007012	te thlaang te a manu khaw , ana pa khaw bawmcemna kalawng loeih poen , tila na cang puei u .
41007013	He tila nangmi lawng thlaangtloe te na cang puei patoeng dawngah Pathen awl te a hoett u . Tecoengah te ang thaihu tloe na sai u yahawh hlang awm hun , ” a tina .
41007014	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping te amah tengla a khue koep tih ahimi nala , “ Nangmi boeih lawng ka awlthui he hutung u langtah yaakming u lah !
41007015	Thlaanghing he adauben kah aka kuun thuk thaihu lawngah bokna phung ah aciim acaih nawh la a sai moenih , akhuiben kah aka thoeng hang thaihu lawng ni thlaang he aciim acaih sak nawh dai .
41007016	( A-u khaw yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya u seh ) , ” a tina .
41007017	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a ceh taak tih im khuila a kuun vengah a thui awl te thuicaih pe hamla a hubang hue lawng a ceel u .
41007018	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Thlaangtloe lak ah na cuih thloei u nawh den he ! Na yaakming u roe nawh aw ? Adauben kalawng akhuila aka kuun thuk thaihu lawng thlaanghing he ataktang la aciim acaih sak nawh moenih ,
41007019	n'tu ah ti atah te thaihu te a thinkaw khuiah kuun nawh tih a bungpui khuila a kuun dawngah pum khui kalawng naatceh la thoeng , ” a tina . ( He tila Jesuh lawng a thui he me ang caak awkk khaw caak koei boeih tila a thuingaihna ni .
41007020	Jesuh lawng koep a thui pe tih , “ Thlaanghing kaw khuikah aka thoeng hang thaihu lawng ni thlaang he aciim acaih sak nawh .
41007021	Thlaang kah thinkaw lungbui khui kalawng athe-arana aka sai sak athe poekna thaihu thli , huencaanna , thlaang ngawnna ,
41007022	Cuk-halhna , apueh ngaihna , boethena , thailatna , asoeng nawh saina , uett-eena , thlaang thuitheetna , oekthloenna oen ngau-athuuna ,
41007023	he ang athe thaihu boeih he thlaang kaw khui kalawng thoeng tih thlaang he ciimcaih sak nawh , ” a tina .
41007024	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak tih Taiar ram la te cet . Im pakhat ah kuun tih teah ahih a awm te a-u khaw ming sak ham ngaih nawh , tede thuh u thai nawh .
41007025	A canu raaithe lawng a tuuk pe hutaa pakhat lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak , a tengla law pahoei tih a khowkung ah a buekuep pe .
41007026	Ahih tah Gental nu la awm tih Siria ram Fonicia peng ah a cuun thlaang ni . A canu pum dawngkah raaithe te hek pe hamla Jesuh tengah a bih .
41007027	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Lamhala camaw thli te buh cah u sih . Camaw thli kah buh te lawh pe tih ui peek vik he soeng nawh , ” a tina .
41007028	Ahih lawng , “ Bawipa , tetih de mah ta ! Camaw thli kah caakdik caboi huikah te ui lawngkhaw a caak van de ta ! ” a tina .
41007029	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Te tila awl na thung dawngah im la meel loeih , na canu raaithe lawng a co taak te na huh ai , ” a tina .
41007030	Ahih tah im la meel tih ihkhun dawngah a canu aka ral te a huh ; raaithe lawng ahih te a co taak tangtang poen .
41007031	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng Taiar peng te a ceh taak , Dekapolis peng ah pat cet tih Sidon kalawng ah Galili Tuilii la te cet .
41007032	Thlaang khatsut lawng haapang awlmueh thlaang pakhat te a tengla avan law puei u tih ahih sawah kut tloeng pe ham Jesuh tengah reenna a bih u .
41007033	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahih bueng te thlaangping tim kalawng atloe la a ceh puei tih te thlaang kah a haa khui te a kutdawn oen a pueih pe , tumtui a tha tih a laai te khaw a koelh pe .
41007034	Tecoengah Jesuh te vaan la maang hang , adung hlang la hill a sang tih te thlaang nala te , “ Effatha , ” a tina . A thuingaihna tah , “ Awng u loeih . ” tina ni .
41007035	Kawlkalh ah te thlaang lawng awl a yaak thai , ahih kah awlthui kanghalhna te khaw ha-ata tih raina khat khaw awm muehla awl cal .
41007036	Tecoengah a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham thlaangping te Jesuh lawng awl a uen ; tede te thli tengah a khang pe tare vengah ahimi lawng a thui u tare ngaai .
41007037	Tecakhaw aka ya boeih tah a kawpoek rai u . Ahimi lawngah , “ A sai thaihu soeprep boeih he theen tangkiik mah aw ! Haapang khaw haa a khui sak tih awlmueh khaw awl a cal sak ! ” tila a thui u .
41008001	Tecoeng adiw thlan ah atloe thlaangping te khaw tun u . Thlaangping hue te caak ham a khueh u nawh dawngah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te a khue tih ,
41008002	“ He kah thlaang thli he kai oen hin thum awm puet u poen tih tahe ah caak ham n'tu khaw khueh u tlaih nawh , he kah thlaangping hue he ka reen tangkiik aih poen .
41008003	Ahimi he buh cah ohla im la ka tuih u kawinih thlaang khatsut tah khaw thla kalawng a law u dawngah lawngpueng ah tawnba u hau ai , ” a tina .
41008004	A hubang hue lawng , “ He kah ramhum huhang ah thlaang he yoeh ham caak khoek a-u lawng a dang thai ai ? ” a tina u .
41008005	Jesuh lawng , “ Takawi meyoeh na khueh u ? ” a tila . Ahimi lawng , “ Takawi cuun rih tah awm , ” a tina u .
41008006	Jesuh lawng thlaangping te dilai dawngah ngawlh ham awl a peek . Tecoengah takawi cuun rih te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coengah takawi te a eh tih thlaangping tengah rek ra pe hamla a hubang hue te a peek , a hubang hue lawng patoeng arek ara u .
41008007	Ahimi lawng nga a yawl a khueh u baal . Jesuh lawng Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coengah nga te khaw a hubang hue te arek ara sak .
41008008	Thlaang boeih lawng a caak tih hah u . Aka ca boeih tah thlaang thong lii yun awm .
41008009	A caak coeih te vawh phueih pasarih dawngah abela a hubang hue lawng a cawi u . Jesuh lawng thlaangping te a ceh sak tih ,
41008010	amah khaw a hubang hue oen lowng khuila kuun u pahoei tih Dalmanutha peng la te cet u .
41008011	Farasi thlaang khatsut Jesuh tengla law u tih Jesuh oen oelhtaih u . Ahimi lawng a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a ngaih u dawngah , “ Pathen kah thlaang tuih la na awm tang aw , na awm nawh aw tite mingna hamla kawpoekrai-miknoek pakhat ah sai lah , ” a tina u .
41008012	Tede Jesuh lawng adung hlang la a hill a sang tih , “ N'tu ah tihin hang kah thlaang lawng he kawpoekrai-miknoek a kuek u kai aw ? Ka sai manawh , atak tang kavan thui u ! Te ang te tihin hang kah thlaang thli tengah ka sai manawh , ” a tina .
41008013	Ahimi te a ceh taak tih lowng khuila te a kuun coengah tuilii khatben rall la te cet .
41008014	A hubang hue lawng takawi te amami ham khoek khuen hamla a hilh u tih lowng khuiah ahimi tengah takawi cuun at bueng a khueh u .
41008015	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Farasi thlaang thli kah tawlru oen Herod kah tawlru dawngah ngaithuen uh , ” a tina .
41008016	Ahimi lawng , “ Mami lawngah takawi n'khueh u nawh dawngah ni ahih lawng he tila a thui , ” ti u .
41008017	Ahimi lawng te tila a thui u te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi nala te , “ N'tu ah takawi khat khaw na khueh u nawh kawng te na thui khiing u ? Na ming u nawh tih na yaakming u thlan hun aw ? Na kaw hang sut u aw ?
41008018	Mik na khueh u lal maiah na hu u nawh aw ? Haa na khueh u lal maiah na ya u nawh aw ?
41008019	Thlaang thong ngaa ham takawi cuun ngaa ka eh pe te na hilh u poen aw ? Acoeih te vawhphueih meyoeh dawngah abela na cawi u te ? ” a tina . Ahimi lawng , “ Vawh phueih paha thlaihih , ” a tina u .
41008020	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang thong lii ham takawi cuun rih ka eh pe vengah acoeih te vawhphueih meyoeh dawngah abecala na cawi u ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawngah , “ Vawhphueih pasa-rih , ” a tina u .
41008021	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Tahe toe na yaakming u nawh hun aw ? ” a tina .
41008022	Ahimi tah Betsaida khaaw te a pha u , teah te thlaang khatsut lawng mikpum thlaang pakhat Jesuh tengla avan law puei u tih ahih te tek hamla Jesuh tengah reenna a bih u .
41008023	Jesuh lawng mikpum te a kut ah a mawt tih te khaaw kah adauben la a ceh puei . Te thlaang kah a mik te tumtui oen a phuh pe coengah ahih sawah Jesuh lawng a kut te a tloeng pe tih , “ Thaihu khat mai khaw na huh thai aw ? ” tila a doet .
41008024	Te thlaang lawng maang hang tih , “ Oeih , thlaang thli ka huh thai , tede ahimi tah thingkung thli aka cet angla awm , ” a tina .
41008025	Jesuh lawng te thlaang kah a mik dawngah a kut te koep a tloeng . Tevengah ahih lawng a mik a daai heet tih a bueh vengah a tueng pe koep tih soeprep boeih te aciimphanla a huh .
41008026	Jesuh lawng ahih nala , “ Vang khuila cet koep tlaih boel , ” a tina tih im la a tuih .
41008027	Tecoengah Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Sisaria Filipi tengvaai kah vangca vangnau la te cet u . Lawngpueng ah ahimi nala te , “ thlaang thli lawng kai he a-u a ti u , van thui u lah ? ” tila a doet .
41008028	Ahimi lawngah , “ Khatsut lawng nang he Baptisma pekung Johan ni ti u , atloe hue lawngtah nang he Elijah ni , ti u tih thlaang vang lawngtah nang he tawngha pakhat khat ni ti u , ” tila a thui pe u .
41008029	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi ta , kai he a-u na ti u ? ” tila a doet . Piter lawngah , “ Nang tah Messiah ni , ” a tina .
41008030	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai kah kawng he a-u tengah khaw thui u boel . ” tila te awl a uen .
41008031	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te cang puei ham a tong : “ Thlaang-hing Capa lawng patang a khang vetih ahaamca thli , khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawngah a hoett u ai . Ahih te a ngawn u ai , tede hin thum coengah tho koep ai a tina .
41008032	Jesuh lawng he kawng he ahimi tengah acairaula a thui pe . Tedawngah Piter lawng ahih te atloe ngaai bet la a ceh puei tih a siim .
41008033	Tede Jesuh lawng maang dak tih a hubang hue te a bueh , Piter te a tlung tih , “ Seitan , ka teng kalawng cet lah . Na poekna he Pathen benkah nawh ni , thlaanghing benkah poekna ni ! ” a tina .
41008034	Tecoengah Jesuh lawngah thlaangping oen a hubang hue te amah tengla a khue tih ahimi nala te , “ A-u khaw ka hu ah bang hamla aka ngaih tah amah kaw ngaih te hoett selang amah kah thinglam te kawt selang tah ka hu ah bang seh .
41008035	A-u khaw a hingna thlawn ham aka ngaih tah a hingna te sung ai , tede a-u khaw awlthang theen oen kai kawng dawngah a hingna te a sung atah a hingna a thlawn ai .
41008036	Thlaang pakhat lawng dilai pum he amah koe la khueh mai cakhaw a hingna te a sung atah aphu awm aw ? Aphu awm tlaih nawh !
41008037	A hingna te dang koep ham a peek thai n'tu khaw awm nawh .
41008038	Thlaang pakhat lawng tihin hang kah Pathen n'tu la aka sak nawh san the vengah he kai kah cangpueina oen kai aka yahna tah , Thlaanghing Capa lawngkhaw ana Pa kah ruep-awmna oen aciim vanthlaang thli oen a law thuk vengah a yah puei van ai .
41009001	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng awl a thui pe koep tih , “ Ataktang kavan thui u , he kah aka awm thlaang khatsut hue he Pathen Ram huham tharana oen a law te a huh u thlantoe duek u manawh , ” a tina .
41009002	Hinruk a awm coengah Jesuh lawng Piter , Jeem oen Johan mi te a ceh puei , tlaangsawm la a luui puei tih te ah te amami bueng awm u . Ahimi kah mik huh ah Jesuh kah a mueime te thawleng u ,
41009003	a himbai te abawkla aang rawngtheng tih tetih aihla abawk ham tah dilai dawngkah a-u lawngkhaw suk thai manawh .
41009004	Tecoengah Elijah , Mosi oen Jesuh mi awl a thui u te a hubang hue lawng a huh .
41009005	Piter lawng Jesuh nala , “ Saya , he ah mami ng'awm u he theen tangkiik ! Riim-im pathum ah ka sa u silang tah pakhat te nang ham seh , pakhat te Mosi ham seh , akhat te tah Elijah ham seh , ” a tina u .
41009006	Ahih oen atloe rawi lawngah a rih tangkiik u tih thui ham koei khaw ahih lawng ming sut nawh .
41009007	Tecoengah muui yaal tih ahimi te a thiing khoep . Muui dawng kalawng ah , “ He tah ka thintlawhna Ka Capa ni , a awl hutung pe uh ! ” tila awl kam at va law .
41009008	Ahimi lawng a teng avai ah a bueh u de a-u khat khaw hu u nawh tih Jesuh bueng te ahimi tengah awm .
41009009	Tlaangsawm kalawng a rum thuk u vengah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Thlaanghing Capa he duekna kalawng a thawh koep thlantoe na huh u thaihu he a-u tengah khaw thui u boel , ” tila awl a uen .
41009010	Ahimi lawng te awl uen te a vai u , tede amami oen amami mai te , “ Duekna kalawng thawhkoepna ti he n'tu kai ? ” tila he kawng he a thui khiing u .
41009011	Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te , “ N'tu ah Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng ‘ Elijah he lamhala law ai ’ a ti u kai ? ” tila a doet u .
41009012	Jesuh lawng , “ Soeprep boeih he roekbah oepsoeh hamla Elijah tah law tangtang ai . Te tih atah n'tu ah Caciim lawngah Thlaanghing Capa lawng patang a khang vetih ahih te a hoett u ai tila a thui kai ?
41009013	Tede kavan thui u , Elijah tah law poen tih Caciim lawng ahih kawng te a thui angla thlaang thli lawng amami ngaih la a sawah a sai u poen , ” a tina .
41009014	Ahimi lawng atloe a hubang hue tengah a pha vengah thlaangping lawng te thli te a veel khoep u tih Phungawl cangpueikung thli khatsut oen a hubang hue a oelh u te a huh .
41009015	Thlaangping lawng Jesuh te a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai tangkiik , a tengla cet u tih a voemtoei u .
41009016	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te , “ Nangmi he ahimi oen ah n'tu kawng na oelh u khiing te ? ” tila a doet .
41009017	Thlaangping tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng , “ Saya , ka capa raaithe lawng a tuuk tih awl khaw a cal thai nawh dawngah nang tengla kavan law puei .
41009018	Raaithe lawng a tuuk vengah dilai dawngah tlim kut tih a kaa dawng kalawng a tilhawm thoeng , a naw te a tah tih a pum boeih keuhkhang la awm . Na hubang hue tengah raaithe hek hamla reenna ka bih de hek u thai nawh .
41009019	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi oengna aka khueh nawh thlaang hue ! Nangmi he metuek toe kan awm puei ai ? Nangmi he meyoeh toe nuem kan reen u lah ai ? Camaw te ka tengla van law puei uh , ” a tina .
41009020	Ahimi lawngah camaw te Jesuh tengla avan law puei u . Raaithe lawng Jesuh te a huh pahoei vengah camaw te rap rap a doek , dilai dawngah tlim tih savaih , a kaa dawngah tilhawm a peem .
41009021	Jesuh lawng , “ Meveng kalawng he tila a awm ? ” tila ana pa te a doet . Ana pa lawng , “ A camoe veng kalawng awm poen .
41009022	Raaithe lawng camaw he ngawn hamla a teeng tih hai dawngkhaw , tui khuiah khaw a tulh poepa . Na sai thai koeila a awm atah n'reen langtah m'bawm lah , ” a tina .
41009023	Jesuh lawngah , “ Na sai thai koei la a awm atah na ti aw ! , Oeih ! Oengna aka khueh thlaang ham tah soeprep boeih he coengg thai ta , ” a tina .
41009024	Tevengah camaw kah ana pa lawng , “ Oengna ka khueh ta , tede khoek nawh , m'bawm lah ! ” tila angaih hlang la paang .
41009025	Jesuh lawng thlaangping amah tengla voeh ava yoeii phai te a huh vengah raaithe nala , “ Awlmueh oen haapang raaithe nang awl kan peek , Camaw kaw khui kalawng co langtah mevengah khaw kuun koep tlaih boel ! ” a tina .
41009026	Raaithe te angaihhlangla paang tih Camaw te langlang a thuen sak tih co . Camaw te duek rawkk angla awm tih thlaang boeih lawngah , “ Duek poen ” ti u .
41009027	Tede Jesuh lawng camaw te a kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh vengah ahih te pai hang .
41009028	Jesuh te im khuila a kuun coeng atah a hubang hue lawng ahuepla , “ N'tu kawngah kaimi lawngtah raaithe ka hek thai u nawh kai ? ” tila a doet u .
41009029	Jesuh lawngah , “ Thangthuina bueng oen ni he ang he hek thaina a awm , atloe hek thaina tah awm nawh ! ” a tina .
41009030	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah te huen kalawng tho u tih Galili peng kalawng poe cet u . Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te a cang puei hun dawngah amah a awmna te a-u khaw ming sak hamla ngaih nawh ,
41009031	A cangpueina tah , “ Thlaanghing Capa he thlaang kut ah a peek u vetih a ngawn u ai . Tede hin thum coengah tho koep ai , ” a tina .
41009032	Tede ahih kah cangpueina te a hubang hue lawng a thuingaihna yaakming u nawh . Ahih te doetdap ham khaw birih u .
41009033	Ahimi tah Kapernaum khaaw te a pha u tih im khuila a kuun u coengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te , “ Lawngpueng ah n'tu kawng na oelh u khiing te ? ” tila a doet .
41009034	Tede ahimi lawng , mami tim ah a-u nuem bawilen koek tila lawngpueng ah a oelh u khiing dawngah ahih kah awl doet te thung pe u nawh .
41009035	Jesuh lawng ngawl tih a hubang paha thlaihih te a khue tih ahimi nala , “ A-u khaw asangkoek la awm ham aka ngaih tah nangmi boeih lak ah aheem koek oen tuihyoeihthlaang la awm seh , ” a tina .
41009036	Tecoengah camaw pakhat te a khue tih ahimi haiah a pai sak . Camaw te a lengawi tih ahimi nala te ,
41009037	“ A-u khaw he ang camaw thli he ka miing oen pakhat khaw aka do tah kai aka do ni ; a-u khaw kai aka do tah kai bueng he n'do nawh tih kai tuihkung te khaw a do , ” a tina .
41009038	Johan lawng , “ Saya , Nang kah miing oen raaithe aka hek thlaang pakhat ka huh u tih mami tim kah thlaang nawh dawngah sai tlaih nawh ham ka khang pe u , ” a tina .
41009039	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Khang pe u boel ! ka miing oen kawpoekrai-miknoek aka sai thlaang lawngah kai he athela aka thui pahoei a-u khaw awm nawh .
41009040	A-u khaw mami aka oelhtaih nawh tah mami ben ah aka awm ni .
41009041	Atak tang kavan thui u : Kai kah thlaang la na awm u dawngah nangmi te tuiding boengloeng khui at khaw aka tuul tah kutdo a dang ngaikhoek ai , ” a tina .
41009042	“ A-u khaw he ang camaw thli timkah pakhat mai te khaw , kai a oengna te phelh sak ham aka suek tah caang neetna sum lungto te a rawn ah a awi tih tuiliidung ah sungpung kawinih ahih ham theen bet ai .
41009043	Tedawngah na kut lawng na oengna te a phelh sak atah tloek poet hawn ! Na kut pahih oen aka duek tlaih nawh hell hai khuiah na tlaak lak atah na kut pakhat bueng oen hingna khuiah na kuun te theen ngai .
41009044	Te huen atah ahimi aka ca ami te khaw duek tlaih nawh tih ahimi aka ung sak hai te khaw duek tlaih nawh .
41009045	Na khow lawng na oengna te a phelh sak atah na khaw te tloek poet hawn ! Na khow pahih oen hell khuiah na tlaak lak atah na khow pakhat bueng oen hingna khuiah na kuun te theen ngaai .
41009046	Te huen atah ahimi aka ca ami te khaw duek tlaih nawh tih ahimi aka ung sak hai te khaw duek tlaih nawh .
41009047	Na mik lawng na oengna te a phelh sak atah na mik te koeih pak hawn ! Mik pahih oen hell khuiah ne tlaak lak atah mik pakhat bueng oen Pathen Ram ah na kuun te theen ngaai .
41009048	Te huen atah ahimi aka ca ami khaw duek tlaih nawh tih ahimi aka ung sak hai khaw duek tlaih nawh .
41009049	Luciik sa boeih te lungkeh oen aciim sak boeih angla thlaang boeih he hai oen aciim sak van ai .
41009050	Lungkeh tah theen ; tede a aalna te a moelh atah metila na aal sak koep thai ai ? Nangmi lawng paya laikoeina lungkeh te khueh u langtah pakhat oen khat roeproeicala awm uh ” a tina .
41010001	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng te huen te a thawh taak , Judia peng la cet tih Jordan tuiva ah te kat . Thlaangping te a tengah tun koep baal tih a cang puei nooek angla ahimi te a cang puei .
41010002	Farasi thlaang khatsut hue lawng a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a tengla law u tih , “ Mami kah Phungawl lawngah thlaang pakhat lawng a yu te thlaak hamla lawngpui a awng pe aw ? tila a doet u .
41010003	Jesuh lawng , “ Mosi lawng me ang phungawl nangmi te m'peek u ? ” tila a doet .
41010004	Ahimi lawngah , “ Mosi lawngtah , ‘ thlaang pakhat lawng a yu te pekna ca a peek atah a maa thai ’ ti , ” tila a thui pe u .
41010005	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi he cang puei ham na rai u tangkiik dawngah nangmi ham he phungawl he Mosi lawng a thut .
41010006	Tede acuekca ah dilai a suen vengah te caciim lawng a thui angla Pathen lawng tawngpa oen hutaa a sai .
41010007	Tedawngah tawngpa lawng a manu oen ana pa te a ceh taak vetih a yu oen ah awm haih ai ,
41010008	ahih rawi tah pakhat la coengg poen ai . Tedawngah ahih rawi tah pahih tlaih nawh tih pakhat poen ni .
41010009	Tedawngah Pathen lawng a mulbet poen te tah thlaanghing lawng pek boel seh , ” a tina .
41010010	Im khuila a kuun koep u vengah he kawng he a hubang hue lawng Jesuh te a doet u .
41010011	Jesuh lawngah ahimi nala te , “ A yu aka thlaak thlaang lawngah hutaa tloe te a yuna atah a yu sawah samphaih .
41010012	Tetih van angla a vaa aka maa hutaa lawngah tawngpa tloe te a vaana atah ahih khaw samphaih , ” a tina .
41010013	Thlaang khatsut lawngah , camaw hue kah a luu dawngah Jesuh lawng a kut tloeng pe tih yotheen peek sak ham a tengla avan law puei u , tede a hubang hue lawng thlaangping te a ho u .
41010014	Tete Jesuh lawng a ming vengah a thinsa tih a hubang hue nala , “ Camaw hue te ka tengla law u seh , ahimi te kanghalh u boel , metihtiah Pathen Ram tah he ang thlaang hue kah ni .
41010015	Ataktang kavan thui u , a-u khaw Pathen Ram he camaw angla aka do nawh tah te ah te kuun thai manawh ” a tina .
41010016	Tecoengah camaw te a lawh tih a pawm , ahimi pakhat rip sawah a kut te a tloeng tih ahimi te yotheen kam-awmna te a peek .
41010017	Jesuh tah khawlawng la yin ceh ham a ceh khoeng vengah te thlaang pakhat a tengla law tih a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng ruila , “ Aka theen saya , dungyan hingna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai , ” tila a doet .
41010018	Jesuh lawng ahih te , “ N'tu dawngah kai he saya theen nan tina ? Pathen bueng nawh tah aka theen a-u khaw awm nawh .
41010019	Awlpeek boeih te na ming ta : “ Thlaang ngawn boel ; hutaa tawngpa thawlh boel ; huen acaan boel ; thlaang te thawlh peel boel ; Thlaang thai-alatna boel , na nu oen na pa te hinyah , a ti teta ” a tina .
41010020	Te thlaang lawng , “ Saya , he awlpeek boeih he ka camaw veng kalawng ka vai boeih poen , ” a tina .
41010021	Jesuh lawng ahih te a lungna tih a bueh rangpatang , “ Thaihu khat bueng ni na voet . Cet langtah na khuehtoen boeih te yooei lang tangka te khawdeng harah thli van peh , te atah vaan ram ah ro thaihu na khueh ai , tecoengah law langtah ka hu ah va baang , ” a tina .
41010022	Te thlaang lawng he awl he a yaak vengah a mik-haai muelh a khueh tih kawthe ruila te cet . Metihtiah ahih tah a kuirang tangkiik dawngah ni .
41010023	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengla maang tih , “ Kuirang thli ham Pathen ram khuiah kuun hamla rai tangkiik mah aw ! a tina .
41010024	He awl dawngah a hubang hue tah a ngaihang u , tede Jesuh lawng , “ Ka ca ka nau thli , Pathen Ram khuiah kuun hamla rai tangkiik !
41010025	Kuirang thli Pathen Ram ah kuun lak ah phaimeet haa khuiah kala-uk a kuun te yoei bet ai , ” a tina .
41010026	A hubang hue lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik tih , “ Te atah a-u thlawn la aka awm thai ai ? ” tila khat oen khat doet u .
41010027	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a haitang heet hih “ He he thlaanghing ham tah coengg thai nawh , tede Pathen hamla tah soeprep boeih he coengg thai ” a tina .
41010028	Tevengah Piter lawng , “ Kaimi lawng soeprep boeih ka ceh taak u tih na hu ah ka bang u poen ” a tina .
41010029	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Oeih , ataktang kavan thui u , a-u khaw a im a lo , a maya manau , ngannu nganca , a manu oen ana pa , ca anau khaw awlthang theen oen kai kawng dawngah aka ceh taak tah ,
41010030	tahe san roeroe ah a yahawh ngaaila a dang ai . Im khaw , maya manau khaw , ngannu khaw , a manu khaw , ca anau oen lo khaw a pueh yakhat la a dang ai , tecoegah heemtekna khaw a dang van ai . tecoengah aka law ham koei san ah dungyan hingna te a dang ai .
41010031	Tede tahe kah lamhacuek thlaang thli he hukhueng la awm u vetih tahe ah hukhueng la aka awm thlaang thli he lamha u dai ai . ” a tina .
41010032	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jerusalem benla cet u . A hubang hue kah a haiah Jesuh te lamhala cet ; a hubang hue tah lakueng u ; a hu ah aka vai thlaang thli lawngkhaw a rih u . Jesuh lawng a hubang thlaangha thlaihih hue te atloela koep a ceh puei tih amah sawah aka thoeng ham koei te a thui pe .
41010033	Ahimi nala te , “ Hutung u lah ! Jerusalem khaw te m'pha u vetih te ah te Thlaanghing Capa he khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli kut ah peek la awm ai . Ahimi lawngah ahih te duek sak hamla awl a tloek u vetih tecoengah Gental thli kut ah a peek ai ,
41010034	nuihbu kamring la a sai u ai , a tumthoeih u ai , a bawh u vetih a ngawn u ai ; tede athum hin ah tho koep ai , ” a tina .
41010035	Tecoengah Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen Johan te Jesuh tengla law hih tih , “ Saya , thaihu pakhat navan sai hamla ka ngaih , ” a tina .
41010036	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi te , “ N'tu kavan sai ai ? ” tila a doet .
41010037	Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Na bawilenna Ram ah na bawi ngawlhcoen dawng na ngawlh vengah kai hih he banvoei ben ah pakhat , bantang ben ah pakhat namah oen haih nan ngawlh sak ham ka ngaih hih , ” a tina .
41010038	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala , “ Navan bih he na ming hih nawh . Ka awkk ham koei patang khangna boengloeng he na awkk thai hih ai aw ? Kai lawng ka dang ham koei baptisma angla te nanghih lawng baptisma na dang thai ai aw ? ” a tina .
41010039	Ahih rawi lawng , “ Ka sai thai hih ai , ” a tina . Jesuh lawng te rawi boeinau te , “ Kai lawng ka awkk ham boengloeng khaw na awkk thai hih vetih ka dang ham koei baptisma te khaw na dang thai hih tangtang ai .
41010040	Tede ka bantang ben ah ahih ngawl seh , ka banvoei ben ah ahih ngawl seh tila kai lawng ka tuek thai nawh . He huen tah Pathen lawng a hooep a tlaang tangte thlaang hue te a peek ai , ” a tina .
41010041	He kawng he atloe hubang paha hue lawng a yaak u vengah Jeem oen Johan sawah a thinsa u .
41010042	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te amah tengla boeih a khue tun tih , “ Pathen aka ming nawh ukkung bawi hue lawng a uk thlaang thli sawah huham tharana a khueh u tih mawtkung hue lawngkhaw anauh ngaai la aana a khueh u .
41010043	Tede nangmi tah te tila na awm u manawh . Nangmi timkah pakhat lawng aka lenduet la awm ham a ngaih atah nangmi boeih kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awm seh ;
41010044	Nangmi timkah pakhat lawng lamhacuek la awm a ngaih atah nangmi boeih kah sal la awm seh .
41010045	Metihtiah Thlaanghing Capa lawng Pateng khaw a bii te thlaang bi sak ham law nawh ; thlaang kah bii te bi ham tih thlaang yahawh hlang hamla a hingna te peek ham ni a law ” a tina .
41010046	Jesuh oen a hubang hue oen ah thlaangping hue tah Jeriko khaaw te a pha u . Jeriko kalawng a law vengah Timas capa kutduen buh bih mikpum pakhat Bartimias te lawngteng ah ngawl .
41010047	Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh va law tila a yaak vengah , “ Devid Capa Jesuh ! Kai he n'reen lah ! tila paang .
41010048	Thlaangping lawng a ho u tih duem awm , a tina u . Tede angaihhlangla paang tare tih , “ Devid Capa , kai he n'reen lah ! ” a tina .
41010049	Jesuh te cot pai tih , “ Ahih te khue u lah , ” a tina . Tedawngah ahimi lawng mikpum thlaang te a khue u tih , “ Na tha thlue sak , tho loeih ! nang n'khue poen te ” a tina u .
41010050	Tedawngah himbai te a voeih pak tih cungpet ruila Jesuh tengla te va law .
41010051	Jesuh lawng , “ Nang ham n'tu sai sak na ngaih ? ” tila a doet . Ahih lawng , “ Saya , ka mik a tueng koep ham ka ngaih , ” a tina .
41010052	Jesuh lawng , “ Cet loeih , na oengna lawng avan tueng sak poen , ” a tina . Kawlkalh maiah ah a mik tueng koep tih te lawngpui ah te Jesuh hu ah baang pahoei .
41011001	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Jerusalem a pha tawm u tih Betfat oen Bethani khaaw teng kah Olif tlaang te a pha u atah Jesuh lawng a hubang pahih te hai la a tuih tih .
41011002	he tila awl a uen : “ Na hai kah khaw khuila cet hih . Na pha hih khoeng ah a-u lawngkhaw a cit nooek thlan lacano a kiing u te na huh hih ai . Thlam hih langtah he la van khuen hih .
41011003	A-u lawng mai khaw , n'tu hamla te tila na sai hih tila n'doet atah , Bawipa lawng a ngoe , kavan thak koep badai tina hih , ” tila awl a uen .
41011004	Tedawngah cet hih tih lawngteng kah im pakhat vawng thawhka tengah lacano a kiing u te a huh . Rui a thlam hih vengah te ,
41011005	a tengah aka pai thlaang khatsut lawngah te , “ N'tu ham lacano a khihna rui te na thlam hih ? ” tila a doet u .
41011006	Ahih rawi lawng Jesuh kah awl uen angla a thui pe tih , te kah thlaang thli lawng lacano te ahi rawi a khuen sak u .
41011007	Lacano te Jesuh tengla avan khuen hih tih la te amami kah himbai oen a khuk u tih Jesuh te a cit sak u .
41011008	Thlaangping lawng amami kah himbai te lawngpui ah a phaih u , thlaangvaang lawngtah lawngteng lawngvai kah thingbuuk te a kawi u tih lawngpui ah thinghu a phaih pe u .
41011009	Jesuh kah a haiah aka cet hue oen a hu ah aka cet thli lawng , “ Hosanna ! Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh !
41011010	Pahaam Devid kah ukna aka law lii te yotheenna awm hawn seh ! Asangkoek vaan ah ke Pathen tah thangtheenna awm hawn seh ! Hosanna ! ” tila pang u .
41011011	Jesuh tah Jerusalem khaaw la te cet , Tempal bok-im khuila kuun tih thaihu thli te boeih a bueh . Tede khaw a thlem poen dawngah a hubang thlaihih oen Bethani khaaw la te cet koep u .
41011012	Avuen khawhin ah Bethani khaw kalawng a mel u koep vengah Jesuh te a bung pawng .
41011013	Athla hlang kalawng , thaidut thing kung at a ram lawng a diik khoep te a huh tih , athaih awm mai kai aw a ti dawngah a kung la te a pan ; Tede a pha vengah , thaidut te a thaih tue nawh dawngah a ram hawng la a awm te a huh .
41011014	Jesuh lawng thaidut thing te , “ Na thaih he a-u lawngkhaw ca koep tlaih boel seh ! ” a tina . Te tila a tina te a hubang hue lawngkhaw a yaak u .
41011015	Jerusalem te a pha u vengah , Jesuh tah Tempal bok-im la cet tih thaihu aka yooei thli oen aka lai thli te boeih a hek . Tangka thawlengkung thli kah caboi oen akhuu aka yooei thli kah ngawlhna te a plet boeih tih ,
41011016	A-u khaw Tempal bok-im talawng vawngup khui kalawng thaihu khat khaw khuen sak tlaih nawh .
41011017	Tecoengah thlaangping te a cang puei tih , “ Caciim khuiah Pathen lawng , “ Kai kah Tempal bok-im he thlaangphun boeih kah thangthuina im ni ti ai , ” tila a thut . Tede nangmi lawngtah thlaanghuuen thli kah thuh-elhna lungkaw la na sai u poen , ” a tina .
41011018	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phung-awl cangpueikung hue lawng he awl he a yaak u tih Jesuh te ngawn hamla along a-im a tlap u . Jesuh kah cangpueina te thlaangping rangpui tah a kawpoek rai u tih ahimi lawng Jesuh te a rih u .
41011019	Thlemben atah Jesuh oen a hubang hue khawpui khui kalawng atloela cet u .
41011020	Avuen mincanghi ah Jesuh oen a hubang hue lawngpueng a ceh u vengah thaidut thing te a huh u . Te thaidut thing te athingpum la ayung toe duek rup .
41011021	Piter lawng thaidut thing Jesuh lawngah a taap te a poek lot vengah Jesuh nala te , ‘ Saya , bueh lah , nang lawng na taap thaidut thing te duek rup poen ! “ a tina .
41011022	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Pathen te mah oeng u lah .
41011023	Atak tang kavan thui u , a-u lawngkhaw a kaw khuiah uepvoetna khueh muehla amah kah a thui angla coengg ngai ai tila a oeng atah he tlaang he , ‘ thoeih langtah tuitunlii khuila tla lah , ’ a tina atah a thui angla ahih ham coengg vetih a sai pe ai .
41011024	Tedawngah ka van thui u : Nangmi lawng thangthuina oen na bih thaihu pakhat khat te ka dang poen tila tangna uh , te atah na bih sarui te m'peek ai .
41011025	Nangmi lawng na pai tih na thangthui u vengah thlaangtloe sawah na kaw a lawna nawh na khueh te khawdawp ngaai pe uh , te atah vaan ah aka awm nangmi na Pa lawng na sai thawlh te khawdawp avan ngaai van ai .
41011026	Nang lawng thlaangtloe sawah khawdawp na ngaai nawh atah vaan kah na Pa lawngah na sai thawlhna dawngah khawdawp van ngaai van manawh ” . a tina .
41011027	Ahimi lawngah Jerusalem te koep a pha u . Tempal bok-im ah Jesuh a yingyawi vengah te khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue oen ahaamca thli a tengla law u tih ,
41011028	“ Ame kah saithaina aana oen he thaihu he na sai ? A-u lawng sai thaina aana he m'peek ? ” tila a doet u .
41011029	Jesuh lawng ahimi awl te a thung pe tih , “ Nangmi he kam at ah awl kan doet u lah ai , awl navan thung u atah he thaihu he ame kah saithaina aana oen ka sai tite kavan thui van ai .
41011030	Johan kah baptisma peek saithaina aana he ame kalawng a law : Pathen teng kalawng aw ? tih nawh atah thlaanghing teng kalawng aw a law ? ” tila a doet .
41011031	Amami oen amami mai te oelh u khiing tih : “ Metila n'ti u lah ai ? Pathen teng kalawng ni a law n'ti kawinih , n'tu ah Johan te na oeng u nawh ? ti ai .
41011032	Tede , ‘ Thlaanghing teng kalawng ni a law n'ti kawinih thlaangping he rih ham awm ” ti u . ( Metihtiah thlaang boeih lawng Johan he tawngha tila a ming u . )
41011033	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh nala , “ Ka ming u nawh ” a tina u . Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawngkhaw ame kah saithaina aana oen he ang thaihu ka sai he kavan thui u manawh ” a tina .
41012001	Jesuh lawng ahimi te thuidoetna oen a thui pe . Jesuh lawngah , ‘ Vaikhat ah misur dum aka sai thlaang pakhat awm tih dum te vawng oen khoep a thung , misurtui suina ham ungrawm a to tih a toetna ham paw a sak . Tecoengah dum te thlaang a vat tih amah tah khawlawng thla la te cet .
41012002	Misur thaih bit tue veng atah dum aka vat thlaang thli tengah a sal pakhat te a tuih tih a dang ham koei dum khang te a lawh sak .
41012003	Dum aka vat hue lawng a salpa te a tuuk tih a bawh u , thaihu khat khaw peek ohla atliingla a mel sak u .
41012004	Tecoengah dum khuehkung lawng atloe sal pakhat te a tuih ; dum aka vat hue lawng a luu ah a bawh u tih yarau yahdeng la a khueh sut u .
41012005	Dum khuehkung lawng atloe sal pakhat te a tuih koep de a ngawn pe u ; atloe sal thli te khaw te tila a sai u , khatsut te a bawh u tih atloe hue te a ngawn u .
41012006	Dum khuehkung lawng a tuih ham tah a lungduet amah capa khat bueng te ni a awm poen . Hukhueng atah , ka capa he tah dum aka vat hue lawng a hinyah ai a ti dawngah a capa te a tuih .
41012007	Tede dum vat hue lawng , ‘ Ahih he dum khuehkung kah a capa ni . Law uh , ngawn u sih , ahih kah ro thaihu he mami kah koeva la awm ai , ” ti u .
41012008	Tedawngah ahimi lawng a capa te a tuuk u , a ngawn u tih a rawkk te misur dum adau benla a voeih u .
41012009	“ Tetih atah dum khuehkung lawng ahimi te metila a tina ai ? ” tila Jesuh lawng a doet . “ Ahih lawng law vetih dum aka vat hue te a ngawn ai , misur dum te thlaangtloe a vat ai .
41012010	“ Caciim lawng : Imsakung thli lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lungto te atloe boeih lak ah aphu aka awm koek Lungto la awm .
41012011	He tah Bawipa lawng a sai ni . Mami mik huh ah kawpoek rai la awm ' , tila a thui te na tae noek u nawh aw ? ” a tina .
41012012	Judah ahaamca hue lawng he thuidoetna he amami te ni a thui ee-tla thil tite a ming u dawngah Jesuh te tuuk hamla kamthlah u , tede thlaang rangpui te a rih u dawngah a ceh taak u .
41012013	Farasi khatsut hue oen Herod kah thlaang khatsut hue Jesuh te awl doet tih a awl thui dawng teah a thawlhna tuuk pe hamla te a tuih u .
41012014	A tengla te law u tih , “ Saya , nang tah awltak na thui yoeyah , thlaang kah poekna khaw n'tu la na ngaai nawh . Nang lawngtah thlaang mik-hai khaw na dan nawh tih Pathen kawngaih awltak te thlaang na cang puei tite ka ming u . Rom Sengpahrang Sangluel tengah mangmu peek he mami kah Phungawl oen kalh u kai aw ? Ahimi he mangmu peek ham tueng aw , peek tueng nawh aw ? van thui lah , ” a tina u .
41012015	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah thailatna te a ming tih , “ Me tih ti kawngah kai he kamah awl thui dawngah thawlhna tuuk ham na ngaih u ? Ngun tangka pheek at ah van khuen u lah , ka bueh lah ai , ” a tina .
41012016	Ahimi lawng ngun tangka pheek at avan khuen pe u tih , “ A-u kah muei-ame oen miing aka awm ? ” tila Jesuh lawng a doet . Ahimi lawng , “ Rom Sengpahrang Sangluel kah muei-ame oen a miing awm , ” a tina u .
41012017	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Tetih atah Sengpahrang kah koeva te Sengpahrang pe u langtah Pathen koe te Pathen pe uh , ” a tina . Te tila te ahimi tah Jesuh sawah a kawpoek rai sut u .
41012018	Tecoengah Sadusi thlaang khatsut , duek coengah thawhkoepna awm nawh aka ti hue te Jesuh tengla law u tih ,
41012019	“ Saya , kaimi ham Mosi lawngah he tila phungawl a thut : ” Thlaang pakhat lawng a ca cuun muehla duek tih a yu te a ro sut oh atah , aka duek kah ca anau la a ca sak pe ham huhainu te a manau lawng yuna seh , ’ ti .
41012020	Vai at tah boenhui thlaang pasarih awm u ; ahaam koek lawngah a yu a lawh de a ca sak mueh la duek .
41012021	Tecoengah apabena lawngah a maya yu te a pang de ahih khaw a ca sak muehla duek . Te tila te apathumna te khaw awm tih ,
41012022	atloe hue khaw te tila awm u boeih . Boenhui pasarih lawng te hutaa te a yuna u de a ca sak ohla duek boeih u . Hukhueng atah te hutaa khaw duek .
41012023	Te hutaa te boenhui boeih lawng a yuna u dawngah thawhkoepna khawhin , thlaangduek boeih a thawh vengah , te hutaa te a-u kah yu la a awm ai ? ” tila a doet u .
41012024	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Na poek thawlh u nawh pai he ! N'tu ah ka poek thawlh u ti he na ming u aw ? Nangmi lawng Caciim khaw , Pathen kah tharana khaw na ming u nawh dawngah ni .
41012025	Metihtiah thlaangduek a thawh koep veng atah vaan kah vanthlaang thli angla awm u vetih yuvaa ti he awm manawh .
41012026	Thlaangduek thawhkoepna kawng : Mosi kah cabu dawngah tangpuem a ungna kawng awl te na tae noek u nawh aw ? Te cabu dawngah a thut tah Pathen lawng Mosi nala , “ Kai tah Abraham Pathen , Isak Pathen , oen Jakob Pathen la ka awm , ” a tina te ta .
41012027	Ahih tah aka hing thlaang thli kah Pathen la awm tih aka duek thlaang thli kah Pathen nawh ni . Nangmi lawng na poek thawlh u tangkiik ” a tina .
41012028	Te tila awl a thui u te aka ya Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat teah te awm . Jesuh lawng Sadusi hue kah awldoetna atheencala a thung pe te a huh vengah awl doet ham a tengla law tih , “ Awlpeek boeih boeih ah ame ang awlpeek nuem awlpui koek ? ” tila a doet .
41012029	Jesuh lawng , “ Awlpui koek pakhatna tah he ni : “ Israel thlaang thli hutung u lah ! Mami kah Bawipa Pathen bueng ni Bawipa la a awm .
41012030	Bawipa na Pathen te na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen na hingna boeih oen , na kawpoek boeih oen , na tharana boeih oen ah lungnah ” .
41012031	A pabena awlpui koek awlpeek tah , “ Namah oen namah te na lungna van angla na imbe te lungnah ” a ti he ni . He rawi pahih lak-ah awlpui ngai atloe awlpeek awm tlaih nawh ” . a tina .
41012032	Phungawl , cangpueikung lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , Boehoeng theen ! Bawipa bueng he Pathen la awm tih ahih bueng nawh tah Pathen tloe awm nawh .
41012033	Tedawngah thlaanghing lawng Pathen te thinkaw lungbui boeih oen kawpoek boeih oen tharana boeih oen ah lungna ham awm tih m'mah kah pum n'lungna van angla imbe te khaw lungna ham awm . He awlpeek pahih n'vai he tah Pathen tengah boknathaang dawngah boiava thawthuengna oen atloe thawthuengna lak-ah awlpui ngaai la awm ” a tina .
41012034	Ahih lawng cuihna oen awl a thung pe te Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah ahih nala te , “ Nang tah Pathen ram oen na thla nawh ” , a tina . He coeng kalawng tah Jesuh he a-u lawngkhaw awl doet ha tlaih nawh .
41012035	Jesuh Lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah a cang puei vengah he tila awl a doet , “ Metila Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawng Messiah tah Devid kah cadil nauha la awm ai tila a thui u thai kai ?
41012036	Aciim Muithla kah bawnghorhna rang oen Devid amah lawng : “ Bawipa lawng ka Bawipa tengah : Na raal thli te na khowpha huiah ka khueh thlantoe ka bantang ben ah ngawl ” a tina .
41012037	Devid amah lawng ahih te , “ Bawi-pa ” ; tila a khue atah metila Messiah te Devid kah cadil nauha la a awm thai ai ? ” a tina . Thlaangping hue lawng Jesuh awl te awmngaihcala a hutung u .
41012038	Jesuh lawng te tila a cang puei vengah te , “ Phungawl cangpueikung hue he ngaithuen uh , ahimi lawng himbai dunghlang oen yingyawi a ngaih u tih dawr yun ah khaw thlaang lawng hinyahna oen n'voem n'toei lah sui tila a ngaih u ,
41012039	sinakok bok-im ah athloekla ahooep atlaang ngawlhna oen poei saina ah huen theen ngawlhna te a tuek u .
41012040	Huhai tumtee thli kah a ruemm thaihu ralring capau te a lawh pe u tih ahimi kah a im thli te a rot pe u , tecoengah thlaang kah yaak theen la asanhlangla thangthui u . Ahimi te a the-eepla dan a tat ai .
41012041	Jesuh tah tempal bok-im kah tangka bawm tengah te ngawl tih thlaang thli kah tangka a sang u te a doen . Kuirang thlaanglen thli lawng tangka yahawh hlang a sang u te a huh ;
41012042	Tevengah te huhainu khawdeng pakhat law van tih ruhum tangka pheksaseen pahih te a sang .
41012043	Tecoeng atah a hubang hue te a khue tih , “ Atak tang kavan thui u , he kah huhainu khawdeng lawng thlaangtloe boeih lak ah tangka bawm khuiah yahawh ngaai a sang poen .
