41012044	Metihtiah atloe hue lawngtah a khuehtoen khuikah acoeih aphe te ni a sang u ; tede he huhainu tah khawdeng de a khueh duen te a peek kik poen , ” tila a thui pe .
41013001	Tempal bok-im kalawng Jesuh a suntlaak vengah a hubang pakhat lawng , “ Saya , Bueh lah ! he lungto oen impui he metihtlukla kawpoek rai ham a awm ! ” a tina .
41013002	Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ He kah impui imlen thli he na huh aw ? He kah lungto thli he pakhat maikhaw a awmna huen ah awm manawh ; a pum boeih la a dawng kang ai , ” a tina .
41013003	Jesuh tah Olif Tlaangsawm ah amah bueng ngawl tih Tempal bok-im benla te mang phai , tevengah Piter , Jeem , Johan oen Andru mi ahuepla ahih tengla te law u .
41013004	Ahimi lawngah , “ He ang thli he metuek vengah a thoeng ai ? He thaihu boeih he thoeng poen ai tila miknoekna awm ai aw , van thui lah , ” tila a doet u .
41013005	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi he a-u lawngkhaw thai-alatna nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
41013006	Thlaang yahawh lawng ka miing oen law u vetih , “ Kai tah ahih poen ni , ” ti ai , thlaang yahawh te a thai alatna ai .
41013007	Nangmi lawng ayoeica kah raalkahna awl na yaak u ah khaw , athlathloei kah raalkahna awlthang na yaak u ah khaw lakueng u boel . Te ang thli te awm ai , tede aboetna a pha poen ti ngaihna nawh ni .
41013008	Ram pakhat oen khat kap u vetih , peng pakhat oen khat teek u ai . Dilai peng boeih ah likluei hinghuen vetih khawthe khawkhana awm ai . He ang thli boeih he tah camoe awm tawm tamtuen cuek bungtlawh angla awm ai .
41013009	Nangmi lawng ngaithuen oen awm uh . Metihtiah nangmi te n'tuuk u vetih awlcekna yung la n'khuen u ai . Sinakok bok-im ah nangmi te m'bawh u ai ; Nangmi lawng kai kawng dawngah ukkung thli oen sengpahrang thli haiah ahimi te Awlthang Theen thui pe hamla na pai u ai .
41013010	Tede atue boetna a pha thlan ah awlthang theen te thlaang boeih tengah phawng la awm ai .
41013011	Nangmi te n'tuuk tih awlcekna yung la n'khuen u atah n'tu nuem ka thui ai tila lakueng oepsoeh u boel ; atue a pha vengah thui hamla m'peek te thui hawn . Metihtiah nangmi lawng na thui ham awl te tah nang kah awl nawh ni , Ciim Muithla teng kah awl ni .
41013012	Thlaang lawngah amah kah maya manau kheet te duek sak ham a peek ai , tetih van angla ana pa lawngkhaw ca anau thli te a sai u van ai . Ca anau thli lawngkhaw a manu oen ana pa te a raalna u vetih a ngawn sak ai .
41013013	Kai kah kawng dawng maiah nangmi te thlaang boeih lawng n'thina ai . Tede a-u khaw aboet toe aka cak tah thlawn la awm ai .
41013014	“ Rih koei tuiileh kap lawngah a awmna nawh koei a huen ah a awm te nangmi lawng na huh u ai , ” ( ca aka tae thli lawng thuingaihna he ming uh ) “ Tevengah Judia ram ah aka awm lawng tlaangsawm la te heng u seh .
41013015	Imphu ah aka awm lawng a khuen ham koei thaihu te lawh ham im khuila kuun re tlaih boel seh ;
41013016	Lo ah aka awm lawngkhaw hi-acuu lawh hamla im la cet re tlaih boel seh .
41013017	Te kah atue khawhin te hutaa vawn-um oen cacuun naukem thli hamla metihtlukla mueirihtamyiin la a awm ai .
41013018	He thaihu thli he sikding tue ah avan pha nawh ham Pathen tengah thangthui uh !
41013019	Metihtiah te khawhin kah patangraina te tah Pathen lawng dilai a suen tih a tongcuek veng kalawng tahe toe ah khaw ming noek nawh athe koek raina poen ni . Hailam ah te ang te awm koep tlaih manawh .
41013020	Bawipa lawng te kah atue khawhin te toi sak nawh kawinih ; a-u khaw loeih deem manawh . Tede , amah kah a thlaang tuek hue hamla tah te atue khawhin te a toi sak poen .
41013021	“ Tedawngah thlaang pakhat khat lawng , ‘ Bueh u lah ! he ah Messiah awm a ti ah khawseh , ’ ‘ Bueh lah ! ke ah Messiah awm , ’ a ti ah khaw ahimi te tangna u boel .
41013022	Metihtiah Messiah rawlrap thli oen tawngha rawlrap thli va thoeng ai . Ahimi lawngah a coengg thai atah Pathen thlaangtuek thli Pateng khaw thailatna ham kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoek rai thaihu broela a sai ai .
41013023	Ngaithuen uh ! Te kah atue atang te apha thlan ah thaihu soeprep te nangmi tengah kavan thui oepsoeh poen he ” a tina .
41013024	“ Te kah patang raina atue khawhin coeng atah khawmik lawng yiin khoep ai , thla lawngkhaw vang tlaih manawh .
41013025	Vaan kalawng aisi tla vetih khawhi ah aka awm aisicumrii lawng amami kah huham tharana along a-im te a thawveel boeih ai .
41013026	Tevengah thlaang capa lawng va pho vetih huham tharana oen ruep-awmna oen ah muui khui kalawng va law ai .
41013027	Ahih lawngah dilai atoe khit kalawng khatben atoe kah Pathen thlaangtuek thli te cawi hamla dilai a kil palii ah vanthlaang thli te a tuih ai .
41013028	Thaidut thing dawngah cuihna cang u lah , Thaidut thing kah a beek-athleeng thli te hingsuepla awm tih a dawn a voeih , a ramno a cawn hang atah nangmi lawng khawhaal tue yoeii poen tila na ming u .
41013029	Tetih van angla he ang thaihu thli a thoeng hang atah atue yoeii poen , law tawm poen tila ming uh .
41013030	Tahe ah aka hing thlaang hue he a duek boeih thlan ah he thaihu boeih he va thoeng ai ti he hilh u boel .
41013031	Vaan oen dilai tah auh ai , tede kai kah awl tah mevengah khaw ha-ata manawh .
41013032	“ Te cakhaw te kah atue oen khawhin te mevengah a thoeng ai tite a-u lawngkhaw ming nawh ; vaan kah vanthlaang lawngkhaw ming nawh ; Pa bueng lawng ni a ming .
41013033	Te kah atue te mevengah avan pha ai tite na ming u nawh dawngah a huertue la awm u lang ring oepsoeh uh .
41013034	N'tu oen a lawh u ti atah , thlaang pakhat tah khawlawng thla la yin cet tih a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te bii a peek , ahimi pakhat rip te a sai ham koei bii te a peek coengah thawhka toetkung te khaw ngaithuen cala a toet ham a uen a tawn heet oen lo u .
41013035	Imkung manghai bawi te mevengah a law ai tite nangmi lawng na ming u nawh dawngah ngaithuen lang ring uh . Thlemhah ah khaw , yiinthuem ah khaw , tihnawhtah cinghue ah khaw , khawthaih ben ah khaw law thai mai .
41013036	Poek muehla ahih te a law parak atah nangmi ih siing ih rawi la na awm u te n'hu boel seh .
41013037	Nangmi teng ka thui he thlaang boeih teng khaw ka thui : Ngaithuen oen ring uh ! ” a tina .
41014001	Kaantaak Poei oen Tawlru thuum nawh Takawi poei te pha ham hin hih angaih vengah khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng Jesuh te ahuepla tuuk tih ngawn ham lawngpui a tlap u .
41014002	Ahimi lawngah , “ Mami lawng poei hin veng atah sai u boel sih , thlaangping he cumplaam la tho ai , ” ti u .
41014003	Jesuh tah Bethani khaaw ah aka awm haibe natna aka tlo noek Simon im ah te awm . Jesuh te buh a caak lii vengah , hutaa pakhat riimtuui phutlo alabasta um dawngah abepirla avan khuen tih va law . Te hutaa lawng alabasta um te a bawh ngoelh tih riimtuui oen Jesuh luu te a suep .
41014004	Te kah aka awm thlaang khatsut tah a thinsa u tih , “ N'tu la riimtuui ke a poeih a lak kai ?
41014005	Riimtuui he ngun tangka yathum lak ah yahawhla yoeih tih khawdeng thli te tangka m'pe kawinih theen ai ta ! ” ti u tih a theet soeh u .
41014006	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Toeng u loeih ! N'tu ham ahih te na lawl na la u ? Ahih lawng kai hamla thaihu theen aroep acap la avan sai poen .
41014007	Khawdeng thli tah nangmi tengah awm poepa ai ta , nangmi lawng na ngaih veng roekk ah ahimi te na bawm thai . Tede kai tah nangmi tengah ka awm poe manawh .
41014008	Ahih lawng a sai thai khoek te a sai poen ; Ka pum dawngah riimtuui avan suep he tah ka rawkk vuina ham a kamthlah oepsoehna ni .
41014009	Tahe ah ataktang kavan thui , dilai peng tawm ah awlthang theen a thuina huen roekk ah amah hilhna nawh ham a sai thaihu he a thui poepa u van ai .
41014010	Tecoengah a hubang thlaihih khuiah aka thuum van Judas Iskariot lawngah Jesuh te a raal thli kut ah peek ham khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengla te cet .
41014011	Ahimi lawngah ahih kah awl thui te a yaak u vengah a kaw hoe tangkiik u tih tangka peek ham awl a kam u . Tedawngah Judas lawng Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek ham atue theen te a tlap .
41014012	Tawlru phull nawh Takawi Poei hin at na , Kaantaak poei buhkokna ham tuuca ngawnna khawhin ah Jesuh te a hubang hue lawng , “ Nang hamla Kaantaak poei buhkokna te ame huen ah kaimi sai sak ham na ngaih ? ” tila Jesuh te a doet u .
41014013	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi tim kah a hubang pahih te he tila awl a uen tih a tuih : “ Khawpui khuila cet hih langtah tuium dawng tui aka thaan thlaang pakhat lawng nanghih te n'hum ai .
41014014	Ahih te a kuunna im toe la a hu ah vai hih langtah te imkung nala : “ Saya lawng , ka hubang hue oen Kaantaak poeibuh caakna akhann te ame ah nuem ? ti ' ti nah .
41014015	Tecoeng atah ahih lawng im han kah akhann kau hlang , anep anoeila soeprep aroek abah heet te n'nueh hih ai , te huen ah te thlembuh veel ham sai hih , ” a tina .
41014016	A hubang rawi lawng khawpui khuila cet hih tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe angla soeprep boeih te a huh tih Kaantaak poeibuh te a roek abah hih .
41014017	Thlemhah atah Jesuh oen a hubang paha thlaihih te va law u .
41014018	Caboi dawng buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh lawng , “ Ataktang kavan thui u , Nangmi timkah kai oen buh aka ca haih pakhat lawng kai sawah paipi a thleep ai , ” a tina u .
41014019	A hubang hue tah a kaw caalla the u tih , “ Kai nan ti ngaihna ngoen nawh macawi ? ” tila pakhat coeng pakhat lawng Jesuh te a doet u .
41014020	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi thlaihih tim kah pakhat van tih kai oen beel dawngah takawi aka nok haih ni .
41014021	Thlaanghing Capa tah duek ai tila Caciim lawng a thui angla duek ai ; tede Thlaanghing Capa sawah paipi aka thleepkung ham tah khawmap tangkiik ! Te thlaang te cuun ohla awm kawinih ahih ham theen bet sui de ta , ” a tina .
41014022	Ahimi lawng thlembuh a caak u lii vengah te Jesuh lawng takawi a lawh tih awmngaih thangthuina a khueh coengah takawi te a eh tih a hubang hue te a peek . “ Lo uh , he tah ka pum ni ” a tina .
41014023	Tecoengah boengloeng te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil a thui coengah a hubang hue te a peek tih ahimi boeih lawng a awkk u .
41014024	Jesuh lawng , “ He tah thlaang yahawh hamla ka hok ka thi ni , Pathen awlkam acakna ka thi ni .
41014025	Ataktang kavan thui u , Pathen ukna khuiah misurtui athaai awkk ham khawhin apha thlantoe he misurtui he ka aw koep tlaih manawh ' , a tina .
41014026	Tecoengah ahimi lawng laa raawl at a sak u tih Olif Tlaangsawm la te luui u .
41014027	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Caciim dawngah , “ Pathen lawng tuudoen te a ngawn vetih tuu boeih tah thek u khonghak ai , ” a ti angla nangmi boeih lawng kai he nan heng taak vetih nan ceh taak sut ai .
41014028	Tede , duekna kalawng thawh sak koep la ka awm coengah nangmi haiah Galili la kan cet ai . ” a tina .
41014029	Piter lawngah , “ Thlaangtloe hue lawng nang te n'ceh taak cakhaw , kai lawng tah nang he kan ceh taak sut roe manawh , ” a tina .
41014030	Jesuh lawng Piter nala te , “ A taktang kavan thui , n'tuu yiin aai voeihih a khaawk thlan ah nang lawngah kai he voeithum toe ka ming roe nawh tila na basa khak ai , ” a tina .
41014031	Piter lawng , ” Nang oen ah duek haih koeila awm cakhaw nang he kan ming roe nawh tila ka thui manawh , ” a tina . Atloe a hubang hue lawngkhaw te tila te a thui u van .
41014032	Ahimi tah ketsaman a ti u a huen te a pha u tih , Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te , “ Kai ka thangthui ruet vengah he ah he an ngawl u de , ” a tina .
41014033	Piter , Jeem oen Johan te a ceh puei . Jesuh tah lakueng malcal tih a kaw moet sut ;
41014034	ahimi nala te , kawthena lawng thinkaw lungbui avan yaawl khoep tih ka peeng phuk ai a ti angla awm . He ah he awm u lang ih mueh la n'ring uh ” a tina .
41014035	Ahih lawng cet hot tih , dilai ah buekuep tih acoengg thai atah patang khangna kalawng loeihna ham thangthui .
41014036	“ A Pa , a Pa ! Nang ham tah soeprep boeih he coeng thai . Kai tengkah patang khangna boengloeng he lo hawn lah . Tede kai kah kawngaih angla awm boel seh , namah kah kawngaih angla coengg hawn seh ” . tila thangthui .
41014037	Tecoengah va meel tih a hubang pathum a ih muelh u te a huh . Piter nala te , “ Simon , na ip muelh aw ? Nang lawngah khawnoek pakhat mai khaw na hak thai nawh aw ? ” a tina .
41014038	Tecoengah ahimi te , “ Nangmi lawng suek-halhna khuiah na tlim u nawh ham thangthui langtah hak u lah . Na thinkaw lawngtah a ngaih de na pumsa tah a tha yoek sut . ” a tina .
41014039	Ahih tah cet koep tih acuek kah angla koep thangthui .
41014040	Tecoengah a hubang hue tengla meel koep tih ahimi a ih muelh u te a huh ; a mik khaw daai u thai nawh tih n'tu thui ham khaw ming u nawh .
41014041	A pathumna a meel koep veng atah , ahimi nala te , “ Tahe toe ah na ip tih na duem u hun aw ? Khoek poen seh ! Atue a pha poen ! Bueh lah , tahe ah Thlaanghing Capa tah thlaang thawlh thli kut ah a peek poen .
41014042	Tho uh , cet u sih . Bueh lah , kai sawah paipi thleepkung te he ah avan pha poen ! ” a tina .
41014043	Te tila Jesuh lawng awl a thui lii vengah te Judas avan pha . Ahih lawng-ah Khawsoeih ahaamca thli , Phungawl cangpueikung thli , Judah thlaang ahaamca thli kah thlaang tuih , samsen oen boelhoen aka pawm thlaangping te avan law puei .
41014044	Paipi thleepkung lawng thlaangping te miknoekna a peek oepsoeh : “ Kai lawng ka mok thlaang te tah nangmi lawng na ngaih u thlaang te ni . Ahih te tu u langtah anepla rep tamena lang khuen uh ” . a tina .
41014045	Judas lawng a paipuek ah Jesuh tengla cet pahoei tih , “ Saya ! ” a tina tih a hih te a mok .
41014046	Te atah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tuuk u tih a khih u .
41014047	Tevengah te kah aka pai thlaang pakhat lawng a samsen te a phong tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah sal te a bawh tih a haa pat a tloek pe .
41014048	Tevengah Jesuh lawng ahimi te a voem tih , “ Kai he thlaanghuuen la ka awm dawngah aw tuuk hamla samsen oen boelhoen oen ah nangmi lawng na law u ?
41014049	Khawhin roekk ah nangmi tengah ka awm tih Tempal bok-im ah kan cang puei u yoeyah ta , nan tu u nawh . Tede Caciim lawng a thui te tah asoep ham awm ” a tina .
41014050	Tevengah a hubang hue boeih lawng a ceh taak sut u tih a heng taak khongphaat u .
41014051	Tlamhi himbai aka bai cadawng tawngpang pakhat lawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai . Ahih te khaw ka tu ai ti u ,
41014052	Tede a himbai te a pit sut tih atliing ayaalla heng phaat .
41014053	Tecoeng atah Jesuh te Khawsoeih Bawi impui la te a ceh puei u , te huen ah khawsoeih ahaamca boeih , Judah ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli tun u .
41014054	Piter lawngah athla ngaai bet kalawng a hu yut tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah impui vawngup khuila te cet . Teah te raaltoeng thli oen haih ngawl u tih hai a aawm .
41014055	Khawsoeih ahaamca boeih , awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum boeih lawng Jesuh te ngawn thaina ham a thawlhna te a tlap u , tede ahimi lawng khatca khaw dang u nawh .
41014056	Sausi la aka pai thlaang broe lawngah Jesuh te hoem a pup u de ahimi kah awl thui te khat khaw tuhkai u nawh .
41014057	Tecoeng atah thlaang khatsut lawng pai tih Jesuh te he tila hoem a peel u :
41014058	“ Ahih lawngah , ‘ He Tempal bok-im thlaanghing kah a sak he ka phe vetih , thlaanghing lawng a sak nawh pakhat te hin thum khuiah ka sak ai , ’ tila a thui te ka yaak u ” , ti .
41014059	Tede ahimi kah awl thui khaw tuhkai u nawh .
41014060	Ahimi boeih kah a haiah te Khawsoeih Bawi tah pai tih Jesuh nala te , “ He kah thlaang thli lawngah hoem awl a thui u tih nang thawlh n'peel te awl thung ham koei awm nawh aw ? ” tila a doet .
41014061	Tede Jesuh lawng a hill a phah duem tih awl kam at khaw thui nawh . Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah , “ Nang he Theenduet Pathen Capa Messiah aw ? ” tila koep a doet .
41014062	Jesuh lawng , ‘ Kai tah Messiah ni , Thlaanghing Capa lawng Thara koek kah bantang ben ah ka ngawlh te khaw , vaan kah muui dawngah ka law te khaw nangmi lawng na huh u ai ! ” tila awl a thung pe .
41014063	Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah a himbaidung te a doek thok tih , “ Mami ham atloe sausi angoe hun baal aw ! .
41014064	Pathen a sal aphaamna awl a thui te nangmi lawng na yaak u poen . Metila awltloekna na khueh u ai ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi boeih lawngah : ahih tah thlaangthawlh ni , ngawn ham awm tila awl a khueng u .
41014065	Thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh te a tumthoeih , a mik te a yeen pe khoep tih a tam u , “ Nang he a-u lawng m'bawh thui lah , ” a tina u . Raalkap thli lawng a khuen u tih a bel u .
41014066	Khawsoeih Bawi kah talawng vawng-up khuiah Piter a awm vengah te , Khawsoeih Bawi kah tuihyoeihthlaang hutaa pakhat te va law .
41014067	Piter hai a aawm te a huh vengah a bueh rangpatang tih , “ Nang khaw Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh oen aka awm haih thlaang van ni ” . a tina .
41014068	Tede Piter lawng basa tih , “ Ka ming nawh ; Nang lawng na thui akawng-alam he ka yaakming moenih , ” a tina tih vawngup thawhka la te cet . Teveng roe ah te aai khaawk pahoei .
41014069	Tuihyoeihthlaang hutaa lawng Piter te a huh koep tih a tengah aka pai thli te , “ Ahih he ahimi timkah pakhat van ni ” toekloek a tina .
41014070	Tede Piter tah basa toengtoeng . Kawlkalh a awm bawt atah , a teng kah aka pai thlaang thli lawng Piter te , “ Nang lawng ahimi tim ah aka thuum van ti he na basa thai manawh , nang khaw Galili thlaang van ni . ” a tina u .
41014071	Tede Piter lawng , “ Awl ka taap tih awltak ka thui ! Kai lawng awltak ka thui nawh atah Pathen lawng dan n'tat seh ! Nangmi lawng na thui u thlaang te ka ming nawh ! ” a tina .
41014072	Tecoeng khoeng ah apabe la aai khaawk tih Piter lawng Jesuh awl “ Aai voeihih a khaawk thlan ah , kai he kan ming roe nawh , voei thum toe na ti ai ” a tina awl te a poek lot tih rap .
41015001	Mincanghi ah khawsoeih ahaamca thli tah Judah ahaamca thli , Phungawl cangpueikung thli , awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum boeih oen ah tun huh u tih khaw a khan u . Jesuh te thiirui oen a khih u , a ceh puei u tih Pilat kut ah a peek u .
41015002	Pilat lawngah , “ Nang he Judah sengpahrang tang aw ? ” tila awl a doet . Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla soeng , ” a tina .
41015003	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawngah Jesuh te thawlh broela a peel u .
41015004	Tedawngah a doet koep tih , “ Awl na thung pe nawh ai aw ? Ahimi kah thawlh peel boeih he hutung lah ! ” a tina .
41015005	Jesuh lawng awl kam at khaw thui nawh toeng toeng tih Pilat tah a kawpoek la rai .
41015006	Kaantaak Poei apha veng roekk ah thawngtla pakhat rangpui lawng a bih te Pilat lawng a thlah poepa .
41015007	Tevengah raal la aka tho thli oen thong haih aka tla , raal la a thawh u vengah thlaang aka ngawn Barabbas a miingna thongtla thlaang pakhat te awm .
41015008	Thlaangping lawngah law u tih poei vengah thongtla pakhat thlah noek angla te thlah sak ham Pilat tengah a bih u .
41015009	Pilat lawng ahimi te , “ Nangmi lawngah Judah sengpahrang he thlah sak ham na ngaih u aw ? ” tila a doet .
41015010	Pilat lawng , ka kut dawngah Jesuh avan pha sak u he khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng a uett u dawngah ni tite atheencala a ming .
41015011	Tede khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng thlaangping te a ceemtuh tih Barabbas dai lat te thlah sak ham Pilat tengah a bih u .
41015012	Pilat lawng thlaangping te , “ Tetih atah Judah sengpahrang he ta metila sai sak ham na ngaih u ? ” tila koep a doet .
41015013	Ahimi lawngah , “ Thinglam dawng-ah ngawn ! ” tila paang u .
41015014	Pilat lawng , “ Ahih lawngah n'tu thawlhna a sai ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawngah , “ Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! ” tila angaihhlangla paang tare u .
41015015	Pilat lawng thlaangping te ngaitluep sak ham a ngaih dawngah Barabbas te a thlah pe . Tecoengah Jesuh te cungpoelh oen a bawh tih ngawn hamla ahimi kut ah a peek .
41015016	Raalkap thli lawngah Jesuh te ram ukbawi kah impui talawng vawngup khuila te a ceh puei u tih raalkap bu khat te a khue tih tun kueng u .
41015017	Ahimi lawng Jesuh te himbaidung lingduuk te a bai sak u tih thliing oen a veh bawilen lumuek te a muek sak u .
41015018	Tecoengah thekha thangpawmna la : “ Judah Sengpahrang a hinglung vaang hawn seh ! ” ti u .
41015019	A luu ah cungpoelh oen a bawh u tih a tumthoeih u , a haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng u , a luu a khun u tih a bok u .
41015020	Te tila nuihbu kamring la a sai u coengah himbailing te a dul pe u tih amah kah himbai te a bai sak koep u . Tecoengah ahimi lawng thinglam dawngah ngawn hamla te a khuen u .
41015021	Lawngpueng ah khaawte ben kalawng khawpui la aka law Simon aka miingna thlaang pakhat a hum u tih raalkap thli lawng Jesuh kah thinglam te amangkhak la a kawh sak u . ( Simon he Sairin khaaw kah Alekzandar oen Rutas kah ana pa ni . )
41015022	Jesuh te Golkota huen ben la te a ceh puei u . Golkota ti he tah “ Luuruh huen ” ti ngaihna ni .
41015023	Te huen ah te mura oen a pawlh haih misurtui te a tuul u , tede Jesuh lawng aw nawh .
41015024	Tecoengah ahimi lawng Jesuh te thinglam dawng a tai u , ahimi lawngah talcung a suh u tih a himbai te rek ara u .
41015025	Ahimi lawng mincang khawnoek pakua vengah Jesuh te thinglam dawng a tai u .
41015026	Ahih thawlh peelna thinglam dawng a tai u te tah , “ Judah sengpahrang ” tila a thut .
41015027	Ahih oen thlaanghuuen pahih khaw a bantang ben ah pakhat , a banvoei ben ah pakhat a tai haih u .
41015028	He tila te caciim lawngah , “ Thlaangthawlh tim ah ahih te a thuum sak ” a ti awl te soep .
41015029	Te kah aka cet paitai thli lawngkhaw , a luu te halh a voeih u tih Jesuh te a tamdeng kawkhahna u : “ Aw ! Nang aw , Tempal bok-im te ka phe vetih hin thum khuiah ka sak koep ai na ti ! .
41015030	Thinglam dawng kalawng tahe ah rum thuk langtah namah oen namah thlawn u lah ! ” a tina u .
41015031	Tetih van la te khawsoeih ahaamca hue oen Phungawl Cangpueikung hue lawngkhaw Jesuh te a nuihna u , “ Thlaangtloe tah a thlawn de amah oen amah tah thlawn u thai nawh he ta ! .
41015032	Israel sengpahrang Messiah te thinglam dawngkah a rum thuk te tahe ah hu u lah sih , te atah mami lawng n'tangna ai ta ! ti u . Jesuh amah oen a tai haih thlaang pahih te lawngkhaw ahih te athe akhana hih van .
41015033	Hingthuntaang ah ram pum boeih te khawnoek pathum khui yiinna lawng a thiing khoep .
41015034	Thlemben khawnoek pathum tue vengah Jesuh lawng , “ Eloi , Eloi , Lama sabaktani ? ” tila angaih hlang la paang . A thuingaihna tah , “ Ka Pathen , ka Pathen , n'tu kawngah nan hoett sut ? ” ti ngaihna ni .
41015035	A teng kah aka pai thlaang khatsut lawng ahih kah paang awl te a yaak vengah , “ Hutung lah ! Ahih lawng Elijah a khue ! ti u .
41015036	Ahimi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng palh cet tih him baipeen te a lawh , misurtui thuii dawngah a nuem tih rawkuih dawngah a piin . Jesuh te a kaa ah a tuh tih “ Ring de lah ! thinglam dawngkah thlawn hamla Elijah va rum ai nuem , bueh u lah sih , ” ti u .
41015037	Jesuh lawng angaihhlangla paang , tecoengah duek .
41015038	Tevengah Tempal bok-im khuikah baiyaan te asaw kalawng adang toe pahih la poet pheuh u .
41015039	Thinglam haiah aka pai raalbawipa lawng metila Jesuh a duek tite a huh vengah , “ He thlaang he tah Pathen Capa tangtang ni ! ” tila a thui .
41015040	Te kah aka awm hutaa khatsut lawngtah athla kalawng a dan u . Ahimi tim ah Meri Makdalin , anoca Jeem oen Josep kah a manu Meri oen ah Salome mi khaw thuum u .
41015041	Galili ah Jesuh a awm vengah ahimi lawng a hu ah baang u tih a bawm a ceem u . Atloe hutaa hue lawngkhaw Jerusalem la te law u tih ahimi oen ah te awm u van .
41015042	Khaw a thlem atah Arimatia khaaw kah Josep te va law . ( Ahih avan pha vengah te khawthlem poen . ) Ahih tah awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum hinyah koei thlaang pakhat van tih Pathen a law te aka ring thlaang ni ( Te Khawhin tah rueng-aphongna Huet hin , Sabbath pha thlan khawhin ni . ) Tedawngah Josep lawng tawng-aa ohla Pilat tengla cet tih Jesuh rawkk te a bih .
41015044	Pilat lawng Jesuh duek poen tila a yaak vengah a kawpoek la rai . Ahih lawng raalbawi te a khue tih Jesuh a duekna san poen aw tila a doet .
41015045	Raalkap bawi kah awl thui te a yaak coeng atah , Pilat lawng Jesuh rawkk te Josep a lawh sak .
41015046	Josep lawng rawkk yaawlna himbai a lai , a rawkk te thinglam dawngkah a lawh tih himbai oen te a yaawl coengah thel a thuk heet thlann lungkaw khuiah te a up . Tecoengah lungto bohlang a plet u tih phuel thawhka te a tleng .
41015047	Meri Makdalin oen Josep manu Meri mi khaw awm van tih Jesuh kah a rawkk upna huen te a huh hih .
41016001	Sabbath hin aboeih coengah Meri Makdalin , Jeem manu Meri oen Salome mi lawng Jesuh rawkk a thlukna hamla riimtuui a lai u .
41016002	Hin rih khuiah lamhacuek khawhin , khaw a thoeng cuek ah ahimi tah phuel la cet u .
41016003	Lawngpueng a ceh u vengah ahimi lawng , “ Thlann thawhka kah lungto te a-u lawng a plet ai ? ” ti u . ( Te tah lungto bo hlang ni . ) Tecoengah ahimi lawng a bueh vengah , te lungto plet tangte la a awm te a huh u .
41016005	Ahimi lawng thlann khuila a kuun u vengah cadawng tawngpang pakhat himbai bawk a bai tih bantang ben ah aka ngawl te a huh tih let u .
41016006	Ahih lawngah , “ Let u boel , nangmi lawngah thinglam dawng a ngawn u Nazaret khaw kah Jesuh na tlap u te ka ming . Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh , tho poen ! Ahih a khuehna huen he bueh lah .
41016007	Tahe ah cet u langtah a hubang hue oen Piter te , he awlthang he thui pe uh : “ Ahih tah nangmi haiah Galili la cet ; nangmi tengah avan thui angla te ah te na huh u ai , ” tila van thui pe uh , ” a tina .
41016008	Tedawngah ahimi tah cet tih lakueng oen thuen ruila heng u . Ahimi lawng a rih u tangkiik dawngah a-u tengah khaw thui u nawh .
41016009	Hutaa hue lawng Piter oen a paya thli tengla cet u tih vanthlaang lawng ahimi tengah a thui pe awl te atawila a thui pe u .
41016010	He coengah Jesuh amah lawng a hubang hue rang oen khawcuuk ben kalawng ah khawtlaak ben toe aka hing yoeyah tih aka ciim dungyan thlawnna awlthang te a thui .
41016011	“ Jesuh tah hing koep tih ka huh poen tila a thui te ahimi lawngah tangna u nawh .
41016012	He coengah hubang pahih vangca la a ceh vengah Jesuh lawng muei ame phuntloe ngai bet la ahih rawi tengah a phumpho pe .
41016013	Ahih rawi lawng meel koep hih tih atloe hue tengah a thui pe hih de ahimi lawng tangna u nawh .
41016014	Hukhueng koek ah a hubang paha thlaikhat buh a caak u lii vengah Jesuh te a phumpho pe . Ahimi lawng oengna khueh nawh tih Jesuh te a hing la aka hu thli kah awlthui khaw tangna ham thinkaw aniing khaklal u dawngah ahimi te a siim .
41016015	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Dilai peng tawm ah cet u lang thlaangphun boeih tengah , awlthang theen he thui pe uh .
41016016	A-u lawngkhaw a tangna tih baptisma a huh atah thlawn la awm ai ; A-u khaw a tangna nawh atah awlcekna a dang ai .
41016017	Aka oeng thli tah kawpoek rai saina huham te a peek ai ; ahimi lawngah ka miing oen raaithe thli te a hek ai ; awl thaai la cal u ai ;
41016018	ahimi lawng asue aka awm ruul tu cakhaw , duekna sue aw cakhaw nganbawh ya manawh , ahimi lawng thlaangtlo thlaangnaa thli sawah kut a tloeng atah te thli lawng hoeih ai . ” a tina .
41016019	Bawipa Jesuh lawng ahimi te awl a thui pe coengah vaan la luui tih Pathen bantang ben ah te ngawl .
41016020	A hubang thli lawng cet u tih peng tawm ah awlthang a thui u , Bawipa tah ahimi tengah bii a bi tih ahimi lawng a thui he soeng tite kawpoekrai saina oen a tueng sak u .
42001001	Hinyah koei Tiofilas : Mami tengah thaihu aka awm he atheen koek la thut ham thlaang yahawh lawng a yawm u poen .
42001002	He thaihu thli he acuekca veng kalawng aka hu tih awlthang aka phawng thli lawng mami tengah avan thui te ahimi lawng a thut u .
42001003	Tedawngah kai lawngkhaw he thaihu boeih he akungcuek kalawng ah acek aneh la ka rui ka hiim coengah Tongmang nang tengah ca thut ham theen ai tila ka poek .
42001004	Nang tengah avan thui u tangte soeprep boeih kawng te ataktang ni tila na mingna hamla kavan thut .
42001005	Judia ram ah Herod he sengpahrang la a awm vengah Abijah khawsoeih bu ah Zekhariah aka miingna khawsoeih pakhat awm . A yu tah Elizabet a miingna , ahih khaw khawsoeih imkhuikaw ah aka thuum van ni .
42001006	Ahih rawi tah Pathen mik huh ah thlaangdoeng la bok awm hih tih Bawipa kah phungawl oen awlpeek boeih te asoepcala a vai hih .
42001007	Elizabet tah a ca yaa tih ca-anau khueh hih nawh , ahih rawi tah patawng aih hih poen .
42001008	Hin at atah Zekhariah he khawhin roekk ah bii a sai ham koei te sai hamla atue a pha van tih Tempal bok-im khuiah khawsoeih biibi a sai koei te a sai .
42001009	Khawsoeih boeih lawng a vai u phung alam van angla bokna-thaang dawngah riimtuui huihthlut ham talcung a suh u tih a hih te a tuek u . Tedawngah Bawipa kah Tempal bok-im khuila te cet ,
42001010	Tevengah riimtuui huihthlutna atue la awm tih rangpui thlaangping tah adauben ah thangthui u .
42001011	Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat ahih tengah phumpho tih rimtuui huihthlutna bokna-thaang bantang ben ah te pai .
42001012	Zekhariah lawng ahih te a huh vengah let uekcuek tih a rih .
42001013	Tede vanthlaang lawngah ahih nala te , “ Zekhariah , rih boel ! Nang kah thangthuina te Pathen lawng a yaak tih na yu Elizabet lawng na ca tawngpa avan cuun ai . Nang lawngah Johan tila miing na sak ai .
42001014	Ahih te a awm veng atah na kaw hoe tangkiik ai , thlaangtloe hue khaw awmngaih tangkiik u ai !
42001015	Ahih tah Bawipa mik huh ah aka lenduet la awm ai . Ahih lawngtah misurtui oen yuu khaw aw roe manawh . Ahih tah a thang pek kalawng Ciim Muithla oen be poen ai .
42001016	Ahih lawng Israel thlaangphun yahawh hlang te amami kah Bawipa Pathen tengla a mel puei koep ai .
42001017	Ahih tah Bawipa kah puencawn la awm vetih tawngha Elijah angla a tha awm vetih a tha ra ai . Ahih lawng ana pa oen ca-anau thli te koep a roep u sak ai ; Ahih lawngah awl aka ngaai nawh thlaang thli te thlaangdoeng thli kah poekna lawngpui la te a mawt koep ai ; Ahih lawngtah Bawipa kah thlaang thli te Bawipa amah ham oepsoeh la arueng aphong sak ai , ” tila a thui pe .
42001018	Zekhariah lawng vanthlaang nala te , “ Te tila awm tangtang ai tite metila ka ming ai ? Kai tah ka patawng poen tih ka yu khaw hutawng van poen ” a tina .
42001019	Vanthlaang lawngah , “ Kai he Gabriel ni , he awlthang theen he nang tengah thui pe ham tuihkung Pathen haiah ka pai .
42001020	Tede nang lawng ka awl he na tangna nawh , atue akhoek vengah atakla thoeng ai . Nang lawng na tangna nawh dawngah awl na cal thai manawh ; ka awlkam he atakla na tengah a thoeng thlantoe awlmueh la na awm ai . ” a tina .
42001021	Teveng khui puet ah te thlaangping lawng Zekhariah te a ring u tih n'tu ah ahih he Tempal bok-im khuiah atue san hlang adiw aih oh kai ti tih a kawpoek rai u .
42001022	A law veng atah ahimi tengah awl thui thai nawh , tedawngah Tempal bok-im khuiah huhthlaam a huh tila ahimi lawng a ming u . Awl kam at khaw thui thai nawh , ahimi tengah te a kut oen ah miknoekna te a sai pe .
42001023	Tempal bok-im khuiah biibina atue te a boeih coeng atah Zekhariah te im la koep meel .
42001024	Tecoeng adiw raih coeng atah a yu Elizabet te vawn tih thla ngaa khui im khuiah awm roep .
42001025	Ahih lawng , “ Tahe aboetna ah kai he Bawipa lawng n'bawm poen , thlaang rangpui haiah yaraula ka awm te avan lawh poen , ” tila a thui .
42001026	Elizabet te tattloella a awmna thla ruk vengah Pathen lawng vanthlaang Gabriel te Galili ram kah khawpui Nazaret la te a tuih .
42001027	Sengpahrang Devid cadil la aka awm Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat lawngah yuna hamla awl a khueh hulaa tengah awl thui pe ham a tuih . Te hulaa tah Meri a miingna .
42001028	Vanthlaang lawng a tengla law tih , “ Na tengah ngaimawngna awm seh ! Bawipa tah na tengah awm tih yotheen kam-awmna yahawh hlang la m'peek ! ” a tina .
42001029	Vanthlaang kah awlthui dawngah Meri tah a ngaai hang tih ahih kah awl he n'tu a thui ngaihna kai tila a kawpoek rai .
42001030	Vanthlaang lawng , “ Meri ! Rih boel ; Nang tah mik-hai theenna Pathen lawng m'peek poen .
42001031	Nang tah na vawn ai , capa pakhat na cuun vetih a miing tah Jesuh tila na sak ai .
42001032	Ahih tah bawilen vetih Tloeng Khoelh Pathen Capa ti u ai . Bawipa Pathen lawngah ahih te patuer Devid angla te sengpahrang la a khueh ai ,
42001033	ahih tah Jakob cadil thli kah dungyan sengpahrang la awm ai ; ahih kah ram tah meveng khaw boet manawh ! ” a tina .
42001034	Meri lawng vanthlaang nala te , “ Kai tah hulaa cuem la ka awm . Metila he he acoengg thai ai ? a tina .
42001035	Vanthlaang lawng , “ Ciim Muithla te na tengla law vetih Pathen kah huham tharana tah na sawah awm ai . Tedawngah aciim camaw te Pathen Capa ti u ai .
42001036	Namah kah cakaw Elizabet te poek lah . Ahih lawngah ca ka cuun tlaih manawh tila a thui , ahih tah hutawng poen de tahe ah tattloella a awmna thla ruk awm poen .
42001037	Metihtiah Pathen lawng a sai thai nawh khat khaw awm nawh .
42001038	Meri lawngah , “ Kai he Bawipa kah salnu ni ; na thui angla ka sawah awm seh . ” a tina . Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng Meri te a ceh taak .
42001039	Tecoeng adiw thlan ah Meri tah kamthlah tih Judia ram tlaang ah aka awm khawpui pakhat la te cet .
42001040	Meri lawng Zekhariah im la cet tih Elizabet te a toei .
42001041	Elizabet lawng Meri kah toeina awl te a yaak vengah a bung khuikah camoe te tat . Elizabet tah Ciim Muithla oen be tih ,
42001042	Ahih lawng angaihhlangla , “ Nang tah hutaa boeih lak ah yo aka theen koek hutaa ni , na cuun ham koei na ca te khaw a yo theen phoeih !
42001043	He ang aka lentloe thaihu he n'tu kawngah ka teng avan pha tih ka Bawipa kah a manu he ka tengla a yingyawi kai ?
42001044	Metihtiah nan toeina awl ka yaak pahoei oen ah ka bung khuikah camoe yawngdiik he awmngaihna oen tat .
42001045	Bawipa kah awlthang te na tengah ataktangla thoeng ai tila na tangna dawngah na yo theen phoeih , ” tila a thui .
42001046	Meri lawngah , “ Ka lungbui lawng Bawipa a koeh ;
42001047	ka hingna khaw thlawnkung Pathen tengah awmngaih ,
42001048	Metihtiah huhsit koek kai a salnu he amah lawng n'hilh nawh ! Tahe kalawng tah cadil nauha thlaang boeih lawng yotheen aka dawng hutaa ni ti u poen ai ,
42001049	metihtiah Thara koek Pathen lawng kai hamla alentloe thaihu avan sai poen . Ahih kah miing tah ciim ;
42001050	Amah te aka hinyah thlaang boeih tengah cadil nauha khat coeng khat toe reenna te a tueng sak .
42001051	Ahih lawngah a thara baan te a thueng a thleng tih amami kah ahuep khawkhanna oen aka oekk u thlaang boeih te a thek a yak boeih .
42001052	Ahih lawngtah thara sengpahrang thli te amami kah ngawlhcoen dawng kalawng adangla a thlaak boeih tih thlaang la a toeh u nawh thli te a pawmsang .
42001053	Buh mueh buhpawng thli te caak awkk atuui tuui oen bung a hah sak tih kuirang thlaanglen thli te kut pingpuei oen atliingla a meel sak .
42001054	Ahih lawngtah mami kah patuer thli tengah awlkamna a sai te thlauh nawh tih amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang Israel thlaangphun te bawmcem hamla law poen .
42001055	Ahih lawngah Abraham oen a cadil nauha boeih tengah dungyan toela reenna tueng sak ham te hilh nawh ! ” tila a thui .
42001056	Meri tah Elizabet tengah thla thum yunyan awm tih tecoengah amah im la koep meel .
42001057	Elizabet tah camoe awm ham atue atang khoek tih capa pakhat a cuun .
42001058	Bawipa lawng ahih sawah kawpoek raina atheen tangkiik a sai te a imbe lovaai oen a cakaw thli lawng a yaak vengah boeih a awmngaih puei u .
42001059	Camawca te hinreet a cuung atah yahhuivuen rett pe ham law u tih ana pa miing Zekhariah miingna seh ti u .
42001060	Tede a manu lawngah , “ Nawh ni ! Johan miingna seh ” a tina .
42001061	Ahimi lawngah Elizabet nala , “ Tetih atah na cakaw khuiah he ang miing he a awm moenih ta ! a tina u .
42001062	Tecoengah ahimi lawng , camoe he ana pa lawng a-u miingna seh a ti kai ti u tih kut oen miknoekna a sai pe u tih a doet u .
42001063	Zekhariah lawng cathutna lungpeel a bih tih , “ A miing tah Johan ni , ” tila a thut . Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u .
42001064	Teveng ruetca maiah Zekhariah tah cal thai koep tih Pathen te a thangpawm pahoei poen .
42001065	Imbe lovaai boeih lawngtah lakueng u , he thaihu kawng awlthang he Judia ram tlaang ah aka awm , khaaw boeih ah te thaang khok .
42001066	He kawng he aka ya tih aka poek thlaang boeih lawng doet u the tih , “ He camaw he metila nuem a awm lah ve ! ” ti u . Metihtiah Bawipa kah huham tharana tah a sawah awm tite atheenla tueng .
42001067	Johan kah ana pa Zekhariah tah Ciim Muithla oen be tih Pathen awl te a thui :
42001068	“ Israel Pathen Bawipa te koeh u lah sih ! Ahih tah a thlaang thli te bawmcem ham oen ah loeih sak hamla law poen .
42001069	Ahih lawngah amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang Devid cadil tha aka ra Thlawnkung avan tuih poen .
42001070	Ahih lawng suenyan veng kalawng amah kah aciim tawngha thli oen awl a kam poen ,
42001071	ahih lawngtah mami he raal kut khui kalawng ah , mami aka thina thlaang boeih kah tharana huham dawng kalawng n'thlawn ai .
42001072	Ahih lawng mami kah patuer thli tengah reenna ka tueng sak vetih amah kah aciim awlkam te ka hilh manawh ” ti .
42001073	Mami he raal kut khui kalawng loeih sak ham oen ah rihsakna awm ohla amah bii te bi hamla mami kah patuer Abraham tengah awltaap oen awl a kam ,
42001075	te tah mami lawng hing khuiah amah haiah ciim acaih tih adoengla awmna ham ni .
42001076	Ka ca , nang tah a Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah tawngha ni ti u ai . Nang tah ahih ham amah kah lawngpui te roekbah hamla Bawipa haiah na cet oepsoeh ai .
42001077	A thlaang thli nala te nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp avan ngai vetih thlawnna na dang u ai tila na thui pe ai .
42001078	Mami kah Pathen tah thlaang reenkung oen thintlawhnakung la awm . Ahih lawngah thlawnna khawse theen te mami sawah avan aang sak vetih ,
42001079	duekna thlip yiinna khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih te vaan kalawng avan thue ai , ngaimawngna lawngpui ah mami he m'mawt ai ” tila a thui .
42001080	Camaw te pumtaksa oen muithla ben ah puer tih roeng hang . Israel thlaang thli tengah langyala a pho thlan vengah ramhum huhang ah te awm .
42002001	Tevengah te Sengpahrang sangluel Awkastas lawng Rom ram pum ah thlaangmi soep hamla awl a peek .
42002002	He kah lamhacuek thlaangmi soepna a sai vengah Kuirinias tah Siria ram ukkung bawi la awm .
42002003	Tedawngah thlaang boeih lawng thlaangmi soepna ah miing peek hamla amami awmna khawpui la te rip cet u .
42002004	Josep tah Galili ram Nazaret khawpui kalawng ah Devid sengpahrang a cuunna huen Judia ram Bethlehem khawpui la te cet . Josep tah Devid cadil la a awm dawngah tela te cet .
42002005	Josep lawng yuna ham amah thlaang kang Meri oen te cet hih . Meri tah tattloel la awm tih ,
42002006	Bethlehem ah a awm hih vengah te camoe awm ham atue te a pha .
42002007	Meri lawng a capa camiing awmthang te a cuun , ahih te poehlaa oen a yaawl tih awkkhawng dawngah te a helh , ahih rawi pahna ham kamyin pahna-im ah ahuen awm nawh .
42002008	Te ram khui pengpang yun kah tuudoen khatsut tah ramhum ah reh u tih amami kah tuu thli te a doen u .
42002009	Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat te ahimi tengah tueng tih Bawipa kah ruep-awmna lawng ahimi te a thue . Ahimi lawng caalla a rih u ;
42002010	tede vanthlaang lawngah ahimi nala te , “ Rih u boel ! Nangmi ham awlthang theen kavan khuen , te awlthang theen lawngah thlaang boeih tengah awmngaihna abo hlang avan khuen ai .
42002011	Tihin ah Devid khawpui khuiah nangmi kah thlawnkung Khrih Bawipa tah thang poen !
42002012	Nangmi lawng na noekna ham tah he tila awm ai : camaw te poehlaa oen a yaawl vetih vaitaw buh beel awkkhawng dawngah a helh te na huh ai , ” a tina .
42002013	Kawlkalhca maiah vaan kah vanthlaang raalkap bu tah vanthlaang thli oen va pho u tih Pathen te laa sak oen a thangpawm u :
42002014	“ Vaan asang koek ah Pathen thangpawm u hawn seh , a lungna thlaang thli a awmna dilai dawngah roepna awm hawn seh , ” tila a thui u .
42002015	Vanthlaang thli ahimi teng kalawng vaan la a mel koep u veng atah tuudoen hue lawng amami pakhat oen khat te “ Bethlehem la cet u silang tah Bawipa lawng mami tengah avan thui thaihu aka thoeng te bueh u sih . ” ti u .
42002016	Tedawngah aloela cet u tih vaitaw awkkhawng dawngah a helh camawca oen ah Meri oen Josep te a huh u .
42002017	Tuudoen thli lawng camaw te a huh u coeng atah vanthlaang thli lawng camaw kawng a thui pe te thlaang thli tengah a thui patoeng u .
42002018	Tuudoen thli lawng a thui te aka ya boeih tah a kawpoek rai u .
42002019	Meri lawng he thaihu boeih he hilh nawh tih te kawng te adung hlangla a poek .
42002020	Tuudoen thli lawng meel koep u tih a yaak boeih oen a huhna boeih dawngah te Pathen thangpawmna laa a sak u ; ahimi tengah vanthlaang lawng a thui pe angla te thoeng tak tak .
42002021	Hinreet cuung tih camaw te yahhuivuen reet ham atue apha veng atah , Jesuh tila miing a sak u . Te tah a manu bung khuiah a suen thlan vengah vanthlaang lawng a sak sut poen ni .
42002022	Mosi kah awlpeek Phungawl angla Josep oen Meri lawng Ciim-acaihna te sai hamla atue te a pha . Tedawngah ahih rawi lawng camaw te Bawipa tengah nawn ham Jerusalem la te a ceh puei .
42002023	Bawipa kah phungawl dawng : “ Camiing tawngpaca boeih tah Bawipa tengah na nawn ai , ” tila a thut .
42002024	Bawipa kah phung awl lawng a kuek angla akhuu bawh at tinawh tah imvuelh akhuu puer pek pheek hih te luciik la thawthueng ham ahih rawi tah cet hih .
42002025	Tevengah te Simeon aka miingna thlaang pakhat te Jerusalem ah awm . Ahih tah thlaangdoeng , Pathen aka rih thlaang la awm tih Israel thlaangphun thlawn la a awmna tue te a ring khuep . Ahih te ciim muithla lawng a awm puei tih ,
42002026	Bawipa kah awlkam Messiah te na huh thlan atah na duek manawh tila Ciim Muithla lawng a thui pe rapcaat .
42002027	Ciim Muithla kah mawtna rang oen Simeon tah Tempal bok-im la cet . Phungawl lawng a kuek te sai hamla a manu oen ana pa lawng camaw Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la avan khuen vengah ,
42002028	Simeon lawng camaw te a kut oen a pawm tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui :
42002029	“ Bawipa , tahe ah na awlkam te na soep sak poen tih na salpa he ngaimawng ngaitoe la nan ceh sak poen ai .
42002030	Nang kah thlawnna te ka mik oen ka huh poen ,
42002031	te tah thlaang boeih haiah namah kah roekbah te ni :
42002032	Gental thlaangphun tengah na kawngaihna aka tueng sak aangna la awm tih na thlaangphun Israel thlaang thli tengah ruep-awmna avan khuenkung la awm . ” tila a thui .
42002033	Simeon lawng ahih kawng te tila a thui dawngah te a manu oen ana pa tah a kawpoek rai hih .
42002034	Simeon lawng ahimi te a phueh asawm tih a manu Meri nala te , “ He camaw tah Israel thlaangphun khuiah thlaang yahawh lawng a rawkna ham oen thlawnna hamla Pathen lawng a tuek poen ni . Ahih tah Pathen kah miknoek la awm tih thlaang lawngah athela a thui u ai ,
42002035	te tila a thui u dawngah amami kah ahuepla poekna boeih te tueng ai . Tecoengah samsen aka hatt angla na kawthena lawng na lungbui te avan thun ai . ” a tina .
42002036	Asher phun , Fanu-el canu , Anna aka miingna huhainu tawngha pakhat awm . Ahih tah kumsarih bueng a vaa oen awm haih hih tih tahe tah a kum sawmreet kumlii awm poen . Ahih lawng Tempal bok-im he nawng aner taak nawh ; Khawyiin khawthaih Pathen a bok , buh a yeh tih thangthui yoeyah .
42002038	Ahih khaw tevengah te avan pha van tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui , Pathen lawng Jerusalem a loeih sak ai tila aka lamtoen thlaang boeih tengah camawca kawng te a thui pe .
42002039	Josep oen Meri lawng , Bawipa kah phungawl lawng akuek boeih a sai coeng atah a awmna Galili ram Nazaret khawpui la te meel koep hih .
42002040	Camaw te roeng hang tih a tha awm hang ; cuihna oen be tih Pathen yotheenna te a sawah awm .
42002041	Kaantaak Poei bur hamla Jesuh a manu oen ana pa he kum roekk ah Jerusalem la cet hih .
42002042	Jesuh he a kum kumha thlaihih vengah a ceh nooek u angla Poei bur ham cet u .
42002043	Poei a boeih coeng atah amah khaw la voei u , tede camaw Jesuh tah Jerusalem ah te awm . Te tila a awm te a manu oen ana pa lawng ming hih nawh ;
42002044	ahih rawi lawngtah aka voei haih thlaang thli oen cet haih cawini tila a poek , tedawngah hin at puet lawngpueng cet u , tecoeng atah a cakaw thli oen a paya thli tim ah te a tlap hih .
42002045	Ahih rawi lawng a huh nawh dawngah Jerusalem la meel koep hih tih a tlap hih .
42002046	Athum hin atah ahih te Tempal bok-im khuiah a huh hih . Ahih tah Judah thlaang thli cangpueikung thli oen ngawl haih u , ahih kah awlthui te a hutung u tih awl a doet u .
42002047	Ahih lawng cuihna oen awl a thung pe te aka ya thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u .
42002048	A manu oen ana pa lawngkhaw a huh hih vengah a kawpoek rai hih van tih a manu lawngah , “ Ka ca , n'tu ah kai hih he tila nan sai ? Na pa oen kai lawngtah lakueng lalapla nang he kan tlap hih ta . ” a tina .
42002049	Jesuh lawng ana pa yuvaa te , “ N'tu ham kai he nan tlap hih ! Kai he a Pa im ah ka awm ti he na ming hih nawh aw ? ” a tina .
42002050	Tede ahih kah awlthungna te ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh .
42002051	Tecoengah Jesuh tah ana pa yuvaa oen haih Nazaret la te meel koep u , te ah te poe awm tih a manu oen ana pa awl te a ngaai pe . A manu lawngah he thaihu boeih he a kaw khuiah a khueh .
42002052	Jesuh tah pumtaksa oen cuihna ben ah roeng hang tih Pathen oen thlaanghing haiah mik-hai theen a dang .
42003001	Sengpahrang sangluel Teberias lawng a ram a ukna kum thlaingaa a law vengah te Pontias Pilat tah Judia ram ukkung la awm , Herod tah Galili ram ukkung la awm tih a manau Filip tah Ituria oen Trakhonitis ram ukkung la awm ; Lisanias tah Abilen ram ukkung la awm tih ,
42003002	Annas oen Kaiafas tah khawsoeih bawi la awm hih . Tevengah ramhum huhang ah aka awm Zekhariah capa Johan tengah Pathen awl te a pha .
42003003	Tedawngah Johan tah Jordan tuiva tengvaai kah ram tawm boeih ah cet tih , “ Na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang u lah , te ah ni na thawlhna te Pathen lawng khawdawp avan ngaai ai , ” tila a thui .
42003004	Tawngha Isaiah kah cabu dawngah a thut angla , “ Thlaang pakhat ramhum huhang ah paang tih : ‘ Bawipa ham lawngpui te oepsoeh la roekbah u lah ; a cehna lawngpui te adoengla sai uh !
42003005	Longhoi boeih te et uh , khawcung rammawl boeih te avan at la sai uh , cehkel lawngken te adoengla sai u lang lawngthe lawnghu te hal thlaula sai uh :
42003006	Thlaangphun boeih lawng Pathen kah thlawnna te a huh ai ! tila a thui . ” a tina te soep .
42003007	Thlaangping lawngah baptisma dang ham Johan tengla te law u . Johan lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi ruul hue , aka law ham koei Pathen kah dantatna kalawng na loeih u thai ai tila a-u lawng avan thui u ?
42003008	Na thawlhna na yut u te thaihu theen saina oen tueng sak uh . Abraham tah mami cuunkung patuer ni tila nangmi lawng thui u mailai tlaih boel . Pathen lawngah he lungto he a lawh vetih Abraham kah cadil la a sai thai ti he kavan thui u !
42003009	Thingkung boeih te ayung ah vung hamla haica te a toen oepsoeh poen ; Athaih theen aka thaih nawh thingkung boeih te a vung vetih hai dawngah a phuum ai . ” a tina .
42003010	Thlaangping lawngah , “ Te tih atah kaimi lawng n'tu ka sai ai ? ” tila a doet u .
42003011	Ahih lawngah , “ Angki yung hih aka khueh lawngah aka khueh nawh thlaang te yung at ah pe seh , caak awkk aka khueh lawngah aka khueh nawh thlaang thli te pe thoem seh . ” a tina .
42003012	Mangmu cawikung thli khatsut tah baptisma dang ham law u tih , “ Saya , kaimi ta n'tu ka sai u ai ? ” a tina u .
42003013	Ahimi nala te , “ Mangmu te cawi ham tuueng lak ah apuehla cawi boel , ” a tina .
42003014	Raalkap khatsut lawngah khaw , “ Kaimi ta , n'tu ka sai u ai ? ” tila ahih te a doet u . Ahih lawngah , “ A-u tengkah khaw tangka te rot boel , a-u khaw asoeng nawh la ngah ngah thawlh peel boel . Namami kah thapang oen na ngaai tluep sak uh . ” a tina .
42003015	Thlaang yahawh lawng Messiah a ngaiuepna te pho koep tih Johan amah he Messiah poen kai aw ti u tih a kawpoek rai u .
42003016	Tedawngah Johan lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma kan peek u , tede thlaang pakhat kai lak ah aka lenduet te law ai . Kai tah ahih kah khawmuek rui Pateng thlam pe hamla ka mueinai nawh . Ahih lawngtah nangmi te Ciim Muithla oen hai oen ah baptisma m'peek ai .
42003017	Ahih lawngah caang yahna raa te a pawm , Caangthaih boeih te a yah vetih caangtak te thaidi khuiah a khueh ai ; tede caanghii te tah aka duek tlaih nawh hai dawngah a phuum ai . ” a tina .
42003018	Johan lawng aphunphun la Awlthang Theen te thlaangping tengah a phawng tih a thawlhna te yut u hamla a thuituen .
42003019	Tede ukkung bawi Herod lawngah a manau yu Herodias te a rot tih a yuna dawngah khawseh , atloe athe thaihu broela a sai dawngah Johan lawng ahih te a siim .
42003020	Tecoengah Herod lawng athe-eep ngaai thaihu te a sai . Johan te thong ah a thlaak .
42003021	Thlaangping lawng baptisma a dang u coeng atah , Jesuh khaw baptisma a dang van . A thangthui vengah te ahih ham vaan te awng u tih ,
42003022	Ciim Muithla tah pumtaksa la akhuu angla te ahih sawah va law thuk . Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawng , “ Nang tah kan lungna ka Capa ni . Na sawah ka ngaai tluep ti . ” tila a thui .
42003023	Jesuh lawng amah kah bii a tong vengah te a kum sawm thum yunyan law poen . thlaang thli lawngtah ahih he Josep capa tila a poek u . Josep tah Heli capa la awm .
42003024	Heli tah Matthat capa , Matthat tah Levi capa , Levi tah Melkhi capa , Melkhi tah Jannai capa , Jannai tah Josep capa ,
42003025	Josep tah Mattathias capa , Mattathias tah Amos capa , Amos tah Nahum Capa , Nahum tah Esli capa , Esli tah Nakkai capa ,
42003026	Nakkai tah Maath capa , Maath tah Mattathias capa , Mattathias tah Semin capa , Semin tah Josek capa , Josek tah Joda capa ,
42003027	Joda tah Joanan capa ; Joanan tah Resa capa ; Resa tah Jerubbabel capa ; Jerubbabel tah Shealtiel capa ; Shealtiel tah Neri capa ;
42003028	Neri tah Melkhi capa ; Melkhi tah Addi capa , Addi tah Kosam capa , Kosam tah Elmadam capa , Elmadam tah Er capa ,
42003029	Er tah Joshua capa , Joshua tah Elizer capa , Elizer tah Jorim capa , Jorim tah Matthat capa , Matthat tah Levi capa ;
42003030	Levi tah Simeon capa , Simeon tah Judah capa , Judah tah Josep capa , Josep tah Jonam capa , Jonam tah Eliakim capa ,
42003031	Eliakim tah Melia capa , Melia tah Menna capa , Menna tah Mattatha capa , Mattatha tah Nathan capa , Nathan tah Devid capa ,
42003032	Devid tah Jesi capa , Jesi tah Obed capa , Obed tah Boaz capa , Boaz tah Salmon capa , Salmon tah Nashon capa ,
42003033	Nashon tah Amminadab capa , Amminadab tah Admin capa , Admin tah Arni capa , Arni tah Hezron capa , Hezron tah Perez capa , Perez tah Judah capa ,
42003034	Judah tah Jakob capa , Jakob tah Isak capa , Isak tah Abraham capa , Abraham tah Terah capa , Terah tah Nahor capa ,
42003035	Nahor tah Seruk capa , Seruk tah Riu capa , Riu tah Pelek capa , Pelek tah Eba capa , Eba tah Shelah capa ,
42003036	Shelah tah Kainan capa , Kainan tah Arpaksad capa , Arpaksad tah Shem capa , Shem tah Noah capa , Noah tah Lamek capa ,
42003037	Lamek tah Metuselah capa , Metuselah tah Enok capa , Enok tah Jared capa , Jared tah Mahalaleel capa , Mahalaleel tah Kenan capa ,
42003038	Kenan tah Enos capa , Enos tah Seth capa , Seth tah Adam capa , Adam tah Pathen Capa ni .
42004001	Jesuh tah Ciim Muithla oen ah betoetla Jordan tuiva kalawng va meel , tecoengah Muithla lawng ramhum huhang la te a ceh puei ,
42004002	te ah te Raaibawi lawng khawhin sawmlii khui puet ah ahih te a suek ahalh . Teveng khui puet ah n'tu khaw ca nawh , tedawngah atloeih lam atah a bung pawng .
42004003	Raaibawi lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang he Pathen Capa tangtang atah he lungto he takawi la a coenggna ham awl thlaw lah . ” a tina .
42004004	Tede Jesuh lawngah , “ Caciim lawngah , ‘ Thlaanghing he buh bueng oen ah hing thai nawh ? ’ tila a thui ” a tina .
42004005	Tecoengah Raaibawi lawng a ceh puei tih apabe atah dilai dawngkah ram boeih te a huh sak .
42004006	Raaibawi lawng , “ Huham tharana boeih oen he kah bawi areng kuirangna boeih he nang kan pe ai , he ang thli boeih he ka kut dawngah peek la awm poen tih kai lawng ka tuek thlaang te ka peek thai .
42004007	Tedawngah nang lawng kai he nan bok atah he ang thli boeih he nang ham poen ni , ” a tina .
42004008	Jesuh awng , “ Caciim lawngah , “ Bawipa na Pathen bueng te ni na bok vetih ahih bueng kah bii te ni na bi ai , ’ tila a thui , ” a tina .
42004009	Tecoengah Raaibawi lawng Jerusalem la te a ceh puei , Tempal bok-im kah imphu ah te a khueh tih , “ Nang he Pathen Capa tang atah he kalawng ah sungpung thuk lah .
42004010	Metihtiah Caciim lawng , ‘ Nang te khoemdoen hamla Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang thli te avan tuih ai , ’ ti .
42004011	‘ Na khow Pateng khaw lungto dawng na khuek nawh ham ahimi lawng a kut oen te m'pawm ai , ’ tila a thui . ” a tina .
42004012	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Caciim lawngah , ‘ Bawipa na Pathen te noekdak boel ’ tila a thui , ” a tina .
42004013	Jesuh te Raaibawi lawng soeprepla a suek a halh coeng atah kawlkalh tah a nawng taak .
42004014	Tecoengah Jesuh tah Galili la meel tih Ciim Muithla kah huham tharana tah ahih sawah awm . Ahih kawng awlthang te te kah pengpang boeih ah thaang khonghak .
42004015	Ahih lawng sinakok ah a cang puei tih thlaang boeih lawng a koeh u .
42004016	Tecoengah Jesuh te amah apuer ayawngna Nazaret khawpui la cet tih Sabbath hin atah a ceh nooek angla Sinakok la te cet . Caciim te tae hamla ahih te pai hang ,
42004017	tawngha Isaiah kah cayaawl te a peek u , ahih lawng cayaawl te a thlam tih he tila a thutna hue te a huh ,
42004018	“ Bawipa kah Muithla tah ka sawah awm , metihtiah khawdeng lungma thli tengah awlthang theen thui hamla ahih lawng kai he n'tuek poen . Sal la a khawh khaklal thlaang thli tengah loeihna te thui hamla , mikpum haiying thli a mik a tueng koepna ham ; Heemtekna patang khang thlaang thli a loeihna ham ,
42004019	Bawipa lawng a thlaang thli a thlawnna tue tah avan pha poen , tila phawng hamla kai he n'tuek poen , ” tila a thut te a tae .
42004020	Jesuh lawng cayaawl te a yaawl tih aka khoemkung kut ah te a peek koep tih ngawl . Sinakok khuikah thlaang boeih lawng mikkhah ohla ahih te ringg a bueh u ,
42004021	ahimi nala te , “ Caciim dawngkah ka tae awl te tihin ah soep poen . ” a tina .
42004022	Ahih kah awl thui lawng ahimi boeih kah thinkaw khuek adeng tih ahih lawng awl theen kaa theen a thui te a kawpoek la rai u tangkiik . Ahimi lawngah , “ Ahih he Josep capa nawh aw ? ” ti u .
42004023	Ahimi nala te , “ Tatuk awl dawngah , ‘ Siibawipa , namah oen namah te tuui-ahaai u lah , ” tila a thui awl te kamah he nan tina u lettat ai tite ka ming . Kapernaum khaaw ah na sai tila ka yak u thaihu te ang van te kamah khaaw ah he sai van lah , ’ tila nan tina u ai .
42004024	He he kavan thui u , “ Tawngha he amah a awmna khaaw ah do u nooek nawh .
42004025	Ka thui he hutung u lah ; Elijah dung vengah kum thum coengah kum vangg ah khaw kaang tih ram pum ah khawthe khawkha vengah te Israel ram khuiah huhai tumtee broela awm tang tang .
42004026	Elijah he Israel ram kah a-u huhai khat tengah khaw tuih nawh , tede Sidon ram kah Zarefat khaaw ah aka awm huhai teng bueng ah ni a tuih .
42004027	Tawngha Elisha dung vengah te Israel ram kah thlaang yahawh tah lungkiit haibe natna a khueh u ; ahimi timkah a-u khat khaw hoeih nawh de Siria ram kah Naaman pakhat bueng tah hoeih . ” a tina .
42004028	Sinakok ah aka awm thlaang thli lawng a yaak vengah a thin toek u .
42004029	Ahimi lawngah tho u tih Jesuh te khawpui khui kalawng adaubenla a mawt u tih pu-ngaw pathleng ah tulh voek ham khawpui a phuengna tlaangpoer la te a khuen u ,
42004030	tede ahih tah thlaangping tim ah te yingyelh tih cet vik .
42004031	Tecoengah Jesuh tah Galili ram , Kapernaum la te cet , te ah te Sabbath hin ah thlaangping te a cang puei .
42004032	Ahih lawng saithaina aana oen a thui dawngah ahih kah cangpueina te ahimi boeih a kawpoek la rai u .
42004033	Sinakok khuiah te raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang pakhat awm ; ahih lawng angaihhlangla paang tih ,
42004034	“ Aah ! Nazaret Jesuh , kaimi he metila kan tina ai na ti ? Kaimi he phe ham aw na law ? Nang he a-u tite kan ming : nang tah Pathen kah aciim laipai ni ! ” a tina .
42004035	Jesuh lawng raaithe nala te , “ Awl muehla te kah thlaang kaw khui kalawng cet loeih ! ” tila awl a peek . Raaithe lawngah te kah thlaang te ahimi haiah te a tlim sak tih nganbawh peek muehla ahih kah a kaw khui kalawng cet .
42004036	Thlaang boeih te a kawpoek la rai tih pakhat oen pakhat , “ He awl he me ang awl kai ? He thlaang lawngah ahu-aham oen raaithe thli awl a peek tih ahimi tah cet khonghak u mai ! ” ti u .
42004037	Tecoeng atah te kah pengpang ram pum ah Jesuh kawng te thaang khonghak poen .
42004038	Jesuh tah sinakok kalawng suntla tih Simon im la te cet . Simon kah a mase hutaa te tlo malcal tih ahih kawng te Jesuh tengah a thui pe u .
42004039	Jesuh lawng cet tih ahih tengah te pai tih tlawh anatna kalawng hoeih loeih a tina . Tevengah a sanat te hoeih , tho pahoei tih ahimi te a do adan .
42004040	Khaw a tlaak thuk coeng atah tlawh natna soeprep oen aka tlo thli te a paya thli lawngah Jesuh tengla avan law puei u ; ahimi pakhat rip sawah te a kut a tloeng pe tih ahimi boeih te a hoeih sak .
42004041	Raaithe thli lawngkhaw thlaang yahawh hlang kah a kaw khui kalawng co u tih , “ Nang tah Pathen Capa ni , ” tila paang u . Raaithe thli lawng ahih te Messiah ni tila a ming u dawngah ahimi te awl cal nawh ham Jesuh lawng awl a peek .
42004042	Khaw athaih khoeng atah ading apuekna huen benla te khawpui khui kalawng ah cet . Thlaangping lawng ahih te a tlap u tih a huh u veng atah ahimi te ceh taak nawh hamla a thlawh u .
42004043	Tede ahimi nala te , “ Pathen kah Ram kawng Awlthang Theen he atloe khawpui ah khaw ka phawng ham awm , te tila aka thui ham ni Pathen lawng Kai he n'tuih . ” a tina .
42004044	Tedawngah ram pum kah sinakok bok-im ah te phung a thui .
42005001	Hin at ah Jesuh tah Kenisaret Tuilii-keeng ah a pai vengah te thlaangping lawng Pathen awl hutung hamla ahih tengah te toklekla la law u .
42005002	Tevengah tuikeeng ah lowng pahih a kiing u te a huh ; tuihawi thli lawng lowng te a ceh taak u tih amami kah lok thli te a suk u .
42005003	Jesuh lawng Simon kah lowng khuiah te kuun tih tuikeeng kalawng tuilii benla lowng te a thoeih sak . Jesuh te lowng khuiah ngawl tih thlaangping te a cang puei .
42005004	Ahih lawng awl a thui coeng atah Simon nala te , “ Tuilii dung benla lowng te tulh langtah na paya thli oen lok te voei u lah . ” a tina .
42005005	Simon lawng , “ Bawipa , khawyiin puet ah lok ka heeng khiing u poen de nga khat khaw ka tu u nawh . Tede nang awl ah ka heeng u de lah ai , ” a tina .
42005006	Lok te a heeng u atah nga yahawh khuengdeng te a tuuk u tih lok te thok pawn tawm .
42005007	Tedawngah atloe lowng dawngah aka awm a paya thli te a kut oen a yavaih u tih law u lang m'bawm uh a tina . Ahimi te law u tih lowng pahih dawngah nga te abetoet la a sang u tih tui dawngah lowng te buekk dalh .
42005008	Simon Piter lawng tete a huh vengah Jesuh haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih , “ Bawipa , Kai he thlaangthawlh ni , n'ceh taak mai hawn ! ” a tina .
42005009	Nga te yahawh khuengdeng a tuuk u dawngah Piter amah oen aka awm haih thli tah a kaw poek rai u .
42005010	Simon oen nga aka tu haih Zebedi ca rawi Jeem oen Johan a puei rawi te khaw a kawpoek rai hih van . Jesuh lawng , “ Rih boel ; tahe kalawng tah thlaang tukung la na awm ai . ” a tina .
42005011	Ahimi lawngah lowng te tuikeeng la a doek u coeng atah soeprep boeih te a ceh tak u tih Jesuh hu ah bang u .
42005012	Vaikhat ah Jesuh tah haibe natna lawng a caak kawlsawp thlaang pakhat a awmna khaw ah te awm . Ahih lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah dilai dawngah buekuep tih reenna a bih , “ Bawipa na kawngaih atah haibe natna he navan ciing sak thai ! ” a tina .
42005013	Jesuh lawng a kut a thueng tih ahih te a tek , “ Ka ngaih ta , hoeih hawn loeih . ” a tina . Kawlkalh ah te thlaang te haibe natna hoeih pahoei .
42005014	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ A-u tengah khaw thui boel , tede khawsoeih tengla cet phaat langtah ahih lawng nang he n'yutt n'yam seh ; tecoengah na hoeih poen tite thlaang boeih lawng a mingna ham Mosi kah awlpeek angla luciik thawthuengna te sai . ” a tina .
42005015	Tede Jesuh kawng te tah thaang tare tih rangpui thlaangping lawng ahih kah awl thui te yaak hamla law u tih ahimi kah tlawhnatna te a hoeih pe sak .
42005016	Tede ahih tah ading asuekna huen la te cet tih te ah te thangthui .
42005017	Hin at ah Jesuh lawng a cang puei u lii vengah te Galili oen Judah ram kah khawpui boeih oen Jerusalem kalawng aka law Farasi thlaang khatsut oen phungawl cangpueikung thli te ngawl u . Thlaangtlo hoeih sakna hamla Bawipa kah huham tharana tah Jesuh tengah awm .
42005018	Thlaang khatsut lawngah aka khawn thlaang pakhat te a himbai phaih dawngah avan kawh u , ahih te Jesuh haiah khueh pe ham im khuila khuen hamla te a yawm u .
42005019	Thlaang ayahawh aih dawngah im khuila khuen u thai nawh . Tedawngah ahih te imphu la a khuen u tih imphu te a bauh u , tecoengah thlaangping lakli Jesuh haiah thlaangtlo te himbai phaih dawngah a thlaak thuk u .
42005020	He tih aih la ahimi lawng oengna a khueh u te Jesuh lawng a huh vengah aka khawn thlaang nala te , “ Ka puei , na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen . ” a tina .
42005021	Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng , “ Pathen thekhana awl aka thui he kah thlaang he a-u ? Pathen pakhat bueng lawng ni thawlhna khawdawp a ngaai thai ta ! ” tila ahimi lawng a poek u .
42005022	Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te thiim a ming tih ahimi nala te , “ N'tu ah te ang thaihu te na poek u ?
42005023	‘ Na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaai la awm poen , ’ tihnawhtah , ‘ Tho lang cet loeih ’ tila thui he aw aka yoei bet kai ?
42005024	Tedawngah Thlaanghing Capa lawng dilai dawng thawlh khawdawp ngaai thaina aana a khueh tite nangmi kan ming sak u ai . ” a tina . Tedawngah aka khawn thlaang te , “ Tho loeih , namah kah himbaiphaih he lo langtah namah im la cet loeih , kan tina he ! ” a tina .
42005025	Te thlaang lawngah ahimi boeih haiah pai pahoei , a ralhna himbai phaih te a lawh koeloe , Pathen te a tih koeh im la te cet .
42005026	Ahimi boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik ! Ahimi lawng rih oen thuen ruila Pathen te a thangpawm u , “ Tihin atah kawpoek rai tangkiik thaihu te mami lawng n'huh u poen , ” tila a thui u .
42005027	He coengah te cet tih mangmu cawikung Levi aka miingna amah kah yung im ah aka ngawl te a huh . Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Ka hu ah baang lah ” a tina .
42005028	Levi lawng tho tih soeprep boeih te a ceh taak tih a hu ah koe a vai .
42005029	Tecoengah Levi lawng amah im ah buh veelna poei Jesuh ham a sai pe tih kamyin kamlai tim ah mangmu cawikung thli oen atloe thlaang thli te awm u .
42005030	Farasi thlaang khatsut oen amami bu khuiah aka thuum van Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut lawng Jesuh kah hubang thli tengah te caitoek u tih , “ N'tu ah nangmi lawng mangmu cawikung hue oen thlaangthawlh thli oen ah buh te na caak na awkk haih u ? ” a tina u .
42005031	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Sading thlaang lawngah siibawi ngoe nawh , tede thlaangtlo bueng lawng ni angoe a tina .
42005032	Kai tah thlaangdoeng thli te khue ham oen ah thawlh yut sak ham ka law nawh tih thlaangthawlh thli te khue ham oen ah thawlh yut sak ham ni ka law . ” a tina .
42005033	Thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala , “ Johan kah hubang thli lawngtah buh a yeh u poepa tih thangthui u , tecoengah Farasi hue kah hubang thli lawngkhaw te tila te a sai u van ; tede nang kah hubang thli lawngtah a caak a awkk u mai nawh pai he . ” a tina u .
42005034	Jesuh lawngah , “ Yuluipoei ah poei aka bur thlaang thli te yulokung oen a awm haih khuiah ahimi te buh a yeh sak ai tila na poek u aw ? Buh yeh sak manawh !
42005035	Tede yulokung te ahimi teng kalawng athlala a khuenna khawhin te a pha ai , tevengah ahimi lawng buh a yeh u badai ” a tina .
42005036	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he khaw a thui pe : “ A-u lawngkhaw angki aruem te hisa athai oen ah baw nawh , angki aruem te hisa athaai oen a baw atah hisa athaai te angki aruem oen ah roepcap manawh .
42005037	A-u lawngkhaw misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap aruem dawngah thloen nooek nawh , metihtiah misurtui athaai lawngah saphaw yuukhap te a pawkk sak vetih misurtui khaw ceu thloep ai , saphaw te khaw pawn ai .
42005038	Te lak atah misurtui athaai te saphaw yuukhap athaai thik dawngah thloen ham awm !
42005039	A-u lawngkhaw misurtui aruem te a awkk coeng atah misurtui athaai te ngaih tlaih nawh . Misurtui aruem te tah tuui ngaai . ” tila a thui pe .
42006001	Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng loha lakli kalawng ah te cet . A hubang hue lawngah caangvui te a yuun u , a kut oen a nawi u tih a caak u .
42006002	Farasi thlaang khatsut lawngah , “ Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah sai nawh hamla a thui te n'tu ah nangmi lawng na sai u ? ” tila a doet .
42006003	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Devid oen a thlaang thli lawng a bung a pawng u vengah n'tu a sai tite ca na tae nooek u nawh aw ?
42006004	Ahih lawng Pathen im khuila cet tih , Pathen tengah a nawn u takawi te a lawh tih a caak , tecoengah amah kah thlaang thli te khaw a peek . Khawsoeih hue bueng lawng a caak thai takawi , ahimi lawng a caak te mami kah Phungawl oen kalh u teta ! ” a tina .
42006005	Tecoengah awlcuina ah Jesuh lawng , “ Thlanghing capa tah Sabbath Bawi ni ” a tina .
42006006	Atloe Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh tah Sinakok bok-im la te cet tih a cang puei . Te ah te a bantang kut aka kheem thlaang pakhat awm .
42006007	Khatsut Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang vaang hue lawngah Jesuh kah a sai he soeng nawh tila thawlh peel ham a ngaih u , tedawngah Sabbath khawhin ah kut kheem te a hoeih sak lah ai nuem tite huh hamla rep a doen u .
42006008	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te a ming tih kut kheem thlaang nala te , “ Pai langtah hai benla he law lah , ” a tina . Te thlaang lawng tho hang tih pai .
42006009	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Awl kan doet u lah ai : Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah mami he n'tu sai sak ham a ngaih ? Thlaang bawm ham aw , tihnawhtah nganbawh peek ham aw ? Thlaang kah hingna thlawn ham aw , tihnawhtah phe ham aw ? ” a tina .
42006010	Jesuh lawng a teng-avai ah te mang tih a dan ; tecoengah te thlaang nala te , “ Na kut te thueng lah ” a tina . A hih lawng a thui angla a sai tih a kut te koep theen .
42006011	Ahimi te a thin sa soeh u tih Jesuh he metila n'sai lah ai tite a thui u .
42006012	Tecoengah Jesuh te thangthui hamla tlaang la cet tih te ah te yiin at puet Pathen tengah thangthui .
42006013	Khaw athaih atah a hubang thli te a tengla a khue tih ahimi timkah paha thlaihih te a tuek , te thli te Celtuih tila miing a sak :
42006014	Ahimi hue kah a miing tah , Simon ( Piter tila khaw a thui u ) oen a manau Andru ; Jeem oen Johan , Filip oen Bartalomiu ;
42006015	Matthai oen Tawmas , Alfias capa Jeem oen Simon ( Phunkuup a ti u te ) ,
42006016	Jeem capa Judas oen paipi thleepkung Judas Iskariot , he hue he ni .
42006017	Jesuh tah celtuih thli oen tlaang kalawng rum thuk u tih dilai avan at na ah a hubang thlaang broe oen ah te pai u . Te kah thlaangping yahawh hlang te tah Judia peng pum oen Jerusalem kalawng ah , tuivakeeng kah khawpui Taiar oen Sidon kah aka law thlaang thli ni ;
42006018	ahimi lawngah a awl thui te yaak ham oen ah a tlawhna te hoeih sak ham a ngaih u dawngah law u . Raaithe lawng khawdeng a peek thlaang thli khaw law u tih hoeih u .
42006019	Ahih kah huham tharana te a pum dawng kalawng pooeng tih ahimi te a hoeih sak dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ahih te tek ham a yawm u .
42006020	Jesuh lawng a hubang thli te a bueh tih , “ Nangmi khawdeng thlaang thli tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u ; Pathen Ram tah nangmi ham ni !
42006021	“ Tahe ah buh mueh buhpawng la aka awm thli tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u ; Nangmi tah na bung hah ai ! Tahe ah aka ruungrap nangmi hue tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u ; nangmi nuihcalna te awm badai !
42006022	Thlaanghing Capa kawngah nangmi te thlaang lawngah n'thina u tih n'hoett sut u , n'sal aphaam tih athela n'thui u atah nangmi tah yotheen kam-awmna na dawng u !
42006023	“ Te tila n'sai u atah na kaw hoe sak lang awmngaih oen laam u lah , metihtiah vaan ah nangmi ham kutdo alentloe te avan khueh poen . Metihtiah tetih van la te ahimi kah patuer thli lawng tawngha thli te a sai u roe poen .
42006024	“ Tede tahe ah nangmi kuirang thlaanglen thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik mai mah aw ; nangmi tah hingkhui awmtheenna na boenn u poen !
42006025	Tahe ah bung aka hah thlaang thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik mai mah aw ; nangmi tah buhmueh buhpawng la oen na van ai ! Tahe ah nangmi aka nui aka cal thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw ; nangmi tah lungnat yaak oen na rap u ai !
42006026	Thlaang lawng nangmi te n'koeh u vengah te khawmap tangkiik mah aw ; ahimi kah patuer thli lawng te tila ni tawngha rawlrap thli te a koeh u van .
42006027	“ Tede ka awl he aka hutung nangmi tengah kavan thui u : Na raal te lungna u lah , nangmi aka thina thlaang thli hamla theenna te sai pe uh ,
42006028	Nangmi aka tapvoep thli te yotheenna pe u langtah nangmi thekhana thlaang thli ham thangthui pe uh .
42006029	Thlaang lawngah na beeng khatben te avan bel atah khatben te khaw bel sak baal ; pakhat lawngah asawkah na buen angki te avan lawh atah adangkah na buen angki te khaw pe hawn .
42006030	Na tengah thaihu aka bih thlaang te pe u langtah pakhat khat lawng na thaihu te a lawh atah bih koep boel .
42006031	Thlaang lawng na sawah van sai seh tila na ngaih van angla thlaangtloe sawah khaw sai van .
42006032	Nang aka lungna thlaang bueng te na lungna atah metila yotheen kam-awmna te dang hamla na poek ? Thlaangthawlh thli lawngkhaw ahimi aka lungna te a lungna van ta !
42006033	Tecoengah nang ham theenna aka sai thlaang bueng sawah theenna te na sai atah n'tu ah yotheen kam-awmna te dang ham na poek ? Thlaangthawlh thli lawng Pateng te tila a sai u van ta !
42006034	Aka sah thai koep ham na ngaaiuep thlaang bueng tengah thaihu te na pu atah n'tu ah yotheen kam-awmna te dang hamla na poek ? Thlaangthawlh thli lawng Pateng ataring ah dang koep hamla thlaangthawlh thli te thaihu a pu van ta !
42006035	Nangmi lawngtah te tila sai boel ! Na raal thli te lungna langtah ahimi sawah theenna te sai peh ; thaihu te pu u lah , dang koep ham ngaiuep hanlan tlaih boel . Nangmi lawng alentloe kutdo na dang u vetih Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah ca anau la na awm u ai . Metihtiah ahih tah lungvatna aka ming nawh oen thlaangthaipalat thlaang thli sawah theenna te a sai pe .
42006036	Nangmi kah na Pa lawng thlaang reenna kaw a poek van angla nangmi lawngkhaw thlaang reenna kaw te poek uh .
42006037	“ Thlaangtloe te awl cek boel , tetih atah Pathen lawng nangmi te awl n'cek van manawh ; thlaangtloe te sal-aphaam boel , tetih atah Pathen lawng nangmi te n'sal-aphaam van manawh ; thlaangtloe sawah khawdawp ngaai u lah , tetih atah Pathen lawng na sawah khawdawp a ngaai van ai .
42006038	Thlaangtloe te do a dan u lah , Pathen lawng nangmi te n'dodan van ai : Atak tang ni , abetoet la avan loeng ai , apueh asawm la te na dang ai , na kut dawngah avan lun vetih na phueih tloel toela m'peek ai . Nang lawng thlaangtloe ham na hawna loengkhong te ang van te Pathen lawng nang ham a hawna van ai ” a tina .
42006039	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng he tila thuidoetna awl a thui pe : “ Mikpum pakhat lawng atloe mikpum pakhat te mawt thai nawh ; a mawt atah pahih bok la ungrawm khuiah tla ai .
42006040	Sengcamoe he cangpueikung saya lak ah thoem soeh aih nawh ; tede sengcamoe boeih lawng amami kah cangna te a coeng boeih atah a saya angla awm ai .
42006041	Namah mik khuiah thingboeng aka awm te poek ohla n'tu ah na boenhui thli mik dawngkah muenmawi te na bueh ?
42006042	Namah mik khuiah aka awm thingboeng Pateng khaw na huh thai nawh maiah na maya manau nala te , ‘ Na mik dawngkah muenmawi te kavan lo ai ne ? ’ na tina . Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Lamhacuek la namah mik dawngkah thingboeng te lo , tecoengah na maya manau mik khuikah muenmawi te lawh pe ham atheenla na huh thai ai . ” a tina .
42006043	Thingkung theen lawng athaih the te thaih nawh , thingkung the lawngkhaw athaih theen te thaih nawh .
42006044	Thingkung boeih he athaih apai oen ming thai la awm ; nangmi lawngah thliingkung dawngkah thaidut thaih te na bit u nooek nawh , thliingkung dawng-kah misur thaih khaw na bit u nawh .
42006045	Thlaang theen lawngtah a thinkaw lungbui khuikah thaihu theen a tung asep khui kalawng atheen thaihu te a thoeng sak ; thlaangthe lawngtah thaihu the a tung asep te a thoeng sak . Metihtiah thinkaw khuiah abetoet te hui a kaa lawng a thui .
42006046	“ Kai lawng kavan thui te tah na sai u nawh maiah , n'tu ah nangmi lawng , ‘ Bawipa , Bawipa ’ nan tina u ?
42006047	A-u khaw ka tengah law tih ka awl thui a hutung tih aka vai tah n'tu oen a lawh u tite kan huh sak u ai .
42006048	Ahih tah tuungrawm te adungla a to tih lungnu dawngah tuung acakla aka liing im sakung oen lo u . Tuivatui te alen atah te kah im te tui lawng a liw tih a linglok , tede im te acakla a sak dawngah im tah hinghuen nawh .
42006049	Tede a-u khaw ka awl he a yaak tih aka vai nawh thlaang te tah tuungrawm te adungla to nawh tih imtuung acakla aka sut nawh , im aka sa coplap thlaang oen lo u ; tuiliw lawngah te im te aningnoek vengah tlim pahoei ; metihtlukla rih ham a awm ! ” a tina .
42007001	Jesuh lawng he awl boeih he thlaangping tengah a thui boet coengah Kapernaum khaaw la te cet .
42007002	Te kah aka awm Rom raalbawi lawngah a lungna tangkiik tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat a khueh . Te thlaang te tlo tih duek tawm .
42007003	Te kah raalbawi lawng Jesuh kawng te a yaak vengah Judah ahaamca thli te a tuih tih a tuihyoeihthlaang te hoeih sak hamla a ceel sak .
42007004	Ahimi te Jesuh tengla law u tih reenna te caalla a bih u , “ He thlaang he na bawm roeroe hamla angoe .
42007005	Ahih lawngah mami phun he a lungna tih kaimi ham sinakok pakhat avan sak . ” a tina u .
42007006	Tedawngah Jesuh te ahimi oen cet haih u tih , im te a pha tawm u atah raalbawipa lawngah a paya thli te avan tuih tih , “ Bawipa , patang palai tlap boel . Ka im la nang na law ham ka koeih ka vaih nawh ,
42007007	na tengla kamah law hamla khaw ka ting ka tawkk nawh tila ka poek u . Na awl mah thlaw doek mai , kai kah tuihyoeih-thlaang he hoeih mai badai .
42007008	Kai khaw ka sawkah bawi haam thli kut huiah ka awm tih kai kah kut huiah raalkap thli awm patoeng van baal . Kai lawngah pakhat khat te , “ Cet lah ! ” ka tina atah cet tih atloe pakhat te , ‘ Law lah ! ’ ka tina atah va law , ka salpa te he he sai lah ka tina atah a sai , ” tila te a thui sak u .
42007009	Jesuh lawng he awl he a yaak vengah a kawpoek la rai , amah huvai thlaangping tengla te maang dak phai tih , “ Ataktang kavan thui u , he ang oengna he Israel thlaang thli tim ah Pateng khaw ka hu thlan hun ! ” a tina .
42007010	A thlaangtuih thli te raalbawipa im la meel u tih a tuihyoeihthlaang sadingla a awm te a huh u .
42007011	Tecoeng adiw thlan ah Jesuh te Nain a ti u khawpui la te cet , a hubang thli oen thlaangping lawngah a hu ah a vai u .
42007012	Khawpui vawngka te a pha khoeng vengah rawkk aka thak thlaangping te law u . Aka duek thlaang te tah huhainu kah a capa pakhatca bueng la a awm dawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang yahawh hlang te huhainu oen haih law u .
42007013	Bawipa lawng te kah huhainu te a huh vengah a reen tangkiik tih ahih nala te , “ Rap tlaih boel ” a tina .
42007014	Tecoengah Jesuh te cet phai tih repp te a tek , tevengah rawkk aka kawt thlaang thli te cot pai u . Jesuh lawng , “ Cadawng tawngpang ! Tho hang lah , kan tina he ! ” a tina .
42007015	Thlaangduek te ngawl tih awl a thui , tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahih te a manu tengah koep a peek .
42007016	Ahimi boeih lawng rih ruila Pathen te a thangpawm u . “ Aka lenduet tawngha tah mami tim ah thoeng poen , Pathen tah a thlaang thli thlawn hamla law poen ! ” tila te ahimi lawng a thui u .
42007017	He awlthang Jesuh kawng he Judah ram pum oen a teng-avai ram boeih ah thang khonghak .
42007018	He thaihu boeih kah akawng alam he a hubang thli lawng Johan tengah a thui pe u , tedawngah ahimi timkah laipai pahih te a khue tih ,
42007019	Bawipa te doet sak hamla a tuih , “ Nang he Johan lawngah aka law ham koei thlaang a tite nang poen aw , tihnawhtah kaimi lawng thlaangtloe te ka ngaiuep u hun ai aw ? ” tila te a doet sak .
42007020	Jesuh teng apha hih vengah ahih rawi lawng , “ Johan lawngah aka law ham koei thlaang a tite nang he poen aw , tihnawhtah kaimi lawng thlaangtloe ka ngaiuep u hun ai aw , ’ tila doet sak hamla kaihih he n'tuih ” a tina .
42007021	Tevengah te Jesuh lawng thlaang-thli kah a tlawhna , natna oen raaithe lawng a kuun thil thlaang thli te a hoeih sak tih mikpum thlaang broe te khaw mik a tueng sak koep .
42007022	Jesuh lawng Johan kah thlaangtuih laipai rawi nala te , “ Cet koep hih langtah na huh boeih oen na yaak boeih he Johan tengah thui pe hih : mikpum thli a mik tueng poen , khowkheem khowbai thli cet thai poen , lungkiit haibe natna aka tlo thli anatna ciing boeih poen , haapang lailot thli lawng awl a yaak poen , thlaangduek tho koep poen , Awlthang Theen he khawdeng lungma thlaang thli tengah a thui u poen .
42007023	Kai kah kawng alam dawngah ngaithliwhna aka khueh nawh tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni ! tila thui pe ” a tina .
42007024	Johan kah laipai rawi te a mel koep coeng atah , Jesuh lawng Johan kawng te thlaang rangpui tengah a thui : “ Nangmi lawng ramhum huhang ah Johan tengla na ceh u te , n'tu huh hamla na ngaiuep u ? Yilh lawng a yawng mailai caapu thing te huh ham aw na ngaiuep u ?
42007025	Nangmi lawng n'tu huh hamla na ceh u ? Hinaak himbai atheen theen oen aka thoekcau u te huh hamla aw ? Te tila hi-acuu atheen theen phutlo oen thloeih cah u tih thayoeidoh la aka awm tah sengpahrang impui ah ni a awm u !
42007026	Nangmi lawng n'tu huh ngaih ah na ceh u , van thui u lah ? Tawngha te huh ngaih ah aw ? Tetih tangtang pai ni , tede nangmi lawngah tawngha lak ah aka lenduet na huh u poen he ta .
42007027	Metihtiah Johan he tah caciim lawngah , “ Pathen lawng nang hamla lawngpui roekbahkung na haiah laipai kavan tuih ai , ’ tila a thui thlaang te ni . ” a tina .
42007028	Jesuh lawng , “ Johan lak ah aka lenduet a-u khat khaw awm nawh hun tila kavan thui u . Tede Pathen ram khuiah ayiit koek la aka awm thlaang te Johan lak ah lenduet ngai . ” a tina .
42007029	Te tila a thui te thlaang rangpui lawng a yaak u : ahimi oen ah , awlpui ngaaila mangmu cawikung thli tah Pathen lawng a kuek doengna te aka vai thlaang la awm u tih Johan lawng baptisma te a peek u .
42007030	Tede Farasi thlaang thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung hue lawngtah ahimi ham Pathen kah kamthlahna te a hoett u tih Johan kah baptisma te dang hamla te a thana u .
42007031	Jesuh lawng a awlthui te a tom koep tih , “ Tahe san kah thlaang thli he n'tu oen ah ni ka nuehtah lah ai ? Ahimi he n'tu oen a lawh u ?
42007032	Ahimi he tah thaihu yoeihna huen ah aka ngawl camaw thli oen lo u . Thloep at la aka awm hue lawngah atloe thloep at hue nala te , “ Kaimi lawngah yuluina riingding kavan tum u , tede na laam u nawh ! Kaimi lawng rawkktoetna laa khaw kavan sak u de na rap u nawh ! ’ aka ti u the camaw hue oen na lo u .
42007033	Baptisma pekung Johan te law tih buh a yeh , misurtui khaw aw nawh , tevengah nangmi lawng , ‘ Johan te raaithe lawng a kuun thil ! ’ na ti u .
42007034	Thlaanghing Capa lawngah law tih a caak , a awkk , tevengah nangmi lawng , ‘ He thlaang he bueh u lah ! caruut aw lam thlaang ni , mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaangthawlh thli kah paya ni ! ’ na ti u .
42007035	Tecakhaw , Pathen kah cuihna tah soeng tangtang tila aka do thlaang boeih lawng a tueng sak ” a tina .
42007036	Farasi thlaang pakhat lawng thlem buh veel haih hamla Jesuh te a khue , Jesuh te ahih im la cet tih buh caak hamla te ngawl thuk .
42007037	Te kah khawpui khuiah te aka thawlh tangkiik hutaa pakhat awm . Te kah hutaa lawngah Farasi thlaang kah im ah Jesuh buh a caak tite a yaak , tedawngah alabasta um at dawngah riimtuui abepirla avan khuen tih ,
42007038	Jesuh kah a hu ben a khowkung ah te pai , rap tih a mikphitui te Jesuh khow dawngah a cip sak . Tecoengah a khow te a sam oen a thuut pe , a mok tih riimtuui oen a khow te a suep pe .
42007039	Farasi thlaang lawng te kah hutaa lawng te tila a sai te a huh vengah a kaw khuiah te , “ He thlaang he tawngha tangtang kawinih amah aka tek hutaa he a-u te ang thlaang ti te a ming vetih metila a thawlh ti khaw a ming ai , ” tila a poek .
42007040	Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ Simon , na tengah thui ham pakhat awm ” a tina . Ahih lawngah , “ Oeih , Saya , van thui lah , ” a tina .
