42007041	Jesuh lawngah , “ Tangkapu thlahkung thlaang tengah tangka aka pu thlaang pahih awm . Pakhat lawngah ngun tangka ya-ngaa a ba tih atloe pakhat lawng ngun tangka sawm-ngaa a ba .
42007042	Te rawi lawng laiba te sah thai hih nawh , te rawi pahih bok kah laiba te a yoe pe sak . Te atah te rawi pahih khuiah a-u lawng tangkapu thlahkung te a lungna ngaai ai ? tila a doet .
42007043	Simon lawng , “ Ka poekna maiah laiba yahawh hlang a yoe pe sak tih khawdawp a ngaai pe thlaang lawngah te a lungna ngaai ai , ” tila a thui pe . Jesuh lawng , “ Soeng tangtang ” a tina .
42007044	Tecoengah te kah hutaa benla te maang tih Simon nala te , “ He hutaa he na huh aw ? Na im la ka law de khow silhna tui nan pe nawh , tede he hutaa lawngtah mikphitui oen ka khow he avan silh tih a sam oen avan thuut .
42007045	Nang lawngtah nan mok nawh , tede ahih lawngtah avan pha pek kalawng ka khow avan mok he toeng nawh .
42007046	Nang lawngah ka luu suepna ham olif situi khaw nan pe nawh , tede ahih lawngtah riimtuui oen ka khow avan suep poen .
42007047	Tedawngah , “ Lungna aka lenduet lawng a thawlhna yahawh hlang te khawdawp a ngaai pe poen tite a tueng sakna ni . Tede a-u khaw a thawlhna tehca te khawdawp ngaai pe la aka awm thlaang lawngtah lungna tehca bueng te a tueng sak van ” a tina .
42007048	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng hutaa nala te , “ Na thawlhna boeih te khawdawp ngaai la awm poen . ” a tina .
42007049	Caboi dawngah thlembuh aka veel haih thlaangtloe hue lawngah , “ Thawlhna Pateng khawdawp aka ngaai thlaang he a-u kai ? tila a thui u .
42007050	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng hutaa nala te , “ Na oengna lawng n'thlawn poen : ngaimawng ngaitoe la cet loeih ” a tina .
42008001	Tecoeng adiw raih atah Jesuh lawng vangpui oen vangca boeih te a hiil tih Pathen Ram kawng Awlthang Theen te a phawng . A hubang hue paha thlaihih khaw ahih oen cet haih u tih ,
42008002	tlawhnatna oen raaithe lawng a tuuk tih aka hoeih hutaa khatsut khaw a hu ah te bang u : a kaw khuikah raaithe pasarih co tih aka hoeih Meri ( Makdalin a ti u te ) oen ah
42008003	Herod sengpahrang kah imkhuikaw ukkung Khusa kah a yu Joanna ; tecoengah Susanna oen atloe hutaa thli a hu ah bang u tih a khuehtoen thaihu oen ah Jesuh oen a hubang thli te a bawmcem u .
42008004	Khawpui pakhat coeng pakhat kah thlaang thli te Jesuh tengla law u tih a tun kueng u vengah te he kah thuidoetna awl he Jesuh lawng a thui pe :
42008005	“ Voei khat ah thlaang pakhat tah caangti heh hamla cet . Lo khuiah caangti a heh vengah te caangti khatsut tah lawngpui ah tla , thlaang lawng a caawt tih va lawngah boeih a ruh .
42008006	Caangti khatsut tah lungrawng sawkah dilai apamna ah te tla tih caangti a po hang veng atah dilai te nuem poe nawh tih caangkung te reu boeih .
42008007	Caangti khatsut tah thliing ahaang tim ah tla , thliing te roeng hang tih caangkung te malh a diik .
42008008	Caangti khatsut tah dilai atheenna ah tla ; caangkung te roeng hang tih let yakhat la a vui athaih te rip thaawn . ” a tina . Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Yaakna haa na khueh u atah ya uh . ” a tina .
42008009	A hubang hue lawngah , he thuidoetna awl thuingaihna te Jesuh a doet u tih ,
42008010	Jesuh lawng , “ Pathen Ram awlhuep mingna te nangmi m'peek poen , tede thlaangtloe hue lawngtah a bueh u de huh nawh ham , a hutung u de yaakming nawh ham thuidoetna oen ni thui pe ham a awm . ” a tina .
42008011	“ Thuidoetna awl thuingaihna tah he tila awm : Caangti tah Pathen kah awl te ni .
42008012	Lawngpui ah aka tla caangti tah Pathen awl aka ya thlaang thli te thuingaihna ni ; ahimi lawng oengna oen thlawnna te a dangna nawh ham Seitan lawngah law tih ahimi thinkaw khuikah awlthang te a lawh pe .
42008013	Lungrawng sawah aka tla caangti te tah awlthang theen te a yaak tih awmngaih kawhoe la aka do thlaang te thuingaihna ni . Tede ahimi kaw khuiah ayung te caa khuek nawh . Kawlkalh ham bueng te a oeng u tih noekdakna tue a law veng atah tlim boeih u .
42008014	Thliing ahaang tim ah aka tla caangti te thuingaihna tah : Pathen awl te a yaak u de he dilai khawsakna kah lakueng raina oen kuirangna oen ah awmtheenna lawng a khuk tih ahinghoek dawngah a vui athaih ahii la aka awm thlaang thli te ni .
42008015	Lai theen dawngah aka tla caangti thuingaihna tah : awlthang theen te a yaak tih thinkaw khuiah hinyahna , doengna oen a khoem tih a vui athaih toela uehna oen aka awm thlaang thli te thuingaihna ni , ” a tina .
42008016	“ A-u lawngkhaw haiim te a vaang tih beeldung oen muek khoep nawh , ih-khun huiah khaw khueh nawh . Imkhui la thlaang a kuun vengah haiang te a huhna ham haivangna dawngah haiim te a khueh .
42008017	Thuh-elh la aka awm boeih te pho biit vetih muekdah la aka awm boeih te tueng pheng vetih huh thai la awm ai .
42008018	Tedawngah metila awl he na hutung tite ngaithuen uh ; metihtiah , a-u khaw thaihu a khueh te a tawm athap pe ai , tede a-u khaw a khueh nawh te ayawl akaai tah ka khueh tila a poek te Pateng khaw a lawh pe ai . ” a tina .
42008019	Jesuh kah a manu oen a manau thli te a tengla law u , tede thlaang ayahawh aih dawngah huh u thai nawh .
42008020	Thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Na nu oen na manau thli nang huh ham a ngaih u tih adauben ah pai u . ” tila a thui pe .
42008021	Jesuh lawng ahimi boeih nala te , “ Pathen awl te a yaak tih aka vai thlaang boeih tah ka manu oen ka manau la awm . ” a tina .
42008022	Hin at ah Jesuh tah a hubang thli oen lowng dawngah ngawl u tih ahimi nala te , “ Tuilii khatben rall la cet u sih . ” a tina tih cet u .
42008023	Lowng oen ah a ceh u phai vengah Jesuh tah ditdit ip . Kawlkalh maiah tuilii dawngah te khaw thlii tih lowng dawngah tui te be dalh poen , tedawngah ahimi boeih te lakueng u .
42008024	A hubang thli te Jesuh tengla cet tih a thawh u , “ Bawipa , Bawipa ! Mami n'duek boeih u poen ai he ! ” a tina u . Jesuh lawng tho tih khawthlii oen tuilet te awl a peek ; thlipui thliphoe te duem tih dipsiditla awm .
42008025	Tecoengah a hubang thli nala te , “ Na oengna te mela na khueh u ? ” a tina . Tede ahimi te a kawpoek rai u tih a rih u , amami khat oen khat te , “ He kah thlaang he a-u kai ? Ahih lawngtah khawthlii oen tuilet he awl a peek tih a awl khaw a ngai pe mai ! ” ti u .
42008026	Jesuh oen a hubang thli tah Galili tuilii khatben rall ah aka awm Kerasa peng benla lowng oen ah cet u .
42008027	Jesuh te lan a pha khoeng veng atah te khaaw kah thlaang raaithe lawng a kuun thil pakhat te a tengla va law . Ahih tah atliing ayaalla asanhlang awm puet poen , im ah khaw awm nawh tih thlaangduek a upna lungkaw khuiah te awm .
42008028	Ahih lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah angaihhlangla paang tih a khowkung ah te a buekuep pe tih , “ Tloeng Khoelh Pathen Capa Jesuh ! Kai he metila sai ham na ngaih ? Kai he dan n'tat mai boel , reenna kavan bih ! ” tila te paang .
42008029	Jesuh lawng raaithe te ahih kaw khui kalawng ram la ceh ham awl a peek dawngah ni te tila a tina . Ahih kaw khuiah te raaithe kuun poepa tih a kut a khow te thiirui oen rap a piin tih a khawh khaklal u de thiirui te a bot tih ramhum huhang la raaithe lawng a viil puei .
42008030	Jesuh lawng ahih te , “ A-u na miingna ? tila a doet . Ahih lawngah , “ Ka miing tah ‘ Mob ’ ka miingna ” a tina . Metihtiah ahih kaw khuiah raaithe moen a awm dawngah ni .
42008031	Raaithe thli lawngah Jesuh nala te kaimi he aboetna aka awm nawh ungrawm dung khuila te n'thlaak mai boel a tina u tih reenna a bih u .
42008032	Te kah tlaangthleep ah te awk piing hui at a vuelh u te awm . Tedawngah raaithe thli lawng ahimi te awk thli kah a kaw khuila kuun sak ham Jesuh tengah a bih u tih a kuun sak u .
42008033	Ahimi tah te kah thlaang kaw khui kalawng co u tih awk thli kah a kaw khuila te kuun u . Tevengah awk hui at te apum boeih la cehthleeng ah plit dingkang , tuilii ah tla tih duek boeih .
42008034	Awkdoen hue lawng te tila a awm te a huh u dawngah heeng u tih khawpui khui oen vangca boeih ah te kah awlthang te a thui u .
42008035	Thlaangping lawngah te tila a awm te huh hamla cet u tih Jesuh teng a pha u atah raaithe lawng a ceh taak thlaang lawngah te hinaak himbai a buen a naak tih lungcuih la Jesuh khow kungah a ngawlh te ahimi lawng a huh u vengah te a rih u .
42008036	Te tila a awm te aka hu thlaang thli lawngah te kah thlaang te metila hoeihna a dang tite thlaangping hue tengah patoeng a thui pe u .
42008037	Tecoeng atah te kah peng paang ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah te a rih tangkiik u tih ahimi boeih lawng Jesuh nala te atloela cet mai hawn a tina u . Tedawngah Jesuh tah lowng dawngah luui hang tih atloela cet .
42008038	Raaithe lawng a ceh taak thlaang lawngah te , “ Na hu ah m'bang sak van . ” a tina tih reenna a bih . Tede , Jesuh lawng ahih nala te .
42008039	“ Im la cet koep langtah Pathen lawng nang ham avan sai he thui , ” a tina . Te thlaang lawngah khawpui khuila te cet tih Jesuh lawng ahih sawah a sai pe te a thui .
42008040	Jesuh te thlaang broe lawngah a ring khiing u poen dawngah tuilii khatben rall kalawng a meel phai veng atah thlaangping lawng ahih te a do u .
42008041	Tevengah Jairu aka miingna thlaang pakhat te khaw va law , ahih tah te kah sinakok bok-im ukkung pakhat van ni . Ahih lawng Jesuh kah a khow kungah te buekuep tih amah im ah law van hamla Jesuh tengah reenna a bih ,
42008042	metihtiah a canu khatca bueng kum thlaihih aka law te a duek tawmca dawngah ni . Jesuh te a ceh phai vengah khatben khat bang kalawng thlaangping lawngah muelh a yaawl u .
42008043	Te kah thlaangping tim ah te kum ha thlaihih khui puet ah thisuntlaak tlawhna aka tlo hutaa pakhat te awm ; ahih lawng a khuehtoen boeih thapang la siibawi te a peek tih a tuui ahaai u van de a-u khat lawngkhaw hoeih sak thai nawh .
42008044	Ahih lawngah thlaangping lakli ah Jesuh kah a hu ben ah te law tih ahih kah himbaidung ahmoi te duem a tek , tevengah thisuntlaak tlawhna te hoeih pahoei .
42008045	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai he a-u lawngah n'tek ? ” tila a doet u . Thlaang boeih lawng kan tek nawh a tina u , Piter lawngah , “ Bawipa , thlaangping lawngah khatben khat bang kalawng n'veel khoep tih n'yaawl u he ta ” a tina .
42008046	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang pakhat lawngah kai he n'tek , metihtiah ka pum dawngkah huham tharana a thoeng te ka ming . ” a tina .
42008047	Te kah hutaa lawngah kai lawng ka tek te a ming poen a ti dawngah thuen ruila law tih Jesuh kah a khow kungah te a buekuep pe . Te kah thlaang boeih haiah te n'tu kawngah ahih te a tek tih metila a hoeih pahoei tite biit a thui .
42008048	Jesuh lawng ahih te , “ Ka canu , na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen . Ngaimawng la cet loeih ” a tina .
42008049	Jesuh lawng awl a thui lii vengah te Jairu im kalawng thlaang pakhat rawkk-thenn va law tih , “ Na canu duek poen , saya he kawhuet cakbat la khueh khiing tlaih boel , ” tila Jairu tengah a thui pe .
42008050	Tede Jesuh lawng tete a yaak vengah Jairu nala , “ Lakueng boel ; oeng mah oeng doek mai lah , ahih te theen badai , ” a tina .
42008051	Im te a pha u veng atah , Piter , Johan , Jeem oen ah camaw kah a manu oen ana pa bueng nawh atah amah oen haih a-u khaw im khuila kuun sak nawh .
42008052	Te kah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng camaw te a rah u tih reeng u . Jesuh lawng , “ Rap u boel , camaw he a duek moenih , aka ip mai ni ! ” a tina .
42008053	Ahimi lawngah camaw te duek tila a ming u dawngah Jesuh te a nuihna u .
42008054	Tede Jesuh lawng a kut ah camaw te a phoeih tih , “ Ka canu , tho lah ! ” a tina .
42008055	Hutaaca te hing koep tih pahoei tho hang , Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te ‘ Caak koei pakhat khat pe uh ’ a tina .
42008056	Ana pa oen a manu tah a kawpoek rai tangkiik hih , tede Jesuh lawng he tila aka awm thaihu he a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham awl a uen .
42009001	Jesuh lawng a hubang thlaihih te a khue tun tih , ahimi lawng raaithe boeih te hekna ham , tlawhnatna te hoeih sak hamla huham tharana oen saithaina aana te a peek .
42009002	Tecoengah Pathen ram kawng thui ham oen ah thlaangtlo hoeih sak hamla ahimi te a tuih .
42009003	Ahimi nala te , “ Kamyin la na cehna ah n'tu khaw khuen u boel ; cawnghol khaw , sawngsa khaw , caak awkk khaw , tangka khaw , angki ahoei yung at khaw khuen u boel .
42009004	Nangmi na pahna im ah te khawpui khui kalawng na ceh thlantoe ah awm uh ;
42009005	Nangmi impahna aka pe nawh khaaw te ceh taak u langtah ahimi te ngaithuen peekna la na khow dawngkah laidiik te van khoek pe uh . ” a tina .
42009006	A hubang hue lawngah cet u tih vangca vangnau boeih te a hiil u , Awlthang Theen te a phawng u tih khaaw tawm ah thlaangtlo te a hoeih sak u .
42009007	Galili ram ukkung Herod lawngah he tila thaihu aka thoeng hang kawng he a yaak vengah , thlaang khatsut lawng Baptisma pekung Johan he hing koep tila a thui u dawngah a ngaai hang sut .
42009008	Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah Elijah ni aka pho koep tila a thui u tih thlaangtloe lawngtah yan vengkah tawngha pakhat khat ni aka hing koep ti u .
42009009	Herod lawngah , “ Kai lawng Johan kah a luu te ka tloek pe poen , tede he kah thaihu thli akawng alam , ka yaak thlaang he a-u kai ? ” tila a thui . Tedawngah Jesuh te huh hamla a yawm .
42009010	A hubang thli te va meel koep u tih amami kah a sai boeih te Jesuh tengah a thui pe u . Jesuh lawng ahimi te a khue tih amami bueng Betsaida khawpui la te cet u .
42009011	Te kawng te rangpui lawng a yaak vengah a hu ah bung a vai u . Jesuh lawng ahimi te a uem tangkiik tih Pathen Ram kawng te a thui pe , sadingna aka ngoe thlaang thli te sa a ding sak .
42009012	Thlemben khaw a tlaak tawm atah hubang thlaihih hue te a tengla law u tih , “ Thlaangping he tuih loeih , he hue yunyan kah khaaw oen lo ah he cet u selang tah caak awkk oen pahna tlap u seh , he kah ahuen amawl he ramhum rammawl ni , ” a tina u .
42009013	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawngah he kah thlaang thli he caak awkk pe uh a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Kaimi lawng takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih bueng ni ka khueh u . Thlaang rangpui ham caak awkk lai sak hamla na ngaih aw ? ” a tina u .
42009014	( Te ah te thlaang tawngpataang hawng ah thong ngaa yun awm . ) Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala , “ Thlaangping sawm ngaa yun maiah athloepla rip ngawlh sak . ” a tina .
42009015	Te tila a hubang hue lawng a sai coengah ,
42009016	Jesuh lawng takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih te a lawh tih vaan la maang hang ; Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui , takawi oen nga te a eh tih a hubang thli tengah te a peek tih thlaangping hue tengah takawi te a ree pe u .
42009017	Ahimi boeih lawng a hah khuek la a caak u , acoeih aphe te a hubang hue lawng a cawi u tih vawhphueih paha thlaihih dawngah te betoet .
42009018	Hin at ah Jesuh amah bueng a thangthui vengah a hubang thli te ahih tengla law u . Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ thlaang thli lawng kai he a-u a ti u ? ” tila a doet .
42009019	Ahimi lawngah , “ Khatsut lawngtah nang he Baptisma pekung Johan ti u . Thlaangtloe khatsut lawngtah Elijah ni ti u tih atloe khatsut lawngtah yan veng kah tawngha pakhat khat aka hing koep ni , ti u ” tila a thui pe .
42009020	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng ta , Kai he a-u na ti u ? ” tila a doet . Piter lawngah , “ Nang tah Pathen kah Messiah ni , ” a tina .
42009021	Tecoengah he kawng he ahimi lawngah a-u tengah khaw thui nawh ham Jesuh lawng a khang pe .
42009022	Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang hing capa lawng patang palai a khang doetthloet vetih Judah ahaamca thli , khawsoeih haam thli oen Phungawl Cangpueikung thli lawngah te a hoett u ai . Ahih te a ngawn u ai , tede hin thum coengah tho koep ai . ” tila a thui pe .
42009023	Tecoengah ahimi boeih tengah te , “ A-u khaw ka hu ah baang ham a ngaih atah , amah kawngaih te hoett seh , amah kah thinglam te hin roekk ah kawt selang tah ka hu ah bang seh .
42009024	Metihtiah a-u khaw amah kah hingna te thlawn ham aka ngaih tah a hingna te a thlawng ai , tede a-u khaw kai kawngah a hingna te a thlawng atah a hingna te a thlawn ai .
42009025	Thlaanghing lawng dilai pum he amah koe la khueh mai cakhaw a hingna te a thlawng tih a sung atah n'tu nuem hoeikhangna a awm ? Hoeikhangna roe awm nawh !
42009026	Kai he khaw seh , kan cang puei he khaw seh a-u lawngkhaw a yah puei atah Thlaanghing Capa lawng a ruep-awmna oen , ana Pa oen aciim vanthlaang thli kah ruep-awmna oen a law vengah ahih te khaw a yah puei van ai .
42009027	Atak tang kavan thui u , he kah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawngah Pathen Ram te na huh thlantoe na duek u manawh ” a tina .
42009028	He kah awl he a thui coeng yarh khat yunyan a awm atah Piter , Johan , oen Jeem mi te Jesuh lawng a ceh puei tih thangthui u ham tlaang la luui u .
42009029	A thangthui lii vengah a mik-hai te thawleng u tih alakloe la awm , a hinaak himbai te bawk rawngtheng .
42009030	Kawlkalh maiah thlaang pahih te ahih oen awl a thui . Ahih rawi te tah Mosi oen Elijah ni .
42009031	Ahih rawi tah vaan ruep-awmna oen law hih tih Jerusalem ah Jesuh kah duekna rang oen Pathen kawngaihna adiw thlaan ah asoep ham kawng te Jesuh oen a thui u .
42009032	Piter oen a paya rawi tah ip muelh u , tede a hinghang u veng atah Jesuh kah ruep-awmna te khaw , a tengah thlaang pahih aka pai te khaw a huh u .
42009033	Te kah thlaang pahih lawng Jesuh te ka ceh taak hih ai a ti veng atah Piter lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Bawipa , he ah mami n'awm u he theen tangkiik ! Kaimi lawng riim-im pathum ah ka sa u ai , pakhat te nang ham seh , pakhat te Mosi hamla , pakhat te tah Elijah ham seh . ” a tina . ( Ahih lawng n'tu ka thui tite ming heet nawh . )
42009034	Ahih lawng awl a thui lii vengah muui va yaal tih ahimi te a yaawl khoep ; ahimi muui lawng a thiing khoep vengah te a hubang hue lawngtah caalla a rih u .
42009035	Muui dawngkah awl pakhat lawngah , “ Ahih he tah Ka Capa ni , Kai lawngah ka tuek te ni , a awl thui te ngaai pe uh ! ” tila a thui .
42009036	Te kah awl te a thui boet atah Jesuh te amah bueng la awm . Hubang hue lawng he kah akawng alam boeih te a phah u tih te vengkah ahimi lawng thaihu a huh u te a-u tengah khaw thui u nawh .
42009037	Avuen khawhin atah Jesuh oen a hubang pathum hue te tlaang kalawng a rum thuk u vengah thlaangping lawng Jesuh te avan pan u .
42009038	Thlaangping tim kah thlaang pakhat te paang tih , “ Saya ! Reenna kavan bih , ka capa khueh duen he van bueh lah !
42009039	Raaithe lawng a tuuk tih ploeng ploeng paang , a thuen sak tih tlup tlup a tlim sak , a kaa dawngah tilhawm khaw nomnom a peem ; a ngawn a theh poepa tih thlah tlaih nawh !
42009040	Na hubang thli tengah raaithe hek hamla reenna ka bih de ahimi lawng hek u thai nawh ” a tina .
42009041	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nangmi oengna khueh nawh thlaang oen lawnghang thlaang thli ! Meveng toe nangmi he kan awm puei ai ? Meveng toe nuem kan ruemm khiing u lah ai ? ” a tina . Tecoengah te kah thlaang nala te , “ Na capa te he la van law puei lah . ” a tina .
42009042	Tawngpaca te a law phai vengah raaithe lawng ahih te a thuen sak tih dilai dawng tlup a tlim sak . Jesuh lawng raaithe te awl a peek , tawngpaca te a hoeih sak coengah ana pa tengah koep a peek .
42009043	Thlaang boeih tah Pathen kah lenna huham tharana dawngah te a kawpoek rai u . Jesuh kah a sai thaihu boeih dawngah thlaangping a kawpoek a rai u lii vengah te a hubang hue nala ,
42009044	Kai lawng kavan thui he hilh u boel ! Thlaanghing Capa he aana aka khueh thlaang thli kut ah a peek u ai , ” a tina
42009045	Tede a hubang hue lawngah a thui ngaihna te ming u nawh . Ahimi lawng a yaakmingna nawh ham thuingaihna te awlpaveel oen a thui pe . Te kawng alam te doet ham khaw birih sut u .
42009046	A hubang thli lawngah amami khuiah te a-u nuem aka lenduet ti u tih awl puung u .
42009047	Ahimi lawng te tila a poek u te Jesuh lawng a ming , tedawngah camaw pakhat te a khue tih amah tengah a pai sak ,
42009048	a hubang hue nala te , “ A-u khaw he camaw he ka miing oen ah a do atah kai he ni n'do ; a-u khaw kai he aka do tah kai aka tuihkung te a do . Metihtiah nangmi tim kah ayiit koek te aka lenduet la awm . ” a tina .
42009049	Johan lawngah , “ Bawipa , nang kah miing oen ah raaithe aka hek thlaang pakhat ka huh u tih mami timkah thlaang nawh dawngah sai tlaih nawh ham ka khang pe u . ” a tina .
42009050	Jesuh lawng Johan oen atloe hubang hue nala te , “ Khaang pe u boel , metihtiah nangmi te aka oelhtaih nawh thlaang te tah na puei na paw ni . ” a tina .
42009051	Jesuh te vaan la luui ham atue a khoek tawm poen dawngah Jerusalem la ceh ham kaw a poek tih kamthlah .
42009052	Samaria khaaw ah soeprep boeih oepsoeh la aka sai ham ahih lawng thlaang a tuih .
42009053	Tede Jerusalem la te ceh poe ham a kamthlah u dawngah te khaw kah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te pah sak u nawh .
42009054	He tila a awm te hubang Jeem oen Johan lawng a huh vengah ahih rawi lawng Jesuh te , “ Bawipa he kah thlaang thli he phe hamla vaan kah hai te kaimi lawng tlaak sak ham na ngaih aw ? ” tila a doet hih .
42009055	Jesuh lawng maang dak tih ahih rawi te a ho .
42009056	Tecoengah Jesuh oen a hubang thli tah khaw tloe la cet u .
42009057	Ahimi te lawngpueng a ceh u vengah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala , “ Na cehna roekk ah na hu ah ka baang van ai . ” a tina .
42009058	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Metaang lawngkhaw a awm na lungkaw thingkaw a khueh tih va lawngkhaw a bu a khueh , tede Thlaanghing Capa lawngtah duemdawngna oen ihna ahuen kangna khaw khueh nawh . ” a tina .
42009059	Jesuh lawng thlaangtloe pakhat nala te , “ Ka hu ah baang lah . ” a tina . Tede te thlaang lawngah , “ Bawipa , im la ka cet de silang a pa rawkk te ka kuem lamha de ai . ” a tina .
42009060	Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaangduek lawng amami thlaangduek te vui u noen seh . Nang tah cet langtah Pathen Ram kawng te thui lah . ” a tina .
42009061	Thlaangtloe pakhat lawngah te , “ Bawipa na hu ah ka baang van ai , tede ka cet silang tah ka cakaw thli te ka phih ka ra de ai , ” a tina .
42009062	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ A-u khaw laithawl sai ham a tongnan tih a hu benla aka maang khiing te tah Pathen Ram oen ah tingtawkk nawh . ” a tina .
42010001	He coengah Bawipa lawng thlaang sawmsarih pahih te a tuek , ahimi te pahih pahih ah a bok u sak tih amah a cehna koei khaaw oen ahuen amawl boeih ah te a tuih .
42010002	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Caang ah hamla tah yahawh tangkiik mai de , aka aat ham biibikung tah yawlca . Lo khui-kah caang aka aat la biibikung thlaang yahawh avan tuihna ham lokhuehkung tengah thangthui uh .
42010003	Nangmi va cet u lah ! Metaang timkah tuuca angla nangmi he kan tuih u .
42010004	Nangmi lawng tangka bawm khawseh , sawngsa khawseh , khawmuek khaw khuen u boel ; a-u thlaang khaw voemtoei hamla lawngpueng ah cot pai boel .
42010005	Nangmi lawng im khui pakhat ah na kuun veng roekk ah lamhacuekla , “ He im khuiah he ngaimawngna awm hawn seh . ” tina uh .
42010006	Te kah im khuiah ngaimawngna aka ngaih thlaang te a awm atah nangmi kah ngaimawng toeina te ahih sawah awm seh ; a awm u nawh atah namami tengah va meel koep ai .
42010007	Te kah im ah te awm u langtah ahimi lawng m'peek boeih te ca uh , metihtiah bii aka bi lawngtah a bi phu te a dang ham awm . Imlui te khat coeng khat pong thiikthuek u boel .
42010008	Khawpui pakhat khuila na kuun veng roekk ah nangmi te n'do u atah na haiah avan toen te ca uh ,
42010009	te khawpui khuikah thlaangtlo thli te hoeih sak uh , te kah aka awm thlaang thli nala te , ‘ Pathen Ram tah nangmi tengah avan pha poen ’ tila thui pe uh .
42010010	Tede khawpui pakhat khuila na kuun veng roekk ah nangmi te n'do u nawh atah lawngpui tawm ah cet u langtah ,
42010011	‘ Kaimi kah ka khow dawngah aka kap na khaw khuikah laidiik nangmi ngaithuen he peekna hamla kavan khoek u poen . Tede he tah van hilh u boel , ‘ Pathen Ram tah nangmi tengah avan pha poen ! ’ tila thui pe uh .
42010012	Atak tang kavan thui u , Awlcekna Khawhin ah te kah khaaw lak ah Sodom khaaw te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai bet ai ! ” a tina .
42010013	“ Nang Korazin khawpui , nang hamla khawmap tangkiik mah aw ! Nang Betsaida nang hamla khawmap sut ! nangmi tengah kawpoek raina ka sai he Taiar oen Sidon ah ka sai kawinih n'cui vengah ni te kah thlaang thli lawng amami kah thawlh yutna te tueng sak hamla ngawl u vetih tlamhi oen a khuk u coengah amah oen amah te haiphu oen a phull u poen ai !
42010014	Awlcekna Khawhin ah te nangmi lak ah Taiar oen Sidon khaw te Pathen lawng a reen ngaai bet ai .
42010015	Nang Kapernaum ! Namah oen namah te vaan la pawmsang u ham na ngaih aw ? Hell ah thlaak thuk la na awm ai ! ” a tina .
42010016	Jesuh lawng a hubang thli nala te , “ A-u khaw nangmi kah awl a hutung u atah kai kah awl ni a hutung u ; a-u khaw nangmi kah awl te a hutung nawh atah kai kah awl ni a hutung nawh poen ; a-u khaw kai he aka hoett tah kai tuihkung te ni a hoett poen . ” a tina .
42010017	A thlaangtuih sawmsarih pahih hue te awmngaih kawhoe la va meel koep u tih ahimi lawngah , “ Bawipa , kaimi lawng nang kah miing oen ah awl ka peek u vengah raaithe thli lawng Pateng khaw awl a ngaai u ! ” a tina .
42010018	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Khaw thlap apha angla vaan kalawng Seitan a tlaak thuk te ka huh .
42010019	Hutung u lah ! Nangmi lawng ruul oen celkhui ta-ai tim ah na ceh thaina ham , Raal kah huham tharana te taana thai ham , nangmi te thaihu khat lawngkhaw nganbawh peek nawh ham saithaina aana te kan peek u poen .
42010020	Tede raaithe thli lawng nangmi awl te a ngaai u dawngah awmngaih u boel ; vaan ah nangmi kah miing a thut u dawngah te awmngaih uh . ” a tina .
42010021	Tevengah te Ciim Muithla lawng Jesuh te awmngaihna oen a betoet sak tih , “ A Pa , vaan oen dilai kah Bawipa ! Nang lawng thlaangcuih oen thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli tengah na tueng sak nawh tih na thuh te thoemthaina aka khueh nawh thlaang thli tengah na tueng sak poen dawngah kan uem tangkiik . A Pa , he tila coengg sak ham namah lawng na ngaih roe ni . ” tila a thui .
42010022	“ A Pa lawng thaihu soeprep boeih m'peek poen . Capa he a-u ti khaw Pa nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw ming nawh . Amah te tueng sak hamla Capa lawng a tuek thlaang oen Capa amah lawng nawh atah Pa te a-u lawngkhaw ming u nawh .
42010023	Tecoengah Jesuh tah a hubang hue benla te maang tih ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng na huh u thaihu he na huh thloem u dawngah na yo theen phoeih u !
42010024	Nangmi tengah kavan thui he tawngha yahawh hlang oen sengpahrang thli lawngah nangmi lawng na huh u he huh hamla a ngaih u de hu u thai nawh , nangmi lawng na yaak u he yaak ham a ngaih u de ya u thai nawh . ” a tina .
42010025	Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat law tih Jesuh kah a thawlhna tuuk pe ham a yawm . Ahih lawngah , “ Saya , dungyan hingna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai ? ” tila a doet .
42010026	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Caciim lawng n'tu a thui ? Avan thui thli te metila nang lawng na yaakmingna a awm ? ” a tina .
42010027	Te kah thlaang lawngah , “ Na Bawipa Pathen te na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen na hingna boeih oen , na tharana boeih oen , na kawpoek boeih oen ah lungna lah , ’ ti . Tecoengah ‘ namah oen namah te na lungna u van angla na imbe lovaai te khaw lungna van ’ ti ” a tina .
42010028	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Awl navan thung he tah soeng poen , te tila te sai , te tih atah na hing ai . ” a tina .
42010029	Tede Phungawl cangpueikung lawng amah oen amah te thlaangdoeng la a poek u dawngah , “ Ka imbe lovaai te a-u nuem ? ” tila Jesuh te a doet .
42010030	Jesuh lawngah , “ Voei khat ah thlaang pakhat tah Jerusalem kalawng Jeriko khaw la a ceh thuk vengah ahih te thlaanghuen thli lawng a bawh u , hinaak himbai te a pit pe u , a bawh doetthloet u tih a duek dalh la a ceh taak sut u .
42010031	Te tila a awmna kah lawngpui ah te khawsoeih pakhat te cet thuk van ; tede ahih lawng te kah thlaang te a huh vengah khatben kalawng a reel aram tih a ceh taak .
42010032	Te tih van la te Levi thlaang pakhat khaw te kah lawngpui ah poe cet thuk van tih te kah thlaang te a huh , ahih lawngkhaw khatben kalawng areel aram tih a ceh taak van .
42010033	Tede Samaria thlaang pakhat , te kah lawngpui kalawng ah kamyin la aka cet lawng atah te kah thlaang tengla te a pha tih a huh vengah a reen tangkiik .
42010034	A tengla te cet tih boengha te situi oen misurtui oen ah a thluk pe tih boengha thli te a yeen pe ; tecoengah te kah thlaang te amah kah lacano dawngah a ngawlh sak tih yinpahna im la te a ceh puei ; te ah te ahih lawng te kah thlaangtlo te a buul athlawng .
42010035	Avuen ah ka cet ai a ti veng atah ngun tangka pheek hih te a lawh tih yinpahna imtoetkung te a peek tih ahih nala te , “ Nang lawngah ahih he khuutcem mai de , ahih hamla na hawna avak asah boeih te ka meel koep vengah kan pe ai , ’ a tina . ” tila te a thui pe .
42010036	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah , “ He kah thlaang pathum khuiah he thlaanghuuen thli lawng a bawh thlaang kah imbe lovaai te a-u tila na poek ? ” tila te a doet .
42010037	Phungawl cangpueikung lawngah , “ Ahih aka reen thlaang te a imbe lovaai la awm . ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Te atah nang khaw cet langtah te tila te sai van . ” a tina .
42010038	Jesuh oen a hubang thli te kamyin la cet u tih khaw pakhat a pha u , te ah te Marta aka miingna hutaa pakhat lawng a im ah a pah sak .
42010039	Meri aka miingna a manau pakhat awm . Ahih lawngtah Bawipa kah a khow kungah ngawl tih a hih kah cangpueina te a hutung .
42010040	Marta tah bii toklek tih hoeng atoeih nawh , tedawngah law tih , “ Bawipa , kamah bueng pawng athawh ham ka manau lawng n'ceh taak sut he , n'tula khaw na ngaai nawh aw ? Kai he bawm hamla van thui pe lah ! ” a tina .
42010041	Bawipa lawng , ahih nala te , “ Marta ! Nang lawngtah thaihu yahawh hlang dawngah na lakueng tih na patang ,
42010042	tede angoe tangtang tah pakhat bueng ni . Meri lawngtah asoeng thaihu te a tuek poen tih ahih tengkah te a-u lawngkhaw rot pe tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
42011001	Hin at vengah Jesuh tah ahuen pakhat ah thangthui . A thangthui coeng atah a hubang pakhat a tengla law tih , “ Bawipa , Johan lawng a hubang thli a cang puei van angla thangthuina te kaimi n'cang puei u van lah , ” a tina .
42011002	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng na thangthui u vengah tila thui uh : ‘ A Pa : Na miing ciim tah hinyahna awm hawn seh ; na Ram va pai hawn seh .
42011003	Kaimi lawng ka ngoe caak awkk te hin at coeng hin at m'pe lah .
42011004	Kaimi sawah thawlhpalhna aka sai boeih te khawdawp ka ngaai u van angla kaimi kah thawlhna he khawdawp van ngaai van lah . Aka rai tangkiik noekdakna te kaimi tengah van pha sak boel ’ tila thangthui uh . ” a tina .
42011005	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang thli tengah , “ Thuina maiah , nangmi pakhat khat lawng yiinthuem ah na paya im la na cet tih ahih nala te , Anaang nang , takawi cuun thum ah m'pe de lah .
42011006	Ka paya pakhat khawlawng cet tih tapekca ah ka im avan pha tih ka cah ka awh ham caak koei khat khaw ka khueh nawh ! ’ na tina .
42011007	Tevengah na paya lawngah im khui kalawng , ‘ Thlaang kawhuet cakbat la khueh boel ! Thawh ka khaih poen , ka ca thli oen ka ip u poen . Nang te thaihu peek ham ka tho thai tlaih manawh . ’ ti .
42011008	Te atah metila a awm ai ? Kavan thui u , ahih te na paya la a awm dawngah tho nawh tih takawi te m'pe nawh de nang lawng yah ohla na bih mangkhak atah ahih lawng tho vetih na ngoe thaihu boeih te m'peek ai .
42011009	Tedawngah he he kavan thui u : Bih u lah , m'peek ai ; tlap u lah na dang ai , Thawh te khooek u lah , nang ham avan awng ai .
42011010	Metihtiah aka bih boeih te a peek ai , aka tlap boeih lawng adang ai , thawh aka khooek boeih ham a awng pe ai .
42011011	Na ca lawng nga avan bih vengah ruul aka pe papa nangmi khuiah khat khaw na awm u aw ?
42011012	Aaidui avan bih vengah celkhuita-ai na peek ai aw ?
42011013	Thlaangthe la na awm u de ta , na ca thli te thaihu theen peek ham na ming u . Te atah vaan ah aka awm Pa lawng atah Ciim Muithla te aka bih boeih tengah a peek tare ai ta ! ” a tina .
42011014	Raaithe lawng akuun tih awl aka mueh thlaang pakhat kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe te Jesuh lawngah a hek tih te thlaang te raaithe lawng a ceh taak coeng atah awl cal . Thlaangping tah a kawpoek la rai sut u ,
42011015	tede , thlaang khatsut lawngtah , “ Raaithe thli hek thai hamla huham tharana he raaithe thli kah a bawipa Beelzebul lawng ni a peek , ” ti u .
42011016	Thlaangtloe lawngtah Jesuh kah a thawlhna te tuuk ham a ngaih u dawngah ahih kah a sai te Pathen ben-kah aka law ni tite tuengsakna ham kawpoek raina sai ham te a bih u .
42011017	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah poekna te thiim a ming tih ahimi nala te , “ Ram pakhat he amah oen amah athloekla pek u the tih thek u kawinih asan pai thai manawh ; imkhuikaw khaw pek u the tih a roep u nawh atah khawsak paw .
42011018	Tedawngah Seitan kah ram khaw pakhat oen khat raal u the kawinih metila asan a pai thai ai ? Nangmi lawng atah kai lawngah raaithe ka hek he Beelzebul lawngah raaithe hek thaina te kai he a peek na ti u .
42011019	Kai lawng Beelzebul rang oen raaithe ka hek atah nangmi kah hubang thli lawng ta metila a hek u ? Nangmi na soeng u nawh tite namami kah hubang thli lawng a tueng sak !
42011020	Tetih nawh ni , kai lawngah Pathen kah huham tharana oen raaithe ka hek tih , te lawngah te Pathen Ram nangmi teng avan pha poen tite a tueng sak .
42011021	Thara thlaang pakhat lawng amah kah aw-vaa boeih oen a im te a toet atah a khueh a toen boeih te sueng .
42011022	Tede tha aka ra ngaai bet pakhat lawng a teek tih a taa atah ahih lawng a uepna awva boeih te a lawh pe vetih thaihu thaiha te a rek a ra pe ai .
42011023	A-u khaw kai he aka pai puei nawh tah kai he aka raalna thlaang ni ; a-u khaw thlaang ka cawitun vengah kai he aka bawmcem nawh tah thlaang aka thekyak thlaang ni . ” a tina .
42011024	“ Raaithe pakhat , thlaang pakhat kah a kaw khui kalawng co tih a ceh vengah , ramhum huhang te a hiil tih a awmna ham ahuen amawl te a tlap . Pakhat khaw a huh nawh veng atah , ‘ Ka ceh taak kamah im la te ka meel koep hawn ai . ’ tila a poek .
42011025	Tedawngah meel koep tih im te aciimbiit la awm tih thaihu thaiha atheenla a kuem heet u te a huh .
42011026	Tecoengah cet tih amah lak ah athe eep ngaai atloe raaithe pasarih te avan law puei tih te ah te awm u . Tedawngah te thlaang te tah acuek veng kah lak ah nauh tare ngaai . ” a tina .
42011027	Jesuh lawng tila a thui coengah thlaang tim kah hutaa pakhat lawngah paang tih ahih nala te , “ Nang he aka cuunkung oen cawmcahkung tah metihtlukla a awmngaih ai te ! ” a tina .
42011028	Tede Jesuh lawngah , “ Pathen awl te a yaak tih aka vai tah metihtlukla a awmngaih tare ai ! ” a tina .
42011029	Thlaangping lawngah Jesuh te a veel khoep u vengah te Jesuh lawng , “ Tihin hang kah thlaang thli he the-akk tangkiik ! Ahimi lawng kawpoekraina te a bih u , tede Jonah kah kawpoekraina nawh atah atloe khat khaw ka sai manawh .
42011030	Nineveh khaaw kah thlaang thli hamla tawngha Jonah te noekna la a awm van angla Thlaanghing Capa he khaw tihin hang kah thlaang thli ham miknoek la awm van ai .
42011031	Sheba sengpahrang Nu lawng Solomon kah cuihna awl hutung ham athla hlang amah ram kalawng va law ; Awlcekna Khawhin ah ahih lawng pai vetih tihin hang kah thlaang thli he thawlh a peel poen ai ; ataktang kavan thui u , Solomon lak ah aka lenduet ngaai he ah he awm .
42011032	Nineveh khaaw kah thlaang thli lawng Jonah kah phung thui awl a yaak u dawngah a thawlhna yut u , Awlcekna khawhin ah ahimi lawng pai vetih nangmi te thawlh m'peel poen ai ; ataktang kavan thui u , Jonah lak ah aka lenduet ngaai he ah he awm . ” a tina .
42011033	A-u lawng haiim te a vaang tih thlip khoep nawh , beeldung oen khaw dah khoep nawh ; im khuila aka law thlaang thli lawng aangna te a huh thaina ham haivangna dawngah te a khueh .
42011034	Pum hamla tah mik he haiim angla awm . Na mik rawi te acaih vengah na pum te aangna oen be ; tede na mik rawi te atheen nawh veng atah na pum te yiinna khuiah awm .
42011035	Tedawngah na pum dawngah aka awm aangna te yiinna la a coengg nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
42011036	Haiim a aangna oen nang te n'thue vengah na pum te aangna oen be tih ame huen maiah khaw yiinna a awm nawh angla na pum boeih te aang ai . ” a tina .
42011037	Jesuh te awl a thui coeng atah Farasi thlaang pakhat lawng buh ca la ahih te a khue ; tedawngah cet tih buh caak hamla te ngawl .
42011038	Jesuh lawng buh caak thlan ah kut a silh nawh te Farasi thlaang lawng a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai .
42011039	Tedawngah Bawipa lawng ahih nala te , “ Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli lawngtah boengloeng oen beel te adauben tah na silh u , tede akhui ben tah tluung-athangna , athe thaihu oen betoet .
42011040	Nangmi thlaangngau paathuu thli ! Adauben aka sai Pathen lawngah akhuiben te khaw sai nawh aw ?
42011041	Tede nangmi kah boengloeng oen beel dawngah aka awm te khawdeng thlaang thli te pe u lah , tetih atah soeprep boeih te nangmi ham ciim ai .
42011042	Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi lawng cuenruek-an , sawngsing oen tawitlim anno Pateng khaw paha ah pakhat te Pathen na peek u , tede nangmi lawngah doengna , Pathen lungna te tah na hadalhna u . He ang thli he na sai hamla awm tih atloe te khaw dalrana ohla sai ham awm .
42011043	Nangmi Farasi thlaang thli ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi lawng sinakok bok-im ah athloekla ahooep atlaang ngawlhcoen dawngah ngawlh ham oen ah thaihu yoeihna huen ah thlaang kah hinyahna oen voemtoeina te na ngaih u .
42011044	Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw ! Nangmi tah thlaang lawng ming nawh tih asawah a cehna miknoekna aka awm nawh thlam oen na la u . ” a tina .
42011045	Phungawl cangpueikung pakhat lawng ahih nala te , “ Saya he tila na thui he kaimi khaw nan sal nan phaam haih poen ! ” a tina .
42011046	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung thli ham khaw khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi lawngah phueih ham aka rai tangkiik thalrih te thlaang na phueih sak u , tede namami lawngtah thalrih te na kutdawn oen Pateng na tek nawh .
42011047	Nangmi ham khawmap tangkiik mah aw ! Nangmi lawngah tawngha thli ham thlann te atheen theenla na sai pe u , te kah tawngha thli te namami kah patuer thli lawng a ngawn u te ni .
42011048	Tedawngah nangmi lawng namami kah patuer thli lawngah a sai te na kawtlaak puei u tite na tueng sak u ; ahimi lawng tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih nangmi lawng thlann te na sai pe u .
42011049	He kawngah he Pathen kah Cuihna lawng , ‘ Ahimi tengah tawngha thli oen laipai thli te ka tuih ai ; ahimi lawngah khatsut te a ngawn u vetih atloe hue te tah a heem a tek u ai ? tila a thui .
42011050	Tedawngah Abel a ngawn u veng kalawng boknathaang oen Huen Ciim laklaw ah a ngawn u Zekhariah toe ah , dilai suen cuek veng kalawng tawngha boeih te a ngawn u dawngah tahe san kah thlaang thli he dan a tat ai . Teveng kah thlaang thli boeih ham te tahe san kah thlaang thli he dan a tat ai tila kavan thui u !
42011052	Nangmi Phungawl cangpueikung thli ham khawmap tangkiik ! Nangmi lawng cuihna im kah thawhka awngna caabi te na kuem khak u ; namami khaw na kuun u nawh , kuun ham aka yawm thlaang thli ham khaw na khang pe u ! ” a tina .
42011053	Te kalawng Jesuh te a ceh coeng atah , Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thli lawng ah teveng kalawng tah ahih te a huhhuett tangkiik u poen tih ,
42011054	a cal thawlhna oen awl a thuina dawngah a thawlhna te tuuk pe ham thaihu kawng alam yahawh hlang te a doet u .
42012001	Tevengah thlaangping toeklek nawh te tun u tih amami pakhat oen pakhat te tiil u the ; tevengah Jesuh lawng lamhacuekla a hubang hue nala te , ‘ Farasi thlaang thli kah tawlru te atheenla ngaithuen uh , ka thui ngaihna tah ahimi kah thailatna te ni .
42012002	Muekdah khoep la aka awm thaihu boeih te pho vetih ahuep ahel boeih te a ming sak ai .
42012003	Tedawngah yiinna khuiah na thui u te hingthun khawthaih ah a yaak u ai , thawh na khaih khoep u tih ahuepla im khuiah awltuemm na thui u te imphu kalawng a paang puei u ai . ” a tina .
42012004	“ Ka puei thli , kavan thui u , pum bueng he a ngawn thai doek tih atloe athe-eep khat khaw aka sai thai nawh thlaang thli te rih boel .
42012005	Nangmi lawng a-u rih ham a awm tite kavan tueng sak ai ; Pum he a ngawn coengah hell khuiah thlaak thaina aana aka khueh Pathen te rih uh . Nangmi lawng ahih te ni na rih u ham a awm , kai lawng kavan thui he tangna u lah !
42012006	Variit pa-ngaa te pheksaseen pahih la yooei u nawh aw ? Pathen lawngtah variit te pakhat khaw hilh nawh .
42012007	Na luu dawngkah sam Pateng a toek boeih . Tedawngah rih u boel ; nangmi tah variit yahawh hlang lak ah na phu awm ngaai ! ” a tina .
42012008	“ Atak tang kavan thui u , a-u khaw kai kah thlaang la ka awm tila langya ah aka thui tah , Thlaanghing Capa lawng ahih te Pathen kah vanthlaang thli haiah ka thlaang ni a tina van ai .
42012009	Tede a-u khaw seh langya ah kai he aka hoett tah Thlaanghing Capa lawngah ahih te Pathen kah vanthlaang thli haiah a hoett van ai .
42012010	A-u khaw Thlaanghing Capa te oelhtaihna awl aka thui te khawdawp a ngaai pe ai , tede a-u khaw Ciim Muithla te a oelh ataih tih athela aka thui tah khawdawp ngaai pe manawh .
42012011	Ahimi lawngah nangmi te sinakok ah khaw , ram ukbawi oen ukkung thli haiah khaw n'khuen u vengah namah oen namah te metila ka phungtu u vetih me ang awl ka thui ai ti khaw lakueng a boel .
42012012	Metihtiah nangmi lawng na thui ham koei te Ciim Muithla lawng n'cang puei ai . ” a tina .
42012013	Thlaangping tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , a pa lawng kaihih boeinau hamla avan ceh taak ro te kai ham thoem avan pek van ham ka maya tengah thui pe lah ” a tina .
42012014	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Ka puei , nanghih te awl cek ham oen ah ro pek pe hamla a-u lawng kai he n'khueh ? ” a tina .
42012015	Tecoengah ahimi boeih nala te , “ Apueh ngaihna soeprep dawngah kuemsuem u lang tloeng u lah ; metihtiah thlaang kah hingna tak tak he bawirengna , khueh toen thaihu dawngah pangtung nawh . ” a tina .
42012016	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi teng ah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe : “ Voei khat ah kuirang pakhat lawng lo pakhat a toen tih caang theen tangkiik .
42012017	Ahih lawngah tila a poek , ‘ Caang ka khuehna ham awm tlaih nawh . Me tih ni ka ti lah ai ? ’ ti .
42012018	Tecoengah tila a poek tih , ‘ He tila ka sai ai , thaidi boeih te ka phe silang pakhat la kang abo ngaai la ka sai ai , tecoengah te kah thaidi dawngah te caang oen atloe thaihu boeih te ka khueh ai .
42012019	Tecoengah kamah oen kamah te nang yotheen kam-awm thlaang ! Kum san hlang ham na ngoe thaihu theen boeih te na khueh poen ! Thayoeidoh la awm lah , Ca langtah aw lah , ngaimawng ngaitoe la awm lah , ka ti ai ’ ti .
42012020	Tede Pathen lawng ahih nala te , ‘ Nang thlaangngau paathuu ! N'tu yiin ah na hingna te boet poen ai ; tedawngah namah ham na tung na sep thaihu thli he a-u lawng a paang ai ? ” a tina .
42012021	Tecoengah awlcuina ah Jesuh lawng , “ Amah hamla kaawn aka tung aka sep thlaang tah Pathen kah mik huh atah kuirang la awm nawh . ” a tina .
42012022	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te , “ Tedawngah nangmi lawng na hingna ham angoe caak awkk khaw , na pum ham angoe hinaak himbai khaw lakueng u boel kan tina u .
42012023	Hingna he caak awkk lak ah awlpui ngaai tih pum he khaw hinaak himbai lak ah awlpui ngaai ni .
42012024	Vang-aak thli ke bueh u lah ; ahimi lawng ruk khaw tuh u nawh tih caang khaw aat u nawh . Ahimi lawng khaai khaw khueh u nawh tih caangpai khaw holh u nawh ; Tede Pathen lawng a cah a awh ! Nangmi he va lak ah na phu tlo ngaai !
42012025	Nangmi timkah a-u lawng mai khaw lakuengna rang oen a hingna te bet a cot sak thai ai aw ?
42012026	He ang thaihu tehca mai Pateng khaw na sai thai u nawh atah , n'tu ham ah atloe thaihu kawngah na lakueng u ?
42012027	Ramhum kah raipai thli lawng metila a roeng hang tite bueh u lah : ahimi lawng bii khaw bi nawh , amami ham hinaak himbai khaw tak u nawh . Tede nangmi tengah kavan thui tah Solomon sengpahrang Pateng khaw a bawilen hi-acuu a khueh moek de , raipai angla aka theen khat khaw khueh nawh .
42012028	Tihin ah hing tih thangvuen ah aka duek pahoei , hai dawngah phuum hamla aka awm sul-aram Pateng khaw Pathen lawng a thoei acaam . Ahih lawngah nangmi te thoei acaam tare nawh ai aw ? Nangmi na oengna yawl tangkiik nawh pai he !
42012029	Tedawngah nangmi lawng caak awkk kawng te poek khuep oen lakueng u boel .
42012030	( Metihtiah Pathen aka ming nawh dilai thlaang thli lawng ni he ang thaihu thli he a thoeh a tham . ) Nangmi kah na Pa lawng he ang thaihu na ngoe boeih te a ming .
42012031	Amah kah a Ram te awlpuila poek u lah , te atah he thaihu boeih he nangmi m'peek ai . ” a tina .
42012032	“ Rih u boel , metihtiah nangmi te na Pa lawng Vaan Ram peek ham a ngaih .
42012033	Nangmi lawng na khueh na toen te yooei u langtah tangka te khawdeng thlaang thli pe uh . Aka pawn thai nawh tangkabawm te namami ham khueh u langtah vaan ah namami ham kaawn te tung asep uh , te huen atah thlaanghuuen lawngkhaw huuen thai nawh tih kuum-akett lawngkhaw a caak thai nawh dawngah metuek khaw boeih manawh .
42012034	Metihtiah na thaihu a awmna huen ah te na thinkaw khaw awm yoeyah van ai . ” a tina .
42012035	“ Me ang thaihu a thoeng veng-kah ham khaw oepsoehla awm uh , hinaak himbai te oepsoehla bai-ana u langtah haiim te oepsoehla vaang uh ,
42012036	yuluipoei kalawng aka meel koep ham koei a bawipa lawng thawh a khooek pe vengah thawhka te pahoei awng pe ham aka ring oepsoeh tuihyoeihthlaang thli angla huertuela awm uh .
42012037	A bawipa a law koep vengah huertuela a toet tih oepsoehla aka ring tuihyoeihthlaang thli te tah a yo theen phoeih ! Atak tang kavan thui u , ahih lawng amah angki te a pit vetih a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a ngawlh sak coengah ahimi te a do adan ai .
42012038	Yiinthuemtaang ah a law ah khaw , cinghue ah a law ah khaw , ahimi oepsoeh la a awm te a huh atah a yo theen phoeih u !
42012039	Tecoengah he he ming u lah , Im khuehkung lawng thlaanghuuen a lawna atue te ming kawinih a im te thlaanghuuen muk sak manawh .
42012040	Tedawngah nangmi khaw oepsoehla awm uh , metihtiah nangmi lawng na ngaiuep nawh vengah Thlaanghing Capa tah law ai . ” a tina .
42012041	Piter lawngah , “ Bawipa , he thuidoetna he kaimi ham aw na van thui , tihnawhtah thlaang boeih ham aw ? ” tila a doet .
42012042	Bawipa lawngah , “ Tetih atah , a-u nuem uep-awm tih aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la aka awm ? Ahih tah a bawi lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli cawmcah ham , atue atang vengah ahimi caak awkk pekung la a khueh te ueppang koei aka cuih tuihyoeihthlaang la awm ai .
42012043	A bawipa a law vengah te tila bii a bi te a huh atah te kah tuih-yoeih thlaang te tah a yotheen phoeih !
42012044	Atak tang kavan thui u , te kah tuihyoeihthlaang te amah kah khuehtoen boeih uktemkung la a bawipa lawng a khueh ai .
42012045	Tede ‘ ka bawipa he law yue tang manawh ’ tila a poek tih atloe tuihyoeih-thlaang hutaa khaw , tawngpa khaw a bawh apai tih a caak a awkk tih yuu a ruui atah ,
42012046	ahih lawng a ngaiuep nawh tih a ming nawh atue atang hin at veng atah a bawipa te a law pe ai . A bawipa lawng ahih te pat a tloek vetih awl ngaai nawh thlaang thli kah paang koei te a paang sak van ai .
42012047	A bawipa lawng sai sak ham a ngaih te a ming de aka sai nawh tih oepsoehla aka awm nawh tuihyoeihthlaang te tah dan a tat vetih a bawh doetthloet ai .
42012048	Tede a bawipa kah kawngaih ming nawh tih bawh ham koei te aka sai tuihyoeihthlaang tah adoem aphoe ngaai la a bawh ai . Yahawh hlang a peek thlaang tengkah te yahawh hlang a bih van ai ; apueh ngaai la a peek thlaang tengkah te apueh la a bih van ai . ” a tina .
42012049	“ Kai tah dilai he hai oen ung sak ham ni ka law , tahe vengah khaw ung poen kawinih ka ngaih !
42012050	Kai lawng ka dang ham koei baptisma pakhat awm hun , tete ka coeng thlantoe tah ka kawpoek patang tangkiik mah aw !
42012051	Nangmi lawngah kai he dilai dawngah roepna peek hamla va law tila na poek u aw ? Nawh ni , roepna nawh tih pekbona peek ham ni ka law .
42012052	Tahe kalawng tah imkhuikaw pakhat ah aka awm thlaang pa-ngaa te pek u ai , pathum lawng pahih te a raalna vetih pahih te lawngah pathum te a raalna van ai .
42012053	Ana pa thli lawng a capa thli te a raalna vetih a capa thli lawng ana pa thli te a raalna van ai ; a manu thli lawng a canu thli te a raalna vetih a canu thli lawngkhaw a manu thli te a raalna van ai ; a manii lawng a la-nga te a raalna vetih a la-nga lawngah a manii te a raalna van ai . ” a tina .
42012054	Jesuh lawng thlaangping tengah tila a thui pe , “ Nangmi lawng khawtlaak ben kalawng ah muui a yaal hang te na huh u vengah khawtlan ai tila pahoei na thui u tih tlan khoet .
42012055	Tecoengah ahot ben-kah yilh a law atah khaw ling ai na ti u tih ling tangtang .
42012056	Thlaangthaipalat hue ! Nangmi lawng vaan oen dilai he na dan u tih khawtue tah na thui thai u ; tetih atah , n'tu ah tahe vengkah atue he tah na ming u thai nawh ? ” a tina .
42012057	Asoeng thaihu te sai ham n'tu ah namami lawngkhaw kaw na poek u nawh ?
42012058	Thlaang pakhat khat lawng nang te tayacawi ham a ngaih tih awlcekna yungim la n'ceh puei atah , awlcekna yungim na pha thlan vengah ahih oen roeproeina sai . Te tila na sai nawh atah ahih lawng nang te awlcek bawi haiah m'mawt poen ai , awlcekbawi lawng nang te palik kut ah m'peek vetih thongim ah n'thlaak ai .
42012059	Ataktang ni kavan thui u , laiba te na sah boeih thlantoe thongim khuiah na awm ai ” a tina .
42013001	Tevengah te kah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawng Galili thlaang thli Pathen tengah Luciik thawthuengna a sai u vengah Pilat bawi lawng a ngawn kawng te a thui pe u .
42013002	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Te kah Galili thlaang thli , te tila a ngawn u te atloe Galili thlaang thli lak ah aka thawlh ngaai ni tila na poek u aw ?
42013003	Thawlh koek aih nawh ! Atak tang kavan thui u , nangmi khaw na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah nangmi boeih khaw ahimi angla na duek u van ai .
42013004	Siloam kah imtloensang a tlim vengah thlaang paha thlaireet a namm darek tih aka duek hue te ta ? Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaangtloe boeih lak ah the koek tila nangmi lawng na poek u aw ?
42013005	The koek aih nawh ! Atak tang kavan thui u , nangmi khaw na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah nangmi boeih khaw ahimi angla na duek u van ai . ” a tina .
42013006	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng he kah thuidoetna he ahimi tengah a thui pe : “ Thlaang pakhat lawngah misurdum khuiah thaidut thing kung at a liing . Ahih lawng cet tih thaidut te thaih aw , thaih nawh aw ti tih a bueh de athaih pakhat khaw hu nawh .
42013007	Tedawngah ahih lawng amah kah dumtoetkung nala te , ‘ Bueh lah , kum thum puet ah he la he ka law tih thaidut thing he ka bueh de a thaih khat khaw ka hu nawh . Vung hawn loeih ! N'tu ah laitheen apoei apit la a vak asah sak ? ” a tina .
42013008	Tede dumtoetkung lawng , “ Bawipa kum at tah awm mai de seh ; a teng-avai he dilai ka voe pe silang tah laimeen oen ka vui de lah ai .
42013009	Cangthok ah a thaih atah theen badai ; athaih nawh atah vung mai hawn ; a tina . ” tila a thui pe .
42013010	Sabbath khawhin hin at vengah Jesuh lawng sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei .
42013011	Teah te kum ha thlaireet khuiah raaithe lawng a tlawh sak hutaa pakhat te awm ; ahih te a uen khuun roepsoet tih doeng sak thai tlaih nawh .
42013012	Jesuh lawng ahih te a huh vengah a khue tih , “ Hutaa nang , na tlawhna hoeih poen ! ” a tina .
42013013	Ahih lawng a kut te hutaa sawah a tloeng tih hutaa te amah poek ah yauh doeng pahoei tih Pathen te a thangpawm .
42013014	Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo a hoeih sak dawngah sinakok bok-im ukkung te a thin sa ; tedawngah thlaangping nala te , “ Mami lawng bii bina ham khawhin hinruk awm ; te khawhin ah te law u langtah thlaangtlo hoeih sak uh , tede Sabbath khawhin atah sai u boel ! ” a tina .
42013015	Bawipa lawng ahih nala te , “ Nangmi thlaangthaipalat hue ! Nangmi lawng Sabbath khawhin ah na vaitaw khaw , lacano khaw seh , a kiingna rui te na thlam pe u tih tui awkk sak ham na mawt u de lah koen .
42013016	Tahe ah Seitan lawng kum ha thlaireet khui a piin tih a khawh mangkhak Abraham cadil he ah awm he ta ; Sabbath khawhin ah ahih he piin ayeenna kalawng n'loeih sak nawh ai aw ? a tina .
42013017	Ahih kah awl thungna lawng a raal thli te a yah sak , thlaangping tah ahih kah kawpoekrai thaihu a saina dawngah te awmngaih u .
42013018	Jesuh lawngah tila a doet , “ Pathen kah Ram he n'tu oen a lawh u ? N'tu oen ah ka nuehtah lah ai ?
42013019	Te tah he oen lo u . Thlaang pakhat lawng antammu te a lawh tih amah dum ah te a heh . Antammu te roeng hang tih thingkung la pai , te atah va thli te law u tih abeek thli dawngah a bu a tuk u . ” a tina .
42013020	Jesuh lawng “ Pathen Ram he n'tu oen ah ka nuehtah lah ai ? tila koep a doet .
42013021	Te tah he oen lo u . Hutaa pakhat lawng tawlru te a lawh tih ta-ekk hawl thum oen a thoekk haih tih ta-ekk te a rawi sak boeih . ” a tina .
42013022	Jesuh lawng Jerusalem la a ceh vengah te khawpui boeih oen vangca vangnau ah te cet tih thlaang thli te a cang puei .
42013023	Thlaang pakhat lawng ahih nala , “ Bawipa , thlaang a yawlca lawng aw thlawnna he a dang ai ? ” tila a doet .
42013024	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Thawhka ceek ah te kuun ham yawm u lah ; thlaang yahawh lawng kuun ham a yawm u ai , tede kuun thai u manawh .
42013025	Imkung lawng tho vetih thawh a khaih ai ; tevengah adauben ah na pai u vetih thawh te na khooek u ai , “ Bawipa , thawh van awng de lah ! ’ na tina u ai . Ahih lawngah , “ Ame kalawng nangmi na law u , kan ming kan tung u moenih . ’ ti ai .
42013026	Tevengah nangmi lawng , ‘ Kaimi he nang oen ah buh aka ca haih ni ; kaimi khaw ah nan cang puei u teta ! ? na tina u ai .
42013027	Tede tila koep a thui ai , ‘ Nangmi he ame kalawng na law , kan ming nawh . Nangmi thlaangthe thli ; atloela cet uh ’ n'tina ai .
42013028	Nangmi lawng Pathen Ram khuiah Abraham , Isak , Jakob oen tawngha thli te na huh u ai . Nangmi tah adauben ah na rap vetih na naw te cakcak na rueng u ai !
42013029	Khawcuuk , khawtlaak , aluen ben akakk ben kalawng thlaang law u vetih Pathen Ram khuiah poei buh a veel haih u ai .
42013030	Tevengah te tahe ah hukhueng la aka awm he lamhacuekla awm vetih tahe ah lamhacuekla aka awm he hukhueng la awm ai . ” tila a thui pe .
42013031	Tevengah te Farasi thlaang khatsut a tengla law u tih Jesuh nala te , “ Herod lawng nang he ngawn ham a ngaih dawngah he kalawng atloela cet loeih ” a tina u .
42013032	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Tihin ah khaw , thangvuen ah khaw , kai lawng raaithe thli te ka hek vetih thlaangtlo te ka hoeih sak hun ai , a thum hin ah bii ka coeng ai . ” tila cet u langtah metaang tengah te thui pe uh . ” a tina .
42013033	Me tih khaw seh , kai ngoen tah tihin ah khaw , thangvuen ah khaw , awmvai ah khaw ka sai nooek te ka sai toengtoeng hun ai ; metihtiah tawngha pakhat he Jerusalem khawpui khui nawh atah atloe ame huen ah khaw ngawn ham theen nawh .
42013034	“ Jerusalem , Jerusalem ! Nang lawng tawngha thli te na ngawn , Pathen lawng na tengah avan tuih laipai thli te khaw lungto oen na de u ! Aainu lawng a ca thli te a phe oen a khuk adah angla na thlaang thli te ka pooem hamla voei yahawh hlang ka ngaih de nang lawng ah na thana .
42013035	Tedawngah nangmi kah Tempal bok-im te a hoett poen ai . Atak tang kavan thui u , ‘ Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe hawn seh ’ tila nangmi lawng na thuina atue te apha thlantoe kai he nan hu u tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
42014001	Sabbath khawhin hin at vengah Jesuh tah Farasi thlaang thli mawtkung pakhat im la te buh pan la cet ; tevengah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te rep a doen u .
42014002	Thlaang pakhat a kut a khaw aka phiing te Jesuh tengla va law ,
42014003	tevengah Jesuh lawng Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli te , “ Mami kah Phungawl lawng Sabbath khawhin ah thlaangtlo hoeih sak ham a ngaih aw , ngaih nawh aw ? ” tila a doet .
42014004	Tede ahimi te awlmueh la awm u . Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo te a khue , a hoeih sak tih a tuih .
42014005	Tecoengah ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi timkah thlaang pakhat kah a ca mai khaw , tihnawhtah vaitaw khaw , Sabbath khawhin ah ungrawmdung ah tla kawinih nangmi lawng doek pahoei ohla na awm ai aw ? ” a tina .
42014006	Tede he kawngah he ahimi lawng awl thung pe u nawh .
42014007	Kamyin khatsut lawngah huen theen koek a tuek u te Jesuh lawng a huh , tedawngah he kah thuidoetna he ahimi boeih tengah a thui pe :
42014008	‘ Thlaang pakhat khat lawng yuluina poei ah n'ceel vengah huen theen koek ah ngawl u boel . Nang lak ah awlpuila aka awm hinyah koei ngaai thlaang khaw a ceel thai mai ,
42014009	tevengah nang hih te aka ceelkung lawngah na tengla law vetih nang nala te , ‘ He ah he ahih ngawl seh . ’ n'tina ai . Tevengah nang tah yah laat la ahemkoek huen ah te na ngawl ai .
42014010	Tedawngah nang te thlaang lawng n'khue vengah cet langtah ahemkoek huen ah te ngawl mai hawn , te atah nang te imkung lawng na tengla law vetih , ‘ Ka puei , huen theen ngaai dawngah ngawl . ’ ti ai . He tila te nang tah atloe kamyin boeih haiah hinyahna na dang ai .
42014011	A-u khaw amah oen amah a pawm sang u atah adangla tla ai , a-u khaw amah oen amah adangla aka awm tah a pawmsang u ai .
42014012	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng imkung nala te , “ Nang lawngah hingthun buh khaw , thlembuh khaw , buh pan la thlaang na khue vengah na paya thli khaw , na imbe kuirang thlaanglen thli khaw khue boel . Metihtiah ahimi lawng nang te n'khue u van vetih te tila nang lawng na sai te avan thung van ai .
42014013	Nang lawng poei na sai vengah khawdeng thlaang , kut ngun khaw-ngun thlaang thli , kutkheem khowkheem thlaang thli oen mikpum thlaang thli te khue ;
42014014	ahimi lawngtah nang te n'thung koep thai nawh vetih nang lawng yotheenna na dawng ai . Thlaangdoeng thli duekna kalawng a thawhna khawhin ah Pathen lawng nang te n'thung badai . ” a tina .
42014015	Te kah buh veelna ah aka ngawl thlaang pakhat lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Jesuh nala te , “ Pathen Ram khuikah buhlawi poei ah aka thuum van tah yotheen aka dawng ni ! ” a tina .
42014016	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Thlaang pakhat lawng buhlawi a thawng tih thlaang yahawh thlaang te a ceel .
42014017	Buhlawi tel ham atue te a khoek veng atah kamyin thli te khue hamla amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang te a tuih tih , “ Law u loeih , soeprep boeih te coekroek la awm poen ! ” a tina .
42014018	Tede ahimi boeih pakhat coeng pakhat lawngah peelnangna awl te a thui u . Lamhacuek kah thlaang lawngah tuihyoeihthlaang te tila a thui pe , “ Lo ka lai tih ka cet silang ka bueh de ai ; ka law thai manawh n'reen mai hawn . ” a tina .
42014019	Thlaang pakhat lawngah , ‘ Vaitaw bawh ngaa ka lai tih ka phep hamla awm ; ka law thai manawh , n'reen mai hawn . ’ a tina .
42014020	Thlaangtloe pakhat lawngtah , ‘ Ka yu ka lawh pek tih ka law thai manawh . ’ a tina .
42014021	“ Tuihyoeihthlaang te meel koep tih he ang thli boeih he a bawi manghai tengah a thui pe . Bawi manghai tah a thin sa tih a tuihyoeihthlaang nala te , ‘ Khawpui khuikah lawngpui boeih oen imkep imvaai ah aloela cet langtah khawdeng thli , mikpum haaiying thli , kutngun , khowngun thli , kut kheem khow kheem thli te van law puei . ’ a tina .
42014022	Bawt a awm atah tuihyoeihthlaang lawngah , ‘ Bawipa , na awlpeek angla ka sai poen , tede awmna ham ahuen hoeng hun . ’ a tina .
42014023	Tedawngah a bawi manghai lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang nala te , ‘ Ka im khuiah thlaang abetoetna ham manglai lawngpui oen lawnglak boeih ah cet langtah thlaang boeih te van law puei .
42014024	Atak tang kavan thui , acuek kah thlaangceel thli a-u khat lawngkhaw ka buh ka aan he teng alai manawh . ’ a tina ” tila a thui pe .
42014025	Voei khat vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang lawng Jesuh oen a ceh haih u vengah ahimi benla te maang tih tila a thui pe .
42014026	“ A-u khaw ka tengla aka law thlaang thli lawngah a manu oen ana pa te a lungna lak ah khaw , a yu oen a ca thli te a lungna lak ah khaw , a maya manau thli oen a ngannu thli te a lungna lak ah khaw , amah oen amah te a lungna u lak ah khaw kai he aka lungna ngaai nawh tah ka hubang la awm thai ma-nawh .
42014027	A-u khaw amah kah thinglam te kawh ruila ka hu ah aka law nawh tah ka hubang la coengg thai manawh .
42014028	Nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawng imtloensang sak ham a kamthlah atah , bii coengna hamla tangka khoek ai aw tite ming ham lamhala ngawl vetih me yoeh aboeih ai tite a nai anawng ai .
42014029	Te tila a nai anawng lamha nawh atah bii a tong tih lungdang a suem coengah imtloensang a sak te coeng thai nawh vetih thlaang lawngah a nuihna ai .
42014030	‘ He thlaang lawngah he imtloensang tah a sak de bii khaw coeng thai nawh ! ’ ti u ai .
42014031	Sengpahrang pakhat ahih te teek ham raalkap thongkul oen aka law atloe sengpahrang pakhat te a raalkap thong ha oen kah hamla a ceh atah ahih lawng ngawl lamha vetih te sengpahrang te ka taa thai ai aw tite a poek ai .
42014032	A taa thai koei nawh atah ahih te teek ham aka law sengpahrang te athla hlangla a awm vengah laipai a tuih vetih roeproeina awl te a thui sak ai . ” tila a thui pe .
42014033	Jesuh lawng awlcuina ah , “ Tetih van angla nangmi timkah pakhat lawngah soeprep boeih te a hoett nawh atah ka hubang la coengg thai manawh . ” a tina .
42014034	“ Lungkeh tah theen , tede a aalna te a moelh atah aal sak koep ham sai thai la awm tlaih nawh .
42014035	Laitheen la khaw , laimeen la khaw sai ham theen tlaih nawh ; voeih ham ni a awm poen . Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya seh ! ” a tina .
42015001	Hin at ah mangmu cawikung thli oen thlaangthawlh thli tah Jesuh kah awl thui hutung hamla law u ,
42015002	Farasi thlaang thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli tah caitoek u tih , “ He thlaang lawngah he thlaangthawlh thli khaw a do tih ahimi oen buh Pateng khaw a caak haih u nawh pai he ! ” ti u .
42015003	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe ;
42015004	Nangmi khuikah thlaang pakhat lawngah tuu yakhat khueh mai tih tuuping timkah pakhat te auh mai kawinih n'tu a sai ai ? Ahih lawng tuu sawmkua pakua te ramtliim saino a awmna ramhum ah te a ceh taak vetih tuu aka auh te a dang thlantoe a tlap .
42015005	A dang koep veng atah awmngaih tangkiik tih a lengpang dawngah a kawh tih im la meel .
42015006	Tecoengah a paya thli oen a imbe kah thlaang thli te a khue tun tih ahimi nala te , “ Ka awmngaih tangkiik , tuu aka auh vik te ka dang koep poen , n'awmngaih puei u lah ! ’ a tina .
42015007	Atak tang kavan thui u , tetih van angla thawlhna yut ham aka ngaih nawh thlaangdoeng sawmkua pakua lak ah thlaangthawlh pakhat lawng thawlhna a yut dawngah vaan ah awmngaihna yahawh ngaai awm ai . ” a tina .
42015008	“ Hutaa pakhat lawngah ngun tangka pheek ha a khueh ti mai lah sih , te khuikah pakhat te a auh atah n'tu a sai ai ? Ahih lawng haiim te a vaang coengah im te a tell tih a huh thlantoe im khui tawm ah a tlap .
42015009	A huh koep veng atah a paya thli oen a imbe kah thlaang thli te a khue tun tih ahimi nala te , ‘ Ka awmngaih tangkiik , ngun tangka aka auh te ka dang koep poen , ng'awmngaih puei u lah ! a tina .
42015010	Atak tang kavan thui u , tetih van angla thlaangthawlh pakhat lawng a thawlhna a yut dawngah Pathen kah vanthlaang thli tah awmngaih u . ” a tina .
42015011	Jesuh lawng awl thui a tom koep tih , “ Voei khat ah capa pahih aka khueh thlaang pakhat awm .
42015012	A capa anoca lawngah te , ‘ A Pa , ka paang ham koei ro te tahe ah m'pe mai hawn ’ a tina . Tedawngah te kah thlaang lawngah a capa pahih ham ro te a pek pe .
42015013	Hin hih , hin thum coeng atah a capa anoca lawng te amah kah thaihu thli te a yoeih , tangka te a khuen tih atloela te cet . Ahih tah athlahlang ram la cet , te ah te awmtheen awmyaal aboen tih tangka a pooek ayak .
42015014	A khueh boeih te thloep a hawna . Tecoeng atah te kah ram pum ah te khawthe khawkha tih te vengah te ahih tah n'tu khat khaw khueh tlaih nawh .
42015015	Tedawngah te ram kah thlaang pakhat tengah bii bi hamla te cet , te kah thlaang lawng ahih te lo la a tuih tih awk a doen sak .
42015016	Ahih te a-u khat lawngkhaw caak koei a peek nawh dawngah awkbuh dawngkah maicik maidawn cang te a naai poen .
42015017	Hukhueng atah a lungcuih pan tih tila ti , ‘ A pa kah bii aka bi thlaang thli lawng caak lek awkknaa nawh la buh a khueh u , kai tah he ah he ka lamlum tawm poen !
42015018	Ka tho silang a pa tengla ka cet ai , tecoengah tila ka tina ai , ‘ A pa , Pathen oen nang sawah ka thawlh tangkiik poen .
42015019	Na ca ti hamla ka koeih tlaih nawh ; namah kah bii aka bi thlaang la khaw n'khueh mai hawn , ka tina ai , tila a poek .
42015020	Tecoengah tho tih ana pa tengla te koep meel . “ Im kalawng athlana ah a law vengah te ana pa lawng a huh dinn tih a reen tangkiik , heeng phai tih a capa te koe a kop tih a mok .
42015021	A capa lawng , ‘ A pa , Pathen oen nang sawah ka thawlh tangkiik oh poen . Na capa ti ham ka koeih tlaih nawh . ’ a tina .
42015022	Tede ana pa lawng a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te a khue tih , ‘ Angki theen koek te aloela van khuen u lang buen sak uh . Kutcabuen te buen sak u langtah khawmuek te khaw muek sak uh .
42015023	Tecoengah cet u langtah vaitaw sak-awm paduuk te van khuen u langtah ngawn uh , poei sai u sih !
42015024	Metihtiah ka capa he duek poen de tahe ah hing koep ; ahih tah vi vik poen de tahe ah phumpho koep . ’ a tina . Tecoeng atah poei te a sai u .
42015025	“ Te veng ah te a capa ahaamca te lo ah awm . Lawngpueng a law phai veng im a pha tawm atah riingding tum awl oen laa sak laam awl te a yaak .
42015026	Ahih lawngah a tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat te a khue tih a doet , ‘ N'tu a sai u ? ’ a tina .
42015027	Tuihyoeihthlaang lawng ah , ‘ Na nau te im la law koep tih sading ngaimawng la avan pha koep dawngah na pa lawng vaitaw sak-awm paduuk te a bawh pe . ’ a tina .
42015028	A capa ahaam te a thin sa soeh tih im khuila kuun nawh ; Te atah ana pa te law tih im khuila kuun ham a capa te a thloep ahoelh .
42015029	Tede a capa lawng ana pa nala te , “ Bueh lah , kum san hlang sal angla nang ham bii ka bi , na awl te ngaai ohla vai khat khaw ka awm nawh . Kai ta n'tu nan peek ? Ka paya thli oen awmtheenna poei sai ham me-ee pum at Pateng khaw nan pe nawh !
42015030	Tede nang kah koe-ava te poeihcaih mai la thlaanghalhnu oen aka hawna na capa he im la a law koep atah vaitawca sak-awm te na bawh pe ! ’ a tina .
42015031	Ana pa lawng , ‘ Ka ca , nang tah kamah tengah na awm tih ka toen thaihu boeih he nang kah thaihu ni .
42015032	Tede na nau he tah duek poen de tahe ah hing koep ; ahih tah vi poen de tahe ah phumpho koep , tedawngah ka awmngaih tih poei ka sai u , ’ tila a thui pe . ” a tina .
42016001	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah , “ Vai khat ah kuirang pakhat awm tih thaihu kuemkung tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat a khueh . Thaihu kuemkung lawngah a bawipa kah tangka apoei-oepla a hawna tila kuirang tengah a thui pe u ,
42016002	Tedawngah ahih te a khue tih , ‘ Nang kah kawng alam ka yaak he metila a awmna ? Ka thaihu boeih na kuemna cayin te m'pe loeih , nang tah thaihu kuemkung la na awm tlaih manawh . ’ a tina .
42016003	Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng a kaw khuiah , ‘ Ka bawipa lawng kai he bii n'toeng sak poen ai . Metila ka ti lah ai ? Tuilong to ham khaw ka tha lawng noeng koek nawh , Buh bih kutduen ham tah ka yak .
42016004	N'tu ka sai ai tite ka ming poen ! Te tila ka sai atah ka bii he aboet ah khaw a im ah aka awm sak ham paya thli ka khueh poen ai . ’ ti .
42016005	Tedawngah a bawipa kah laiba aka khueh thli te a khue . Lamhacuek kah thlaang te , ‘ Ka bawipa kah lai meyoeh na ba pe ? ’ tila a doet .
42016006	Ahih lawngah , ‘ Olif situi pung yakhat ka ba pe ’ a tina . Thaihu kuemkung lawng , ‘ He he nang kah cayin seh , ngawl thuk , sawm ngaa la mah thut mai hawn . ’ a tina .
42016007	Tecoengah atloe pakhat te , ‘ Nang ta , lai meyoeh na ba ? ’ tila a doet . Ahih lawngah , ‘ Caanghum suum thong khat ka ba , ’ a tina . Thaihu kuemkung lawng , ‘ He he nang kah cayin seh , yareet la thut mai . ’ a tina .
42016008	Te kah thaihu kuemkung lawng cuihna oen te tila thaihu a sai dawngah a bawipa lawng a koeh ; metihtiah he dilai thlaang thli lawng amami kah thaihu a sai vengah aangna khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lak ah cuih u ngai . ” a tina .
42016009	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Tedawngah kavan thui u : dilai bawilenna koeva oen paya laikoei sai uh , bawilenna koeva aboeih coeng dengah ni dungyan im ah nangmi te n'khueh ai .
42016010	A-u khaw thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm la a awm atah thaihu bo hlang dawngah khaw uep-awm la awm van ai ; a-u khaw thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm nawh atah thaihu bohlang dawngkhaw uep-awm van manawh .
42016011	Tecoengah dilai bawilenna koeva khoembelna dawngah uep-awm nawh atah metila bawilenna koeva tang tang te nangmi m'peek ai ?
42016012	Tecoengah thlaang kah koeva thaihu dawngah uep-awm nawh atah namami kah thaihu te a-u lawng m'peek tang ai ?
42016013	“ Me ang tuihyoeihthlaang lawngkhaw bawi manghai pahih kah sal la awm thai manawh , ahih lawng pakhat te a thina vetih a khat te a lungna ai ; pakhat teng atah a ciil cak vetih a khat te tah a hel acal ai . Nangmi lawng Pathen oen tangka kah bii te pahih bok la na bi renten thai manawh ” a tina .
42016014	Tangka aka ngaih soeh Farasi thlaang thli lawng he kah awl boeih he a yaak u vengah Jesuh te a nuihna u .
42016015	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng thlaangtloe kah mik huh atah thlaangdoeng la na sa u , tede nangmi kah thinkaw lungbui te Pathen lawng a ming . Metihtiah thlaang lawngah phutlo tangkiik la a poek thaihu thli he Pathen mik huh atah a phu awm nawh .
42016016	Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cathut te tah Baptisma pekung Johan dung toe ah ni a cak ; tecoeng kalawng tah Pathen Ram kawng Awlthang Theen te a phawng u tih thlaang boeih lawng toklekla kuun u .
42016017	Phungawl dawngkah a yitt koek a dek yet te a auh lak atah vaan oen dilai a auh te yoei ngaai .
42016018	“ A-u lawngkhaw a yu te a ma tih yu tloe a lawh atah samphaih poen ; tecoengah yu thlaak hutaa te khaw aka yuna thlaang tah samphaih poen ni , ” a tina .
42016019	Voei khat tah kuirang thlaang pakhat awm tih hinaak himbai phutlo oen thoekcau u tih hin roekk ah awmtheen a boenn .
42016020	Khawdeng thlaang pakhat Lazaruh aka miingna te awm van tih apum araw boeih ah vueihacang-ing lawng a yaawl , kuirang thlaang kah thawhka toela te avan law puei u ,
42016021	kuirang thlaang kah caboi dawng kalawng aka tla buhdik anhaai te caak hamla a ngaiuep . Ui Pateng khaw law tih ahih kah vueihacang-ing te a leh pe .
42016022	“ Khawdeng thlaang te a duek atah vaan kah poeipui ah Abraham tengah ngawlh sak hamla vanthlaang thli lawng a ceh puei u . Kuirang thlaang te khaw duek van tih a up u .
42016023	Ahih tah Hell khuiah patang a khang , athlahlangla a dan hang vengah Abraham tengah Lazaruh aka ngawl te a huh .
42016024	Te atah paang tih a khue , ‘ A pa , Abraham ! Kai he n'reen mai langtah Lazaruh te van tuih lah , a kutpue te tui dawngah nuemm selang ka daang he van suul lah seh , he kah hai khuiah he patang ka khang sut oh poen ! ’ a tina .
42016025	Tede Abraham lawngah , ‘ Ka capa , na hing khui puet ah thaihu theen boeih te m'peek poen , Lazaruh lawngtah athe thaihu boeih adang te ming lah saw . Tede , tahe ah ahih tah he ah he awmtheen a boenn tih nang tah patang na khang poen .
42016026	Tecoengah mami kah laklaw ah longhoi dung pakhat awm , tedawngah he kalawng ah he nang na awmna benla laan hamla aka ngaih thli khaw laan thai nawh , nang na awmna kalawng kaimi benla he a-u khatca khaw laan thai nawh ? a tina .
42016027	Kuirang thlaang lawngah , ‘ Tetih atah , A pa Abraham , reenna kavan bih , Lazaruh te a pa im la tuih lah ,
42016028	te ah te ka manau thli pa ngaa awm hun . Lazaruh te tuih langtah ahimi khat lawngah khaw he kah patang khangna ahuen he avan phana u nawh ham ahimi tengah ngaithuenna awl van thui pe lah seh . ’ a tina .
42016029	Abraham lawngah , ‘ Na manau hue te ngaithuen awl thui pe ham Mosi oen tawngha thli awm ta , ’ ahimi kah awl thui te na nau hue lawng hutung ngoen seh , ” a tina .
42016030	Kuirang thlaang lawngah , ‘ A pa Abraham , tete khoek nawh ! Thlaang pakhat khat he duekna kalawng tho tih cet kawinih ahimi lawngah a thawlhna te yut ai , ’ a tina .
42016031	Tede Abraham lawngah , ‘ Ahimi lawngah Mosi oen tawngha thli kah awl te a hutung u nawh atah thlaang pakhat khat duekna kalawng tho mai cakhaw ahimi lawng tangna manawh , ’ tila a thui pe , ” a tina .
42017001	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue tengah , “ Thawlhna khuiah thlaang aka tlaak sak thaihu thli awm ngai khoek ai , tede te ang tlaakna te aka sai thlaang thli ham tah khawmap tangkiik !
42017002	He camaw tim kah pakhat mai khaw thawlh sak lak atah caang neetna lungto bohlang a rawn a awi tih tuitunlii khuiah tla kawinih ahih ham theen bet ai .
42017003	Tedawngah na sai ham koei te ngaithuen uh ! Na boenhui te a thawlh atah ahih te toel athaam , a yut alawi atah a sawah khawdawp ngaai peh .
42017004	Ahih lawng hin at ah voei sarih na sawah thawlhna a sai tih voei sarih van na tengah law tih , ‘ Ka yut oh poen , ’ a ti atah a sawah khawdawp van ngaai peh , ” a tina .
42017005	Celtuih thli lawng Bawipa nala , “ Kaimi kah oengna he van roeng sak lah , ” a tina u .
42017006	Bawipa lawngah , “ Nangmi lawng antammu teh mai mah oengna te na khueh u atah he kah songlet thing he , ‘ Na yung oen haih ah namah poek ah phuk u langtah tuitunlii ah namah poek ah liing u lah , ’ na tina atah nangmi awl te avan ngaai ai , ” a tina .
42017007	“ Nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat lawngah laithawl aka sai mai khaw , tuudoen mai khaw seh tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat na khueh ti mai lah sih . Ahih te lo kalawng law tih a paipuek ah , ‘ Aloela buh ca loeih ’ na tina u ai aw ?
42017008	Na tina u manawh ! Te tila na tina lak ah nang lawng , ‘ Kai hamla thlembuh van lo de lah , tecoengah rangkhukna angki te buen langtah buh ka caak vengah kai he n'toet de lah ; tecoengah buh te na caak badai , ’ na tina ai .
42017009	Te kah tuihyoeihthlaang lawng awl a ngaai dawngah te awmngaih awl thui pe ham ngoe nawh de lah koen ?
42017010	Nangmi khaw te tila na awm u van , sai hamla avan thui boeih te na sai u coengah , ‘ Kaimi tah tuihyoeihthlaang mai ni ; kamami kah sai ham koei te ni ka sai u ’ ti u mai hawn , ” tila a thui pe .
42017011	Jerusalem khaw benla Jesuh a ceh phai vengah Samaria oen Galili laklaw ramri ah te cet .
42017012	Vangca pakhat la ahih te a kuun vengah haibe aka na thlaang paha a tengla law u . Ahimi lawngah athlala hoer pai u tih ,
42017013	“ Bawipa Jesuh ! Kaimi he n'reen lah ! ” tila paang u .
42017014	Jesuh lawng ahimi te a huh vengah , “ Cet u langtah nangmi te khawsoeih thli lawngah n'yutt n'yam u seh . ” a tina . Lawngpueng a ceh phai u vengah ahimi tah boeih hoeih u .
42017015	Ahimi tim kah pakhat lawngah ka hoeih poen tila a ming vengah , meel koep tih angaihhlangla Pathen te a koeh .
42017016	Jesuh kah a khowkungah dilai dawng buekuep tih Jesuh tengah uemna awl a thui . Te thlaang te tah Samaria thlaang ni .
42017017	Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaang paha hoeih u de lah koen ni , atloe pakua hue teta mela oh kai ?
42017018	N'tu ah he kah thlaangphun tloe pakhat bueng lawngah Pathen thangpawm ham a va meel koep ? ” a tina .
42017019	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Tho lang cet loeih ; na oengna lawng n'hoeih sak poen , ” a tina .
42017020	Farasi thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Pathen Ram he mevengah avan pha ai , ’ tila a doet u . Ahih lawng awl a thung pe tih , ‘ Pathen Ram he tah huh thai koeila law manawh .
42017021	A-u lawngkhaw , ‘ Bueh lah he ah awm he ! tihnawhtah , te ah awm te ! ’ tila thui thai manawh , metihtiah Pathen Ram tah namami khuiah ni a awm . ” a tina .
42017022	Tecoengah a hubang hue te , “ Thlaanghing Capa kah Khawhin hin at te nangmi lawng huh hamla na ngaihna atue law ai , tede nangmi lawng na hu u manawh .
42017023	Nangmi tengah , ‘ Bueh lah , ke ah awm ke ! ’ tihnawhtah , ‘ Bueh lah , he ah awm he ! ’ tila aka thui thlaang awm ai . Tede tlap hamla cet u boel .
42017024	Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin tah khaw thlap apha vengah khawhi-mikboet akhatben kalawng khatben toe ah a aangna lawng a thue rawngtheng angla te awm ai .
42017025	Tede ahih lawngah lamhala patang palai a khang vetih tihin hang kah thlaang thli lawng ahih te a hoett u ai .
42017026	Noah dung vengkah a awm angla te Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin vengah khaw awm van ai .
42017027	Noah te lowng khuila a kuun khawhin toe ah thlaang thli lawng a caak a awkk u tih hutaa tawngpa lawng yu a lawh u tih vaa a sak u , tuiliwpui law khuengdeng tih ahimi te boeih a khuk .
42017028	Lot dung vengah a awm angla te awm van ai . Thlaang boeih lawng a caak a awkk u , thaihu a lai u tih a yoeih u , thingkung rawkung a liing u tih im a sak u .
42017029	Lot lawng Sodom khaaw te a thawh taak hin vengah vaan kalawng hai oen kat hai te , khaw angla tlan tih ahimi boeih te a ngawn .
42017030	Thlaanghing Capa kah khawhin a thoeng vengah khaw te tila awm van ai .
42017031	Te khawhin ah amah kah imphu ah aka awm lawng a thaihu thli te lawh hamla im khuila kuun re tlaih boel seh ; te tila te lo ah aka awm thlaang lawngkhaw im la meel koep tlaih boel seh .
42017032	Lot kah a yu te hilh u boel !
42017033	A-u khaw a hingna te thlawn hamla a yawm atah a hingna te sung ai ; A hingna te a sung atah hingna te a dang ai .
42017034	Nangmi tengah kavan thui u , te kah khawhin ah ihkhun dawngah aka ip haih thlaang pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih a khat te a ceh taak ai ,
42017035	Sum deeng haih hutaa pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai .
42017036	Lo ah bii aka bi haih thlaang pahih khuiah pakhat te a lawh vetih pakhat te a ceh taak ai . ” a tina .
42017037	A hubang hue lawng ahih te , “ Bawipa , te tila te me tuek ah a awm ai ? ” tila a doet u . Jesuh lawngah , “ Duek rawkk a awmna roekk ah langta thli tun ai , ” a tina .
42018001	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te thathe muehla thangthui poepa ham awm tite cangpueina hamla thuidoetna pakhat ahimi tengah a thui pe .
42018002	Ahih lawngah , “ Khawpui pakhat ah Pathen khaw rih nawh tih thlaang khaw aka hinyah nawh awlcekbawi pakhat awm .
42018003	Te kah khawpui khuiah te huhai pakhat awm van , ahih lawngah awlcekbawi tengla law tih , ‘ Ka raal te a dokna ham n'bawm de lah ! ’ tila a bih poepa .
42018004	Awlcekbawi lawng a thana khiing de aboet lam atah , ‘ Kai lawng Pathen Pateng ka rih nawh tih thlaang khaw ka hinyah nawh ,
42018005	he kah huhainu lawng he n'lawn khiing aih poen dawngah awl ka tloek pe mai poen ai . Te tih nawh kawinih law poepa vetih hukhueng atah kamah he patang m'peek lat ai ! ? ti . ” a tina .
42018006	Tecoengah Bawipa lawng , “ Adoengla awl aka cek nawh awlcekbawi kah awl te hutung u lah .
42018007	Te atah amah tengah khawyiin khawdaai paang tih bawmna aka bih thlaang thli ham ah Pathen lawng adoengla awl te cek nawh ai aw ? Ahimi te bawm hamla a tat loe nawh ai aw ?
42018008	Nangmi tengah kavan thui , ahih lawngah ahimi kah ngaihna angla awl a cek vetih aloela a sai pe ai . Tede Thlaanghing Capa lawng a Law vengah dilai sawah he oengna te a huh ai aw ? ” a tina .
42018009	Amah kah theenna te a uepna tih thlaang boeih te tula aka sak nawh thlaang thli tengah he kah thuidoetna he Jesuh lawng a thui pe .
42018010	“ Voei khat ah thlaang pahih tah thangthui hamla Tempal bok-im la cet hih : Pakhat te tah Farasi thlaang la awm tih a khat te tah mangmu cawikung la awm .
42018011	Farasi thlaang lawngtah amah bueng pai tih , “ Aw , Pathen , kai tah ngaihmoekna aka khueh thlaang , hoem thui thlaang , samphaih thlaang , he ang thlaang thli angla ka awm nawh dawngah kan uem tangkiik . He kah mangmu cawikung angla khaw ka awm nawh dawngah kan uem baal
42018012	Kai tah yarh khat ah hin hih buh ka yeh tih , tangka ka dang boeih khuikah paha ah pakhat te nang kan peek . ” tila thangthui .
42018013	Tede mangmu cawikung tah athlala pai tih vaan benla Pateng maang ha nawh , a raang te a tum tih , ‘ Aw Pathen , kai thlaangthawlh he n'reen lah , ’ tila thangthui .
42018014	Nangmi tengah kavan thui u , mangmu cawikung lawng Pathen haiah doengna te a huh tih im la meel . Farasi thlaang lawng atah doengna te hu nawh . A-u khaw amah oen amah a pawmsang u atah adangla tla vetih a-u khaw amah oen amah te adangla aka awm tah a pawmsang u ai .
42018015	Thlaang khatsut lawng a ca camaw thli te Jesuh lawngah a sawah a kut tloeng pe selang tah thangthui pe seh a ti u dawngah Jesuh tengla avan law puei u . A hubang hue lawng a huh u tih ahimi te a ho u ,
42018016	tede Jesuh lawng camaw thli te amah tengla a khue tih , “ Camaw thli te ka tengla law seh , ahimi te kanghalh u boel , metihtiah Pathen Ram tah he ang camaw thli kah ni .
