42018017	He he hilh u boel ! A-u lawngkhaw Pathen Ram te camaw angla a do nawh atah te Ram ah kuun manawh . ” a tina .
42018018	Judah thlaang mawtkung pakhat lawng Jesuh te , “ Cangpueikung Saya Theen , dungyan hingna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai ? tila a doet .
42018019	Jesuh lawng ahih te , “ N'tu ah kai he thlaang theen nan tina ? Pathen pakhat bueng nawh atah a-u khat khaw theen nawh . ” a tina .
42018020	Awlpeek thli te na ming te ta : ‘ Hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai boel ; thlaang ngawn boel ; huuen boel ; asoeng nawh la thlaang te thawlh peel boel ; na nu oen na pe te hinyah ; ’ ti de lah koen . ” a tina .
42018021	Te thlaang lawngah , “ He kah awlpeek boeih he ka camaw veng kalawng ka vai boeih poen . ” a tina .
42018022	Jesuh lawng he awl he a yaak vengah ahih nala te , “ Nang lawng na sai ham pakhat a ngoe toengtoeng hun . Na khueh boeih te yooei langtah tangka te khawdeng thli te peh , te atah nang lawng vaan ram ah koeva thaihu na dang ai ; tecoengah law langtah ka hu ah bang lah . ” a tina .
42018023	Tede te kah thlaang lawng he awl he a yaak vengah a kaw la the malcal , metihtiah ahih tah broela a bawi alen dawngah ni .
42018024	Jesuh lawng ahih kah kawthe te a huh vengah , “ Kuirang thlaanglen ham tah Pathen Ram khuiah kuun hamla rai tangkiik oh he !
42018025	Kala-uk pakhat phaimeet khuiah a kuun lak ah kuirang thlaang pakhat lawng Pathen Ram khuiah kuun ham rai tangkiik , ” a tina .
42018026	Ahih kah awlthui te aka ya boeih lawngah , “ Tetih atah a-u lawng thlawnna te a dang ai , ” tila a doet .
42018027	Jesuh lawng , “ Thlaanghing ham aka coengg thai tlaih nawh te Pathen ham tah coengg thai . ” tila a thui pe .
42018028	Tecoengah Piter lawng , “ Bueh lah ! Na hu ah bang hamla kaimi lawngtah ka im khaw ka ceh taak u poen he . ” a tina .
42018029	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Oeih , atak tang kavan thui u , a-u khaw Pathen Ram kawngah a im khaw , a yu a ca thli khaw , maya manau khaw , a manu oen ana pa khaw , ca-anau thli khaw aka ceh taak tah ,
42018030	tahe san ah khaw , a pueh alawila a dang vetih aka law ham koei san ah khaw dungyan hingna te a dang ai . ” a tina .
42018031	Jesuh lawng hubang thlaihih te ahuep ahelna ah a ceh puei tih , “ Hutung u lah ! Mami he Jerusalem la n'cet u ai , te ah te tawngha thli lawng Thlaanghing Capa kawng a thut oepsoeh boeih te soep ai .
42018032	Ahih te Gental thlaang thli kut ah a peek u vetih nuihbu la a sai u ai , a sal aphaam u vetih a tumthoeih u ai .
42018033	Ahimi lawngah a bawh u vetih a ngawn ai , tede athum hin ah tho koep ai . ” tila a thui pe .
42018034	Tede a hubang hue lawng he ang thli he khat khaw yaakming u nawh ; ahimi ham tah he kah awl thuingaihna he thuhphah la awm tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe akawng alam he ming u nawh .
42018035	Jesuh tah Jeriko khaaw te a pha tawm , tevengah lawngteng ah mikpum thlaang pakhat ngawl , kut a duen tih buh a bih .
42018036	Ahih lawngah thlaangping kah ceh tuen awl te a yaak vengah , “ He he n'tu muuem ca ? ” tila thlaang thli te a doet .
42018037	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh va law ” a tina u .
42018038	Ahih lawngah paang tih , “ Devid capa , Jesuh ! Kai he n'reen lah . ” a tina .
42018039	Hai ben kah aka cet thlaangping lawngah ahih te a tlung u tih duem awm ham a thui pe u . Tede ahih lawngah angaihhlangla paang tare tih , “ Devid capa , kai he n'reen lah ! ” a tina .
42018040	Tevengah Jesuh te cot pai tih te kah mikpum te a tengla te van law puei uh a tina . A teng avan pha atah Jesuh lawngah ,
42018041	“ Nang hamla n'tu kavan sai ai ? ” tila a doet . Ahih lawng , “ Bawipa , ka mik he a tueng koep ham ka ngaih . ” a tina .
42018042	Jesuh lawng , “ Na mik tueng koep seh ! Na oengna lawng na mik avan tueng sak poen . ” a tina .
42018043	Ahih te a mik tueng pahoei , Jesuh hu ah bang tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui . Te tila a awm te thlaangping lawng a huh vengah ahimi boeih lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u veng .
42019001	Jesuh tah Jeriko khaw la kuun tih te kalawng poe cet .
42019002	Te ah te Zakia aka miingna mangmu cawikung bawi pakhat awm tih ahih tah bawireng tangkiik .
42019003	Jesuh he a-u kai ti tih huh hamla a yawm , tede ahih tah thlaang hemm la awm tih thlaangping lawng a thlip khoep dawngah Jesuh te hu thai nawh .
42019004	Tedawngah Jesuh a cehna koei ben ah thlaangping kah hai benla heeng phai tih ahih te a huhna ham thaihba thing dawngah luui .
42019005	Jesuh lawng te huen te a pha atah asaw benla maang hang tih Zakia nala te , “ Zakia , aloela rum thuk , tihin ah nang im ah ka pah ai . ” a tina .
42019006	Zakia tah aloela rum thuk tih awmngaih cala ahih te a pah sak .
42019007	Te tila a awm te thlaang thli lawng a huh u vengah , “ He kah thlaang he thlaang-thawlh im ah pah hamla a ceh maica ! ” ti tih caitoek u .
42019008	Zakia lawng pai hang tih Bawipa nala te , “ Bawipa , hutung lah ! Ka khueh thaihu avaang athal ah khawdeng thlaang thli ka pe ai , thlaang ka thai ka latna tih thaihu ka lawh pe atah apueh asawm let lii la ka sah ai . ” a tina .
42019009	Ahih te Jesuh lawng , “ He kah im ah thlawnna ti hin ah a pha poen , metihtiah ahih khaw Abraham kah cadil van ni .
42019010	Thlaanghing Capa tah thlaangha paataam tlap ham oen ah thlawn ham ni a law . ” a tina .
42019011	Thlaangping hue lawng awl a hutung u lii vengah he kah thuidoetna pakhat he a thui pe . Jerusalem te a pha tawm u poen tih ahimi lawngtah Pathen Ram he tueng pahoei poen ai tila a poek u .
42019012	Tedawngah tila a thui pe , “ Voei khat ah areng aka sang thlaang pakhat awm tih sengpahrang la coengg ham khaw thla la cet , tecoeng atah im la meel koep hamla te kamthlah .
42019013	A ceh thlan ah tuihyoeihthlaang paha te a khue , ahimi te sui tangka pheek at rip a peek tih , “ Khawlawng la ka ceh ruet ah , he kah tangka oen thaihu thaiha yooei uh . ” a tina .
42019014	Tede ahih te a ram khuikah thlaang thli lawng a thina u dawngah laipai a tuih u tih , “ He kah thlaang he kaimi lawngah sengpahrang la ka ngaih u nawh . ” tila te a thui sak u .
42019015	Te kah thlaang te sengpahrang la a awm coeng atah koep meel . A tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawng tangka apuung ataai meyoeh a dang kai tite ming a ngaih tih ahimi te pahoei a khue .
42019016	Lamhacuek kah thlaang te law tih , ‘ Bawipa ! Nang lawng nan peek tangka pheek at oen thaihu thaiha ka yoeih tih apuung ataai sui tangka pheek ha ka dang , ’ a tina .
42019017	Tevengah ahih lawng , ‘ Theen ! Nang tah aka theen tuihyoeihthlaang ni ! Nang tah thaihu tehca dawngah uep-awm la na awm tih khawpui paha ukkung la kan khueh ai . ’ a tina .
42019018	Tecoengah a pahihna tuihyoeihthlaang te law tih , ‘ Bawipa , nang lawng nan peek tangka pheek at oen thaihu thaiha ka yoeih tih apuung ataai sui tangka pheek ngaa ka dang , ’ a tina .
42019019	Ahih te khawpui pa-ngaa ukkung la na awm ai , ’ a tina .
42019020	Atloe tuihyoeihthlaang te law tih , ‘ Bawipa , nang kah tangka te awm ngoen he ; baipeen oen ka cuun tih ka kuem mangkhak ta . ’ a tina .
42019021	Nang tah amangkhak thlaang la na awm tih kan rih tangkiik . Nang lawngtah namah kah thaihu nawh khaw na lawh tih caangti na tuh nawh te khaw na ah mai ? a tina .
42019022	Ahih nala te , ‘ Nang thlaangthe tuihyoeihthlaang ! Na awlthui te namah awlcekna ham ka hawna ai ! Kai he amangkhak thlaang , kamah kah thaihu nawh khaw ka lawh tih caangti ka tuh nawh te khaw ka ah te na ming ta .
42019023	Theen , te atah , n'tu ah tangka kuemna bengh ah ka tangka te na khueh nawh ? Ka meel koep vengah tangkaca oen acingrang la ka dang ai ta . ’ a tina .
42019024	Tecoengah te kah aka pai thlaang thli nala te , “ Ahih tengkah sui tangka te lo u langtah tangka pheek ha aka khueh tuihyoeihthlaang te pe uh . ’ a tina .
42019025	Tede ahimi lawng , ‘ Bawipa , ahih tah tangka pheek ha a khueh poen ta ! ’ a tina u .
42019026	Ahih lawng awl a thung pe tih , ‘ Kavan thui u , yahawh hlang aka khueh te yahawh ngaai a peek ai ; tede aka khueh nawh te a khueh duen Pateng khaw a lawh pe ai .
42019027	Kai he amami kah sengpahrang la awm sak ham aka ngaih nawh ka raal thli te van law puei u langtah ahimi te ka hai ah ngawn uh ! ’ a tina ” tila a thui pe .
42019028	Jesuh lawng he kah thuidoetna awl he a thui coengah ahimi haiah Jerusalem la te cet .
42019029	Olif Tlaang tengkah Betfat oen Bethani khaaw te a pha u tawm atah a hubang pahih te hai la a tuih tih tila awl a uen :
42019030	‘ Na hai kah khaaw la ke an cet hih langtah khaaw khuila na kuun hih vengah a-u lawngkhaw a cit thlan lacano pakhat a kiing u te na huh pahoei hih ai . A kiingna rui te thlam hih langtah he la he van khuen .
42019031	Thlaang pakhat khat lawngah n'tu ham rui te na thlam a ti atah , Bawipa lawng a ngoe tila thui peh . ” a tina .
42019032	Ahih rawi lawng cet hih tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe angla soeprep boeih te a huh .
42019033	Ahih rawi lawng lacano a khihna rui te a thlam hih lii vengah la khuehkung lawngah ahih rawi nala te , “ N'tu hamla rui te na thlam hih ? ” a tina .
42019034	Te rawi lawngah , “ Bawipa lawng a ngoe , ” a tina hih tih ,
42019035	Jesuh tengla lacano te a khuen pe . Tecoengah ahimi lawngah amami kah himbai te lacano kah a uen dawngah a phaih u tih Jesuh te a ngawlh sak u .
42019036	Jesuh lawng lacano te a cit tih a ceh phai vengah thlaangping lawng amami kah himbai te lawngpui ah a phaih u .
42019037	Jerusalem te a pha tawm tih Olif Tlaang tengkah singlingla lawngpui a rum thukna ahuen kalawng tah a hubang thli thlaangping lawngah kawpoek rai thaihu thli te a huhna dawngah Pathen te a uem u tih angaih-hlangla a thangpawm u :
42019038	“ Bawipa miing oen aka law sengpahrang tah Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna pe hawn seh ! Vaan ah roepna awm selang Pathen tengah ruep-awmna awm hawn seh ! ” tila paang u .
42019039	Tevengah thlaangping timkah Farasi thlaang khatsut lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , na hubang thli he awl a phahna ham thui pe lah , ” a tina u .
42019040	Jesuh lawngah , “ Kavan thui u , ahimi lawng awl phah sap kawinih lungto thli lawng amah poek ah paang ai ta . ” a tina .
42019041	Jerusalem khawpui te a pha tawm tih , Jerusalem te a huh atah rap .
42019042	“ Tihin ah ngaimawngna hamla n'tu angoe ti bueng mah te na ming u mai kawinih ! Tede nang lawng tahe ah na hu thai nawh !
42019043	Nang he na raal thli lawngah raalvawng oen ceemraal oen ah n'duum khoep vetih khatben khatbang kalawng n'khaih khoepna khawhin te a pha ai .
42019044	Ahimi lawngah nang te m'phe phengvel vetih na vawngup khuiah na thlaang thli te a ngawn dingkang poen ai . Ahimi lawng lungto khatca khaw khupthal ohla awmna huen ah ceh taak u manawh , metihtiah nang thlawn hamla Pathen a lawna atue atang te na ming nawh dawngah ni ! ” a tina .
42019045	Tecoengah Jesuh tah Tempal bok-im khuila kuun tih thaihu aka yooei thlaang thli te pheng a vai ,
42019046	ahimi nala te , “ Caciim dawngah , Pathen lawng , ‘ Kai kah Tempal bok-im tah thangthuina im tila a thui u ai . ’ tila a thut te ta . Tede nangmi lawngtah thlaanghuuen pa caan thli kuepyingna la na sai u poen . ” a tina .
42019047	Jesuh lawng khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im khuiah a cang puei u . Khawsoeih ahaamca thli , Phung-awl cangpueikung thli oen thlaangping mawtkung thli lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih u ,
42019048	tede thlaang boeih lawng ahih awl te a thung u tih lung at khaw thlauh ham a ngaih u nawh dawngah ahimi lawng te tila te sai ham along a-im hu u nawh .
42020001	Hin at ah Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah thlaang thli te a cang puei tih Awlthang Theen te a phawng , khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli , bokna ben kah ahaamca thli thik at la haih law u tih ,
42020002	ahih nala te , “ He thaihu thli sai hamla ame ang saithaina na khueh ? Saithaina aana he a-u lawng m'peek ? van thui lah ” a tina u .
42020003	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Nangmi he tahe ah awl khat ah kan doet u van lah ai .
42020004	Johan lawng baptisma peek ham saithaina aana he Pathen tengkah a huh aw , tihnawhtah thlaanghing tengkah aw ? Van thui u lah , ” a tina .
42020005	Ahimi lawngah amami oen amami te oelhtaih khiing u tih , “ Metila n'thui u lah ai ? ‘ Pathen tengkah a dang , ’ tila n'thui pe kawinih ahih lawngah , ‘ N'tu ah Johan te na tangna u nawh ti ai ta .
42020006	Tede mami lawng , “ Thlaanghing tengkah ni , ’ n'tina u kawinih he kah thlaang boeih lawngah Johan he tawngha tangtang ni tila a oeng u dawngah lungto oen n'de ai , ” ti u .
42020007	Tedawngah ahimi lawng , “ Ame kah nuem ka ming u nawh . ” a tina u .
42020008	Te atah Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Tetih atah kai lawngkhaw he kah thaihu thli he ame kah saithaina aana oen ka sai ti he ka thui van manawh ” a tina .
42020009	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng thlaangping hue te he kah thuidoetna awl he a thui pe : “ Thlaang pakhat lawngah misurdum a sai tih dum te thlaang a vat , tecoengah amah tah khawlawng thla la cet tih asan hlang awm .
42020010	Misur thaih bit tue a pha veng atah a salpa pakhat te dum vat thlaang thli tengla a tuih tih amah lawng ahimi tengkah dang ham koei te a lawh sak . Tede dum aka vat thlaang hue lawng a salpa te a tam doetthloet u tih atliing saloella a meel sak u .
42020011	Tecoengah atloe a salpa pakhat te a tuih koep ; tede dum aka vat thlaang thli lawng ahih te khaw a bawh doetthloet u tih athe akhana u , yah a bai u tih atliing saloella te a meel sak u .
42020012	Tecoengah a pathumna a salpa te a tuih ; dumvat thlaang thli lawngah ahih te khaw boengha a caak sak u tih dum adaubenla a voeih u .
42020013	Tecoeng atah dumkhuehkung lawng , ‘ Metila ka sai lah ai ? Ka lungna duet ka capa he man nih ka tuih mai poen sui , ahih ngoen tah a hinyah u ngai badai ! ’ ti .
42020014	Tede dum vat thlaang thli lawng ahih te a huh u vengah , ‘ Ahih he tah dum khuehkung kah a capa ni . Ngawn u sih , ahih lawng a paang ham koei ro he mami ham awm seh ! ’ tila a thui u .
42020015	Tedawngah ahimi lawng a capa te dum adaubenla a khuen u tih a ngawn u . Tetih atah misurdum khuehkung lawng dum vat thlaang thli te metila a sai ? ”
42020016	Ahih te law vetih te kah thlaang thli te a ngawn coeng atah misurdum te thlaangtloe a vat ai . ” tila a thui pe . Thlaangping lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah , “ Te tila te awm roe mai boel seh ! ” ti u .
42020017	Jesuh lawng ahimi te he tila a doet , “ Caciim dawngah , im aka sa thlaang thli lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lungto te atloe boeih lak ah awlpui koek la coengg , ’ tila a thui te ta n'tu a thuingaihna ?
42020018	A-u khaw te kah lungto dawngah aka tla boeih tah adiik anuui la rek vetih te kah lungto lawng a tlaak thil thlaang te khaw adiik avaai la a neet ai . ” a tina .
42020019	Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng he kah thuidoetna awl he amami ni a thuingaihna tite a ming u dawngah Jesuh te tuuk pahoei ham a ngaih u ; tede ahimi lawngah thlaangping te a rih u .
42020020	Tedawngah ahimi lawng atue theen te a ring u . Tedawngah saithaina aana aka khueh Rom acoyah kah ram ukbawi kut ah Jesuh te peek thai ham , thlaang khatsut te thlaangdoeng la aka sa u ham tangka kutsuh a peek u tih Jesuh te awl kaa doetdapna oen thawlhna te thuep aka doen la a tuih u .
42020021	He kah raalyam thlaang hue lawngah Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , nang lawng na thui tih na cang puei thli he soeng tila ka ming u . Nang lawngtah thlaang mik-hai khaw dan muehla Pathen kah kawngaihna akawng awltak te na cang puei tila ka ming u .
42020022	Kaimi lawngah Rom sengpahrang sangluel tengah mangmu peek hamla mami kah Phungawl oen kalh u the aw , kalh u nawh aw ? van thui lah . ” a tina u .
42020023	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi kah thailatna te thiim a ming tih ,
42020024	“ Ngun tangka pakhat ah n'huh sak u lah . Tangka dawngah a-u kah muei-ame oen a miing a awm ? ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Sengpahrang sang-luel kah mueime oen a miing awm , ” a tina u .
42020025	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng , “ Tetih atah Sengpahrang sangluel kah koe te sengpahrang sangluel te pe uh , Pathen kah koe te Pathen pe uh ” a tina .
42020026	Ahimi lawng thlaangping hai ah te a thawlhna khat khaw tu u thai nawh , ahih kah awlthungna te a kawpoek la rai u tih awl mueh thuep la awm u .
42020027	Tecoeng atah , thlaang he duekna kalawng ah tho koep nawh tila aka thui Sadusi thlaang khatsut te Jesuh tengla law u tih ahimi lawng ,
42020028	“ Saya , Mosi lawngtah kaimi ham phungawl tila avan thut : ‘ Thlaang pakhat lawng a ca sak muehla a yu te a duek taak atah a manau lawng a maya yu te paang seh , ca-anau cuun selang tah aka duek a maya kah ca-anau ti u seh , ’ tila a thut .
42020029	Voei khat ah boenhui pasarih awm ; ahaam koek lawng te yu a lawh de ca sak muehla duek .
42020030	Tecoengah apabena lawngah te kah hutaa te a yuna tih ca sak muehla a duek taak van .
42020031	Tecoengah apathumna a manau lawng a yuna de ca sak muehla a duek taak baal . Te tila te boenhui pasarih lawng ca sak muehla boeih a duek taak u .
42020032	Hukhueng atah te kah hutaa khaw duek van .
42020033	Boenhui thlaang pasarih lawng ahih te a yuna u , tetih atah thlaangduek thawhkoepna khawhin ah a-u kah a yu la a awm ai ? ” tila a doet u .
42020034	Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Hutaa oen tawngpa lawngah hingkhui vengah ni yu vaa la a awm ai ,
42020035	tede duekna kalawng aka tho ham koei hutaa oen tawngpa hue tah aka law ham koei hingna dawngah yuvaa la awm tlaih manawh .
42020036	Ahimi tah vanthlaang angla awm u vetih duek thai manawh . Ahimi tah duekna kalawng tho koep u poen tih Pathen kah ca-anau la ni a awm u poen .
42020037	Thlaangduek tho koep ai ti he Mosi lawng aciimphanla a thui . A boeih tangte tangpuem ungna kawng a thuina dawngah Bawipa te , ‘ Abraham Pathen , Isak Pathen oen Jakob kah Pathen , ’ tila a thui .
42020038	Ahih tah aka hing hue kah Pathen la awm tih aka duek thli kah Pathen nawh ni , ahih dawngah thlaang boeih tah hing . ” tila a thui pe .
42020039	Phungawl cangpueikung khatsut hue lawngah , “ Saya , awl na thung pe he theen ! ” a tina u .
42020040	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te awl kam at khaw doet ha u tlaih nawh .
42020041	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Messiah tah Devid cadil la awm ai tila te metila a thui thai u kai ?
42020042	Metihtiah Devid amah lawng Saam cabu dawngah , ‘ Bawipa lawng ka Bawipa tengah ,
42020043	Na raal thli te na khowtloeng la ka sai thlantoe Ka bantang ben ah he ngawl lah , ’ tila a thui .
42020044	Devid lawng ahih te , ‘ Bawipa ’ a ti atah metila Messiah te Devid cadil la a awm thai ai ? ” tila a doet .
42020045	Thlaangping lawngah ahih kah awl te a hutung u lii vengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te ,
42020046	“ Phungawl cangpueikung thli tengah he ngaithuen u lah , ahimi lawngah himbaidung bai oen yingyawi ham a ngaih u , thaihu yoeihna huen ah thlaang kah voemtoeina oen hinyahna te a ngaih u ; sinakok ah ngawlhna athloekla a hooep u te a tuek u tih poei saina ah ngawlhna atheen koek te a tuek u ;
42020047	huhai tumtee kah thaihu oen a im te a rot pe u tih thlaang kah yaak ngaih la asanhlangla thangthui u ! Ahimi lawngah athekoek dantatna te a dang u ai ! ” a tina .
42021001	Jesuh lawng maang tih a teng avai te a dan vengah Tempal bok-im kah tangkakong khuiah kuirang thli lawng tangka a sang u te a huh ,
42021002	Khawdeng tangkiik huhai pakhat lawng ruhum pheksa pahih a sang te khaw a huh .
42021003	Tevengah ahih lawng , “ Atak tang kavan thui u , thlaangtloe boeih lak ah he kah khawdeng koek huhai lawng yahawh ngaai te a sang poen .
42021004	Metihtiah thlaangtloe hue lawngtah amami kah khuehtoen bawi alenna dawngkah acoeih aphe te ni a peek u , tede he hutaa he tah khawdeng de amah kah hingna ham a khueh duen te a peek kik poen ” a tina .
42021005	A hubang khatsut hue lawngah Tempal bok-im lungto theen theen oen dan ngaih danthluela thoekcauna oen Pathen tengah kutdo peekna akawng te a thui u .
42021006	Tevengah Jesuh lawngah , “ He kah na huh boeih he , lungto khatca khaw ceh taak ohla apum boeih la a voeih dingkangna atue te avan pha ai . ” a tina .
42021007	Ahimi lawngah , “ Saya , metuek vengah he tila a awm ai ? Atue apha poen tite noekna ham n'tu aka thoeng ai ? ” tila a doet u .
42021008	Jesuh lawng , “ Ngaithuen uh ; a-u lawngkhaw n'thaina boel seh . Thlaang broe lawngah ka miing oen law ai , ‘ Kai tah ahih poen ni ! Atue a pha poen ! ’ ti ai . Tede ahimi hu ah te bang u boel .
42021009	Nangmi lawng raal thawhna oen ceemtloekna te na yaak u vengah rih u boel ; te ang thaihu te lamhacuek ah va thoeng ai , te ang thli te aboetna tah yoeii poen ti ngaihna nawh ni . ” a tina .
42021010	Tecoengah a awl thui te a tom tih , “ Ram pakhat oen khat kaap u the ai ; thlaangphun khat oen khat thekyak u the ai .
42021011	Khaaw yat ram yat ah rih-awm likluei hinghuen ai ; khawthe khawkha oen tlawhtahaw awm ai ; vaan kalawng miknoekna oen rih-awm thaihu thoeng ai .
42021012	He kah thaihu boeih he a thoeng thlan ah nangmi te n'tuuk u vetih n'heemtek u ai ; nangmi te sinakok ah awlcek ham n'ceh puei u vetih thongim ah n'thlaak ai ; kai kawngah sengpahrang thli oen ukkung bawi thli haiah n'khuen ai .
42021013	He tah Awlthang Theen phawngna ham ah nangmi hamla atue theen la awm ai .
42021014	Namah oen namah te metila ka phungtu u ai tite lakueng u boel , thincak la awm oepsoeh uh ,
42021015	metihtiah na raal thli a-u khatca lawngkhaw oelhtaih thai nawh tih taa thai nawh hamla nangmi lawng na thui ham koei awl oen cuihna te kan peek ai .
42021016	Nangmi te na nu oen na pa lawngkhaw , na boenhui lawngkhaw , na paya lawng-khaw raal kut ah m'peek u vetih nangmi timkah khatsut te tah a ngawn u ai .
42021017	Kai kawngah nangmi te thlaang boeih lawng n'thina ai .
42021018	Tede na luu dawngkah sam te thaam at mai khaw ha ata manawh .
42021019	Acakla pai lah , tetih atah namah oen namah te na thlawn u ai .
42021020	“ Jerusalem khawpui te raal thli lawng a veel khoep te na huh u vengah adiw thlan ah rawk poen ai tila te ming uh .
42021021	Tevengah Judia ram khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lawng tlaang sawm la heeng u seh ; khawpui khuiah aka awm thlaang thli lawng khawpui te co taak u seh , khaaw teng khaaw vai ah aka awm thlaang thli lawng khawpui khuila kuun u boel seh .
42021022	Metihtiah te hin te tah , ‘ Dantatna Khawhin ’ la a awm dawngah Caciim lawng a thui te soep ai .
42021023	Te khawhin tah bungpum vawn-um oen cacuun naukem hutaa thli ham tah khawmap sut maimah aw ! He kah ram khuiah rih-awm mueirihtamyiin te thoeng vetih he kah thlaang thli sawah Pathen kah dantatna te thoeng ai .
42021024	Thlaang khatsut te samsen oen a ngawn u vetih atloe hue te tah ram tawm ah saltamnaa la a khuen ai ; thlaangphun tloe lawng amami kah atue atang te aboet thlantoe Jerusalem te a khow huiah a khueh ai .
42021025	“ Te atah khawmik , thla oen aisi thli dawngah , noekna alakloe te thoeng ai . Dilai sawkah ram boeih lawng tuitunlii kah tuisambaak awl oen tuilet thawh awl te a rih u vetih ngaihang khawbing la awm ai .
42021026	Dilai pum ah aka law ham koei te thlaang thli lawng a poek doen u vengah a rih u vetih thuen ai , metihtiah vaan kah huham tharana te hinghuen ai .
42021027	Tecoengah thlaanghing capa tah ruep-awmna oen bawilen tharana oen muui dawngah a rum thuk te a huh u ai .
42021028	He thaihu thli a thoengna ham atong poen atah pai u langtah na luu te thawh u lah , metihtiah nangmi thlawnna ham tah yoeii poen ” a tina .
42021029	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah he kah thuidoetna he a thui pe : “ Thaidut thing oen atloe thingthaih boeih te poek u lah .
42021030	A dawn thaai a cawn hang te nangmi lawng na huh u vengah khawhaal hungkang tue tah yoeii poen tila na ming u .
42021031	Tetih van angla he kah thaihu thli a thoeng te nangmi lawng na huh u vengah Pathen Ram tah law poen ai tila ming uh .
42021032	He he hilh u boel , tahe ah aka hing thlaang thli he a duek boeih thlan ah he kah thaihu thli he va thoeng ai .
42021033	Vaan oen dilai tah khum ai , tede ka awl he tah mevengah khaw khum manawh .
42021034	“ Ngaithuen u lah ! Nangmi lawng awmtheen awmyaal poeibuh caak awkk oen dilai han khawsak lakuengna te poek u aih boel , te tila na awm u veng bawtbet khawlai ah te kah Khawhin lawng nangmi teng avan pha ai .
42021035	Metihtiah te tah dilai saw khaaw tawm ah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah thoeng ai .
42021036	He kah aka law ham koei thaihu thli he ading asuekla pooeng ahana ham , tharana khueh tih Thlaanghing Capa haiah paina thai ham ahuertuela awm u langtah thangthui yoeyah uh . ” a tina .
42021037	Jesuh lawng khawdaai atah Tempal bok-im ah thlaang thli te a cang puei , thlemben atah Olif Tlaang la cet tih khawyiin atah te ah te ip yoeyah .
42021038	Thlaang boeih lawngah ahih awl te hutung hamla mincanghi ah Tempal bok-im la te cet u .
42022001	Kaantaakpoei , Tawlru aka thuum nawh Takawi Poei tah atue yoeii poen .
42022002	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng thlaangping te a rih u dawngah Jesuh te ahuepla ngawn ham along a-im tlap hamla a yawm u .
42022003	Tevengah hubang paha thlaihih khuiah aka thuum Iskariot a ti u Judas kaw khuila Seitan te kuun .
42022004	Tedawngah Judas tah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raal bawi thli tengla cet tih Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek thaina ham koei akawng te a thui u .
42022005	Ahimi tah a kaw hoe soeh u tih ahih te tangka peek ham awl a khueh u .
42022006	Te tila te Judas khaw a kaw tla van tih thlaangping lawng he kawng he ming ohla Jesuh te ahimi kut ah peek ham atue theen te tlap ham a tong .
42022007	Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei vengkah Kaantaak poeibuh hamla tuuca ngawn ham khawhin te a pha .
42022008	Jesuh lawng Piter oen Johan te he tila awl a uen tih a tuih : “ Cet hih langtah mami kah caak ham Kaantaak Poei te roekbah hih ” a tina .
42022009	Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Ame huen ah roekbah sak ham na ngaih ? ” tila a doet .
42022010	Ahih lawng , “ Nanghih lawng khawpui khuila na kuun vengah tuithaan thlaang pakhat oen na hum u ai . Ahih a kuunna im khuila te vai poe hih langtah ,
42022011	Imkung nala te , ‘ Saya lawng , me kah akhann khuiah nuem Kaantaak Poei buh te ka hubang hue oen ka caak ai ? ’ ti , tila thui peh .
42022012	Ahih lawngah im han kah akhann kau hlang thaihu a cungkuem la aka awm te n'huh sak ai , te ah te thaihu soeprep te roekbah hih , ” a tina .
42022013	Ahih rawi tah cet hih tih Jesuh lawng a thui pe angla soeprep te a huh tih Kaantaak Poei buh te a roekbah hih .
42022014	Atue a khoek vengah Jesuh lawng caboi te a hubang hue oen haih a veel u .
42022015	Ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawngah patang palai ka khang thlan ah Kaantaak Poei buh he nangmi oen veel haih hamla ka ngaih tangkiik !
42022016	Nangmi tengah kavan thui u , metihtiah Pathen Ram khuiah he kah poei buh lawng thuingaihna tangtang te a tueng sak thlantoe tah ka ca tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
42022017	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng boengloeng te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui , “ He he lo u langtah nangmi khat oen khat rekra u lang aw uh .
42022018	Kavan thui u , tahe kalawng ah Pathen Ram a pai thlantoe misurtui he ka aw tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
42022019	Tecoengah takawi te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coeng atah takawi te a eh tih ahimi te a peek , “ He tah ka pum ni , nangmi ham kan peek te ni . Nangmi lawng kai he nan poek khuepna ham he tila sai uh . ” a tina .
42022020	Tetih toengtoeng la thlembuh caak coengah boengloeng te ahimi a peek tih , “ He kah boengloeng he tah nangmi ham ka hok ka thi oen ah ka cak sak Pathen kah awlkam thaai ni .
42022021	Tede , bueh lah ! Ka sawah paipi aka thleepkung tah caboi tengah ka awm haih .
42022022	Pathen kah awltloek angla Thlaanghing Capa tah duek ai , tede ka sawah paipi aka thleep thlaang ham tah khawmap tangkiik mah aw ! ” a tina .
42022023	Tecoeng atah ahimi khat oen khat te a-u lawngah he kah thaihu he a sai ai tila doet u .
42022024	A hubang hue lawng amami tim ah a-u nuem aka lenduet la poek ham aka awm ti u tih awl puung u .
42022025	Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Pathen aka oeng nawh sengpahrang thli lawng thlaang rangpui sawah aana a khueh u tih ukkung bawi thli lawngkhaw amami te ‘ Thlaang rangpui te aka lungvatkung ni ’ ti u .
42022026	Tede nangmi tah te tila awm ham nawh ni ; nangmi timkah aka lenduet lawngtah anoca koek angla awm ham ni , mawtkung lawngah tuihyoeihthlaang angla awm ham ni .
42022027	A-u aka lenduet , buh caak ham aka ngawl thlaang aw , tihnawhtah buhteemkung aw ? Aka ngawl thlaang te lenduet ta . Tede , kai tah nangmi tim ah buh teem an teem angla ka awm .
42022028	“ Nangmi lawngtah suek-halhna ka tawngna boeih ah nan awm puei u ;
42022029	a Pa lawng ka tengah ukna aana m'peek van angla nangmi khaw kan pe van ai .
42022030	Nangmi lawngtah ka Ram khuiah kamah kah caboi dawng na caak na awkk u vetih Israel phun paha thlaihih te uk hamla bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah na ngawl u ai .
42022031	Jesuh lawng , ‘ Simon , Simon ! Hutung lah ! Lotoenkung lawng caangtak oen caanghii a pekthlee angla athe khui kalawng atheen te thloeng ham , nangmi boeih te noekdak hamla Seitan lawng saithaina nawl a dang poen .
42022032	Tede Simon , na oengna te a tlaakna nawh ham ah nang ham ka thangthui . Tecoengah ka tengla koep na maang phai vengah na maya manau thli te tha van ra sak . ” a tina .
42022033	Piter lawng , “ Bawipa , nang oen thong tlaak haih ham khaw , duek haih ham khaw oepsoeh la ka awm poen ” a tina .
42022034	Jesuh lawngah , “ Piter , kavan thui , n'tu yiin ah , kai he ka ming ka tung nawh tila voei thum toe na thui thlan atah aai khawk manawh . ” a tina .
42022035	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang thli nala te , “ Kai lawng nangmi te tangkabawm , sawngsa oen khowmuek khaw khuen sak ohla kan tuih u vengah te avoetna awm aw ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawngah , “ Khat khaw voet mai nawh ” a tina u .
42022036	Jesuh lawng , “ Tede , tahe atah tangkabawm khaw , sawngsa khaw khuen uh , a-u khaw samsen te a khueh nawh atah angki te yooei selang lai seh .
42022037	Kavan thui u , metihtiah caciim lawngah , ‘ Ahih tah thlaangthawlh la a toek haih poen ’ tila kai kah kawng alam a thut te asoep ham awm , metihtiah kai kah kawng alam a thut sut te noenoe soep poen .
42022038	A hubang hue lawng , “ Bawipa , bueh lah ! He ah samsen pahih awm ! ” a tina u . Ahih lawngah , “ Te mah khoek poen ” a tina .
42022039	Jesuh lawng a sai nooek angla khawpui te a thawh taak tih Olif Tlaang la te cet , a hubang hue khaw ahih oen haih cet u .
42022040	Te huen ah a pha u veng atah ahimi nala te , “ Suek-halhna khuiah na tlaak thawlh nawh ham thangthui uh . ” a tina .
42022041	Tecoengah ahimi teng kalawng lungto kutdi daawng khoek athlana ah cet tih khuklu oen cuengkueng tih thang-thui .
42022042	“ A Pa , na kawngaih atah he kah patang khangna boengloeng he ka teng kalawng khoe hawn . Tede kai kah kawngaihna boel selang na kaw-ngaih angla sai hawn . ” tila thangthui .
42022043	Vaan kah vanthlaang pakhat a tengah phumpho tih ahih te tha a peek .
42022044	Thin thiip uett ah kawsi dung tangkiik la thangthui tih a sotui te thisen angla dilai ah cip .
42022045	A thangthuina kalawng tho hang tih a hubang hue tengla te cet phai , ahimi tah kawthe uett ah tawnba sut u tih a ih muelh u te a huh .
42022046	Ahimi nala te , “ N'tu ah na ih muelh u ? Suekna khuiah na tlaak thawlh nawh ham tho lang thangthui u lah . ” a tina .
42022047	Jesuh te awl a thui lii vengah thlaangping te avan pha , hubang thlaihih khuiah aka thuum Judas lawngah te avan law puei . Ahih lawng Jesuh te mok hamla a tengla tang va law .
42022048	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Judas , nang lawngah mokna oen aw Thlaanghing Capa he na thak ai ? a tina .
42022049	Jesuh tengah aka awm a hubang hue lawngah te tila thaihu aka thoeng te a huh u vengah ahimi lawng , “ Bawipa , samsen oen ka tloek u ai aw ? ” a tina .
42022050	Ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat lawng Khawsoeih Bawi kah a sal te a bantang haa pat a tloek pe .
42022051	Tevengah Jesuh lawng , “ Yoeh mah seh ! ” a tina . Ahih lawng te thlaang kah a haa te a tek tih a hoeih pe sak .
42022052	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet thli kah a bawi hue oen ah a tengla aka law ahaamca boeih nala te , “ Kai he thlaanghuuen la ka awm dawngah aw nangmi lawng samsen oen boelhoen oen ah nan law thil u ?
42022053	Kai he khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im ah nangmi oen n'awm u ta , tevengah te nan tu u nawh . Tede yiin tharana lawng a uk lii tahe vengah he nangmi kah saina hamla a tue theen ni . ” a tina .
42022054	Ahimi lawng Jesuh te a tuuk u tih Khawsoeih Bawi im la te a ceh puei u ; Piter lawngah athla ngaai kalawng soei soei a vai .
42022055	Talawng luung ah hai a toeih u , hai te a aawm u tih ngawl u , Piter khaw te ah te ngawl van .
42022056	Hai kungah Piter a ngawlh te tuih-yoeihthlaang hutaa pakhat lawng a huh vengah a bueh rang patang tih , “ He kah thlaang he khaw Jesuh oen aka awm haih ni ! ” ti .
42022057	Tede Piter lawng a oelh tih , “ Hutaa nang , ahih te ka ming moenih ” a tina .
42022058	Tecoeng a awm bawt ah thlaang pakhat lawng Piter te a huh nooek dawngah , “ Nang khaw , ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat van ni ” a tina . Tede Piter lawng , “ Kai he ahimi timkah thlaang nawh ni ” a tina .
42022059	Tecoengah khawnoek pakhat yunyan a diw raih coeng atah thlaangtloe pakhat lawng , “ Ahih he khaw Jesuh oen aka awm haih ni , uepvoetna tehca khaw awm nawh , metihtiah ahih he Galili thlaang la khaw awm ! ” tila rapcaat la a thui .
42022060	Tevengah Piter lawng , “ Nang lawng na thui akawng alam he ka ming moenih ! ” a tina . Awl a thui lii vengah aai te khawk pahoei .
42022061	Bawipa tah dak maang tih Piter te rangpatang la a bueh heet , tevengah Piter lawng , “ N'tu yiin aai a khaawk thlan ah kai he kan ming nawh tila voei thum toe na basa ai ” tila Bawipa lawng a thui pe te lot a poek .
42022062	Piter te adaubenla cet , a kawsi la dung tih rap .
42022063	Jesuh amah te aka toet raalkap thli lawngah thekha la a sai u tih a bawh u .
42022064	Ahimi lawngah a mik te khoep a yeen pe u tih a doet u , “ A-u lawng nang n'bawh ? Thui lah ! ” a tina u .
42022065	Te tila te ahimi lawngah thekhana awl tloe broela a thui u .
42022066	Khaw a daai veng atah Judah thlaang ahaamca thli , khawsoeih haam thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli te tun huh u tih Jesuh te awlcekkung thli khonsil haiah avan law puei u .
42022067	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang he Messiah aw , van thui lah ? ” a tina u . Ahih lawngah , “ Kai lawngah ka thui cakhaw na tangna u manawh ;
42022068	awl kan doet u cakhaw navan thung tang u manawh .
42022069	Tede tahe kalawng tah Thlaanghing Capa he Thara koek Pathen bantang ben ah ka ngawl poen ai . ” a tina .
42022070	Ahimi boeih lawngah , “ Te atah nang he Pathen Capa aw ? ” tila a doet u . Ahih lawng ahimi nala , “ Na thui u angla Pathen Capa ni . ” a tina .
42022071	Tevengah ahimi lawngah , “ Aka mingkung sausi khat khaw ngoe tlaih nawh ! Amah awlthui te mami lawng n'yaak rep poen ! ” ti u .
42023001	Ahimi boeih lawng tho u tih Pilat haiah Jesuh te a khuen u ,
42023002	Te ah te ahimi lawng thawlh a peel u , “ He kah thlaang lawngah thlaangping he a mawt thawlh , Sengpahrang sangluel tengah mangmu peek nawh ham a thui pe tih amah oen amah te Messiah a ti u sengpahrang ni tila a thui . ” a tina u .
42023003	Pilat lawngah , “ Nang he Judah sengpahrang aw ? ” tila a doet . Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla ka awm . ” a tina .
42023004	Tecoengah Pilat lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen thlaangping te , “ He thlaang he a thawlhna ka hu nawh . ” a tina .
42023005	Tede ahimi lawngah anauh ngaai la awl a huer u tih , “ He kah thlaang lawngah amah kah cangpueina oen awlpuungna a sai . Ahih lawng Galili kalawng a tong tih tahe ah he la he avan pha . ” tila thawlh a pup u .
42023006	He awl he Pilat lawng a yaak vengah , “ Ahih he Galili thlaang aw ? ” tila a doet .
42023007	Jesuh te Herod uk khuikah thlaang ni tila a ming vengah Herod tengla te a tuih , te vengah Herod khaw Jerusalem ah awm .
42023008	Herod lawng Jesuh te a huh vengah a kaw hoe tangkiik , metihtiah ahih kawng te a yaak poen tih huh hamla a ngaih te san poen . Jesuh lawng kawpoek rai a sai te huh hamla a ngaiuep .
42023009	Tedawngah Herod lawng Jesuh te awl yahawh hlang a doet de Jesuh lawng thung pe nawh .
42023010	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli lawng hai benla cawh u tih anauh ngaai la Jesuh te thawlh a pup u .
42023011	Herod oen a raalkap thli lawng Jesuh te nuihbu la a sai u tih tula sak ohla a nuihna u ; tecoengah ahimi lawng himbaidung atheen te a bai sak u tih Pilat tengla koep a tuih .
42023012	Te khawhin ah te Herod oen Pilat he koep roep hih , he veng thlan atah ahih rawi he raal la awm hih .
42023013	Pilat lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli , mawtkung thli oen thlaangping te a khue tun tih ,
42023014	ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng he kah thlaang lawngah thlaang a mawt thawlh na ti u dawngah ka tengla navan law puei u . Tahe nangmi haiah ahih he awl ka khee poen , nangmi lawng thawlh na pup angla ahih lawng lumlai a thawh sak te khat khaw ka hu nawh .
42023015	Herod lawngkhaw a thawlhna hu nawh , tedawngah namami tengla avan tuih koep . He kah thlaang lawng duekna yawkk ham koei a sai te awm nawh .
42023016	Tedawngah cungpoelh oen ka tam silang ka thlah hawn ai . ” a tina .
42023017	( Kaantaak Poei veng roekk ah thongtla thlaang pakhat te Pilat lawng a thlah pe ham awm . )
42023018	Thlaangping rangpui lawngah , “ Ahih te ngawn ! Barabbas te van thlah ! ” tila paang u .
42023019	( Barabbas tah khawpui khuiah thlaang a ngawn tih kawsi a pawkk sak dawngah thongim ah a thlaak u . )
42023020	Pilat lawngtah Jesuh te a hoerpoengla thlah ham a ngaih dawng-ah thlaangping tengah lunghoeih awl koep a thui .
42023021	Tede ahimi lawngah , “ Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! ” tila koep paang u .
42023022	Pilat lawng a pathumna atah ahimi nala te , “ Tetih atah n'tu thawlhna ahih lawngah a sai ? Duekna yawkk ham koei a sai khat khaw ka hu nawh ! Cungpoelh oen ka tam silang ka thlah hawn ai . ” a tina .
42023023	Tede ahimi lawngah Jesuh te thinglam dawng ngawn ham ah awl ue la paang tare u tih aboetna atah ahimi kah paang awl lawng a taa .
42023024	Tedawngah ahimi lawng a bih khiing u awltloekna te Jesuh sawah Pilat lawng a sai pe .
42023025	Ahimi kah a ngaih , thlaang a ngawn tih kawsi aka pawkk sak thongtla te a thlah pe tih Jesuh te amami kawngaih la sai ham ahimi kut ah a peek .
42023026	Jesuh te raalkap thli lawng a khuen tih a ceh u vengah te vangca vangnau ben kalawng khawpui khuila aka law Sairin khaaw kah Simon aka miingna te a hum u tih ahimi lawng ahih te a tuuk u , thinglam te amangkhak la a kawh sak u tih Jesuh hu ah te a ceh sak u .
42023027	Rangpui thlaangping lawngah a hu ah a vai u , ahimi timkah khatsut hutaa thli lawng a raang te a tum u tih ahih te aka rah hutaa khaw awm .
42023028	Jesuh lawng ahimi benla maang tih , ‘ Jerusalem kah hutaa thli ! Kai ham rap u boel , namami ham oen ah na ca na nau thli ham mah rap uh .
42023029	Metihtiah thlaang lawngah , “ ca-anau aka khueh nooek nawh , camoe aka cuun nooek nawh , suuktui aka tuul nooek nawh hutaa thli tah a yo theen tih a kam awm phoeih ” tila a thuina khawhin te avan pha ai !
42023030	Thlaang lawngah tlaang sang nala te , ‘ Kaimi sawah tlim rup lah ! ’ khawcung nala te , ‘ Kaimi he n'thuh lah ! ’ tila a thuina tue te a pha ai .
42023031	Metihtiah thing he a hing vengah he ang thaihu he , he tila a sai u atah thing he a koh atah metila nuem a awm lah ve ? ” a tina .
42023032	Thlaangtloe pahih thlaangthawlh rawi te khaw Jesuh oen ngawn haih ham a ceh puei u .
42023033	Ahimi lawngah “ Luu Ruh ” huen a ti u te a pha u vengah Jesuh te thinglam dawng a tai u tih thlaangthawlh pahih te a bantang ben ah pakhat , a banvoei ben ah pakhat a tai u .
42023034	Jesuh lawng , “ A Pa , Ahimi sawah khawdawp ngaai hawn ! Ahimi lawng a sai he a ming u nawh dawngah ni . ” a tina . Ahimi lawng talcung a yueh u tih ahih kah hi-acuu thli te a rek ara u .
42023035	Judah thlaang mawtkung thli lawng : “ Ahih lawng thlaangtloe tah a thlawn ; Pathen lawng a tuek Messiah tang tang atah amah oen amah thlawn u seh ! ” tila a nuih ariingna u vengah te thlaangping lawngah pai tih a dan u .
42023036	Raalkap thli lawngkhaw a nuihna u , ahimi te law u tih misurtui thuii te a tuul u tih ,
42023037	“ Nang he Judah sengpahrang atah namah oen namah thlawn u lah , ” a tina u .
42023038	Asawkah ca a tai tah : “ Ahih tah Judah sengpahrang ni . ” tila a thut u .
42023039	Te kah a tai u thlaangthawlh pakhat lawngah ahih te asal aphaam tih : “ Nang he Messiah nawh aw ? Namah oen namah thlawn u langtah kaihih he khaw n'thlawn lah saw ! ” a tina .
42023040	Tede atloe pakhat te lawngtah ahih te a siim tih , “ Pathen na rih nawh aw ? Nang lawng ahih angla awlkhuengna avan at te na dang .
42023041	Tecakhaw mahih ham tah awlkhuengna he aka soeng ni , metihtiah mahih lawngtah n'sai phu yawkk ham koei te ni n'yawkk ; tede ahih tah thawlhpalhna sai nawh . ” a tina .
42023042	Tecoengah Jesuh nala te , “ Jesuh , Sengpahrang la na law vengah kai he n'hilh boel ne ! ” a tina .
42023043	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Na sawah awl ka kam , Paradis ah kai oen haih tihin ah na awm ai . ” a tina .
42023044	Hingthun khawnoek paha thlaihih yun vengah khawmik lawng aang tlaih nawh tih yiinna lawngah ram pum te thlemben khawnoek pathum toe a khuk ;
42023045	Tempal bok-im kah baiyaan te pahih la poet pheuh u .
42023046	Jesuh lawng angaihhlangla paang tih , “ A Pa ! Na kut dawngah ka muithla kavan tloeng ! ” tila a thui coengah te duek .
42023047	Te tila a awm te raalbawi lawng a huh vengah Pathen te a thangpawm tih , “ Ahih he tah thlaangdoeng tangtang ni ! ” tila te a thui .
42023048	Te tila thaihu aka thoeng hang te huh hamla te ah aka tun thlaang thli lawng te tila thaihu a awm te a huh u vengah kawthe uett ah a raang a tum u tih im la meel u .
42023049	Jesuh te pumpak la aka ming boeih oen Galili kalawng ahih hu ah aka baang hutaa thli lawngkhaw athla la soei pai u tih a dan u .
42023050	Judah peng Arimatia khaaw kah Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm . Ahih tah hinyah koei thlaangdoeng pakhat la awm tih Pathen Ram a lawna tue te a ring .
42023051	Ahih tah awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang pakhat van de ahih lawngah amami khonsil kah awltloekna oen thaihu sai te ngaih nawh .
42023052	Ahih lawng Pilat tengla cet tih Jesuh rawkk te a bih .
42023053	Tecoengah a rawkk te a lawh tih himbai athaaithik oen a yaawl , lungkaw thuk tangte , vai khat khaw hawna nooek nawh thlann khuiah te a up .
42023054	Te khawhin te Huet hin la awm tih Sabbath khawhin te a pha tawmca poen .
42023055	Jesuh hu ah aka bang Galili kah hutaa hue lawng Josep oen haih cet u tih thlann te khaw , akhuiah Jesuh rawkk te metila a khueh tite khaw ahimi lawng a huh u .
42023056	Tecoeng atah ahimi te im la meel u tih riimtuui oen baw aka tuui thaihu thli te rawkk hamla a roek a bah u . Ahimi tah Phungawl dawngkah awlpeek angla Sabbath khawhin ah te duem u .
42024001	Khawhin hin rih khuikah lamhacuek khawhin mincanghi ah hutaa thli lawng amami kah roek abah riimtuui te a khuen u tih phuel la cet u .
42024002	Thlann thawhka kah lungto atloela a thoeih te a huh u tih akhuila te kuun u ,
42024003	tede ahimi lawng Bawipa Jesuh kah a rawkk te tah hu u nawh .
42024004	He kawngah ngaihangla a pai sut u vengah te himbai bawk aka bai thlaang pahih te ahimi tengah parak a pai pe .
42024005	Hutaa hue lawng a rih soeh u tih dilai ah buekuep u , te kah thlaang rawi lawng ahimi nala te , “ N'tu ah nangmi lawng aka hing thlaang te thlaangduek tim ah na tlap u ?
42024006	Ahih tah he ah awm tlaih nawh ! tho poen . Galili a awm vengah nangmi tengah avan thui awl te poek uh :
42024007	‘ Thlaanghing Capa he thlaangthawlh thli kut ah a peek u vetih thinglam dawng a ngawn u ai , athum hin ah tho koep ai . ’ tila a thui teta ” a tina .
42024008	Tecoeng atah hutaa hue lawng Jesuh awl thui te lot a poek u ,
42024009	phuel kalawng meel u tih a hubang thlaikhat oen atloe hue tengah he kah thaihu boeih he a thui pe u .
42024010	Te kah hutaa hue tah Meri Makdalin , Joanna oen Jeem manu Meri , he hue he ni ; te kah aka awm haih atloe hutaa hue lawngkhaw , he thaihu he celtuih hue tengah a thui pe u .
42024011	Tede celtuih hue lawngah hutaa thli kah a thui te ahong la a poek u tih tangna u nawh .
42024012	Tede Piter tah tho thlat tih poe heeng ; ahih lawng buekuep thuk tih thlann khui te a bueh vengah rawkk yaawlna himbai tah a huh de atloe n'tu khaw hu nawh . Tecoeng atah he tila aka awm thaihu dawngah te a kawpoek rai tih im la koep meel .
42024013	Te hin vengah te Jesuh kah hubang rawi pahih tah Emmau a ti u khaw la te cet hih . Te khaw tah Jerusalem khawpui kalawng meng sarih yun thla .
42024014	Ahih rawi lawngah thaihu aka thoeng hang kawng alam te a thui hih .
42024015	Ahih rawi lawng te tila a thui hih veng te ah , Jesuh lawng te rawi te a kee tih ahih rawi oen haih cet ;
42024016	ahih rawi lawng a huh de metila nuem noek hih nawh .
42024017	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te , “ Nanghih lawng lawngpueng puet ah n'tu kawng nuem na thui hih ” a tina . Te rawi te haithe-latt la pai hih .
42024018	Kleopas aka miingna thlaang pakhat lawng , “ Jerusalem la aka law kamyin khuiah thlemvai pekca ah te kah aka thoeng hang thaihu te aka ming nawh he tah nang bueng mai kai aw ? ” a tina .
42024019	Ahih lawng , “ N'tu thaihu muuem ? ” tila a doet . Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh tengah aka thoeng teta . Ahih tah tawngha pakhat la awm tih Pathen oen thlaang boeih haiah a thuina oen a saina thaihu boeih dawngah ahu aham awm tila a poek u .
42024020	Mami kah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen ukkung bawi hue lawng ngawn hamla awl a khueng u tih thinglam dawng a ngawn u .
42024021	Kaimi lawngtah ahih lawng ni Israel thlaangphun he a loeih sak ai tila ka ngaiuep u ! Te tila a awmna kalawng tihin he tah a thum hin poen ni .
42024022	Kaimi timkah hutaa khatsut lawngtah kaimi he kawpoek avan rai sak u ; Ahimi lawngah mincanghi ah cet u tih thlann te a bueh u de a rawkk te hu u nawh .
42024023	Ahimi te va meel koep u tih ahih tah tho poen tila aka thui vanthlaang te khaw ka huh u tila a thui u .
42024024	Kaimi timkah thlaang khatsut khaw phuel la cet u tih hutaa hue kah a thui angla boelh a huh u , tede ahih te tah hu u nawh . ” tila a thui pe hih .
42024025	Tevengah Jesuh lawng te rawi nala te , “ Metila na ngau hih aih ! Tawngha thli lawng a thui boeih te tangna hamla na kawpoek yaai hih aih he !
42024026	Messiah lawng amah kah ruep-awmna ah a kuun thlan ah he ang thli he a yawkk hamla ngoe nawh aw ? ” a tina .
42024027	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng Mosi kah cabu dawng kalawng a tong tih tawngha boeih kah cathut toe ah Caciim boeih dawngah amah kah kawng alam a thut te a hih rawi tengah a thuicaih pe .
42024028	A cehna koei khaw te ahimi lawng a pha tawm atah Jesuh lawng ka cet phaat ai a ti angla te a sa pe ;
42024029	tede terawi lawng ahih te a tuuk tih , “ Kaihih tengah pah van mai ; khaw tla thuk poen tih khaw yiin tawm poen . ” a tina . Tedawngah te rawi oen pah haih hamla te cet .
42024030	Ahih lawngah te rawi oen buh caak haih hamla ngawl , takawi te a lawh tih awmngaih awl a thui , tecoengah takawi te a eh tih te rawi te a peek .
42024031	Tecoeng atah te rawi kah a mik te tueng pan tih ahih te a noek , tede ahih rawi kah mik huh ah pahoei a auh pe poen .
42024032	Ahih rawi lawngah te , “ Lawngpueng ah ahih lawng awl avan thui tih Caciim te a thuicaih vengah mahih kah lungbui ah hai aka alh angla awm ta ? ” tila a thui hih .
42024033	Ahih rawi te tho pahoei hih tih Jerusalem la meel koep hih , te ah te hubang thlaikhat oen thlaangtloe thli a tun haih u te a huh tih ,
42024034	“ Bawipa tah tho tangtang poen ! Ahih tah Simon tengah phumpho poen ! ” tila te a thui u .
42024035	Tecoengah te kah thlaang pahih lawngkhaw lawngpueng ah thaihu aka thoeng te oen Bawipa lawng takawi a eh vengah a noekna kawng te a thui hih .
42024036	He kawng he ahimi tengah a thui hih lii vengah Bawipa amah te ahimi tengah pai parak tih ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi sawah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh , ” a tina .
42024037	Ahimi lawngah muithla ni ka huh tila a poek u tih a rih u .
42024038	Tede ahimi nala te , “ N'tu kawngah na lakueng u akcak aih ? N'tu kawngah he ang uepvoetna he nangmi kaw khuiah a law ?
42024039	Bueh lah , ka kut rawi oen ka khaw rawi he , Kamah ni nan huh u . N'tek u lah nan ming u badai , metihtiah muithla lawngtah thi-asa oen ruh te khueh nawh , nan huh u angla kai ngoen tah ka khueh ta . ” a tina .
42024040	Te tila a thui coengah a kut oen a khow te ahimi a huh sak .
42024041	Ahimi tah awmngaih tih kawpoek rai oen awm u de ahimi lawng tangna u thlan hun , tedawngah ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng caak koei khat mai khaw na khueh aw ? ” a tina .
42024042	Ahimi lawng nga haai tangte keekvaang te a peek u ,
42024043	a lawh tih ahimi mik huh ah a caak pe .
42024044	Tecoengah ahimi tengah , “ Mosi kah Phungawl khuiah khaw , tawngha thli kah ca thut dawngah khaw , Saam laabu dawngah kai kah kawng alam a thut boeih te asoep ham awm tila nangmi teng ka awm vengah kavan thui u te he kah thaihu thli he ni . ” tila a thui pe .
42024045	Tecoeng atah caciim te a yaak ming thaina ham ahimi kah thinkaw te a awng pe tih ,
42024046	Ahimi te , “ He tila a thut sut te awm : Messiah lawng patang a khang vetih a thum hin ah duekna kalawng tho koep ai ,
42024047	amah miing oen thawlh yutna kawng thawlh khawdawp ngaaina kawng awlthang te Jerusalem kalawng a tong vetih thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng ai .
42024048	Nangmi tah he kah thaihu he aka mingkung sausi la na awm u .
42024049	Kamah roe lawngah a Pa lawng avan kam te nangmi tengah kavan tuih ai . Tede asawben kah tharana te nangmi tengah a law thlantoe tah khawpui khuiah te ring uh . ” a tina .
42024050	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng a hubang hue te khawpui adauben athla hlang Bethani khaw la te a ceh puei , te ah te a kut a thueng tih ahimi te a phueh a sawm .
42024051	Ahimi te aphueh asawm tih yotheenna a peek veng te ah ahimi teng kalawng hooep u tih vaan benla te pawm u hang .
42024052	Ahimi lawng ahih te a bok u tih awmngaih tangkiik la Jerusalem la te koep meel u ,
42024053	ahimi lawng atue atang khueh boeih te Tempal bok-im khuiah Pathen thangpawmna hamla a hawna u .
43001001	Dilai suen thlan ah , awl tah awm oepsoeh poen ; ahih tah Pathen oen awm haih tih ahih te tah Pathen ni .
43001002	Acuek veng kalawng te awl te tah Pathen oen ah awm haih .
43001003	Ahih rang oen ah Pathen lawng thaihu boeih he a sai ; Ahih rang oen ah a sai mueh thaihu khat khaw awm nawh .
43001004	Te awl te tah hingna kungpui la awm tih te kah hingna lawngah thlaanghing tengla aangna te avan khuen .
43001005	Te kah aangna lawng yiinna khui te a thue tih , yiinna lawng metuek vengah khaw thih thai manawh .
43001006	Pathen lawng amah kah laipai Johan te avan tuih ,
43001007	thlaang boeih lawng awlthang te a yaak tih a tangna u ham , aangna kawng te aka thui ham ahih te va law .
43001008	Amah tah aangna nawh ni ; aangna kawng te thui hamla aka law thlaang ni .
43001009	Te kah aangna tah dilai la law tih thlaanghing boeih aka thue aangna tangtang ni .
43001010	Te awl te tah dilai ah awm , ahih rang oen Pathen lawng dilai he a sai de ahih te dilai lawng ming nawh .
43001011	Ahih tah amah ram la law de amah kah thlaang thli lawng do u nawh .
43001012	Tecakhaw khatsut lawngtah ahih te a tangna u tih a do u ; tedawngah ahimi te Pathen kah ca-anau la coenggna te a dang u .
43001013	Ahimi lawng thlaanghing phung angla Pathen kah ca-anau la coengg nawh , ahimi te thlaanghing ana pa kah ca-anau angla a cuun moenih ; ahimi kah ana Pa tah Pathen amah ni .
43001014	Te awl te tah thlaanghing la coengg tih lungvatna oen awltak oen ah betoet , mami tim ah he awm . Mami lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te n'huh u , te ruep-awmna te tah ana Pa kah khuehduen pakhat bueng Capa la a awm te ni .
43001015	Johan lawngah ahih kawng te a thui vengah , “ Ahih tah kai coengah aka law ni , tede ahih tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni , metihtiah kai ka awm thlan ah ahih tah awm poen tila akawng ka thui te tah ahih he poen ni ” tila paang tih a thui .
43001016	Amah kah abetoet lungvatna khui kalawng yotheen kam-awmna khat coeng khat te mami m'peek .
43001017	Pathen lawng Phungawl te Mosi rang oen m'peek , tede awltak oen lungvatna tah Jesuh rang oen ni a law .
43001018	Pathen he a-u khat lawngkhaw hu u vai nawh . Pathen amah oen van at la haih , ana Pa tengah aka awm a capa khat bueng lawngah he ana Pa te a tueng sak poen .
43001019	Jerusalem kah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Levi thlaangphun oen khawsoeih khatsut te Johan tengla a tuih tih , “ Nang he a-u nuem ? ” tila a doet sak u .
43001020	Johan lawng thana ohla , “ Kai tah Messiah nawh ni ” tila phah ohla aciimla a thui pe .
43001021	Ahimi lawngah , “ Tetih atah nang he a-u ? Nang he Elijah aw ? ” tila a doet u . Johan lawngah , “ Kai he Elijah nawh ni ” tila awl a thung pe . Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang he tawngha aw ? ” tila koep a doet u tih , “ Kai he tawngha nawh ni ” a tina .
43001022	Ahimi lawngah , “ Tetih atah nang he a-u ? Kaimi aka tuihkung hue tengah awl khuen ham a awm dawngah namah oen namah ta a-u na ti ? van thui lah , ” a tina u .
43001023	Johan lawng awl a thung pe tih : “ Kai tah , tawngha Isaiah lawng , ‘ Bawipa a cehna ham lawngpui te adoengla sai uh ’ tila ramhum huhang ah aka paang te ni ” tila a thui pe .
43001024	Farasi thlaang thli lawng a tuih laipai hue lawngah ,
43001025	Johan nala te , “ Nang he Messiah nawh , Elijah nawh tih tawngha nawh atah n'tu ah nang lawng baptisma na peek ? ” tila a doet u .
43001026	Johan lawng , “ Kai lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma te ka peek , tede nangmi lawng na ming u nawh , nangmi tim ah aka pai pakhat te awm .
43001027	Ahih tah kai ka law coengah va law , tede kai tah ahih kah khowmuek rui pateng thlam pe ham ka ting ka tawkk moenih ” a tina .
43001028	He kah thaihu boeih a coenggna he tah Johan lawng baptisma a peekna Jordan tuiva rall kah khawcuuk ben ah aka awm Bethani khaaw ah ni .
43001029	Avuen khawhin atah amah tengla Jesuh a law te Johan lawng a huh tih , “ Dilai thawlhna aka phuei Pathen kah Tuuca ke bueh u lah !
43001030	Kai coengah thlaang pakhat va law , tede ahih tah kai lak ah bawilen ngaai , metihtiah kai he n'cuun thlan ah ahih tah awm poen . ’ tila akawng ka thui te tah a hih poen ni .
43001031	Kai lawngah ahih he a-u ti khaw ka ming nawh , tede kai lawng tui oen ah baptisma ka peek he tah ahih te Israel thlaang thli lawng a mingna ham ni . ” tila a thui .
43001032	Tecoengah Johan lawng , “ Vaan kalawng Muithla te akhuu angla va rum thuk tih ahih sawah a cuuk thuk te ka huh .
43001033	Ahih te a-u ti khaw ka ming nawh , tede tui oen ah baptisma peek hamla tuihkung Pathen lawngah ‘ Muithla te va rum thuk vetih thlaang pakhat sawah a cuuk te na huh ai ; ahih te tah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma pekung ni tite na ming ai , ’ ti .
43001034	Te tah kamah lawng ka huh tih ahih tah Pathen Capa ni tila nangmi tengah kavan thui u , ” tila Johan lawng a thui .
43001035	Avuen hin ah Johan te a hubang pahih oen haih a pai u vengah ,
43001036	Jesuh a yingyawi te a huh tih , “ Pathen kah Tuuca ke bueh hih lah ! ” a tina .
43001037	He tila a thui te a hubang rawi lawng a yaak tih Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih .
43001038	Jesuh te a hu la dak maang , te vengah ahih rawi lawng a hu ah a vai hih te a huh tih , “ N'tu na tlap hih ” tila a doet . Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Rabbi , me ah na awm ? ” a tina hih . ( He kah awllung he tah , “ Cangpueikung ” ti ngaihna ni . )
43001039	Ahih lawng , “ Law hih langtah bueh lah , ” a tina . ( Te veng te tah thlemben khawnoek palii yunyan ni . ) Tedawngah ahih rawi lawng cet hih , a awmna te a bueh hih tih khawyiin toe ahih oen awm u .
43001040	Te rawi khuikah pakhat te tah Simon Piter kah a manau Andru ni .
43001041	Vaikhat atah a maya Simon nala te , “ Kaimi tah Messiah te ka huh poen ” a tina . ( Messiah ti he tah ‘ Khrih ’ ti ngaihna ni . )
43001042	Tecoengah Jesuh tengla Simon te a ceh puei . Jesuh lawng ahih te a bueh tih , “ Nang tah Johan capa Simon na miingna , tede Sifas na miingna poen ai . ” a tina . ( He tah Piter tina oen lo hih tih “ Lungto ” tila thui ngaihna ni . )
43001043	Avuen atah Jesuh te Galili la ceh ham kamthlah . Filip te a huh tih , “ Ka hu ah bang lah ! ” a tina .
43001044	( Filip he tah Andru oen Piter a awmna Betsaida khaw kah van ni . )
43001045	Filip lawng Nathanael te a huh tih , “ Mosi lawng Phungawl cabu dawngah akawng alam a thut tih tawngha thli lawngkhaw akawng alam a thut thlaang te kaimi lawng ka huh poen . Ahih tah Nazaret khaw kah Josep capa Jesuh te ni ” a tina .
43001046	Nathanael lawng , “ Nazaret khaw kalawng thaihu theen pakhat mai khaw thoeng thai ai aw ? ” tila a doet . Filip lawng , “ Law langtah bueh lah . ” a tina .
43001047	Jesuh lawng Nathanael a tengla a law te a huh vengah , “ Israel thlaangphun tak tak he ah awm he ; ahih tah thawlhpalhna roe awm nawh ! ” tila ahih lawng a thui .
43001048	Nathanael lawng ahih nala te , “ Metila nan ming ? ” tila a doet . Jesuh lawng , “ Filip na khue thlan ah thaidut thing phung kaak ah na awm vengah te kan huh poen ” a tina .
43001049	Nathanael lawngah , “ Saya , Nang tah Pathen Capa ni ! Nang tah Israel Sengpahrang ni ! ” a tina .
43001050	Jesuh lawng , “ Thaidut thing phungkaak ah na awm vengah kan huh poen tila ka thui dawngah na tangna aw ? Nang lawngah he lak ah aka bo ngaai thaihu na huh hun ai ! ” a tina .
43001051	Tecoengah ahih rawi te , “ Awltak tang kavan thui : Vaan te awng u vetih Thlaanghing Capa sawah Pathen kah van thlaang thli a rum thuk oen a luui hang te na huh u ai ” a tina .
43002001	Hin hih a awm coengah Galili peng Kanaa khawpui ah yuluipoei awm . Jesuh kah a manu khaw te ah te awm tih ,
43002002	Jesuh oen a hubang hue khaw yuluipoei ah te a khue u van .
43002003	Misurtui te a boeih dawngah Jesuh te a manu lawng , “ Misurtui khueh u tlaih nawh . ” a tina .
43002004	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nang lawng sai koei te van thui boel , kai lawng sai hamla atue pha thlan . ” a tina .
43002005	Tecoeng atah Jesuh kah a manu lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli nala te , “ Ahih lawng a thui boeih te sai uh ” a tina .
43002006	Judah thlaangphun lawngah khaw-niingtuikaa ah ciimcaihna kawng phung alam a khueh u tih , te ham ah te tuitang pakul kuun awikaw paruk te ah te a hawlh u .
43002007	Jesuh lawng tuihyoeihthlaang thli nala , “ He kah awikaw dawngah tui thloen uh . ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah awikaw rai toe ah tui te abecala a thloen u ,
43002008	tecoengah ahimi nala te , “ Tui te thoem duekk u langtah poei uktemkung tengla khuen pe uh ” a tina . Ahimi lawng tui te a khuen u ,
43002009	misurtui la aka coengg tui te a teng-alai . Ahih lawngah misurtui he ame kah tite ming nawh , ( tede tuithaan tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawngtah a ming u ) ; tedawngah yulokung te a khue tih ,
43002010	ahih nala te , “ Thlaang boeih lawngtah kamyin thli te lamhala misurtui ahuemm te a tuul tih ahahla a awkk u coengah misurtui adu te a tuul . Tede nang lawngtah misurtui ahuemm te tahetoe na khueh hun nawh pai he ! ” a tina .
43002011	Jesuh lawng lamhacuek kawpoek rai thaihu he Galili peng Kanaa khaw ah a sai ; te ah te a ruep-awmna a tueng sak tih a hubang hue lawng ahih te a tangna u .
43002012	He coeng atah Jesuh oen a manu , maya manau oen ah a hubang hue tah Kapernaum la cet u tih te ah te khawhin ayawlca awm u .
43002013	Judah hue kah Kaantaak Poei te a pha tawm vengah Jesuh te Jerusalem la cet .
43002014	Tempal bok-im vawngup khuiah thlaang thli lawng vaitaw , tuu oen akhuu aka yooei thli , amami kah caboi dawngah ngawl u tih tangka aka thaw-leeng thlaang thli te a huh .
43002015	Tedawngah rui-akhau te ruicungpoelh la a holl tih boiava boeih vaitaw oen tuu khaw ruicungpoelh oen a tam tih Tempal bok-im adaubenla kang a vai ; tangka thawlengkung thli kah caboi te boeih a plet pe tih a tangka thli te heh u khonghak ;
43002016	tecoengah akhuu aka yoei thlaang thli te , “ He ang thli he khuen uh ! A Pa kah im he thaihu yoeihna huen la sai u tlaih boel ! ” a tina .
43002017	Caciim lawngah , “ Aw , Pathen , na im ka thintlawhna he ka kaw khuiah hai angla alh . ” tila a thui te a hubang hue lawng lot a poek u .
43002018	Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng , “ Nang lawngah he tila na sai he ame kah sai thaina aana oen na sai ti he tueng sak ham kawpoek raina n'tu navan sai ai ? ” a tina u .
43002019	Jesuh lawng , “ He kah Tempal bok-im he phe uh , hin thum khuiah ka sak koep ai . ” a tina .
43002020	Ahimi lawngah , “ He kah Tempal bok-im he sawm lii kumruk khui puet ah a sak u , nang lawng hin thum khuiah na sak koep ai aw ? a tina u .
43002021	Tede Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im tila a thui te amah pum ni a thuingaihna .
43002022	Tedawngah duekna kalawng a thawh koep vengah ahih lawng Te tila a thui te a hubang thli lawng koep a ming u tih Caciim khaw , Jesuh awl thui te khaw a tangna u .
43002023	Jesuh lawng Kaantaak Poei khui , Jerusalem ah a awm vengah kawpoekrai a sai te a huh u tih thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u .
43002024	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi boeih te a ming dawngah tangna nawh .
43002025	Ahimi kah akawng alam te a-u khat lawngkhaw a tengah thui pe ham ngoe mai nawh , metihtiah amah lawng thlaang kah thinkaw te boeih a ming .
43003001	Nikodemu aka miingna Judah thlaang mawtkung pakhat awm , ahih tah Farasibu khuikah thlaang ni .
43003002	Yiin at atah ahih te Jesuh tengla cet tih , “ Rabbi , nang tah Pathen kah thlaangtuih cangpueikung pakhat ni tila ka ming u . Pathen kah awmpueina nawh atah kawpoek rai na sai he a-u khat lawngkhaw sai thai manawh . ” a tina .
43003003	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Awltak kavan thui : a-u khaw a thang koep nawh atah Pathen Ram te hu manawh . ” tila a thui pe .
43003004	Nikodemu lawngah “ Metila thlaang haam la aka awm te a thang koep thai ai , ahih te a manu kah ca-im khuila kuun vetih apabe la thang koep thai manawh ! ” a tina .
43003005	Jesuh lawng , “ Awltak tang kavan thui , a-u khaw tui oen muithla oen ah a thang nawh atah Pathen Ram khuiah kuun thai manawh .
43003006	Thlaang he nu oen pa kah pumsa ben ah aka thang tah pumsa la awm , tede muithla ben ah aka thang tah Muithla la awm .
43003007	Kai lawngah na thang koep ham awm kan tina dawngah na ngaai hang sak boel .
43003008	Khaw lawngah amah ngaihna benla thlii mai ; khawthlii awl te na yaak , tede ame kalawng a law tih me benla a ceh tite na ming nawh . Muithla oen aka thang thlaang boeih khaw te tila ni a awm . ” a tina .
43003009	Nikodemu lawng , “ He he metila a coeng thai ai ? ” tila a doet .
43003010	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nang he Israel thlaangphun khuiah aka lentloe cang-pueikung la na awm de , he he na ming nawh aw ?
43003011	Awltak kavan thui , “ Kaimi lawngtah ka ming te ka thui u tih ka huh rep te ni ka thui pantau , kaimi kah awl he a-u khat lawngkhaw na do u nawh .
43003012	Kai lawng he dilai thaihu kawng kavan thui vengah Pateng nangmi lawng nan tangna u nawh ; vaan kah thaihu kawng kavan thui vengah metila nan tangna u pai ai ?
43003013	Vaan kalawng aka law thuk Thlaanghing Capa nawh atah a-u khat khaw vaan la luui nawh .
43003014	Mosi lawng ramhum huhang ah ruhum ruul te cungkui dawngah a tai van angla Thlaanghing Capa khaw a tai ai ,
43003015	amah te aka tangna thlaang boeih lawng dungyan hingna a khuehna ham ni .
43003016	Pathen lawng dilai he a lungna tangkiik dawngah a Capa khat bueng khueh duen te a peek , ahih te aka tangna boeih tah duek manawh , dungyan hingna te a khueh ai .
43003017	Metihtiah Pathen lawng dilai he awl cek ham a Capa he van tuih nawh , dilai thlawnkung la awm ham ni avan tuih .
43003018	A-u khaw Capa te aka tangna boeih tah awl cek manawh ; tede a-u khaw aka tangna nawh tah awl cek la awm poen , metihtiah ahih lawngah Pathen Capa khuehduen khat bueng te a tangna nawh dawngah ni .
43003019	Awlcekna biibi tah he tila ni : aangna tah dilai la law poen , tede thlaang he athe aih dawngah aangna lak ah yiinna te a lungna ngaai .
43003020	Athe thaihu aka sai boeih lawngtah cangna te a thina tih aangna ah law ham te ngaih u nawh , metihtiah athe thaihu a sai te tueng sak ham ngaih u nawh .
43003021	Tede a-u khaw asoeng thaihu theen aka sai tah aangna ah law tih a sai thaihu te Pathen kawngaih ni tite aangna lawng a tueng sak . ” a tina .
43003022	Tecoengah Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah Judia peng la cet u , te ah te ahimi oen awm u tih baptisma a peek .
43003023	Aenon ah te tui yahawh a awm dawngah te ah te Jesuh lawngkhaw baptisma a peek van . Aenon tah Salim khaw kalawng yoeii . Thlaangping lawng ahih tengla cet u tih ahimi te baptisma a peek .
43003024	( He vengah Johan he thongim ah tla thlan hun . )
43003025	Johan kah hubang khatsut hue tah bokna benkah ciimcaihna kawngah te Judah thlaang pakhat oen awl puung u .
43003026	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Johan tengla cet u tih , “ Saya , Jordan tuiva rall kah na tengah aka awm akawng na thui thlaang te na ming aw ? Ahih lawng tahe ah baptisma a peek van tih ahih tengla thlaangping broela cet u ! ” a tina .
43003027	Johan lawngah , “ A-u khaw Pathen lawng a peek nawh atah n'tu khat khaw khueh thai nawh .
43003028	‘ Kai tah Messiah nawh ni , ahih hai kah a tuih thlaang mai ni . ” tila ka thui te aka mingkung tah nangmi ni .
43003029	Vaa aka sa tuemnu hulaa te tah yulokung cadawng kah thlaang ni ; tede yulokung kah paya tah a tengah pai tih awl a hutung , yulokung kah awl te a yaak vengah awmngaih . Kai kah awmngaih soepna khaw te tila ni a awm .
43003030	Ahih tah roeng hang ai , tede kai tah ka tla thuk ai . ” a tina .
43003031	Saw benkah aka law thlaang tah atloe boeih lak ah lenduet . Dilai dawng-kah aka law tah dilai thlaang la awm tih dilai kawng te a thui , tede vaan benkah aka law tah soeprep boeih sawah awm . Ahih lawngtah amah kah a huh oen a yaak te a thui de a-u lawngkhaw ahih awl te do u nawh .
43003032	Ahih lawngtah a huh tih a yaak te a thui de a-u khat lawngkhaw ahih awl te tangna u nawh .
43003033	Tede a-u khaw ahih kah awl te aka do tah te tila a dona rang oen Pathen tah ataktang ni a thui tila a cak sak .
43003034	Pathen lawng a tuih thlaang te tah Pathen amah Muithla te betoetla a peek dawngah Pathen awl te a thui .
43003035	A Capa te ana Pa lawng a lungna tih soeprep boeih te ahih kut ah kang a peek .
43003036	A-u khaw a Capa te aka tangna boeih tah dungyan hingna a khueh ; a-u khaw a Capa awl te aka ngai nawh tah hingna te khueh nawh vetih Pathen thinsana te a sawah poe awm ai .
43004001	Jesuh lawngah Johan lak ah hubang yahawh adang tih baptisma a peek tite a yaak u .
43004002	( Atak tang atah Jesuh amah lawngtah a-u khat khaw baptisma pe nawh ; a hubang hue lawng ni a peek . )
43004003	Tedawngah te tila a thui u te Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah Judia peng te a ceh taak tih Galili la te koep meel ;
43004004	te vengah te Samaria peng kalawng te a ceh hamla awm .
43004005	Samaria peng khuikah Saika khaaw te a pha , Te khaaw te Jakob lawng a capa Josep a peek lohuen kalawng ah thla aih nawh .
43004006	Te ah te Jakob kah tuikhur te awm , Jesuh tah lawngpueng ceh ah bawngg malcal tih tuikhur tengah te ngawl . Te veng te tah hingthun yunyan ni .
43004007	Samari nu pakhat te tui thaan la law tih Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Tui n'awkk sak lah . ” a tina .
43004008	( A hubang hue tah caak awkk lai ham khawpui khuila cet u . )
43004009	Te kah hutaa lawngah , “ Nang he Judah thlaang la na awm , kai tah Samaria thlaang ni ; metila kai tengah tui navan bih mai lauh ? ” a tina . ( Judah thlaang phun lawngah Samari thlaang thli kah a hawna boengloeng oen beel thli te hawna u nawh . )
43004010	Jesuh lawng , “ Pathen kah peek lungvatna tila doek na ming mai tih nang tengah tui aka bih he a-u tite na ming kawinih , ahih tengah te na bih vetih ahih lawng hingna tui te m'peek ai . ” a tina .
43004011	Te kah hutaa lawngah , “ Bawipa , tuium khaw na khueh nawh , tuikhur khaw dung tangkiik . Nang lawng ame kah hingna tui te na dang ai ?
43004012	He kah tuikhur he patuer Jakob lawng kaimi m'peek ni ; amah lawngkhaw a ca anau thli lawngkhaw , a boiava lawngkhaw he kah tui he ni rip a awkk u . Nang he Jakob lak ah na lenduet ngaai aw ? a tina .
43004013	Jesuh lawng , “ A-u khaw he kah tui aka aw tah tui hall koep ai ,
43004014	tede , a-u khaw kai lawng ka peek tui te aka aw tah tui hall koep tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
43004015	Te kah hutaa lawng , “ Bawipa , te tih atah kai lawngah tuihalh la koep ka awm tlaih nawh ham khaw , he la he tui thaan la ka law koep tlaih nawh ham te tui te kai m'pe lah ! ” a tina .
43004016	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Cet langtah na vaa te khue , tecoengah koep va lawh . ” a tina .
43004017	Ahih lawngah , “ Kai he ka vaa awm nawh . ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Ka vaa awm nawh na ti te soeng .
43004018	Nang lawng thlaang pa-ngaa na vaana poen , tahe ah na awm puei thlaang te na vaa tangtang nawh ni . Atak tang ni na thui . ” a tina .
43004019	Te hutaa lawngah , “ Bawipa , nang he tawngha ni tila kan ming .
43004020	Kaimi Samari thlaang thli kah patuer hue lawngtah he kah tlaangsawm ah he Pathen a bok u , tede nangmi Judah thlaang lawngtah Jerusalem ah ni Pathen he bok ham awm na ti u . ” a tina .
43004021	Jesuh lawng ahih nala , “ Hutaa nang , ka awl thui he tangna lah , he kah tlaangsawm ah khaw , Jerusalem ah khaw , Pa te thlaang lawngah a bokna nawh atue te a pha ai .
43004022	Nangmi Samari thlaang lawngah a-u ka bok u tite na ming u taktak nawh ; tede kaimi Judah thlaang lawngtah a-u ka bok u tite ka ming u , metihtiah Judah thlaang teng kalawng ni thlawnna tah a law .
43004023	Tede Pa tah ataktangla a awm van angla aka bok thlaang thli lawngkhaw Pathen kah Muithla tharana oen awltak oen ah a bokna atue te avan pha poen tih he ah he awm poen . Te tila aka bok te ni Pathen lawngah a ngaih .
43004024	Pathen tah Muithla la a awm dawngah ahih te aka bok thlaang lawngkhaw Muithla oen awltak la a bok ham awm . ” a tina .
43004025	Hutaa lawng ahih nala , “ Messiah law ai tite ka ming , ahih te a law veng atah soeprep boeih te kaimi tengah avan thui ai . ” a tina .
43004026	Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Nang oen awl aka thui kai he tah ahih poen ni . ” a tina .
43004027	Tevengah te Jesuh kah a hubang thli koep va meel u tih hutaa pakhat oen awl a thui te a huh u vengah ahimi tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik . Tede ahimi khat lawngkhaw te hutaa te , “ N'tu na ngaih ? ” te tila doet u nawh tih Jesuh te khaw , “ N'tu ah ahih oen awl na thui ? ” tila khaw doet u nawh .
43004028	Tecoeng atah hutaa lawng tuium te a ceh taak tih khaw khuila cet koep , te kah aka awm thlaang thli nala te ,
43004029	“ Kai lawng ka sai thaihu boeih aka thui thlaang he law u langtah bueh u lah . Ahih he Messiah kai aw ? ” tila a thui pe .
43004030	Tedawngah khaw khuikah thlaang thli te law u tih Jesuh tengla cet u .
43004031	Teveng ruet ah te a hubang hue lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , buh ca de saw ! ” a tina u .
43004032	Tede ahih lawng , “ Akawng alam na ming u nawh buh te caak hamla ka khueh . ” a tina .
43004033	Tedawngah hubang hue lawng doet u the tih , “ thlaang pakhat khat lawng buh avan peek kai aw ? ” ti u .
43004034	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai kah buh tah kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te vai ham oen ah sai ham bii m'peek te coeng pe ham ni .
43004035	Nangmi lawngtah , ‘ he coengah thla lii a awm atah caang ah ham khoek poen ai ’ na ti u . Tede kavan thui u , loha thli ke a theenla dan u lah ; tahe ah caang hiin poen tih caang ah ham khoek poen !
43004036	Caang aat thli lawng thapang a dang u tih dungyan hingna hamla caangvui te a cawi u ; tedawngah caang aka tuhkung oen caang aatkung tah awmngaih bok ai .
43004037	‘ Thlaang pakhat lawng a tuh tih thlaangtloe pakhat lawng a ah ” tila a thui awl te soeng tangtang .
43004038	Nangmi lawng na bina nawh lohuen ah caang aat la kan tuih u ; te ah te thlaangtloe lawng bii a bi tih ahimi kah biibina dawngah te nangmi lawng athawn na dang u ” a tina .
43004039	Te kah hutaa lawngah te , “ Kai lawng thaihu ka sai boeih te ahih lawngah avan thui ” tila te a thui pe dawngah , te khaw kah aka awm Samari thlaang broe lawng Jesuh te a tangna u .
43004040	Tedawngah Samari thlaang thli lawng Jesuh tengla avan pha u vengah te kaimi tengah cam mai de a tina u tih Jesuh tah te khaw ah te khawhin hin hih cam .
43004041	Amah kah awl thui a yaak u dawngah thlaang broe lawng a tangna u tih ,
43004042	ahimi lawng te kah hutaa nala te , “ Nang lawng na thui dawngah nawh tih , kamami roe lawng amah awl thui ka yaak u poen dawngah ahih tah he dilai thlawnkung ni tila ka ming u tih tahe ah ka tangna u poen . ” a tina .
43004043	Te ah te hin hih a cam coengah Jesuh tah Galili la te cet .
43004044	Metihtiah Jesuh amah lawngah te , “ Tawngha he amah ram khuiah thangpawm u nooek nawh . ” tila a thui u .
43004045	Galili te a pha veng atah te kah thlaang thli lawng a do u , metihtiah ahimi tah Jerusalem ah Kaantaak Poei vengah cet u van tih te poei ah ahih kah a sai thaihu boeih te a huh u dawngah ni .
43004046	Tecoengah tui te misurtui la a coeng sakna Galili peng kah Kanaa khaaw la te koep cet . Te ah te ukkungbawi pakhat awm , Kapernaum khaaw ah aka awm a capa te tlo .
43004047	Ahih lawngah Judia kalawng Galili la Jesuh va law tite a yaak vengah a tengla cet tih a capa aka duek tawm te hoeih sak ham ah Kapernaum la poe ceh hamla reenna a bih .
43004048	Jesuh lawngah ahih nala te , “ Nangmi lawngah kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai thaihu te na huh u nawh atah mevengah khaw na tangna u manawh ” a tina .
43004049	Te kah bawi lawngah , “ Bawipa , ka ca a duek thlan ah law mai de . ” a tina .
43004050	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Cet loeih , na ca te hing badai . ” a tina . Te kah thlaang lawng Jesuh awl te a tangna tih cet .
43004051	Lawngpueng a ceh phai vengah te a tuihyoeihthlaang thli oen hum u tih , “ Na capa te theen badai ” a tina awlthang oen avan voekk u .
43004052	Ahih lawngah a capa te mevengah a hoeih tila a doet tih ahimi lawngah , “ N'thlem hingthun khawnoek pakhat ah a sanat lawng a thlah ” tila a thui pe u .
43004053	Tevengah ana pa lawngah , “ Na Capa te theen badai ” tila Jesuh lawng a tina atue ni tite a ming . Tedawngah amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng a tangna u .
43004054	He tah Judia kalawng Galili la a law coengah Jesuh lawng apabe kawpoekraina miknoek a sai ni .
43005001	He coengah Judah hue kah bokna poei a awm dawngah Jesuh te Jerusalem la cet .
43005002	Jerusalem kah Tuu Thawhka tengah te tuilii pakhat awm , te tuilii tengah savang pa-ngaa a sak u , te kah tuilii te Hebru awl la Betzatha tila a thui u .
43005003	Te kah savang ah te thlaangtlo thli , mikpum , khowkheem oen kutkheem thli broela ral u .
43005004	( Pathen kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng metuek tue vengah nuem tah tuilii ah te law tih tui te a phuul sak . Tui te a phuul coengah Lamhacuekla tuilii khuiah aka sungpung thlaangtlo tah me ang tlawhnat khaw a hoeih pe dawngah ahimi lawng tui aka phuul te a ring u . )
43005005	Te ah te sawmthum kum reet aka tlo puet thlaang pakhat awm .
43005006	Jesuh lawngah ahih te ah a ralh te a huh , te thlaang te tah a san hlang tlo puet poen tite ahih lawng a ming ; tedawngah ahih nala te , “ Hoeih ham na ngaih aw ? ” tila a doet .
43005007	Te kah thlaangtlo lawngah , “ Bawipa , tui a phuul vengah , tuilii dawng kai aka tulh ham thlaang awm nawh ; tuilii dawngah ka cet ai ka ti vengah thlaangtloe lawng n'khall poen . ” a tina .
43005008	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Tho lah , na ihphah te lo lang cet loeih . ” a tina .
43005009	Kawlkalh ca ah te thlaang te hoeih ; a ihphah te a lawh tih cet . Te hin te tah Sabbath khawhin ni
43005010	tedawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng aka hoeih thlaangtlo nala te , “ Tihin he Sabbath khawhin la awm tih ihphah na kawh te mami kah Phungawl lawng ngaih nawh . ” a tina u .
43005011	Ahih lawngah , “ Kai aka hoeih sak lawngah na ihphah te lo langtah cet loeih ti ta ” a tina .
43005012	Ahimi lawngah , “ He tila sai ham aka thuikung te a-u ? ” tila a doet u .
43005013	Tede aka hoeih thlaang te lawngah Jesuh te a-u ti khaw ming nawh , metihtiah te kah aka awm thlaangping tim ah Jesuh tah cet valh poen .
43005014	Tecoeng atah Jesuh lawng ahih te Tempal bok-im khuiah a huh tih , “ Hutung lah , tahe tah na hoeih poen ; thawlhna sai tlaih boel , toeng loeih , tetih nawh kawinih athe-eep ngaai na sawah pakhat khat va thoeng ai . ” a tina .
43005015	Tecoengah te kah thlaang lawng cet tih ahih aka hoeih sak te Jesuh ni tila aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah te a thui pe .
43005016	Sabbath khawhin ah Jesuh lawng thlaangtlo a hoeih sak dawngah ahimi lawng Jesuh te heem-atek hamla a tong u poen .
43005017	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ A Pa lawng bii a bi yoeyah dawngah kai lawngkhaw ka bi van ai . ” a tina .
43005018	Ahih lawng Sabbath phung te a phe bueng muehla Pathen te amah kah ana Pa la a thui tih amah te Pathen oen van at la a khueh , a awl thui lawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang boeih te a thin a phawh pe tare tih ahih te ngawn hamla a teeng u .
43005019	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Awltak kavan thui u ; Capa lawngah amah ngaih ah thaihu khat khaw sai thai nawh ; ana Pa lawng a sai thaihu a huh te ni a sai . Ana Pa lawng a sai te Capa lawngkhaw a sai van .
43005020	Metihtiah ana Pa lawng Capa te a lungna dawngah amah lawng a sai boeih te a Capa a huh sak . He lak ah aka lenduet thaihu te a huh sak vetih nangmi boeih tah na kawpoek rai u ai .
43005021	Ana Pa lawng thlaangduek a thawh sak tih hingna a peek angla Capa lawngkhaw amah lawng a ngaih thlaang thli te hingna a peek .
43005022	Ana Pa amah lawng a-u khaw awl cek nawh . Ahih lawng a Capa tengah awl cek thaina te asoepla a peek poen ,
43005023	Ahimi lawng ana Pa te a hinyahna van angla thlaang boeih lawng a Capa te a hinyahna van ham ni . A-u khaw Capa te a hinyah nawh atah ahih tuihkung ana Pa te hinyah nawh .
43005024	“ Awltak kavan thui u : a-u khaw ka awl a yaak tih kai aka tuihkung te a tangna atah dungyan hingna te a khueh . Ahih te awl cek tlaih manawh , metihtiah duekna kalawng hingna ah kuun poen .
43005025	Awltak kavan thui u : Pathen Capa awl te thlaangduek thli lawng a yaakna atue te law ai , te kah atue te avan pha poen , te awl aka ya boeih tah hing ai .
43005026	Ana Pa amah te hingna kungpui la awm , tetih van la a Capa te hingna kungpui la awm ham a sai poen .
43005027	Tecoengah a Capa tah Thlaanghing Capa la a awm dawngah awl cek thaina te a peek poen .
43005028	He dawngah he na kawpoek rai sak aih boel , thlaangduek thli lawng ahih awl a yaakna atue te law lii poen ;
43005029	ahimi tah thlann khui tho kalawng u ai , theenna aka sai thlaang thli tah tho u vetih hing ai ; athe aka sai thlaang thli khaw tho u van ai , tede dan a tat ai .
43005030	“ Kai lawngah kamah rang oen thaihu khat khaw ka sai nawh ; Pathen lawng avan thui angla ni awl ka cek , tedawngah kai kah awlcekna tah doeng , metihtiah kai lawng kamah ngaih te sai ham ka yawm nawh , tede kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te ni ka sai .
43005031	Kai lawngah kamah kawng te sausi ka deng atah ka thui he aka soeng taktak nawh ni .
43005032	Tede kai yueng la sausi dengkung pakhat awm tih ahih lawng kai kawng alam a thui te soeng tila ka ming .
43005033	Nangmi lawng Johan tengla laipai na tuih u tih ahih lawng awltak avan thui .
43005034	Kai lawngah thlaang kah sausi deng he ka ngaih dawngah nawh ni ; he tila ka thui he nangmi lawng thlawnna na dangna ham ni .
43005035	Johan he tah haialh aka aang haivang oen lo u tih nangmi lawngah ahih kah aangna khuiah kawlkalh ni awmtheen ham na ngaih u .
43005036	Tede Johan kah sausideng lak ah alentloe sausideng ham ka khueh : te tah a Pa lawng sai ham m'peek bii ka sai te ni , te lawng atah kai yuengla awl a thui vetih a Pa lawng kai he a tuih tila a tueng sak ai .
43005037	Tecoengah tuihkung Pathen lawngkhaw kai yuengla sausi a deng ai . Nangmi lawng ahih awl te na ya nooek u nawh , a mik-hai te na huh nooek u nawh dawngah
43005038	nangmi lawng ahih awl te na thinkaw lungbui ah na khoem u thai nawh , metihtiah amah lawng avan tuih thlaang te nangmi lawng na tangna u nawh dawngah ni .
43005039	Nangmi lawng Caciim khuiah dungyan hingna ka huh ai tila na poek u tih Caciim na thoel na laang u . Caciim lawngah he kai kah kawng alam ni a thui .
43005040	Hingna khueh hamla ka tengah law ham tah na ngaih u nawh .
43005041	Kai lawngah thlaang kah koeh awl te ka tlap nawh ,
43005042	Tede nangmi he me ang thlaang tite kan ming u tih nangmi lawng thinkaw lungbui oen Pathen na lungna u nawh ti khaw ka ming .
43005043	Kai tah a Pa rang oen ni ka law , tede kai he nangmi lawng nan do u nawh ; tede thlaangtloe pakhat khat amah kah saithaina aana oen a law vengah ahih te na do u badai .
43005044	Nangmi lawngtah khat oen khat tengkah koehna awl te na ngaih u , tede Pathen pakhat bueng tengkah koehna dang ham tah na yawm u nawh ; tetih atah metila kai he nan tangna u pai ai ?
