43005045	Tede kai lawngah nangmi he a Pa haiah thawlh m'peel ai tila poek u boel . Nangmi lawng na uep na pangna Mosi lawng ni thawlh m'peel u ai .
43005046	Nangmi lawng Mosi he na tangna u tak tak kawinih kai he nan tangna u suide ta ; metihtiah ahih lawngah kai kah kawng alam ni a thut .
43005047	Tede ahih kah cathut te na tangna u nawh poen atah kai lawng ka thui he metila na tangna u pai ai . ” a tina .
43006001	He coeng atah Jesuh te Galili Tuiliipui ah te kaa phai . ( Tiberias Tuiliipui tila khaw a thui u ) .
43006002	Ahimi lawngah thlaangtlo a hoeih sak kawpoekrai noekna te a huh u tih thlaangping lawng a hu ah bung a vai .
43006003	Jesuh te tlaangsawm la luui tih a hubang thli oen haih ngawl u .
43006004	Kaantaak Poei atue tah yoeii poen .
43006005	Jesuh lawng a teng avai te a dan vengah thlaangping yahawh hlang a tengla a law te a huh , tevengah Filip te a doet tih , “ He kah thlaang he yoeh hamla caak khoek buh he ame ah n'lai thai ai ? ” a tina .
43006006	( He tila a doet he tah Filip te noekdak ham a ngaih ; amah lawngtah metila ka sai ai tite a ming poen ) .
43006007	Filip lawngah , “ Thlaang boeih lawng ayawlca ah yeen a caak ham Pateng takawi laina ham ngun tangka yahnih khoek manawh . ” a tina .
43006008	A hubang atloe pakhat , Simon Piter kah a manau , Andru lawngah ,
43006009	“ He ah he baalii takawi cuun ngaa oen nga pahih aka khueh camaw tawngpaca pakhat awm ” a tina . Tede he kah thlaang he yoeh hamla te ang ca mai te khoek manawh . ” a tina .
43006010	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Thlaangping te ngawlh sak lah , ” a tina . ( Te ah te pompih moen awm ) . Te ah te thlaang boeih te ngawl u ; te kah thlaang te thong ngaa yun awm .
43006011	Jesuh lawng takawi te a lawh tih Pathen tengah awm-ngaih awl a thui , tecoengah te kah aka ngawl thlaangping tengah te a ree . Nga te khaw te tila te a sai tih ahimi lawngah ahahla a caak u .
43006012	Ahimi boeih lawng ahahla a caak u coeng atah a hubang hue nala te , “ Acoeih aphe te cawi uh ; baw-are sak boel . ” a tina .
43006013	Tedawngah ahimi lawng a cawi u tih baalii takawi cuun ngaa dawngkah thlaangping lawng a caak coeih te vawhphueih paha thlaihih dawngah abela a cawi u .
43006014	Jesuh lawng a sai kawpoekrai miknoekna he aka hu thlaang boeih lawngah , “ Ahih he tah dilai dawngah aka law ham koei Tawngha taktak te ni ” tila a thui u .
43006015	Ahimi lawngah law u vetih amangkhakla amah te sengpahrang la n'khueh u ai tite Jesuh lawng a ming tih ; tedawngah tlaangsawm la te amah bueng koep cet .
43006016	Khaw athlem thuk veng atah Jesuh kah a hubang hue te tuiliipui la cet thuk u ,
43006017	Lowng dawngah ngawl u tih Kapernaum khaw benla te tuiliipui ah kaa u phai tih cet u . Khaw tah yiin poen de ahimi tengla Jesuh tah pha thlan hun .
43006018	Tevengah khaw thlii khuengdeng tih tuilet tho .
43006019	A hubang hue lawng meng thum , meng lii yunyan lowng te a kaih u coeng atah tui sawah Jesuh te law phai tih lowng a awmna benla ayoeii rep te a huh u veng atah ahimi lawng a rih u .
43006020	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Rih u boel , kai ni ” a tina .
43006021	Tecoengah lowng dawngah te awmngaihcala a ngawlh sak u , tecoeng atah ahimi lawng pha ham a ngaih ahuen te kawlkalh ah a pha u .
43006022	Avuen khawhin atah tuiliipui khatben rall ah aka awm thlaangping lawng , te huen ah lowng pakhat bueng a awm te a ming u . Te kah Lowng dawngah Jesuh cet nawh tih a hubang hue bueng ni a ceh u tite a ming u .
43006023	Tiberias kalawng aka law atloe lowng thli te , Bawipa lawng awmngaih awl a thui coengah thlaangping lawng takawi a caakna huen tuikeeng ah te avan pha u .
43006024	Thlaangping lawngah te huen ah te Jesuh oen a hubang hue khaw awm u nawh tite a ming u vengah te kah lowng dawngah te luui u tih ahih te tlap hamla Kapernaum khaw la te cet u .
43006025	Thlaangping lawng tuiliipui khatben rall ah Jesuh te a huh u vengah , “ Saya , me vengah he la he na pha ? ” a tina u .
43006026	Jesuh lawng , “ Awltak kavan thui u ; nangmi lawngah kawpoekrai miknoekna te na yaakming u dawngah kai he nan tlap u moenih , takawi te a hah toett la na caak u dawngah ni nan tlap u .
43006027	Aka awm poe nawh caak awkk ham bii bi u boel ; te lak ah dungyan aka awm caak awkk ham bii te bi uh . Thlaanghing Capa lawng caak awkk te m'peek ai ; metihtiah Pa Pathen lawngah ahih sawah amah kah ngaikhuekna miknoek a khueh poen . ” a tina .
43006028	Te atah ahimi lawngah , “ Pathen lawng kaimi sai sak ham a ngaih te ka bina u thai ham n'tu ka sai u ai ? ” tila a doet u .
43006029	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Pathen lawng nangmi sai sak ham a ngaih te tah amah lawng avan tuih thlaang te tangna ham lawngah ni ” a tina .
43006030	Ahimi lawng , “ Kaimi lawngah na sai te ka huh u tih nang te kan tangna u hamla kawpoekrai miknoek n'tu na sai ai ? Nang lawng n'tu navan sai ai ?
43006031	Caciim lawngah a thui angla , ‘ Ahih lawngtah ahimi kah caak hamla vaan kah takawi a peek ’ a ti van angla kaimi kah patuer hue lawngtah ramhum huhang ah manna te a caak u . ” a tina .
43006032	Jesuh lawngah , “ Awltak kavan thui u , Mosi lawng nangmi m'peek te vaan kah takawi nawh ni ; vaan kah takawi tangtang te nangmi aka pe tah a Pa ni .
43006033	Metihtiah Pathen kah peek takawi tah vaan kalawng law thuk tih dilai he hingna a peek . ” a tina .
43006034	Ahimi lawngah , “ Bawipa , te takawi te yoeyahla kaimi m'pe lah . ” a tina u .
43006035	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai tah hingna takawi ni , a-u khaw ka tengah aka law tah meveng khaw a bung pawng manawh ; a-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah meveng khaw tui hall manawh .
43006036	Tede kavan thui u , tahe ah nan huh u poen de nan tangna u nawh .
43006037	A Pa kah peek boeih tah ka tengla law ai . A-u khaw ka tengah aka law boeih tah ka hek manawh .
43006038	Metihtiah kamah kawngaih sai hamla vaan kah ka law nawh tih kai aka tuihkung kah kawngaih te sai ham ni ka law .
43006039	Kai he aka tuihkung kah kawngaih tah ka tengah amah kah peek boeih te pakhat khaw ha-ata sak ham nawh ni , tede aboetna khawhin ah ahimi boeih te thawh sak tih hing sak ham ni .
43006040	Metihtiah Capa te a huh tih aka tangna boeih lawngtah dungyan hingna te khueh hamla a Pa lawng a ngaih . Tecoengah aboetna khawhin ah ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai . ” a tina .
43006041	Ahih lawngah , “ Kai tah vaan kalawng aka rum thuk takawi ni ” tila a thui dawngah te kah thlaangping hue te caitoek u .
43006042	Tedawngah ahimi lawng , “ He thlaang he Josep capa Jesuh nawh aw ? Mami lawng ana pa oen a manu khaw m'ming u ta . Metila vaan kalawng ka rum thuk a ti mai ? ” ti u .
43006043	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawng caitoek khiing u boel , toeng u loeih .
43006044	Kai he aka tuihkung a Pa lawngah ka tengla avan mawt nawh atah a-u khat khaw ka tengah law thai manawh ; aboetna khawhin ah ahih te ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai .
43006045	Tawngha thli lawng , “ Thlaang boeih te Pathen lawng a cang puei ai ” tila a thut . A-u khaw Pa awl te a yaak tih aka cang tah ka tengla law u .
43006046	He tah a Pa te aka hu thlaang awm ti ngaihna nawh ni ; Pathen tengkah aka law bueng lawng ni Pa te a huh .
43006047	Awltak tang kavan thui u : ahih te aka tangna tah dungyan hingna a khueh .
43006048	Kai tah hingna takawi ni .
43006049	Nangmi kah patuer hue lawng ramhum hu hang ah manna te a caak u de ahimi boeih tah duek u .
43006050	Tede , a-u khaw vaan kah aka rum thuk takawi te aka ca boeih tah duek manawh .
43006051	Kai tah vaan kalawng aka rum thuk hingna takawi ni . A-u khaw he takawi he aka ca tah yoeyahla hing poen ai . Kai lawng ka peek ham koei takawi tah ka thi ka sa he ni , dilai lawng a hingna ham ka peek ni . ” a tina .
43006052	He awl lawngah ahimi tim ah te thinso kawsa a thawh sak tih , “ He kah thlaang lawngah he mami kah caak hamla metila a thi asa te mami m'peek thai ai ? ” tila doet u .
43006053	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Awltak kavan thui u : nangmi lawngah Thlaanghing Capa kah a ngan te na ca u nawh tih a thi te na awkk u nawh atah hingna te na khuiah awm manawh ,
43006054	A-u khaw ka ngan he a caak tih ka thi he a awkk atah dungyan hingna a khueh tih ahih te aboetna khawhin ah ka thawh vetih ka hing sak ai .
43006055	Metihtiah ka ngan he tah caak ham tangtang tih ka thi he tah awkk ham koei tangtang ni .
43006056	A-u khaw ka ngan he a caak tih ka thi he aka aw tah kai dawngah hing tih kai khaw ahih dawngah ka hing .
43006057	Aka hing a Pa lawngah kai he n'tuih tih ahih rang oen ah kai khaw ka hing . Tetih van angla a-u khaw kai he aka ca tah kai rang oen ah hing ai .
43006058	Tecoengah he tah vaan kalawng aka law takawi ni ; he takawi he aka ca tah yoeyahla hing poen ai . He tah nangmi kah patuer hue lawng a caak takawi oen lo u nawh , te kah takawi te aka ca tah duek u . ” a tina .
43006059	Jesuh lawng he awl he Kapernaum khaw Sinakok bok-im ah a cang puei .
43006060	He awl he a huvai thlaang broe lawng a yaak u vengah , “ He kah cangpueina he rai tangkiik aih , a-u lawng a yaakming thai ai ? ” ti u .
43006061	He kawngah ahimi caitoek u tite a-u lawngkhaw thui pe muehla Jesuh lawngah a ming tih tedawngah ahimi te , “ He awl lawngah he na kaw avan boet sak u aw ?
43006062	Thlaanghing Capa he acuek vengkah a awmna huen la a luui koep hang te na hu u mai kawinih me tih ni na ti u oh ai ?
43006063	Hingna pekung tah Pathen Muithla ni ; thlaanghing tharana tah a poei ni . Nangmi tengah kavan thui awl lawngah hingna aka pe Pathen Muithla te avan law puei .
43006064	Tede nangmi khatsut lawngtah na tangna u nawh . ” a tina . ( Jesuh lawngah thlaang pakhat lawngtah tangna nawh vetih amah sawah paipi a thleep ai tite acuekca kalawng a ming poen . )
43006065	Tecoengah a thui pe tih , “ He kawngah ni a Pa lawng avan tuih nawh atah a-u khaw ka tengla law thai manawh tila acuekca ah kavan thui u teta . ” a tina .
43006066	He kawngah he Jesuh kah a huvai thlaang broe te meel koep u tih a hu ah te bang u tlaih nawh .
43006067	Tedawngah a hubang thlaihih hue te , “ Nangmi khaw kai he ceh taak ham na ngaih u van aw ? ” tila a doet .
43006068	Simon Piter lawngah , “ Bawipa , a-u tengla ka ceh u ai ? Nang lawng ni dungyan hingna na khueh .
43006069	Tahe atah nang he Pathen tengkah aka law Thlaang Ciim tila kan tangna tih kan ming u poen . ” a tina .
43006070	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi thlaihih hue he kai lawng kan tuek u nawh aw ? Nangmi khuikah pakhat tah raaithe la awm ! ” a tina .
43006071	Ahih lawng Simon Iskariot capa Judah kawng ni a thui . Metihtiah Judah khaw hubang paha thlaihih khuikah pakhat van de ahih sawah te paipi a thleep .
43007001	He coengah Jesuh tah Galili peng la te kamyin la cet ; Judia peng khuiah aka awm aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng ahih te ngawn ham a ngaih u dawngah tela te yin ceh ham ngaih nawh .
43007002	Judah thlaangphun kah Riim-im Poei atue te yoeii poen ,
43007003	tedawngah Jesuh te a manau hue lawngah , “ He kalawng Judia la cet langtah nang lawng na sai thaihu thli te na huvai thli lawng hu u van seh .
43007004	A-u lawngkhaw miing thang te a ngaih atah a sai thaihu te thuh elh thai nawh . Nang lawng he ang thaihu thli he na sai dawngah na kawng he dilai pum lawng ming lah seh ! ” a tina u .
43007005	( Amah kah a manau hue lawngkhaw tangna u nawh . )
43007006	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai ham atue atang pha thlan hun . Nangmi ham tah me ang atue atang khaw theen mai ta .
43007007	Dilai lawng nangmi n'thina moenih , kai ni n'thina , metihtiah kai lawngah ahimi kah athe te ka poer pe dawngah n'thina u .
43007008	Te kah poei la te nangmi cet uh , kai ham tah atue a pha thlan dawngah te poei la te kai tah ka cet manawh . ” a tina .
43007009	He tila a thui pe tih Galili ah te awm .
43007010	Te kah Poei la te a manau thli a ceh coeng atah Jesuh khaw cet van ; tede langya ah cet nawh tih ahuepla cet .
43007011	Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng ahih te poei khuiah a tlap u tih , “ Ahih he mela a awm kai ? ” ti u .
43007012	Thlaangping tim ah ahih kawng te tuemtuem a thui u . Thlaang khatsut lawng , “ Ahih te thlaang theen ni , ” ti u tih khatsut lawng , “ Thlaangthe ni . ” ti u .
43007013	Tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih u dawngah ahih kawng te a-u lawngkhaw langya ah thui u nawh .
43007014	Te kah Poei te tentanrak a boeih tawm veng atah Jesuh te Tempal bok-im la cet tih a cang puei .
43007015	Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tah a kawpoek rai u tangkiik tih , “ He thlaang he sengim khaw kai nooek nawh de , thoemthaina he yoeh he metila a ming kai ? ” ti u .
43007016	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai lawng kan cang puei u he kamah kah cangpueina nawh ni , tede kai aka tuihkung Pathen tengkah aka law ni .
43007017	A-u khaw Pathen kawngaih te sai ham aka ngaih lawngtah kan cang puei u he Pathen tengah aka law aw , tihnawhtah kamah kah saithaina aana oen ka thui aw ti he a ming ai .
43007018	Amah kah saithaina aka thui thlaang tah amah ham ruep-awmna dang ham aka yawm thlaang ni . Tede ahih te aka tuihkung kah ruep-awmna aka tlap thlaang tah boe a ngaai tih ahih dawngah thawlhpalhna khat khaw awm nawh .
43007019	Mosi lawng Phungawl te nangmi m'peek u . Tede a-u khat lawngkhaw Phungawl te na vai u nawh . Nangmi lawng n'tu dawngah kai he ngawn ham nan teeng u ? ” a tina .
43007020	Thlaangping lawngah , “ Nang he raaithe na khueh ! A-u lawngah nang he ngawn ham n'teeng u ? ” a tina u .
43007021	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai lawng kawpoek rai miknoekna pakhat ka sai tih nangmi boeih na kawpoek rai u .
43007022	Mosi lawng na capa thli te yahhuivuen reet ham avan thui u , ( te te Mosi lawng sai nawh tih na patuer hue lawng ni a tong u . ) tedawngah nangmi lawng Sabbath khawhin ah na capa thli te yahhuivuen na reet pe u .
43007023	Tecoengah Mosi kah Phungawl te phe nawh ham ah Sabbath khawhin ah camaw tawngpaca te yahhui-vuen na reet u atah kai lawng Sabbath khawhin ah thlaang te aciimthlaula ka hoeih sak dawngah he n'tu ah na thin a sa u ?
43007024	Asaw ahan kah alan atang oen awltloek mailai he toeng u loeih , asoeng akam taktak la awl tloek uh . ” a tina .
43007025	Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang khatsut lawng , “ Aana khuehkung thli lawng ngawn hamla a teeng u te ahih he nawh aw ?
43007026	Bueh lah ! Ahih lawng langya ah awl a thui , ahimi lawng me tih khaw a tina u nawh kai ? Ahih he Messiah ni tila ahimi lawng a ming u tangtang aw ?
43007027	Messiah te a law vengah ahih te ame kalawng a law tite a-u lawngkhaw ming manawh . Tede mami boeih lawng he kah thlaang he ame kalawng a law tite m'ming u . ” tila a thui u .
43007028	Jesuh lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah a cang puei vengah , awl a huer tih , “ Nangmi lawng kai he nan ming u taktak tih ame kalawng ka law ti khaw na ming u aw ? Kai he kamah rang oen ka law nawh . Tede kai aka tuihkung tah soeng tangtang , ahih te nangmi lawng na ming u nawh ,
43007029	tede , kai lawngtah ka ming , metihtiah kai tah ahih teng kalawng ka law tih kai he ahih lawng n'tuih dawngah ni . ” a tina .
43007030	Te vengah te ahimi lawng ahih te tuuk ham a yawm u de ahih kah atue a pha thlan dawngah a-u khat lawngkhaw tu u nawh .
43007031	Tede thlaang rangpui khuikah akuum ngaai lawngah ahih te a tangna tih , “ Messiah te a law atah ahih lawngah he kah thlaang lak ah he kawpoekrai miknoek yahawh a sai ai aw ? ” ti u .
43007032	Jesuh kawng te thlaangping lawng-ah te tila tuemtuem a thui u te Farasi thlaang thli lawng a yaak u , tedawngah ahimi oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng ahih te tuuk sak hamla raalkap a tuih u .
43007033	Jesuh lawngah , “ Kai he nangmi tengah kawlkalh ni ka awm ai , tecoeng atah kai aka tuihkung tengla ka cet ai .
43007034	Nangmi lawng nan tlap u ai , kai ka awmna ham koei ahuen la te na cet thai u nawh vetih kai he nan hu u manawh . ” a tina .
43007035	Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawngah amami khat oen khat te , “ Mami lawng huh nawh ham mela a ceh vik ai ? Mami phun Judah thlaang thli a awmna Krik khawpui la cet vetih Krik thlaang thli te a cang puei ai aw ?
43007036	‘ Nan tlap u suide nan hu u manawh , tecoengah ka awmna ham koei ahuen la te na law u thai manawh ’ a tite n'tu a thuingaihna kai ? ” ti u .
43007037	Te kah poeipui aboetna khawhin ah te Jesuh lawng pai tih , “ A-u khaw tui aka hall tah ka tengla law selang tah tui aw lah seh .
43007038	Caciim lawngah , “ A-u khaw kai aka oeng tah a thinkaw khui kalawng hingna tui te phuet ai ’ a ti angla awm ai ” tila angaih hlang la pang tih a thui .
43007039	Jesuh lawng amah te aka tangna thlaang thli lawng a dang ham koei Muithla kawng te ni he tila a thui . Te kah atue vengah ahih te Muithla pe thlan hun , metihtiah Jesuh te ruep-awm la thawh sak thlan hun .
43007040	He tila a thui te thlaangping timkah khatsut lawng a yaak u vengah , “ He kah thlaang he tawngha tangtang ni ! ” ti u .
43007041	Thlaangtloe lawngtah , “ Ahih he Messiah ni ! ” tila a thui u . Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah , “ Messiah he Galili kalawng law manawh !
43007042	Caciim lawng a thui tah , “ Messiah he Sengpahrang Devid kah cadil la awm vetih Devid amah a awmna Bethlehem khawpui khuiah ni a thang ai . ” tila a thui u .
43007043	Tedawngah thlaangping hue tah Jesuh kawngah a kaw poek vai u nawh .
43007044	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah tuuk hamla a ngaih u de a-u lawngkhaw tu u nawh .
43007045	Raalkap hue te a meel u koep veng atah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi hue lawng ahimi nala te , “ Ahih te n'tu ah navan khuen u nawh . ” tila a doet .
43007046	Raalkap hue lawng , “ A-u khat lawngkhaw te kah thlaang angla awl thui nooek u nawh ! ” a tina u .
43007047	Farasi hue lawng , “ Nangmi khaw n'ngau sak u poen aw ?
43007048	Aana khuehkung khaw , Farasi thlaang khaw ahih te aka tangna pakhat mai khaw na ming u aw ?
43007049	He kah thlaangping lawngah Mosi kah Phungawl ming u nawh , tedawngah ahimi lawng Pathen kah kawsi te a yawkk u poen ! ” a tina .
43007050	Farasi thlaang pakhat , he veng thlan ah Jesuh te huh ngaih ah aka cet Nikodemu te awm . Ahih lawng thlaangtloe hue nala te ,
43007051	“ Mami kah Phungawl ning ah , thlaang pakhat te amah awl thui n'yaak thlan ah , a sai thaihu khaw huh thlan ah awl khueng thaina awm nawh . ” a tina .
43007052	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang khaw Galili thlaang van aw ? Caciim te thoel alang lah , Galili kalawng tawngha khat khaw thoeng vai nawh tite na ming ai . ” a tina u .
43008001	Tecoeng atah thlaang boeih te im la meel u , tede Jesuh tah Olif Tlaang la te cet .
43008002	Avuen mincanghi ah Tempal bok-im la te koep cet . Thlaangping lawng ahih te a veel khoep u , ngawl thuk tih ahimi te a cang puei .
43008003	Phungawl cangpueikung thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng a samphaih vengah a tuuk u hutaa pakhat te avan khuen u tih ahimi boeih haiah te a pai sak u .
43008004	Ahimi lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Saya , he kah hutaa he a samphaih lii veng roe ah a tuuk u .
43008005	Mami kah Phungawl dawng Mosi lawngtah he ang hutaa he a duek toela lungto oen de mat ham awm tila awl a khueng . Nang lawng ta , metila na thui ai ? a tina u .
43008006	Ahimi lawng he tila a thui u he tah , Jesuh te amah awl thui dawngah a thawlh tuuk pe ham oen ah ahimi lawng thawlh a peel thaina ham ni . Tede ahih lawng buekuep tih a kutdawn oen dilai dawngah ca a thut .
43008007	Te kah aka pai thlaang thli lawng a doet khiing u dawngah adoengla ngawl tih ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi tim kah thawlhna aka sai vai nawh lawngah lungto oen de lamha seh . ” a tina .
43008008	Tecoengah koep buekuep thuk tih dilai dawngah ca a thut .
43008009	Ahimi lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah , ahaamca kalawng a tong tih pakhat coeng khat ahimi boeih te cet u khongphaat . Te kah aka pai khiing hutaa oen Jesuh bueng te a ceh taak u .
43008010	Ahih tah adoengla ngawl tih hutaa nala te , “ Mela a ceh kang u ? Nang kah thawlhna khee hamla khat khaw awm u nawh aw ? ” a tina .
43008011	Te hutaa lawngah , “ Bawipa khat khaw awm u nawh . ” a tina . Jesuh lawngah , “ Tetih atah theen , kai lawngkhaw kan khee van manawh . Cet loeih , tede thawlh koep tlaih boel . ” a tina .
43008012	Jesuh lawngah Farasi thlaang thli nala te , “ Kai tah dilai aangna ni , a-u khaw ka hu ah aka bang tah hingna aangna te a khueh vetih yiinna khuiah yingyawi tlaih manawh .
43008013	Farasi thlaang thli lawng , “ Nang lawng namah kawng ni na thui ; na awlthui te khaw a poei-oep ni . ” a tina u .
43008014	Jesuh lawngah , “ Tih nawh ni , kai lawng kamah kawng he ka thui cakhaw aka soeng ni ka thui , metihtiah kai lawngah ame kalawng ka law tih mela ka ceh ai tite ka ming . Nangmi lawngtah kai he ame kalawng ka law tih mela ka ceh ai ti khaw na ming u nawh .
43008015	Nangmi lawngtah thlaanghing siing la awl na cek u ; Kai lawngah a-u khat khaw awl ka cek nawh .
43008016	Tede kai lawng he tila ka sai mai cakhaw kamah bueng lawng awl ka tloek moenih ; kai aka tuihkung a Pa te ka tengah a awm dawngah kai kah awltloekna tah soeng ai .
43008017	Namami kah Phungawl dawngah , sausi thlaang pahih lawng a pai puei atah a thui te soeng tila a thut .
43008018	Kai lawng kamah kawng ka thui , kai aka tuihkung a Pa lawngkhaw ka kawng alam he a thui . ” a tina .
43008019	Ahimi lawngah , “ Na Pa te mela a awm ? ” a tina u . Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi lawng kai he khaw nan ming u nawh , a Pa khaw na ming u nawh . Nangmi lawng kai he nan ming u kawinih a Pa khaw na ming u van ai ” a tina .
43008020	Jesuh lawng he kah awl boeih he Tempal bok-im khuikah tangka khuehna kong tengah a cang puei u vengah te a thui . Tede amah kah atue te a pha thlan dawngah a-u lawngkhaw a hih te tu u nawh .
43008021	Jesuh lawng ahimi tengah te a thui pe koep tih , “ Kai tah athlala ka cet ai ; nangmi lawng nan tlap u ai , tede nangmi tah namami kah thawlhna dawngah na duek u ai . Ka cehna ahuen la te nangmi na cet thai u manawh ” a tina .
43008022	Tedawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng , “ Ahih lawngah ka cehna huen ah nangmi na cet thai manawh tila a thui he amah oen amah te ka ngawn u ai a ti ngaihna aw ? ” tila a thui u .
43008023	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nangmi tah adang ben dilai thlaang la na awm u , tede kai tah asawben kah aka law ni . Nangmi tah dilai thlaang ni , tede kai tah dilai thlaang nawh ni .
43008024	Tedawngah ni nangmi tah na thawlhna dawngah na duek ai kan tina u . Tecoengah , “ Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm ’ tila aka thui te na tangna u nawh atah namami thawlhna dawngah na duek ai . ” a tina .
43008025	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang he a-u ? ” tila a doet u . Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Acuekca veng kalawng kavan thui u poen .
43008026	Nangmi kawng he ka thui hamla moen awm , nangmi he sal-aphaam hamla moen awm . Tede kai aka tuihkung tah soeng tangtang tih kai lawng ahih tengkah ka yaak te ni dilai tengah ka thui . ” a tina .
43008027	Jesuh lawng ana Pa kawng te a thui vengah ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh .
43008028	Tedawngah ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng thlaanghing Capa te na tai u vengah , “ Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm ” tila aka thui te na ming u badai , tecoengah kai lawngah kamah kah saithaina aana oen khat khaw ka sai nawh , tede kai lawng thui hamla a Pa amah kah thuituenna bueng te ni ka thui tite na ming u ai .
43008029	Tecoengah kai aka tuihkung te tah ka tengah awm ; metihtiah kai lawngah ahih kah kawhoena te ka sai poepa dawngah kamah bueng n'ceh taak sut nawh . ” a tina .
43008030	Jesuh lawng he kah thaihu thli a thui he aka ya thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u .
43008031	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng amah aka tangna thlaang thli tengah , “ Kai lawng kan cang puei u he nangmi lawng na tangna u atah nangmi tah kai kah hubang tangtang la na awm u ;
43008032	awltak te na ming u vetih te kah awltak lawng nangmi te n'loeih sak ai . ” a tina .
43008033	Ahimi lawngah , “ Kaimi tah Abraham cadil la ka awm u tih a-u khat kah saltamnaa la khaw ka awm u nawh . ‘ Nangmi tah na loeih ai ’ tila na thui te n'tu na thuingaihna ? ” tila a doet u .
43008034	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Awltak kavan thui u : a-u khaw thawlhna aka sai boeih tah thawlhna sal la awm .
43008035	Sal lawngtah imkhuikaw pakhat ah akaanla poe awm nawh , tede a capa tah yoeyahla poe awm .
43008036	Nangmi te Capa lawng n'loeih sak atah na loeih u tangtang ai .
43008037	Nangmi he Abraham cadil tite ka ming ngoen ta . Kai lawng kan cang puei he nangmi lawng na do u nawh dawngah kai he ngawn ham nangmi lawng na yawm u .
43008038	A Pa lawngah kai n'huh sak akawng alam te ni kai lawngah ka thui , tede nangmi lawngtah na pa lawng avan thui te na sai u . ” a tina .
43008039	Ahimi lawngah , “ Abraham tah kaimi na pa ni . ” a tina u . Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Nangmi he Abraham kah ca anau taktak atah ahih lawng a sai thaihu te ang te na sai u van ai ta .
43008040	Nangmi tengah he Pathen tengkah ka yaak te ni kavan thui , tede nangmi lawngtah kai he ngawn ham nan teeng u . Abraham lawngtah he tila a sai moenih !
43008041	Nangmi lawngtah na pa kah kah a sai te ni na sai u van ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Kaimi lawng a Pa pakhat bueng Pathen amah te ni ka khueh u ; kaimi he ahih kah aca anau thli taktak ni . ” a tina u .
43008042	Jesuh lawngah ahimi nala , “ Pathen he nangmi kah na Pa tangtang kawinih kai he nan lungna u suide , metihtiah kai tah Pathen teng kalawng ka law tih tahe he ah he ka awm . Kamah kah aana oen ka law nawh , ahih lawng ni n'tuih .
43008043	Kai lawng kavan thui he n'tu ah na yaakming u nawh ? Awl kavan thui he na hutung u thai nawh dawngah ni .
43008044	Nangmi tah na pa Raaibawi kah ca-anau la na awm u tih na pa kah kawngaih te vai hamla na ngaih u . Acuek veng kalawng ahih tah thlaang ngawnkung la awm tih awltak ben ah metuek veng khaw awm nooek nawh , metihtiah ahih ah awltak te a awm roe nawh dawngah ni . Hoem awl a thui vengah a sai nooek bueng te ni a sai , metihtiah ahih tah hoemthuikung la awm tih hoem thui thlaang boeih kah ana pa la awm .
43008045	Tede kai lawngtah awltak kavan thui dawngah nangmi lawng nan tangna u nawh .
43008046	Nangmi khuiah ka thawlhna aka thui thai thlaang pakhat khaw na awm u aw ? Kai lawng awltak ka thui atah n'tu ah kai he nan tangna u nawh ?
43008047	Pathen tengkah aka law thlaang lawngtah Pathen awl te a hutung u . Tede nangmi tah Pathen teng kalawng na law u van nawh dawngah ni hutung ham na ngaih u nawh . ” a tina .
43008048	Ahimi lawngah Jesuh nala te , “ Nang tah Samari thlaang la na awm , tecoengah na kaw khuiah raaithe awm ” kan tina u he soeng nawh aw ? ” a tina u .
43008049	Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Kai tah raaithe ka khueh nawh , kai lawng a Pa ni ka thangpawm , tede nangmi lawngtah kai he nan sal nan phaam u .
43008050	Kai lawng kamah ham ruep-awmna ka tlap nawh . Tede kai hamla ruep-awmna aka tlap awlcekkung pakhat awm .
43008051	Awltak kavan thui u ; a-u khaw kai lawng kan cang puei he aka vai tah mevengah khaw duek manawh . ” a tina .
43008052	Ahimi lawngah ahih nala te , “ Nang he raaithe na khueh tite tahe atah acaihla ka ming u poen ! Abraham tah duek poen tih tawngha hue khaw duek boeih poen , tede nang lawngtah , ‘ a-u khaw kai lawng kan cang puei he aka vai tah mevengah khaw duek manawh ’ na ti .
43008053	Kaimi kah pahaam Abraham tah duek poen ; nang he Abraham lak ah ka lenduet na ti aw ? Tawngha thli khaw duek poen . Namah oen namah te a-u la na ngaai u ? ” a tina u .
43008054	Jesuh lawng awl a thung tih , “ Kai lawng kamah oen kamah ka thangpawm u atah te thangpawmna te aphu awm nawh . Kai he thangpawmkung tah a Pa ni , nangmi lawng namami kah Pathen na ti u te ni .
43008055	Nangmi lawngah a hih te na ming u nawh , tede kai lawngtah ka ming . Ahih te ka ming nawh ka ti kawinih nangmi angla kai he hoemthuikung la ka awm ai . Tede kai lawngtah ahih te ka ming tih a awl ka ngaai pe .
43008056	Nangmi kah na pa Abraham lawngah kai ka lawna atue he huh a ngaih tih awmngaih ; ahih lawng a huh tih a kaw hoe . ” a tina .
43008057	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang he na kum sawmngaa pateng khaw a law thlan maiah , Abraham te na huh tangtang aw ? ” a tina u .
43008058	Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Awl tak kavan thui u , Abraham a awm thlan ah Kai Ka Awm poen . ” a tina .
43008059	Tecoeng atah ahih te de ham ah lungto a ruh u , tede Jesuh lawng a thuh u taak tih Tempal bok-im kalawng ah suntla .
43009001	Jesuh te a ceh phai vengah a awm pek veng kalawng mikpum thlaang pakhat te a huh .
43009002	A hubang hue lawngah , “ Saya , a-u kah thawlhna lawng ahih he mikpum la a thang sak ? Amah kah thawlhna lawng aw , tihnawhtah ana pa yuvaa kah thawlhna lawng aw ? ” tila a doet u .
43009003	Jesuh lawngah , “ Ahih he amah kah thawlhna lawngkhaw , ana pa yuvaa kah thawlhna lawngkhaw a mik pum sak nawh . Ahih kah mik a pum he Pathen kah huham thara biibina te ahih sawah a tuengna ham ni .
43009004	Khawthaih vengah he kai aka tuihkung kah bii te mami lawng bi ham awm ; a-u lawngkhaw bii a bi thaina nawh khawyiin te law ai .
43009005	Dilai ka awm vengah he kai tah dilai ham aangna la ka awm ” a tina .
43009006	Te tila a thui coengah Jesuh lawng dilai dawngah tumtui a tha tih tumtui oen taknawng te a sai ; taknawng te a mik dawngah a thluk pe ,
43009007	tecoengah , “ Cet langtah Siloam Tuilii ah na mik-hai te sil lah ” a tina . ( Siloam he tah , ‘ Tuih ’ ti ngaihna ni . ) Tedawngah te thlaang lawngah cet tih a mik-hai te a silh tih a mik te koep tueng .
43009008	He veng thlan ah ahih lawng kutduen buh bih la a awm te aka hu thlaang thli oen a imbe lovaai hue lawng , “ Ahih he aka ngawl kutduen thlaang nawh aw ? ” ti u .
43009009	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah , “ Ahih ni ” ti u tih atloe hue lawngtah , “ Ahih nawh ni ; ahih oen aka lo u ni . ” ti u . Tedawngah amah lawng , “ Te thlaang te tah kai he poen ni ” tila a thui .
43009010	Ahimi lawngah , “ Tetih atah metila na mik te a tueng thai ? ” tila a doet u .
43009011	Ahih lawng , “ Jesuh a ti u thlaang lawngah te taknawng a sai tih ka mik dawngah avan thluk tih , “ Siloam la cet langtah na mik-hai te sil . ’ n'tina . Tedawngah ka cet tih ka silh vengah te tueng pahoei poen . ” a tina .
43009012	Ahimi lawngah , “ Ahih te mela a awm ? ” tila a doet u . Ahih lawngah , “ Ka ming moenih ” a tina .
43009013	Tecoengah mikpum aka hoeih thlaang te Farasi thlaang thli tengla a ceh puei u .
43009014	Jesuh lawng taknawng a sai tih ahih kah mik a hoeih pe sak khawhin te tah Sabbath hin ah ni .
43009015	Tecoengah Farasi hue lawngah te thlaang te metila a mik a tueng tite koep a doet u . Ahimi nala te , “ Ahih lawng ka mik dawngah taknawng avan thuk ; ka mik ka silh tih tahe ah ka mik tueng ” a tina .
43009016	Farasi thlaang khatsut lawngtah , “ He tila aka sai thlaang lawngah te Sabbath phung a vai nawh dawngah Pathen tengkah aka law thlaang nawh ni . ” tila a thui u . Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah , “ Thlaang thawlh pakhat lawng he ang kawpoekrai miknoekna he metila a sai thai ai ? ” ti u . Tedawngah ahimi tim ah pekbona te awm .
43009017	Tedawngah Farasi hue lawng te thlaang te a doet koep u , “ Nang lawngtah ahih lawngah na mik te avan hoeih sak tila na thui , tetih atah ahih te a-u na ti ? ” a tina u . Te kah thlaang lawngah , “ Ahih tah tawngha ni . ” a tina .
43009018	Tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng te thlaang te a mik pum tih tahe ah a mik tueng koep tite ana pa yuvaa te doet thlan atah tangna hamla ngaih u nawh ,
43009019	tedawngah ana pa yuvaa te a khue u tih , “ Ahih he nanghih yuvaa kah na capa aw ? A thang pek kalawng a mik pum na ti u , tetih atah metila tahe ah a mik he a tueng koep thai ? ” tila a doet u .
43009020	Ana pa yuvaa lawng , “ Ahih he kai hih yuvaa kah capa ni , a awm pek kalawng a mik pum poen .
43009021	Tede tahe ah metila a mik a tueng thai ti khaw , ahih kah mik te a-u lawng a tuui ahaai pe ti khaw ka ming hih nawh . Amah te doet uh ; a kum haam van poen , amah lawng avan thui thai ai ta ! ” tila a tina hih .
43009022	Ahih rawi yuvaa lawngah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih hih dawngah te tila te a thui pe , Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a tangna tih aka thui boeih te sinakok bok-im kalawng hek sih tila aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng a thui u dawngah ni .
43009023	Tedawngah ni ana pa yuvaa lawng , “ Ahih te a kum haam van poen ; amah te doet uh ! ” a tina .
43009024	Ahimi lawngah mikpum la aka thang thlaang te apabela a khue koep u tih , “ Awltak na thuina ham Pathen haiah awl kam lah ! Nang kah mik aka hoeih sak te thlaangthawlh ni tila ka ming u . ” a tina u .
43009025	Te thlaang lawngah , “ Ahih te thlaangthawlh aw , thlaangdoeng aw ti khaw ka ming nawh . Kai lawng ka ming pakhat tah : Kai tah ka mik pum tih tahe ah ka mik a tueng koep he ni ka ming . ” a tina .
43009026	Ahimi lawngah , “ Ahih lawng n'tu avan sai ? Na mik aka pum te metila avan hoeih sak ? tila a doet u .
43009027	Ahih lawngah , “ Kavan thui poen teta , nangmi lawng na hutung u nawh . N'tu hamla yaak koep na ngaih u ? Nangmi khaw ahih kah hubang la coengg ham na ngaih u van aw ? ” tila awl a thung pe .
43009028	Ahimi lawng te thlaang te a tap avoep u coengah , “ Nang he ahih kah hubang ni he ; tede kaimi tah Mosi kah hubang ni .
43009029	Kaimi lawngtah Pathen lawng Mosi tengah awl a thui pe te ka ming u , tede nang lawng a hu ah na vai thlaang te tah ame kalawng a law ti khaw ka ming u nawh ! ” a tina u .
43009030	Te thlaang lawngah , “ Ahih lawngah , ka mik he avan tueng sak lal maiah ame kalawng a law khaw ka ming nawh na ti u te kawpoek rai ham awm !
43009031	Kaimi lawng ka ming tah Pathen lawng thlaangthawlh awl te hutung pe nawh tih amah te a hinyah tih a kawngaih aka sai thlaang thli kah awl te a hutung pe tila ka ming u .
43009032	Dilai suen cuek veng kalawng mik aka pum te thlaang pakhat khat lawng a hoeih sak ti he a-u lawngkhaw ya nooek nawh .
43009033	Te kah thlaang te Pathen teng kalawng a law nawh atah ahih lawng thaihu khat khaw sai thai manawh .
43009034	Ahimi lawng , “ Nang thawlhna dawngah aka thang tih aka roeng hang , nang lawngah aw kaimi he cangpuei ham na yawm van . ” a tina u . Tecoeng atah ahih te sinakok bok-im kalawng a hek u poen .
43009035	Jesuh lawng ahih te a hek u tite a yaak tih a huh veng atah , “ Nang lawng Thlaanghing Capa he na tangna aw ? ” tila a doet .
43009036	Te thlaang lawngah te , “ Bawipa , ahih te a-u , ka tangna hamla van thui lah saw ! ” a tina .
43009037	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang lawng ahih te na huh poen , ahih tah tahe ah nang oen awl aka thui hih he ni . ” a tina .
43009038	Te thlaang lawngah , “ Bawipa , kan tangna poen ” a tina tih Jesuh haiah te khuklu oen cuengkueng .
43009039	Jesuh lawng , “ Dilai la kai ka law he tah mikpum thlaang thli lawng mik a tuengna ham , miktueng thlaang thli lawng mik a pumna ham ah awl cek hamla ni ka law . ” a tina .
43009040	Te kah aka awm Farasi thlaang khatsut thli lawng he tila ahih tengah a thui te a yaak u vengah , “ Kaimi khaw na mik pum u van , na ti ngaihna aw ? ” tila a doet u .
43009041	Jesuh lawng , “ Nangmi he na mik pum u kawinih na thawlhna awm manawh ; tede ka mik he tueng na ti u dawngah tahe toe ah na thawlhna awm mangkhak hun . ” a tina .
43010001	Jesuh lawngah , “ Awltak kavan thui u : Tuu im khuila thawhka kalawng kuun ohla atloe abang kalawng luui tih aka kuun tah thlaanghuuen thli oen raal thli ni .
43010002	Thawhka kalawng aka kuun thlaang te tah tuu thli te khawlcuikung tuudoen ni .
43010003	Thawhka toetkung lawng ahih hamla thawh a awng pe ; amah kah tuu thli te a miing oen a khue vengah ahih awl te tuu thli lawng a yaak pe tih ram la a ceh puei .
43010004	Ahih lawng tuu thli te a khuen vengah te thli kah a hai ben ah a ceh pe tih tuu thli lawng a hu ah a vai u , metihtiah ahih awl te a noek u dawngah ni .
43010005	Thlaangtloe hu tah vai u nawh , ahih kah awl te noek u nawh vetih te ang thlaang te tah a heng taak khongphaat dai ai . ” a tina .
43010006	He kah thuidoetna he ahimi tengah Jesuh lawng a thui pe de thuingaihna te ming u nawh .
43010007	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng koep a thui pe tih , “ Awltak kavan thui : Kai tah tuu thawhka ni .
43010008	Kai ka law thlan veng kah atloe boeih aka law te tah thlaang huen oen raal thli ni ; tede ahimi kah awl te tuu thli lawng hutung pe nawh .
43010009	Kai tah thawhka ni . A-u khaw kai dawng kalawng ah a kuun atah thlawnna a dang ai , ahih tah kuun thuk , cet hang vetih ramtliim sainona te a dang ai .
43010010	Thlaanghuuen lawngtah huuen ham , ngawn ham oen ah phe ham bueng ni a law . Kai tah nangmi lawng hingna te na khueh thaina hamla , asoepbir hingna te na khuehna u thai ham ni ka law .
43010011	Kai tah tuudoen theen ni . Tuudoen theen lawngtah tuu hamla a hingna te a peek .
43010012	Tuudoen la aka awm nawh , thlaangvat tuudoen lawngtah amah kah tuu khaw khueh nawh , metaang a law te a huh vengah tuu thli te a ceh taak tih a heeng taak ; tedawngah metaang lawng tuu te a ngeh tih a thek ayak boeih .
43010013	Thlaangvat tuudoen tah thlaangvat la a awm dawngah tuu thli te doen acang nawh .
43010014	Kai tah tuudoen theen ni . A Pa lawng kai he m'ming angla A Pa te kai lawngkhaw ka ming , tetih van la kai lawng ka tuu thli te ka ming tih ahimi lawngkhaw kai he m'ming u van . Kai lawngtah tuu thli ham hingna ka peek .
43010016	He kah tuu-im khuiah aka awm nawh ka tuu thli atloe khaw awm hun . Te thli te khaw kavan khuen hun ai ; te thli lawngah ka awl he a ngaai ai ; tuu huui at la coengg vetih tuudoen pakhat oen awm u ai .
43010017	Kai lawngtah hingna te ka dang koep hamla a awm dawngah hingna te peek ham ka ngaih tih a Pa lawng n'lungna .
43010018	Ka hingna he a-u lawngkhaw van rot nawh . Kamah kawthawh oen ni ka peek . Kai lawngah peek thaina ka khueh tih lawh thai koepna khaw ka khueh . He tah kai lawngah sai ham a Pa kah awlpeek ni . ” a tina .
43010019	He kah awl dawngah he thlaangping tim ah pekbona te koep awm .
43010020	Ahimi a kuum ngaai lawngtah , “ Ahih he raaithe a khueh ! Angparawt thlaang ni ! N'tu la a awl he na hutung pe u ? ” tila a thui u .
43010021	Tede atloe hue lawngtah , “ Raaithe aka khueh thlaang lawngah he tila awl thui manawh ! Metila raaithe lawng mikpum thlaang te mik a tueng sak ai ? ” ti u .
43010022	Jerusalem ah Tempal bok-im Nawnna Poei te awm . Te tah sikca sikding tue ni .
43010023	Jesuh tah Tempal bok-im kah Solomon Imcoen ah te yingyawi .
43010024	Thlaangping lawngah a veel khoep u tih , “ Kaimi he meveng toe ah ngaihang khawbing la nan khueh khiing ai ? Awlceet van thui loeih : Nang he Messiah aw ? ” tila a doet u .
43010025	Jesuh lawngah , “ Kavan thui poen ta , tede kai he nan tangna u nawh . A Pa kah aana oen ah ka sai thaihu thli lawng kamah kawng he a thui ;
43010026	tede nangmi he kamah kah tuuca la na awm u nawh tih nan tangna u nawh .
43010027	Kamah kah tuuca lawngtah ka awl he a hutung ; tuu thli te ka ming tih ka hu ah va bang u .
43010028	Te thli te dungyan hingna ka peek tih meveng khaw duek u tlaih manawh . A-u lawngkhaw ahimi te van rot u manawh .
43010029	Ka tengah a Pa kah peek te tah soeprep lak ah aka lenduet ni , a Pa kah khoemdoenna khui kalawng rot manawh .
43010030	A Pa oen kai he tah pakhat ni . ” a tina .
43010031	Tecoeng atah ahih te dena hamla lungto a ruh u .
43010032	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawng sai hamla a Pa kah peek thaihu theen te nangmi hai ah moen ka sai poen ; he thaihu thli khuiah me ang kawng dawngah kai he lunghawh oen de hamla na ngaih u ? ” a tina .
43010033	Ahimi lawngah , “ Thaihu theen na sai dawngah nang he lungto oen de ham ka ngaih u moenih , tede Pathen thekhana awl na thui dawngah ni ! Nang he thlaangthoet mailai ni , tede namah oen namah te Pathen la na sa u . ” a tina u .
43010034	Jesuh lawng , “ Namami kah Phung-awl dawngah Pathen lawng ‘ Nangmi tah pathen thli ni ” tila , a thui te a thut .
43010035	Caciim lawngah a thui he yoeyahla soeng tite ka ming ; Pathen lawng amah kah awl a peek thlaang thli te pathen a tina .
43010036	Kai he a Pa lawng n'tuek tih dilai la n'tuih . Tetih atah kai tah Pathen Capa ni ka ti dawngah Pathen thekhana awl na thui tila metila nangmi lawng na thui thai ai ?
43010037	A Pa lawng sai sak ham a ngaih thaihu te kai lawng ka sai nawh atah kai he n'tangna u boel .
43010038	Tede te thli te ka sai atah , nangmi lawng kai he nan tangna u nawh mai cakhaw , a Pa tah kai ah awm tih kai khaw a Pa ah ka awm te na mingna u hamla ka sai thaihu thli he tah na tangna u ham awm . ” a tina .
43010039	Ahimi lawngah Jesuh te tuuk hamla koekthoek a yawm u de ahih lawng a thuh u taak vik tih ahimi kah kut dawng kalawng loeih .
43010040	Tecoengah Jesuh tah Jordan tuiva ah te kaa phai , Johan lawng baptisma a peekna huen la te cet tih te ah te awm .
43010041	Thlaang yahawh hlang a tengla te law u . Ahimi lawngah “ Johan lawng kawpoek rai miknoek khat khaw sai nawh , tede ahih kawng a thui boeih boeih te tah soeng . ” ti u .
43010042	Te kah aka awm thlaang broe lawngah ahih te a tangna u .
43011001	Bethani khaw ah aka awm Lazaruh aka miingna thlaang pakhat te a sa ding nawh . Bethani he tah Meri oen Marta boeinau a awmna khawpui ni .
43011002	( Meri he Bawipa kah a khow te riimtuui oen a suep tih a sam oen aka thuut te ni ; sa aka ding nawh Lazaruh te tah ahih kah nganpa ni . )
43011003	A ngannu rawi lawngah Jesuh tengah “ Bawipa na lungna na paya he a sa ding nawh . ” tila awl a tah hih .
43011004	Tete Jesuh lawng a yaak vengah , “ He tlawhna he Lazaruh kah duekna toela coengg aih manawh ; he ngoen tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna a tuengna hamla awm vetih he tlawhna rang oen Pathen Capa lawng ruep-awmna a dang ai . ” tila a thui .
43011005	Jesuh lawng Marta oen a manau oen ah Lazaruh te a lungna .
43011006	Lazaruh kah sadingna nawh awlthang te a yaak de a awmna huen ah te hin hih awm hun .
43011007	Tecoeng atah a hubang hue nala te , “ Judia la cet koep u sih . ” a tina .
43011008	A hubang hue lawngah , “ Saya , thlemvai pekca ah thlaangping lawng nang te lungto oen de a ngaih u teta , ceh koep ham na kamthlah aw ? ” a tina u .
43011009	Jesuh lawng , “ Hin at ah khawnoek thlaihih awm de lah koen ? Tedawngah a-u khaw khawthaih ah a yingyawi atah he dilai aangna he a huh dawngah ploeng nawh .
43011010	Tede khawyiin ah a yingyawi atah aangna te a khueh nawh dawngah ploeng . ” a tina .
43011011	Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coengah , “ Mami kah paya Lazaruh tah ip muelh poen , tede ka cet silang ahih te ka thawh ai . ” a tina .
43011012	A hubang hue lawngah , “ Bawipa , ahih te a ih muelh atah a sa ding badai . ” a tina u .
43011013	Jesuh lawngtah Lazaruh duek poen tila a thuingaihna ni , tede ahimi lawngtah amah poek ah ip mai cawini tila a poek u .
43011014	Tedawngah Jesuh lawng ahimi te , “ Lazaruh duek poen . ” tila a thui pe angtau .
43011015	“ Tede ahih tengah ka awm nawh te nangmi hamla ka awmngaih , te dengah ni nangmi lawng na tangna u hun ai . Cawh , ahih tengla cet u sih . ” a tina .
43011016	Tevengah Tawmas ( Caphee a ti u te ) lawng a paya hubang hue nala te , “ Mami khaw ahih oen duek haih van hamla , Saya oen cet haih u sih ! ” a tina .
43011017	Jesuh te a pha vengah Lazaruh a up u te khawhin hin lii awm poen tite a ming .
43011018	Bethani he Jerusalem kalawng ah meng hih vet ni a thla ,
43011019	Ahih rawi boeinau kah a nganpa a duek dawngah reem ahaalna ham ngawlh puei hamla Judah thlaang thli te broela law u .
43011020	Jesuh va law tite Marta lawng a yaak vengah do hamla te cet , tede Meri tah im ah awm .
43011021	Marta lawng Jesuh nala te , “ Bawipa , he ah nang na awm kawinih ka nganpa he duek nawh sui !
43011022	Tede , tahe Pateng khaw Pathen tengah na bih boeih te nang m'peek ai tite ka ming . ” a tina .
43011023	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Na nganpa he tho koep ai , ” a tina .
43011024	Ahih lawngah , “ Aboetna khawhin ah tho ai ti ngoen tah ka ming ta . ” a tina .
43011025	Jesuh lawng Marta nala te , “ Kai tah thawhkoepna oen hingna ni . A-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah duek mai cakhaw hing ai ;
43011026	a-u khaw kai he aka tangna tih khaw aka sa tah duek roe manawh . He he na tangna aw ? ” a tina .
43011027	Marta lawng , “ Bawipa ! Oeih , ka tangna , nang tah dilai la aka law ham Pathen Capa Messiah tite kan tangna . ” a tina .
43011028	Marta lawng he tila a thui coengah cet koep phai tih a manau Meri te ahuepla duem a khue . Ahih nala te , “ Saya te he ah awm , nang he n'tooem ta . ” a tina .
43011029	Meri lawng a yaak vengah tho thlat tih ahih te huh hamla aloela cet .
43011030	( Jesuh te khaaw khui pha thlan , Marta oen a humna hih ah te awm hun . )
43011031	Reem ahaalna awl aka thui hamla Meri oen im ah aka awm haih thlaang thli lawng Meri lawngah tho thlat tih aloela a ceh te a huh u vengah a hu ah bung a vai u . Ahimi lawngtah Meri he phuel la ni aka rap hamla a ceh tila a poek u .
43011032	Meri lawng Jesuh a awmna te a pha atah , ahih te a huh pahoei oen a khowkung ah buekuep tih , “ Bawipa , he ah nang na awm kawinih ka nganpa he duek nawh sui ! ” a tina .
43011033	Jesuh lawng ahih kah rah te khaw , ahih oen aka awm haih hue kah rah te khaw a huh , a thinkaw a phoel pe tih a kawsi la dung .
43011034	Ahimi nala te , “ Ame ah na up u ? ” tila a doet . Ahimi lawng “ Bawipa law langtah bueh lah saw , ” a tina u .
43011035	Jesuh rap .
43011036	Te kah thlaang thli lawng , “ Bueh u lah , a lungna tangkiik den he ! ” ti u .
43011037	Tede ahimi tim kah khatsut lawngah , “ Mikpum haaiying khaw , mik aka tueng sak thlaang lawngah he Lazaruh khaw duek nawh hamla sai thai nawh ai aw ? ” ti u .
43011038	Jesuh tah kawsi la dung tih thlann la te cet , phuel te lungkaw la awm tih thlann te lungpeel oen a tleng u .
43011039	Jesuh lawng , “ Lungpeel te khoe u lah . ” a tina . Thlaangduek ngannu Marta lawngah , “ Bawipa , a baw the poen cawi ni . A up u he khawhin hin lii awm poen ! ” a tina .
43011040	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nang lawng na tangna atah Pathen ruep-awmna na huh ai , kan tina de lah koen ? ” a tina .
43011041	Ahimi lawng lungpeel te a khue u . Jesuh te vaan la maang hang tih , “ A Pa , ka awl na hutung tih ka awmngaih tangkiik .
43011042	Ka awl na hutung yoeyah he ka ming , te cakhaw kavan thui he tah , he kah aka awm thlaang thli ham ni , ahimi lawngah kai he nang lawng nan tuih tite a tangna u ham ni . ” a tina .
43011043	He tila a thui coengah angaihhlangla a khue tih , “ Lazaruh law lah ! ” a tina .
43011044	Ahih tah a kut , a khow kah rawkk yaawlna himbai oen , a mik-hai yeenna himbai oen te va law . Jesuh lawng ahimi nala , “ Thlam pe u langtah ceh sak uh . ” a tina .
43011045	Meri te hip hamla aka law thlaang yahawh hlang lawngah Jesuh kah a sai te a huh u tih ahimi lawng ahih te a tangna u .
43011046	Tede khatsut tah meel koep u tih Jesuh kah a sai te Farasi thlaang thli tengah a thui pe .
43011047	Tedawngah Farasi thlaang thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng awlcekna khonsil huhtunna te a sai u tih , “ Me tih ni n'ti u lah ai ? He kah thlaang lawngah kawpoek rai miknoek boehoeng la a sai poen !
43011048	Mami lawng he tila n'thlahphaam sut kawinih thlaang boeih lawng a tangna u poen ai , aana khuehkung Rom thlaang thli lawng law u vetih mami kah Tempal bok-im he a phe u vetih mami Judah thlaangphun he khaw a thup poen ai ! ” ti u .
43011049	Ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat , te kum ah Khawsoeih Bawi la aka awm Kaiafas aka miingna lawngah , “ N'tu khaw na ming u nawh !
43011050	Thlaangphun a thup rup tih thlaang boeih a duek lak atah thlaang pakhat a duek te theen ngaai ti he na ming u nawh aw ? ” a tina .
43011051	Atak tang atah , he awl he amah kawthawh oen a thui moenih ; te kum ah ahih te Khawsoeih Bawi la a awm van angla Jesuh he Judah thlaangphun ham duek ai tite a thui oepsoeh ni ,
43011052	ahimi ham bueng nawh tih khawyat ah aka darh khonghak Pathen thlaang boeih pumkhat la cawi tunna hamla khaw a thui haih ni .
43011053	Te khawhin kalawng tah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Jesuh te ngawn hamla khawkhanna a sai u poen .
43011054	Tedawngah Jesuh tah langya ah Judia la te yin cet tlaih nawh , tede divinlangre tengkah Efarim khawpui la tah cet tih te ah te a hubang hue oen awm u .
43011055	Kaantaak Poei atue te yoeii tih poei a pha thlan ah aphung angtoekla bokna ben kah ciimcaihna te sai ham ram pum kah thlaang akuum ngaai tah Jerusalem la cet u .
43011056	Tempal bok-im ah ahimi lawng a tun u veng atah Jesuh te a tlap u tih , amami khat oen khat te doet u , “ Metila na poek ? Poei ah he law nawh ai aw ? ” ti u .
43011057	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Farasi thlaang thli lawng ahih te a tuuk thaina u ham , “ A-u lawngkhaw Jesuh a awmna te na ming u atah van thui uh . ” tila awl a uen u .
43012001	Kaantaak Poei a phana ham hinruk a ngaih vengah duekna kalawng aka tho koep Lazaruh a awmna khaaw , Bethani la Jesuh te cet .
43012002	Te ah te ahih hamla thlembuh veelna a sai pe u tih Marta lawngah bii te a bawm . Jesuh oen caboi dawng buh aka veel haih thlaang thli tim ah Lazaruh khaw thuum van .
43012003	Tevengah Meri lawng naadu riimtuui phutlo boengloeng khui at te avan khuen , Jesuh khow te a suep tih a sam oen a thuut pe . Te kah riimtuui baw lawngah im khui te a hu thulh .
43012004	Jesuh kah hubang pakhat Judas Iskariot , ahih sawah paipi aka thleep ham koei lawngah te ,
43012005	“ N'tu ah riimtuui he ngun tangka yathum la a yoeih tih khawdeng thlaang thli te a peek nawh ? ” tila a thui .
43012006	Ahih lawng tila a thui he khawdeng thlaang thli te a poek tang tih a thui moenih , thlaanghuuen la a awm dawngah ni a thui . Ahih tah tangka kuemkung la a awm dawngah tangka te amah hamla thoem a hawna poepa .
43012007	Tede Jesuh lawng , “ Ahih te lawl ala u boel ! Ka rawkk kuemna khawhin veng kah ham khaw sai mai seh .
43012008	Khawdeng thlaang thli tah nangmi oen awm u poepa ai , tede kai tah nangmi oen ka awm poe manawh . ” a tina .
43012009	Bethani khaw ah Jesuh awm tite a yaak u vengah tela te thlaangping broela cet u . Te ah te Jesuh a awm dawng bueng ah nawh tih duekna kalawng Jesuh lawng a thawh sak Lazaruh khaw a awm dawngah ni .
43012010	Tedawngah khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawng Lazaruh te khaw ngawn hamla a teeng u ,
43012011	metihtiah ahih kawng dawngah Judah thlaang broe lawng ahimi te a hoett u tih Jesuh te a tangna u dawngah ni .
43012012	Avuen hin ah Kaantaak Poei la aka law thlaangping lawngah Jerusalem la Jesuh law ai tila a yaak u .
43012013	Tedawngah ahimi lawng samtoe te a khuen u tih ahih te do hamla cet u , “ Pathen te thangpawm uh ! Bawipa miing oen aka law te Pathen lawng yotheenna pe seh ! Israel Sengpahrang te Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awm pe seh ! ” tila te paang u .
43012014	Caciim lawngah , “ Zaion khawpui , nang lawng rih roe boel !
43012015	Na sengpahrang lawng lacano te a cit tih law lii hun , ” tila a thui angla Jesuh lawng lacano pakhat te a huh tih a cit .
43012016	Tevengah te a hubang hue lawng he kah thaihu he yaakming u thai nawh ; tede Jesuh he ruep-awm la a thawh coeng veng atah Caciim lawng ahih kawng a thui tih ahih hamla ni ahimi lawng a sai pe u tite a yaakming u .
43012017	Jesuh lawng Lazaruh te thlann khuikah a khue tih duekna kalawng a thawh sak vengah Jesuh tengah aka awm thlaang thli lawng te kawng te a thui patoeng u .
43012018	Ahih lawng he ang kawpoekrai miknoekna a sai te a yaak u dawngah ahih te huh hamla thlaangping law u .
43012019	Tedawngah Farasi thlaang thli lawng amami khat oen khat te , “ Mami lawng n'taa thai nawh poen ti he na ming u aw ! Bueh lah , dilai pum lawng ahih hu ah bang u poen ! ” ti u .
43012020	Poei vengah Pathen bok ham Jerusalem la aka cet thlaang tim ah te krik thlaangphun khatsut khaw awm u .
43012021	Ahimi lawngah Galili peng Betsaida khaw kah Filip tengla te cet u tih , “ Saya , Jesuh huh hamla ka ngaih u . ” a tina .
43012022	Filip lawng Andru tengla cet tih a thui pe coengah ahih rawi te Jesuh tengla cet tih a thui pe hih .
43012023	Jesuh lawng ahih rawi nala te , “ Thlaanghing Capa lawng aka lenduet ruep-awmna dang hamla tahe ah atue a pha poen .
43012024	Awltak kavan thui u ; caangthaam thaam at te dilai la tla nawh tih a duek nawh atah amah moepoe la awm . A duek atah caangthaam yahawh la a thoeng sak .
43012025	A-u lawngkhaw amah kah hingna te a lungna atah sung ai ; a-u khaw he dilai ah amah kah hingna te a thina atah dungyan hingna te a dang ai .
43012026	A-u khaw kai kah bii he bi hamla a ngaih atah ka hu ah bang seh , te dengah ni kai kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli lawngah ka awmna ah a awm u van ai . Kai kah bii aka bi te tah a Pa lawng a thangpawm ai . ” a tina .
43012027	Jesuh lawng , “ Ka kawpoek patang tangkiik mah aw , n'tu ka thui lah ai ? ‘ A Pa , he kah atue he ka sawah van pha sak mai boel , ’ tila aw ka thui lah ai ? Tede patang khangna atue he tawng ham ni ka law roe .
43012028	A Pa , na miing te ruep-awmna pe lah ! ” tila a thui . Tecoengah vaan kah awl lawngah , “ Ruep-awmna te ka peek poen , ka peek koep hun ai ” tila a thui .
43012029	Te kah aka pai thlaangping lawngah te awl te a yaak u tih thlaang pakhat lawngtah khawhumm awl ni ti u , thlaangtloe lawngtah , “ Vanthlaang lawng awl avan thui pe . ” ti u .
43012030	Tede Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ He awl he kai hamla van thui nawh , nangmi ham ni .
43012031	Tahe ah dilai he awlcek ham atue apha poen ; tahe ah he dilai ukkung thli te atloela a khoe poen ai .
43012032	Kai he dilai dawng kalawng tai la ka awm vengah thlaang boeih he ka tengla ka doek ai . ” a tina .
43012033	( Te tila a thui te amah kah patang khang duekna te ni a thui ngaihna . )
43012034	Thlaangping lawngah , “ Kaimi kah Phungawl lawngah Messiah tah yoeyahla hing ai tila a thui . Tetih atah Thlaanghing Capa te a tai u ai tite metila na thui thai ? Thlaanghing Capa te a-u ? tila a doet u .
43012035	Jesuh lawng , “ Aangna he nangmi tengah kawlkalh ni a awm poen ai . Yiinna te nangmi sawah avan pha nawh ham aangna a awm vengah he cet u lah ; metihtiah yiinna khuiah aka cet lawngtah meben la ka ceh tite ming nawh .
43012036	Nangmi lawng aangna thlaang la na awmna u ham aangna na khueh vengah he aangna te tangna u lah , ” a tina . He awl he a thui coeng atah ahimi te a ceh taak tih thuh u poen .
43012037	Ahimi kah mik huh ah kawpoekrai miknoekna boeih he a sai pe de ahimi lawng tangna u nawh ,
43012038	he tah tawngha Isaiah lawng : “ Bawipa , kaimi lawng awl ka thui he a-u lawng a tangna ? Bawipa lawng a-u tengah huham tharana te a tueng sak ? tila a thui te asoepna ham ni .
43012039	He dawngah ni ahimi lawng a tangna u nawh , metihtiah Isaiah amah toengtoeng lawngah ,
43012040	“ Pathen lawng ahimi mik te a pum sak tih lung among sak , ‘ Tetih atah ahimi mik lawng hu nawh vetih , ahimi kah thinkaw lawng ming nawh vetih ahimi te hoeih sak hamla ka tengla a law u nawh ai ’ tila Pathen lawngah ti ” tila te a thui .
43012041	Isaiah lawng Jesuh kah ruep-awmna te a huh dawngah ni ahih lawng te tila a thui .
43012042	Te tila a awm ah Pateng khaw aana khuehkung Judah thlaang broe lawngah Jesuh te a tangna u ; tede Farasi thlaang thli lawngah sinakok bok-im kalawng n'hek hau ai tite a rih u dawngah te kawng te langyala thui u nawh .
43012043	Ahimi lawng Pathen kah koehna lak ah thlaanghing kah koehna te a ngaih ngai u dawngah ni .
43012044	Jesuh lawng awl a huer tih angaihhlangla paang tih , “ A-u khaw kai he aka tangna tah kai bueng he tangna nawh tih kai tuihkung te khaw a tangna .
43012045	A-u khaw kai he aka hu tah kai tuihkung te khaw a huh .
43012046	A-u khaw kai aka tangna tah yiinna khuiah a awmna nawh ham kai tah dilai ah aangna la ka law poen .
43012047	A-u khaw ka awl he a yaak tih aka vai nawh te kai lawng awl ka cek manawh . Dilai he awl cek ham ka law nawh tih thlawn ham ni ka law .
43012048	A-u khaw ka awl he aka do nawh tih kai aka hoett te awl aka cek hamla thlaang awm . Aboetna khawhin vengah ka awl thui lawngah awl a cek ai .
43012049	He tah soeng tak tak ; metihtiah kai lawng kamah rang oen ka thui nawh , tede kai he tuihkung a Pa kah awlpeek rang oen ni ka thui .
43012050	Tecoengah ahih kah awlpeek lawngtah dungyan hingna te avan khuen tila ka ming . Tedawngah a pa kah thui sak te ni kai lawng ka thui . ” a tina .
43013001	Te tah Kaantaak Poei apha tawm Khawhin poen ni . Jesuh lawng he dilai he ceh taak tih Pa tengla ceh hamla atue apha poen tite a ming . Ahih lawngah he dilai kah a hubang hue te a lungna tih aboet toela a lungna .
43013002	Jesuh oen a hubang hue thlembuh a veel u vengah Seitan lawngah Simon Iskariot capa Judas thinkaw khuiah te Jesuh sawah paipi thleep hamla kawpoek te a khueh pe poen .
43013003	Jesuh lawngah tharana cungkuem ana Pa lawng a peek te a ming ; ahih lawngah Pathen tengkah ka law tih Pathen tengla ka cet ai ti khaw a ming .
43013004	Tedawngah caboi dawng kalawng tho hang tih asawkah himbaidung a bai te a pit , bailoeng oen a hingcen te a yeen .
43013005	Tecoengah beeldung dawngah tui a thloen tih a hubang thli kah a khow te a silh pe , a hingcen ah a yeen bailoeng oen te a thuut pe .
43013006	Simon Piter tengah a pha veng atah ahih lawng , “ Bawipa , nang lawng ka khow navan silh aw ? ” a tina .
43013007	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai lawng ka sai he tahe ah na yaakming thlan hun , tede tahe kalawng ah na yaakming badai . ” a tina .
43013008	Piter lawngah , a thana tih , “ Ka khow he meveng khaw navan sil boel ! ” a tina . Jesuh lawngah , “ Na khow he kavan sil nawh kawinih ka hubang la na awm tlaih manawh . ” a tina .
43013009	Simon Piter lawng , “ Te tih atah , Bawipa , ka khow bueng he van sil boel ! ka kut oen ka luu he khaw van sil ! ” a tina .
43013010	Jesuh lawng , “ Tui aka thlu tangte tah ciim poen tih thui thluk ham awm tlaih nawh , a khow bueng te ni silh ham angoe . Nangmi boeih tah na ciim u , pakhat ni aka ciim nawh . ” a tina .
43013011	( Jesuh lawng amah sawah paipi aka thleep koei te a ming , tedawngah , “ Nangmi boeih na ciim u , pakhat ni aka ciim nawh . ” a tina . )
43013012	Jesuh lawng ahimi khow te a silh coengah himbaidung te a bai koep tih a ngawlhna caboi dawngah te koep ngawl . Kai lawng ka sai he na yaakming u aw ? tila a doet .
43013013	Nangmi lawngah kai he Saya tila khaw , Bawipa tila khaw nan khue u , te tila ka awm dawngah nan tina te soeng .
43013014	Nangmi kah Bawipa oen Saya kai lawngah nangmi kah khow te kavan silh . Tedawngah nangmi lawng khat oen khat kah khow te patoeng na silh u van ham awm .
43013015	Kai lawng ka sai van angla nangmi lawngkhaw na sai u van ham , na oett ham koei te kavan sai poen .
43013016	Awltak kavan thui : Sal he a bawipa lak ah lenduet nawh , laipai he khaw aka tuihkung lak ah lenduet nawh .
43013017	Tahe tah awltak he na ming u poen , ataktangla aka sai tah metihtlukla a awmngaih ai !
43013018	Nangmi boeih he ka thui ngaihna nawh ni ; ka tuek te tah ka ming . Tede caciim lawng , “ Kamah kah buh aka ca lawng raal la coeng poen ” a tite asoep ham awm .
43013019	He ang thli he a thoeng thlan ah kavan thui u , te dengah ni a thoeng tak tak vengah , “ Kai Tah Ka Awm Tih Ka Awm ” a tite na tangna ai .
43013020	Awltak kavan thui u , kai lawng ka tuih thlaang te aka do tah kai he khaw n'do van , kai he aka do tah kai tuihkung te khaw a do van . ” a tina .
43013021	Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coeng atah , thinphat uett ah , “ Awltak kavan thui u , nangmi tim kah pakhat lawng ka sawah paipi a thleep ai . ” a tina .
43013022	A hubang hue lawngah a-u thui-ngaihna kai ti u tih khat oen khat te aletla bueh u the .
43013023	A hubang thli khuikah thlaang pakhat , Jesuh lawng a lungna te Jesuh tengah ngawl .
43013024	Simon Piter lawng ahih nala te , “ A-u nuem a thuingaihna doet lah . ” a tina .
43013025	Tedawngah te kah hubang te Jesuh tengla thoeih rep phai tih , “ Bawipa a-u lawng paipi a thleep ai ? a tina .
43013026	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai lawngah takawi kaam at caak te antui dawngah ka nuemm vetih ka peek thlaang te ahih ni . ” a tina . Tedawngah takawi kaam at caak te a lawh tih a nuem , tecoengah Simon Iskariot capa Judah te a peek .
43013027	Judah lawng takawi te a lawh khoeng vengah Seitan tah a kaw khuiah kuun . Jesuh lawng ahih nala , “ Na sai koei te aloela sai loeih ! ” a tina .
43013028	Jesuh lawng ahih tengah n'tu ah te tila a thui tite caboi dawngah aka ngawl khat lawngkhaw yaakming u nawh .
43013029	Judah tah tangka kuemkung la awm tih Jesuh lawngah ahih te poei veng ham ah amami kah angoe , tihnawhtah khawdeng thlaang thli te thaihu pakhat khat peek ham te lai hamla a thui pe cawini tila a hubang khatsut lawngtah a poek u .
43013030	Judah lawng takawi te a do tih cet pahoei poen . Teveng te tah khawyiin thlemkhuep poen ni .
43013031	Judah te a ceh coengah Jesuh lawng , “ Tahe ah Thlaang Capa kah ruep-awmna tah tueng poen ; ahih rang oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna tah tueng poen .
43013032	Tecoengah ahih rang oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna te a tueng atah Pathen lawng Thlaanghing Capa amah dawngah ruep-awmna te a tueng sak vetih avan sai pahoei poen ai .
43013033	Ka ca thli , nangmi tengah asan ka awm tlaih manawh . Nangmi lawng kai he nan tlap u ai ; tede aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah ka thui te tahe ah nangmi tengah kavan thui u , ‘ Kai ka cehna ah nangmi na cet thai manawh . ’
43013034	Tahe ah awlpeek thaai kan peek u : pakhat oen khat te lung u lah . Kai lawng nangmi kan lungna u van angla nangmi khat oen khat na lung u ham awm .
43013035	Nangmi khat oen khat na lung u atah thlaang boeih lawng nangmi he kai kah hubang hue ni tila a ming u ai . ” a tina .
43013036	Simon Piter lawng , “ Bawipa , mela na ceh ai ? ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Kai ka cehna ah tahe na law thai manawh , tede ahula na law badai ” a tina .
43013037	Piter lawng , “ Bawipa , n'tu ah tahe ah ka law thai nawh ai ? Nang hamla tah duek khaw ka maa nawh ” a tina .
43013038	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai hamla tah duek khaw na maa nawh tang tang aw ? Awl-tak kavan thui : aai a khawk thlan ah , kai he ka ming nawh tila voei thum toe na thui ai . ” a tina .
43014001	Jesuh lawng a hubang hue nala te , “ Nangmi lawngah ngaihang khawbing la awm u boel , Pathen khaw oeng u langtah kai khaw n'tangna u lah .
43014002	A Pa im ah ahuen yahawh hlang awm tih nangmi ham ah ahuen roekbah hamla ka cet ai . Awm nawh kawinih nangmi tengah kavan thui nawh mue .
43014003	Kai lawng ka cet vetih nangmi hamla ahuen te ka roekbah coengah ka law koep vetih kai ka awmna ah nangmi awm van ham kan lawh ai .
43014004	Kai ka cehna ahuen la aka pha sak lawngpui te na ming u . ” a tina .
43014005	Tawmas lawng ahih nala te , “ Bawipa , mela na ceh ai tite ka ming u nawh , te kah ahuen ah phana lawngpui te metila ka ming u ai ? ” tila a doet .
43014006	Jesuh lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Kai tah lawngpui oen awltak oen ah hingna la ka awm . Kai rang nawh atah a-u khaw Pa tengla cet thai manawh .
43014007	Tahe ah kai he nan ming u poen , nangmi lawng a Pa te khaw na ming u ; tahe veng kalawng ah nangmi lawng ahih te na ming u poen tih na huh u poen ” a tina .
43014008	Filip lawng , “ Bawipa , na Pa te kaimi n'huh sak lah , te ni kaimi lawng ka ngoe u . ” a tina .
43014009	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nangmi tengah asan hlang ka awm poen , nan ming thlan aw , Filip ? A-u khaw kai he aka hu tah a Pa te a huh poen . Tetih atah n'tu ah , “ Na Pa te kaimi n'huh sak lah na ti .
43014010	Filip , kai tah a Pa khuiah ka awm tih a Pa te ka khuiah awm tite na tangna nawh aw ? Nangmi tengah awl kavan thui he kamah awl nawh ni . Ka khuiah aka awm a Pa kah bii bina ni .
43014011	Kai lawngah , kai tah a Pa khuiah ka awm tih ka khuiah a Pa awm tila ka thui he tangna lah . Na tangna nawh atah ka sai thaihu te tangna uh .
43014012	Awltak kavan thui u , a-u khaw kai he aka tangna lawngtah kai lawng ka sai he a sai van ai , thaihu alentloe Pateng khaw a sai ai , metihtiah kai tah Pa tengla ka ceh ham a awm poen dawngah ni .
43014013	Capa rang oen ah Pa kah ruep-awmna te a tuengna ham ka miing oen na bih boeih te kavan sai ai .
43014014	Ka miing oen ah thaihu khat khat navan bih te kavan sai ai ” a tina .
43014015	“ Kai he nan lungna u atah , ka awlpeek he na vai ham awm .
43014016	A Pa tengah ka bih vetih nangmi te dungyan aka awm puei hamla ahih lawngah atloe Bawmkung te nangmi m'peek ai .
43014017	Pathen kawng awltak aka tueng sak Muithla te m'peek ai . Dilai lawng ahih te hu thai nawh , ming thai nawh vetih ahih te do manawh . Tede ahih tah nangmi tengah awm tih na khuiah a awm dawngah nangmi lawngtah na ming u .
43014018	“ Kai lawng ka ceh atah namami bueng te kan ceh taak sut manawh ; Nangmi tengla koep ka law ai .
43014019	Kawlkalh a awm coeng atah dilai lawng kai he n'hu tlaih manawh , tede nangmi lawngtah nan huh ai ; kai tah ka hing dawngah nangmi khaw na hing u van ai .
43014020	Te khawhin te apha atah , kai he a Pa khuiah ka awm tih nangmi khuiah ka awm van angla nangmi khaw ka khuiah na awm te na ming u ai .
43014021	A-u lawngkhaw ka awlpeek he a do tih aka vai tah kai he aka lungna thlaang ni . Kai he aka lungna boeih tah a Pa lawng a lungna ai ; Kai lawngkhaw ahih te ka lungna vetih a tengah ka phumpho pe ai . ” a tina .
43014022	Judas lawng ( Judas Iskariot nawh ni ) , “ Bawipa , kaimi teng atah na phumpho tih dilai teng atah na phumpho nawh te metila a awm ai ? ” a tina .
43014023	Jesuh lawng , “ A-u khaw kai aka lungna tah kan cang puei he a vai ham awm . Ahih te a Pa lawng a lungna ai , kai oen a Pa te a tengla ka law vetih ahih tengah te ka awm hih ai .
43014024	A-u khaw kai he aka lungna nawh tah ka cang puei he vai manawh . Nangmi lawng na yaak u cangpueina he kamah tengkah nawh ni , tede kai tuihkung a Pa teng kalawng ni a law .
43014025	Nangmi teng ka awm vengah he kah awl he kavan thui u .
43014026	A Pa lawng ka miing oen avan tuih ham koei Bawmkung Ciim Muithla lawngah soeprep boeih te nangmi m'cang puei vetih kavan thui boeih he nangmi m'ming sak ai .
43014027	Ngaimawngna kavan ceh taak u , te tah kamah kah ngaimawngna te ni kan peek u . Dilai kah peek te ang te kan pe nawh . Ngaihang lakueng oen khawthe boepla awm u boel ; rihsakna khaw khueh u boel .
43014028	‘ Kai tah ka cet ai , tede nangmi tengla ka law koep ai , kan tina te na yaak u poen . ’ Kai he nan lungna u atah a Pa tengla ka cet ai ka ti he na awmngaih ham awm ; metihtiah ahih tah kai lak ah aka lenduet ni .
43014029	He he a thoeng taktak vengah nangmi lawng na tangna u hamla tahe veng a thoeng thlan ah he kavan thui u poen .
43014030	He dilai ukkung te law poen ai , tedawngah nangmi oen awl asan hlang la n'thui u tlaih manawh . Ahih lawng ka sawah huham tharana te khueh thai manawh ,
43014031	tede kai lawng a Pa ka lungna tih ahih kah awl peek angla soeprep boeih ka sai te dilai lawng a ming ham awm . “ Law uh , cawh , he huen kalawng cet u poen sih . ” a tina .
43015001	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai tah misurkung tangtang la ka awm tih a Pa tah Dum khuehkung ni .
43015002	Ahih lawngah , dawngah athaih aka thaih nawh a beek-athleeng thli te a haih boeih tih athaih aka thaih nawh te khaw athaih ciil te athaihna ham a beek-athleeng thli te a coei pe .
43015003	Nangmi tah kai kah cangpueina oen aciimthlaula na awm u poen .
43015004	Kai dawngah he tuhkai u lang awm poe u lah , kai khaw nangmi oen ka tuhkai u vetih ka awm poe van ai . Misur kah a beek-athleeng lawng amah poek ah thaih thai nawh ; misurkung oen poe a tuh u dengah ni a thaih thai . Te tih van angla nangmi khaw kai dawngah poe na tuhkai u nawh atah na thaih u thai manawh .
43015005	Kai tah misurkungpui la ka awm tih nangmi tah a beek a thleeng thli ni . A-u khaw kai dawngah awm tih kai khaw ahih dawngah ka awm atah yahawh hlang la thaih ai ; kai rang nawh atah n'tu khaw na sai thai u manawh .
43015006	A-u khaw kai dawngah aka awm nawh tah misur kah a beek-athleeng angla a voeih vetih reu ai ; te ang a beek-athleeng te a cawi vetih hai dawngah a phum ai , te ah te ung boeih ai .
43015007	Kai dawngah na awm u tih nangmi khuiah ka awl he a awm atah nangmi lawng na bih thaihu te na dang u ai .
43015008	Nangmi lawng yahawh hlangla athaih thaihna rang oen a Pa kah ruep-awmna te na tueng sak u vetih te tila te ka hubang la na coengg u ai .
43015009	A Pa lawng kai n'lungna van angla nangmi khaw kan lungna .
43015010	A Pa kah awlpeek te ka vai tih a lungna khuiah ka awm van angla ka awlpeek thli he na vai u atah kai kah lungna khuiah na awm u .
43015011	Ka awmngaihna te nangmi khuiah awm tih na awmngaihna te asoepna ham he awl he kavan thui u .
43015012	Ka awlpeek tah he ni : kai lawng nangmi kan lungna van angla nangmi khat oen khat lung u van .
43015013	Thlaang lawngah he a paya hamla a lenduet lungna a khueh thai tah ahimi ham hingna a peek te ni .
43015014	Nangmi lawng ka awlpeek he na sai u atah ka paya la na awm u .
43015015	Nangmi te tuihyoeihthlaang kan tina tlaih nawh , metihtiah tuihyoeihthlaang lawngtah a bawipa kah a sai te ming nawh . A Pa tengkah ka yaak boeih te kavan thui poen dawngah nangmi he ka paya kan tina u poen .
43015016	Nangmi lawngah kai he nan tuek nawh ; nangmi lawng na cet u vetih yoeyahla aka cak a thaih te na thaihna u hamla kai lawng nangmi he kan tuek tih bii kan peek u . Tedawngah nangmi lawng ka miing oen na bih boeih te a Pa lawng m'peek ai .
43015017	Tecoengah he tah kai kah awl peek ni : pakhat oen pakhat lung u lah . ” a tina .
43015018	Dilai lawng nangmi n'thina atah lamhacuekla kai he ni n'thina tite poek uh .
43015019	Nangmi lawngah dilai koeva la na awm u kawinih dilai lawng amah koeva angla te n'lungna u van ai . Tede nangmi he dilai dawng kalawng kan tuek u poen tih dilai koeva la na awm u tlaih nawh dawngah dilai lawng nangmi n'thina .
43015020	‘ Sal he tah a bawipa lak ah lenduet nawh ’ kan tina te hilh u boel . Ahimi lawng kai he n'heem atek atah nangmi te khaw n'heem atek van ai ; ahimi lawng kai kah cangpueina he a vai u atah nangmi kah cangpueina te khaw a vai u van ai .
43015021	Tede nangmi he kai kah thlaang la na awm u dawngah ahimi lawng te ang thli boeih te nangmi sawah avan sai ai ; metihtiah ahimi lawng kai aka tuihkung te ming u nawh .
43015022	Kai he ka law nawh tih ahimi tengah te ka thui pe nawh kawinih ahimi lawng thawlhna khueh u nawh sui ; tede tahe tah ahimi lawng amami thawlhna peelnangna ham n'tu khaw khueh u tlaih nawh .
43015023	A-u khaw kai he aka thina tah a Pa te khaw a thina van .
43015024	A-u lawngkhaw a sai nooek nawh te ahimi tim ah ka sai nawh kawinih ahimi te thawlh u nawh sui ; kai lawng ka sai te ahimi lawng a huh u tih a Pa oen kai he n'thina u poen .
43015025	Tede , he tah amami kah Phungawl dawngah , ‘ N'tu kawng nawh maiah ahimi lawng kai he n'thina u poen , ’ tila a thut te asoepna ham ni .
43015026	A Pa teng kalawng aka law Bawmkung , Pathen kawng awltak aka phawng Muithla te law ai . Kai lawng a Pa tengkah kavan tuih vetih kamah kawng he a thui ai .
43015027	Nangmi khaw acuekca veng kalawng ka tengah na awm u dawngah kamah kawng he na thui u van ai .
43016001	Nangmi lawng na oengna te na hoett u nawh ham he awl he kavan thui u .
43016002	Nangmi te sinakok bok-im khui kalawng n'hek u vetih nangmi te aka ngawn thlaang thli lawng Pathen bii ni ka bi u tila a poekna atue te law ai .
43016003	Ahimi lawngah kai he khaw , a Pa khaw a ming u nawh dawngah he ang thli he nangmi sawah a sai u ai .
43016004	He ang thaihu thli he ahimi lawng sai hamla atue apha vengah kavan thui he na hilh u nawh ham ah awl kavan thui . Nangmi tengah ka awm dawngah he kah thaihu thli he acuekca ah kavan thui u nawh .
43016005	Tahe atah kai aka tuihkung tengla ka cet poen ai , tede a-u khat lawngkhaw mela na ceh ai tite nan doet u nawh .
43016006	Tahe ah kavan thui dawngah na kaw the u .
43016007	Tede awltak kavan thui : kai he ka ceh atah nangmi ham theen bet ai , metihtiah ka cet nawh kawinih nangmi tengah Bawmkung te law manawh . Tede ka cet kawinih ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih ai .
43016008	Ahih te a law veng atah thawlhna kawng , oengna kawng oen Pathen kah awlcekna kawng te ahih lawngah dilai thlaang thli tengah a thui pe ai .
43016009	Ahimi lawng kai he n'tangna u nawh dawngah thawlh u ti khaw a thui pe ai ;
43016010	Kai tah a Pa tengla ka cet poen vetih nan hu u tlaih manawh , tedawngah doengna kawng te a thui ai .
43016011	He dilai ukkung thli he awl a cek poen dawngah awlcekna kawng te a thui ai .
43016012	Nangmi tengah thui ham moen ka khueh , tede tahe ah he nangmi lawng na harukna lek aih manawh .
43016013	Tede Muithla te a law veng atah ahih lawng Pathen kawng awltak te avan phawng vetih awltak khuila te m'mawt u ai . Ahih lawng amah aana oen thui manawh , tede ahih lawng a yaak te a thui vetih aka law ham koei thaihu te avan thui ai .
43016014	Ahih lawng kai he ruep-awmna te m'peek ai , metihtiah ahih lawngtah kai lawng ka thui te nangmi tengah avan thui ai .
43016015	A Pa kah a khueh boeih te tah kai kah ni ; tedawngah Muithla lawngtah kai lawng ka peek te a lawh vetih nangmi tengah avan thui ai tila kavan thui u . ” a tina .
43016016	“ Kawlkalh a awm coeng atah kai he nan hu u tlaih manawh , tede kawlkalh a awm coengah kai he koep nan huh u ai ” a tina .
43016017	A hubang khatsut lawngah amami oen amami te , “ He he n'tu a thuingaihna kai ? Kawlkalh a awm coengah nan hu tlaih manawh ti tih , tecoengah kawlkalh a awm coengah nan huh u koep ai ’ ti ; tecoengah ‘ a Pa tengla ka cet ai ’ tila khaw a thui .
43016018	‘ Kawlkalh ah ’ a ti he n'tu a thui ngaihna kai ? N'tu kawng nuem a thui ; ka ming u moenih ! ” ti u .
43016019	Ahimi lawngah doet hamla a ngaih u te Jesuh lawng a ming tih ahimi nala , “ Kai lawngah , ‘ kawlkalh a awm coengah nan hu u tlaih manawh , tecoeng kawlkalh a awm coengah nan huh u koep ai ’ ka ti te aw namami oen namami na doet u khiing te ?
43016020	Awltak kavan thui , nangmi lawng kopaang oen na rap u ai , tede dilai tah awmngaih ai ; nangmi tah na kaw the ai , tede nangmi kah kawthena te awmngaihna la coengg ai .
43016021	Hutaa lawngah camoe a cuun vengah , patang khangna tue lawng a pha tih a kaw the ; tede dilai dawng camoe pakhat te a cuun veng atah ahih lawng awmngaih tih patang palaina te a hilh .
43016022	Te tila te nangmi khaw na awm u van ai : tahe ah na kaw the u , tede nangmi te koep kan huh u vetih na awmngaih tangkiik u ai ; te tah a-u khat lawngkhaw a lawh thai nawh awmngaihna ni .
43016023	“ Te khawhin te a law vengah nangmi lawng n'tu khaw navan bih u manawh . Awltak kavan thui : nangmi lawng ka miing oen na bih boeih te a Pa lawng m'peek ai .
43016024	Tahe toe ah he nangmi lawng n'tu khaw ka miing oen na bih u thlan hun ; nangmi kah awmngaihna te asoepna ham bih u lah na dang ni .
43016025	He thaihu thli he nangmi tengah thui hamla nuehtahna awl bueng te ka hawna . Tede kai lawng nuehtahna awl ka hawna nawh atue te a pha vetih a Pa kawng te aciimbiitla nangmi tengah avan thui ai .
43016026	Te khawhin te a pha vengah ka miing oen ah ahih tengah te na bih u ai ; ahih tengah nangmi yuengla kavan bih ai tila ka thui nawh ,
43016027	Metihtiah a Pa amah lawng nangmi te n'lungna . Nangmi lawng kai he nan lungna u tih kai he Pathen teng kalawng ka law ti he na tangna u dawngah nangmi te n'lungna .
43016028	Kai tah a Pa teng kalawng dilai dawngla ka law , dilai he ka ceh taak vetih a Pa tengla ka cet ai . ” a tina .
43016029	Tecoengah a hubang hue lawng , “ Tahe tah nang lawng nuehtahna awl thui tlaih ohla aciimthlaula na thui poen .
43016030	Nang lawng soeprep boeih na ming tila tahe tah ka ming u poen ; nang lawngah thlaangtloe te doet ham na ngoe nawh . Tedawngah nang he Pathen tengkah na law tila kaimi lawng ka tangna . ” a tina u .
43016031	Jesuh lawngah , “ Tahe ah na tangna u poen aw ?
43016032	Nangmi he phang na pek u ai , namah im la na cet u khongphaat vetih kai he kamah bueng nan ceh taak sut atue te law lii tih tahe ah avan pha poen . Tede kai tah kamah bueng tangtang aih nawh ni , metihtiah a Pa lawngah ng'awm puei .
43016033	Nangmi lawng kai oen ah tuhkaina rang oen ngaimawngna na khuehna ham he he kavan thui . Dilai lawng nangmi raina m'peek ai . Tecakhaw na thin cak sak uh ! Kai lawng dilai ka taa poen ! ” a tina .
43017001	Jesuh lawng he awl he a thui coengah ahih tah vaan benla maang hang tih , “ A Pa , atue tah a pha poen . Na capa kai lawng nang te ruep-awmna kan peekna ham na capa he ruep-awmna m'pe lah .
43017002	Nan peek boeih te dungyan hingna ka peek thaina ham thlaang boeih sawah sai thaina aana te nan peek poen .
43017003	Tecoengah dungyan hingna ti he tah nang lawng na tuih Jesuh Khrih he ming tih Pathen taktak nang te ming he ni .
43017004	Dilai sawah na ruep-awm na te ka tueng sak poen ; kai lawngah ka sai hamla nan peek bii te ka coeng poen .
43017005	A Pa ! Dilai sai thlan ah namah oen awm haih vengkah ruep-awmna te ang van te tahe namah haiah ruep-awmna te m'pe lah .
43017006	Dilai dawngkah nan peek thlaang thli tengah na miing te ka tueng sak poen . Ahimi te nang kah thlaang la awm tih ahimi te kai nan peek . Ahimi lawng na awl te a ngaai u tih ,
43017007	soeprep boeih nan peek he nang teng kah aka law ni tite tahe tah a ming u poen .
43017008	Nang lawng nan peek awl te ahimi ka peek tih ahimi lawng a do u ; kai he nang teng kalawng ka law ti he soeng tangtang tila a ming u tih kai he nang lawng nan tuih ni tila a tangna u .
43017009	“ Ahimi hamla ka thangthui . Dilai ham ka thangthui nawh tih nang lawng nan peek thlaang thli te nang kah thlaang la a awm dawngah ahimi ham ka thangthui .
43017010	Kai lawng ka khueh boeih he nang kah ni , nang lawng na khueh boeih te khaw kai kah ni ; ahimi rang oen kai kah ruep awmna he tueng .
43017011	Tahe tah na tengla ka law poen ai ; dilai ah ka awm tlaih manawh , tede ahimi tah dilai ah awm ai . Aka ciim a Pa ! nang oen kai tah pumkhat la n'awm van angla ahimi khaw pumkhat la a awm u van ham nang lawngah nan peek huham tharana namah miing oen ah te ading asuekla thlipdah lah .
43017012	Ahimi oen ka awm vengah he nang lawng nan peek huham tharana namah miing oen ah te ahimi he ading asuekla ka thlip ka dah tih ka khoem . Thlaangha pataam la nuen tangte thlaang pakhat te thui muehla tah pakhat khaw ha-ata nawh .
43017013	Tahe ah kai tah na tengla ka law poen ai , ahimi lawngah ka awmngaihna he a thinkaw khuiah aboet toela a khuehna u ham dilai ka awm veng he ah , he ang thaihu thli he ka thui pe .
43017014	Nang kah awl te ahimi ham ka thui pe , kai he dilai koeva la ka awm van nawh angla ahimi khaw dilai koeva la awm u nawh tih ahimi he dilai lawng a thina u .
43017015	Dilai dawng kalawng ahimi he na lawh hamla kavan bih nawh , tede Thlaangthe Puei teng kalawng ading asuekla thlipdah ham ni kavan bih .
43017016	Kai he dilai koeva la ka awm van nawh angla ahimi khaw dilai koeva la awm u nawh .
43017017	Ahimi he awltak oen namah hamla pum peek sak lah ; awltak tah na awl te ni .
43017018	Kai he dilai ah nan tuih van angla ahimi te dilai ah ka tuih van .
43017019	Ahimi lawngah ataktang la na tengah pum a peek u van ham kai khaw ahimi hamla pum ka peek .
43017020	Ahimi ham bueng ah ka thangthui nawh , ahimi kah awl thui rang oen ah kai he aka tangna thlaang thli ham khaw ka thangthui .
43017021	Ahimi boeih lawng pumkhat la a awmna u ham ka thangthui . A Pa , Nang khuiah kai ka awm tih kai khuiah nang na awm van angla ahimi te mami khuiah awm van lah seh . Kai he nang lawng ni nan tuih tite dilai lawng a tangna ham ahimi he pumkhat la awm sak lah .
43017022	Nang oen kai he pumkhat la n'awm van angla ahimi khaw pumkhat la a awmna u ham nang lawng nan peek ruep-awmna te ang van te ahimi ka peek .
43017023	Ahimi khuiah kai ka awm tih kai khuiah nang na awm , ahimi lawng pum khat la a awmna rang oen nang lawng kai nan tuih tih nan lungna van angla ahimi khaw na lungna tite dilai lawng a ming ai .
43017024	“ A Pa ! Dilai suen thlan vengah nan lungna tih ruep-awmna nan peek , te kah ruep-awmna te nang lawng ka tengah nan peek thlaang thli lawng a huhna u ham kai ka awmna ah ahimi te awm sak ham ka ngaih .
43017025	Aka doeng a Pa ! Dilai lawng nang m'ming nawh de kai lawngtah kan ming tih nang lawngah kai he nan tuih tite he thli lawng a ming u .
43017026	Kai nan lungna te ahimi khuiah awm tih kai khaw ahimi khuiah ka awmna ham nang te ahimi ka ming sak poen , ka ming sak baal hun ai . ” tila thangthui .
43018001	Jesuh lawng he tila a thangthui coengah a hubang hue oen ah cet u tih Kidron sawkpui ah te kat phai u . Te ah te dum pakhat awm tih te la te Jesuh oen a hubang hue te cet u .
43018002	Jesuh oen a hubang hue tah tela te a ceh poepa u dawngah paipi thleepkung Judas lawng dum te a ming .
43018003	Tedawngah Judas lawng Rom raalkap bu khat oen ah Farasi thlaang thli oen khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawng a tuih tempal bok-im aka toet thlaang vang te dum la a ceh puei . Ahimi lawng pawmcunghaiha oen oep u tih haiim oen haithoei te a khuen u .
43018004	Jesuh lawng amah tengah aka thoeng ham koei soeprep boeih te a ming , tedawngah hai-la te cawh phai tih ahimi nala te , “ A-u na tlap u ? ” tila a doet .
43018005	Ahimi lawng , “ Nazaret Jesuh ka tlap ” a tina u . Ahih lawngah , “ Kai he ahih poen ni . ” a tina . Paipi thleepkung Judas tah te ah te ahimi oen haih pai u .
43018006	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai he ahih poen ni . ” a ti vengah te hu benla nawng u tih dilai dawngah tlim drek u .
43018007	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ A-u na tlap u ? ” tila koep a doet . Ahimi lawng , “ Nazaret khaw kah Jesuh ” a tina u .
