43018008	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai he ahih poen ni , kan tina u teta , nangmi lawng kai he nan tlap u atah atloe hue he tah ceh sak uh . ” a tina .
43018009	( He tila a thui he tah , “ A Pa , nang lawng nan peek thli te tah pakhat khaw ka ha sak nawh ” tila a thui te asoepna ham ni . )
43018010	Simon Piter lawng samsen a khuen te tiingim dawngkah a phong tih Khawsoeih Bawi kah tamnaa , a bantang haa te pat a tloek pe . Te kah tamnaa te Malkhas a miingna .
43018011	Jesuh lawng Piter nala , “ Na samsen te tiingim khuiah sang koep ! A Pa kah peek patang khangna boengloeng he kai lawngah aw manawh tila na poek aw ? a tina .
43018012	Tecoengah Rom raalkap thli oen raalbawi thli oen ah Judah hue lawngah Jesuh te a tuuk u tih a khih u ,
43018013	Lamhacuekla Annas tengla a khuen u . Ahih tah te kum ah Khawsoeih Bawi la aka awm Kaiafas kah a mase la awm .
43018014	Kaiafas he tah , ‘ thlaang yahawh hamla thlaang pakhat a duek he theen bet , ’ tila Judah thli te poekna aka pe aana khuehkung ni .
43018015	Simon Piter oen atloe hubang pakhat lawng Jesuh te a hu ah a vai hih . Te kah hubang pakhat te Khawsoeih Bawi oen ming u , tedawngah ahih lawng Jesuh oen Khawsoeih Bawi kah impui vawngup khuila te cet ,
43018016	tevengah Piter tah vawngthawhka adauben ah te awm . Atloe hubang lawngah te adaubenla koep cet , thawhka aka toet hutaaca te a thui pe tih Piter te a khuila a ceh puei .
43018017	Thawhka aka toet hutaaca lawng Piter nala te , “ Nang khaw te thlaang kah a hubang van nawh aw ? ” a tina . Piter lawng , “ Kai he ahih kah hubang nawh ni . ” a tina .
43018018	Khaw a sik dawngah tuihyoeih-thlaang thli oen raalkap thli lawng haihol hai a toeih u , a veel u tih pai ruila hai te a aawm u . Piter lawng cet van tih pai ruila hai te a aawm van .
43018019	Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah Jesuh te a hubang thli kawng oen amah kah cangpueina kawng te a doet .
43018020	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai lawng thlaang tawm tengah langyala ka thui poepa poen ; cangpueina boeih te thlaang boeih a tunna sinakok bok-im oen Tempal bok-im ah ni ka sai , kai lawng ahuepla khat khaw ka sai nawh .
43018021	Tedawngah n'tu hamla kai he nan doet ? Ka awl thui te aka ya thlaang thli te man na doet sui . Kai lawng ka thui te a ming u , ahimi te doet . ” a tina .
43018022	He awl he Jesuh lawng a thui vengah te kah raalkap pakhat lawng ahih te a bel tih , “ Metila Khawsoeih Bawi tengah tila awl na thui aih mai ! ” a tina .
43018023	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Kai lawng ka thui te asoeng nawh atah he kah thlaang thli he asoeng nawh te thui peh saw . Tede ka thui he asoeng atah n'tu ah kai he nan bawh ? ” a tina .
43018024	Tecoengah Annas lawng Jesuh te a khihna rui thlam pe ohla Khawsoeih Bawi Kaiafas tengla a tuih .
43018025	Piter tah te ah te pai khiing tih hai a aawm . Tedawngah thlaangtloe hue lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang khaw te thlaang kah a hubang pakhat van nawh aw ? ” a tina . Tede Piter lawng basa tih , “ Kai he ahih kah hubang nawh ni , ” a tina .
43018026	Khawsoeih Bawi kah tamnaa pakhat , Piter lawng a bantang haa a tloek pe thlaang kah a cakaw pakhat lawng , “ Nang he dum khuiah ahih oen kan huh haih de lah koen ? ” a tina .
43018027	Piter lawng koekthoek ah , “ Kai nawh ni ” tila a thui tih tevengah aai khawk pahoei .
43018028	Mincanghi ah Jesuh te Kaiafas im kalawng ukkung bawi impui la te a khuen u . Aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawngah Kaantaak poei buh te caak thaina ham amami te bokna phung angla ciimcaih ham a ngaih u dawngah ukkung bawi impui khuila kuun u nawh .
43018029	Tedawngah Pilat lawng adauben la cet tih ahimi te a doet , “ He thlaang lawngah n'tu thawlhna a sai dawngah navan khuen u ? ” a tina .
43018030	Ahimi lawngah , “ He thlaang lawng he lumlai lo nawh kawinih nang tengla kavan khuen u nawh mue . ” a tina u .
43018031	Pilat lawng ahimi nala te , “ Te atah ahih he namami lawng khuen u langtah namami kah phungawl angla awl cee uh . ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Kaimi lawng a-u khat khaw ngawn thaina ka khueh u nawh . ” a tina u .
43018032	( Jesuh lawng amah he me ang duekna oen ka duek ai tila a thui te asoepna ham ni tila he a thoeng hang . )
43018033	Pilat bawi lawngah impui khuila koep kuun tih Jesuh te a khue , “ Nang he Judah Sengpahrang aw ? ” tila a doet .
43018034	Jesuh lawng , “ He awl he namah poek ah aw nan doet , tihnawhtah thlaangtloe lawng aw kai kah kawng he avan thui ? ” a tina .
43018035	Pilat lawng , “ Nang lawng kai he Judah thlaang la aw nan poek ? Kai kut dawngah nang aka pe thlaang thli he namah thlaangphun oen khawsoeih ahaamca thli ni . Lumlai na huh aw ? ” a tina .
43018036	Jesuh lawng , “ Kai kah pengram tah he dilai he nawh ni ; he dilai he ka ram mai kawinih aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli tengah a pha nawh ham ka hubang thli lawng a teek u poen ai . Kai kah ram tah he dilai he nawh ni . ” a tina .
43018037	Tedawngah Pilat lawng koep a doet tih , “ Tetih atah nang he sengpahrang aw ? ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Na thui angla kai tah sengpahrang ni . Kai lawng awltak thui ham ka ngaih pakhat dawng maiah ni he dilai ah ka law tih ka thang . A-u khaw awltak dawngah aka awm lawngtah ka awl he a ngaai u .
43018038	Pilat lawng , “ Awltak he n'tu ? ” tila a doet . Tecoegah Pilat lawng adauben kah thlaangping tengla koep cet tih ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawngtah a duekna koei thawlhna khat khaw ka hu nawh .
43018039	Tede namami kah phung angla Kaantaak poei vengah kai lawng thongtla thlaang pakhat ka thlah poepa . Nangmi lawng Judah sengpahrang he thlah sak ham na ngaih u aw ? ” tila a doet .
43018040	Ahimi lawngah paang u tih , “ Ahih te van thlah boel ! Barabbas te van thlah ! ” ti u . ( Barabbas tah thlaanghuuen ni . )
43019001	Tecoengah Pilat lawng Jesuh te a khue tih cungpoelh oen a tam sak u .
43019002	Raalkap thli lawng thliing lumuek te a sai u tih a luu ah a muek sak u , tecoengah himbai ling te a bai sak u ,
43019003	a tengla te yoeii u tih , “ Judah Sengpahrang na hinglung vaang seh ! ” a tina u tih a bel u .
43019004	Pilat lawng koekthoek cet tih thlaangping nala te , “ Bueh u lah ! Ahih he duek sak ham akawng alam ka hu nawh tite na huhna u ham nangmi tengah kavan khuen ai . ” a tina .
43019005	Tecoeng atah Jesuh lawng thliing lumuek te a muek tih bailing bai oen va law . Pilat lawng ahimi nala te , “ Ahih he bueh u lah ! ” a tina .
43019006	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkap thli lawng a huh u vengah paang u tih , “ Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! Thinglam dawngah ngawn ! ” tila a thui u . Pilat lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi lawng khuen u langtah thinglam dawng ngawn uh . Kai lawngtah ahih he duek sak ham akawng alam ka hu nawh . ” a tina .
43019007	Thlaangping lawngah , “ He kah thlaang lawng amah oen amah te Pathen Capa a ti dawngah kamami kah phungawl lawng a thui angla a duek ham awm . ” tila awl te koep a thung pe u .
43019008	He tila a thui u te Pilat lawng a yaak vengah tare a rih .
43019009	Ahih lawngah impui khuila cet koep phai tih Jesuh te , “ Nang he ame kalawng na law ? ” tila a doet . Tede Jesuh lawng awl thung pe nawh .
43019010	Pilat lawng , “ Kai he nan voem ngaih nawh aw ? Kai lawngah nang he thlah thaina khaw , thinglam dawng ngawn thai ham khaw aana ka khueh ti he na ming nawh aw ? ” a tina .
43019011	Jesuh lawngah , “ Nang lawng ka sawah aana na khueh he Pathen lawng m'peek dawngah ni . Tedawngah na kut dawngah kai aka pekung te a thawlhna bo tare ngai , ” a tina .
43019012	He tila a thui te Pilat lawng a yaak vengah Jesuh thlah ham oen ah loeih sak ham along a-im te a tlap . Tede thlaangping lawngah paang koep u tih , “ Nang lawng ahih te na loeih sak atah nang tah Sengpahrang sangluel kah paya tlaih nawh ni ! A-u khaw amah oen amah te sengpahrang ni aka ti boeih tah Sengpahrang sangluel te aka raalna thlaang poen ni ! ” ti u .
43019013	Pilat lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Jesuh te adaubenla avan law puei tih , “ Lungpeel Phaih ” a ti u ahuen kah awlcekna ngawlhcoen dawngah te ngawl . ( Lungpeel Phaih a tite Hebru awl la “ Gabbatha ” ti u . )
43019014	Teveng te tah Kaantaak Poei huet hin hingthun tawm poen ni . Pilat lawngah thlaangping nala te , “ Na sengpahrang he bueh u lah ! ” a tina .
43019015	Ahimi lawngah paang koep u tih , “ Ahih te ngawn ! Ahih te ngawn ! Thinglam dawngah ahih te ngawn ! ” ti u . Pilat lawng ahimi nala , “ Nangmi kah sengpahrang he thinglam dawng ngawn sak ham na ngaih u aw ? ” tila a doet . Khawsoeih ahaamca thli lawngah , “ Sizar Sengpahrang sangluel nawh tah atloe sengpahrang ka khueh u nawh . ” a tina u .
43019016	Tecoeng atah Pilat lawng Jesuh te thinglam dawngah ngawn hamla ahimi kut ah a peek . Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng Jesuh te a ceh puei u .
43019017	Amah thinglam te kawh ruila cet tih , “ Luuruh Huen ” a ti u te a pha . ( Hebru awl la tah , “ Golgota ” ti u . )
43019018	Ahimi lawng te ah te thinglam dawng a ngawn u ; thlaangtloe pahih khaw khatben khat bang ah a ngawn u tih Jesuh te a lung ah a ngawn u .
43019019	Pilat lawng noekna ca a thut tih thinglam dawngah a tai sak . Ahih lawng , “ Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh , Judah Sengpahrang ” tila a thut .
43019020	Thinglam dawngah Jesuh a taina huen te khawpui khui kalawng athla aih nawh dawngah thlaang tawm lawngah noekna ca te a tae u . Noekna ca te Hebru , Latin oen Krik awl la a thut .
43019021	Khawsoeih ahaamca hue lawngah Pilat nala te , “ Judah Sengpahrang tila thut boel , te lak atah amah awl thui angla , ‘ He kah thlaang lawng kai tah Judah sengpahrang ni ’ a ti ang la te thut ” a tina u .
43019022	Pilat lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Ka thut tangte he tah ka thut angla awm seh . ” a tina .
43019023	Raalkap thli lawng Jesuh te thinglam dawngah a tai coeng atah ahimi lawng hi-acuu te a lawh pe u tih amami pakhat rip hamla thloep lii la a pek u . Ahimi lawngah a himbaidung te khaw a lawh u , te himbaidung te tah aduul la a tah dawngah a huina a-ngawhaa awm nawh .
43019024	Raalkap thli lawng , “ He tah pheuh u boel sih ; a-u lawng nuem a dang ve , talcung sutt u sih ” tila a thui u . He kah Caciim lawngah , “ Ahimi lawngah , kai tah hi-acuu te pek u the tih ka himbaidung te tah talcung a yueh u ” tila a thui te asoepna hamla tila he awm . Raalkap thli lawng te tila te a sai u .
43019025	Jesuh kah thinglam tengah te a manu oen a manu kah manau Klopas yu Meri oen Meri Makdalin hue he ayoeiila rep pai u .
43019026	Jesuh lawng a manu oen te ah aka pai a lungna a hubang te a huh tih a manu nala te , “ Ahih te na capa ni . ” a tina .
43019027	Tecoengah te kah hubang nala te , “ Ahih te na nu ni ” a tina . Te kalawng atah a hubang lawngah amah im ah awm sak ham a ceh puei .
43019028	Jesuh lawngah , tahe tah thaihu cungkuem soep boeih poen tite a ming tih Caciim lawng a thui te asoepna ham , “ Tui ka hall ” tila a thui .
43019029	Te ah te misurtui thuii abecala a thloen u tuium pakhat awm ; te kah misurtui dawngah baipeen te a nok tih hissop thing cungkui dawngah a kek , tecoengah Jesuh te a kaa ah a tuh .
43019030	Jesuh lawng misurtui te a yawn tih , “ Coeng boeih poen ! ” ti . Tecoeng atah a luu te a khun a hingna boet .
43019031	Tecoengah aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli lawng Pilat tengla cet u tih thinglam dawng a tai thlaang thli kah a khow thli te tlot khem pe ham , ahimi kah rawkk te thinglam dawngkah lawh hamla a bih u . Ahimi lawng tila a bih u he tah te khawhin te huet hin la awm tih Sabbath khawhin ah rawkk thli te thinglam dawng awm sak ham ahimi lawng ngaih u nawh , Sabbath khawhin tah aciim khawhin la a awm dawngah ni .
43019032	Tedawngah raalkap thli lawng cet u tih thinglam dawng Jesuh oen a ngawn haih thlaang kah a khow te lamhacuek ah a khem pe , tecoengah atloe pakhat kah a khow te a khem pe u .
43019033	Tede , ahimi lawngah Jesuh teng a pha u veng atah duek tangte la a awm te a huh u , tedawngah ahih kah a khow te tah khem pe u nawh .
43019034	Raalkap pakhat lawngah Jesuh te a vee ah cai oen a thun tih tevengah thisen oen tui te pahoei thoeng .
43019035	( He tila a awm he aka hukung lawng tila a thui he tah nangmi lawngkhaw na tangna u van hamla ni . Ahih lawng atak tang a thui te amah lawng a ming . )
43019036	Caciim lawngah , “ A ruh te pakhat Pateng tlot manawh ” tila a thui te asoepna hamla tila he awm .
43019037	Tecoengah atloe Caciim dawngah khaw , “ Ahimi lawng cai oen a thun u te a bueh u ai ” tila a thui te awm .
43019038	He coeng atah Arimatia khaaw kah Josep lawng Jesuh rawkk te lawh hamla Pilat tengah a bih . ( Josep lawng aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih tih ahuepla Jesuh kah hubang la thuep aka awm ni . ) Pilat lawng a rawkk te na lawh thai a tina dawngah cet tih a lawh .
43019039	Jesuh te huh hamla khawyiin ah aka cet Nikodemu khaw Josep oen haih cet tih mura oen aloes a pawlh heet riimtuui pawng yakhat tluk te a khuen .
43019040	Ahih rawi lawng Jesuh rawkk te a khuen hih tih Judah phung rawkk vui siing angla Jesuh rawkk oen riimtuui te himbai haldoel oen ah haih a yaawl .
43019041	Jesuh a ngawnna huen ah te dum pakhat awm tih te ah te a-u khat khaw a upna nawh thlann lungkaw a thai pakhat awm .
43019042	Te khawhin te tah Judah thlaang thli kah huet hin la awm tih thlann lungkaw te khaw ayoeica dawngah te ah te Jesuh te a up u .
43020001	Yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin mincanghi khaw a thaih suisai vengah Meri Makdalin te phuel la cet , thlann thawhka tlengna lungto ana khoe u te a huh .
43020002	Ahih lawngah Jesuh lawng a lungna atloe hubang thli oen Simon Piter tengla te heeng tih , “ Thlann khuikah Bawipa te a lawh u poen , mela nuem a khueh u kai , ka ming nawh ! ” tila a thui pe .
43020003	Tecoengah Piter oen atloe hubang lawng phuel la cet hih .
43020004	Ahih rawi te heeng hih de atloe hubang te loe bet tih lamhala thlann te a pha .
43020005	Ahih lawng buekuep thuk tih a bueh vengah rawkk yaawlna himbai te a huh , tede a khuila tah kuun nawh .
43020006	Ahih hu ah aka law Simon Piter tah thlann khuila te kuun thuk . Te ah himbai a awm te khaw ,
43020007	Jesuh kah a luu yaawlna himbai yaawl tangte athloekcala a awm te khaw a huh .
43020008	Tecoeng atah lamhala thlann aka pha atloe hubang te khaw a khuila kuun van ; ahih lawngkhaw a huh tih a tangna .
43020009	( Caciim dawngah ahih tah duekna kalawng tho koep ai tila a thui te yaakming hih nawh toengtoeng hun . )
43020010	Tecoengah a hubang rawi te im la meel koep hih .
43020011	Meri te thlann tengah pai tih rap . Ahih lawng rah ruila te buekuep thuk tih thlann khui te a bueh ,
43020012	tevengah himbai bawk aka bai vanthlaang pahih Jesuh kah rawkk a helhna ah te a khow ben ah pakhat , a luu ben ah pakhat aka ngawl hih te a huh .
43020013	Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Hutaa nang , n'tu ah na rah khiing ? ” a tina hih . Ahih lawngah , “ Ka Bawipa he a khuen u poen , mela nuem a khueh u ka ming nawh he ! ” a tina .
43020014	Tecoengah a hu benla a mang phai veng atah te ah Jesuh aka pai te a huh ; tede ahih lawng Jesuh tila noek nawh .
43020015	Jesuh lawngah , “ N'tu ah na rah khiing oh ca ? Nang lawng a-u nuem na tlap de ? ” a tina . Ahih te dumtoetkung la a poek tih , ” Saya , ahih te na lawh oh atah van thui lah , mela nuem na khueh , ka cet silang tah ka lo ai ” a tina .
43020016	Jesuh lawngah , “ Meri ! ” tila a khue . Meri lawngah ahih benla te maang tih Hebru awl la , “ Rabboni ! ” a tina . ( Thuingaihna tah , ‘ Saya ’ tina ni . )
43020017	Jesuh lawngah , “ Kai he n'tu khaklal boel de lah , a Pa tengla ka cet thlan hun , tede ka manau thli tengla cet langtah , ‘ ahimi oen kai kah a pa , kai kah Pathen oen ahimi kah Pathen tengla ka cet poen ai ti ’ tila thui peh . ” a tina .
43020018	Tedawngah Meri Makdalin lawng a hubang thli tengla te cet , Bawipa a huhna oen ahih tengah awl a thui pe te ahimi tengah a thui pe .
43020019	Thawh koep hin thlemben atah a hubang hue te thik at la tun u . Ahimi lawng aana khuehkung Judah thlaang thli te a rih u tih thawh a khaih tih khak a kalh u . Tevengah Jesuh te law tih ahimi tim ah te a pai pe . “ Nangmi sawah ngaimawngna awm seh . ” a tina .
43020020	He tila a thui coengah ahimi te a kut rawi oen a vee te a huh sak . A hubang hue lawng Bawipa te a huh u tih awmngaih u .
43020021	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm seh , a Pa lawng kai n'tuih van angla nangmi he kan tuih u . ” tila koep a thui pe .
43020022	Tecoengah ahimi sawah a hill te pho a hut tih , “ Ciim Muithla he lo u lah .
43020023	Nangmi lawng thlaang kah thawlhna te khawdawp na ngaai pe u atah ahimi te khawdawp ngaai la awm ai ; nangmi lawng ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp na ngaai pe nawh atah ahimi tah khawdawp ngaai nawh la awm ai ” a tina .
43020024	Jesuh a law vengah te hubang thlaihih khuikah pakhat van Tawmas ( Caphee a ti u te ) tah awm nawh .
43020025	Tedawngah atloe hubang hue lawng , “ Kaimi tah Bawipa te ka huh u poen ! ” a tina u . Tawmas lawng ahimi nala te , “ Kai tah , a kut dawngkah thiicung henna boengha te kutdawn oen ka tek nawh tih a vee te khaw ka kut oen ka yuh ka yam nawh atah ka tangna manawh ” tila a thui .
43020026	Yarh khat a awm coeng atah a hubang hue te im khuiah koep tun u . Tawmas khaw ahimi oen awm u . Thawh te khak a kalh u , tede Jesuh te law tih ahimi tim ah pai tih , ” Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm seh ” a tina .
43020027	Tecoengah Tawmas nala te , “ Na kutdawn thli te ka kut dawngah khueh langtah ka kut he bueh lah ; na kut te yueng langtah ka vee he yutt yam lah . Uepvoet tlaih boel , tangna loeih ! ” a tina .
43020028	Tawmas lawng , “ Ka Bawipa oen ka Pathen ” a tina .
43020029	Jesuh lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang lawng nan huh dawngah nan tangna aw ? Kai he huh muehla aka oeng thlaang thli tah yotheenna a dawng u ! ” a tina .
43020030	Jesuh lawngah a hubang thli tengah kawpoekrai miknoekna yahawh hlang a sai te he cabu dawngah thut nawh la moen awm hun .
43020031	Tede Jesuh tah Messiah , Pathen Capa ni tite nangmi lawng na tangna u tih ahih te na oengna rang oen hingna te na khuehna u ham he ang thli he thut la awm .
43021001	He coengah Jesuh lawng Teberias Tuiliipui ah a hubang thli tengah te koep a phumpho pe . A phumphona tah tila ni .
43021002	Simon Piter , Tawmas ( caphee a ti u te ) , Nathanael ( Galili peng Kanaa khaw kah ) , Zebedi ca rawi oen ah Jesuh kah hubang atloe pahih te haih awm u .
43021003	Simon Piter lawng atloe hue nala te , “ Kai nga ka heeng de lah ai . ” a tina . Ahimi lawng , “ Kaimi khaw ka law u van ai ” a tina u . Lowng dawngah cet u tih nga a heeng u , tede yiin at puet ah nga khat khaw tu u nawh .
43021004	Khaw a thoeng hang atah Jesuh te tuikeeng ah pai , tede a hubang thli lawng Jesuh te noek u nawh .
43021005	Tecoengah ahimi nala te , “ Cadawng thli , nga khat khaw na tu u nawh aw ? ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Khat khaw ka tu u nawh ” a tina u .
43021006	Te atah ahimi nala te , “ Lowng kah bantang ben ah lok te heeng u lah , ayawl akai tah na tuuk u khawming . ” a tina . Tedawngah ahimi lawng lok te a heeng u tih nga yahawh hlang a tuuk khuengdeng u tih lok te koep doek u thai tlaih nawh .
43021007	Jesuh lawng a lungna hubang pakhat lawngah Piter nala te , “ Bawipa ni ! ” a tina . Piter lawng , Bawipa ni tite a yaak vengah a himbaidung a dul sut te a hingcen ah a yeen tih tui dawngah sungpung thuk .
43021008	Atloe hubang hue lawngtah nga aka be poek lok te a doek u tih tuikeeng la te lowng oen law u . Ahimi te tah lan kalawng ah thla hlang aih nawh , pe yathum yun ni athla .
43021009	Ahimi lawng tuikeeng te a pha u vengah haialh dawngah nga a haai tangte te khaw a huh u , takawi khaw awm .
43021010	Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Nga na tuuk u te thoem van khuen lah , ” a tina .
43021011	Simon Piter lawngah lowng dawng la cet tih nga abobo oen aka be poek lok te tuikeeng la a duek , nga te , yakhat coeng sawmngaa pathum law mai de lok te pawn nawh .
43021012	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ Law uh , ca u loeih , ” a tina . Bawipa ni tite a ming u poen tih a hubang khatca lawngkhaw , “ Nang he a-u ? ” tila te doet re u tlaih nawh .
43021013	Te atah Jesuh lawng cet tih takawi te a lawh tih ahimi te a peek ; te tila te nga khaw ahimi te a peek .
43021014	He tah duekna kalawng a thawh coengah a hubang hue tengah Jesuh a phumphona a pathumna ni .
43021015	Ahimi lawng a caak u coeng atah Jesuh lawng Simon Piter nala , “ Johan capa Simon , he hue lawngah kai n'lungna lak ah nang lawng nan lungna ngaai aw ? ” tila a doet . Simon lawngah , “ Oeih , Bawipa , kan lungna he na ming . ” a tina . Jesuh lawng , “ Ka tuu thli he atheenla van doen . ” a tina .
43021016	Avoeihihna ah Jesuh lawng , “ Johan capa Simon , kai he nan lungna aw ? ” a tina . Ahih lawngah , “ Oeih , Bawipa , kan lungna te na ming . ” a tina . Jesuh lawngah , “ Ka tuu thli he van doen ne . ” a tina .
43021017	Apathum na ah Jesuh lawng , “ Johan capa , Simon , kai he nan lungna aw ? ” tila a doet . Jesuh lawng voei thum toe ah nan lungna aw tila a doet dawngah Piter tah a kaw the malcal tih , “ Bawipa soeprep he na ming ; kai lawng kan lungna te na ming ! ” a tina . Jesuh lawngah , “ Ka tuu thli he van doen .
43021018	Awltak kavan thui : Na thawh thuem veng atah huertuela na awm tih na ngaihna ah te na cet ; tede na patawng atah baan na lam vetih nang te thlaang lawngah n'piin ai , na ceh ngaihna nawh ahuen la te n'khuen u ai . ” a tina .
43021019	( He tila a thui he tah Piter he me ang duekna oen a duek vetih Pathen ruep-awmna te a tueng sak ai tite thuinuetna ni . ) Tecoengah Jesuh lawng , “ Ka hu ah baang lah ! ” a tina .
43021020	Piter lawng maang tih a bueh vengah Jesuh lawng a lungna atloe hubang te a huh , te thlaang te tah thlembuh a veel u vengah Jesuh pum dawngah hangdang tih , “ Bawipa , na sawah a-u lawng paipi a thleep ai ? ” tila aka doet te ni .
43021021	Piter lawng ahih te a huh vengah , Jesuh nala , “ Bawipa , ahih he ta metila a awm ai ? ” tila a doet .
43021022	Jesuh lawngah , “ Kai ka law toe ah ahih te hing sak hamla ka ngaih mai kawinih nang lawng n'tu na tina ai ? ka hu ah va bang ngoen lah ! ” a tina .
43021023	Tedawngah te kah a hubang te duek manawh tila Jesuh kah a hubang hue tengah te a thui pe u . Tede Jesuh lawngtah ahih te duek manawh tila thui nawh : “ Kai ka law toe ah ahih te hing sak hamla ka ngaih mai kawinih nang lawng n'tu na tina ai ? ” tila ni a thui .
43021024	Ahih te tah he ang thaihu thli aka thuikung oen cathutkung hubang pakhat la awm tih ahih lawng a thui te soeng tila ka ming u .
43021025	Jesuh lawng atloe thaihu thli a sai te moen awm hun . Te ang thli te pakhat coeng pakhat thut boeih mai sih ti kawinih te ang thli thutna cabu te khuehna ham dilai pumpui he Pateng khoek mai manawh tila ka poek .
44001001	Ka Lungna Tiofilas ; Lamhacuek kah cabu dawngah Jesuh lawng thaihu a sai boeih oen bii a tong cuek vengkah a cangpueina kalawng ah vaan la a luuina khawhin toe kah akawng alam te ka thut poen .
44001002	Vaan la a luui thlan vengah a thlaangtuek hubang hue te Ciim Muithla tharana oen a uen a tawn .
44001003	A duek coengah khawhin sawmlii khui puet ahimi tengah a phumpho pe tih ahih tah hing tite uepvoetna awm tlaih nawh .
44001004	Tecoengah ahimi a tun u vengah he tila awl a thui pe : “ Jerusalem he ceh taak u boel , a Pa awlkam akawng alam kavan thui kutdo te ring uh .
44001005	Johan lawngtah tui oen baptisma te a peek , tede khawhin meyoeh khaw a awm aih thlan ah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma te na dang u poen ai . ” tila a thui pe .
44001006	Jesuh oen a hubang thli a tun u vengah te ahimi lawng , “ Bawipa , tahe vengah aw Israel thlaangphun thli he a Ram na peek koep ai ? tila a doet u .
44001007	Jesuh lawng ahimi nala te , “ A Pa lawng atue atang oen ari amawng a helh te nangmi lawng na ming ham ngoe mai nawh .
44001008	Tede nangmi sawah Ciim Muithla a law vengah nangmi tah tharana oen na betoet u vetih Jerusalem ah , Judia peng boeih oen ah Samaria peng ah , tecoengah dilai aboetna kheng toela kai kah sausi la na awm u ai .
44001009	He awl he a thui coengah ahimi kah mik huh roe ah te vaan la luui hang , muui lawng a yaawl khoep tih ahimi lawng hu u thai tlaih nawh .
44001010	Te tila vaan la a luui hang te ahimi lawng mik khah muehla vaan benla poe a dan u , tevengah himbai bawk aka bai thlaang pahih ahimi tengah a pai pe tih ,
44001011	ahih rawi lawngah , “ Galili thlaang thli , n'tu ah te ah te na pai u tih vaan benla na dan khiing u ? Jesuh he nangmi teng kalawng vaan la luui poen , vaan la a luui hang na huh u van angla te a rum thuk koep te na huh u ai . ” a tina .
44001012	Tecoengah a hubang thli tah Olif Tlaang kalawng Jerusalem la te koep meel u . Te tlaang te khawpui kalawng ah meng tentan yunyan ni a thla mai .
44001013	Ahimi tah khawpui khuila kuun u tih amami a awmna huen la te cet u : Ahimi hue te tah ; Piter , Johan , Jeem oen Andru , Filip oen Tawmas , Bartalomiu oen Matthai , Alfias capa Jeem , Phunkuup Simon ; oen ah Jeem capa Judas , he hue ni .
44001014	Ahimi tah Jesuh kah a manu Meri oen khaw , hutaa thli oen khaw , Jesuh kah a manu thli oen khaw huh u poepa tih thangthui u .
44001015	Khawhin meyoeh yun nuem a awm coeng atah oengca thli huhtunna awm tih thlaangmi te a pum boeih la ya pakul yun awm , Piter lawng pai tih awl a thui .
44001016	Ahih lawngah , “ Maya manau thli , ‘ Jesuh aka tu thlaang thli te lawngnuehkung Judas kawng Ciim Muithla lawng Devid kaa khui kalawng a thui oepsoeh tih Caciim khuiah a thut te asoep ham awm .
44001017	Judas tah mami bu khuiah aka thuum thlaang pakhat van tih mami oen bii aka bi haih hamla a tuek thlaang van ni , ” tila a thui .
44001018	( Judas lawngah amah kah athe ara , saina oen a dang tangka te oen ah lo huen pakhat a lai , te ah te amah duek . A bung te pawkk phut tih a riil khaw boeih thoeng .
44001019	Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawng te kawng te a yaak u , tedawngah te kah lo huen te amami awl la ‘ Akeldama ’ tila a thui u , thuingaihna tah “ Thisen lo huen . ” ti ngaihna ni . ) .
44001020	“ Saam cabu dawngah , ‘ A im te imrongg dingratt la awm selang tah im khuiah a-u khaw awm boel seh ’ tila a thut . Tecoengah , ‘ Ahih kah bi yueng te thlaangtloe lawng bi seh ’ tila a thut te khaw awm .
44001021	Tedawngah Bawipa Jesuh kah thawhkoepna te aka thui haih hamla thlaang pakhat khat lawng mami he bawngyawng ham awm .
44001022	Te thlaang te tah Bawipa Jesuh he mami oen ah khawlawng ceh poepa vengah te mami tengah aka thuum van tih Johan lawng baptisma awlthang a thui veng kalawng ah , mami teng kalawng Jesuh vaan la a luui toe ah mami tengah aka awm thlaang seh ” tila a thui .
44001023	Tedawngah ahimi lawng thlaang pahih Josep a ti u Barsabbas ( Jastas tila khaw a miingna ) oen Mattias te a nuen u .
44001024	Tecoengah ahimi lawng thangthui u tih , “ Bawipa , nang lawng thlaang boeih kah kawpoek te na ming .
44001025	Tedawngah Judas lawng a ceh taak Celtuih bii te ahih yuengla aka bi ham he kah thlaang pahih khuiah nang lawng na tuek te van tueng sak lah . ” tila thangthui u .
44001026	Tecoengah ahimi lawng te thlaang pahih khuiah te tuek hamla talcung a yueh u tih Mattias te a tuek u , ahih te celtuih thlaikhat tim ah te a thuum sak u .
44002001	Pentikos hin a pha vengah oengca thli boeih te ahuen pakhat ah kang tun u .
44002002	Tevengah thlipui khawthlii tuen awl oen aka lo u awl te vaan kalawng bawtbet ah law tih ahimi a ngawlhna im khui te a hu thulh .
44002003	Tevengah ahimi lawng hailai oen ah aka lo u te a huh u , te kah hailai te pek u phang tih te kah aka awm thlaang pakhat rip sawah te awm .
44002004	Ahimi tah Ciim Muithla oen betoet u tih Muithla lawngah a thui sak angla awl tloe la cal u .
44002005	Tevengah te dilai saw ram tawm kah aka law , bokna ben ah thinkaw aka pe Judah thlaang thli te Jerusalem ah awm u .
44002006	He kah tuen apau awl he a yaak u vengah thlaangping te kueng tun u . Oengca thli lawng amah awl la a cal u te ahimi lawng amah awl la rip a yaak u vengah ahimi tah a kawpoek la rai u .
44002007	Ahimi lawng ngaihang kawpoek rai oen , “ He tila awl aka thui hue he Galili thlaang boeih de lah koen !
44002008	Tetih atah metila ahimi awl thui he mami lawng mah awl mah kaa la rip n'yaak kai ?
44002009	Mami he Patia ram , Media ram oen Elan ram kah aka law ; Mesopotamia ram , Judia ram oen Kappadocia ram kah aka law ; Pontias oen Asia ram kah aka law ,
44002010	Frikia ram oen Pamfilia ram kalawng , Iyipt ram oen Sairin khaaw teng khaaw vai Libia ram khuikah aka law thlaang ni ; khatsut tah Rom ram kalawng aka law ;
44002011	Judah thlaangphun oen Judah phung aka vai Gental thlaang ni ; Mami timkah khatsut tah Krik ram oen Arabia ram kah aka law thlaang ni ; Pathen kah kawpoek rai thaihu sai kawng , ahimi lawng a thui u te mami lawng n'mah awl la n'yaak rip u mai ! ” tila a thui u .
44002012	Ahimi tah ngaihang cawm-am sut u tih amami khat oen khat te , “ He he n'tu a thuingaihna kai ? ” tila doet u .
44002013	Tede thlaangtloe lawngtah oengca thli te a nuihna u tih , “ He kah thlaang thli he yuu aka ruui thlaang hue ni ! ” tila a thui u .
44002014	Tevengah Piter te celtuih paha thlaihih oen pai haih u , angaih hlang la awl a huer tih thlaangping rangpui tengah awl a thui : “ Ka puei - Judah thlaangphun thli oen Jerusalem ah aka awm boeih , he kah thuingaihna he kavan thui ai , hutung u lah .
44002015	He kah thlaang thli he nangmi kah poek angla yuu a ruui u moenih ; Tahe ah mincang khawnoek pakua ni a pha hun .
44002016	He tah tawngha Jo-el lawng akawng alam a thui te ni .
44002017	Ahih lawngah , ‘ Khawhin aboetna a pha atah , Pathen lawng : Thlaang boeih he ka Muithla oen ka toi ai . Na capa thli oen na canu thli lawngah ka awl he a phawng u ai ; Thlaangno roeng thaai thli lawng huhthlaam a huh u vetih Ciya patawng hue lawngah mang a man ai .
44002018	Te khawhin ah kamah kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli hutaa oen tawngpa sawah ka Muithla ka toi vetih ahimi lawng ka awl te a phawng ai .
44002019	Vaan khawhi sawah kawpoek rai miknoek ka sai vetih dilai adang ben ah khaw kawpoek rai thaihu ka sai ai . Te tah thisen , hai-alh , aka thah muepkuep haikhu oen ah ka tueng sak ai ;
44002020	Bawipa kah khawhin , ruep-awm oen alenduet te a pha thlan ah khawmik te yiin khup vetih thla lawngkhaw thisen angla lingduuk la awm ai .
44002021	Tevengah Bawipa te a khue tih reenna aka bih tah thlawnna a dang ai , ’ tila a thui .
44002022	Ka puei Israel thlaangphun thli , ka awl he hutung u lah ! Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh lawng Pathen kah saithaina aana a khueh tite ahih rang oen Pathen lawng a sai kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu oen ah aciimphanla a tueng sak poen . Te ang thli te namami mik huh ah a sai dawngah nangmi lawng na ming u .
44002023	Pathen lawngah amah khawkhanna angla Jesuh te nangmi kut ah peek hamla awl a khueng oepsoeh poen ; ahih te thinglam dawng na tai u tih thlaangthawlh thli kah kut oen na ngawn u poen .
44002024	Tede , Pathen lawngah ahih te duekna thara khui kalawng a loeih sak tih a thawh sak poen , metihtiah ahih te duekna lawngah thongtla angla tu khaklal thai nawh .
44002025	Devid lawngah ahih kawng te , ‘ Bawipa te ka haiah ka huh poepa ; Ahih tah ka tengah awm tih ka lakueng nawh
44002026	Tedawngah kawhoena oen ka betoet tih ka awl tah awmngaihna oen becoeih . Kai tah duek koei la ka awm de ngaiuepna oen ngaikhuek thindeeng la ka awm ai ,
44002027	metihtiah nang lawngah celkhui-khaaw ah nan voei sut nawh vetih ; namah kah uep-awm tuihyoeihthlaang te thlann khuiah rong athaang sak ham na ngaih nawh .
44002028	Nang lawngah hingna benla aka mawt lawngpui te nan huh sak poen , nan awm puei tih awmngaihna oen ka betoet . ’ tila a thui .
44002029	Maya manau boeih , mami kah patuer miingthang Devid Sengpahrang kawng he acaihpanla kavan thui ai . Ahih tah duek tih a up u poen , ahih kah thlann te tahe toe mami mik huh ah awm hun .
44002030	Ahih tah tawngha la awm tih Pathen lawng ahih tengah awl a kam te a ming : Pathen lawng awl a kam tah Devid cadil pakhat te Devid amah angla sengpahrang la a khueh ai a ti te ni .
44002031	Pathen lawng hailam ben ah a sai ham koei te Devid lawng a ming tih tedawngah Messiah kah thawhkoepna kawng te a thui oepsoeh poen . Ahih lawngah , ‘ Ahih tah celkhuikhaaw ah voei sut manawh ; ahih kah a pum te thlann khuiah rong sut manawh . ” tila a thui .
44002032	Pathen lawng Jesuh te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tite aka mingkung tah kaimi ni .
44002033	Ahih tah ana Pa Pathen kah bantang ben ah a ngawlh sak poen tih ana Pa kah awlkam angla Muithla te a dang poen . Tahe ah nangmi lawng na huh u tih na yaak he tah kaimi sawah avan toi amah kutdo ni .
44002034	Devid amah he vaan la luui nawh ; Ahih lawng a thui tah , ‘ Bawipa lawngah ka Bawipa tengah : Na raal thli te na khowtang ah khowtloeng la ka khueh thlantoe , ka bantang ben ah ngawl lah . ” tila a thui .
44002036	Tedawngah Israel thlaang thli boeih , nangmi lawng thinglam dawng na ngawn Jesuh te Pathen lawngah Bawipa oen Messiah la a sai ni tite atak tang la ming u lah ! ” a tina .
44002037	He awl he thlaang thli lawng a yaak u vengah lakueng u tangkiik tih Piter oen atloe celtuih hue nala te , “ ‘ Maya manau thli , kaimi lawng n'tu ka sai u ai ? ’ tila a doet u .
44002038	Piter lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi boeih lawngah na thawlhna yut u langtah na thawlhna boeih khawdawp ngaaina hamla Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah baptisma hu u lah ; te atah Pathen kah kutdo Ciim Muithla te na dang u ai .
44002039	Te kutdo te peek ham Pathen kah awlkam tah namami oen na cadil thli ham khaw , athla hlang kah thlaang boeih ham khaw , Bawipa Pathen amah lawng a khue boeih thlaang thli ham ni . ” a tina .
44002040	Piter lawng ahimi te awltloe khaw moen a thui pe tih , ‘ He kah thlaangthe thli sawah aka law ham koei dantatna kalawng namami oen namami thlawn u lah ! ” a tina .
44002041	Ahih kah awl thui te thlaang broe lawngah a tangna u tih baptisma a huh u , te kah khawhin ah te ahimi bu khuiah thlaang thong thum yunyan lawngah a tawm a thap u .
44002042	Ahimi lawngah celtuih hue tengah cangna , khat oen khat pawlneengna , beroep lopaang buh veelna , thangthuina ah amami kah atue te a hawna u .
44002043	Celtuih hue lawngah kawpoek rai miknoekna oen kawpoek raina thli te broela a sai u tih thlaang boeih tah lakueng u .
44002044	Oengca boeih te khat la huui u tih a khueh thaihu thli te pakhat oen khat rek ara patoeng u .
44002045	Ahimi lawng amami kah thaihu khuehtoen thli te a yoeih u tih a voetna aka awm thlaang thli te a ngoena angla tangka te arek ara u .
44002046	Khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im ah te pum u , amami im ah buh veel haihna te a sai u tih lunghoeih lungpaih la awmngaihna thinkaw oen a caak u .
44002047	Pathen te a thangpawm u tih ahimi te thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah u . Tecoengah thlawnna aka dang thlaang thli te Bawipa lawngah khawhin roekk ah ahimi bu khuiah te a kuun pe sak .
44003001	Hin at ah Piter oen Johan tah thangthuina tue thlemben khawnoek pathum ah Tempal bok-im la te cet hih .
44003002	Te ah te Atheen Thawhka a ti u te awm tih a thangpek kalawng khow aka kheem thlaang pakhat te ah te awm . Tempal bok-im la aka cet thlaang thli tengah tangka bih hamla ahih te hin roekk ah te kah thawhka la te avan khuen u .
44003003	Ahih lawngah Piter oen Johan a law hih te a huh vengah tangka a bih .
44003004	Ahih rawi lawng a bueh rang patang tih Piter lawng , “ Kai hih he n'bueh lah ! ” a tina .
44003005	Tevengah thaihu pakhat khat m'peek ai tite a ngaiuep tih ahih rawi te a bueh .
44003006	Tede Piter lawng ahih nala , “ Tangka ka khueh thamhalh nawh , tede ka khueh te kan peek : Nazaret Jesuh miing oen ah awl kan peek , tho langtah cet lah ! ” a tina .
44003007	Tecoengah ahih te a bantang kut ah a phoeih tih a thawh hang . Te thlaang kah a khow oen khowcih te cak pahoei ;
44003008	Ahih tah sawi tih pet , pai hang tih yingyawi . Tecoengah ahih rawi oen Tempal bok-im khuila te kuun , sawipet ruila cet tih Pathen te a thangpawm .
44003009	Ahih lawng ceh ruila sawipet tih Pathen a thangpawm te te kah thlaang thli lawng a huh u ;
44003010	Ahih te Atheen Thawhka ah aka ngawl buh bih kutduen thlaang ni tite a ming u vengah ahih sawah thaihu aka thoeng dawngah te kawpoek la rai tih a ngaai hang u .
44003011	Te thlaang lawngah Piter oen Johan te a phoeih khak , thlaangping tah a kawpoek la rai u tih Solomon imthloeih a ti u te ah te ahimi tengla heeng u phai .
44003012	Piter lawng thlaangping te a huh vengah ahimi nala , “ Ka puei Israel thlaang thli , n'tu kawngah he thaihu dawngah he na kawpoek a rai u tih kaihih he alet uekcuekla nan bueh u ? Kaihih lawngah kamahih kah huham tharana oen Pathen haiah theenna oen ah he kah thlaang he a ceh sak tila na poek u aw ?
44003013	Abraham , Isak oen Jakob Pathen , mami patuer hue kah Pathen lawngah amah kah tuihyoeih-thlaang Jesuh te aciim ruep-awmna te a peek poen . Tede nangmi lawng aana khuehkung thli kut ah na peek tih Pilat lawng ka thlah silang tah ka loeih sak ai tila awl a khueh coengah Pateng khaw Pilat haiah nangmi lawng na thana u .
44003014	Ahih tah thlaangciim , thlaangdoeng la awm de , ahih te nangmi lawng na hoett u tih thlaang aka ngawn dai te thlah sak ham Pilat tengah na bih u .
44003015	Nangmi lawngah hingna benla aka ceh puei thlaang te na ngawn u , tede Pathen lawng ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen , tite aka mingkung tah kaimi ni .
44003016	Ahih kah a miing huham tharana lawng he kah khowkheem thlaang he tharana te a peek . Nangmi lawng na huh tih na ming u he tah ahih kah a miing oengna rang oen ni sai la a awm ; nangmi boeih lawng na huh u angla Jesuh oengna lawng ni ahih he a sa ading sak .
44003017	Tedawngah maya manau thli , nangmi boeih oen namami kah mawtkung thli lawng Jesuh sawah na sai u te na ming u nawh dawngah na sai u tite ka ming u .
44003018	Yan vengah Pathen lawng tawngha boeih tengah , amah kah Messiah lawngah patang a khang ai tila a thui oepsoeh te amah lawng te tila asoep sak .
44003019	Tedawngah nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaaina ham thawlhna yut u langtah Pathen tengla meel u lah .
44003020	Te tila na sai u atah , Bawipa teng kalawng muithla ben tharana a lawna tue te a pha vetih nangmi ham a tuek oepsoeh Messiah Jesuh te avan tuih ai .
44003021	Yan vengkah aciim tawngha thli hawna oen Pathen lawng a thui poen angla soeprep boeih he athaaila saina atue te a pha thlantoe ahih te vaan ah awm hun ai .
44003022	Mosi lawngah , ‘ Bawipa na Pathen lawng nangmi khuikah thlaang kai angla tawngha pakhat te nangmi ham avan tuih ai . Nangmi lawng na sai u ham koei soeprep boeih avan thui te na hutung pe u ai .
44003023	A-u khaw tawngha lawng a thui te a ngaai nawh atah Pathen thlaang thli teng kalawng a thloeng vetih a phe boeih ai ’ tila a thui .
44003024	Samu-el oen ahih coeng kah aka law tawngha boeih lawngkhaw tahe vengah aka thoeng ham koei thaihu thli he a thui u .
44003025	Pathen lawng amah kah tawngha thli rang oen ah awl a kam te tah nangmi ham ni , Pathen lawng namami kah patuer thli tengah awlkamna a sai te nangmi lawngkhaw na paang u van . Abraham tengah te , ‘ Nang kah cadil nauha thli rang oen ah dilai thlaang boeih te yotheenna oen ka phueh ka sawm ai ’ tila a thui .
44003026	Tedawngah Pathen lawng a Tuihyoeih-thlaang te a tuek tih nangmi lawng thawlhna te na ceh taak u tih nangmi boeih te yotheenna peek hamla nangmi tengah lamhacuekla avan tuih . ” a tina .
44004001	Piter oen Johan lawng thlaangping tengah awl a thui hih lii vengah te khawsoeih khatsut thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkapbawi thli oen ah Sadusi khatsut hue te avan pha u .
44004002	Celtuih pahih rawi lawngah thlaangping hue te duekna kalawng Jesuh tho koep tila a cang puei he tah thlaangduek thli tho koep tite a cak sak dawngah Sadusi hue tah a thin sa u .
44004003	Tedawngah ahimi lawng ahih rawi te a tuuk u , khaw athlem thuk poen dawngah avuen khawhin toe thong ah a thlaak u .
44004004	Tede ahih rawi kah awl thui te aka ya thlaang broe lawng a tangna u tih thlaang thong ngaa yun toela puung hang .
44004005	Avuen khawhin atah Judah thlaangphun mawtkung thli , ahaamca thli oen Phungawl cangpueikung thli te Jerusalem ah tun u .
44004006	Ahimi te Khawsoeih Bawi Annas oen Kaiafas , Johan , Alekzandar oen ah Khawsoeih Bawi kah atloe imkhuikaw thli oen huh u .
44004007	Ahimi lawngah celtuih rawi te amami haiah a pai sak tih a-u kah a miing na hawna ? tila a doet u .
44004008	Tevengah Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Piter lawng , “ Thlaangping aka mawt thli oen ahaamca thli :
44004009	Khowkheem thlaang pakhat sawah thaihu theen saina kawng ahih he metila a hoeih tite tihin ah nan doet u ,
44004010	Nangmi boeih oen ah Israel thlaang boeih lawng a ming ham tah he kah thlaang lawngah hoeih heet tih nangmi haiah a pai he tah , nangmi lawng thinglam dawngah na ngawn u tih duekna kalawng Pathen lawngah a thawh sak koep , Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh Khrih kah a miing tharana rang oen ni .
44004011	Caciim lawngah , “ Imsakung thli lawng a hoett sut lungto te awlpui koek lungto la coengg , ’ tila a thui te tah Jesuh he ni .
44004012	Ahih rang bueng oen ni thlawnna he huh thai la a awm ; dilai pum ah he Pathen kah peek ahih nawh atah mami aka thlawn thai a-u khat khaw awm nawh .
44004013	Awlcekna khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli lawngah Piter oen Johan he thoemthai cuihna aka khueh nawh thlaang mailai ni tite a ming u , tede ahih rawi lawng tong-aa ohla awl a thui te a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u . Tede ahih rawi he tah Jesuh kah a paya beroep ni tite ahimi lawng a ming u .
44004014	Tede Piter oen Johan tengah khow-kheem thlaang aka hoeih te ahimi lawng a huh u dawngah n'tu khaw thui u thai nawh .
44004015	Tedawngah awlcekna khonsil im khui kalawng ahih rawi te kawlkalh a ceh sak u , tecoeng atah amami poek ah doet u tih awl a thui u .
44004016	Ahimi lawngah , “ He rawi he metila n'sai lah ai ? Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah ahih rawi kah miknoekna alakloe a sai he a ming u boeih poen tih mami lawngkhaw oelh thai la awm nawh .
44004017	Tede he thaihu he thlaangping tim ah apuung tare nawh ham , ahih rawi lawngah a-u tengah khaw Jesuh miing oen awl thui nawh ham khaang pe sih . ” tila a thui u .
44004018	Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng te rawi te a khue koep u tih Jesuh miing oen a-u khaw cang puei nawh ham , a-u tengah khaw Jesuh miing oen awl thui nawh hamla a khaang pe u .
44004019	Tede Piter oen Johan lawng ahimi nala te , “ Pathen haiah nangmi kah awl ngaai he aw aka soeng , tihnawhtah Pathen awl ngaai he aw aka soeng tite namami lawngah awl tloek uh .
44004020	Metihtiah kai hih lawngtah kamah mik oen ka huh tih ka haa oen ka yaak te thui hamla ka toeng manawh . ” tila a thui hih .
44004021	Tedawngah awlcekna khonsil thlaang thli lawng ahih rawi te anauh ngaai la ngaithuenna a peek tih a tuih hih . He tila thaihu aka awm dawngah he thlaang broe lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u tih ahih rawi te dan peek hamla coengg thai nawh .
44004022	He kah kawpoekrai miknoekna a sai pe thlaang he tah a kum sawmlii thlai law poen .
44004023	Piter oen Johan he a thlah pahoei oen a paya hue tengla meel hih tih khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli kah awl thui te ahimi tengah a thui pe .
44004024	Te awl te oengca thli boeih lawng a yaak u vengah ahimi boeih lawng thik at la haawl u tih Pathen tengah thangthui u : “ Vaan oen dilai , tuitunlii oen ah a khuiah aka awm boeih saikung Bawipa !
44004025	Nang kah tuihyoeihthlaang , kaimi kah patuer Devid teng kalawng Ciim Muithla oen awl na thui tih , ‘ Gental thlaang thli lawng n'tu ah a thin a sa u tih , n'tu ah thlaang thli lawng ahuep khawkhanna te a sai u ?
44004026	Bawipa oen Messiah te oelhtaih hamla , dilai saw kah sengpahrang thli lawng kamthlah u tih , ukkung thli lawng tun u . ’ tila na thui .
44004027	Metihtiah Herod oen Pontias Pilat tah he khawpui khuiah Gental thlaang thli oen Israel thlaang thli oen ah nang kah aciim Tuihyoeihthlaang Messiah la na sai Jesuh te oel khak hamla tun u tangtang .
44004028	Nang lawngah namah kah huham tharana oen aka awm ham koei na thui sut soeprep boeih te sai hamla ahimi tah tun u .
44004029	Tedawngah tahe ah he Bawipa , ahimi kah helcalna he van poek lang namah kah tuihyoeihthlaang kaimi he namah kah awl te thin awm tangkiik la n'thui sak lah .
44004030	Thlaang tlo thli lawng a sa a dingna ham na kut te van thueng langtah aciim Tuihyoeihthlaang Jesuh miing oen ah kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai miknoekna te sai lah . ” tila thangthui u .
44004031	Ahimi lawng a thangthui coeng boet atah ahimi a tunna ahuen te hinghuen . Ahimi tah Ciim Muithla oen betoet u tih Pathen awl te thin awm tangkiik la a thui u .
44004032	Oengca thli lawngah thinkaw oen lungbui khat la kang a khueh u . A-u lawngkhaw a khueh thaihu te kamah kah thaihu ni ti u tlaih nawh tih ahimi lawng a khueh thaihu boeih te khat oen khat avanpila ree u .
44004033	Celtuih thli lawng Bawipa Jesuh kah thawhkoepna te huham tharana oen a phawng u tih Pathen lawng ahimi boeih sawah yotheen kam-awmna te yahawh hlang la a lun pe .
44004034	Ahimi kah bu ah te thlaang khat khaw a voetna awm nawh . Im khaw , lo khaw aka khueh hue lawngah boeih a yoeih u tih a huh tangka boeih te ,
44004035	Celtuih hue kah kut ah kang a peek u ; te tangka te pakhat rip tengah a voetna taring ah arek ara pe u .
44004036	Te ah te Caipras tuisanglak kah Levi thlaangphun Josep aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih Celtuih hue lawng Barnabas a tina u . ( thuingaihna tah , “ Thaphawhkung ” tina ni . ) ,
44004037	ahih lawngah amah lo huen te a yoeih , tangka te avan khuen tih celtuih hue kah kut dawngah te a tloeng pe .
44005001	Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat te awm tih a yu tah Safira a miingna , ahih rawi lawng a khueh thaihu te thoem a yoeih hih .
44005002	Tede a yu lawngkhaw a ngaih van tih tangka avaang athal te amahih ham a paih hih tih a paih coeih te celtuih hue kah kut ah te a peek .
44005003	Piter lawng ahih nala , “ Ananias , n'tu ah na thinkaw te Seitan na uk sak , na khueh toen na yoeih thaihu phu te namah ham na paih thoem tih Ciim Muithla te na thai na lat na ?
44005004	Na thaihu te na yoeih thlan ah namah thaihu la awm tih na yoeih coengah khaw tangka te namah koe la ni a awm . N'tu ham he ang thaihu he sai hamla thinkaw na poek ? Thlaang na thai na latna nawh tih Pathen ni na thai na lat na ! ” a tina .
44005005	He awl he Ananias lawng a yaak pahoei oen tlim tih duek ; he kawng he aka ya boeih lawngtah
44005006	Cadawng caloe thli law u tih a rawkk te himbai oen a yaawl u , a khuen u tih a up u .
44005007	Tecoeng khawnoek pathum yunyan a awm coengah a yu te va law , ahih lawngah te tila thaihu aka awm te ming nawh .
44005008	Piter lawng ahih te , “ Nanghih yuvaa lawng na yoeih thaihu phu na dang te he yoeh poen aw , van thui lah ? ” a tina . Ahih lawngah , “ Oeih , he yoeh poen ni . ” a tina .
44005009	Tedawngah Piter lawng , “ N'tu ah nanghih yuvaa lawng Bawipa kah Muithla he noekdak ham kaw na poek hih ? Na vaa kah rawkk aka kuem thli thawhka ah tahe pai u te , ahimi lawng nang khaw n'khuen u van ai ! ” a tina .
44005010	Kawlkalh ah ahih te Piter kah a khowkung ah tlim pahoei tih duek . Cadawng caloe thli law u tih ahih te a rawkk la a thoel u , ahimi lawng a khuen u tih a vaa tengah te a up u .
44005011	He kawng he aka ya khrihcabu oen thlaangtloe boeih lawng atah caalla a rih u tangkiik .
44005012	Celtuih hue lawngah thlaangping tim ah kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu te broela a sai u . Oengca thli boeih tah Solomon Imthloeih ah te kueng tun u .
44005013	thlaang thli lawng ahimi te a koeh u de , amami bu khuikah thlaang nawh lawngtah ahimi oen tuhkai u ham te tong-aa haitawk u .
44005014	Tede , Bawipa te aka tangna hutaa , tawngpa thlaang broe lawngah ahimi bu te a tawm athap tare u .
44005015	Celtuih hue kah biibina rang oen a dang phu tah Piter te a law phai vengah a mueithlip lawngah thlaangtlo pakhat mai khaw thlipdah seh ti u tih , thlaangtlo thli te lawngpui la avan khuen u tih ihkhun dawngah khaw , phak dawngah khaw a ralh sak u .
44005016	Tecoengah Jerusalem khaawteng khaawvai kah thlaangping broe lawngah thlaangtlo thli khaw , a kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thli te khaw avan khuen u ; ahimi boeih te biit hoeih u .
44005017	Tecoengah Khawsoeih Bawi oen a paya boeih , te kah aka awm Sadusi thlaang boeih lawng celtuih thli te a uett aham u ; tedawngah ahimi lawng thaihu pakhat khat sai hamla awl a khueng u .
44005018	Ahimi lawngah celtuih hue te a tuuk u tih rangpui kah thongim ah te athlaak u .
44005019	Tede khawyiin ah Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng thongim thawh te a awng pe , celtuih thli te a ceh puei tih ahimi nala te ,
44005020	“ Cet u langtah Tempal bok-im khuiah te pai u lang he kah hingna a thaai kawng he thlaang boeih tengah thui uh ” a tina .
44005021	Celtuih hue lawng ahih awl te a ngaai pe u , khaw a thaih atah Tempal bok-im khuila kuun u tih a cang puei u . Khawsoeih Bawi oen a paya thli lawngah awlcekna khonsil huhtunna sai hamla Judah thlaang ahaamca thli te a khue ; te coengah celtuih thli te ahimi haiah van law puei ham thongim la thlaang a tuih u .
44005022	Tede a thlaangtuih thli lawng thongim a pha u vengah thongim khuiah celtuih thli te hu u tlaih nawh , tedawngah awlcekna khonsil thlaang thli tengla te meel u tih a thui pe u ,
44005023	‘ Kaimi thongim ka pha u vengah thong thawhka a kalh khak tih a piin rap te khaw , aka toet thli thong thawhka ah a awm u te khaw ka huh u ; tede thawhka te ka awng u vengah a khuiah a-u khat khaw ka hu u nawh ! ” ti u .
44005024	Khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen tempal bok-im aka toet raalkap bawi thli lawng te awl te a yaak u vengah celtuih thli he me tih ni a ti oh kai tite a kawpoek rai u .
44005025	Tevengah thlaang pakhat law tih ahimi nala te , “ Hutung u lah ! thong ah na thlaak u thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im ah thlaang thli te a cang puei ! ” a tina .
44005026	Tevengah tempal bok-im aka toet bawi lawng amah kah thlaang thli te a ceh puei tih celtuih hue te avan khuen koep u . Tede amami te thlaangping lawngah lungto oen n'de hau ai tite a rih u tih a mangkhakla tah sai u nawh .
44005027	Ahimi lawng celtuih thli te im khuila a kuun puei u tih khonsil thlaang thli hai ah te a pai sak u tih Khawsoeih Bawi lawng ahimi te awl a doet .
44005028	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nangmi lawngah te kah thlaang miing oen ah cang puei nawh hamla kavan khaang khak u poen , tede na sai he bueh u lah ! Nangmi lawng Jerusalem pum ah na cang puei u tih puung khonghak poen , ahih te kaimi lawng a duek sak tila sai hamla na ngaih u ! ” a tina u .
44005029	Piter oen atloe celtuih thli lawng awl a thung pe u tih , “ Kaimi lawng Pathen awl ni ka ngaai u , thlaanghing awl ka ngaai u nawh .
44005030	Nangmi lawng ahih te thinglam dawng na tai u tih na ngawn u coengah mami patuer thli kah Pathen lawng Jesuh te duekna kalawng ah a thawh sak poen .
44005031	Israel thlaang thli te a thawlhna yut sak ham oen ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp ngaai pe ham ahih tah Pathen lawngah a bantang ben ah Mawtkung oen Thlawnkung la a pawmsang poen .
44005032	Kaimi tah he thaihu boeih he aka mingkung la ka awm u , Pathen lawngah amah awl aka ngaai thli kutdo la a peek Ciim Muithla te khaw mingkung sausi la awm ” a tina u .
44005033	Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang boeih lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih celtuih thli te duek sak ham a ngaih u .
44005034	Tede ahimi timkah Farasi thlaang pakhat , thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah tangkiik , Phungawl cangpueikung Gamaliel aka miingna te awlcekna Khonsil ah pai tih , celtuih thli te adaubenla khuen kawlkalh ham awl a peek tih ,
44005035	tecoengah awlcekna Khonsil kah thlaang thli nala te , “ Ka puei Israel thlaang thli , he kah thlaang thli sawah na sai u he atheenla ngaithuen uh .
44005036	N'hu vengah Tudas aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih amah oen amah te thlaangtang van ni tila a hoe soeh tih thlaang yalii yunyan lawngah a hu ah bang u . Tede ahih te a ngawn u coeng atah a hubang thli te yan khonghak tih ahih kah biibi te khaw a duek roep te na ming u .
44005037	Tecoengah thlaangmi soepna atue vengah te Galili thlaang Judas te khaw awm tih ahih lawng thlaangping a hu ah a bang sak van , tede ahih te a ngawn u tih a hubang thli khaw pal u boeih .
44005038	Tedawngah kavan thui u , he kah thaihu dawngah , he kah thlaang thli he metila khaw sai u mai boel . Amami awm la te awm u mai seh ! Ahimi kah khawkhanna oen biibi he thlaanghing benkah sai la a awm atah pal badai ;
44005039	tede Pathen benkah biibina atah na taa u thai tang manawh . Nangmi lawng Pathen te ee-lena la awm hau ai ! ” a tina . Awlcekna Khonsil thlaang thli lawngah Gamaliel kah poekna te a vai u .
44005040	Ahimi lawng celtuih thli te a khuila a khue koep u tih cungpoelh oen a tam u , Jesuh miing oen awl thui tlaih nawh ham awl a peek u tih tecoengah ahimi te a thlah u .
44005041	Celtuih hue tah awlcekna Khonsil kalawng a ceh u vengah awmngaih u tangkiik , metihtiah ahimi te Jesuh kawngah yarau ming ham tueng roe la Pathen lawng a poek dawngah ni .
44005042	Khawhin roekk ah Tempal bok-im khuiah khaw , im ah khaw , Messiah Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te ahimi lawng a thui u tih a cang puei yoeyah u .
44006001	Teveng tue kalawng a awm raih coeng atah a hubang thli thlaangmi khaw puung tare hang tih Krik awl la aka cal Judah thlaang oen Judah awl la aka cal Judah thlaang thli te awlpuungna awm . Krik awl aka cal Judah thlaang thli lawng khawhin roekk bawmna fann tangka rekrana ah ahimi tengkah huhai tumtee thli tah navan thloeng bet u ti tih caitoek u .
44006002	Tedawngah celtuih paha thlaihih lawng oengca thli te a pum boeih la a khue tun tih , “ Kaimi lawng tangka kawng thuikhanna dawngah Pathen kah awl thui ham thlahphaam sut atah soeng nawh .
44006003	Tedawngah maya manau thli , Cuihna oen Ciim Muithla oen ah aka betoet namami timkah thlaang pasarih ah tuek uh , ahimi te he kah thaihu kawng khawkhankung la ka khueh u ai .
44006004	Kaimi ngoen tah thangthuina oen Pathen awl thui biibina dawngah atue boeih he ka hawna u ai . ” a tina u .
44006005	Celtuih hue kah awl thui te ahimi boeih a kaw tla u , tedawngah ahimi lawng Ciim Muithla oen oengna oen ah aka betoet Stefen , Filip , Prokoras , Nikanor , Timon , Parmenas , Antiok khaaw kah Gental thlaang , acuek ah Judah phung aka vai Nikolas te a tuek u .
44006006	Celtuih hue tengla a tuek thlaang thli te a ceh puei u tih ahimi sawah kut a tloeng pe u tih a thangthui pe u .
44006007	Te tila te Pathen kah awl tah puung tare hang Jerusalem khawpui khuiah a hubang thli khaw puung van tih khawsoeih thli broe lawngkhaw oengna te a do u van .
44006008	Pathen lawng yotheenna oen aphueh asawm tih huham tharana oen aka betoet Stefen lawng thlaang rangpui tim ah aka lentloe miknoekna oen kawpoekraina te a sai .
44006009	Tede ahih te thlaang khatsut lawngah a oelh ataih u , ahimi te tah Sairin oen Alekzandria khaaw kah Judah thlaang thli lawngkhaw a tunna van Sal loeih thli kah sinakok bok-im ah aka thuum thlaang thli van ni . Stefen he ahimi oen khaw , Asia oen Silicia peng kah atloe Judah thlaang thli oen khaw awl oelhtaih u .
44006010	Tede Stefen lawngah Muithla kah peek cuihna oen awl a thui dawngah ahimi lawng taa u thai nawh .
44006011	Tedawngah thlaang khatsut te , “ Mosi oen Pathen thangthena awl ahih lawng a thui te kaimi lawng ka yaak u ! ” tila aka thui ham kutsuh a peek u tih a thui sak u .
44006012	Te tila te ahimi lawng thlaang rangpui oen ahaamca thli oen ah Phungawl cangpueikung thli te thinkaw a phawh pe u . Ahimi lawng Stefen te a tuuk u tih awlcekna Khonsil haiah a khuen u .
44006013	Tecoengah ahih kawng te ahong ahii la aka thui ham thlaang khatsut te avan law puei u . Ahimi lawngah , “ Ahih lawng he mami kah aciim Tempal bok-im oen Mosi kah Phungawl te athela a thui poepa .
44006014	Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh lawngah Tempal bok-im he a phe vetih Mosi kah peek phung boeih te a thaw pan ai tila a thui te kaimi lawng ka yaak u ! ” tila a thui u .
44006015	Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka ngawl thlaang boeih lawng Stefen te a bueh rangpatang u vengah ahih kah mik hai tah vanthlaang kah mik-hai angla a awm te a huh u .
44007001	Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah Stefen nala te , “ Ahih lawng a thui he soeng aw ? ” tila a doet .
44007002	Stefen lawngah , “ Maya manau oen a pa thli , ka awl thui he hutung u lah ! Mami kah patuer Abraham he Haran ah awm hamla a ceh thlan ah Mesopotemia khaaw ah a awm vengah te ruep-awm Pathen te a tueng pe tih ,
44007003	ahih nala te , ‘ Na imkhuikaw oen na ram he ceh taak langtah kai lawngah kan nueh ham koei ram la te cet lah ’ a tina .
44007004	Tedawngah ahih lawng amah ram te a ceh taak tih Haran khaaw ah awm hamla te cet . Abraham te ana pa a duek coeng atah tahe ah na awmna u ram la he Pathen lawng a pooeng sak .
44007005	Tevengah te Pathen lawng Abraham te amah hamla ram te avaang athal khaw pe nawh , pae khat mai khaw pe nawh , tede Pathen lawngtah te ram te ahih peek hamla amah oen a cadil nauha kah ram la awm ham awl a kam . Pathen lawng awl a kam vengah te Abraham tah ca-anau khueh nawh .
44007006	Ahih tengah Pathen lawng a thui tah : ‘ Na cadil thli te ram tloe ah saltamnaa la awm u vetih kum yalii khuiah patang palai heemtekna te a ming u ai .
44007007	Tede sal la ahimi aka hawna thlaang thli te kai lawng awl ka cek ai ; tecoeng atah ahimi lawng te kah ram kalawng law u vetih he kah ahuen ah kai he n'bok u ai . ” tila a thui .
44007008	Tecoengah Pathen lawng Abraham te awlkam noekna hamla yahhuivuen reetna phung alam te a peek . Tedawngah Abraham lawng Isak te a cuun coeng yarh khat a awm atah yahhuivuen a reet pe ; Isak lawngkhaw a capa Jakob te yahhuivuen a reet pe tih Jakob lawngkhaw mami phun miing thang patuer thli a capa paha thlaihih te yahhuivuen a reet pe .
44007009	Jakob ca thli lawng a manau Josep te a uett u tih Iyipt ram ah sal la a yoeih u . Tede Pathen lawng a awm puei tih ,
44007010	patang raina boeih dawng kalawng ahih te a ding apuekla a loeih sak . Iyipt sengpahrang tengah Josep a pha vengah Pathen lawng mik-hai thlampaanna oen cuihna te a peek , tedawngah sengpahrang lawng Josep te ram ukkung oen sengpahrang im khui ukkung la a khueh .
44007011	Tecoengah Iyipt ram pum oen Kanaan ram ah khawthe khawkha tih khawdeng raina te awm . Mami kah patuer thli te caak awkk khueh u nawh ,
44007012	Iyipt ram atah khawbuh ram sai tite Jakob lawng a yaak vengah mami kah patuer a ca thli te lamhacuek la tela te a tuih .
44007013	Apabe ah a ceh u veng atah Josep lawngah amah te a-u tite a maya hue tengah a thui pe , tecoeng atah Iyipt sengpahrang lawng Josep cakaw kawng te a ming .
44007014	Tedawngah Josep lawng ana pa Jakob tengah awl a tah tih a cakaw boeih thlaang sawm sarih pa-ngaa te Iyipt ram la law ham a thui pe .
44007015	Tecoengah Jakob tah Iyipt ram la cet tih amah oen a ca thli tah te ah te duek u .
44007016	Ahimi kah a rawkk thli te Shekhem la a khuen u tih Abraham lawng Hamor thlaangphun tengkah tangka oen a lai phuel ah te a up u .
44007017	Pathen lawng Abraham tengkah awlkamna te sai hamla atue ayoeii veng atah Iyipt ram ah te mami phun khaw puung khuengdeng poen .
44007018	Hukhueng atah Josep kawng aka ming nawh sengpahrang lawng Iyipt ram te a uk .
44007019	Ahih lawng mami kah patuer hue te a thai alatna tih ahimi te athe akhana u , a ca thli te amilh amoengna ham im adauben ah te amangkhakla ngah ngah a khueh sak u .
44007020	Te kah atue atang vengah a thlaang aka theen camaw Mosi te a cuun . Ahih te im ah thla thum bueng a poeh a pawm u tih ,
44007021	amah im adauben ah a khueh u vengah sengpahrang canu lawng amah kah cacah la a lawh tih a cuun a cah .
44007022	Ahih lawng Iyipt thlaang thli kah cuihna boeih te a cang tih awlcal thingkaa ah khaw , thaihu saina ben ah khaw miing thaang thlaang la coengg hang .
44007023	Mosi he a kum sawmlii a law veng atah amah thlaang phun Israel thlaang thli te metihtlukla thekha hepna patang a khang u tite bueh hamla kamthlah .
44007024	Iyipt thlaang pakhat lawng thlaang pakhat a heem atek te a huh , cet tih a runn , Iyipt thlaang te a ngawn tih kut a thung .
44007025	( Ahimi te loeih sak hamla Pathen lawng ahih te a hawna ai tite a thlaangphun thli lawng a ming ai tila a poek , tede ahimi lawngah ming u nawh . )
44007026	Avuen khawhin atah Israel thlaang pahih a tawh asi hih te a huh tih ahih rawi te roeproei sak hamla a yawm . Ahih lawngah , “ Hutung hih lah , nanghih he Israel thlaang ni ; n'tu ah tila he na tawh na si hih ? ” a tina .
44007027	Tede atloe pakhat sawah khawboe aka the soeh thlaang te lawngah , Mosi te a tulh tih , “ Kaimi he uk ham oen awl cek hamla a-u lawng nang he n'khueh ?
44007028	Iyipt thlaang pakhat n'thlem ah na ngawn angla te kai hih he ngawn van ham na ngaih aw ? ” a tina .
44007029	Mosi lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Iyipt ram kalawng heeng vik , cet tih Midian ram ah te awm . Te ah te a ca pahih a cuun .
44007030	Kum sawmlii a awm coeng atah Sinai Tlaang tengkah ramhum huhang ah tangpuem aka ung hairawng haialh khui kalawng vanthlaang pakhat Mosi tengah a phumpho pe .
44007031	Mosi tah te kah a huh te a kawpoek rai tih atheen heet la huh rep ham tangpuem tengla te cet . Tede Bawipa awl te a yaak tih ,
44007032	‘ Kai tah na patuer hue kah Pathen , Abraham , Isak oen Jakob mi kah Pathen ni . ’ a tina . Mosi lawng a rih uuet ah thuen tih bueh ha nawh .
44007033	Bawipa lawng , “ Na khowmuek te dul lah , nang lawng na paina ahuen te huen ciim ni .
44007034	Iyipt ram ah ka thlaang thli lawng khawdeng patang a khang u te ka huh poen . Ahimi kah khaw khah laise awl te ka yaak tih ahimi te thlah hamla ka law poen . Tahe ah law lah ; Iyipt ram la kan tuih ai . ’ a tina .
44007035	“ Mosi he Israel thlaang pahih lawng a ngaih nawh thlaang te ni . Ahih rawi lawng , “ A-u lawng nang he kaimi kah ukkung oen awlcekkung la n'khueh ? ” a tina . Ahih tah tangpuem aka ung hairawng haialh dawngah aka thoeng vanthlaang bawmna rang oen ahimi te loeih sak ham oen uk hamla Pathen kah thlaangtuih ni .
44007036	Ahih lawngah a thlaangphun thli te Iyipt ram kalawng a mawt tih , Iyipt ram ah khaw , Tuitunlii Seen ah khaw , ramhum huhang ah khaw kum sawmlii khui puet ah miknoekna oen kawpoek raina te a sai .
44007037	‘ Pathen lawngah namami khuikah thlaang tawngha pakhat te kai angla avan tuih ai ’ tila Israel thlaang thli tengah aka thuikung te tah Mosi ni .
44007038	Ahih tah ramhum huhang ah Israel thlaang thli te aka tunsakkung , mami kah patuer hue oen khaw , Sinai Tlaang ah awl aka thui pe vanthlaang oen khaw awm haih tih Pathen kah hingna awl te mami tengah van phasakkung la awm .
44007039	“ Tede mami kah patuer hue lawng ahih awl te ngaai u nawh ; ahimi lawngah ahih te hoett sut tih Iyipt ram la mel koep ham te a ngaih u .
44007040	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Aaron nala , “ Kaimi he aka mawt hamla pathen thli te kaimi ham van sai loeih . Iyipt ram kalawng mami mawtkung Mosi he metila a awm ti khaw m'ming u tlaih nawh poen . ” a tina u .
44007041	Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng vaitaw ataalca muei asam te a sai u tih amami kah kutsaimuei tengah thaw a thueng u tih luciik a nawn u , amami kah kutsaimuei te hinyah peekna poei khaw a sai u .
44007042	Tedawngah Pathen lawng ahimi te a mangthawng taak tih vaan kah aisi thli te a bok sak u . Tawngha thli kah cabu dawngah a thut tah : ‘ Israel thlaang thli ; ramhum huhang ah kum sawmlii khui puet boiava na ngawn u tih thaw na thueng u te kai ham nawh ni .
44007043	Nangmi lawng na khuen u te tah , Molek pathen bokna-thaang ni , namami kah aisi pathen Rephan kah muei asam , namami lawng bok hamla na sai u kutsaimuei ni . Tedawngah nangmi he Babilon ram voel la te kan hek poen ai . ’ tila a thut .
44007044	“ Mami kah patuer hue lawng ramhum huhang ah Pathen tah ahimi tengah awm tite mingna hamla Pathen a awmna Riim-im te a khueh u . Mosi tengah Pathen lawng a thui pe angla a sak u tih Mosi tengah a huh sak amaw-aka angla te a sak u .
44007045	Hukhueng atah mami kah patuer hue lawng ana pa hue tengkah riim-im te a paang u tih Pathen lawng a hek thlaang thli kah ram te Joshua mi oen a lawh pe u vengah riim-im te a khuen u tih te ah te Devid dung toe awm .
44007046	Ahih tah Pathen haiah mik-hai theen a dang tih Jakob Pathen a awmna im te sak hamla Pathen tengah a bih .
44007047	Tede ahih ham imsakung tah Solomon ni .
44007048	Tede Tloeng Khoelh Pathen tah thlaanghing lawng a sak im dawngah te awm nawh ; tawngha lawng a thui angla ,
44007049	Bawipa lawngah , ‘ Vaan tah Ka ngawlhcoen la awm tih , dilai he tah ka khowtloeng la awm . Nangmi lawng kai ham ah me ang im nuem navan sak ai ? Kai lawng ka awmna ham ahuen te mela nuem ?
44007050	He kah thaihu boeih he kamah lawng ka sai thaihu nawh aw ? ’ tila a thui .
44007051	Tecoengah Stefen lawng , “ Nangmi he na thin thah tangkiik mai mah aw ! Na kaw talh sut u tih Pathen awl yaak hamla na haa khaw pang malhtalh u ! Nangmi he na patuer hue angla ni na awm u : Nangmi lawngkhaw Ciim Muithla te na hek khaklal poepa u !
44007052	Na patuer hue lawngah aheem atek nawh tawngha khat khaw awm aw ? Amah kah thlaangdoeng Tuih-yoeih thlaang a lawna kawng , yan veng kalawng aka thui Pathen kah laipai thli te ahimi lawng a ngawn u . Tahe ah khaw nangmi lawng paipi na thleep u tih ahih te na ngawn u poen .
44007053	Vanthlaang teng kalawng peek patoeng Pathen kah phungawl te aka dang tah nangmi ni , te kah phungawl te nangmi lawng na vai u nawh ! ” a tina .
44007054	Awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang boeih lawng Stefen kah awl thui te a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih thinsa uuet ah a naw te cakcak a rueng u .
44007055	Tede Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Stefen tah vaan a dan hang tih Pathen kah bantang ben ah aka pai Jesuh oen Pathen kah ruep-awmna te a huh .
44007056	Ahih lawngah , “ Bueh lah ! Vaan ke awng u tih Pathen kah bantang ben ah Thlaanghing Capa aka pai ke ka huh ! ” tila a thui .
44007057	Khonsil kah thlaang thli lawng angaihhlangla paang u tih a haa te khoep a buem u . Tecoengah ahimi boeih lawng pahoei a cuuk thil u tih ,
44007058	ahih te khawpui adaubenla akhup athalla a mawt u tih lungto oen mat a de u . Sausi la aka awm thlaang thli lawngah amami kah himbaidung thli te cadawng pakhat Sawl aka miingna te a kuem sak u .
44007059	Ahimi lawng lungto oen a de u lii vengah te Stefen lawng Bawipa tengah , “ Bawipa Jesuh , ka muithla he nang lawng lo mai loeih ! ” a tina .
44007060	Ahih lawngah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih , “ Bawipa ! He thli lawngah thawlhna a sai he van thung pe boel ! ” tila te angaihhlangla paang . He awl a thui coeng atah duek poen .
44008001	Ahih a ngawn u te Sawl lawngkhaw a kaw tlaak puei van . Te khawhin kalawng tah Jerusalem kah Khrihcabu ah heem-atek patang-khangna te tong u poen . Celtuih thli thui muehla oengca thli boeih tah Judia peng oen Samaria ram ah yan khonghak .
44008002	Bokna ben ah tlungmu thlaang khatsut lawngah Stefen rawkk te a kuem u , a kaw the u tih rap u .
44008003	Tede Sawl lawngtah khrihcabu te phe ham a yawm ; im pakhat coeng pakhat ah cet tih oengca thli te hutaa khaw , tawngpa khaw akhup athalla a mawt tih ahimi te thongim ah a thlaak .
44008004	Aka yan khonghak oengca thli lawngah peng tawm ah cet u tih awlthang a thui u .
44008005	Filip tah Samaria ram kah khawpui la te cet tih te kah aka awm thlaang thli tengah Messiah kawng te a thui pe .
44008006	Filip kah awl thui dawngah thlaangping te a kaw thluembuek u , ahih lawng kawpoekrai a sai te a huh u tih atheenla awl te a hutung u .
44008007	Raaithe lawng a kuun thlaang thli kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe thli te vupaang ruila co u tih , aka khawn thlaang thli oen khowkheem thlaang thli broela hoeih u .
44008008	Tedawngah khawpui khuikah thlaang thli tah awmngaih u .
44008009	Te khawpui khuiah Simon aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm tih amah kah caam thoemthaina oen Samaria thlaang thli te kawpoek a rai sak poepa . Ahih lawng amah te thlaang mailai nawh ni tila a thui tih ,
44008010	te khawpui kah thlaangcawm thlaangcee , ahem asang boeih lawng ahih awl te a ngaai pe u tih ahimi lawng , “ Ahih tah ‘ Alen Duet Huham Tharana ’ a ti u Pathen kah tharana ni ” tila te a thui u .
44008011	Ahih lawngah amah kah caam thoemthaina oen asanhlangla ahimi te a thai alatna poen dawngah a thinkaw thluembuek u tih awl a ngaai pe u .
44008012	Tede Jesuh Khrih kawng oen Pathen Ram kawng awlthang theen Filip lawng awlthang a phawng te a tangna u tih hutaa tawngpa lawngkhaw baptisma te a dang u .
44008013	Simon lawngkhaw a tangna van tih baptisma a dang coeng atah Filip tengah te awm roep poen , ahih lawngah alentloe miknoekna oen kawpoekraina te a huh vengah a ngaai hang sut .
44008014	Jerusalem ah aka awm celtuih thli lawng Samaria khaaw kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw Pathen awl te a tangna u van poen tite a yaak u vengah Piter oen Johan te ahimi tengla a tuih u .
44008015	Ahih rawi lawng a pha atah ahimi lawngah Ciim Muithla te a dangna u hamla oengca thli ham te a thangthui pe hih .
44008016	Metihtiah Ciim Muithla te ahimi timkah a-u pakhat tengah khaw law thlan hun ; ahimi lawngah Bawipa Jesuh miing bueng oen ah baptisma te a huh u hun dawngah ni .
44008017	Tecoengah Piter oen Johan lawng ahimi sawah a kut te a thueng hih tih Ciim Muithla te a dang u .
44008018	Celtuih rawi lawngah ahimi sawah kut a thueng tih oengca thli lawng Ciim Muithla a dang u tite Simon lawng a huh . Tedawngah ahih lawng Piter oen Johan te tangka a peek tih ,
44008019	“ A sawah ka kut ka thueng pe thlaang boeih lawng Ciim Muithla te a huhna u ham , huham tharana te kai m'pe van lah , ” a tina .
44008020	Tede Piter lawng ahih nala te , “ Pathen kah kutdo he tangka oen ka lai thai ai tila na poek dawngah namah oen na tangka te hell ah tla hih !
44008021	Pathen mik huh ah na thinkaw lungbui a doeng nawh dawngah kaihih kah biibina dawngah na thuumna ham koei avaang athal khaw awm nawh .
44008022	Tedawngah he ang na kamthlahna athe dawng kalawng yut langtah he ang thaihu na poek dawngah na sawah khawdawp avan ngaaina ham Bawipa tengah thangthui lah .
44008023	Metihtiah nang he uett-eena oen na betoet tih thawlh thongtla la na awm tite kan huh . ” a tina .
44008024	Simon lawng Piter oen Johan nala te , “ Nanghih lawng na thui te ka sawah pakhat khaw a thoengna nawh ham reenna oen Bawipa tengah thangthui hih lah ” a tina .
44008025	Piter oen Johan lawng Bawipa kawng a mik huh thli te a thui hih tih Bawipa awl te a phawng hih coeng atah Jerusalem la koep meel hih . A meel lam ah Samaria peng kah vangca vangnau yahawh hlang ah te Awlthang Theen a phawng hih .
44008026	Bawipa kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng Filip nala te , “ Tho lang kamthlah lah , akaak ben Jerusalem kalawng Gaza la cehna lawngpui ah cet lah . ” a tina . ( He kah lawngpui he tahe ah hawna u tlaih nawh . )
44008027	Tedawngah Filip tah tho tih cet . Lawngpueng ah im la aka meel Etiopia sengpahrang nu kah kaawn-ava kuemkung , awlpui koek bawi la aka awm Etiopia thlaang tiltleh a ti u pakhat te a hum . Ahih te Pathen bok hamla Jerusalem la cet tih amah kah maranglengg oen im la koep meel . Maranglengg a cit tih im la a meel vengah tawngha Isaiah cabu te a tae .
44008029	Ciim Muithla lawng Filip nala , “ Maranglengg tengah ayoeii-repla cet lah . ” a tina .
44008030	Filip lawngah heeng phai tih ayoeii rep veng atah ahih lawngah tawngha Isaiah kah cabu a tae awl te a yaak . Ahih nala te , “ Nang lawng na tae te na yaakming aw ? ” tila a doet .
44008031	Te kah bawi lawng , “ A-u lawng-khaw a thuicaih nawh maiah metila ka yaakming thai ai ? ” a tina . Te atah ahih lawng Filip te maranglengg dawngah luui ham oen ngawlh haih hamla te a ceel .
44008032	Ahih lawngah caciim awl a tae te tah : “ Ngawn hamla a khuen tuuca angla a mawt u tih , a mul te a vawkk pe vengah awl kaa aka law nawh tuucano angla awm , ahih tah awl kam at khaw thui nawh .
44008033	Ahih te yaraula a sai u tih , asoeng akam nawh la awl a cek u , dilai dawngah a hingna aboet poen dawngah ahih kah cadil nauha kawng te a-u khat lawngkhaw thui thai u manawh . ” tila a thut te ni .
44008034	Te kah bawi lawng Filip nala te , “ Tawngha lawngah a-u kawng a thui kai ? Amah kawng aw a thui , tihnawhtah thlaangtloe kawng aw a thui kai , van thui lah ? ” a tina .
44008035	Tecoeng atah Filip lawngah te kah caciim awl kalawng ah a tong pe tih Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te ahih tengah a thui pe .
44008036	Ahih rawi tah poe cet thuk hih , tui a awmna te a pha hih veng atah te kah bawi lawng , “ He ah tui awm he . Baptisma dang ham n'tu lawng kai he n'kang khak ai ? ” tila a thui .
44008037	( Filip lawngah , “ Na thinkaw lungbui boeih oen na tangna atah baptisma na dang ai ta ” a tina . Ahih lawngah , “ Jesuh Khrih tah Pathen Capa ni tite ka tangna ” a tina .
44008038	Te kah bawi lawngah maranglengg te a pai sak , Filip oen te kah bawi te tui dawngla bok cet thuk hih tih Filip lawng ahih te baptisma a peek .
44008039	Ahih rawi te tui dawngkah a law hang hih vengah Bawipa kah Muithla lawng Filip te vik a ceh puei . Te kah bawi lawngah ahih te koep hu tlaih nawh , tede awmngaihna oen poe cet .
44008040	Filip lawng Asdod khaw ka pha tite a ming ; ahih tah Sisaria la cet tih a pha thlantoe lawngpueng kah khaw roekk ah te Awlthang Theen a thui .
44009001	Teveng yun ah te Sawl lawngah Bawipa kah a huvai thli te heem-atek tih ngawn hamla a teeng mangkhak . Ahih lawng Khawsoeih Bawi tengla cet tih ,
44009002	Bawipa kah lawngpui aka vai thlaang thli te a huh atah hutaa khaw , tawngpa khaw ahimi boeih te tuuk thaina ham , a tuuk thlaang thli te Jerusalem la avan khuen koep thaina hamla Damaskas khawpui kah sinakok bok-im kah ahaamca thli tengah a yaak sakna ca te a bih .
44009003	Sawl tah cet tih Damaskas khawpui te a pha tawm atah , vaan kah aangna pakhat lawng mikpatap ah a thue ploeng tih a teng-avai te aang rawngtheng .
44009004	Ahih te dilai ah tlim tih , “ Sawl , Sawl ! N'tu ah kai he nan heem nan tek aih ? ” tila awl kam at te a yaak .
44009005	Ahih lawngah , “ Bawipa , nang te a-u ? ” tila a doet . Te kah awl lawngah , “ Kai tah nang lawng nan heem nan tek Jesuh ni .
44009006	Tede tho langtah khawpui khuila te cet lah , te ah te na sai ham koei te avan thui ai . ” a tina .
44009007	Sawl oen aka cet haih thlaang thli te pai ngangtang u , awl kam at khaw cal u nawh ; ahimi lawng awl tah a yaak u de a-u khat khaw hu u nawh .
44009008	Sawl tah dilai dawng kalawng tho hang tih a mik te a daai , tede thaihu khat khaw hu nawh . Tedawngah ahimi lawng a kut ah a phoeih u tih Damaskas khawpui khuila a mawt u .
44009009	Khawhin hin thum khuiah ahih te a mik tueng nawh , teveng khuiah te caak awkk khaw ca nawh tih tui khaw aw nawh .
44009010	Damaskas khawpui ah Ananias aka miingna Khrihca pakhat awm . Ahih lawngah huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa lawng ahih te , “ Ananias ! ” tila a khue . Ahih lawngah , “ Bawipa he ah ka awm , ” a tina .
44009011	Bawipa lawng ahih nala te , “ Tho langtah Lawng Doeng ah aka awm Judas im la te cet lah , te ah te Tarsas khaw kah Sawl aka miingna thlaang pakhat te tlap lah . Ahih tah thangthui lii hun tih ,
44009012	ahih lawng a mik a tueng koep na ham Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat law tih a sawah kut a tloeng pe te huhthlaam a huh poen . ” a tina .
44009013	Ananias lawng , “ Bawipa , thlaang yahawh lawngah he kah thlaang kawng khaw , Jerusalem kah na thlaang thli tengah rih-awm thaihu a sai boeih kawng te khaw avan thui u .
44009014	Tecoengah nang aka bok thlaang boeih tuuk hamla khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah aana oen ni a law . ” a tina .
44009015	Bawipa lawng ahih nala te , “ Cet mai hawn , metihtiah kamah kah bii aka bi hamla , Gental thlaang thli , sengpahrang thli oen Israel thlaang thli tengah ka miing aka tueng sak ham ahih te ka tuek poen .
44009016	Tecoengah kamah roeroe lawngah kamah kawngah patang a khang ham koei boeih te ka huh sak ai . ” a tina .
44009017	Tedawngah Ananias lawng cet tih Sawl a awmna im khuila te kuun tih a sawah kut a tloeng pe . Ahih lawng , “ Ka manau Sawl , he la na law vengah lawngpueng ah te namah tengah aka phumpho Bawipa Jesuh amah lawng kai he n'tuih . Na mik te a tueng koep na ham Ciim Muithla oen na betoet na hamla ni kai he n'tuih . ” a tina .
44009018	Kawlkalhca maiah Sawl kah a mik dawng kalawng thaihu pakhat ngakher angla tla tih a mik te tueng koep . Ahih lawng tho tih baptisma te a dang ;
44009019	tecoengah caak awkk te a caak coeng atah a tha awm koep . Sawl tah Damaskas khaaw ah te oengca thli oen khawhin yawlca awm kawlkalh .
44009020	Ahih lawng sinakok bok-im boeih ah te cet tih Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tite a thui .
44009021	Ahih kah awl thui te aka ya thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih , “ Ahih he Jerusalem ah Jesuh aka bok thlaang boeih aka ngawn te nawh aw he ? Ahimi te tuuk hamla kamthlah tih khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengah khuen hamla ni he la a law de ca ? ” tila te doet u .
44009022	Tede Pawl kah awl thui tah huham tharana awm tare tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a thui rapcaat tih Damaskas ah aka awm Judah thlaang thli lawng a awl te thung pe u thai nawh .
44009023	Khawhin yahawh thlaang a awm hang coeng atah Judah thlaang thli te tun huh u tih , Sawl te ngawn hamla khaw a khan u ,
44009024	tede ahimi kah khawkhan te Sawl tengah a thui pe u . Ahimi lawng Sawl te ngawn a ngaih u dawngah khawpui kah vawng thawhka te khawyiin khawdaai a toet u .
44009025	Tede yiin at atah Sawl te a hubang hue lawng a khuen u tih pahaang dawng a sang u , vawngkulh bangbuerh kalawng duem a thlaak u .
44009026	Sawl tah Jerusalem la cet tih hubang thli tengah pawlneeng hamla a yawm . Tede ahih te hubang pakhat van ni tite tangna u nawh tih ahimi lawng a rih u .
44009027	Te atah Barnabas te ahih bawm ham law tih celtuih hue tengla a ceh puei . Ahih lawngah Sawl lawng lawngpueng ah Bawipa te a huh tih awl a thui pe kawng te ahimi tengah a thui pe . Sawl lawngah Jesuh miing oen raltheenla awl a thui te khaw ahimi tengah te a thui pe .
44009028	Tecoeng atah Sawl te ahimi oen awm haih u tih Jerusalem te a hiil adawng , Bawipa miing oen raltheenla awl a thui .
44009029	Krik awl la aka cal Judah thlaangphun hue oen khaw awl a thui u tih oelhtaih u , tede ahimi lawngkhaw ahih te ngawn ham a yawm u .
44009030	Oengca thli lawng te kawng te a ming u vengah Sawl te Sisaria la a ceh puei u tih Tarsas khaaw la te a tuih u .
44009031	Judia Tecoeng atah ram , Galili ram oen Samaria ram kah khrihcabu tah ngaimawngla awm u . Bawipa te hinyahna oen khaw a sak u tih Ciim Muithla kah bawmna rang oen a tha ra u tih puung tare u .
44009032	Piter tah khaw tawm ah yin la cet tih voei khat atah Lidda ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli te hip hamla te cet .
44009033	Te ah te kum reet khuiah khawn roep tih ihkhun dawng kalawng aka tho thai nawh Anias aka miingna thlaang pakhat te awm .
44009034	Piter lawng ahih nala te , “ Anias , Jesuh Khrih lawng na sa avan ding sak poen . Tho langtah na ihphah te yaawl . ” a tina tih Anias te pahoei tho .
44009035	Lidda oen Sharon ah aka awm thlaang lawng a hih te a huh u tih Pathen ben ah kaw a thaw u .
44009036	Joppa khaaw ah Tabita aka miingna oengca pakhat awm . ( Ahih te Krik awl la Dorkas a miingna tih thuingaihna tah , “ Sayuk ” ti ngaihna ni . ) Ahih lawng thaihu theen saina oen khawdeng bawmna ah atue atang boeih te a hawna .
44009037	Tevengah te ahih tah tlo tih duek . A rawkk te tui a thluk u tih asaw dawtt im han ah te a helh u .
44009038	Joppa khaaw he Lidda khaaw kalawng thla aih nawh tih Lidda ah Piter awm tite Joppa khaaw kah oengca thli lawng a yaak u vengah thlaang pahih a tuih u tih , “ Reenna oen kaimi tengah aloela law de lah . ” tila awl a uen u .
44009039	Tedawngah Piter te kamthlah pahoei tih ahih rawi oen cet u . A pha veng atah asaw dawtt im han la te a luui puei u . Huhai thli lawng Piter te a veel khoep u tih rap u , Dorkas lawng a hing vengah a sai pe angki oen hinaak himbai thli te a huh sak u .
44009040	Piter lawng ahimi boeih te im han kalawng ram la a ceh sak coengah khuklu oen cuengkueng tih thangthui ; tecoengah rawkk benla maang tih , “ Tabita , tho lah ! ” a tina . A mik a daai tih Piter te a huh vengah tho tih ngawl .
44009041	Piter lawng a phoeih tih ahih te a thawh hang . Tecoengah Oengca boeih oen huhai thli te a khue tih ahimi tengah te a hing la a tloeng pe .
44009042	Te kawng awlthang te Joppa khaaw ah thaang khok tih thlaang broe lawng Bawipa te a tangna u .
44009043	Piter tah Joppa khaaw kah Simon aka miingna saphaw oen haw-apai thaihu aka sai thlaang oen ah khawhin yahawh hlang haih awm .
44010001	Sisaria khaaw ah Kornilias aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm . Ahih tah , “ Itali Raalkapbu ” a ti u Rom raalkapbu pakhat kah raalbawi ni .
44010002	Ahih tah bokna ben ah a tlungmu thlaang pakhat la awm tih amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng Pathen a bok u . Ahih lawngkhaw Judah thlaang khawdeng thli te a bawm acem poepa tih Pathen tengah thangthui yoeyah .
44010003	Hin at atah khawvaang ben khawnoek pathum yunyan ah ahih lawng huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Pathen vanthlaang pakhat law tih “ Kornilias ! ” tila khuekung te aciimphanla a huh .
