44010004	Ahih lawng vanthlaang te rih doe ah a dan heet tih “ N'tu nuem , Bawipa ? ” a tina . Vanthlaang lawngah , “ Nang kah thangthuina oen reenna oen ah bawmcemna na sai lawngah te Pathen kah thinkaw a puem poen tih na thangthuina te thung hamla awm oepsoeh poen .
44010005	Piter aka miingna thlaang pakhat tengah te tahe ah Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih lah .
44010006	Ahih tah tuitunlii tengah aka awm saphaw thaihu aka sai Simon im ah pah . ” a tina .
44010007	Tecoeng atah vanthlaang te cet . Kornilias lawng amah im kah tuihyoeihthlaang pahih oen bokna ben ah tlungmu tih amah te pumpakla doenkung raalkap pakhat te a khue .
44010008	Ahimi tengah amah lawng a huh boeih te a thui pe tih Joppa khaaw la ahimi te a tuih .
44010009	Ahimi te cet u tih avuen khawhin Joppa a pha tawm vengah te , Piter tah thangthui hamla hingthun ah imphu la luui hang .
44010010	Ahih te a bung pawng tih pakhat khat caak hamla a ngaih ; caak awkk te aroek abah pe u vengah ahih lawng huhthlaam pakhat a huh .
44010011	Te kah huhthlaam dawngah te , vaan awng u tih thaihu pakhat aka law thuk , a kil palii a thlingthlui tih himbai bohlang oen aka lo u , dilai la avan thlaak thuk te a huh .
44010012	Te kah a khuiah te ramsa phun soeprep boeih , aka colh aka vaan thai ramsa boeih oen va phun soeprep boeih te awm .
44010013	Awl pakhat lawngah , “ Piter , tho lah ; ngawn langtah ca lah ! ” a tina awl te a yaak .
44010014	Tede Piter lawng , “ Ka ca nawh mue , Bawipa ! phung alam ben ah aka acaih nawh tih aka ciim nawh thaihu te khatca khaw ka ca nooek nawh . ” a tina .
44010015	Te kah awl lawng koep a thui pe tah , “ Pathen lawng Ciim a ti coengthloeih te pakhatca khaw aciim nawh la poek boel . ” a tina .
44010016	He tila voei thum toe awm tih tecoeng atah te kah thaihu te vaan la koep a doek hang poen .
44010017	Piter lawng he kah huhthlaam thuingaihna a kawng te a poek lii vengah , Kornilias kah thlaangtuih hue lawng Simon im te a pha u tih vawng thawhka haiah ahimi te pai u .
44010018	Ahimi lawngah , “ Simon Piter aka miingna kamyin te awm aw ? ” tila a khue tih a doet u .
44010019	Piter lawng huhthlaam thuingaihna te yaakming ham a poek lii veng-ah Muithla lawngah , “ Hutung lah ! Thlaang pathum lawng nang he n'tlap u .
44010020	Tedawngah tho langtah rum thuk , ahimi oen haih cet , uelh boel , ahimi te kai lawng ni kavan tuih . ” a tina .
44010021	Tedawngah Piter tah ahimi tengla cet thuk tih , “ Nangmi lawng na tlap u te kai poen ni . N'tu navan lawh u ? ” a tina .
44010022	Ahimi lawng , “ Raalbawi Kornilias lawng n'tuih u . Ahih tah Pathen aka bok thlaang theen pakhat la awm tih Judah thlaang boeih lawngah a hinyah tangkiik u . Nang lawng na thui thli te ahih lawng a yaakna hamla Pathen kah vanthlaang pakhat lawng nang te amah im ah ceh puei ham a thui pe . ” a tina u .
44010023	Piter lawng ahimi te im khuila a khue tih yiin at tah ip u de a tina tih te ah te pah u . Avuen atah kamthlah tih ahimi oen cet haih ; Joppa khaaw kah oengca thli khatsut tah ahih oen cet haih van .
44010024	Avuen khawhin ah Piter tah Sisaria khaaw te a pha , te ah te Kornilias lawng amah cakaw thli oen paya laikoei a ceel thlaang thli oen ahih te a ring u .
44010025	Piter te a law phai vengah Kornilias lawng a do tih a khowkung ah a buekuep pe .
44010026	Tede Piter lawng a thawh tih , “ Pai hang lah , kai khaw thlaang mailai van ni ” a tina .
44010027	Piter oen Kornilias tah awl noenoe a thui hih tih im khuila a kuun phai hih vengah thlaang broela a tun kueng te a huh .
44010028	Tevengah ahimi nala te , “ Judah thlaang pakhat he Gental thlaang phun oen yingyawi paithle tih pawlneeng haih hamla a bokna phung lawng ngaih nawh tite atheencala namami lawngkhaw na ming u . Tede a-u khat khaw phung alam ben ah caih nawh tih ciim nawh tila poek nawh ham Pathen lawng n'huh sak poen .
44010029	Tedawngah nang lawng nan khue sak vengah oelhtaih tlaih ohla ka law poen . Tetih atah van thui u lah , n'tu hamla nan khue u ? ” a tina .
44010030	Kornilias lawng , “ N'thlem vai vuen , he veng tue yunyan ah , khawvaang khawnoek pathum ah te kamah im khuiah ka thangthui . Kawlkalhca maiah himbai a bawk likthik aka bai thlaang pakhat ka haiah va pai tih ,
44010031	ahih lawng : ‘ Kornilias ! Pathen lawng na thangthuina te a yaak tih reenna oen bawmcemna na sai te a ming poen .
44010032	Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih langtah Simon Piter aka miingna thlaang te khue sak . Ahih tah tuitunlii tengah aka awm saphaw aka sai Simon im ah te pah ” tila te a thui .
44010033	Tedawngah nang te pahoei kan khue sak , na law tih theen poen . Tahe ah Bawipa lawng nang n'thui sak awl te hutung hamla he ah he kaimi boeih Pathen haiah ka awm u . ” a tina .
44010034	Tevengah Piter lawng awl a thui tih , “ Pathen lawngah thlaang boeih he avan at la a khueh ti he tah soeng tangtang tila tahe atah ka ming poen .
44010035	A-u khaw amah te a bok tih doengna te aka sai boeih tah me ang thlaangphun khaw a hih lawng a do .
44010036	Thlaang boeih kah Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih rang oen ngaimawngna Awlthang Theen a thui tih Israel thlaang thli tengah Pathen lawng a peek te na ming u .
44010037	Johan lawng baptisma a peekna kawng awl te a thui coengah Galili kalawng a tong tih Israel ram pum ah thaihu alentloe aka thoeng te a ming u .
44010038	Nangmi lawng Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh kawng oen ah ahih sawah Ciim Muithla oen tharana te metila Pathen lawng a lun pe tite a ming u . Ahih tah Pathen lawng a awm puei dawngah peng tawm ah te cet , theenna te a sai tih Raaithe bawi kah huham tharana kut khuiah aka awm boeih te a hoeih sak .
44010039	Israel ram pum oen Jerusalem khaaw ah ahih lawng a sai boeih te aka mingkung sausi la kaimi he ka awm u . Tecoengah ahih te thinglam dawng a tai u tih a ngawn u .
44010040	Tede hin thum coengah ahih te Pathen lawng a thawh sak koep tih a phumpho sak ,
44010041	thlaang boeih tengah phumpho sak nawh tih Pathen lawng a tuek oepsoeh mingpueikung sausi la aka awm , duekna kalawng a thawh coengah amah oen caak awkk te aka ca , aka aw haih kaimi teng bueng ah ni a phumpho sak .
44010042	Thlaang boeih tengah awlthang theen thui hamla , thlaangduek oen thlaanghing awlcekkung la Pathen lawng ahih te a khueh te aka mingkung sausi la kaimi he awl m'peek u .
44010043	A-u khaw ahih te aka tangna boeih tah a miing huham tharana oen ah a thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai pe ai tila tawngha boeih lawng ahih kawng te a thui u . ” a tina .
44010044	Piter lawng awl a thui lii vengah te ahih kah awl thui aka hutung thlaang boeih sawah Ciim Muithla te va rum thuk .
44010045	Gental thlaangphun thli sawah khaw , amah kutdo Ciim Muithla te Pathen lawng a lun pe dawngah Joppa khaw kah Piter oen aka law haih Judah thlaangphun oengca thli tah a kawpoek rai u .
44010046	Metihtiah ahimi lawngah ming nawh awl la cal u tih Pathen kah bawilenna a thangpawm te a yaak u dawngah ni . Piter lawngah :
44010047	“ Mami angla he kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw Ciim Muithla a dang u van . Te tih atah he thli he tui oen baptisma peek ham a-u lawng a khaang khak ai ? ” tila a thui .
44010048	Tedawngah ahimi te Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah baptisma dang hamla awl a peek . Tecoengah Piter te ahimi tengah khawhin ayawl khaw cam hamla a ceel u .
44011001	Judia ram pum kah atloe oengca thli boeih oen celtuih boeih lawng Gental thlaang thli lawngkhaw Piter te a do u van tite a yaak u .
44011002	Piter te Jerusalem la a ceh vengah Gental thlaang thli te yahhuivuen reet sak ham aka ngaih thlaang thli lawngah a cawtt-abauh u tih ,
44011003	“ Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh Gental thlaang im ah na pah tih caak awkk khaw na caak haih roe mai ! ” a tina u .
44011004	Tedawngah Piter lawng acuekca veng kalawng thaihu aka thoeng hang te asoepbirla biit a thui pe :
44011005	“ Joppa khawpui ah ka thangthui lii vengah huhthlaam pakhat ka huh . Vaan kalawng thaihu pakhat aka law , a kil palii a thlingthlui himbai bo hlang oen aka lo u dilai la avan thlaak thuk te ka huh tih ka teng avan pha dengah a toeng .
44011006	Akhuiben te ka bueh heet vengah imvuelh boiava oen ramsa phun soeprep aka colh aka vaan thai ramsa boeih oen va phun soeprep boeih te ka huh .
44011007	Tecoengah awl pakhat ka tengah avan thui te ka yaak tih , ‘ Piter , tho lah ; ngawn langtah ca lah ! ’ tila avan thui .
44011008	Tede , kai lawngah , ‘ Bawipa , ka ca nawh mue ! Phung alam ben ah caih nawh tih aka ciim nawh caak awkk te ka kaa khuiah kuun nooek nawh ” ka tina .
44011009	Vaan kalawng awl avan thui koep tih , ‘ Pathen lawng ciim a ti coengthloeih te nang lawngah khatca khaw aciim nawh la poek boel , ’ tila avan thui .
44011010	He tila voei thum toe awm tih tecoeng atah te kah thaihu boeih te vaan la koep a doek hang poen .
44011011	Teveng tue ca roe ah Sisaria khaaw kalawng avan tuih thlaang pathum te ka awmna im la te avan pha u .
44011012	Uelh re tlaih ohla ahimi oen ceh haih pahoei ham Muithla lawng avan thui . He kah ka puei oengca paruk hue khaw Joppa kalawng Sisaria la kai oen haih ka law u tih kaimi boeih he Kornilias im la ka cet u .
44011013	Ahih lawngah , amah im ah vanthlaang pakhat pai tih , ‘ Joppa khaaw la thlaang tuih lang atah Simon Piter aka miingna thlaang te khue sak .
44011014	Ahih lawngtah nangmi tengah awl avan thui vetih te awl rang oen ah namah oen na imkhuikaw lawng thlawnna na dang u ai . ’ tila a thui pe te kaimi tengah avan thui .
44011015	Tecoengah , awl ka thui pe vengah te acuek vengah mami sawah a awm van angla ahimi sawah khaw Ciim Muithla te va rum .
44011016	Tevengah Bawipa lawng , ‘ Johan lawngtah tui oen ah baptisma te m'peek u , tede nangmi tah Ciim Muithla oen baptisma m'peek ai . ’ tila a thui te lot ka poek .
44011017	Mami lawng Bawipa Jesuh te n'tangna vengah mami m'peek kutdo te ang van te Gental thlaang thli khaw Pathen lawng a peek van ti he tah ciim mai poen ; tedawngah kai he a-u la ka awm aih tih Pathen te ka oel khak lal thai ai ! ’ tila a thui pe .
44011018	He awl he ahimi lawng a yaak u vengah cawttbauh awl te a toeng u , Pathen te a thangpawm u tih , “ Pathen lawng , Gental thlaangphun thli khaw thawlh yut u tih hing van hamla atue theen a peek van poen ! ” ti u .
44011019	Stefen a ngawn u coeng kah heemtekna aka thoeng hang dawngah te oengca thli khatsut tah yan khonghak tih khatsut tah Fonicia , Saipras oen Antiok toela a pha u tih Judah thlaangphun thli bueng tengah awlthang te a thui u .
44011020	Tede Saipras oen Sairi khaw kah thlaang , atloe oengca thli te Antiok la cet u tih Gental thlaangphun thli tengah khaw , awlthang te a phawng pe u tih Bawipa Jesuh kawng Awlthang Theen te a thui pe u .
44011021	Bawipa kah huham tharana tah ahimi tengah awm tih thlaang toek lek nawh lawng a tangna u tih Bawipa benla a kaw a thaw u .
44011022	He kawng awlthang he Jerusalem kah khrihcabu teng a pha , tedawngah Barnabas te Antiok la a tuih u .
44011023	Ahih lawng a pha vengah Pathen lawng thlaang thli te metihtlukla yotheen a peek tite a huh vengah awmngaih tangkiik tih thinkaw lungbui tak oen Bawipa tengah thincak la a awmna u ham , uep-awm la a awmna u hamla ahimi te a thaphawh .
44011024	Barnabas tah thlaangdoeng pakhat la awm , Ciim Muithla oen oengna oen ah betoet tih thlaang yahawh hlang te Bawipa tengla avan law puei .
44011025	Tecoengah Barnabas tah Sawl te tlap hamla cet .
44011026	Ahih te a huh tih Antiok la avan law puei tih ahih rawi lawng kum at puet khrihcabu kah thlaang thli oen huh u tih thlaang boehoeng mai te a cang puei . Oengca thli he lamhacuek la Antiok ah Khrihca tila a thui cuek u .
44011027	Teveng yunyan ah tawngha khatsut te Jerusalem kalawng Antiok la cet u .
44011028	Akabas aka miingna ahimi timkah thlaang pakhat te pai tih dilai pum ah he khawthe khawkha awm ai tila Muithla kah huham tharana oen oepsoehla a thui . ( Klaudias te sengpahrang sangluel la a awm vengah khawthe khawkhana te awm . )
44011029	A hubang thli lawngah amami kah sai thai khoek ah Judia ram ah aka awm oengca thli te bawmcemna peek hamla awl a thui u .
44011030	Ahimi lawng te tila a sai u coeng atah tangka te khrihcabu ahaamca thli tengah peek ham Sawl oen Barnabas kut ah a pat pe u .
44012001	He veng yunyan ah Herod seng-pahrang lawng khrihcabu khui-kah thlaang khatsut te heemtek hamla a tong poen .
44012002	Ahih lawngah Johan kah a manau Jeem samsen oen a ngawn sak .
44012003	He tila a ngawn dawngah Judah thlaang thli a ngaai khuek a ti u te a huh vengah Piter te khaw a tuuk sak u . ( Te veng te tah Tawlru thuum mueh Takawi Poei ni ) .
44012004	Piter te a tuuk u coeng atah thongim ah a thlaak tih bu khat ah raalkap palii aka awm raalkap bu lii te a toet sak u . Herod lawngtah Kaantaak Poei a boeih coengah rangpui haiah awl cek ham kamthlah .
44012005	Tedawngah ni Piter te thong ah a thlaak , tede khrihcabu khuikah thlaang thli lawng ahih hamla te Pathen tengah thinkaw thluembuek tang oen thangthui u .
44012006	Herod lawng ahih te thlaangping haiah awl cek ham a pha tawm yiin ah Piter te raalkap pahih laklaw ah te ip . Ahih te thiirui pahih oen a khih tih thong thawhka ah khaw raaltoeng thli pai u .
44012007	Bawipa kah vanthlaang te bawtbet khawlai ah te ah te pai parak tih thongim te a thue pheng . Vanthlaang lawng Piter te a lengpang ah a hinghuek tih a thawh , “ Aloela tho ! ” a tina . Tevengah Piter kut dawngkah thiirui te pahoei tla .
44012008	Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng , “ Na cihin te na langtah na khawmuek te muek lah ” a tina . A thui pe angla Piter lawng a sai coeng atah vanthlaang lawng , “ Na himbai te bai langtah ka hu ah law lah . ” a tina .
44012009	Piter lawng thongim adauben toela a vai . Tede vanthlaang lawng a sai te ataktang ni tila ming nawh ; ahih lawng huhthlaam ni ka huh tila a poek .
44012010	Ahih rawi lawng lamhacuek raaltoeng a paina oen a pabena te a pooeng hih coeng atah khawpui khuila cehna thii thawhka te a pha hih . Thawhka te amah poek ah te rawi hamla awng u tih te kalawng ah te cet hih . Lawngpui ah poe a ceh hih vengah te bawtbet maiah Piter te vanthlaang lawng a ceh taak .
44012011	Tevengah Piter lawng a tengah aka thoeng boeih te a ming vengah cuih pan tih , “ He tah ataktang ni tila ka ming poen ! Bawipa lawng kai he Herod kah tharana oen Judah thlaang thli lawng ka sawah a sai thaihu boeih dawng kalawng loeih sak ham vanthlaang avan tuih . ” tila a thui .
44012012	Amah kah awm ih boeih te a kaw a puk heet coeng atah Johan Mark kah a manu Meri im la te cet , te ah te thlaang broela tun u tih thangthui u .
44012013	Piter lawng adauben kalawng ah thawh te a khooek tih Roda aka miingna tuihyoeihthlaang hutaaca lawngah thawhka te awng hamla cet .
44012014	Ahih lawngah Piter awl te a noek tih awmngaih uett ah thawh te awng ohla im khuila cet koep tih thlaang thli tengah te ‘ thawhka adauben ah Piter awm ’ a tina .
44012015	Ahimi lawngah , “ Na ngau aw ! ” a tina u . Tede ahih lawng atak tang ni tila a thui mang khak . Tedawngah ahimi lawng , “ Ahih kah vanthlaang macawi . ” a tina u .
44012016	Teveng ah Piter lawng thawhka te a khooek khiing . Ahukhueng ah ahimi lawng thawh a awng u tih Piter te a huh u veng atah a ngaai hang sut u .
44012017	Piter lawng ahimi te awm duem hamla a kut oen noekna a peek tih thongim khui kalawng ah metila Bawipa lawng a loeih sak tite ahimi tengah a thui pe . Ahih lawngah , “ He he Jeem oen atloe oengca thli tengah thui pe uh . ” a tina tih ahimi te a ceh taak coeng atah atloela poe cet .
44012018	Khaw athaih atah Piter he me tih ni a ti oh kai ti u tih raaltoeng thli tah ngaihangtalh la awm u .
44012019	Herod lawng Piter te tlap hamla awl a peek tih a tlap u de dang u nawh . Tedawngah raaltoeng thli te doet adap coengah ngawn hamla awl a peek . He coeng atah Herod he Judia ram kalawng cet tih Sisaria khaaw ah te kawlkalh awm .
44012020	Herod tah Turi oen Sidon khaaw kah thlaang thli sawah a thin sa tangkiik , tedawngah ahimi lawng tun huh u tih ahih oen huh u hamla te cet u . Lamhacuek ah ahimi lawng sengpahrang impui ukkung Blastas te ahimi pai puei ham a ceel u . Tecoengah ahimi tah Herod tengla cet u tih roeproei u hamla a bih u , metihtiah ahimi ram kah caak awkk dangna tah Herod sengpahrang kah ram uk khuiah a awm dawngah ni .
44012021	Awl tuentahna khawhin te a pha atah Herod lawng amah kah sengpahrang phawlip oen thoekcau u , a bawi ngawlhcoen dawngah te ngawl tih thlaangping tengah awl a thui pe .
44012022	Ahimi lawngah , “ Awl aka thui he thlaang nawh ni , Pathen ni ! ” tila te paang u .
44012023	Herod lawng Pathen te a hinyah nawh dawngah Bawipa kah vanthlaang lawng ahih te a bawhtaal pahoei , yunghuut lawng a keuh tih duek .
44012024	Teveng ruetrat ah te Pathen awl tah puung tare tih roeng hang .
44012025	Barnabas oen Sawl tah amami kah biibi te a coeng hih tih Jerusalem la koep meel hih , Johan Mark te khaw a ceh puei hih .
44013001	Antiok khaaw kah khrihcabu khuiah tawngha thli oen cangpueikung thli khatsut tah thoem awm u : Te thli te tah , Barnabas , Simeon ( Thlaangmuuem a ti u te ) , Lucias ( Sairin khaw kah ) , Manaen ( ukkungbawi Herod kah thawnpuei ) oen ah Sawl , he hue ni .
44013002	Ahimi lawngah Pathen a bok u tih buh a yeh u vengah te Ciim Muithla lawngah ahimi nala te , “ Kai lawng bii ka hoel ka paai te aka bi hamla ka khue Barnabas oen Sawl te kai ham van thloeng uh ” a tina .
44013003	Ahimi lawng buh a yeh u tih thangthui u , ahih rawi sawah kut a tloeng pe u tih tecoeng atah ahih rawi te a tuih u .
44013004	Barnabas oen Sawl tah Ciim Muithla lawng a tuih van angla Silukia khaaw la cet hih tih te kalawng ah Saipras tuisanglak la te tuisangphaw oen cet hih .
44013005	Ahih rawi lawng Salamis khaaw a pha hih veng atah Pathen awl te sinakok bok-im ah a phawng hih . Ahih rawi lawng bii aka bawmkung la Johan Mark te a ceh puei .
44013006	Ahimi tah te kah tuisanglak kalawng cet poe u tih Paphos khaaw te a pha u , te ah te caam aka thoem Bar-Jesuh aka miingna thlaang te a huh u , ahih tah amah oen amah te tawngha ni tila aka thui soeh Judah thlaang pakhat van ni .
44013007	Ahih tah tuisanglak ukkung , Serkias Pawlas thlaangcuih kah paya la awm . Ukkungbawi lawng Pathen awl te yaak ham a ngaih dawngah Barnabas oen Sawl te amah tengla a khue .
44013008	Tede ahimi te caam aka thoem Elimas ( he tah Krik miing ni ) lawng a oelh ataih tih ukkung bawi lawngah oengna khueh boel seh tila a yawm mangkhak .
44013009	Tevengah Pawl a ti u Ciim Muithla oen aka betoet Sawl lawngah ; caam aka thoem thlaang te a bueh rangpatang tih ,
44013010	“ Nang , Raaibawi capa ! Nang tah doengna boeih boeih kah thunkha la na awm . Nang he thailatna soeprep oen na betoet tih Bawipa kah awltak he hoem awl la thawvel ham na yawm poepa !
44013011	Bawipa kut te na sawah tahe avan pha ai ; na mik te pum khoep vetih kawlkalh khui atah khawthaih khawse te na hu manawh , ” a tina . Kawlkalh maiah Elimas kah a mik te muui muuemtuut lawng a dah pe khoep tih amah te a kut ah aka mawt hamla thlaang te a pathoep poen .
44013012	Ukkung bawi lawng he tila thaihu aka thoeng te a huh vengah a tangna tih Bawipa kawng a cang puei te a kawpoek la rai tangkiik .
44013013	Pawl oen a paya thli tah Paphos kalawng tuisangphaw oen cet u tih Pamfilia ram kah Perka khawpui te a pha u , te ah te Johan Mark te a ceh taak u tih Jerusalem la amami tah koep meel u .
44013014	Ahih tah Perka kalawng poe cet tih Pisidia ram khui Antiok khaaw te a pha u . Sabbath khawhin atah sinakok bok-im la cet u tih ngawl u .
44013015	Mosi Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cathut te a tae coeng atah sinakok bok-im ukkung thli lawngah ahimi nala te : “ Maya manau thli , thlaang yahawh ham thaphawhna awl thui ham a awm atah na thui u ham ka ngaih u de ” a tina u .
44013016	Pawl lawng pai tih a kut oen noekna a peek tih awl a thui : “ Ka puei - Israel thlaang thli oen Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang thli : hutung u lah !
44013017	Israel thlaangphun kah Pathen lawngah mami kah patuer thli te a tuek tih Iyipt ram ah ram tloe thlaang angla a awm u vengah thlaangphun bo la te a sai . Pathen lawng amah kah alentloe huham tharana oen ahimi te Iyipt ram kalawng avan law puei tih ,
44013018	ahimi lawngah khawkum Sawmlii khui puet ramhum huhang ah patang a kha ang u .
44013019	Ahih lawngah Kanaan ram kah thlaangphun phun sarih te a taa tih te ram kah hunkung huenmah la a thlaang thli te a sai .
44013020	He tila a awm khui boeih te kum yalii sawm ngaa yunyan awm . “ He coengah tawngha Samu-el dung toe ah ahimi te awlcekkung thli te a peek .
44013021	Tecoengah ahimi lawng sengpahrang a bih u tih kum sawmlii khuiah ahimi kah sengpahrang la awm hamla Pathen lawngah Benjamin phun , Kish capa Sawl te a peek .
44013022	Pathen lawng ahih te a khoe pe coeng atah Devid te ahimi kah sengpahrang la a khueh pe . Pathen lawng ahih kawng a thui te tah : ‘ Jesi capa Devid tah ka kaw aka tawng thlaang , kai lawng sai sak ham ka ngaih boeih te aka sai ham thlaang te ka huh poen ” tila a thui .
44013023	Pathen lawngah amah awlkam angla Devid cadil Jesuh te Israel thlaang thli kah Thlawnkung la a sai poen .
44013024	Jesuh lawng amah kah bii te a tong thlan ah Johan lawngah Israel thlaangphun thli te na thawlhna yut u langtah baptisma dang u lah , a tina .
44013025	Tecoengah Johan lawng amah kah bii te a coeng tawm vengah thlaang rangpui nala te , ‘ Kai he a-u tila na poek u ? Kai tah nangmi lawng na ring oel khiing thlaang te nawh ni . Tede hutung u lah ! Ahih tah kai hu ah va law tih kai tah ahih kah khowmuek te dul pe ham Pateng khaw ka koeih nawh . ’ tila a thui .
44013026	“ Abraham cadil , ka puei Israel thlaangphun thli oen Pathen aka bok Gental thlaangphun thli ; thlawnna awlthang he mami tengah m'peek !
44013027	Metihtiah Jerusalem ah aka awm thlaang thli oen ahimi mawtkung thli lawngah ahih te Thlawnkung ni tila ming u nawh tih Sabbath khawhin roekk ah a tae u tawngha thli kah awl te khaw ahimi lawng yaakming u nawh . Tede Jesuh te a ngawn u tih tawngha thli kah awl thui te a soep sak u .
44013028	Ahimi lawngah ahih te ngawn hamla akawng alam hu u nawh de ahih te ngawn ham Pilat tengah a bih u .
44013029	Te tila ahih kawng Caciim lawng a thui boeih te a sai u coengah thinglam dawngkah a rawkk te ahimi lawng a lawh u tih thlann ah a up u .
44013030	Tede Pathen lawng ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen tih ,
44013031	Galili kalawng Jerusalem la amah oen khawlawng aka cet haih nooek thli tengah khawhin broe nawh la a phumpho pe . Tahe ah ahimi te Israel thlaang phun ham aka mingkung sausi la awm u .
44013032	Tedawngah te Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengah thui hamla he la he ka law u : mami kah patuer thli tengah sai hamla Pathen lawng awl a kam te mami a cadil thli tengah Jesuh kah thawhkoepna rang oen tahe ah avan sai poen . Saam laa raawl hihna dawngah , Nang tah ka capa la na awm ; tihin ah kai tah na Pa la ka awm poen , ’ tila a thut .
44013034	Tecoengah thlann khuiah metuek khaw rong sut ohla duekna kalawng a thawhkoepna kawng te Pathen lawng a thui tah : ‘ Devid teng awl ka kam tangte , aka ciim tih uepna koei tangtang yotheen kam-awmna te kan pe ai . ’ tila a thui .
44013035	Tecoengah Saam laa atloe dawngah khaw , ‘ Namah kah a congmang heet tuihyoeihthlaang te thlann khuiah na rong sak sut manawh . ’ tila a thui .
44013036	Devid lawng a hing khuiah Pathen kawngaihna te a sai , tecoengah duek tih an patuer thli oen haih a up u de phuel khuiah a rawkk te rong .
44013037	Tede Pathen lawng duekna kalawng a thawh sak thlaang te tah he tila awm nawh .
44013038	Ka puei Israel thlaangphun thli , kaimi lawng ming sak hamla ka ngaih u tah , Jesuh rang oen ni thawlh khawdawp ngaaina kawng awl te nangmi tengah avan thui u ; Ahih te aka tangna thlaang boeih tah Mosi kah Phungawl lawng a loeih sak thai nawh thawlhna kalawng a loeih sak tite ming u lah .
44013040	Tedawngah tawngha thli lawng a thui te nangmi sawah a thoeng nawh ham ngaithuen uh :
44013041	‘ Hutung u lah ! Nangmi nuihbu la thlaang aka sai hue ! Lakueng uekcuek lang duek uh ! metihtiah tihin ah ka sai ham koei he thlaang pakhat lawng van thui u cakhaw , na tangna u roe manawh ! ’ tila a thui ” a tina .
44013042	Sinakok bok-im kalawng Pawl oen Barnabas a ceh hih vengah te , Sabbath khawhin ah law koep hih langtah he kawng he yahawh la van thui de a tina u .
44013043	Thlaangping te sinakok bok-im kalawng a ceh boeih u coengah Pawl oen Barnabas te Judah thlaang thli oen Judah phung la aka kuun Gental thlaang broe lawngah a hu ah bung a vai u . Celtuih rawi lawng ahimi te Pathen lungvatna dawngah awm poe hamla thathluena awl a thui pe .
44013044	Tecoeng Sabbath khawhin atah te khawpui khuikah thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa awl te hutung hamla law u .
44013045	Judah thlaang thli lawngah thlaangping te a huh u vengah ahimi lawng uett-eena thinkaw a khueh u ; Pawl lawng a thui te khaw a oelh ataih u tih amah te khaw aphawh akhah u .
44013046	Tede Pawl oen Barnabas lawng raltheenla a thui tare hih tih : “ Nangmi tengah Pathen awl he lamhacuekla thui ham ngoe tangtang . Tede nangmi lawng na hoett u tih namah oen namah te dungyan hingna oen a tingtawkk nawh la na poek u atah kan ceh taak u vetih Gental thlaangphun tengla ka cet hih ai .
44013047	Metihtiah kai hih tengah Bawipa kah awlpeek tah : ‘ Dilai pum lawng thlawnna a dangna ham nang hih tah Gental thlaang thli kah aangna la kan khueh poen . ’ tila a thui ” a tina hih .
44013048	Gental thlaang thli lawng he awl he a yaak u vengah , awmngaih u tangkiik tih Bawipa kah awlthang te a thangpawm u ; dungyan hingna paang hamla a tuek thlaang thli te oengca la awm u .
44013049	Bawipa kah awl tah te kah ram pum ah te puung khuengdeng .
44013050	Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngah khawpui khuikah mawtkung thlaang thli oen Pathen aka bok hinyah koei Gental hutaa thli te a ceemtuh u tih Pawl oen Barnabas te heemtek ham a tong u , ahih rawi te a ram khui kalawng a vai u .
44013051	Celtuih rawi lawngah ahimi sawah a kawlawna nawh te ming sak nala a khow dawngkah laidiik te a khoek hih tih Ikoniam khaaw la poe cet hih .
44013052	Antiok khaw kah oengca thli tah awmngaihna oen Ciim Muithla oen ah betoet u .
44014001	Tetih toengtoeng la te Ikoniam ah khaw Pawl oen Barnabas tah sinakok bok-im la cet tih awl a thui hih , Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli yahawh hlang te oengca la coengg u .
44014002	Tede aka tangna nawh Judah thlaang thli lawng Gental thlaang thli te a ceemtuh u tih oengca thli te a oelh a taih sak u .
44014003	Celtuih rawi tah te ah te asan hlang awm tih Bawipa kawng te raltheenla a thui hih , ahih rawi lawng a thui lungvatna kawng awlthang te soeng tila tueng sakna ham kawpoek rai miknoekna oen kawpoek rai sai thaina huham tharana te a peek .
44014004	Te khawpui khuikah thlaangping tah pek u tih khatsut lawng Judah thlaang te a bawngyawng u tih khatsut lawng celtuih rawi te a bawngyawng u .
44014005	Tecoengah Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli lawngah celtuih rawi te thekhana tih lungto oen de hamla a thui u .
44014006	Celtuih rawi lawng he kawng he a ming tih Likonia ram khuiah aka awm Listra oen khaawteng khaawvai la te heeng hih .
44014007	Te ah te ahih rawi lawng Awlthang Theen te a thui hih .
44014008	Listra khaaw ah a thang pek kalawng a khow kheem tih aka cet thai nawh thlaang pakhat awm .
44014009	Ahih tah te ah te ngawl tih Pawl kah awl thui te a hutung . Pawl lawngah , ahih lawngtah a tangna dawngah hoeih thai ai tite a huh , tedawngah rangpatangla a bueh heet tih ,
44014010	angaih hlang la ahih nala te , “ Tho lang pai hang lah ! ” a tina . Te thlaang lawng cungpet tih yingyawi .
44014011	Pawl lawng a sai te thlaangping lawng a huh vengah , “ Thlaanghing angla pathen thli he va thoeng tih mami tengah va law poen ! ” tila amami Likonia awl la te paang u .
44014012	Ahimi lawngah Barnabas te Zias tila miing a sak u tih Pawl tah awl thuikung la a awm dawngah Harmas tila miing a sak u .
44014013	Te khawpui kah adauben ah tempal bok-im awm tih Zias pathen khawsoeih lawng vaitaw taal thli oen raipai thli te khawpui vawng thawhka la te avan khuen , ahih oen thlaangping hue lawngah celtuih rawi tengah luciik thawthuengna te nawn ham a ngaih u .
44014014	Ahimi lawngah te tila ka sai ai a ti u te Pawl oen Barnabas lawng a yaak hih vengah amahih kah himbai te a pheuh hih , thlaangping tim ah heeng hih tih paang ,
44014015	“ N'tu ham he he na sai u ? Kaihih khaw nangmi angla thlaanghing van ni ! Nangmi lawng he ang aphu aka awm nawh te na hoettna u ham , vaan , dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah a khuiah aka awm boeih saikung aka hing Pathen tengla na maang u hamla kaihih lawng Awlthang Theen he phawng hamla ka law hih .
44014016	N'cui veng atah thlaang boeih he amami kah ngaihna angla a ceh sak .
44014017	Tede ahih tah thaihu theen saina oen ah awm tite a tueng sak poepa : vaan kalawng ah khaw a tlan sak tih atue atang vengah thing thaih rampu te m'peek u ; caak awkk te m'peek u tih na kaw avan hoe sak u . ” tila a thui pe hih .
44014018	He tila awl a thui pe hih ah Pateng khaw thlaangping lawngah ahih rawi tengah luciik thawthuengna te nawn nawh ham celtuih rawi lawng a khaang pe tloel hih .
44014019	Pisidia ram khuikah Antiok khaaw oen Ikoniam khaaw kalawng Judah thlaang khatsut te law u tih thlaangping te amami benla a doek u thai , Pawl te lungto oen a de u , duek poen tila a poek u tih khawpui adaubenla te a mawt u .
44014020	Tede oengca thli lawng ahih te a veel khoep u vengah tho tih khawpui khuila te koep cet . Avuen khawhin atah Barnabas oen Derbe khaaw la te cet hih .
44014021	Pawl oen Barnabas lawng Derbe ah Awlthang Theen te a phawng hih tih thlaang broe te hubang la coengg . Tecoengah Listra , Ikoniam , Pisidia ram kah Antiok khaaw la te cet hih koep .
44014022	Ahih rawi lawngah oengca thli te tha a peek hih tih oengna dawngah cak poe hamla thathluena awl a thui pe hih . Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Mami lawng Pathen ram khuiah kuun ham ah khawdeng patang broela khang ham roe ni , ” tila te a cang puei hih .
44014023	Ahih rawi lawng khrihcabu roekk ah ahaamca thli te a khueh pe , ahih rawi lawngah buhyeh thangthuina oen ahimi te a uepna Pathen tengah a nawn .
44014024	Pisidia ram te a pooeng hih coengah Pamfilia ram te a pha hih .
44014025	Perka khaaw ah awlthang a phawng hih tih tecoengah Attalia khaw la te cet hih .
44014026	Bii a coeng hih poen dawngah te kalawng ah Antiok la tuisangphaw oen koep cet hih . Antiok khaaw he tah biibi tong hamla Pathen kah lungvatna dawngah pum a peekna hih khaw ni .
44014027	Antiok khaaw te a pha hih veng atah khrihcabu kah thlaang thli te thik at la a tun sak hih tih ahih rawi rang oen Pathen lawng a sai thli oen Gental thlaang thli lawng a tangna thai ham lawngpui a awng pe kawng te ahimi tengah a thui pe hih .
44014028	Ahih rawi tah te ah te atue san hlang oengca thli oen awm u .
44015001	Thlaang khatsut tah Judia kalawng Antiok la law u tih , “ Nangmi lawngah Mosi kah Phungawl lawng a kuek angla yahhuivuen na reet u nawh atah thlawnna na dang thai manawh . ” tila a cang puei u .
44015002	Pawl oen Barnabas tah he kawngah ahimi oen oelh ataih u tih awl puung u . Tedawngah Pawl oen Barnabas he Antiok kah thlaang khatsut oen Jerusalem la cet u selang tah he kawng he celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli te doet u seh tila awl a thui u .
44015003	Khrihcabu lawng ahimi te yawh a thak u ; Fonicia oen Samaria ram ben kalawng poe cet u tih Pathen ben ah Gental thlaangphun thli kah kawthawna kawng te ahimi lawng a thui u tih he kah awlthang lawngah oengca boeih te a awmngaih sak .
44015004	Jerusalem te ahimi a pha veng atah khrihcabu oen celtuih thli oen ah ahaamca thli lawng ahimi te a do u tih ahimi rang oen Pathen lawng thaihu a sai boeih te a thui pe u .
44015005	Tede Farasi benla aka awm oengca thli khatsut lawng pai u tih , “ Gental thlaangphun lawng yahhuivuen reet u selang tah Mosi kah Phungawl he vai u seh tila thui pe ham awm ” tila a thui u .
44015006	Celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli tah he kah awldoetna he poek hamla tun huh u .
44015007	Asan hlang a thui khiing u coengah Piter lawng pai tih , “ Maya manau thli , Gental thlaangphun lawng Awlthang Theen te a yaak u tih a tangna u thai ham n'hu vengah Pathen lawng nangmi timkah kai he aka thuikung la n'tuek te nangmi lawng na ming u .
44015008	Thlaang boeih kah poekna mingkung Pathen lawngah Ciim Muithla te mami m'peek van angla Gental thlaang thli khaw a peek van tih ahimi te a do poen tite a tueng sak .
44015009	Ahih lawngah mami oen ahimi laklaw ah pekbona sai nawh ; ahimi lawng a tangna u dawngah ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai pe .
44015010	Tedawngah , n'tu hamla nangmi kah patuer thli lawngkhaw , mami nawn lawngkhaw phueih thai nawh thalrih te oengca thli na phueih sak rang oen tahe ah Pathen te noekdak ham na ngaih u ?
44015011	Tetih moenih ta ! Ahimi angla mami lawngkhaw n'tangna u van tih Bawipa Jesuh kah lungvatna rang oen thlawnna n'dang u . ” a tina .
44015012	Barnabas oen Pawl lawng , ahih rawi rang oen Gental thlaangphun tengah Pathen lawng kawpoekrai miknoekna oen kawpoekrai thaihu a sai kawng te a thui hih vengah thlaangping lawng sap a hutung u .
44015013	Ahimi lawng awl a thui boeih u coeng atah Jeem lawng ah : “ Maya manau thli , ka awl hutung u lah !
44015014	Simon lawng a thui angla Pathen lawng Gental thlaang thli te amah hamla a lawhna rang oen metihtluk la ahimi a thintlawhna tite lamhala a tueng sak poen .
44015015	Tawngha thli kah awl thui khaw he kah awl oen vai u . Caciim lawng a thui angla ,
44015016	‘ Bawipa lawngah , he coengah koep kava meel vetih Devid kah ram te ka thawh koep ai . Aka rawk thli te ka sak koep vetih acakla ka pai sak koep ai .
44015017	Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih lawng ka tengla law u vetih kamah kah thlaang la awm hamla ka khue Gental thlaang thli khaw law u ai .
44015018	Te tila yan veng kalawng he awl aka mingsakkung Bawipa lawng a thui . ’ a tina .
44015019	Jeem lawngkhaw a thui pe tih , ‘ Pathen benla kaw aka thaw Gental thlaang thli he mami lawng raina peek ham awm nawh tila ka poek .
44015020	Te lak atah , kutsaimuei bokna ah a nawn u dawngah phung alam ben ah aka caih nawh caak awkk te caak nawh ham ; hutaa oen tawngpa thawlhna dawngah kuemsuem ham , rawn khak ramsa te caak nawh ham , sathi khaw caak nawh hamla ca mah pat pe u sih .
44015021	Metihtiah sinakok bok-im ah n'cui veng kalawng Mosi kah Phung awl te Sabbath khawhin roekk ah a tae poepa u tih khaw tawm ah ahih awl te khaw a phawng u poen . ” a tina .
44015022	Tecoengah celtuih thli , ahaamca thli oen khrihcabu lawng Pawl oen Barnabas oen ah Antiok khaaw la tuih haih ham amami bu khuikah thlaang khatsut te tuek hamla awl a tloek u . Ahimi lawngah oengca boeih lawng a hinyah u thlaang pahih Barnabas a ti u Judas oen ah Silas te a tuek u .
44015023	Ahih rawi kut ah te a dangkah angla ca a pat pe u : “ Nangmi kah maya manau la aka awm kaimi celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli lawng Antiok , Siria oen Cilicia ah aka awm Gental phun maya manau thli te kan toei u .
44015024	Kaimi tim-kah thlaang khatsut aka law lawngah nangmi te raina m'peek u tih ahimi kah awlthui lawngah ngaihangtum la nangmi te n'khueh u tite ka yaak u . Tede ahimi te kaimi kah mingpueina awm nawh .
44015025	Tedawngah kaimi tun ka huh u tih laipai tuek u silang tah mami lawng n'lungna Barnabas oen Pawl oen ah nangmi tengla tuih haih sih tila boeih ka kaw vai u .
44015026	Pawl oen Barnabas tah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah bii dawngah duek oen hing khaw aka maa nawh thlaang ni .
44015027	Tedawngah ca oen kavan thut u he nangmi tengah thui pe hamla Judas oen Silas he kavan tuih u .
44015028	He kah angoe phung alam coengah atloe thalrih khatca khaw nangmi sawah tloeng nawh hamla Ciim Muithla oen kaimi ka kaw vai u poen :
44015029	kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk te ca u boel ; sathi ca u boel ; rawn khak ramsa te ca u boel ; hutaa oen tawngpa thawlh u boel . He ang thaihu boeih he nangmi lawng sai nawh ham na kuemsuem u atah theen mai poen . Na sa ding u seh . ” tila a thut pe u .
44015030	Laipai thli te a tuih u tih Antiok khaaw la te cet u , tela te a pha u atah oengca thli te vai at la a tun sak tih capat te ahimi kut ah a peek u .
44015031	Ahimi lawng ca te a tae u vengah thathlue thakawna awl dawngah te a kaw hoe u tangkiik .
44015032	Judas oen Silas khaw tawngha la a awm hih dawngah ahimi tengah thathluena awl oen thapeekna awl asanhlangla a thui pe hih .
44015033	Ahih rawi tah te ah te akhoek anoen a awm hih coeng atah oengca thli lawng sading ngaimawng la a thak u tih aka tuihkung thli tengla koep meel hih .
44015034	( Tede Silas tah te ah te awm hamla kamthlah . )
44015035	Pawl oen Barnabas tah Antiok khaaw ah asanhlang awm hih tih thlaangtloe hue oen Bawipa awl te a phawng u tih a cang puei u .
44015036	Te ah te a awm ran hih coeng atah Pawl lawng Barnabas nala te , “ Bawipa awl mahih lawng n'thuina khaaw boeih ah te cet silang tah maya manau thli te hip lah sih , metila nuem a awm kai , hiil-adawng lah sih . ” a tina .
44015037	Barnabas lawngtah Johan Mark te ceh puei ham a ngaih ,
44015038	Tede ahih tah te rawi kah biibina aboet toe ah baang poe nawh tih ahih rawi te Pamfilia ah a ceh taak tih a meel koep dawngah Pawl lawngtah ahih te ceh puei hamla theen nawh tila a poek .
44015039	Te kawngah awl puung hih tih ahih rawi tah pek ahih : Barnabas lawng Mark te a khue tih Saipras la tuisangphaw oen cet hih .
44015040	Pawl lawngah Silas te a tuek tih oengca thli lawng Pathen kah lungvatna dawngah a nawn u coengah cet hih van .
44015041	Ahih tah Siria oen Cilicia ben kalawng poe cet tih khrihcabu thli te tha a thlue sak .
44016001	Pawl tah Derbe kalawng Listra khaaw la te cet , te ah te khrihca thlaang pakhat Timote aka miingna te awm . A manu tah khrihca van tih Judah thlaangphun la awm , tede ana pa tah Krik thlaangphun ni .
44016002	Listra oen Ikoniam kah oengca boeih lawng Timote te a koeh u .
44016003	Pawl lawng Timote te ceh puei a ngaih dawngah yahhuivuen a reet sak . Ahih lawng te tila a sai sak te tah te kah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih lawng Timote kah ana pa te Krik thlaang phun tila a ming u dawngah ni .
44016004	Ahimi lawng a cehna khaaw tawm ah te Jerusalem ah Celtuih thli oen ahaamca thli kah awltloekna phung alam a sai u te a thuicaih pe tih te kah phung te ahimi lawng vai hamla a thui pe u .
44016005	Tedawngah khrihcabu thli tah oengna ben ah a tha ra u tih khawhin roekk ah puung tare hang .
44016006	Ahimi te Ciim Muithla lawng Asia ram khuiah awlthang a phawng sak nawh dawngah Frikia ram oen Galati ram la te poe cet u .
44016007	Misia ramri a pha u veng atah Bitinia ram khuila ceh ham a yawm u , tede Jesuh kah Muithla lawng ahimi te ceh taak u nawh .
44016008	Tedawngah Misia ram kalawng Troas khaaw la poe cet u .
44016009	Khaw yiin atah Pawl lawng huhthlaam pakhat a huh tih te kah a huh na dawngah te Macidonia thlaang pakhat pai tih , “ Macidonia ram la law u langtah kaimi he m'bawm u lah ! ” tila a bih .
44016010	He kah huhthlaam he Pawl lawng a huh coeng atah Macidonia ram la ceh ham pahoei ka kamthlah u , metihtiah te kah aka awm thlaang thli tengah Awlthang Theen thui hamla Pathen lawng n'khue ka ti u dawngah ka kamthlah pahoei u .
44016011	Kaimi tah Troas kalawng Samotarek la tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih avuen ah Neapolis ka pha u .
44016012	Te kalawng ah Macidonia peng , lamhacuek khawpui Filipi la te lan lawngpui kalawng ah ka cet u . Te kah khawpui te tah Rom ram uk khuiah awm . Te ah te khawhin sanhlang ka awm u .
44016013	Sabbath khawhin ah khawpui avooel ben-kah tuivakeeng la ka cet u , te ah te Judah thlaang thli kah thangthui tunna ahuen awm ai tila ka poek u . Kaimi ka ngawl u tih te ah aka tun hutaa thli tengah awl ka thui pe u .
44016014	Ahimi timkah hutaa pakhat himbai lingdiik aka yoeikung Tiatira khaaw kah Lidia lawngah kaimi awl te a hutung . Ahih tah Pathen aka bok hutaa pakhat la awm tih Pawl kah awl thui te hutung nguenthuen ham Pathen lawng a thinkaw a awng pe .
44016015	Amah oen a imkhuikaw thlaang boeih lawng baptisma a huh u coeng atah , “ Kai he Bawipa ah oengca taktak la nan poek u atah law u lang ka im ah pah uh . ” tila n'ceel u . Tecoeng atah a im la ceh ham kaimi te n'tongnolh u .
44016016	Hin at atah thangthuina huen la kaimi ka ceh u vengah raaithe aka khueh sal hutaaca khat oen ka huh u . Ahih te raaithe lawngah hailamben ah aka thoeng ham koei te a thui sak thai . Ahih lawng hailamben thaihu kawng thuina rang oen a bawi thli ham tangka moen a dang pe .
44016017	Ahih te kaimi oen Pawl hu ah law tih , “ He kah thlaang thli he tah Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli ni ! Nangmi lawngah thlawnna te metila na dang u thai ai tite ahimi lawng avan thui ai ! ” tila paang .
44016018	Te tila te khawhin sanhlang ahih tah paang khiing , Pawl te thinsabat la a khueh aih dawngah a hu la maang dak tih raaithe nala te , “ Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah ahih kaw khui kalawng co loeih kan tina he ! ” a tina . Tevengca roe ah ahih kaw khui kalawng raaithe te co pahoei .
44016019	Hutaaca kah a bawi thli lawng ahimi kah tangka dangna tah awm tlaih nawh tite a ming u veng atah Pawl oen Silas te a tuuk u tih rangpui a tunna huen ah aana khuehkung thli tengla te a mawt u .
44016020	Ahimi lawngah te rawi te Rom ram ukbawi thli tengla a khuen u tih , “ He rawi he Judah thlaangphun ni , mami kah khawpui khuiah awlpuungna a sai hih .
44016021	Ahih rawi lawngah mami kah phung oen aka kalh u phung te a cang puei hih ; kaimi tah Rom thlaang la ka awm u dawngah he ang phung he ka do u nawh vetih ka vai u manawh . ” tila a thui u .
44016022	Tevengah thlaangping hue lawngkhaw Pawl oen Silas te sulh a cuuk thil u . Tecoeng atah Rom ram ukbawi thli lawng Pawl oen Silas kah himbai te a pit pe u tih cungpoelh oen bawh hamla awl a peek .
44016023	A bawh doetthloet u coeng atah ahih rawi te thongim khuiah a uup u , ahih rawi te longkhon buen sak tih piin rap hamla thongim toetkung thli te awl a peek .
44016024	Awlpeek te a dang coeng atah thong ukbawi lawng te rawi te thongim a khuicok la a uup u tih longkhon a rih khuethluek te a khow dawngah a buen u .
44016025	Yiinthuem tang yunyan atah Pawl oen Silas lawng thangthui hih tih Pathen koehna laa a sak hih , atloe thongtla thli lawng ahih rawi kah laa sak awl te a hutung u .
44016026	Tevengah bawtbet khawlai maiah likluei law khuengdeng tih thongim te lungdangsuem toela hinghuen . Kawlkalh maiah thawhka boeih te awng u phengvel tih thongtla thli a khihna thiirui te thlam u boeih .
44016027	Thong ukbawi te tho hang tih thong thawhka boeih a awng u te a huh vengah thongtla boeih tah co boeih poen cawini tila a poek ; tedawngah a samsen te a suh tih amah oen amah te ka ngawn u ai ti .
44016028	Tede Pawl te paang khalau tih , ‘ Namah oen namah nganbawh pe u boel ! Kaimi boeih he ah ka awm u ! ” a tina .
44016029	Thong ukbawi lawng haithoei a tawh sak coengah thongim khuila te toklek la kuun phai tih Pawl oen Silas kah a khowkung ah rih oen thuen ruila te buekuep .
44016030	Tecoengah ahih rawi te adaubenla a ceh puei tih , “ Ka bawipa rawi , thlawnna ka dangna ham n'tu ka sai ai ? ” tila a doet .
44016031	Ahih rawi lawngah , “ Bawipa Jesuh te tangna lah , namah oen na imkhuikaw lawng thlawnna na dang u ai . ” a tina .
44016032	Ahih rawi lawngah Bawipa awl te ahih oen a im kah thlaangtloe boeih tengah a thui pe hih .
44016033	Amah yiin vengah te thong ukbawi lawng ahih rawi te a ceh puei tih a boengha thli te a silh pe ; ahih oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng baptisma te pahoei a dang u .
44016034	Tecoengah thong ukbawi lawng amah im la Pawl oen Silas te a ceh puei tih caak awkk te a do adan . Tahe atah ahimi lawng Pathen te a tangna u poen dawngah amah oen a imkhuikaw boeih tah awmngaih tangkiik u .
44016035	Avuen mincang ah Rom thlaang aana khuehkung thli lawng palik bawi thli te awl a peek tih a tuih , “ Te rawi te ceh sak loeih ” a tina .
44016036	Tevengah thong ukbawi lawng Pawl nala te , “ Bawi thli lawngah nang oen Silas te thlah hamla thlaang avan tuih poen . Tedawngah na cet thai hih poen , ngaimawng ngaitoe la cet hih loeih . ” a tina .
44016037	Tede Pawl lawngah palik bawi nala te , “ Kai hih kah thawlhpalhna te hu u nawh de rangpui haiah cungpoelh oen n'bawh u , kaihih he Rom thlaang de lah koen ! Tecoengah thong n'thlaak u . Tahe ah ahimi lawng kaihih he ahuepla tuih ham a ngaih u . He tila sai ham tuueng nawh ! Rom ram ukbawi thli amami te he la law selang kaihih he n'thlah seh . ” a tina .
44016038	Palik bawi thli lawng he awl he Rom ram ukbawi thli tengah a thui pe u ; Pawl oen Silas te Rom thlaang ni tila a yaak u veng atah a rih u .
44016039	Tedawngah ahih rawi tengla ahimi te cet u tih reenna a bih u , tecoeng ahimi lawngah te rawi te thongim khui kalawng a thlah u tih khawpui khui kalawng ceh loeih hamla reenna a bih u .
44016040	Pawl oen Silas lawng thongim te a thawh taak hih tih Lidia im la cet hih . Te ah te ahih rawi lawng oengca thli oen huh u tih ahimi tengah thathluena awl a thui pe coengah a ceh taak .
44017001	Pawl oen Silas te Amfipolis oen Apollonia kalawng poe cet hih tih Tesalon khaaw te a pha , te ah te sinakok bok-im pakhat awm .
44017002	Pawl lawng a ceh nooek angla sinakok la te cet . Te ah te Sabbath khawhin hin thum khuiah thlaangping oen awl a thui ,
44017003	Caciim dawngkah awl te a thoel alang u tih a thui ngawng u , Messiah tah khawdeng patang a khang vetih duekna kalawng tho koep ai tite a thui caih pe . Pawl lawngah , “ Nangmi tengah kavan phawng Jesuh he tah Messiah poen ni . ” tila a thui pe .
44017004	Ahimi timkah khatsut lawngtah a yaakming u tih Pawl oen Silas te a bawngyawng u ; tedawngah nu mawtkung thli oen Pathen aka bok Krik thlaang thli broe lawngkhaw a bawngyawng u van .
44017005	Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngtah a uett a ee u tih lawngteng lawngvai kah boethe halang thlaang thli te a cawi tun tih thlaangping la a tingtun sak . Ahimi lawngah khawpui khuiah cumplaam la tho u , Jason kah im te a muk u tih Pawl oen Silas te thlaangping tengah khuen hamla a tlap u .
44017006	Tede ahih rawi te a huh u nawh veng atah ahimi lawng Jason oen atloe oengca thli khatsut te akhup athalla avan mawt u tih te khawpui kah aana khuehkung thli tengah , “ Khaaw tawm ah rai-acangna aka thoeng sak thlaang rawi te tahe tah mami khaw khuila avan pha poen !
44017007	tede Jason lawng te rawi te a im ah a thuh . Ahih rawi lawngah sengpahrang sangluel kah phung boeih khaw a phe hih , sengpahrang atloe awm tih Jesuh a miingna tila a thui . ” tila paang u .
44017008	Te tila ahimi lawng a paang u dawngah thlaangping oen khawpui khuiah aana khuehkung thli kah thinkaw a phawh .
44017009	Aana khuehkung thli lawng Jason oen atloe hue te thlahna ham aamahkhanna tangka ahimi tengah a lawh u , tecoengah a thlah u .
44017010	Khaw a yiin thuk atah oengca thli lawng Pawl oen Silas te Berea khaaw la pahoei a tuih u . Ahih rawi lawng a pha atah sinakok bok-im la cet hih .
44017011	Te kah thlaang thli tah Tesalon ah aka awm thlaang thli lak ah a poekna kau bet . Ahimi lawng thinkaw thluembuek oen awl te a hutung u tih Pawl lawng a thui te soeng tang kai nuem ti u tih hin roekk ah Caciim te ahimi lawng athoel alang u .
44017012	Ahimi timkah thlaang broe lawngah a tangna u tih hinyah koei Krik hutaa thli oen Krik thlaang tawngpa broe lawngkhaw a tangna u .
44017013	Tede Tesalon ah aka awm Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl lawngah Berea ah khaw Pathen awl a phawng tite a yaak u vengah tela te law u tih thlaangping te a ceemtuh u tih awl puungna a sai sak u .
44017014	Tedawngah oengca thli lawng Pawl te tuitunlii keeng la te pahoei a tuih u ; tede Silas oen Timote tah Berea khaw ah te awm hih .
44017015	Pawl aka thak thlaang thli te Aaten khaw toela haih cet u tih Berea khaaw la a meel koep u vengah Silas oen Timote te Pawl amah tengla law yue seh tila awl a uen .
44017016	Pawl lawng Silas oen Timote te Aaten khaaw ah a ring vengah te kah khawpui tah kutsaimuei oen abehuepla a awm te a huh tih a kaw the tangkiik .
44017017	Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli oen khawseh , Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang thli oen khaw sinakok ah awl a thui u poepa tih , rangpui tunna huen ah khaw , cet thuk cet hang thlaang thli oen khawhin roekk ah awl a thui u .
44017018	Epikuras kah cangpueina aka vai thli kah cangpueikung hue oen khaw , Stoik a ti u cuihna te aka cangpueikung hue oen khaw ahih tah oelhtaih u . Ahimi tim-kah khatsut lawngah , “ He kah thlaang koeih pavaih nawh lawng he n'tu nuem a thui van ca ? ” ti u . Thlaangtloe hue lawngah , “ Ram tloe kah pathen kawng ni a thui muema he . ” a tina u . Pawl lawngah Jesuh kawng oen a thawhkoepna kawng a thui dawngah ni ahimi lawng te tila te a tina u .
44017019	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pawl te Areopakas a ti u awlcekna khonsil ah a ceh puei u tih , “ Nang lawng akawng alam na thui cangpueina a thaai te ming hamla ka ngaih u .
44017020	Na thui thaihu thli he kaimi haa yaak atah alakloela awm tih te ang thli thui ngaihna te ming ham ka ngaih u . ” a tina .
44017021	( Aaten khaaw kah thlaang thli oen te ah aka awm kamyin kamlai thli lawngah hukhueng la a yaak u thaihu thaai kawng te doet adap tih awl hutungna la atue atang te a hawna u . )
44017022	Pawl lawngah te khawpui kah awlcekna khonsil bawi thli haiah pai tih , “ Nangmi Aaten thlaang thli he bokna ben ah na tlungmu u tite ka ming .
44017023	Metihtiah na vang khuiah ka yingyawi tih nangmi lawng na bokna ahuen boeih te ka bueh vengah asawah , “ Ming Nawh Pathen Hamla ” tila na thut u bokna-thaang pakhat te ka huh . Nangmi lawng ming heet muehla na bok u te ni tahe ah nangmi teng kavan thui .
44017024	Dilai oen a khuiah aka awm thaihu soeprep saikung , vaan oen dilai kah Bawipa te tah thlaanghing kut oen a sak tempal bok-im ah awm nawh .
44017025	Ahih tah thlaang boeih tengah hingna oen hillsang yilh oen ah thaihu cungkuem pekung la a awm dawngah mami lawngah ahih ham bii te bi pe tih do adan hamla khatca khaw ngoe mai nawh .
44017026	Thlaang pakhat dawng kalawng thlaangphun boeih te a sai tih dilai pumpui ah a awm sak . Amah lawngah ahimi kah atue atang oen a awmna ham ahuen amawl te oepsoehla a nuen pe sut poen .
44017027	Ahih lawng tila a sai he tah ahimi lawng angaai ahuett u tih amah te a tlap u atah a huh thaina ham ni . Ataktang atah Pathen he mami a-u khat oen khaw thla aih nawh .
44017028	Thlaang pakhat lawng , ‘ Amah dawngah mami n'hing u , amah dawngah n'awm u tih n'tatvuet u . ’ tila a thui angla te awm . Namami kah tingtoenglung aka thlaak hue lawngkhaw , ‘ Mami khaw ahih kah cadil van ni ’ tila a thui angla te awm .
44017029	Mami tah Pathen kah ca-anau la n'awm u dawngah thlaanghing kah cuihna , thoemthaina oen a sai muei asam sui , ngun , lungto kutsaimueime oen ah Pathen he lo u tila mami lawng poek ham awm nawh .
44017030	Pathen amah te thlaanghing lawng a ming nawh vengkah atue atang te n'tu la khaw poek asam nawh , tede tahe atah khaaw tawm ram tawm kah thlaang boeih kah the-arana boeih te mangthawng taak hamla awl a peek poen .
44017031	Metihtiah amah lawng a tuek oepsoeh thlaang pakhat rang oen ah dilai pumpui he doengna oen awlcek hamla atue khawhin a nuen poen . Ahih lawng te thlaang te duekna kalawng a thawh sak rang oen thlaang boeih tengah asoengna te a tueng sak ! ” tila a thui .
44017032	Duekna kalawng thawhkoepna kawng Pawl lawng a thui te ahimi lawng a yaak u vengah thlaang khatsut lawng ahih te a nuihna u , tede thlaangtloe lawngtah , “ He kah akawng alam na thui he yaak koep ham ka ngaih u . ” a tina .
44017033	Tecoeng atah tunna kalawng Pawl te cet poen .
44017034	Thlaang khatsut tah Pawl oen te bawngyawng u , khonsil ah aka thuum van , ahimi khuikah thlaang pakhat Dionisias lawngkhaw Damaris aka miingna hutaa pakhat oen thlaang-tloe khatsut hue lawngtah a tangna u .
44018001	He coeng atah Aaten khaaw te Pawl lawng a thawh taak tih Kawrin khaaw la cet .
44018002	Sengpahrang sangluel Klaudias lawng Rom kalawng ah Judah thlaang boeih te a hek dawngah Itali ram kalawng a yu Priscilla oen haih aka law pek Pontas ram kah Akuila aka miingna Judah thlaang pakhat oen te ah te huh u . Pawl te ahih rawi yuvaa tengah te laiawm ,
44018003	Pawl khaw ahih rawi yuvaa angla saphaw riim-im saina oen tangka a dang van dawngah ahih rawi yuvaa tengah awm tih bii haih a bi u .
44018004	Ahih lawngah Sabbath khawhin roekk ah sinakok bok-im ah te awl a thui poepa , Judah thlaang oen Krik thlaang thli lawng a yaakming tih a tangna thai hamla te a yawm .
44018005	Macidonia kalawng Silas oen Timote avan pha hih atah Pawl lawng atue atang boeih te awlthang phawngna ham a hawna tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila Judah thlaang thli teng ah acairaula a thui pe .
44018006	Pawl te ahimi lawng a oel khaklal u tih ahih kawng te athela a thui u vengah a himbai dawngkah laidiik te a khoek thil tih , “ Nangmi lawng na ha-ata u atah namami kah thebuh la awm seh ! Ka sawah thoeng boel seh . Tahe kalawng tah Gental thlaang thli tengla ka cet poen ai . ” a tina .
44018007	Tedawngah ahimi te a ceh taak tih Pathen aka bok Gental thlaang pakhat Titias Jastas aka miingna im ah awm hamla cet ; ahih im tah sinakok bok-im a huben ah te awm .
44018008	Sinakok bok-im uktemkung Krispas oen a imkhuikaw boeih lawng-tah Bawipa te a tangna u ; Kawrin khaaw kah thlaangtloe thli lawngkhaw awlthang te a yaak u , a tangna u tih baptisma te a dang u .
44018009	Yiin at atah Pawl lawng huhthlaam a huh tih te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa lawng , “ Rih boel , toeng tlaih ohla awlthang te poe thui ,
44018010	metihtiah kai lawng kan awm puei dawngah a-u lawngkhaw nang te nganbawh n'yawkk sak manawh , he khawpui khuikah yahawh ngaai he tah kamah kah thlaang la ni a awm u . ” a tina .
44018011	Tedawngah Pawl tah kum at coeng kum vaang te ah te awm tih thlaangping te Pathen awl a cang puei .
44018012	Akhaia ah Kallio te Rom ram ukbawi la a awm veng atah Judah thlaang thli lawng cawitun u tih Pawl te a tuuk u coeng atah awlcekna yungim la te a khuen u .
44018013	Ahimi lawngah , “ He kah thlaang lawngah phungawl oen a kalh u la Pathen bok ham thlaangping te a suek ahalh ! ” a tina u .
44018014	Pawl lawng awl ka thui ai a ti vengah Kallio lawngah Judah thlaang thli nala te , “ He he athe ara lumlai pakhat mai aw , tinawh atah thawlhpalhna lumlai pakhat mai kawinih nangmi Judah thlaang thli sawah kawdaw thinsanna oen kaw ka poek ham theen .
44018015	Tede he tah awllung thli , miing thli oen namami kah phungawl kawngah awlpuungna la a awm dawngah namami lawng thui uh . Kai lawng he ang thaihu thli dawngah awl ka cek manawh ! ” a tina .
44018016	Tecoeng atah awlcekna yungim kalawng ahimi te a hek poen .
44018017	Ahimi boeih lawng sinakok uktemkung Sostenes te a tuuk u tih awlcekna yungim haiah te a bawh u . Tede Kallio lawngtah tete n'tu la khaw ngaai pe nawh .
44018018	Pawl he Kawrin khaaw ah khawhin sanhlang oengca thli oen a awm coengah ahimi te a ceh taak u tih Priscilla oen Akuila oen ah Siria khaaw la tuisangphaw oen cet haih u . Kenkhria khaaw kalawng tuisangphaw oen a ceh thlan ah awlkamna a sai dawngah a luu te bithliingla a vawkk .
44018019	Efesa khaaw te a pha u atah Pawl lawngah te ah te Priscilla oen Akuila te a ceh taak . Amah tah sinakok bok-im khuila cet tih Judah thlaang thli oen awl a thui u .
44018020	Te kah thlaang thli lawngtah asan hlang awm hamla a thlawh u de ahih lawng a thana .
44018021	Aceh tawm atah , “ Pathen lawng angaih atah nangmi tengla ka law koep ai . ” a tina . Tecoeng atah Efesa khaaw kalawng tuisangphaw oen cet .
44018022	Sisaria khaaw te a pha coeng atah Jerusalem la phaat cet tih khrihcabu te a voem a toei , tecoengah Antiok la poe cet .
44018023	Te ah te asanhlang a awm coeng atah te kalawng Galati peng oen Frikia peng la cet tih oengca boeih te thathluena awl a thui pe .
44018024	Tevengah te Alekzandria khaaw kah Apollos aka miingna Judah thlaang pakhat te Efesa khaaw la va law . Ahih tah awlthui a thoem tangkiik tih Caciim dawngkah awl te acek aneh la a ming .
44018025	Ahih lawngah Bawipa kah Lawngpui thuinuetna te a cang heet poen dawngah Jesuh kawng te asoeng akamla a cang puei tih thathluela a thui . Tede ahih lawngah Johan kah baptisma bueng te ni a ming .
44018026	Sinakok bok-im ah raltheenla awl a thui . Priscilla oen Akuila lawng ahih awlthui te a yaak hih vengah ahih te im la a ceh puei tih Bawipa kah Lawngpui te asoeng tare la a thuicaih pe hih .
44018027	Tecoengah Apollos tah Akhaia la ceh ham kamthlah , tedawngah Efesa kah oengca thli lawng Akhaia kah oengca thli tengah ca a thut pe u tih ahih he uem u langtah dodan uh a tina . Ahih te a pha veng atah Pathen kah lungvatna rang oen oengca la aka awm hue ham ah bawmcemkung theen koek la awm .
44018028	Rangpui haiah awl a oelh u vengah Caciim dawngkah awl te ahih lawng a thoel tih Jesuh tah Messiah ni tila a oelh tangtang atah Judah thlaang thli te a taa .
44019001	Kawrin khaaw ah Apollos a awm veng te ah , te kah peng te a hiil adawng tih Efesa khaaw te a pha . Te ah te hubang thli khatsut te a huh tih ,
44019002	Te atah , ‘ Nangmi lawng oengca la na coengg u vengah te Ciim Muithla na dang u poen aw ? tila ahimi te a doet . Tevengah ahimi lawng , “ Ciim Muithla awm tite a yaak pateng khaw ka yaak u moenih . ” ti u .
44019003	Tevengah Pawl lawngah , “ Tetih atah nangmi lawng me ang baptisma na dang u ? ” a tina . Ahimi lawngah , “ Johan kah baptisma ni ka dang u . ” a tina .
44019004	Pawl lawngah , “ Johan kah baptisma tah thawlhna aka yut thlaang thli ham ni , ahih lawng Israel thlaang thli tengah , ‘ Ka hu ah aka law te na tangna u ham awm ’ tila a thui te tah , Jesuh te ni . ” a tina .
44019005	Ahih lawng he awl he a yaak vengah Bawipa Jesuh miing ah baptisma te a dang u .
44019006	Pawl lawng ahimi sawah a kut a tloeng atah Ciim Muithla te ahimi sawah va law ; ahimi lawngah ming nawh awl la cal u tih Pathen awl te khaw a phawng u .
44019007	Ahimi tah a pum boeih la thlaang paha thlaihih yun tah awm u .
44019008	Pawl tah sinakok bok-im la te cet tih thla thum khui puet ah raltheenla thlaangping tengah awl a thui , ahimi oen ah awl a thui u pakcal tih Pathen Ram kawng te ahimi lawng a yaakmingna thai ham a yawm .
44019009	Tede khatsut tah amangkhak thlaang la a awm u dawngah tangna u nawh tih thlaang rangpui haiah Pathen kah Lawngpui along a-im te athela a thui u . Tedawngah ahimi te a ceh taak tih oengca thli te a ceh puei , hin roekk ah Tirannas cacangna im ah awl a thui pe .
44019010	He tila te kum hih khui a sai tih Asia ram ah aka awm thlaang boeih Judah oen Gental thlaang thli lawng Bawipa awl te a yaak u .
44019011	Pathen lawng Pawl rang oen ah aka awm nooek nawh kawpoekrai miknoekna te a sai .
44019012	Ahih kah a hawna kut thuutna baaipeen oen a raang dahna himbaica thli pateng khaw thlaangtlo thli tengla a khuen u vengah ahimi kah tlawhnatna hoeih tih raaithe aka khueh thlaang thli kah a kaw khui kalawng raaithe thli te co u .
44019013	Judah thlaang khatsut raaithe hek hamla aka yingyo thlaang thli lawngkhaw Jesuh miing te hawna ham a yawm u . Ahimi lawng raaithe thli nala te , “ Pawl lawng a phawng Jesuh miing oen ah awl kan peek , co u loeih , ” a tina .
44019014	Judah thlaang Khawsoeih Bawi Skeva capa thli pasarih lawngah he tila a sai u .
44019015	Tede raaithe lawng ahimi nala te , “ Jesuh te ka ming , Pawl khaw ka ming ; tede , nangmi he a-u ? ” a tina .
44019016	A kaw khuiah raaithe aka awm thlaang te lawngah ahimi te a hah doet thloet tih boeih a taa . Boengha a caak u tih hinaak himbai pawnsawi la ahih im kalawng heeng u .
44019017	Efesa ah aka awm Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang boeih lawng he kawng he a yaak u vengah a rih tangkiik u tih Bawipa Jesuh miing te a hinyah tare u .
44019018	Oengca thli khuikah thlaang broe lawngah law tih ahimi lawng a sai thli te rangpui haiah a phawng u .
44019019	Caam thoemthaina te aka hawna thlaang broe lawngah amami kah cabu thli te avan khuen tih rangpui haiah te hai dawngah a phum u . Ahimi lawng cabu phu te atoek asam u vengah apum boeih la ngun tangka thong sawm ngaa a pha .
44019020	He tila te Bawipa awl tah puung tare tih roeng hang .
44019021	He ang thaihu thli a awm hang coengah Pawl lawngah Macidonia ram oen Akhaia ram kalawng Jerusalem la ceh poe hamla kamthlah . Ahih lawngah , “ Tela te ka ceh coengah Rom khawpui la ka cet ai . ” ti .
44019022	Tedawngah amah bawmcemkung thlaang pahih Timote oen Erastas te Macidonia la a tuih , amah tah Asia ram khuiah atue san hlang a hawna .
44019023	Tevengah te Bawipa kah Lawngpui kawng dawngah Efesa khaaw ah awl puungna awm .
44019024	Demetrias aka miingna ngun thiidekung lawng rai pathennu Artimis kah tempal bok-im muei-ame thli te ngun oen a sai , ahih kah biibina oen ah biibikung thli lawng tangka a dang u .
44019025	Tedawngah amah kah bii aka bi thlaang thli oen amah angla bii tloe aka sai thli te khaw a khue tun tih ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi u , mami kah khuehtoen thaihu tah he kah biibina dawng kalawng ni n'dang u tite na ming u .
44019026	Tahe ah Pawl lawng a sai te nangmi lawng na huh thai tih na yaak thai u . Ahih lawngah , ‘ Thlaanghing lawng a sai pathen thli he pathen tangtang nawh ni ’ tila a thui tih Efesa khaaw oen Asia ram pum kah thlaang boeih te a yaakming sak poen .
44019027	Tedawngah mami kah biibina he miingthe a dang poen ai tite lakueng ham awm . Te bueng nawh tih Asia ram oen dilai pumpui kah thlaang lawng a bok rai pathennu Artimis kah bawilenna khaw yok vetih ahih kah tempal bok-im khaw apoeila awm poen ai tite lakueng ham awm ! ” a tina .
44019028	He awl he thlaangping lawng a yaak u vengah a thin sa soeh u tih , “ Efesa khaaw kah Artimis tah bawilen duet ni ” tila te paang u .
44019029	Te tila te khawpui khuiah cumplaam la tho u . Thlaangping lawngah Pawl oen yin aka cet haih Macidonia nam thlaang pahih Kaia oen Aristarkas te a tuuk u tih poei sai laamna-im la te aathamala a mawt u .
44019030	Pawl amah khaw thlaangping haiah te ceh ham a ngaih de oengca thli lawng ceh sak nawh .
44019031	Te peng kah aana khuehkung a paya khatsut hue lawngkhaw poei sai laamna-im la te ceh nawh hamla awl a tah u .
44019032	Te kah thlaangping thli te ngaihangtum luukiil haven la awm u : ahimi timkah thlaang yahawh ngaai lawngtah n'tu kawngah he tila ka tun u ti khaw a ming u nawh dawngah thlaang vaang lawng atloela paang u , atloe thlaangvaang lawng athloekla paang u .
44019033	Judah thlaang thli lawng Alekzandar te thlaangping hai la a ceh sak tih thlaang khatsut lawngtah ahih lawng ni awlpuungna he a thoeng sak cawini tila a poek u . Tecoeng atah Alekzandar lawng thlaangping te sap duem hamla a kut oen noekna a sai pe tih amah phungtuna awl te thui ham a yawm .
44019034	Tede ahimi lawng ahih te Judah thlaang ni tila a noek u vengah : “ Efesa khaaw kah Artimis tah bawilen duet ni ! ” tila te khawnoek pahih khui puet ah ruek ruek paang u .
44019035	Hukhueng atah te kah khawpui ah aana aka khueh cathutkung lawng thlaangping te a duem sak thai . Ahih lawng , “ Ka puei , Efesa thlaang thli , Efesa khaaw he tah alenduet Artimis tempal bok-im oen vaan kalawng aka tla thuk lungto cuem te doenkung la na awm u tite thlaang boeih lawng a ming u .
44019036	A-u lawngkhaw he tah oelh thai manawh . Tedawngah nangmi lawng duem na awm u ham awm tih poek muehla thaihu khat khaw sai ham awm nawh .
44019037	He rawi lawngah he tempal bok-im te khaw rot nawh tih mami kah pathennu kawng khaw athela thui nawh de ahih rawi he nangmi lawng he la navan khuen u .
44019038	Demetrias oen bii aka bi haih thlaang hue lawng a-u khaw tayacawi ham a khueh atah , aana khuehkung thli oen awlcekna yung oen ah awlcekna khawhin khaw mami lawng n'khueh u dawngah taya na cawi u thai ta .
44019039	Tede , apuehla na ngaih u atah pilnam rangpui tunna ah awl cek ham awm .
44019040	Tihin ah aka thoeng thaihu dawngah he , mami lawng ni awl puungna a thoeng sak tila m'peel hau ai ti he rih ham awm tih he tila a awm he akawng alam khaw atheenla n'thui u tang manawh . ” a tina .
44019041	He awl he a thui coeng atah thlaangping te a meel sak .
44020001	Awlpuungna te aboet coeng atah Pawl lawng oengca thli te a khue tun tih thathluena awl a thui pe coeng atah sading ngaimawngla an awm uh a tina . Tecoeng atah Makedonia ram la te cet .
44020002	Ahih lawngah te kah peng te a hiil adawng tih thathluena awl a thui pe , tecoeng atah Akhaia ram la te cet tih te ah te thla thum awm .
44020003	Siria ram la ceh ham cai de , Judah thlaang thli lawng ahuepla ngawn ham a teeng u tite a ming tih Macidonia ram benla ceh koep hamla te kamthlah .
44020004	Berea khaaw kah Piras capa Sopatar , Tesalon khaaw kah Aristarkas oen Sekunda ; Derbe khaaw kah Kaia ; Asia ram kah Tukhikas oen Trofimas mi te Timote lawng a ceh puei u .
44020005	Ahimi te lamhala cet u tih Troas khaaw ah kaimi te n'ring u .
44020006	Tawlru thuum nawh Takawi Poei a boeih coengah Filipi kalawng Kaimi khaw tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih hin ngaa coengah ahimi oen Troas ah ka huh u , te ah te khawhin hin rih ka cam u .
44020007	Yarh khat khuikah lamhacuek khawhin ah beroep lopaangna thlembuh veel haih hamla ka tun u . Avuen hin ah ceh ham a kamthlah u dawngah Pawl lawng thlaangping tengah yiinthuem toe ah awl a thui .
44020008	Kaimi ka tunna asaw im han ah haiim te moen a vaang u .
44020009	Cadawng pakhat Jutikas aka miingna te bangbuerh ah ngawl , Pawl lawng awl a thui lii vengah te ahih tah a mik kuu tih ngaam , ahula tah ip muelh tih im han apathumna kalawng dilai la tla thuk . Ahimi lawngah duek rawkk la a ruh u .
44020010	Tede Pawl te rum thuk tih ahih te koe a sambai , ayuh ayam tih a pooem . Ahih lawngah , “ Lakueng u boel , hing hun he ! ” a tina .
44020011	Tecoengah im han la koep cet , takawi a eh tih a caak u . Ahimi oen mincang khawthaih toe asanhlang awl a thui u coengah Pawl te cet .
44020012	Ahimi lawngah cadawng te sading la amah im la te a ceh puei u tih ahimi boeih tah a ngaimawng u .
44020013	Kaimi te tuisangphaw oen lamhala Asos khaaw la te ka cet u , te kalawng tuisangphaw oen Pawl oen ah ceh haih hamla ka kamthlah u . Amah tah lan lawngpui kalawng a law dawngah te tila sai ham avan thui .
44020014	Asos khaaw ah kaimi oen ka huh u tih tuisangphaw dawngah ka luui sak u , tecoengah Mitilin khaw la ka cet u .
44020015	Te kalawng ah tuisangphaw oen ka cet u tih avuen hin ah Khios tuisanglak ka pha u . Tecoeng awmvai hin atah Samos tuisanglak ka pha u tih awmvaivuen hin atah Militas khaaw te ka pha u .
44020016	Pawl lawngah Asia ram khuiah poei-apah ham ngaih nawh tih Efesa khaaw te kaan tih tuisangphaw oen ceh phaat ham kamthlah . Acoeng thai atah Pentikos khawhin vengah Jerusalem te aloela pha ham a ngaih .
44020017	Pawl lawngah Militas kalawng Efesa la thlaang a tuih tih khrihcabu ahaamca thli te ahih oen huh u hamla law u lah seh , tila awl a tah .
44020018	Ahimi te avan pha u veng atah Pawl lawng , “ Asia ram kavan pha peek kalawng nangmi teng ka awm khui puet ah atue khawhin metila ka hawna tite na ming u .
44020019	Judah thlaang thli lawng ngawn hamla n'teeng poepa u dawngah rai-acangna ka teng ah a pai vengah khaw , Bawipa kah tuihyoeihthlaang la ka awm van angla kawdaw thinsan oen ah bii ka bi .
44020020	Thlaang rangpui haiah khaw , namami im ah khaw , nangmi kah hoeikhangna koei te khatca khaw thuh phah muehla ka thui tih kan cang puei u te na ming u .
44020021	Pathen haiah na thawlhna yut tih mami kah Bawipa Jesuh te na tangna u ham Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang khaw avan at la ngaithuenna rep kan peek u poen .
44020022	Tahe atah Ciim Muithla kah awl te ka ngaai tih Jerusalem la ka cet ai , te ah te ka sawah n'tu thaihu aka thoeng ai tite ka ming nawh .
44020023	Ka phana boeih khaaw roekk ah Ciim Muithla lawng ah ngaithuenna m'peek tih thongtlaak oen raina lawng kai he n'ring khuep ti bueng he ni ka ming .
44020024	Tede ka hingna he n'tu la khaw ka ngaai mai nawh ; kai ham avan thloem bii oen ah kai lawng sai hamla Bawipa Jesuh lawng m'peek bii te coeng ham bueng ni ka ngaih . Te tah Pathen kah lungvatna kawng Awlthang Theen phawng ham he ni .
44020025	Kai lawngah nangmi boeih te khok kan hiil tih Pathen ram kawng te kavan thui u . Tede tahe kalawng tah a-u khat lawngkhaw kai he koep nan hu u tlaih manawh tite ka ming .
44020026	Tedawngah tihin nangmi tengah ataktang kavan thui ; nangmi timkah pakhat khat khaw na ha-ata u mai atah ka sawah tla boel seh .
44020027	Metihtiah Pathen kah a kamthlahna te thuh phah muehla apum boeih la nangmi tengah biit kavan thui poen .
44020028	Tedawngah namah oen namah te ngaithuen u langtah nangmi lawng na doen hamla Ciim Muithla lawng m'peek tuu thli te doen-acaang u lah . Pathen lawng amah Capa duekna rang oen amah koe la a khueh Pathen Khrihcabu tuudoen la te awm u lah .
44020029	Kai ka ceh coeng atah nangmi tim ah metaang tluung thli te law u vetih ahimi lawng tuuca thli te a sa sueng sak manawh tite ka ming .
44020030	Namami tim kah thlaang khatsut lawngah oengca thli te amami ben la mawt ham a ngaih dawngah hoem awl a thuina atue te a pha ai .
44020031	Tedawngah ngaithuen uh , kum thum khui puet ah khawyiin khawdaai mikphi oen kan cang puei u te hilh u boel .
44020032	Tahe tah nangmi he Pathen kah doencangna oen amah kah lungvatna awlthang khuiah kan peek u poen , te lawngah nangmi te n'roeng sak vetih amah kah thlaang boeih hamla a toen oepsoeh yotheen kam-awmna te m'peek ai .
44020033	Kai lawngah a-u kah sui khaw , ngun khaw , hinaak himbai khaw ka naai nawh .
44020034	Ka paya laikoei thli oen kamah kah ngoe ngaihna boeih te dang hamla kamah lawng ka kut oen bii ka bi te nangmi lawng na ming u .
44020035	Mami lawng voetna aka awm thlaang thli te bawmcemna ham bii te bi ham awm tite soeprep boeih ah kan huh sak poen . Bawipa Jesuh amah lawng , ‘ Dangna lak ah peekna he yo-akam awm ngaai ’ tila a thui awl te hilh u boel . ” a tina .
44020036	Pawl lawng awl a thui coeng atah ahimi oen haih khuklu oen cuengkueng u tih thangthui u .
44020037	Ahimi boeih lawng rap u tih Pawl te khak a kawp u , a mok u tih sadingla cet ne , a tina u .
44020038	Pawl lawng ahimi nala te , ‘ Kai he koep nan hu u tlaih manawh ’ a tina dawngah a kaw the u . Tecoeng atah Pawl te tuisangphaw a awmna la a thak u .
44021001	Kaimi lawngkhaw ahimi nala te sadingla awm uh ka tina coeng atah ka cet u . Tuisangphaw oen phaat ka cet u tih Kos tuisanglak te ka pha u ; avuen hin atah Rodis tuisanglak ka pha u ; te kalawng Patara la ka cet u .
44021002	Te ah te Fonicia la aka cet tuisangphaw pakhat ka huh u tih te oen ah te ka cet u .
44021003	Saipras tuisanglak a tuengna huen te ka pha u atah adang ben kalawng ka reel u tih Siria la te ka cet u . Turon khaaw atah lan la ka rum u , te ah te tuisangphaw dawngah thaihu a phueih te a sat u .
44021004	Te ah te oengca thli thlaang khatsut ka huh u tih ahimi tengah hin rih ka awm u . Pawl te Jerusalem la ceh nawh hamla ahimi lawng Muithla kah huham tharana oen a thui pe u .
44021005	Tede ahimi tengah khawhin hih rih ka awm u coeng atah ka cet u . Ahimi boeih oen a yu a ca thli lawng khawpui adauben tuikeeng toe la n'thak u , te ah te khuklu oen ka cuengkueng u tih ka thangthui u .
44021006	Tecoeng atah khat oen khat kut ka tuuk u coeng atah kaimi tah tuisangphaw dawng ka luui u , ahimi tah im la koep meel u .
44021007	Turon kalawng ka cet u tih Tolimas te ka pha u . Te ah te oengca thli oen ka voem ka toei u tih ahimi tengah hin at ka cam u .
44021008	Avuen khawhin ah ka cet u tih Sisaria khaaw te ka pha u . Te ah te , Jerusalem ah bawmkung la a tuek u thlaang pasarih khuiah aka thuum van awlthang phawngkung Filip im ah ka pah u .
44021009	Ahih lawng Pathen awl aka phawng a canu hulaa palii a khueh .
44021010	Te ah te asanhlang ka cam u coengah Akabas aka miingna tawngha te Judia ram kalawng avan pha .
44021011	Ahih te kaimi tengla law tih Pawl kah cihin te a lawh , a kut oen a khow te a piin tih , “ Ciim Muithla lawng tila avan thui : He kah cihin khuehkung he Jerusalem ah Judah thlaang thli lawng he tila a piin vetih Gental thlaang thli kut ah a peek ai . ” tila a thui .
44021012	He awl he kaimi lawng ka yaak u veng atah kaimi oen te kah aka awm thlaangtloe hue lawng Jerusalem la ceh nawh ham Pawl te ka thlawh u .
44021013	Tede ahih lawng , “ Me tih na ti u , he tila na rah u he ka thin navan hoepp sak u ! Jerusalem ah piin ayeen ham bueng oepsoehla ka awm nawh , te ah te Bawipa Jesuh kawngah duek ham pateng khaw oepsoehla ka awm poen . ” a tina .
44021014	Kaimi lawng ahih te ka thlawh u thai tlaih nawh , ka toeng u tih , “ Bawipa kawngaih hawn seh . ” ka tina u .
44021015	Te ah te kawlkalh ka cam u coeng atah kamami kah thaihu te ka roek ka bah u tih Jerusalem la te ka cet u .
44021016	Sisaria khaaw kah hubang thli khatsut khaw kaimi oen ka cet haih u tih kaimi lawng ka pahna koei Manason im la te n'ceh puei u . Ahih tah Saipras khaaw kah thlaang , acuekca kalawng oengca la aka awm poen ni .
44021017	Jerusalem la te kaimi ka pha u atah oengca thli lawng awmngaihcala n'do u .
44021018	Avuen atah Jeem te huh hamla Pawl oen kaimi haih ka cet u ; Khrihcabu ahaamca boeih khaw te ah te awm u .
44021019	Pawl lawng ahimi te kut a tuuk tih amah kah biibina rang oen Gental thlaang tim ah Pathen lawng a sai thaihu boeih te biit a thui pe
44021020	Ahih awl te a hutung u coeng atah ahimi boeih lawng Pathen te a thangpawm u . Tecoengah ahimi lawng , “ Maya Pawl , Judah thlaangphun toeklek nawh oengca la awm u poen tih ahimi lawng Phungawl a thintlawhna mangkhak te na ming poen .
44021021	Gental ram ah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih te Mosi kah Phungawl te hoett hamla , a ca thli te yahhuivuen reet nawh ham khaw , Judah phung alam te khaw vai tlaih nawh hamla nang lawng na cang puei tila ahimi lawng a thui u .
44021022	He la nang navan pha khaw a ming u poen cawini . Te tih atah me tih ni n'ti u lah ai ?
44021023	Kaimi lawngtah he tila na sai ham ka ngaih u . He ah he awlkamna aka sai thlaang palii awm .
44021024	Ahimi he ceh puei langtah bokna benkah ciimcaihna siing te sai puei van , nang lawngah tangka te kawnn peh , te atah ahimi lawng a luu te a vawkk bling thai ai . He tila na sai atah ahimi lawng nang kawng a thui u te atak tang nawh ni tila thlaang boeih lawng a ming u vetih namah khaw Mosi kah Phung awl angla ni khaw a sak van tite a ming u ai .
44021025	Tede oengca la aka awm Gental thlaang thli ham tah ahimi lawng kutsaimuei bokna ah a nawn u khatsut caak awkk te caak nawh ham , sathi caak nawh ham , ramsa rawn khak sa te caak nawh ham , ahimi lawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna te kuemsuem hamla mami kah awl tloekna ca te ahimi tengah m'pat pe u poen . ” a tina u .
44021026	Tedawngah avuen atah te kah thlaang thli te Pawl lawng a ceh puei tih ahimi oen bokna siing angla ciimcaihna te a sai u . Tecoengah Pawl te Tempal bok-im la cet tih ciimcaihna atue atang he aboet toe ah khawhin meyoeh a awm ai , ahimi pakhat rip ham luciik nawnna atue te mevengah n'sai ai tite oepsoehla a thui pe .
44021027	Tede khawhin hin rih te aboet tawm veng atah Asia ram kalawng aka law Judah thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im khuiah Pawl te a huh u . Ahimi lawngah thlaangping te a ceemtuh u tih Pawl te a tuuk u .
44021028	Ahimi lawngah , “ Israel thlaang thli , n'bawm u lah ! Ahih he khaaw tawm ah cet tih Israel thlaang thli khaw , Mosi kah Phungawl oen Tempal bok-im he khaw Oelhtaih hamla thlaang boeih te a cang puei . Tecoengah tahe ah Gental thlaang khatsut te Tempal bok-im khuila avan law puei tih he huen ciim he a hok a aih ” tila paang u .
44021029	( Efesa khaaw kah Trofimas oen Pawl te khawpui khuiah a huh haih u tih Pawl lawng ahih te Tempal bok-im khuila avan law puei tila a poek u dawngah te tila paang u . )
44021030	Khawpui pum te tokcaliik la tho u , thlaang boeih lawng heeng u , Pawl te a tuuk u tih Tempal bok-im adaubenla aathamala a mawt u . Tempal bok-im thawhka te pahoei a khaih u .
44021031	Tokcaliik la aka tho thlaangping lawng Pawl te ngawn ham kamthlah u , Jerusalem khawpui pum ah cumplaam la tho khuengdeng u poen tite Rom raalbawipa lawng a yaak .
44021032	Raalbawipa lawng raalkap bawi oen raalkap thli oen ah aathamala pahoei cet u . Thlaangping lawng raal bawipa oen raalkap thli te a huh u vengah Pawl a bawh u te a toeng u .
44021033	Raalbawipa te Pawl tengla cet , a tuuk tih thiirui pahih oen a khih sak . Tecoengah ahih lawng , “ He kah thlaang he a-u , n'tu thawlhna a sai ? ” tila a doet u .
44021034	Thlaangping khatsut lawng atloela paang u tih , khatsut lawng athloekla paang u van . Thlaangping kah paang awl dawngah awlpuungna taktak te Raalbawipa lawng a ming thai nawh dawngah Pawl te raaltoetna vawngup khuila khuen hamla raalkap thli te awl a peek .
44021035	Thlakkung te a pha tawm u atah thlaangping te tlungsa soeh aih tih raalkap thli lawng Pawl te a pawm hang u .
44021036	Thlaangping lawng a hu ah avan vai u tih , “ Ngawn uh . ” tila te ruek paang u .
44021037	Raalkap thli lawng Pawl te raaltoetna vawngup khuila a khuen tawm u atah Raalbawipa nala te , “ Na tengah awl ka thui thai ai aw ? ” a tina . Raalbawipa lawngah , “ Krik awl na cal thai aw ? ” a tina tih ,
44021038	“ Tetih atah n'hu vengah thlaang thonglii awva oen ceem la a thawh puei tih ramhum rammawl la aka ceh puei Iyipt thlaang te nang nawh macawi ? ” a tina .
44021039	Pawl lawng awl a thung pe tih , “ Kai tah Judah thlaang ni , Cilicia ram , Tarsas khawpui miing thaang kah thlaang ni . Reenna oen thlaangping tengah awl n'thui sak lah . ” a tina .
44021040	Raalbawipa lawng awl a thui sak . Te atah Pawl te thlakk dawng pai tih thlaangping te sap duem ham a kut oen noekna a peek . Thlaangping lawng awl a phah sap u coeng atah ahimi tengah Hebru awl la Pawl lawng awl a thui pe .
44022001	“ Maya manau thli oen a pa hue , nangmi haiah kamah ka phungtuna awl he hutung u lah ! ” a tina .
44022002	Ahimi tengah Hebru awl la a thui pe te a yaak u vengah awl a phah dingri u ; Pawl lawngah :
44022003	“ Kai he Cilicia ram Tarsas khaaw kah Judah thlaang ni , tede , Jerusalem ah he ka roeng hang tih Gamaliel kah sengcamoe la ka awm . Kai lawng mami patuer hue kah Phungawl oen thuituen-na te ka dang tih tihin ah he kah aka awm nangmi boeih angla Pathen tengah ka tlungmu van .
44022004	Kai lawngah he kah lawngpui aka vai thlaang thli te ka heem ka tek tih ka ngawn . Kai lawng hutaa khaw tawngpa khaw ka tuuk tih thong ah ka thlaak .
44022005	Kai lawng awltak ka thui tite Khawsoeih Bawi oen awlcekna Khonsil ah aka thuum boeih aka mingkung sausi la awm . Ahimi lawngah Damaskas khaw kah Judah thlaang thli tengah a thut pe u ca te khaw kai lawng ka lawh , tecoeng atah te kah thlaang thli te tuuk hamla , ahimi te thiirui oen khih tih dan tat ham Jerusalem la koep van khuen hamla te ka cet . ” a tina .
44022006	Damaskas khaaw la ka cet tih ka pha tawm veng hingthun ah te vaan kah aangna pakhat lawng n'thue ploeng tih ka teng ka vaai te aang rawngtheng .
44022007	Dilai ah ka tlim tih awl pakhat lawng , ‘ Sawl , Sawl ! N'tu ah kai he nan heem nan tek aih ? ’ tila a thui awl te ka yaak .
44022008	Kai lawngah , ‘ Bawipa , nang te a-u ? ’ ka tina . Ahih lawngah , ‘ Kai tah nang lawng nan heem nan tek Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh ni ’ tila avan thui .
44022009	Kai oen ka cet haih thlaang thli lawng aangna te a huh u de ka tengah awl aka thuikung kah awl te tah ya u nawh .
44022010	Tevengah kai lawng , ‘ N'tu ka sai ai , Bawipa ! ’ tila ka doet tih Bawipa lawngah , ‘ Tho langtah Damaskas la cet , te ah te nang lawng na sai ham koei Pathen lawng avan khueh thaihu boeih te avan thui ai . ’ tila avan thui .
44022011	Te kah aangna lawng ka mik avan tueng sak tlaih nawh dawngah ka cet haih ka puei thli lawng Damaskas khaaw la te a kut oen m'mawt u .
44022012	Te khawpui khuiah Ananias aka miingna thlaang pakhat awm , ahih tah bokna ben ah tlungmu tih mami kah Phungawl te a vai , te ah aka awm Judah thlaang boeih lawng a hinyah tangkiik u .
44022013	Ahih te law tih ka tengah pai , ‘ Ka manau Sawl , na mik tueng loeih seh ! ’ n'tina . Teveng roe te ah ka mik tueng pahoei tih ahih te ka huh .
44022014	Ahih lawng , ‘ Mami patuer hue kah Pathen lawng amah kawngaih te ming hamla amah kah aka doeng tuihyoeihthlaang te huh sak ham oen ah amah awl roe oen a thui awl te yaak hamla nang he n'tuek poen .
44022015	Metihtiah nang lawng na huh tih na yaak boeih te thlaang boeih tengah thui hamla nang he a hih ham aka mingkung sausi la na awm ai .
44022016	Tahe ah n'tu na ring khiing ? Tho langtah baptisma te dang loeih , amah tengah thangthuina rang oen na thawlhna boeih te sil loeih ’ tila avan thui .
44022017	“ Jerusalem la te koep ka cet tih Tempal bok-im khuiah ka thangthui vengah huhthlaam pakhat ka huh ,
44022018	te kah huhthlaam dawngah Bawipa te ka huh tih ahih lawngah , ‘ He kah aka awm thlaang thli lawng kai kah kawng alam na thui he a do u nawh dawngah Jerusalem he ceh taak loeih , uelh tlaih boel . ’ tila avan thui .
44022019	Tevengah kai lawng , ‘ Bawipa , Sinakok boeih ah ka cet tih nang aka tangna thlaang thli te ka tuuk tih ka bawh te ahimi lawng atheenla a ming u .
