44022020	Tecoengah nang kah sausi la aka awm Stefen te a ngawn u vengah te kamah khaw ka awm , ahih te ngawn ham ka ngaih puei van tih ahih aka ngawnkung thli kah hi-acuu te ka khoem pe . ’ ka tina .
44022021	Bawipa lawngah , ‘ Cet loeih , athla hlang la aka awm Gental thlaang thli tengla nang he kan tuih ai . ’ n'tina ” tila a thui pe .
44022022	He toe ah Pawl lawng awl a thui te tah thlaangping lawng a hutung u de , tecoeng atah awl a huer u tare tih , “ Te kah thlaang te thip uh ! Ngawn loeih ! Ahih te hing paa nawh ni ! ” tila paang u .
44022023	Ahimi lawngah paang u , a him-bai thli te a thlek u tih laidiik te vaan la a heh u .
44022024	Judah thlaang thli lawng paang u tih a oel khaklal u te ming ham ah ahih te raaltoetna vawngup la khuen ham oen ah cungpoelh oen tam hamla a raalkap thli te awl a peek .
44022025	Tede ahih te cungpoelh oen bawh hamla ahimi lawng a piin u vengah te Pawl lawng te kah aka pai raalkapbawi nala te , “ Rom thlaang pakhat he awl na cek thlan ah na bawh praap he upadi phung poen aw ? ” a tina .
44022026	He awl he raalkapbawi lawng a yaak vengah raalbawipa tengla cet tih , “ Ahih he Rom thlaang ni ! Metila ka sai ai na ti ? ” tila a doet .
44022027	Te atah raalbawipa lawng Pawl tengla cet tih a doet , “ Nang he Rom thlaang aw ? Van thui lah . ” a tina . Pawl lawngah , “ Oeih , kai tah Rom thlaang ni ” a tina .
44022028	Raalbawipa lawng , “ Kai lawngtah tangka ka peek tih Rom thlaang la ka coengg ” a tina . Pawl lawngah , “ Kai tah Rom thlaang roe la ka thang ” a tina .
44022029	Tevengah Pawl te awl ka doet ai aka ti thlaang thli te pahoei nawng u ; Pawl he Rom thlaang ni tite raalbawipa lawng a ming vengah thiirui oen a khih hau te caalla lakueng .
44022030	Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl he thawlh a peel u te acek aneh la raalbawipa lawng ming ham a ngaih ; tedawngah avuen hin atah Pawl a piinna thiirui te a thlam pe , khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli te ngawlh tun ham awl a peek . Tecoeng atah Pawl te ahimi haiah a pai sak .
44023001	Pawl lawng Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli te a bueh rangpatang tih , “ Ka puei , Israel thlaang thli ! Kai tah tahe toe ah khaw ka sakna dawngah athe atheen mingna thinkaw he Pathen haiah ciim . ” a tina .
44023002	Khawsoeih bawi Ananias lawng Pawl tengah aka pai thlaang thli nala te , ‘ Pawl te a kaa ah bel pingmal uh , ’ a tina .
44023003	Tevengah Pawl lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang , abawk vuut vawngpui , Pathen lawng namah te m'bel malcal seh ! Nang lawngah kai he Phungawl angla awl cek hamla te ah te na ngawl van de kai he bel hamla awl na peek dawngah Phungawl te na phe poen ! ” a tina .
44023004	Pawl tengah aka pai thlaang thli lawng ah te , “ Nang lawngah Pathen kah Khawsoeih Bawi na sal na phaam ! ” a tina u .
44023005	Pawl lawng , “ Ka puei , Israel thlaang thli , ahih he Khawsoeih Bawi ni tite ka ming nawh dawngah ni . Caciim lawngah , ‘ Na thlaang phun ukkung te athela thui boel , ’ tila a thui ta ” a tina .
44023006	Te kah thlaangvaang te Sadusi thlaang tih thlaang vaang te tah Farasi thlaang ni tite Pawl lawng a huh vengah awlcekna Khonsil ah te paang tih , “ Ka puei , Israel thli , Kai he Farasi thlaang pakhat ni , Farasi thlaang thli kah capa ni . Thlaang duek thli tho koep ai tite ngaiuepna ka khueh dawngah ni he ah he awl n'khee u . ” tila a thui .
44023007	He tila a thui coeng khoeng atah Farasi thlaang thli oen Sadusi thli te awl puung u tih pahih la pek u .
44023008	( Sadusi thlaang thli lawngtah thlaang duek thli he koep tho tlaih nawh tih vanthlaang khaw , muithla khaw awm nawh tila a thui u ; tede Farasi thlaang thli lawngtah te ang thli boeih te awm tangtang tila a tangna u . )
44023009	Ahimi kah awlpuungna awl te san tare hang tih Farasi thlaang timkah cangpueikung khatsut te pai u tih : “ He kah thlaang dawngah he a thawlhna khat khaw ka hu u nawh ! Muithla pakhat lawngkhaw , vanthlaang lawngkhaw a thui pe thai mai ta ” tila a oelh khaklal u .
44023010	Awlpuungna te solaan tare hang tih Pawl te petpet a doek u hau mai ai ti tih lakueng u . Tedawngah raalkap thli te thlaangping tengla a tuih tih , ‘ Pawl te ceh puei u langtah raaltoetna vawngup la khuen uh ’ a tina .
44023011	Te kah khawyiin ah te Bawipa tah Pawl tengah pai tih , “ Rih boel ! Jerusalem ah he kai ham sausi la na pai angla Rom khawpui ah khaw he tila na pai hun ai . ” a tina .
44023012	Avuen mincang atah Judah thlaang khatsut te tun huh u tih , khaw a khaan u . Ahimi lawngah Pawl te ngawn thlan roekk atah caak awkk khaw caak nawh hamla awl a taap u .
44023013	He tila khaw aka khaan thlaang thli te sawmlii thlai awm u .
44023014	Tecoengah ahimi lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli tengla cet u tih , “ Kaimi lawng Pawl he ka ngawn u thlan khui roekk tah thaihu khat khaw caak nawh ham athe ka phoei u tih awl ka taap u poen .
44023015	Tedawngah nangmi oen Khonsil ahaamca thli lawng ahih kawng te acek aneh la doet tare ham aka ngaih angla te sa u langtah nangmi tengah Pawl te avan khuen u thai ham Rom raalbawipa te yaak sak uh . He la he avan pha thlan ah ngawn hamla oepsoehla ka awm u ai ” tila a thui pe u .
44023016	Tede Pawl ngannu kah a capa lawng te tila a teeng u kawng te a yaak ; raaltoetna vawngup la cet tih Pawl tengah a thui pe .
44023017	Tecoengah Pawl lawng raalbawi pakhat te a khue tih , “ Raalbawipa tengla cadawng he cet puei , pakhat khat thui pe ham a khueh cawini ” a tina .
44023018	Raalbawi lawng ahih te raalbawipa tengla a ceh puei tih , “ Thongtla Pawl lawng , ‘ he kah cadawng lawng he nang tengah awl thui ham a khueh , ceh puei , ’ a ti dawngah kavan law puei ” a tina .
44023019	Raalbawipa lawng a kut ah a mawt tih atloela a ceh puei , “ Kai tengah n'tu awl thui ham na khueh ? ” a tina .
44023020	Ahih lawngah , “ Khonsil ah aka thuum thlaang thli lawng , Pawl kawng he acek aneh la ming heet ham aka ngaih angla te sa u silang Pawl te Khonsil ah van khuen thuk ham thangvuen ah bih hamla Judah aana khuehkung thli a kaw vai u poen .
44023021	Ahimi awl te ngaai pe boel ; metihtiah thlaang sawmlii thlai lawng thuh u tih ahih te a mah u . Ahimi lawng Pawl te a ngawn thlan khui caak awkk khaw caak nawh ham awl a taap u poen . Ahimi lawng sai hamla oepsoehla awm u poen tih nang kah awl ni doek a lamtoen u poen ” a tina .
44023022	Raalbawipa lawng , “ Ka tengah navan thui he a-u khat tengah khaw thui boel . ” a tina tih cadawng te koep a tuih .
44023023	Tecoengah raalbawipa lawng raalkapbawi pahih te a khue tih , “ Raalkap yahnih , marang raalkap sawmsarih , cai aka pawm raalkap yahnih te khue langtah n'tu yiin khawnoek pakua ah Sisaria la ceh ham kamthlah oepsoeh uh .
44023024	Pawl lawng a cit ham marang pakhat ah roekbah pe langtah ram ukbawi Filik tengla ading asuekla pha sak uh ” a tina .
44023025	Tecoengah raalbawipa lawng adangkah angla ca a thut tih a pat :
44023026	“ Klaudias Lisias lawng Hinyah koei ram ukbawi Filip tengah ca kavan pat :
44023027	Judah thlaang thli lawng he kah thlaang he a tuuk u tih a ngawn dalh u . Ahih he Rom thlaang ni tila ka ming u dawngah raalkap thli oen ka cet u tih ka thlawn u .
44023028	Ahimi lawng thawlh a peel u te ming ham ka ngaih tih amami kah awlcekna Khonsil la ka ceh puei .
44023029	Ahih lawngah duekna koei oen thongtlaakna koei khat khaw sai nawh tite ka huh ; ahih he thawlh a peel u tah amami kah phungawl kawng alam ni .
44023030	Ahih he ngawn hamla a teeng u tite ka yaak vengah , nang tengah tuih pahoei ham ka poek . Ahih he taya aka cawi hue te nang tengah taya cawi ham ka thui pe poen . Na sa ding seh . ” tila a thut pe .
44023031	Raalkap thli lawng a thui pe angla te a sai u . Ahimi lawngah te yiin ah te Antipatris toela Pawl te a ceh puei u .
44023032	Avuen hin atah cai aka pawm raalkap thli oen raalkap yahnih te tah raaltoetna vawng up la meel u tih marangcit raalkap thli lawng Pawl te poe a ceh puei u .
44023033	Ahimi lawngah Sisaria te a pha u atah ram ukbawi te ca a peek u tih ahih kut ah Pawl te a tloeng pe u .
44023034	Ram ukbawi lawng ca te a tae coeng atah Pawl nala te , ‘ Nang he ame ram kah ’ tila a doet . Cilicia ram kah thlaang ni tite a ming coeng atah ,
44023035	Ahih lawngah , “ Nang te taya aka cawikung thli avan pha u vengah nang kah lumlai he kavan thui badai ” a tina . Tecoengah Pawl te ram ukbawi amah kah yungimpui ah khueh tih raalkap thli lawng toet hamla awl a peek .
44024001	Khawhin hin ngaa a awm coeng atah Khawsoeih Bawi Ananias tah Judah thlaang khatsut hue oen thlaangcal Tertullas oen haih Sisaria la cet u . Ahimi te ram ukbawi Filik tengla cet u tih Pawl te taya a cawi u .
44024002	Pawl te a khue u tih thlaangcal Tertullas lawng adangkah angla thawlhpeelna te a thui : “ Hinyah koei ram ukbawi ! Nang lawngah cuihna oen nan mawt u dawngah roeproeina asanhlang la awm tih ram theenna ham ah tlaih pan ham angoena boeih te na tlaih poen .
44024003	Ame huen ah khaw te tila na sai dawngah kaimi ka awmngaih tih kan uem u tangkiik .
44024004	Nang kah atue atang te asan-hlang hawna ham ka ngaih nawh , tede atoila ka thui he na hutung hamla reenna kavan bih .
44024005	Kaimi lawng he kah thlaang he thlaang teekyaakkung la ka huh u : ahih lawng he dilai pum kah Judah thlaang thli tengah awlpuungna a sai tih Nazarin bu kah mawtkung la awm ,
44024006	Tempal bok-im khaw hok-aih hamla a yawm vengah te ka tuuk u . ( Kaimi lawng kamami kah Phungawl angla awl cek ham ka kamthlah u ,
44024007	tede raalbawipa Lisias law tih ahih he kaimi kut dawngkah a rot .
44024008	Tecoengah ahih he taya aka cawikung thli te nang tengla law ham awl a peek . ) He kah thlaang he nang lawng awl na doet atah kaimi lawng thawlh ka peel boeih te namah lawng na ming badai . ” a tina .
44024009	Judah thlaang thli lawng-khaw ruek kawhuui u tih thawlh a peel he asoeng tang tang ni tila a thui u .
44024010	Ram ukbawi lawng Pawl te awl thui ham noekna a peek tih Pawl lawngah , “ Nang tah he thlaangphun sawah kum san hlang awlcekkung la na awm poen tite ka ming , kamah phungtuna awl he na haiah nan thui sak dawngah ka awmngaih .
44024011	Jerusalem la Pathen bok ham ka cet , hin ha thlaihih pateng awm nawh hun tite nang lawng na ming thai ai .
44024012	Tempal bok-im khuiah thlaang pakhat khat oen ka tawh ka thaam u khaw , khawpui khui ame ang huen ah khaw , Sinakok bok-im khuiah khaw , kai lawng thlaangping ka ceemtuh tite Judah thlaang thli lawng hu manawh .
44024013	Tahe ah ahimi lawng ka sawah thawlhpeelna he asoengna tangtang te nang tengah van thui u tang manawh .
44024014	Ka sai tangtang tila nang tengah ka thui tah he ni : Ahimi lawng soeng nawh a ti u , Lawngpui te ka vai tih kamami patuer hue kah Pathen te ka bok . Tede kai lawngkhaw Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli kah cabu dawng a thut boeih te ka tangna . Thlaangthe khaw , thlaang theen khaw , duekna kalawng tho koep ai tite ahimi angla kai lawngkhaw ka ngaiuep van .
44024015	Ahimi lawngah thlaang boeih he thlaangdoeng oen thlaangthawlh khaw duekna kalawng tho ai tila Pathen ah ngaiuepna a khueh u te ang van ni kai lawngkhaw ka khueh van .
44024016	Tedawngah Pathen oen thlaanghing haiah athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim khueh hamla ka sai thai khui tah ka sai poepa .
44024017	Kum san hlang Jerusalem kalawng athlana la awm coengah ka thlaangphun thli hamla tangka thak ham , luciik nawn hamla te la te ka cet .
44024018	Bokna siing angla ciimcaihna te ka sai boet coengah Tempal bok-im khuiah luciik thawthuengna ka sai vengah kai he ahimi lawng n'huh u . Tevengah te ka tengah thlaangping khaw awm nawh , awlpuungna khaw awm nawh .
44024019	Tede , te ah te Asia ram kalawng aka law Judah thlaang khatsut tah awm ; ahimi lawng kai he oelhtaih ham a ngaih u atah tayacawi hamla amami man nang tengah a law u ham awm de ta .
44024020	Tetih atah he kah aka awm thlaang hue lawngah Khonsil ahaamca thli haiah ka pai vengah kai lawng ka sai thawlh a huh u te van thui u seh .
44024021	Kai lawng ahimi haiah ka pai vengah : ‘ Thlaangduek thli he tho koep ai tila ka tangna dawngah tihin ah nangmi lawng taya nan cawi u he . ’ tila ka thui pakhat bueng he nawh atah atloe a awm atah van thui u seh . ” a tina .
44024022	Filik lawngtah lawngpui a ti u te a ming heet dawngah awl thuina te a toeng sak tih , ahimi nala , ‘ Raalbawipa Lisias avan pha vengah nangmi kah Lumlai he kavan tloek badai . ” a tina .
44024023	Ahih lawng Pawl aka toet raalkapbawi te ahih he atheenla toet , tede ahoerpoengla awm sak langtah angoe angaih thli te khaw a paya thli lawng pe seh . ’ a tina .
44024024	Khawhin meyoeh yun nuem a awm coeng atah Filik he a yu Judah nu Drusilla oen va law hih . Ahih lawng Pawl te a khue tih Pawl lawng Jesuh Khrih ah oengna kawng a thui te a hutung hih .
44024025	Tede Pawl lawngah theenna kawng , mah oen mah kuemsuemna kawng oen Awlcekna Khawhin a lawna kawng te a thui vengah Filik lawng caalla a rih tih , “ Tahe tah cet de ne . Ka hoeng vengah kan khue sak koep badai . ” a tina .
44024026	Te ah te ahih lawngah Pawl lawng he tangka m'peek ai tila a ngaiuep , tedawngah ni ahih lawng Pawl te a khue sak poepa tih awl a thui puei .
44024027	Khaw kum hih a awm coeng atah Filik te Porcias Fitas lawng avan thaw tih ram ukbawi la awm . Filik lawng Judah thlaang thli te a kaw hoe sak ham a ngaih dawngah Pawl te thong khuiah poe a khueh .
44025001	Fitas te hin thum a awm coeng atah te ram la te avan pha tih Sisaria kalawng Jerusalem la cet ,
44025002	te ah te khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang mawtkung thli lawng Pawl thawlh a peelna te a thui u .
44025003	Pawl te lawngpueng ah ngawn ham khawkhanna a khueh u dawngah ahih te Jerusalem la khuen pe ham Fitas tengah reenna a bih u .
44025004	Fitas lawng , “ Pawl he Sisaria thong khuiah awm , kai khaw tela te yue ka meel koep ai .
44025005	Namami kah mawtkung thli he kai ka ceh vengah law u selang tah te kah thlaang lawng te thawlhpalhna a sai atah taya cawi u seh ” a tina .
44025006	Fitas te ahimi tengah khawhin reet nuem , hin ha nuem awm tih tecoengah Sisaria la te cet . Avuen hin atah awlcekna ah ngawl tih Pawl te van law puei uh a tina .
44025007	Pawl te avan pha atah Jerusalem kalawng aka law Judah thlaang thli lawng Pawl te a veel khoep u tih thawlh broela a pup u , te tila thawlh a pup u te soeng tang tang tila ahimi lawng thui u thai nawh .
44025008	Tecoengah Pawl lawng amah phungtuna awl te a thui : “ Kai lawngah Judah thlaang thli kah Phungawl te khaw Tempal bok-im khaw , Rom sengpahrang sangluel sawah khaw thawlhpalhna ka sai nawh . ” a tina .
44025009	Tede Fitas lawng Judah thlaang thli kah haitheen peek te a ngaih dawngah Pawl nala te , “ Jerusalem la cet tih he kah lumlai he ka haiah thui ham na ngaih aw ? ” a tina .
44025010	Tevengah Pawl lawng , “ Sengpahrang sangluel kah awlcekna yungim ah ni thui ham ka ngaih . Namah lawng na ming angla Judah thlaang sawah thawlhpalhna ka sai nawh .
44025011	Kai lawng phungawl te ka phe tih pakhat khat ka sai dawngah duekna koei dantatna te awm kawinih loeih hamla kavan bih manawh . Tede ahimi kah thawlh peelna he asoeng nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw kai he ahimi kut ah pe thai manawh . Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuu ka khaan ai . ” a tina .
44025012	Tecoeng atah Fitas lawng amah kah khawkhankung thli oen a doet u coeng atah , “ Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuu khaan ham na ngaih dawngah ahih tengla na cet ai . ” a tina .
44025013	Te kalawng a awm khueng coeng atah Sengpahrang Akrippa oen Berni tah Fitas tengah uemna awl thui pe ham Sisaria la cet hih .
44025014	Te ah te khawhin san hlang a awm hih coeng atah Fitas lawng Pawl kawng te sengpahrang tengah a thui pe : “ He ah he Filik lawng thong a thlaak pakhat awm ,
44025015	Jerusalem la ka ceh veng te ah Judah thli kah khawsoeih ahaamca thli oen Judah thlaang ahaamca thli lawng thawlh a peel u tih ahih te dan tat ham ka tengah avan bih u .
44025016	Tede kai lawngah , taya a cawi u thlaang pakhat te taya cawikung thli oen haitang u tih thawlh a peelna boeih dawngah amah oen amah phungtuna awl a thui thlan atah a-u khat khaw thlaang kut ah peek hamla Rom thlaang thli kah phung alam nawh ni ka tina .
44025017	Tecoengah he la he ahimi a law u vengah uelh muehla avuen hin ah awlcekna yungim ah ka ngawl tih te thlaang te ka khue sak .
44025018	Ahih taya aka cawi hue te pai u tih a thui u , tede ka poekna angla athe arana khat khaw peel u tangtang nawh .
44025019	Ahimi boeih lawng awlpuungna a thui he tah amami kah bokna kawng oen aka duek tangte Jesuh aka miingna thlaang kawng te mai ni ; tede Pawl lawngtah ahih te hing tila a thui .
44025020	He kah awlpuungna kawng he metila awlceet ka yaak thai lah ai tite ka ming nawh , tedawngah Pawl te Jerusalem la cet tih thawlhpeelna thli he te ah te thui sak ham na ngaih aw ka tina .
44025021	Tede Pawl lawng ayuu akhaan ; ahih lawngah amah te atheenla toet ham oen ah amah kah lumlai te Sengpahrang sangluel lawng awl van tloek seh tila a bih . Tedawngah Sengpahrang sangluel tengla tuih thlantoe ahih te atheenla toet ham awl ka peek . ” a tina .
44025022	Akrippas lawng Fitas nala te , “ Ahih kah awl thui te kamah lawng yaak rep ham ka ngaih a tina . Fitas lawngah , “ Thangvuen ah na yaak badai ” a tina .
44025023	Avuen khawhin atah Akrippa oen Berni tah a bawilen phawlip oen ruep-awm tangkiik la thoekcau u heet tih raalbawi thli oen khawpui khuikah mawtkung ahaamca thli oen ah rangpui tunna impui la te haih kuun u . Fitas lawng awl a thlaw a peek tih Pawl te avan law puei u .
44025024	Fitas lawng , “ Akrippa Sengpahrang oen he ah aka awm boeih Judah thlaang boeih boeih , he kah aka awm lawngkhaw , Jerusalem ah aka awm lawngkhaw , he kah na huh u thlaang he kai tengah taya a cawi u . Ahimi lawng , ahih he hingpaa nawh ni tila paang u .
44025025	Tede ahih lawngah duekna koei dantat ham tangtang a sai khat khaw ka hu nawh . Tede amah lawngah Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuukhaan ham a ngaih tih te la te tuih hamla ka poek poen .
44025026	Tede ahih kawng he Sengpahrang sangluel tengah acek aneh la ca thut ham ka khueh nawh . Tedawngah he ah he nangmi boeih oen awlpui la Sengpahrang Akrippa haiah kavan law puei ! Ahih kah lumlai he thuikhaan coeng atah cathut koei khat khaw awm ai aw ka ti mai dawngah ni .
44025027	Metihtiah thongtla thlaang pakhat taya a cawina akawng alam te atheenla tueng sak ohla tuih ham tah alawng-ala awm nawh . ” tila a thui .
44026001	Akrippa lawng Pawl nala te , “ Namah kawng te na thui thai poen . ” a tina . Pawl lawng a kut te a phawh , tecoengah adangkah angla amah oen amah phungtuna awl te a thui :
44026002	“ Sengpahrang Akrippa ! Tihin na haiah , Judah thlaang thli kah thawlh peelna boeih dawngah kamah oen kamah ka phungtu u he yotheen tang poen ni tila ka poek .
44026003	He tila ka poek he nang lawngtah Judah thlaang thli kah phung oen awlpuungna te atheenla na ming dawngah ni . Tedawngah lunghoeihla ka awl thui he na hutung ham reenna kavan bih .
44026004	Kai he ka camaw veng kalawng metila ka awm ka ih ti he Judah thlaang boeih lawng a ming u . Kai he lamhacuek ah kamah ram khuiah khaw ka sak tih tecoengah Jerusalem ah ka awm te ahimi lawng a ming u .
44026005	Ahimi lawng kai he asan hlang m'ming u poen , acuekca veng kalawng kai tah kamami kah bokna ben ah arai koek Farasi thlaang pakhat la ka awm te a ngaih u atah a thui u thai .
44026006	Tahe veng awlcek ham he ah ka pai he tah Pathen lawng kamami kah patuer hue tengah awlkamna a sai ngaiuepna te ka khueh van dawngah ni .
44026007	Te ngaiuepna te tah kamami thlaangphun paha thlaihih lawng yiin , daai Pathen a bok u vengah dang hamla a ngaiuep u te ni . Hinyah kap Bawipa , te kah ngaiuepna kawngah ni Judah thlaang thli lawng kai he taya n'cawi u !
44026008	Pathen lawng thlaangduek a thawh sak ti he he kah aka awm thlaang thli lawng n'tu kawngah tangna ham awm nawh na ti u ?
44026009	Nazaret khaaw kah Jesuh kawng te oelhtaih thai khui tah ka sai ai tila kamah roe lawngah kaw ka poek .
44026010	Jerusalem ah te tila te ka sai . Kai lawng khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah saithaina aana te ka dang tih Pathen kah thlaang yahawh hlang mai te thong ah ka thlaak ; Ahimi te a ngawn u vengah khaw ngawn ham roe la kai lawng ka ngaih puei van .
44026011	Sinakok bok-im ah khaw ahimi te dan ka tat sak u tih amami kah oengna te hoett sak hamla ka yawm . Ahimi sawah ka thin sa soeh tih ahimi te heemtek hamla ram tloe kah khawpui toela ka pan .
44026012	“ Te tila ka kamthlah dawngah khawsoeih ahaamca thli tengkah awlpeekna aana oen Damaskas khaaw la te ka cet .
44026013	Hinyah kap Bawipa , te tila hingthuntaang lawngpueng ka ceh vengah , khawmik lak ah aka aang ngaai aangna pakhat lawngah kamah khaw , ka cet haih thlaang thli khaw vaan kalawng n'thue rawngtheng u .
44026014	Kaimi boeih te dilai ah ka tlim drek u tih , ‘ Sawl , Sawl ! N'tu kawngah kai he nan heem nan tek aih ca ? Vaitaw taal lawngah amah khuehkung kah cungpoelh te a peh atah a tam doetthloet angla namah oen namah te nganbawh na pe u khoeng ’ tila Hebru awl la avan thui te ka yaak .
44026015	Kai lawngah , ‘ Bawipa , nang te a-u ? ’ ka tina . Tevengah Bawipa lawng , ‘ Kai tah nang kah heem atek Jesuh ni .
44026016	Tede tho langtah pai hang lah . Nang he kamah kah tuihyoeihthlaang la khueh ham na tengah ka phumpho . Tihin ah kai nan huh he khaw hailamben kah kan huh sak ham koei te khaw thlaangtloe tengah aka thui ham ni .
44026017	Kai lawngah nang he Israel thlaang thli kut dawng kalawng khaw , Gental thlaang tengah khaw kan tuih vetih ahimi kut dawng kalawng khaw kan thlawn ai .
44026018	Nang lawng ahimi te a mik na daai sak vetih yiinna kalawng aangna la , Seitan kah tharana khui kalawng Pathen tengla na mang sak ai , te dengah ni ahimi lawng kai he oengna rang oen ah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina te a khueh u vetih Pathen kah thlaangtuek thli tim ah ahuen amawl a dang u van ai ’ tila avan thui ” a tina .
44026019	“ Tedawngah , Sengpahrang Akrippa , vaan kah huhthlaam ka huh te ngailaakna muehla ka awm ma-nawh .
44026020	Lamhacuek la Damaskas oen Jerusalem ah , tecoengah Judia ram pum oen Gental thlaang boeih tengah ahimi lawng thawlhna te yut u tih Pathen benla a mang u hamla , ahimi lawng a thawlh yutna te tueng sakna thaihu sai hamla ka phawng pe .
44026021	He kawng dawngah ni Judah thlaang thli lawng Tempal bok-im ah ka awm vengah te n'tuuk u tih ngawn hamla a yawm u .
44026022	Tede tihin toe ah Pathen lawng n'bawm , tedawngah thlaang yitt thlaangbo nangmi boeih haiah he ka pai tih awl ka thui . Tawngha thli oen Mosi lawng a thui oepsoeh aka thoeng ham koei thaihu te ni kai lawng ka thui :
44026023	te tah Judah thlaang thli oen Gental thlaang thli tengah thlawnna aangna te phawng hamla , Messiah lawng patang a khang coengah duekna kalawng lamhacuek aka tho koep thlaang la awm ai a ti te ni ka thui . ” a tina .
44026024	Te tila Pawl te amah oen amah a phungtu u vengah Fitas lawng , “ Pawl na cuih taal poen ! Cuihna asangsang na cangna lawng ng'ngau sak poen . ” a tina .
44026025	Pawl lawngah , “ Bawipa , ka ngau moenih ! Aka soeng awltak ni ka thui .
44026026	Sengpahrang Akrippa ! Nang lawng he kah thaihu kawng he na ming dawngah ni na tengah tong-aa ohla ka thui . He tah ahuep ahel , akel acawng ah aka thoeng thaihu nawh tih he ang thli boeih he nang lawng na ming tangte poen ni tite ka tangna .
44026027	Sengpahrang Akrippa , tawngha thli kah ca thut te na tangna aw ? Nang lawng na tangna tite ka ming ! ” a tina .
44026028	Akrippa lawng Pawl nala te , “ Kai he atue soetca khuiah khrihca la ka coengg sak thai ai tila na poek aw ? ” a tina .
44026029	Pawl lawngah , “ Atue soetca ah khaw , asan hlang ah khaw , he kah thiirui he tah thui muehla nang oen tihin ah ka awlthui aka hutung nangmi boeih he kai angla awm van ham Pathen tengah ka thangthui ! ” a tina .
44026030	Tecoeng atah sengpahrang khaw , ram ukbawi khaw , Berni oen atloe boeih te tho u tih ,
44026031	a ceh u coeng atah ahimi khat oen khat lawngah , “ He kah thlaang lawng he duekna koei oen thongtlaakna koei khat khaw sai nawh de ni . ” tila a thui u .
44026032	Te atah Akrippa lawng Fitas nala , “ Sengpahrang sangluel tengah ayuukhaan nawh kawinih he thlaang he thlah hamla awm de ni . ” a tina .
44027001	Kaimi he Itali ram la tuisangphaw oen ceh ham awl a khueng u coeng atah , “ Sengpahrang sangluel kah Raalkapbu ” a ti u Rom raalkapbu kah raalbawi Julias kut ah Pawl oen atloe thongtla khat sut te a peek u .
44027002	Asia ram kah tuisangphaw duemdawngna roekk ah aka cet tawm Adramitiam khaaw kah tuisangphaw pakhat dawngah ka luui u tih te oen ah ka cet u . Macidonia ram Tesalon khaaw kah Aristarkas khaw kaimi oen haih ka cet u .
44027003	Avuen atah Sidon ka pha u . Julias lawng Pawl te a reen dawngah a paya thli tengla a ceh sak tih angoe te avan peek u .
44027004	Te kalawng kaimi ka cet u de khawthlii lawng n'haang khoep u dawngah yilh uepna ben Saipras tuisanglak ben ka lawng ka cet u .
44027005	Tecoengah Cilicia oen Pamfilia ayaawnna tuueng tuitunlii ah te ka law u phai tih Licia peng kah Mira khaaw te ka pha u .
44027006	Te ah te Alekzandria kalawng aka law Itali ram la aka cet ham koei tuisangphaw pakhat te raalbawi lawng a huh tih te dawngah te n'luui sak u .
44027007	Khawhin sanhlang ahiing ayaaila ka cet u tih aboetna atah ahar abat la Nidas khaaw te ka pha u . Te ben kalawng ah ceh hamla yilh lawng m'maam khoep u tih yilh uepna ben Krit tuisanglak ben kalawng ka cet u tih Salmon Ngocou tengah te poet ka cet u .
44027008	Tuikeeng ah te poe ka cet u tih Tuisangphaw duemna Huen theen a ti u te ahar abat la ka pha u . Te tah Lasea khawpui kalawng thla aih tlaih nawh .
44027009	Te ah te asan hlang ka cam u tih Thawlh thlamna Khawhin khaw athloei poen dawngah tuisangphaw oen khawlawng thla ceh ham arih awm poen . Tedawngah Pawl lawng ahimi te ngaithuenna awl a thui pe :
44027010	“ Nangmi u , he kalawng ah mami khawlawng ceh he arih ham awm tangkiik tila ka huh ; thaihu thaiha khaw , tuisangphaw khaw , hingna toe khaw sungduehna awm khuengdeng ai . ” a tina .
44027011	Tede raalbawi lawng tuisangphaw kungmah oen aka mongkung kah awl te a ngaai tih Pawl kah awlthui tah tula khaw toeh pe nawh .
44027012	Te kah tuisangphaw duemna huen te sikding khui puet ah awm ham theen nawh ; tedawngah thlaang yahawh lawngah a coeng thai atah Finik la te cet ngala tih te ah te sikding khui puet awm ham a ngaih u . Finik he tah Krit tuisanglak kah tuisangphaw duemna huen la awm tih khawtlaak akakk ben oen khawtlaak aluen ben la te maang .
44027013	Akakk ben kalawng yilh te hiip hiip law tih amami kah kamthlahna angla coeng thai ai a ti u dawngah thiilungdue te a doek u tih Krit tuisanglak te ayoeii rep la poe ka hawng u tih ka cet u .
44027014	Tede raih a awm coeng atah , “ Khawcuuk Aluen ben khawthlii ” a ti u te tuisanglak ben kalawng ah thlii khuengdeng .
44027015	Tuisangphaw te khawthlii lawng avan haang tih khawthlii tim ah tuisangphaw te hoei tloel la awm poen , tedawngah ka thlah sut u tih khawthlii lawng a yawng aroeh mai poen .
44027016	Kauda tuisanglak ayiitca akaak ben te ka pha u atah khawthlii te avan oel tih hoeikhang . Te ah te tuisangphaw dawngkah lowng te ahar abat la ka soem ka sai u .
44027017	Ahimi lawngah lowng te ahanla a thooeng u coeng atah tuisangphaw dawngah rui oen a ven haih tih rap a piin u . Libia tuikeeng tuidang kah divin langdai te a tawh moek hau ai a ti u dawngah baiyaan te a doek u tih tuisangphaw te khawthlii lawng a khuenna roekk ah a ceh sak u .
44027018	Thlipui te a thawh toengtoeng dawngah avuen atah tuisangphaw dawngkah thaihu te thoem a voeih u .
44027019	Athum hin atah tuisangphaw dawngkah a hawna pawmcunghaiha thli te khaw thoem a voeih u .
44027020	Khawhin sanhlang khawmik khaw , aisi thli khaw , ka hu u tlaih nawh , khawthlii te duem nawh tih atlawhla thlii toengtoeng . Aboetna atah ka deem u hun ai tila ka ngaiuep u tlaih nawh poen .
44027021	Te kah thlaang thli te caak awkk khaw caak mueh la asanhlang a awm khiing u poen dawngah Pawl lawng ahimi nala te , “ Nangmi u , ka awl thui te nangmi lawng navan ngaai u kawinih Krit tuisanglak kalawng ah te n'cet u nawh vetih he tila sung adeuhna oen arai asa he n'tawng u nawh sui .
44027022	Tede tahe ah na kaw boet sak u boel ! Nangmi khuikah a-u khat khaw ha-ata manawh ; tuisangphaw bueng ni n'sung ai .
44027023	Metihtiah n'thlem yiin ah kai he a thlaang la khuehkung , kai lawng ka bok Pathen kah vanthlaang te ka tengla law tih ,
44027024	‘ Pawl , lakueng boel ! Sengpahrang sangluel haiah na pai ngaikhoek ai . Pathen he na sawah atheen dawngah nang oen aka cet haih thlaang boeih kah hingna te a thlung poen ’ tila avan thui .
44027025	Tedawngah nangmi lawng na kaw boet sak u boel ! Metihtiah kai tah Pathen te ka uepna khak tih a thui angla te coengg ngai ai .
44027026	Tede tuisanglak pakhat khat kah tuikeeng ah ngoen tah n'khoe ngai badai ” a tina .
44027027	Hin ha thlailiina yiin atah kaimi te Meditarenian tuitunlii yunyan ah thlipui lawng n'yawng u . Yiinthuem tang yun atah tuisangphaw dawngkah biibikung thli lawng lan benla voehvoeh yoeii poen tite a ming u .
44027028	Tedawngah ahimi lawng tuitahna dawngah thaihu rih te a baang u tih a thlaak thuk vengah tuilii te pe yakhat pakul dung tila a ming u ; a awm bawt coengah ahimi lawng a tah koep u vengah pe sawmkua dung tila a ming u .
44027029	Tuisangphaw lawng lungsong a sut hau ai a ti u dawngah tuisangphaw kah ahu ben kalawng thiilungdue palii te a thlaak thuk u tih thangthuina oen khawthaih ka ring u .
44027030	Te vengah te tuisangphaw dawngkah biibikung thli lawng tuisangphaw te ceh taak sut ham a yawm u ; ahimi lawngah a hai ben kalawng thiilungdue aka thlaak angla te sa u tih lowng te tui dawng la a thlaak u .
44027031	Tede Pawl lawngah raalbawi oen raalkap thli tengah a thui pe tih , “ Tuisangphaw dawngah biibikung thli a awm nawh atah na loeih u tang manawh ” a tina .
44027032	Tedawngah raalkap thli lawng lowng piinna rui te a tloek tih lowng te tuidang la a thlaak dingkang .
44027033	Khaw thaih tawm atah ahimi boeih te caak awkk te caak hamla a thui pe tih , “ Nangmi buhmueh buhpawng la na awm u te tahe tah hin ha thlailii law poen , he veng khui puet ah n'tu khat khaw na ca u nawh .
44027034	Na hinglung thloetna ham caak awkk ca u de . Na luu dawngkah samthaam pakhat pateng ha-ata manawh . ” a tina .
44027035	He tila a thui pe coengah Pawl lawng takawi te thoem a lawh tih ahimi haiah Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui , takawi te a eh tih a caak .
44027036	Ahimi tah a ngaai mawng u tih caak awkk khaw a caak u .
44027037	Tuisangphaw dawng aka awm boeih te thlaang yahnih sawm sarih paruk ka awm u .
44027038	Thlaang boeih lawng caak awkk te ahahla a caak u coeng atah tuisangphaw te a yaanghoep betna ham sangvut cang boeih te tuitunlii ah batt a voeih u .
44027039	Khaw athaih hang atah tuisangphaw dawngkah bii aka bi thlaang thli lawngah ame hue kah tuitunlii keeng ti khaw ming u nawh de tuitunlii acaawng ben ah langdai te a huh u tih acoengg thai atah te ah te tui aboenna ah tuisangphaw te duem sak ham a poek u .
44027040	Tedawngah thiilungdue a kiingna rui thli te a tloek u tih tuilii ah a thlaak u , tecoengah tuisangphaw hoei-alena tapaih piinna rui te a thlam u . Tecoengah tuisangphaw te yilh lawng a khuen thaina ham tuisangphaw a hai ben ah baiyaan te a tai u tih langdai benla te cet u .
44027041	Tede tuisangphaw lawng divin langdai a tawh tih tingtai sut ; tuisangphaw a hai ben tah divin a tawh moek tih a tat thai tlaih nawh vengah te ahu ben te tah tuiphu tuilet lawng avan deng tih rek phawngg poen .
44027042	Thongtla thlaang thli te tui yo vetih lan la heeng boeih ai a ti dawngah raalkap thli lawng ngawn hamla kamthlah u .
44027043	Tede raalbawi lawng Pawl te deem sak ham a ngaih tih te tila sai nawh ham a khaang pe . Lamhacuek ah tui aka yo thai hue te tuisangphaw dawng kalawng sungpung tih lan la tui yo ham awl a peek ;
44027044	Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah thingdeep khaw , tuisangphaw dawng-kah aka tlot thingboeng thingdeep te khaw ka tuuk u tih ahimi hu ah te ka yo u . He tila he kaimi boeih tah ading apuek la lan ka pha u .
44028001	Kaimi boeih asuengcala lan ka pha u atah te kah tuisanglak te Malta tuisanglak tila ka ming u .
44028002	Te kah aka awm khawkung thlaang thli lawng kaimi te n'reen tangkiik u . Khaw tlan tih khaw sik , ahimi lawng hai avan toeih u tih hai ka aawm u .
44028003	Pawl lawng thing pok at a lawh tih a toeih , tevengah hailing a yaak tih ruul pakhat te co , a kut te a lengven pe tih hoer bat .
44028004	Te kah khawsakung thlaang thli lawng Pawl kut ah ruul a bat te a huh u vengah , “ Ahih he thlaang aka ngawn cawi ni , tuitunlii dawng kalawng loeih de Khaw lawngah hing sak manawh ” tila a thui u .
44028005	Tede Pawl lawng ruul te hai dawngah a khek tih nganbawh khaw ya nawh .
44028006	Ahimi lawngtah phiing kueng ai , tihnawhtah tlim pahoei vetih duek ai tite ni a ring u mai poen . Tede asanhlang a ring u coeng atah ngan bawh tehca khaw a yaak nawh te a huh u veng atah ahimi te a kawpoek thawleng u tih , “ Ahih he pathen ni ” tila a thui u .
44028007	Te kalawng ayoeica ah tuisanglak ukkungbawi Pubilia kah lo te awm . Ahih lawng kaimi te beroep lopaangla n'khue u tih khawhin hin thum khui kaimi te buh n'kok u .
44028008	Pubilia kah ana pa te tlo tih ral , thimthe khaw tlo . Pawl te ahih a awmna la te cet , a kut te a sawah a tloeng pe coeng atah hoeih .
44028009	He tila a awm te a yaak u veng atah tuisanglak kah thlaangtlo te law u tih boeih hoeih u .
44028010	Ahimi lawng kutdo moen m'peek u , ka ceh u vengah khaw lawngpueng ah kaimi kah angoe koei thaihu te tuisangphaw dawng avan khueh u .
44028011	Thla thum coeng atah , Alekzandria kalawng aka law , te kah tuisanglak ah sikding khui puet aka awm “ Pathen Caphee ” a ti u tuisangphaw oen ka cet u .
44028012	Sirakas khawpui te ka pha u tih hin thum ka cam u .
44028013	Te kalawng ka cet u tih Rekium khawpui te ka pha u . Avuen hin atah akakk ben kalawng khaw thlii tih hin hih khuiah Puteoli khawpui ka pha u .
44028014	Te ah te oengca thli awm u tih ahimi te yarh khat tah awm puei hamla n'ceel u . Te kalawng tah Rom khawpui la ka cet u .
44028015	Rom khawpui kah oengca thli lawng kaimi kawng te a yaak u vengah Appias khawpui kah Thaihu yoeihna oen Reh-im Pathum a ti u khawpui toe ah te n'do u . Pawl lawng ahimi te a huh vengah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil a thui tih a tha la khuek awm .
44028016	Rom khawpui te kaimi ka pha u atah Pawl te raalkap pakhat lawngah a toet tih amah poek ah awm thai na te a peek u .
44028017	Hin thum a awm coengah Pawl lawng te kah aka awm Judah thlaang mawtkung thli te tun a khue . Ahimi te a tun u atah , Pawl lawng ahimi nala te , “ Ka puei Israel thlaang thli , kai lawngah mami Judah thlaang puei khaw , mami kah patuer hue teng kalawng n'dang u phung khaw ka oelh ka taih nawh de Jerusalem thongim ah n'thlaak u tih Rom thlaang thli kah kut dawngah m'peek u .
44028018	Kai he Rom thlaang thli lawngah awldoetna a khueh u coeng atah kai lawngah duekna koei thaihu khat khaw ka sai nawh te a huh u tih thlah ham a ngaih u .
44028019	Tede Judah thlaang thli lawngah kai he thlah ham te ngaih u nawh , ka thlaangphun thli te thawlh peel ham nawh de , sengpahrang sangluel tengah thui khaan nawh atah coeng thai nawh .
44028020	He dawng mai ah ni nangmi oen huh u tih thui hamla kan khue u . Kai he thiirui oen he tila n'khih u he tah Israel thlaang thli lawng a ngaiuep u tih a ring oel u thlaang kawng dawngah ni . ” a tina .
44028021	Ahimi lawngah , “ Nang kah kawng alam he Judia ram benkah capat khat khaw ka hu u nawh , te ben kalawng awlthang aka van khuen khaw , nang kawng te athela aka thui boenhui khat khaw law nawh .
44028022	Tede peng tawm ah he bu he athela a thui u dawngah namah kah poekna te kaimi lawng yaak ham ka ngaih u . ” a tina .
44028023	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pawl oen khawhin a tuntah u tih thlaang broe te tuntahna khawhin ah Pawl a pahna im la te cet u . Mincang kalawng thlemben toe Pathen ram kawng awlthang te a thui pe , tecoengah tawngha thli kah cathut oen Mosi Phungawl khuikah te athoel alaang pe tih Jesuh kawng te ahimi lawng a yaakming na ham a thui pe .
44028024	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah ahih kah awl thui rang oen a yaakming u de thlaangtloe hue lawngtah tangna nawh .
44028025	Ahimi te oelh u khiing tih Pawl lawng he awl pakhat he a thui pe coeng atah meel u ; a thui pe awl tah : “ Ciim Muithla lawng tawngha Isaiah rang oen ah na patuer hue tengah a thui te soeng tangtang !
44028026	Ahih lawng a thui tah , “ Cet langtah he kah thlaang thli he thui pe lah : Na yaak u vetih na hutung u suide , na yaakming u tangtang manawh ; Nangmi lawng na bueh u vetih na dan u suide na hu u tang manawh ,
44028027	metihtiah he thlaangphun thli kah thinkaw lungbui tah mong sut tih ahimi lawng a haa te a buem khoep tih a mik khaw a yiin khoep u . Te tila sai u nawh kawinih ahimi kah mik lawng a huh sui tih a haa thli lawng a yaak sui , ahimi kah thinkaw lawng a yaakming sui tih Ka tengla va meel koep u sui , ahimi te ka hoeih sak sui , ’ tila Pathen lawng a thui te ni ” a tina .
44028028	Pawl lawng awlcuina la a thui tah : “ Tedawngah Pathen kah thlawnna awlthang tah Gental thlaang thli te a peek poen tite ming uh . Ahimi lawng a hutung u ai ! ” a tina .
44028029	( Pawl lawng he awl he a thui coeng atah Judah thlaang thli te awlpuung kaa caan doe ah meel u . )
44028030	Pawl lawng im a vat tih kum hih khui te ah te awm . Amah tengla aka law boeih te atheenla a do .
44028031	Ahih lawng thincakna oen yalpawla Pathen Ram kawng te a thui tih Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kawng te a cang puei .
45001001	Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang , Pathen lawng Awlthang Theen phawng hamla n'tuek tih n'khue celtuih Kai Pawl lawng ca kavan pat .
45001002	Te Awlthang Theen tah yan veng kalawng Pathen lawngah tawngha thli rang oen awl a kam tih Caciim dawngah a thut tangte te ni .
45001003	Te tah Pathen Capa mami kah Bawi Jesuh Khrih kawng te ni . Thlaanghing pumsa ben atah ahih he Devid cadil la awm .
45001004	Pathen la a awmna oen ciimna ben atah huham tharana oen duekna kalawng a thawhna rang oen ah Pathen Capa la a awm te a tueng sak .
45001005	Ahih rang oen Pathen lawng celtuih la awmna m'peek tih thlaangphun boeih lawng oengna oen awlngaaina a khueh thaina ham oen ah mawt ham kai he n'tuih .
45001006	Te kah Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi khaw Jesuh Khrih kah a koe la awm ham Pathen kah khuena ah na thuum u van .
45001007	Tedawngah Pathen lawng a lungna tih a thlaang la coengg ham a ceel Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi boeih tengah he ca he kavan pat . Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh .
45001008	Dilai pum ah nangmi kah oengna kawng te a yaak boeih u poen dawngah Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen tengah lamhacuekla awmngaih ciil ka thui .
45001009	A Capa kawng Awlthang Theen te ka thinkaw lungbui boeih oen ka thui tih a bii ka bi he soeng tila Pathen tah kai kah sausi la awm . Ka thangthui roekk ah nangmi kan poek yoeyah te Pathen lawng a ming .
45001010	Pathen kawngaihna a awm atah vai at mai khaw nangmi tengla law ham Pathen tengah ka bih .
45001011	Metihtiah nangmi oen muithla ben yotheenna te veel haih tih tharana awm sak ham ka ngaih dawngah nangmi te huh ham ka ngaih tangkiik .
45001012	Ka thuingaihna tah kai kah oengna lawng nangmi te bawm ham tih nangmi kah oengna lawng kai he bawm patoeng ham ni .
45001013	Ka maya manau boeih , he he van ming u lah , nangmi tengla law ham ka kamthlah taitu poen de thaihu pakhat khat lawng n'kang poepa . Atloe Gental thlaang tim ah kawthawna ka khueh sak angla nangmi tim ah khaw kawthawna aka khueh awm sak ham ka ngaih tangkiik .
45001014	Metihtiah thlaangphun boeih tengah laiba ka khueh ; Thlaang cuih oen thlaang cuih nawh tengah khaw , cathoem oen cathoem nawh tengah khaw bii bi ham laiba ka khueh .
45001015	Tedawngah ni Rom khawpui ah aka awm nangmi tengah khaw Awlthang Theen phawng ham ka ngaih tangkiik .
45001016	Awlthang Theen tah ka uepna rapsaat ; aka tangna thlaang boeih thlawnna hamla Pathen kah tharana ni . Lamhacuekla Judah thlaangphun ham tih tecoengah Gental thlaangphun hamla khaw awm .
45001017	Pathen lawng thlaanghing he metila thlaangdoeng la a khueh tite Awlthang Theen lawng a tueng sak . “ Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh thlaang te lawngtah oengna oen hing ai . ” tila Caciim lawng a thui angla te doengna tah acuekca veng kalawng aboet toe oengna rang oen ni .
45001018	Pathen kah thinsana lawngtah thlaanghing boeih kah athe-arana oen thawlhna boeih te a oel tih vaan kalawng va tueng poen . Te athe-arana lawng awltak te yaakming thai nawh ham a kang khoep .
45001019	Thlaanghing lawng Pathen he ming thai koei la awm ti he aciimla a tueng poen dawngah Pathen lawng ahimi te dan a peek ; metihtiah Pathen amah roe lawng a tueng sak ni .
45001020	Pathen lawngah dilai a suen cuek veng kalawng huh thai nawh la aka awm dungyan a tharana oen dungyan Pathen la a awmna tah aciimphanla tueng poen . Pathen kah thaihu sai dawngah ahimi lawng a huh thai . Tedawngah thlaanghing lawng a thawlhna te thuh phah thai manawh .
45001021	Ahimi lawng Pathen te a ming u de thangpawm koeila thangpawm u nawh , awmngaih ciil khaw thui u nawh . Ahimi kah poekna boeih tah apoeila coengg , a lung mong sut u tih yiinna oen betoet .
45001022	Ahimi lawng te ka cuih ti u , tede ahimi tah cuih u nawh .
45001023	Dungyan aka hing Pathen te bok ohla aka duek thai koei thlaanghing , va oen ramsa oen ah aka cawlh thaihu hing oen aka lo u kutsai mueime te lat a bok u .
45001024	Tedawngah Pathen lawng te ang thlaang hue te amami kawngaih tuiileh kap thaihu sai ham a peek tih khat oen khat sawah yahpawh koei thaihu a sai u .
45001025	Ahimi lawng Pathen kawng awltak te thailatna awl oen a thaw u . Saikung Pathen te bok ohla a sai thaihu te a bok u tih bii a bi pe u . Saikung Pathen te ni thangpawm yoeyah ham a awm : Amen .
45001026	Tedawngah Pathen lawng thlaang-hing he yarau pawh koeila aka awm pumsa cuk-halhna dawngah a thlah phaam sut . Hutaa hue lawng pateng khaw asoeng akam awmna ham koei hutaa phung te asoeng nawh la a hawna u tih khat oen khat thawlhna a sai u .
45001027	Tih van toengtoengla tawngpa hue lawngkhaw asoeng akam la hutaa oen pawlneengna te a hoett tih pumsa cuk-halhna dawngah tawngpa lawng khat oen khat yahna koei thaihu the thawlhna a sai u dawngah thaihu the a sai phu te ahimi lawng a dang u van .
45001028	Pathen kawng cuihna taktak te thlaanghing lawng a thinkaw khuiah khueh ham a ngaih u nawh dawngah aciimcaih nawh thinkaw lungbui khueh ham Pathen lawng a thlahphaam . Tedawngah sai koei nawh athe thaihu a sai u .
45001029	Ahimi tah soeprep athe-arana athe thaihu cungkuem , apueh ngaihna , thawlhna oen betoet u tih uett-eena , thlaang ngawnna , tawhsina , thailatna , kawnehna oen be u .
45001030	Rengse kawkhah phukhue awl thuina , khat oen khat thuitheetna , Pathen thina , thekhana , oekthloenna , halangna , athe sai ham poekna thli oen ah nu apa awl khaw ngaai u nawh .
45001031	Khawboe ramlang theen u nawh , awlkaa cak u nawh , thlaangtloe sawah reenna , lungna khueh u nawh .
45001032	He tila aka hing thlaang thli tah duek ham awm tila Pathen phungawl lawng a thui te a ming u . Tede he ang thaihu amami kah sai bueng ohla thlaangtloe lawng a sai u te khaw a kawtlaak puei u .
45002001	Tedawngah ka paya , a-u nang khaw thlaangtloe sawah awl na cek vengah namah oen namah te na thlipdah u thai nawh . Metihtiah thlaangtloe awl na cek vengah ahimi angla nang lawngkhaw thawlhna na sai van dawngah namah oen namah ni awl na cek u .
45002002	He tila thaihu the aka sai thli Pathen lawng awl a cek vengah asoeng thaihu a sai tite na ming u .
45002003	Tede ka puei , thlaang lawng thaihu the a sai tih awl na cek vengah nang lawng awl na cek thlaangtloe angla namah khaw na awm van . Pathen kah awlcekna kalawng ka loeih ai tila na poek aw ?
45002004	Tihnawhtah Pathen kah alentloe reenna , khawdawp ngaaina , kawdawna thli te tula khaw na sak u nawh aw ? Pathen kah lungvatna te thawlh yutna ham lawngpui nuehkung ni tite ataktangla na ming u .
45002005	Tede nangmi tah na thin thah u tih thawlh na yut u nawh : tedawngah Pathen kah thinsana oen aka doeng awlcekna Khawhin a pha vengah namami kah dantatna abo tare ham ni na sai khoeng u .
45002006	Pathen lawng thlaang boeih te amami kah a sai taring ah kutdo a peek ai .
45002007	Thlaang khatsut lawng thaihu theen te a sai u tih ruep-awmna , hinyahna oen dungyan hingna te a tlap u ; ahimi te Pathen lawng dungyan hingna te a peek ai .
45002008	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah amami ham bueng a poek u tih asoeng thaihu te a hoett , thaihu the saina te a vai u ; Pathen lawng thinsana oen thinlingna te ahimi sawah a hok pe ai .
45002009	Athe-arana aka sai boeih lawng khawdeng lungmana oen patang tlawhna te a dang u ai , Lamhacuekla Judah thli lawng a dang vetih Gental thli lawngkhaw a dang van ai .
45002010	Tede thaihu theen aka sai boeih tengah Pathen lawng ruep-awmna hinyahna oen ngaimawngna a peek ai . Lamhacuekla Judah thlaang hue lawng a dang vetih Gental hue lawngkhaw a dang van ai .
45002011	Pathen lawngtah thlaang boeih avanpila awl a cek ai .
45002012	Gental hue lawng Mosi kah Phungawl khueh u nawh ; a thawlh u atah phungawl ohla ha-ata u . Judah hue lawng Phungawl a khueh ; A thawlh u atah Phungawl angla awlcekna a dang u .
45002013	Thlaanghing he Pathen haiah thlaangdoeng la a awmna tah Phungawl te yaakna rang oen nawh tih Phungawl lawng sai a ti te saina rang oen ni .
45002014	Gental hue lawng Phungawl khueh u nawh ; Tede Phungawl khueh u nawh mai cakhaw Phungawl lawng sai a ti te lungbui cuihna oen a sai veng roekk-ah ahimi ham Phungawl la awm .
45002015	Phungawl lawng sai a tite a thinkaw ah thut la awm poen tila amami kah khawboe ramlang lawngah a tueng sak . Amami kah poekna lawngah meveng ah nuem tah ahimi te a pai puei vengah soeng tila amami kah athetheen pekbona thinkaw oen a tueng sak .
45002016	Tedawngah Awlthang Theen ka phawng angla awlcekna Hin ah Pathen lawng Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlaanghing boeih kah ahuepla poekna thli te awl a cek ai .
45002017	Tetih atah nangmi Judah hue metila ? Judah thlaangphun la ka awm tila namah oen namah na ti u ; nangmi tah phungawl te na uepna u tih Pathen te na oekthloenna ;
45002018	Pathen lawng nangmi sai sak ham a ngaih te na ming u tih aka soeng te tuek ham khaw Phungawl dawngkah na cang u poen ;
45002019	Mikpum thli te lawngpui nuehkung , yiinna khuikah thlaang thli ham aangna la ka awm na ti u ;
45002020	Thlaang halang thli thuituenkung oen n'tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang thli cangpueikung la ka awm na ti u ; Phungawl dawngkah aka soep cuihna oen awltak te aka khueh la na ngaai u .
45002021	Thlaangtloe tah na cang puei u , n'tu kawngah namah oen namah tah na thuituen u nawh ? “ Huen boel ” tila phung tah na thui u ; namami tah na huen u aw ?
45002022	“ Samphaih boel ” na ti u ; namami tah na samphaih u ? Kutsai pathen tah na tuii na leh u ? tede kutsai pathen bok-im kah thaihu te na rot mangkhak u ?
45002023	Pathen kah phungawl ka khueh na ti u tih na oekk u van , tede phungawl na phe u tih Pathen te yah na bai u ?
45002024	Caciim lawngah , “ Nangmi Judah thlaang thli kawng dawngah Gental thlaang lawng Pathen te thaang athe sak , ” tila a thut .
45002025	Nangmi lawng Phungawl na vai u atah yahhuivuen na reet u te aphu awm tang tang , tede Phungawl te na vai u nawh atah yahhuivuen aka reet nawh oen na lo u .
45002026	Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh Gental thlaang lawng Phungawl lawng a kuek te a vai atah Pathen lawng yahhuivuen a reet angtoekla poek nawh ai aw ?
45002027	Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli , Phungawl khaw thut tangte la na khueh u tih yahhuivuen khaw na reet u poen de Phungawl te na phe u dawngah Gental thlaang thli tah pumsa ben ah yahhuivuen reet nawh mai cakhaw Phungawl te a vai u dawngah ahimi lawng nangmi te thawlh n'peel u poen ai .
45002028	Ataktang atah a-u nuem Judah thlaang taktak tih yahhuivuen aka reet tangtang ? Ahan atah Judah thlaang la awm tih yahhuivuen reetna te pumsa ah sai la a awm atah Judah thlaang tangtang nawh ni .
45002029	Akhuiben ah Judah thlaang la awm tih thinkaw khuiah yahhuivuen aka reet te ni Judah thlaang tangtang a miingna . Te ngoen tah kut oen thut Phungawl kah bii saina nawh tih Pathen Muithla kah bii bina ni . Te ang thlaang te tah thlaanghing ben kah nawh tih Pathen benkah thangtheenna aka dang thlaang ni .
45003001	Tetih atah Judah thlaang lawng Gental thlaang lak ah a hoeikhangna awm bet aw ? Yahhuivuen reetna te pakhat mai khaw aphu awm aw ?
45003002	Asoep arepla hoeikhangna awm . Lamhacuek ah Pathen lawng awlthang theen Judah thlaang thli a kuem sak .
45003003	Tede Judah thlaang thli khatsut hue lawng uep-awm nawh la a awm atah metila a awm ai ? Pathen khaw ahimi tengah uep-awm nawh la awm van ai aw ?
45003004	Tih nawh ni , Thlaang boeih lawng hoem awl thui mai cakhaw Pathen tah soeng tih uep-awm la awm toeng toeng . Caciim lawng , “ Awl na thui vengah na awlthui te soeng tila na tueng sak vetih awlcek la na awm vengah taya cawina te na taa ai , ” tila a thui .
45003005	Tede nangmi kah thaihu the saina dawngah Pathen kah thaihu sai a soeng te a tueng sak atah metila a awm ai ? Pathen lawng mami te thawlh m'peel tih dan n'tat atah Pathen he soeng nawh n'ti ai aw ? ( Thlaanghing poekna oen thui atah ) .
45003006	Tetih nawh ni ; Pathen he doeng nawh kawinih metila dilai awl a cek thai ai ?
45003007	Tede kai kah doengna nawh lawng Pathen kah doengna te aciimla a tueng sak rang oen Pathen te ruep-awmna a peek tare atah metila kai he thawlh peel la ka awm khak ai ?
45003008	Tedawngah , “ thaihu theen a tuengna hamla thaihu the sai u sih ” n'ti u nawh kai ? Tetih roe la awl na thui tite khatsut hue lawng thawlh n'peel u tih ka thaang a the sak u . Te ang thlaang hue te thawlh peel tuueng la a awm dawngah thawlh peel la awm ai .
45003009	Tetih atah mami Judah thlaang ta Gental thlaang lak ah bet atheenna n'tu aka awm ? Atheen tloe moenih ! Aciimphanla ka tueng sak tangte angla Judah thlaang oen Gental thlaang khaw avan at la thawlhna tharana huiah boeih awm u .
45003010	Caciim lawng tila a thui , “ Thlaangdoeng a-u khat khaw awm nawh ;
45003011	thlaangcuih pakhat khaw awm nawh , Pathen aka tlap khat khaw awm nawh .
45003012	Thlaang boeih lawng Pathen te a mangthawng taak ; ahimi boeih tah lawngpui a hang u poen ; doengna aka sai khat khaw awm nawh , pakhatca khaw awm roe nawh .
45003013	Ahimi kah awl tah duekna koei thailatna oen betoet ; a laai dawng kalawng athe hoem awl thoeng ; ahimi kah huikaa khui lawng rih koei saringrup awl ruul sue angla va thoeng ;
45003014	ahimi kah awlthui tah kawsi awlkha runkhuen pansi awl oen be .
45003015	Ahimi tah thlaang nganbawh yaak sak ham oen ngawn tih thip hamla tah a tat loe thakbat u ;
45003016	a cehna roekk-ah rawkna oen patang raina a thoeng sak u .
45003017	Ahimi lawng ngaimawngna lawngpui te ming u nawh .
45003018	Pathen rih ham roe te ahimi lawng ming u nawh ” ti .
45003019	Phungawl khuiah aka awm awl soeprep he Phungawl huiah aka awm thlaang boeih sawah hawna ham ni tite tahe ah m'ming u , te tila a awm te tah thlaang boeih lawng peelnangna te a toeng tih dilai pum he Pathen kah awlcekna huiah a phana ham ni .
45003020	Phungawl vaina rang oen Pathen haiah a-u khat khaw thlaangdoeng la awm nawh . Phungawl kah bii sai tah thlaang lawng thawlhna a sai te ming sak ham mai ni .
45003021	Tede , tahe ah Pathen lawng thlaanghing he amah oen haih thlaangdoeng la a khuehna lawngpui tah a tueng sak poen . Te kah doengna te Mosi kah Phungawl oen tawngha thli lawng sausi a deng u de phungawl oen tuhkai u nawh .
45003022	Jesuh Khrih te oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh . Khrih aka tangna boeih hamla doengna te Pathen lawng a sai dawngah a-u tengah khaw alangna roe awm nawh :
45003023	thlaanghing boeih lawng thawlhna a sai u dawngah Pathen teng kalawng athlathloeila awm u poen .
45003024	Tede , Pathen kah ayoe peek reenna kutdo Jesuh Khrih mami boeih loeihsakkung rang oen thlaang boeih he thlaangdoeng la a khueh .
45003025	Pathen lawng Jesuh Khrih he a thisen rang oen thawlh khawdawp ngaaina saikung la a khueh tih te khawdawp ngaaina tah Jesuh Khrih oengna rang oen ni . Pathen lawng he tila thawlh khawdawp ngaaina a sai he tah a doengna te tueng sak a ngaih dawngah ni . Yan veng atah a kaw daw tih thlaanghing thawlhna te hu nawh angla awm ;
45003026	tede , tahe tue veng atah amah kah doengna te a tuengna ham thlaanghing thawlhna te a pho sak . He-tila Pathen lawng amah thlaangdoeng la a awmna a tueng sak tih Jesuh aka oeng boeih tah thlaangdoeng la a khueh .
45003027	Tedawngah he kawng dawngah oekthloenna koei awm aw ? Awm roeroe nawh ? N'tu kawngah ? Phung-awl n'vai u dawngah aw ? Nawh ni ! Mami lawng n'tangna dawngah ni .
45003028	Thlaanghing he Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh he phungawl vaina rang oen nawh tih oengna rang oen ni .
45003029	Pathen he Judah thlaang thli bueng kah Pathen la awm aw ? Gental thlaang thli kah Pathen la tah awm nawh aw ? Gental thlaang thli kah Pathen la khaw awm .
45003030	Pathen tah pakhat ni , Judah thlaang khaw a oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a khueh tih Gental thlaang khaw a oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a khueh .
45003031	Tetih atah , oengna oen Phungawl he hoett la awm ti ngaihna aw ? N'hoett moenih , Phungawl te n'cak sak dai ni .
45004001	Tetih atah mami kah patuer Abraham kawng he metila n'thui lah ai ? ahih lawng n'tu nuem a tawng ?
45004002	Thaihu theen saina rang oen Pathen haiah doengna dang kawinih oekthloen ham koei la awm suide , tede Pathen haiah oekthloenna koei n'tu khaw awm nawh .
45004003	Caciim lawngah , “ Abraham lawng Pathen te a tangna tih a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng ahih te thlaangdoeng la a khueh ” tila a thui .
45004004	Bii aka bi tah thapang a dang , te thapang te kutdo tila poek ham awm nawh . A thatlawh phu ni a dang .
45004005	Tede biibina ohla a oengna dawngah pangtung tih thlaangthawlh te thlaangthawlh nawh la aka toehkung Pathen te aka tangna tah a oengna te Pathen lawng doengna la a khueh pe .
45004006	Biibina khat khaw thuum muehla Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm thlaang pakhat kah awmngaihna te Devid lawng a thui vengah a thui-ngaihna tah he tila awm :
45004007	“ Athe saina te khawdawp a ngaai pe tih thawlhthlahna aka dang tah yotheen aka dawng ni .
45004008	“ Bawipa lawng a thawlhna te thawlhna la a toeh pe nawh thlaang tah yotheen aka dawng ni .
45004009	Devid lawng a thui yotheenna he yahhuivuen aka reet hue ham bueng aw ? Moenih ta ! Yahhuivuen aka reet nawh hue hamla khaw awm . Caciim n'thui tangte angla , “ Abraham lawng Pathen te a oeng tih a oengna rang oen ahih te Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm . ”
45004010	Te tila Pathen lawng Abraham thlaangdoeng la a pawm te Abraham lawng yahhuivuen a reet coengah aw ? a reet thlan ah aw ? Yahhuivuen a reet coengah nawh tih a reet thlan ah ni .
45004011	Abraham lawng thlaangdoeng la a awm coengah yahhuivuen a reet , ahih kah yahhuivuen reet he tah a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm te a tuengna ham miknoek ni . Tedawngah yahhuivuen reetna ohla Pathen a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm thlaang boeih kah Muithla ben ah Abraham tah Pahaam la awm .
45004012	Ahih tah yahhuivuen aka reet hue kah Pahaam la khaw awm toengtoeng , metihtiah yahhuivuen reet bueng ohla Abraham lawng yahhuivuen a reet thlan vengah oengna oen a hing angla ahimi lawng oengna oen ah a hing u van dawngah ni .
45004013	Pathen lawng Abraham oen a cadil thli tengah dilai he nang kah koeva la awm ai , tila awl a kam vengah Abraham lawngah Phungawl a vai dawngah moenih ta , tede ahih lawng a tangna tih Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm dawngah ni .
45004014	Pathen awlkam he Phungawl aka vai hue lawng paang thai kawinih thlaanghing kah oengna he a hong la awm vetih Pathen kah awlkam tah apoeioep la ni a awm ai .
45004015	Phungawl lawngtah Pathen thinsana avan khuen , phungawl a awmna nawh huen atah phungawl eekna khaw awm van nawh .
45004016	Tedawngah te kah awlkamna tah oengna dawngah akung asut tih Abraham cadil boeih tengah Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo la awm , phungawl aka vai hue ham bueng nawh tih Abraham angla aka oeng thli boeih khaw awm van . Metihtiah Abraham tah Muithla ben ah mami boeih kah Pahaam la a awm dawngah ni .
45004017	Caciim lawng , “ Nang tah nam tawm thlaangphun kah Pahaam la kan sai poen ” tila a thui angla awm . Tedawngah he awlkam he tah Pathen haiah theen tih Abraham lawng a oeng Pathen tah thlaangduek thawhsakkung oen awm nawh te awmsakkung ni .
45004018	Abraham lawng ngaiuep ham n'tu khaw a awm nawh maiah pateng a oeng tih a ngaiuep dawngah “ Nam tawm thlaangphun kah Pahaam la coeng , ” Caciim lawng , “ Na cadil aisi yoeh la yahawh ai , ” tila a thui .
45004019	Abraham tah a kum yakhat cup tawmca poen tih thlaangduek angla a pumsa a awmna oen Sarah khaw ca-anau cuun thai tlaih nawh koeila a awm kawng te a poek khuep vengah a oengna tah yok roeroe nawh .
45004020	A oengna te hoett sut nawh tih Pathen kah awlkam te khaw uepvoet baal nawh ; a oengna tah tharana oen be tih Pathen te a thangpawm .
45004021	Ahih lawngtah Pathen lawng awl a kam coengthloeih te a sai ngaikhoek ai tila a tangna mangkhak .
45004022	Tedawngah Abraham tah a oengna rang oen Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm .
45004023	“ Ahih tah thlaangdoeng la a pawm ” ti he Abraham bueng ham a thut tila awm nawh .
45004024	Jesuh Khrih mami Bawipa duekna kalawng koep aka thawhsakkung te oengna rang oen thlaangdoeng la a pawm mami ham khaw a thut van .
45004025	Mami kah thawlhna phu ah ahih tah duek tih Pathen oen mami roeproeina ham a thawh sak koep .
45005001	Tahe ah tah oengna rang oen mami tah Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la n'khueh u poen tih mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen oen ah n'roep u poen .
45005002	Ahih lawngtah oengna rang oen mami he Pathen kah lungvatna khuila n'kuun puei u poen , te lungvatna khuiah tahe n'awm u . Tedawngah Pathen bawilenna n'bur haih u ai tila ngaiuepna oen n'tha thlue u .
45005003	Raina n'tawng vengah khaw tha n'thlue sak u , metihtiah raina lawngah uehthaina m'peek tila m'ming u tih ,
45005004	uehthaina lawngah Pathen kaw tawngna oen Pathen kaw tawngna lawngah ngaiuepna a thoeng sak tite m'ming u .
45005005	Pathen lawng a lungna te mami thinkaw khuiah Pathen amah kah kutdo Ciim Muithla oen ah avan toi poen dawngah he ngaiuepna lawng mami he kawpoek boet sak nawh .
45005006	Mami lawng n'tu khaw n'sai thai nawh vengah Pathen lawng atue atang a nuen tih mami thlaangthawlh hamla Khrih Jesuh tah duek .
45005007	Thlaangdoeng pakhat hamla thlaang pakhat duek ham rai tangkiik . Thlaang theen ham tah aka duek ngam khaw awm mai ai .
45005008	Tede , thlaangthawlh la n'awm vengah Khrih tah mami ham a duekna oen Pathen lawng mami he metila n'lungna tite a tueng sak poen .
45005009	Amah kah thisen oen tahe atah mami he Pathen oen ah n'roep u poen . Ahih rang oen Pathen kah thinsana kalawng metihtlukla n'thlawn tare ai !
45005010	Mami tah Pathen kah raal la ni n'awm u , tede a Capa duekna rang oen mami he paya laikoei la n'sai poen . Tahe atah Pathen kah paya laikoei la n'awm u poen dawngah Khrih hingna lawng mami he metihtlukla n'thlawn tare ai .
45005011	Te bueng nawh tih tahe ah Pathen kah paya laikoei la mami saikung mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah thaihu sai dawngah n'awmngaih u .
45005012	Thawlhna tah thlaang pakhat rang oen he dilai ah law tih ahih kah thawlhna lawng duekna avan khuen . Metihtiah thlaang boeih tah a thawlh dawngah thawlhna phu ah thlaangphun boeih te duekna lawng a khuk .
45005013	Phungawl a awm thlan ah dilai dawng thawlhna awm poen ; tede phungawl a awmna nawh huen ah thawlhna te thawlh la toeh pe nawh .
45005014	Tede Adam dung veng kalawng Mosi dung toe ah duekna lawng thlaanghing boeih te a uk , Adam lawng Pathen kah awlpeek te vai nawh tih a thawlh angla aka thawlh nawh thlaang thli khaw duekna lawng a uk boeih . Adam tah aka law ham koei thlaang pakhat te huhsakna ni .
45005015	Tede thlaang pahih te vai ahih nawh ; metihtiah Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo tah Adam kah thawlhna oen lo u nawh , te thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna dawng maiah thlaang yahawh duek ti he tah soeng ta-ngak . Tede Pathen kah lungvatna tah , te thlaang kah athe-arana lak ah apueh ngaaila bo tih tetih van toengtoengla thlaang pakhat Jesuh Khrih lungvatna rang oen thlaang yahawh ham aka thoeng Pathen kutdo tah bo tare ai .
45005016	Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo oen thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna tah lo u nawh . Thlaang pakhat a thawlh coengah awltloekna tah “ Na thawlh ” ti he ni ; tede thawlhna yahawh sawah atingtawkk nawh kutdo aka law tah “ Na thawlh nawh ! ” tila awltloekna he ni .
45005017	Thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna rang oen duekna lawng uk ham akung a tongnan ti he soeng tangtang . Te cakhaw thlaang pakhat Jesuh Khrih kah sai tah metihtlukla a bo ngaai . Pathen kah asoepbir lungvatna aka dang thlaang boeih tah ayoela amah oen roeproei u tih Khrih rang oen a hing khuiah taana oen hing u ai .
45005018	Tedawngah thlaang pakhat kah thawlhna dawngah thlaang boeih tah thlaangthawlh la awm , tetih van angla thlaang pakhat kah adoeng saina rang oen thlaang boeih a loeih sak tih ahimi te hingna a peek .
45005019	Thlaang pakhat kah awlngaaina nawh lawng thlaang boeih te thlaangthawlh la a coeng sak , tetih van angla thlaang pakhat kah awlngaaina rang oen thlaang boeih te Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a khueh ai .
45005020	Phungawl he tah thawlhpalhna a puungna ham ni , tede thawlhna apuungna huen ah Pathen kah lungvatna khaw puung tare .
45005021	Tedawngah thawlhna lawngtah duekna te a hawna tih a uk , tetih van angla doengna lawngtah Pathen kah lungvatna oen a uk tih mami kah Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami te dungyan hingna benla n'ceh puei u .
45006001	Tetih atah metila n'ti u lah ai ? Pathen kah lungvatna apuungna tare ham thawlhna te n'sai poepa ai aw ?
45006002	Te tih moenih ! Thawlhna ah n'duek u poen , metila thawlhna dawngah n'awm khuep thai ai ?
45006003	Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah mami baptisma n'dang vengah te a duekna ah baptisma n'dang haih poen tite ataktangla na ming u .
45006004	Tecoengah mami baptisma n'dang vengah mami tah ahih oen up haih la awm tih a duekna ah n'duek haih u , Khrih tah Pa kah ruep-awmna huham lawng duekna kalawng a thawh sak koep angla mami khaw hingna athaai oen hingna van ham ni .
45006005	A duekna ah amah oen n'duek haih atah a thawhna ah amah oen n'tho haih van ai .
45006006	Mami kah hing ruem te Jesuh Khrih oen thinglam dawngah khiing haih la awm poen tite m'ming u . Te tila a khiing haih he tah thawlhna oen aka be pumsa hing ruem te phe boeih tih thawlhna sal la awm tlaih nawh ham ni .
45006007	Metihtiah mami n'duek vengah thawlh tharana khui kalawng n'loeih u .
45006008	Khrih oen mami n'duek haih veng kalawng mami khaw amah oen n'hing haih van ai tila n'tang na .
45006009	Khrih tah duekna kalawng tho koep poen tih duek koep tlaih manawh tite m'ming u , duekna lawng a sawah ukna aana khueh roe tlaih manawh .
45006010	Te tila Khrih tah a duek poen dawngah thawlhna lawng a sawah huham khueh tlaih nawh ; Tahe a hingna he tah Pathen oen pawlneengna ah hing poen .
45006011	Tetih van angla nangmi lawngkhaw thawlhna ah thlaang duek la ka awm u tih Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah Pathen oen pawlneengna khuiah ka hing u poen tila poek uh .
45006012	Nangmi lawng na pumsa ngaihna te vai hamla aka duek thai nangmi pum te thawlhna lawng uk tlaih boel seh .
45006013	Tecoengah na pumvaang ame ang mai te khaw thaihu the saina ah hawna hamla thawlhna ah pe u tlaih boel . Te lak atah duekna kalawng hingna ah n'thawh sak koep angla doengna sai ham na pum boeih te Pathen te pe u hawn .
45006014	Thawlhna he nangmi kah bawi la awm tlaih boel seh ; metihtiah nangmi tah phungawl khuiah na awm u tlaih nawh tih Pathen lungvatna khuiah na awm u poen .
45006015	Tetih atah mami he phungawl huiah n'awm tlaih nawh tih Pathen lungvatna huiah n'awm u dawngah thawlhna n'sai ai aw ? N'sai manawh !
45006016	Thlaang pakhat khat kah awl te ngaai pe ham na pum na peek vengah te a awl na ngaai pe bawi kah sal la na awm tite ataktangla na ming u , tetih angla thawlhna awl te na ngaai u atah thawlhna sal la na awm u tih thawlhna phu tah duekna ni ; tetih van toengtoeng la Pathen awl na ngaai u atah , te awlngaaina phu tah nangmi te thlaangdoeng la n'khueh ai .
45006017	Tede Pathen te uem u lah ! Anoekbuet atah nangmi he thawlhna sal la na awm u de , tahe tah cangpueina dawngah na huh awltak na dang u te na thinkaw lungbui tak oen na vai u poen .
45006018	Nangmi tah thawlhna kalawng na loeih u poen tih doengna sal la na awm u poen .
45006019	( Nangmi lawng yaakmingna pumsa ben ah na khueh u nawh dawngah yaakming thai koei tihinhang kah awl ka hawna ) N'cui veng atah nangmi lawng athe sai hamla aciimcaih nawh oen athe-arana ah na pum te sal la na peek u rapcaat . Tetih van la tahe tah aciimcaih saina hamla na pum te doengna sal la pe u rapcaat loeih .
45006020	Nangmi tah thawlhna sal la na awm u vengah te doengna khui kalawng na loeih u .
45006021	Tahe ah nangmi lawng na yah puei thaihu na sai u te hoeikhangna awm aw ? Te thaihu thli kah aphu tah duekna ni !
45006022	Tede tahe tah nangmi he thawlhna kalawng na loeih u poen tih Pathen kah sal la ni na awm u poen , Nang kah hoeikhangna tah na hingna te amah tengah na peek biit tih aphu tah dungyan hingna te ni .
45006023	Thawlh phu tah duekna ni . Tede Pathen kah ayoe peek kutdo tah mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah dungyan hingna te ni .
45007001	Maya manau thli , nangmi lawng yuvaa la awmna phung he acek aneh la na ming u poen dawngah nangmi tengah ka thui ham koei he khaw na ming u badai . Thlaanghing he a hing khui bueng ni yuvaa la awmna phung lawng a uk .
45007002	Thuina maiah , vaa aka sa hutaa pakhat he a vaa a hing khui bueng ni yuvaa la awmna phung lawng a piin . A vaa te a duek atah yuvaa la a awmna hih phung kah piinna kalawng loeih poen .
45007003	Tedawngah te hutaa lawng a vaa a hing hun maiah thlaangtloe vaana kawinih te hutaa te samphaih n'ti ai . Tede a vaa te a duek coeng atah te hutaa tah thlaanghoeng la a awm poen dawngah vaa a sak atah samphaih miingna tlaih nawh .
45007004	Maya manau thli , nangmi khaw te tila na awm u van . Nangmi tah Khrih kah pum vaang la na awm u poen dawngah Phungawl kah ukna khuiah hingna te na hoett u poen . Mami he Pathen kah biibina ah aphu aka awm la coeng ham tahe atah duekna kalawng aka tho koep Khrih kah thlaang la na awm u poen .
45007005	Thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna oen n'hing u vengah Phungawl lawng a bawnghorh dawngah thawlh sai ngaihna lawng mami pum khuiah bii a bi tih mami te n'duek sak .
45007006	Tede tahe tah Phungawl kah piinna thong khuiah te n'duek u poen dawngah Phungawl dawng kalawng n'loeih u poen . Tahe atah ca oen a thut phungawl lawngpui ruem ah bii m'bi u tlaih nawh tih Muithla ben kah lawngpui thaai ah ni bii m'bi u poen .
45007007	Tetih atah Phungawl amah roe he thawlh n'ti u thai ai aw ? Thawlh n'ti thai manawh ! Tede thawlhna he aka mingsakkung tah Phungawl ni . Phungawl lawng , “ Thlaang kah thaihu naai boel , ” tila van thui nawh kawinih thaihu naaina ti he ka ming manawh .
45007008	Tede he tila thawlhna lawngtah awlpeek dawngah bii a bi tih ka pumsa dawngah ngaihna soeprep te a bawnghorh , Phungawl a awmna nawh atah thawlhna he aka duek thaihu ni .
45007009	Kai kamah roe he n'cui vengah Phungawl ohla khaw ka sak , tede awlpeek te a law vengah tah thawlhna lawng hing tih kai tah ka duek .
45007010	Hingna aka pe ham koei awlpeek lawng he duekna avan thoeng puei lat .
45007011	Thawlhna lawng atue theen a dang tih awlpeek te a hawna vetkat tih n'thai n'latna ; te awlpeek oen kai te ng'ngawn .
45007012	Tedawngah Phungawl tah ciim tih awlpeek khaw ciim , doeng tih theen .
45007013	Tetih atah athe thaihu lawng Kai ham duekna avan thoeng sak ti ngaihna aw ? Tetih moenih . Te tila aka thoeng sak te tah thawlhna ni ; Thawlhna lawng thawlhna tangtang la a awmna te a tuengna ham atheen thaihu te a hawna tih kai ham duekna te avan khuen . Tedawngah thawlhna he mueirihtamyiin thawlhna ni tila awlpeek rang oen tueng tare .
45007014	Phungawl he muithla ben thaihu ni tite mami lawng m'ming u ; tede kai tah thawlhna tengla sal angla a yoeih thlaang ni .
45007015	Kai lawng ka sai he ka yaakming nawh ; sai ham ka ngaih te ka sai nawh tih ka ngaih nawh dai te ka sai lat .
45007016	Sai ham ka ngaih nawh te ka sai vengah Phungawl te soeng tila ka kawtlaak puei van .
45007017	Tedawngah he thaihu aka sai tangtang he kai nawh tih ka khuiah aka awm thawlhna te ni .
45007018	Ka khuiah he thlaanghing la ka coenggna ah atheen awm nawh tila ka ming . Ka khuiah atheen sai ngaihna awm mai cakhaw atheen te ka sai thai nawh .
45007019	Sai ham ka ngaih atheen te ka sai nawh ; sai hamla ka ngaih nawh athe te lat ka sai .
45007020	Kai lawng sai ham ka ngaih nawh te ka sai atah , te aka saikung tah kai tlaih nawh tih ka khuiah aka awm thawlhna lawng ni a sai tite thui ka ngaih .
45007021	Tedawngah he phungawl lawng bii a bi tila ka ming : atheen sai ham ka ngaih vengah kai lawngtah athe bueng te ka tuek .
45007022	Ka khui benkah thlaanghing lawngtah Pathen kah phungawl dawngah te awmngaih .
45007023	Tede ka pum khuikah phungawl tloe lawng bii a bi he ka ming , te phungawl te tah ka thinkaw lawng a ngaih phungawl te aka oel mangkhak awm . Te phungawl lawngah ka pum khuiah bii aka bi thawlhna phungawl khuiah thongtla angla te n'sai .
45007024	Ngaihang khawbing la ka awm mah aw ! Duekna la aka ceh puei he kah ka pum dawng kalawng a-u lawng n'thlawn lah ai ?
45007025	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlawnna saikung Pathen te uem u lah ! Tedawngah ka coenggna tangtang tah he ni : Kamah ben atah ka thlaanghing coenggna lawngah thawlhna phungawl te a vai vengah ka kawpoek bueng oen Pathen phungawl te ka vai thai .
45008001	Tahe tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla aka awm thli ham tah thawlh awlcekna awm tlaih nawh .
45008002	Metihtiah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla hingna ah mami aka ceh puei Muithla kah phungawl lawng duekna oen thawlhna phungawl khui kalawng mami te n'loeih sak poen .
45008003	Thlaanghing pumsa a tha ayoek dawngah Phungawl lawng a sai thai nawh te Pathen lawng a sai . Thlaanghing pumsa ah aka awm thawlhna te a Capa avan tuihna rang oen a phe poen . Thawlhna taa hamla thlaanghing kah thawlhna pumsa angla va law .
45008004	Pathen lawng he tila a sai he tah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla nawh tih Muithla ngaihna angla aka hing mami pum dawngah Phungawl lawng akuek doengna te asoepna ham ni .
45008005	Amami kah pumsa ngaihna angla aka hing thlaang tah pumsa ngaihna lawng a thinkaw te a uk . Muithla kah ngaihna angla aka hing thlaang tah Muithla ngaihna lawng a thinkaw te a uk .
45008006	Pumsa ngaihna ah khawsak phu tah duekna ni . Muithla ngaihna ah khawsak phu tah hingna oen ngaimawngna ni .
45008007	Tedawngah thlaanghing lawng amami pumsa ngaihna angla a awm a tah Pathen raal la awm ; ahimi lawng Pathen kah phungawl te vai nawh , ahimi lawngah vai khaw vai thai roe nawh .
45008008	Amami kah pumsa ngaihna aka vai thli lawngtah Pathen te a kaw hoe sak thai nawh .
45008009	Tede nangmi tah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna ah na awm u nawh , Pathen Muithla nangmi khuiah ataktangla a awm atah Muithla kawngaih angla na awm u . A-u khaw Khrih Muithla aka khueh nawh tah Khrih amah koe la awm nawh .
45008010	Tede Khrih te nangmi khuiah a awm atah thawlhna dawngah na pum te duek mai cakhaw nangmi tah Pathen oen na roep u poen dawngah nangmi kah muithla tah hing .
45008011	Jesuh te duekna kalawng aka thawh sak Pathen Muithla te nangmi khuiah a awm atah , Khrih te duekna kalawng aka thawh sak Pathen Muithla nangmi khuiah a awm dawngah nangmi kah aka duek ham koei pum te hingna a peek van ai .
45008012	Tedawngah maya manau hue , mami lawng sai ham koei n'khueh u , tede mami kah thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla hing ham awm nawh .
45008013	Nangmi lawng thlaanghing pumsa ngaihna angla na hing u atah na duek u ai ; tede nangmi lawng thawlhna na sai thli te Muithla oen na ngawn atah na hing u ai .
45008014	Pathen Muithla lawng a mawt thlaang thli tah Pathen kah ca-anau la awm .
45008015	Metihtiah Pathen lawng m'peek u Muithla tah nangmi te sal la coengg sak ham oen ah birih ngaihuet sak ham nawh tih ; te Muithla lawngtah nangmi te Pathen kah ca-anau la sai ham ni . Te Muithla kah tharana rang oen Pathen te , “ A Pa ! a Pa ! ” tila n'khue thai .
45008016	Mami he Pathen amah kah ca-anau la n'awm tite thui ham Pathen kah Muithla amah roe te mami kah muithla oen tuhkai haih hih .
45008017	Mami tah amah kah ca-anau la n'awm u veng kalawng a thlaang hue ham a khueh pe kam-awm yotheenna te n'dang van ai . Pathen lawng Khrih ham a khueh pe te mami lawngkhaw m'paang van ai ; metihtiah Khrih kah patangraina te n'cuut u atah , mami lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te khaw m'paang van ai .
45008018	Tahe veng mami kah patang palai khangna he hai benkah mami tengah aka thoeng ham koei ruep-awmna oen ah nuehtah koei nawh ni tila ka poek .
45008019	Pathen lawng a ca-anau thli tengah a tueng sak ham koei te a thaihu suen boeih lawng ngaiuep tangkiik oen a lamtoen u .
45008020	Pathen lawng a thaihu suen boeih te apoei apit la awm ham dan a peek . Te tila a awm he thaihu suen thli amami kah kawngaih dawngah nawh tih Pathen amah kawngaih ni . Tede ngai-uepna tah awm hun .
45008021	Te ngaiuepna tah hin at vengah ngoen a thaihu suen boeih lawngah rawkna koei sal piinna kalawng loeih vetih Pathen ca thli kah loeihna ruep-awm te a dang u van ai .
45008022	Tecoengah a suen thaihu lawng tahe tue toe ah camoe awm tawm vengkah a tlawh angla tlawhna oen kopaang u tite mami lawng m'ming u .
45008023	Te tila a suen thaihu bueng lawngah kopaang u nawh , Muithla te lamhacuek Pathen kutdo la aka dang mami pum he loeih sak ham aka ring mami boeih khaw kawdaang ah ng'kopaang u van .
45008024	Metihtiah ngaiuepna oen thlawn la n'awm u . Tede mami lawng n'ngaiuep u te n'huh atah tete ngaiuepna tangtang moenih . Mik huh tangte te a-u lawng a ngaiuep nooek kai ?
45008025	Tede mik huh nawh te n'ngaiuep u atah mami lawng kawdaw oen n'ring u .
45008026	Te tila mami tha a yoek dawngah mami bawmcem hamla Muithla tah va law . Mami lawng metila thangthui ham koei ti khaw m'ming u nawh dawngah awl oen thui thai nawh kopaangna oen Muithla lawng mami ham Pathen tengah avan bih .
45008027	Mami kah thinkaw aka ming Pathen lawng Muithla kah kawpoek te khaw a ming ; metihtiah Muithla lawngtah Pathen amah kah kawngaih angla a thlaang thli yuengah a bih pe dawngah ni .
45008028	Pathen lawngtah amah aka lungna thli ham oen amah lawng a kamthlahna angla a khue thlaang thli lawng atheenna ham thaihu boeih he a sai pe tila m'ming u .
45008029	Pathen lawng a tuek tangte thlaang thli te amah Capa angla a coenggna ham a thloekcala a thloeng , te tila a sai he tah amah aka oeng thlaang yahawh tim ah a Capa te ahaamkoek camiing awmthang la awm sak ham ni .
45008030	Tedawngah Pathen lawng athloekla a thloeng thlaang thli te a khue ; te tila a khue thlaang thli te amah oen a roep u sak tih a ruep-awmna te khaw a paang sak .
45008031	Tetih atah he kawngah he n'tu nuem mami lawng n'thui thai ai ? Pathen lawng mami he m'pai puei atah a-u lawng mami he n'raalna ai ?
45008032	Pathen lawng a Capa khueh duen pateng haih ohla mami ham m'peek ! Mami hamla a Capa pekung lawng soeprep boeih he ayoela mami peek muehla awm ai aw ?
45008033	Pathen lawng a tuek thlaang te a-u lawng thawlh a peel thai ai ? Pathen amah lawngah na thawlh nawh a tina poen .
45008034	Tedawngah ahimi te a-u lawng thawlh a peel thai ai ? Khrih Jesuh lawngkhaw thawlh peel manawh ; Ahih tah duek , tede tho koep , Pathen bantang ben ah ngawl tih mami hamla reenna avan bih .
45008035	Tedawngah a-u lawng mami he Khrih kah lungna dawng kalawng m'pekbo thai ai ? Raina , heemtekna , khawkhana , khawdengna , mueirihtamyiin duekna lawngah m'pek thai ai aw ?
45008036	Caciim lawngah , “ Nangmi kawngah kaimi tah mueirihtamyiin duekna oen ah saringrupla khawyungkhun ka awm u ; Ngawn ham a teeng mangkhak tuu angla kaimi he ka awm u ” tila a thui angla awm tangtang .
45008037	N'tu lawngkhaw , pek thai manawh , he ang raina thaihu thli boeih he mami aka lungnakung rang oen mami lawng n'taa boeih ai .
45008038	Metihtiah n'tu thaihu lawngkhaw amah kah lungna dawng kalawng m'pekbo thai manawh tite aciimphanla ka ming : duekna oen hingna lawngkhaw , vanthlaang thli oen vaan kah ukkung thli tha-awm tharana lawngkhaw , tahe kah atue atang oen hailam ben atue-atang lawngkhaw ,
45008039	dilai sawah aka awm thaihu , dilai dangah aka awm thaihu lawngkhaw mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah lungna dawng kalawng , a thaihu suen boeih khuikah me ang lawngkhaw m'pek thai roe manawh .
45009001	Awltak tang ka thui ; Khrih kah thlaang la ka awm tih hoem awl ka thui nawh . Ciim Muithla lawng a uk athe atheen ka mingna lawngkhaw hoem awl ka thui nawh te a ming .
45009002	Ka thlaangphun ka thi ka sa la aka awm thli hamla ka kaw the tangkiik tih ka thinphatna lawng boet nawh .
45009003	Ahimi hamla atheen koei atah kai lawng Pathen kawsi yawkk tih Khrih oen pek u ham pateng ka ngaih ngaai .
45009004	Ahimi tah Pathen thlaangtuek ni : a ca la a khueh tih ahimi tengah a ruep-awmna te a tueng sak . Ahimi tengah awlkamna te a sai tih Phungawl thli te a peek u , ahimi lawng aka soeng bokna te a khueh u , Pathen kah awlkamna te a huh u ,
45009005	Ahimi tah Hebru thlaangphun cuunkung patuer miingthang thli kah cadil la awm u , thlaanghing ben atah Khrih pateng ahimi kah a phun ni . Soeprep boeih ukkung Pathen tah yoeyahla a thaang theen hawn seh ! Amen .
45009006	Israel thlaang thli he apumboeihla Pathen thlaangtuek la a awm aih nawh dawngah Pathen awlkam tah apoei-oep poen ni tila ka thui ngaihna nawh ni . Metihtiah Israel thlaang boeih he khaw Pathen kah thlaang boeih aih nawh ni .
45009007	Abraham cadil hue khaw apumboeihla Pathen cadil la awm boeih aih nawh . Pathen lawng Abraham te , “ Kai lawng awl ka kam cadil nauha te Isak rang oen ah na khueh ai , ” a tina .
45009008	A thuingaihna tah thlaanghing phung mailai oen cuun la aka awm ca-anau boeih he Pathen kah ca-anau la awm luem nawh . Pathen awlkam heet angla a cuun ca-anau te ni cadil nauha taktak la a khueh .
45009009	Pathen lawng awl a kam tah , “ Atue atang a tluep vengah kava meel koep vetih Sarah lawng capa a cuun ai , ” a tina te ni .
45009010	Tecoengah , he bueng nawh hun , Rebekka capa rawi lawngkhaw mami kah patuer Isak te ni anna pa na hih van .
45009011	Tede capa pakhat a tuek te tah amah kah mengtengna te asoepna ham ni ; tedawngah Pathen lawng Rebekka te , “ Ahaamca lawng anoca kah bii a bi pe ai , ” a tina . He awl he tah ahih rawi boeinau te a cuun thlan vengah a thui ni , ahih rawi lawng athe atheen n'tu khat khaw a sai hih thlan ah ni a thui ; tedawngah Pathen kah tuekna he tah amah kah khuena dawngah akung asut tih ahih rawi boeinau kah saina dawngah nawh ni .
45009013	Caciim lawng , “ Jakob tah ka lungna tih Esau tah ka thina , ” a ti angla ni .
45009014	Tetih atah Pathen he tuueng-aleng roe nawh n'ti thai ai aw ? N'ti manawh .
45009015	Metihtiah Mosi tengah , “ Kamah lawng ka ngaih te ka reen vetih ; kamah lawng ka ngaih te tah ka thintlawhna ai , ” tila a thui .
45009016	Tedawngah soeprep he mami thlaanghing kawngaih oen saina dawng nawh tih Pathen kah reenna rang oen ni .
45009017	Pathen lawng Iyipt sengpahrang nala , “ Kai kah tharana huham oen ah dilai pum ah ka miing aka thang sak ham roe la nang tah sengpahrang la kan khueh , ” tila caciim lawng a thui .
45009018	Tedawngah Pathen lawng amah ngaih te tah a reen tih amah lawng a ngaih te tah a thin a haam sak mai poen .
45009019	Tede nangmi tim kah thlaang pakhat mai lawngah , “ He tila a awm oh atah a-u lawngah Pathen kawngaih te a oelh ataih thai ai , ” na ti u mai ai .
45009020	Ka paya , nang ta a-u la na awm aih tih Pathen te awl na thung ngam ? Dilai am lawng ambawpkung te , “ N'tu ah he tila nan sai , ” tila doet nawh .
45009021	Ambawpkung lawngah amlai te a lawh tih amah ngaih angla a sai thai tih amlaiboeng pakhat te am pahih la a sai tih pakhat te tah awmthoet ah hawna am mailai oen ah pakhat te tah tuisii-am la a sai .
45009022	Tetih van la te Pathen thaihu sai khaw awm . A thinsana oen a tharana te tueng sak ham a ngaih , tede ahih kah thinsana a yawkk dawngah rawk tih phe ham koeila aka awm thli sawah thinsan kawdawna a khueh .
45009023	Tecoengah amah kah aka soep ruep-awmna te tueng sak a ngaih tih amah kah reenna aka dang mami sawah a ruep-awmna te avan toi , mami he a ruep-awmna dang hamla a roek a bah tangte poen ni .
45009024	Mami tah a thlaangkhue la ng'awm u , Judah thlaangphun timkah bueng nawh tih Gental thlaangphun timkah khaw a khue .
