45009025	He tah Hosi cabu khuiah a thui te ni : “ Ka thlaang la ka awm nawh thli te ‘ Ka thlaang , ’ ka tina ai . Ka lungna nawh thlaangphun te , ‘ Ka lungna thlaangphun , ’ ka tina ai .
45009026	‘ Nangmi tah ka thlaang la na awm u nawh ' a tina huen roe ah nangmi tah aka hing Pathen kah ca-anau thli ni a tina ai , ” tila a thui .
45009027	Israel thlaangphun kawngah Isaiah lawng , “ Israel thlaangphun he tuitunlii keengkah divinlai yoeh maila pateng yahawh cakhaw ahimi timkah thlaang a yawlca bueng lawng ni thlawnna a dang ai ;
45009028	Metihtiah , dilai he amah kah athe atheenna angla Bawipa lawng awl a cek yue ai , ” tila a thui .
45009029	He veng thlan ah Isaiah lawng , “ Tharakoek Bawipa lawng mami kah cadil nauha khatsut te thlung nawh kawinih mami he Sodom angla n'coengg vetih , Gomorrah angla ni ng'awm poen ai ” tila a thui oepsoeh poen .
45009030	Tedawngah kaimi lawng ka thui tah Pathen oen roeproei ham aka yawm nawh Gental thlaangphun lawngah oengna rang oen ah Pathen oen roeproei u poen ;
45009031	Tede Pathen oen roeproeina hamla phungawl aka tlap khiing Pathen kah thlaangphun lawngah roepna te dang u nawh .
45009032	N'tu ah a dang u nawh ? Ahimi lawng oengna dawngah pangtung nawh tih amami kah saina te a uep apaangna dawngah ni . Te tila “ Ploengna lungto dawngah ploeng u tih ,
45009033	Caciim lawngah , “ Bueh lah ! Zaion ah lungto pakhat ka khueh , te lungto lawng thlaang thli te a ploeng sak vetih , te lunghiim lawngah ahimi te a tlim sak ai . Tede a-u khaw ahih te a tangna atah yaraula awm tlaih manawh , ” tila a thui .
45010001	Maya manau thli , ka thlaangphun lawng thlawnna dang u seh tila thinkaw tak oen ka ngaih tangkiik ! Ahimi ham metihtlukla Pathen tengah ka thangthui .
45010002	Ahimi lawng a thinkaw te Pathen a peek tangtang tila nangmi tengah ka thui rapcaat thai ; tede ahimi kah thinkaw a peek he cuihna taktak dawngah kung asut moenih .
45010003	Pathen lawng thlaang he me ang along a-im oen amah oen ah a roep u sak ti he ahimi lawng ming u nawh , amami kah lawngpui te sai ham a yawm u dai , tedawngah Pathen lawng amah oen thlaanghing roepna a sai lawngpui te paang u nawh .
45010004	Jesuh Khrih lawng Phungawl te aboet sak poen dawngah a-u khaw aka tangna thlaang boeih tah Pathen oen roeproeina a dang poen .
45010005	Mosi lawngtah Phungawl vaina rang oen Pathen oen ah roepna kawng te a thut : “ A-u khaw Phungawl lawng sai a tite aka sai boeih tah hing ai , ” ti .
45010006	Tede Caciim lawng , oengna rang oen Pathen oen ah roeproeina kawng a thui tah tila ni : “ Nang lawngah , a-u nuem vaan la aka luui hang ai ? ’ tila namah oen namah te doet u boel , ” ( te tah Khrih te aka rum puei ham tila thuingaihna ni . )
45010007	“ A-u nuem celkhui khaw la aka cet thuk ai ? tila khaw ti boel ? . ( te tah Khrih te duekna kalawng thawh sak ham tila thuingaihna ni . )
45010008	A thui awl lawngtah , “ Pathen awl tah na tengah awm , na huui na kaa dawngah na thinkaw khuiah awm ” a tite tah kaimi lawng ka phawng u oengna awlthang he ni .
45010009	Jesuh tah Bawipa ni tila na phawng u tih Pathen lawngah ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak koep tila thinkaw oen na tangna u atah thlawn la na awm ai .
45010010	Metihtiah mami lawng oengna rang oen Pathen oen ah roeproeina n'huh ; kaa oen m'phawng tih thlawnna n'dang u .
45010011	Caciim lawng , “ A-u khaw amah aka tangna boeih tah yarau yahdengla awm manawh ” ti .
45010012	Metihtiah Judah oen Gental thlaangphun pekthlena a awm tlaih nawh dawngah thlaang boeih thuum poen ; Pathen tah thlaang boeih kah Bawipa la awm tih amah te aka khue boeih tah yotheen kawthawina yahawh hlang a lun thil .
45010013	Caciim lawng , “ A-u lawngkhaw bawmna a ngaih dawngah Bawipa te a khue atah thlawnna a dang ai , ” tila a thui angla te awm tangtang .
45010014	Tede ahimi lawng a tangna nawh atah bawmna dang ham metila a miing te a khue thai ai ? Ahimi lawng awlthang te a yaak nawh atah metila a tangna thai ai ? Awlthang te a thui nawh atah metila ahimi lawng a yaak thai ai ?
45010015	A thuikung laipai te tuih la a awm nawh atah metila awlthang te a phawng ai ? Caciim lawng , “ Awlthang Theen van khuenkung laipai thli kah a khow tah theen tangkiik hlang mah aw ! ” tila a thui angla awm tangtang .
45010016	Tede thlaang boeih lawng Awlthang Theen te do u nawh . Isaiah amah lawngkhaw , “ Bawipa , kaimi lawng ka phawng u awlthang he a-u lawng a tangna ? ” tila a thui .
45010017	Tedawngah oengna tah awlthang yaakna dawng kalawng va law tih awlthang tah Khrih te thuina dawng kalawng va law .
45010018	Tede awldoet ka ngaih tah : ahimi lawng awlthang he ya u nawh tangtang aw ? A yaak u ta ; Metihtiah Caciim lawng , “ Ahimi kah paang awl lawng dilai pum ah thaang khok tih ahimi awl tah dilai boetna toe kheng a pha , ” tila a thui .
45010019	Koep kan doet lah ai : Israel thlaang-thli lawng yaakming u nawh aw ? Lamhacuekla awl aka thung ham tah Mosi amah ni . Ahih lawng , “ Ka thlaangphun te uett-ee hamla , thlaangphun la toeksam nawh te ka hawna vetih , thlaang ngau paathuu phun rang oen ka thlaangphun te a thin ka sa sak ai , ” tila a thui .
45010020	Tong-aa ohla Isaiah lawng thincakla a thui tah , “ Kai aka tlap nawh thlaang thli lawng ng'huh u ; Kai he aka thoel-alang nawh thlaang thli tengah ka phumpho pe , ” tila a thui .
45010021	Tede Israel thlaangphun kawng oen tuhkaila tah , “ Awl ngaai nawh tih ceem raal la aka tho thlaang thli te do hamla khawyungkhun kut ka son , ” tila a thui .
45011001	Tetih atah Pathen lawng a thlaang thli te a hoett poen aw ? Hoett roe roe nawh ! Kai kamah khaw Israel thlaang , Abraham cadil , Benjamin phun ni .
45011002	Pathen lawng acuekca kalawng a tuek tangte a thlaang thli te hoett sut nawh . Caciim dawngkah awl , Elijah lawngah Israelca thli sawah a kaw a lawna nawh Pathen tengah a thui te nangmi lawng na ming u :
45011003	Elijah lawng , “ Bawipa , nang kah tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih nang kah bokna-thaang khaw a phe boeih u ; kai bueng he ka deem de , kai khaw ngawn ham n'teeng u ” a tina .
45011004	Pathen lawng n'tu awl a thui pe ? “ Baal pathen rawlrap aka bok nawh thlaang thong sarih kamah hamla ka paih hun ” a tina .
45011005	Tetih toeng la ni tahe khaw a awm : Pathen lawng a lungvatna dawngah a tuek tangte ayawl tah awm van hun .
45011006	Pathen kah tuekna tah ahimi kah saina dawngah nawh tih amah kah lungvatna dawngah ni kung asut . Pathen kah tuekna he thlaanghing kah saina dawngah kung asut atah ahih kah lungvatna te lungvatna tangtang la awm manawh .
45011007	Tetih atah metila a awm ? Israel hue lawng a tlap te hu u nawh . Pathen lawng a tuek ayawlca bueng lawng ni a huh ; atloe hue tah a haa pang malhtalh tih Pathen kah khuena awl te ya nawh .
45011008	Caciim lawngah , “ Pathen lawng ahimi kah thinkaw oen lungbui te a mong sak ; tihin toe ah ahimi lawng hu thai nawh tih ya thai u nawh , ” tila a thui angla awm tangtang .
45011009	Tecoengah Devid lawng , “ Amami kah poei khuiah tu selang dong dawngah man u seh ; Ahimi te ploeng u selang dan tat u seh ! .
45011010	Ahimi lawng a huh thaina nawh ham a mik thli te pum sak selang ; patang raina thalrih phueih uett ah a uen te khun roepsoet u seh , ” tila a thui .
45011011	Tetih atah awl kan doet u lah ai : Judah thlaang thli lawng a tlim u vengah rawk poe taktak poen aw ? A rawk tang aih moenih . Ahimi lawng a thawlh u dawngah Gental thlaang thli tengah thlawnna te va law . Tedawngah Judah thlaang thli lawng uett-eena ahimi sawah a khueh u .
45011012	Judah thlaang thli kah thawlhna lawng dilai ah yotheen kam-awmna yahawh avan khuen tih ahimi kah sung-adeuhna lawng Gental hue hamla yotheen kam-awmna yahawh hlang avan khuen . Tecoengah Judah thlaang yahawh lawng asoepcala a thuum u van veng atah yotheen kam-awmna te metihtlukla asoep tare ai !
45011013	Tahe tah Gental thlaang thli nangmi tengah awl kavan thui . Gental hue nangmi tengah celtuih la ka awm khui roekk tah bii ka bina dawngah ka thangpawm u ai .
45011014	Ka thlaangphun thli te uett-eena thinkaw a khueh sak he tah thlaangvaang mai khaw thlawn thaina ham ni .
45011015	Metihtiah ahimi te hoett sut la a awm vengah thlaangtloe boeih te Pathen kah raal la awmna kalawng a paya laikoei la a sai . Tedawngah ahimi Judah thlaangphun te a do koep veng atah metila a awm tare ai ? Thlaangduek thli ham hingna la coengg ai .
45011016	Takawi lamhacuek la thluem at te Pathen teng a nawn atah takawi boeih amah koe la awm poen ; tecoengah thingkung ayung te Pathen tengah na nawn poen atah a beek-athleeng boeih te ahih kah akoe la awm poen .
45011017	Olif thingkung a liing u a beek thli khatsut te a tloek u tih te kah thingngaw dawngah te olif thingkung rawlrap a beek thli te oen a cong u . Te tila nangmi Gental thlaangphun khaw olif thing rawlrap angla na awm u tih , tahe tah Judah thlaangphun thli kah muithla ben hingna tharana te na bawn u van poen .
45011018	Tedawngah olif thingbeek tloek poet angla aka awm thli te huhsit u boel . Metila nangmi lawng na oekthloen thai lauh ? Nangmi tah a beek mai ni ; nangmi lawng akungpui te na cawm na cah moenih , nangmi te ni akungpui lawng n'cawm u .
45011019	Tede nangmi lawng , “ Kaimi awmna hamla ni a beek thli te a tloek ” na ti u mai ai .
45011020	Te ngoen tah soeng tangtang . Ahimi lawng a oeng u nawh dawngah a tloek tangtang , nangmi tah na oeng u dawngah na awmna huen ah te na awm u . Tede he kawngah oekthloen u boel lang rih lat u hawn .
45011021	Thingkung kah a beek tangtang la aka awm Judah hue pateng Pathen lawng a thlung nawh atah nangmi te n'thlung ai tila na poek aw ?
45011022	He ah he Pathen kah thlaang reenna kaw a poekna oen rih koei la a awm te n'huh u . Aka tlim thli ham tah rih awm tangkiik tede nangmi te tah n'reen u , nangmi lawng a reenna khuiah na awm u poe atah reenna kaw avan poek ai , tede na awm u nawh atah nangmi khaw tloek poet la na awm u van ai .
45011023	Judah thlaangphun lawng a oengna nawh paihuen te a ceh taak u atah acuek kah a awmna paihuen ah te a khueh koep ai , Pathen lawngtah khueh koep thaina nawl a khueh .
45011024	Nangmi Gental thlaang thli tah , ramhum ah amah poek aka po olif thingkung dawngkah a beek thli a tloek poet tih olif thingkung tang dawngah a cong tlap oen na lo u . Judah thlaang thli tah olif thingkung tang oen lo u tih olif thingkung tang dawng-kah a tloek poet a beek thli te akungpui tang dawngah cong koep hamla Pathen ham tah yoeica mai .
45011025	Ka maya manau thli , nangmi lawng ka cuih ka hoe heet poen tila na poek u nawh ham nangmi te ming sak ka ngaih awlhuep pakhat awm . Te awlhuep tah he ni . Israel thlaang thli a thin a haam khaklal he aboet toe ham nawh ni , Gental thlaang thli Pathen tengah asoepcala apha thlan khui ham bueng ni .
45011026	Tecoengah Israel thlaang boeih thlawn la a awm na ham tah he tila ni . Caciim lawng , “ Zaion kalawng Thlawnkung tah law vetih Jakob cadil thli kah athe arana boeih te a voeih ai .
45011027	Ahimi kah thawlhna te ka lawh pe boeih vengah he awlkamna he ahimi oen ka sai ai , ” tila a thui .
45011028	Awlthang Theen a hoett u dawngah Judah hue tah Pathen kah raal la awm u . Te tah nangmi Gental thlaang thli theenna ham ni . Tede Pathen kah tuekna ben atah ahimi tah amami kah patuer thli rang oen Pathen kah paya laikoei la awm u .
45011029	Pathen lawngtah a tuek thlaang thli oen yotheen kam-awm a peek thlaang thli kawngah a kawpoek thloet nawh .
45011030	Nangmi Gental thli lawng anoekbuet atah Pathen awl te na ngaai u nawh , tede tahe ah Judah thlaang thli lawng a awl a ngaai pe u nawh dawngah nangmi lawng Pathen reenna te na dang u .
45011031	Tetih van angla nangmi lawng na dang u reenna te ahimi lawngkhaw Pathen reenna te tahe ah a dangna u van ham Judah thli lawng tahe toe ah Pathen awl te ngaai pe u nawh .
45011032	Pathen lawng thlaang boeih he awl ngaai nawh thongtla thlaang la a sai he tah ahimi boeih tengah a reenna te tueng sak ham a ngaih dawngah ni .
45011033	Pathen tah len kueng tangkiik mah aw ! A cuihna oen a mingna tah dung tangkiik mah aw ! A awltloekna he a-u lawng a thuicaih thai ai ? A thaihu sai along a-im he a-u lawng a yaakming thai lek ai ?
45011034	Caciim lawng , “ Bawipa kah thinkaw te a-u lawng a ming ? a-u lawngah poekna a peek thai ?
45011035	Ahih lawng sah koep hamla a-u lawngah thaihu a peek ? ” tila a thui angla te awm .
45011036	Thaihu boeih he amah lawng a sai , thaihu boeih amah rang oen awm tih amah ham ni . Pathen tengah ayoeyahla ruep-awmna awm hawn seh ! Amen .
45012001	Tedawngah maya manau thli , Pathen lawng mami he n'reen tangkiik dawngah amah bii bina ah amah kah kawtlaak la aka hing luciik angla na pum te Pathen tengah nawn uh tila nangmi te kan ceel u . He tah aka soeng bokna tih nangmi lawng na peek ham koei bokna te ni .
45012002	He dilai khawsak siing angla khaw sa u tlaih boel , tede Pathen lawng nangmi thinkaw a khui ben te asoepbirla van thaw pan hawn seh . Te atah aka theen thaihu , aka soep thaihu oen amah kawtlaak te nangmi lawng na ming u thai ai , he tah Pathen amah kawngaih ni .
45012003	Pathen kah lungvatna kutdo ka dangna rang oen he awl he nangmi boeih tengah ka thui : Namah oen namah te atuueng aleng lak ah asang la poek u aih boel . Te lak atah Pathen lawng oengna m'peek taring ah namah oen namah te nainawng u lah .
45012004	Mami lawng pum pakhat dawngah abeek yahawh n'khueh u tih , he a beek thli lawng bii atloe tloe rip a khueh u .
45012005	Tetih van la mami khaw thlaang yahawh mai de Khrih ah pumkhatla awmna rang oen pumkhatla n'coengg tih pum dawngkah abeek tloe tloe he pakhat oen pakhat a tuhkai u van angla mami khaw khat oen khat m'pha u boeih .
45012006	Tedawngah kutdo aphun tloetloe n'dang rip u tah Pathen kah peek lungvatna kutdo n'dang taring ah hawna u sih . Pathen kah awl te thui thaina kutdo te n'dang u atah oengna n'khueh taring ah hawna ham awm ;
45012007	thlaangtloe ham bii bi koei atah bi ham awm ; cang puei koei atah cang puei ham awm ;
45012008	Thlaang te thapeek koei atah tha peek ham awm ; khuehtoen thaihu te thlaangtloe rekra koei atah moeihoeihna oen rekra ham awm . Saithaina aana te n'dang atah bii yawm ham awm ; thlaangtloe tengah thintlawhna tueng sak ham koei atah reenna oen tueng sak ham awm .
45012009	Nangmi kah lungna te thinkaw tak oen na lung u ham awm . Athe te thina uh , atheen te phoeih mangkhak uh .
45012010	Pakhat oen khat Khrihca maya manau angla lung u the lang thinkaw tak oen ah pakhat oen khat hinyahna te tueng sak uh .
45012011	Na tha rang sak uh , tha-ngak la awm u boel . Bawipa bii te na thinkaw tak oen bi uh ;
45012012	Na ngaiuepna na khuehna dawng teah na tha thlue sak uh ; raina na tawng u vengah thinsan kawdaw oen awm u lang thangthui yoeyah uh .
45012013	Khrihca na puei na paw thli kah a voetna ah te dodan u lang na im ah kamyin te pah sak uh .
45012014	Nangmi heemtekkung thli ham Pathen tengah kam-awm yotheenna bih pe uh ; Oe , yotheen kam-awmna bih pe uh ; tapvoep u boel .
45012015	Awmngaih thlaang thli tengah awmngaih u van . Rungrah oen aka awm thlaang thli tengah rap u van .
45012016	Pakhat oen pakhat roeproei patoeng uh . Oekthloen u boel ; tede huhsit koei bii te khaw bi uh . Namah oen namah te thlaangcuih la poek u boel .
45012017	Nangmi sawah thlaang lawng athe a sai atah ahih te athe oen thung u boel . Thlaang boeih lawng theen tila a poek te sai hamla yawm .
45012018	Thlaang boeih oen roeproeicala awm ham soeprep boeih te acoengg thai khui sai u lah .
45012019	Ka puei thli mevengah khaw luu lo u boel , te lak atah Pathen thinsana lawng sai ngoen seh . Caciim lawngah , “ Kai lawng luu ka lo ai , kai lawngah kut ka thung ai , Bawipa lawng ti , ” tila a thui .
45012020	Te tih atah , “ Na raal te a bung a pawng atah buh van cah , tui a halh atah tui van awkk sak ; he tila na saina oen ah nang lawng ahih te yah na bai poen ni ” tila caciim lawng a thui angla te sai uh .
45012021	Nangmi te athe lawng n'taa boel seh ; Atheen saina oen athe te taa hamla yawm uh .
45013001	Thlaang boeih lawngah ram ukbawi thli te hinyah uh , metihtiah Pathen kah hatlaakna a awm nawh atah ukkung bawi khaw awm nawh tih tahe vengkah ukkung thli khaw Pathen lawng a khueh ukkung hue ni .
45013002	A-u khaw tahe vengkah ukkung thli aka oel khak tah Pathen kah awlthlaw te aka oelkung ni , a-u khaw te tila aka sai te tah amah sawah awlcekna a thoeng sak ai .
45013003	Theenna aka sai hue lawngtah ukkung bawi thli he rih hamla awm nawh , tede athe aka sai thli lawng ni rih ham a awm . Nang lawng aana khuehkung thli te rih ohla awm ham na ngaih atah theenna te sai lah , nang te ahih lawng n'koeh ai .
45013004	Metihtiah ahih tah Pathen kah tuihyoeih-thlaang tih nang ham theenna aka sai hamla ni . Tede nang lawng athe te na sai atah ahih te rih hawn , Metihtiah dantat thaina aana te a khueh tangtang . Ahih tah Pathen kah tuihyoeih-thlaang la awm tih athe-arana aka sai boeih sawah Pathen yuengah dantatna aka thoengsakkung ni .
45013005	He kah akawng alam dawngah nang lawng ukkung thli kah awl te ngaai peh , Pathen kah dantatna na rih u dawngah a awl ngaai pe mai ohla athe atheen pekbona kawpoek theen oen a awl ngaai pe uh .
45013006	Mangmu na peek u khaw he kawngah ni , metihtiah ukkung thli lawng bii a bi u te Pathen ham ni a bi .
45013007	Tedawngah ahimi na peek ham koei te tah pe uh ; namah kah pumpakla peek ham koei mangmu oen kaawn-ava phu mangmu te khaw pe u langtah ahimi boeih te mik-hai yahna lang hinyah uh .
45013008	A-u tengah khaw laiba khueh u boel , nang lawng laiba na khueh tah khat oen khat lung u ham he ni . A-u khaw a thlaangpuei te a lungna atah Phungawl te a vai poen .
45013009	Phungawl lawngah , “ Samphaih boel , thlaang ngawn boel , huuen boel , thlaang kah thaihu naai boel , ” a ti boeih oen ah he thloei kah atloe awlpeek boeih tah , namah oen namah te na lungna u van angla na imbe te lungnah , ” a tina dawngah te cui boeih poen .
45013010	Thlaang pakhat te na lungna atah meveng khaw a sawah athe te na sai roe manawh ; tedawngah Phungawl boeih asoepla vaina he tah lungna ni .
45013011	Nangmi lawng he tah na sai u ham awm , metihtiah nangmi ham na ihduhna kalawng hinghang hamla atue avan pha poen tila na ming u . Metihtiah mami he thlawn la awmna ham atue atang tah mami lawng oengna n'khueh cuek vengkah lak ah tahe ah yoeii tare poen .
45013012	Yiinna tah boet tawm poen , khaw daai hang poen ai . Yiinna thaihu sai te toeng u poen silang tah aangna khuiah raal kahna awva te lo u sih .
45013013	Hingthun khawse ah aka awm thlaang thli angla mami lawng akoeih avaihla hing u sih , khawpaw rang au la awm u boel , yuuruui buh hah oen awm tlaih u boel , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna , boethe halangna awm boel seh , tawhsina oen uett-eena awm boel seh .
45013014	Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah awva te lo uh , na pumsa kah thawlh sai ngaihna oen thawlhna kah kawkhuekna te toeng u loeih .
45014001	Oengna ben ah tha aka yoek thlaang thli te van do u lah , tede ahimi kah pumpakla a poek akawng alam dawngah ahimi oen oelhtaih u boel .
45014002	Thlaang pakhat lawngtah a oengna oen me ang khaw a caak boeih , tede oengna tha aka ra nawh lawngtah tawi-an bueng te a caak .
45014003	Soeprep aka ca thlaang lawngah te tila aka ca nawh te huhsit hamla awm nawh ; soeprep aka ca thlaang te khaw tawi-an bueng aka ca thlaang lawngkhaw huhsit van boel seh . Metihtiah Pathen lawng ahih te a do poen .
45014004	Nang ta a-u la na awm aih tih thlaangtloe kah tuihyoeihthlaang te awl na cek thai ? Te tuihyoeihthlaang lawng a bi thai , bi thai nawh tila awl-khuengkung tah amah kah Bawipa te ni . Ahih lawng a bi thai ai , metihtiah Bawipa lawng a bi sak thai ai .
45014005	Thlaang khatsut lawng atloe khawhin boeih lak ah khawhin hin at te awlpui bet la a poek , atloe pakhat lawngtah khawhin boeih he vai u tila a poek . Pakhat rip lawng a thinkaw ah a soengna te khueh seh .
45014006	A-u khaw , khawhin hin at te alue koek la a poek atah Bawipa te a hinyahna ni . A-u lawngkhaw soeprep boeih a caak atah Bawipa te a hinyahna ni . Metihtiah ahih lawng caak awkk dawngah te Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil a thui . Caak awkk te aka yeh khatsut lawngkhaw Bawipa te hinyahna la a yeh van tih Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil a thui .
45014007	Mami tim ah he a-u khaw mah ham bueng n'hing nawh tih mah ham bueng la n'duek nawh baal .
45014008	Mami lawng hing atah Bawipa ham n'hing u tih , duek ah khaw Bawipa ham ni duek u . Tedawngah mami tah n'duek ah khaw seh , hing ah khaw seh Bawipa kah thlaang ni .
45014009	Metihtiah thlaang duek oen thlaanghing boeih kah Bawipa la awm ham Khrih tah duek tih tho koep poen .
45014010	Tedawngah nangmi tawi-an bueng aka ca thli lawng n'tu hamla na maya manau te na coel khuep u ? Tetih atah nangmi acungkuem aka ca lawng n'tu ah na maya manau te na hep na hap u ? Mami boeih he Pathen haiah m'pai vetih amah lawng awl n'cek ai .
45014011	Metihtiah Caciim dawngah , “ Kai tah aka hing Pathen la ka awm tangtang van angla Thlaang boeih lawng ka haiah khuklu oen cuengkueng ai , Kai he Pathen ni tila a phawng u ai , tila Bawipa lawng ti , ” tila a thui .
45014012	Tedawngah mami boeih lawngah mah kah saina boeih te Pathen haiah m'phawng ai .
45014013	Tedawngah pakhat oen pakhat coelna he toeng u poen sih . Te lak atah , na maya manau a tlimna ham oen thawlhna khuiah a tlaakna koei te metuek khaw sai nawh ham tha huer uh .
45014014	Bawipa Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna lawngah aciimphanla m'ming sak tah amah poek ah aciimcaih nawh caak awkk he a awm moenih ti he ni ; tede thlaang pakhat lawngah khatsut caak awkk te caih nawh tila a poek atah te caak awkk tah ahih ham ciim-acaih nawh .
45014015	Nang lawng caak awkk pakhat khat oen na maya manau te a kaw na hoe sak nawh atah , te tah lungna dawngkah aka thoeng saina tlaih nawh ni . Ahih hamla Khrih tah a duek dawngah nang kah caak awkk oen ahih te tlim sak boel .
45014016	Nangmi lawng theen na ti u te miing the dangna hamla coeng sak boel .
45014017	Metihtiah Pathen kah Ram tah caak awkk dawng awm nawh tih Ciim Muithla kah peek doengna , ngaimawngna oen awmngaihna dawngah ni a awm .
45014018	He tila Khrih kah bii te aka bi lawngtah Pathen te a awmngaih sak tih thlaang lawngkhaw a koeh .
45014019	Tedawngah ngaimawngna taktak aka thoeng sak thaihu thli oen khat oen khat thara sak koei bawmcemna te mami lawng mengteng yoeyah ham awm .
45014020	Caak awkk dawng maiah Pathen kah sai tangte te phe u boel . Caak awkk boeih he caak koei ni , tede thlaang pakhat khat thawlhna ah aka tlim sak koei caak awkk he tah thawlhna ni .
45014021	Asoeng thaihu sai ham tah , na maya manau aka tlim sak thaihu saina , meh caakna , misuryuu awkkna te na kuemsuem u ham awm .
45014022	He kawng tah namah lawng na tangna angla te awm selang tah Pathen oen namah laklaw kah tuhkaina la khueh hawn . A-u khaw soeng a ti angla pakhat khat te a sai tih thinkaw a ciim atah yotheen aka dawng ni !
45014023	Tede caak awkk te a caak vengah ngaithliwhna a khueh atah Pathen lawng ahih te dan a tat ai . Metihtiah ahih lawng a sai te oengna dawngah akung a sut nawh dawngah ni . Thaihu boeih he oengna dawngah akung a sut nawh atah thawlhna ni .
45015001	Mami oengna tha aka ra hue lawngah amami kah thalrih phueih ham tha aka yoek thli te talawng takai ham awm . Mami lawng mah bueng kah ngaikhuekna te sai ham awm nawh .
45015002	Te lak ah , mami kah maya manau lawngah theenna koei , oengna ah a roengna koei te mami boeih lawng sai ham awm .
45015003	Metihtiah Khrih lawngkhaw amah kah ngaikhuekna te sai nawh . Te lak ah , Caciim lawng , “ Nang salphaamna awl te ka sawah tla poen , ” a ti angla te awm .
45015004	Caciim dawngah a thut soeprep boeih tah mami he cangpueina ham oen toelthaamna ham ni . Te tila a thut te tah , Caciim lawng mami m'peek uehthaina oen thincakna rang oen ah mami lawng ngaiuepna te khueh ham ni .
45015005	Khrih Jesuh kah lawngpui huh sakna te na vaina rang oen thinkaw khat la khueh thai ham ueh-thaina oen thincakna kungmah Pathen lawngah nangmi te n'bawmcem hawn seh .
45015006	Te atah nangmi boeih lawng thik at la awlkaa pakhat la te mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa oen Pathen te na thangpawm thai ai .
45015007	Khrih lawngah nangmi n'do van angla Pathen kah ruep-awmna a tuengna ham nangmi khat oen khat do u van lah .
45015008	Tedawngah nangmi tengah kavan thui tah Judah thlaang thli yuengla Khrih tah tuihyoeihthlaang la coengg , Te tah Pathen lawng ahimi kah patuer thli tengah awl a kam te asoepna ham oen ah Pathen tah uep-awm ni tite tueng sak ham tih ,
45015009	Gental thlaangphun lawng-khaw Pathen amah kah reenna te a thangpawmna thai ham ni . Caciim lawngah , “ Tedawngah Gental thlaangphun tim ah nang te kan thangpawm ai , Nang koehna laa ka sa ai ” tila a thui .
45015010	A thui koep baal tih , “ Gental thlaangphun Pathen kah thlaang thli oen awmngaih u lah . ”
45015011	Koekthoek ah , “ Gental thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa te thangpawm uh ; thlaang boeih lawng Bawipa te thangpawm uh , ” tila a thui .
45015012	Tecoengah Isaiah lawng , “ Jesi kah cadil pakhat law ai ; ahih tah Gental thlaangphun uk hamla law vetih ahimi lawng ahih dawngah ngaiuepna a khueh u ai , ” tila a thui .
45015013	Ciim Muithla tharana oen nangmi kah ngaiuepna te roep poepa ham ngaiuepna kungpui , Pathen lawngah amah te na oengna rang oen awm-ngaihna oen ngaimawngna boeih oen ah nangmi te abetoetla n'toi hawn seh .
45015014	Maya manau thli : Nangmi tah theenna oen na be u , Cuihhoena na khueh u tih pakhat oen pakhat na cang puei patoeng u thai tite kamah roe lawng atheenla ka ming .
45015015	Tecakhaw , he capat dawngah kan ming sak koep ham ka ngaih akawng alam khatsut te raltheenla oen ka thut . Ka raltheenna tah Pathen lawng Gental thlaangphun ham bii aka bi la ,
45015016	Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang la awmna te m'peek dawngah ni . Gental thlaangphun lawngah Pathen kah do koei luciik la a awmna ham oen ah Ciim Muithla rang oen Pathen tengah nawn koei thaihu la awmna ham Pathen tengkah , Awlthang Theen ka phawng vengah he khawsoeih angla bii ka bi .
45015017	Tedawngah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat-la awmna rang oen Pathen bii ka bi he ka pawmsang u .
45015018	Gental thlaangphun te mawt ham oen Pathen awl te a ngaaina u ham awlkaa oen khawseh , saina oen khawseh ,
45015019	kawpoek rai saina oen khawseh , kawpoek rai tharana oen khawseh , Pathen Muithla tharana oen khawseh , Khrih kah a sai bueng te ni raltheenla ka thui ai .
45015020	Ka kamthlahna poepa tah Khrih kawng a yaakna nawh ahuen amawl ah Awlthang Theen phawng ham he ni , thlaangtloe lawngah imtuung a sut tangte sawah im sak ham nawh ni .
45015021	Caciim lawngah , “ Ahih kah akawng te aka thui noek nawh hue lawng a huh u vetih aka ya noek nawh thli lawng a yaakming u ai , ” tila a thui angla te awm .
45015022	He dawngah ni nangmi tengah law heem te kanghalh la ka awm poepa .
45015023	Tede , tahe atah he peng yunyan ah bii ka coeng poen tih nangmi tengah law hamla kum yahawh hlang ka cai puet angla ,
45015024	tahe tah nangmi tengah ka law thai poen ai tila ka ngaiuep . Sping ram la yin ka ceh vengah nangmi oen huh u ham ka ngaih tih nangmi tengah kawlkalh ka cam coengah tela te ceh ham tah nan bawm u ham ka ngaih .
45015025	Tede tahe tah kawlkalh ah Jerusalem khawpui la ka cet de silang te kah Pathen thlaang thli ham bii ka bi pe de ai .
45015026	Macidonia ram oen Akhaia ram kah Khrihcabu lawng Jerusalem ah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli timkah khawdeng lungma thli te kawthawh oen bawm hamla awl a tloek u tih thaihu peek a khueh u .
45015027	Te tila awltloekna a khueh u te tah amami kah kawthawh oen ni ; tede ataktang atah ahimi lawng-khaw , khawdeng thli bawm ham te a sai koei bii van ni . Judah thlaangphun lawng Muithla ben kah yotheenna te Gental hue tengah arek ara van angla Gental hue lawngkhaw amami kah thaihu thaiha yotheenna a dang te oen Judah thlaangphun te a bawm van ham awm .
45015028	He bii he ka coeng tih ahimi ham a cawi pe tangka boeih te ahimi kut ah ka tloeng pe boeih coengah Sping ram la ka cet vetih nangmi tengah ka law pahoei ai .
45015029	Nangmi tengla ka law vengah Khrih kah yotheenna asoepbir oen ka law ai tila ka ming .
45015030	Maya manau thli , mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih oen Muithla kah peek lungna oen ah kai hamla kamah oen haih Pathen tengah thinkaw thluembuekcala thangthui ham kan ceel u .
45015031	Judia ram kah aka oeng nawh hue teng kalawng ading asuekla ka awmna ham oen Jerusalem ah bii ka bi te , te kah aka awm Pathen thlaang thli lawng awmngaih oen a do thaina ham thangthui u lah .
45015032	Tedawngah Pathen kawngaih atah awmngaih oen nangmi teng ka law vetih nangmi tengah kamyin la ka law he kawhoena oen thadueng thaai dangna la awm ai .
45015033	Mami ngaimawngna kungpui Pathen tah nangmi boeih tengah awm hawn seh . Amen .
45016001	Kenkhria khaaw kah Khrihcabu ah bii aka bi mami kah ngannu Fibi te nangmi tengah ming sak ham ka ngaih .
45016002	Pathen thlaang thli tah pakhat oen khat na do tueng van angla Bawipa miing oen ah ahih te do u lang angoe boeih te nangmi lawng van bawm uh ; ahih tah thlaang yahawh ham paya theen la awm tih kai hamla khaw awm van .
45016003	Khrih Jesuh kah bii bina dawngah bii bi haih Priscilla oen Akuila te kavan toei .
45016004	Ahih rawi lawng kai hamla duek ngam hih . Ahih rawi te ka uem tangkiik , kai bueng nawh tih Gental Khrihcabu boeih lawngkhaw a uem u .
45016005	Ahih rawi im ah aka pum Khrihcabu te khaw kan toei u . Asia ram ah Khrih aka oeng lamhacuek , ka lungna ka paya Epenetas khaw kan toei .
45016006	Nangmi ham bii aka yawm Meri khaw ka toei .
45016007	Andronikas oen Junias te khaw ka toei , ahih rawi tah kai oen thong aka tla haih Judah thlaangphun ni . Ahih rawi te celtuih thli lawngkhaw atheenla a ming u . Kai lak ah lamhala Khrihca la aka awm hih ni .
45016008	Bawipa oen pawlneengna ah ka lungna paya theen Ampliatas khaw kan toei .
45016009	Khrih kah bii dawngah biibipuei Urbanas oen ka lungna paya Stakhis khaw kan toei hih .
45016010	Khrih ah uep-awm Apellis khaw kan toei . Aristobulas imkhuikaw khaw kan toei u .
45016011	Kamah kah Judah thlaangphun Herodion oen Nasisas imkhuikaw Khrihca maya manau khaw kan toei u .
45016012	Bawipa bii aka bi Traifina oen Traifosa khaw kan toei hih tih , Bawipa ham bii yahawh ngaai aka bi ka lungna ka paya Persis khaw kan toei .
45016013	Bawipa kah bii dawngah tha aka huer Rutas oen kai he a ca angla dodankung a manu te khaw kan toei hih .
45016014	Asinkritas , Flekon , Harmis , Patrobas , Harmas , ahimi oen ah aka awm haih atloe Khrihca maya manau boeih te kan toei u .
45016015	Filolokas oen Julia , Nirias oen a ngannu Olimpas oen ah ahimi oen aka awm haih Pathen kah thlaang boeih te kan toei u .
45016016	Nangmi pakhat oen khat maya manau angla toei u lah . Khrih kah Khrihcabu boeih lawng nangmi te n'toei u .
45016017	Maya manau thli : pekbona aka thoeng sak thli oen oengna te aka thumhang sak oen ah nangmi lawng na cang u tangte cangpueina aka oelh-taih thli te ngaithuen ham kan uen u : Ahimi teng kalawng thloeng uh .
45016018	Metihtiah te ang thaihu aka sai hue te tah mami Bawipa Khrih kah bii aka bi nawh ni , amami kawngaih ni a sai u . Ahimi lawngah awlding awltheen oen koehna awl oen ah tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang-thli te athai alatna u .
45016019	Nangmi lawng awlthang theen dawngah ueppang koeila na awm u te thlaang boeih lawng a yaak u , tedawngah he kawngah he nangmi sawah ka kaw hoe tangkiik . Nangmi te theenna ben atah thlaangcuih la awm ham , tede athe ben atah tu khaw aka ming nawh angla awm sak ham ka ngaih .
45016020	Mami kah ngaimawngna kungpui Pathen lawngah Seitan te nangmi kah khowtang ah a neet yue poen ai . Mami Bawipa Jesuh kah lungvatna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh .
45016021	Kai oen biibipuei Timote lawng nangmi te n'toei u ; Judah phun ka paya Lucias , Jason oen Sosipater mi khaw kan toei u .
45016022	He capat aka thut pe kai Tertias lawngkhaw nangmi te Khrihca thli kah toeina angla kan toei .
45016023	Kai dodankung oen ka pahna imkung Kaias khaw nangmi te Khrihca thli kah toeina angla kan toei .
45016024	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh . Amen .
45016025	Pathen te thangtheen sak u sih ! Awlthang Theen dawngkah angla , kai lawng ka phawng Jesuh Khrih kawng oen yan veng san broela a thuh a elh awltak awlhuep avan phawng te oen ah Pathen lawng nangmi te na oengna dawngah acakla m'pai sak thai ai .
45016026	Tede , tahe ah te kah awl tah tawngha thli kah cathut rang oen avan pha sak poen ; thlaang boeih lawng awltak te a oeng tih a vai thaina ham dungyan Pathen kah awlpeek rang oen thlaangphun boeih tengah a phawng poen .
45016027	Pakhat bueng la aka awm tih cuihna boeih oen aka soep Pathen tah Jesuh Khrih rang oen dungyan toe ruep-awmna awm hawn seh ! Amen .
46001001	Pathen kawngaihna oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la awm ham khue la aka awm Kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Sostenes lawng -
46001002	Pathen kah thlaangciim la awm ham khue la aka awm tih Jesuh Khrih oen tuhkaina rang oen ah amah kah a koe la aka awm Kawrin khaaw kah Pathen Khrihcabu , mami oen ahimi kah Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih te a bok tih khaaw tawm ram tawm ah aka awm thlaang thli tengah khaw , naangmi tengah khaw ca kavan pat u :
46001003	Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawi-pa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna , ngaimawngna te nangmi m'pe u hawn seh .
46001004	Khrih Jesuh rang oen lungvatna te nangmi m'peek dawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui poepa .
46001005	Metihtiah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah awlcal thingkaa oen thoemthai cuihna boeih ah khaw soeprep boeih ah na bawireng soeh u poen .
46001006	Khrih kawng awlthang te nangmi kaw khuiah acakla awm poen tih ,
46001007	mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih te na lamtoen u vengah he yotheen kam-awmna pakhatca khaw avoetna na khueh nawh .
46001008	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih khawhin ah cawttbauh kap awm nawh hamla amah lawng aboet toela nangmi te n'cak sak ai .
46001009	A Capa Jesuh Khrih mami Bawipa oen pawlneeng haih hamla khuekung Pathen tah uep-awm ni .
46001010	Maya manau thli , mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah saithaina aana oen nangmi boeih tengah reenna kavan bih u , nangmi tim ah pekbona a awmna nawh ham awlthui kaalai dawngah na kaw vai u sak . Poekna pakhat , mengtengna pakhat oen ah awm uh .
46001011	Maya manau thli nangmi tim ah tawhsina awm tih Khloe kah imkhuikaw thlaang pakhat lawng avan thui .
46001012	Ka thui ngaih tah he ni : Nangmi pakhat rip lawngah athloek athloekla na thui u . Pakhat lawngah “ Kai tah Pawl kah hubang ni ” ti tih atloe khat lawngah , “ Kai tah Apollos kah hubang ni , ” ti , atloe khat lawngah , “ Kai tah Piter hubang ni , ” ti tih atloe khat lawng , “ Kai tah Khrih hubang ni . ” tila a thui u ti he ni .
46001013	Khrih he bu la pekbo u aw ! Nang ham thinglam dawngah Pawl aw aka duek ! Nangmi he Pawl kah hubang la awm ham aw baptisma na dang u ?
46001014	Krispas oen Kaias bueng nawh atah nangmi tim kah a-u khat khaw baptisma ka peek nawh dawngah Pathen te ka uem tangkiik .
46001015	Tedawngah kamah kah hubang la awm ham baptisma ka dang tila a-u khat lawngkhaw thui thai manawh .
46001016	( Aw , Stetanas oen a imkhuikaw te baptisma ka peek ; tede atloe baptisma ka peek te ka ming nawh . )
46001017	Khrih lawngah kai he baptisma aka pe hamla n'tuih nawh . Thinglam dawngah Khrih kah duekna te ahongla a coenggna nawh ham thlaanghing kah cuihna te hawna ohla Awlthang Theen thui hamla ni n'tuih .
46001018	Metihtiah thinglam dawngah Khrih kah duekna kawng awlthang he ha-ata lii thlaang thli hamla tah awlpoei la awm de , mami thlawn la aka awm lii hue ham tah Pathen kah tharana ni .
46001019	Caciim lawngah , “ Thlaangcuih thli kah Cuihna te ka phe vetih thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli kah mingna te khaw ka hoett pe bangtlang ai . ” tila a thui .
46001020	Tedawngah thlaangcuih thli te mela a awm ai ? Thoemthaina aka khueh thlaang thli te mela a awm u ? He dilai han kah calthai thli mela a awm u ? He dilai dawngkah cuihna he tah ngau-athuuna ni tite Pathen lawng a tueng sak poen !
46001021	Thlaanghing lawng amah kah cuihna oen Pathen te a ming thaina nawh ham amah lawng a cuihna oen a sai poen . Kaimi lawng ka phawng , “ ngau-athuuna ” a ti u awlthang he aka tangna thlaang te thlawn hamla Pathen lawng awl a khueng .
46001022	Judah thlaang thli lawng kawpoek rai miknoekna te a ngaih u tih Krik thlaang thli lawngtah cuihna te a tlap u .
46001023	Kaimi lawngah thinglam dawngkah a ngawn u Khrih te ka phawng u tih te awlthang te Judah thlaang thli ham tah tlimna lungto la awm tih Gental thlaang thli ham tah awlpoei la awm ;
46001024	tede Gental thlaang khaw , Judah thlaang khaw seh Pathen lawng a khue thlaang thli ham tah te awlthang te tah Pathen kah cuihna oen tharana la aka awm Khrih te ni .
46001025	Metihtiah Pathen kah ngau-athuuna tah thlaanghing cuihna lak ah apuehla cuih ngaai tih Pathen kah thayokna he tah thlaanghing kah tharana lak ah a tha ra ngaai .
46001026	Maya manau thli , Pathen lawng nangmi n'khue vengah metila na awm u tite tahe ah poek u lah . Thlaanghing kah huhna atah nangmi he thlaangcuih khaw , huham tharana aka awm thlaang khaw , hinyah koei thlaang khaw yoehca mai ni na awm u .
46001027	Thlaangcuih thli te yah pawh sak ham dilai lawngah n'tu tamu nawh la a poek te Pathen lawng a tuek tih huham tharana aka khueh thlaang thli te yah phueih sak ham dilai lawng tha aka ra nawh thlaang la a poek te a tuek .
46001028	Dilai lawng awlpuila a poek te phe hamla dilai lawng dapsitla a huh thlaang , thlaangnuih pariing la aka awm , thlaang la khaw a toehtham nawh thlaang te Pathen lawngtah a tuek noeng roe ni .
46001029	He ngoen tah Pathen haiah a-u khaw oekthloen u thai nawh ti ngaihna ni .
46001030	Tede nangmi tah Pathen lawng Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla n'awm sak poen tih Pathen lawng Khrih he mami kah cuihna la avan sai poen . Ahih rang oen ah mami tah Pathen oen roeproeina awm poen ; mami tah Pathen kah a thlaangciim la n'coengg u tih mami he n'loeih sak poen .
46001031	Tedawngah Caciim lawng , “ A-u khaw oekthloen u ham a ngaih atah Bawipa kah thaihu sai dawngah oekthloen u seh , ” tila a thui .
46002001	Maya manau thli , nangmi tengah Pathen kah awlhuep awltak te phawng hamla ka law vengah te yaakming ham aka rai awllung thli oen cuihna awl te ka hawna nawh .
46002002	Metihtiah nangmi oen n'awm haih u vengah te awlpuila thinglam dawngah Jesuh Khrih kah a duekna kawng nawh atah soeprep boeih te hilh bangtlang tih thui tlaih nawh ham thinkaw ka melh rap poen .
46002003	Tedawngah nangmi teng ka law vengah te ka tha yoek sut tih rihna oen ka thuen ,
46002004	Nangmi kan cangpueina oen awlthuina dawngah thlaanghing kah cuihna calthaina oen ka phawng nawh tih Pathen Muithla kah tharana oen ni ka phawng .
46002005	Tecoengah nangmi kah oengna he thlaanghing cuihna dawngah akung te sut u nawh tih Pathen tharana dawngah ni akung te a sut u .
46002006	Te cakhaw muithla ben ah poekna aka soep thlaang thli teng atah cuihna awl te ka thui pe . Tede te awl te tah he dilai dawngkah cuihna nawh ni , he dilai ukkung thli kah aka khum tharana te nawh ni .
46002007	Kai lawng ka phawng cuihna te tah Pathen kah cuihna awlhuep thlaanghing tengah pho sak ohla thuh khak la aka awm tih dilai a suen thlan veng kalawng mami kah ruep-awmna ham avan khueh tangte cuihna te ni .
46002008	He dilai ukkung thli a-u khat lawngkhaw cuihna he ming u nawh . Ahimi lawng ming u kawinih ruep-awmna Bawipa te thinglam dawngah ngawn u manawh .
46002009	Tede Caciim lawng a thui angla , “ A-u lawng vaikhat khaw hu nawh tih ayaak nooek nawh , a-u lawngkhaw coengg thai ai tila poek nooek nawh te amah aka lungna thlaang thli hamla soeprep te Pathen lawng a roek a bah pe poen , ” tila a thui .
46002010	Tede a awlhuep te amah Muithla rang oen ah mami he Pathen lawng m'ming sak poen . Muithla lawngtah soeprep boeih Pathen kah kamthlahna adungkoek thuh elh la aka awm te pateng khaw pheng a tlap .
46002011	Thlaang pakhat kah a kawng alam he amah khuiah aka awm a muithla bueng lawng ni a ming ; tetih van angla Pathen kawng he khaw Pathen Muithla bueng lawng ni a ming .
46002012	Mami lawng he dilai dawngkah muithla te n'dang u moenih ; Pathen lawng mami m'peek boeih te mingna ham Pathen lawng avan tuih Muithla te ni mami lawng n'dang u .
46002013	Tedawngah Muithla aka khueh thlaang thli tengah muithla ben awltak ka thuicaih u vengah he thlaanghing cangpueina awl oen te thui thai la awm nawh tih Muithla kah cangpueina awl oen ni ka thui .
46002014	A-u khaw Muithla aka khueh nawh te tah Pathen Muithla dawng kalawng aka law kutdo te dang thai manawh . Te ang thlaang lawngtah yaakming thai tang manawh ; ahih hamla tah apoeila ni a awm , metihtiah Muithla ben kah kutdo thli te tah Muithla bueng oen ni ming thai la a awm .
46002015	Muithla aka khueh thlaang lawng atah soeprep boeih kah aphu te apek abo thai , tede ahih te tah a-u khat lawngkhaw pekbo thai nawh .
46002016	Caciim lawngah , “ Bawipa thinkaw te a-u lawng a ming ? A-u lawngah ahih te poekna a peek thai ai ? ” tila a thui . Tecakhaw kaimi tah khrih kah thinkaw te ka khueh u .
46003001	Maya manau thli , atak tang atah Muithla aka khueh thlaang thli tengah awl ka thui angla nangmi teng atah ka thui thai nawh ; he dilai thlaang thli angla Khrihca oengna dawngah camaw angla ni nangmi tengah awl kavan thui .
46003002	Nangmi lawng buh haam na caak u thai thlan dawngah suuktui ni kan tuul u hun ai . Tahe ah pateng khaw buh haam na ca u thai thlan hun ,
46003003	metihtiah nangmi tah tahe toe he dilai thlaang thli angla ni khaw na sak u hun . Nangmi tim ah uett-eena awm tih khat oen khat na tawh na thaam u vengah te nangmi tah dilai thlaang la na awm u tih dilai phung la khaw na sak u tite tueng sak nawh aw ?
46003004	Nangmi lawngtah , “ Kai tah Pawl kah hubang ni na ti u tih akhat lawngah , “ Kai tah Apollos kah hubang ni , ” tila na thui u te he dilai thlaang angla na sai u nawh aw ?
46003005	Ataktang atah Apollos he a-u ? Pawl he ta a-u ? Kaimi he tah nangmi lawng Pathen te na tangna u hamla mawtkung Pathen kah thlaang thli mai ni . Kaimi lawngah Bawipa lawng sai hamla m'peek bii te ni ka bi u .
46003006	Kai lawngah ati-amu te ka tue tih Apollos lawng tui a suep , tede athing aka po sak tah Pathen ni .
46003007	Amu-ati tuekung oen tuisuepkung te awlpui nawh ni . Athing aka posakkung Pathen ni awlpui .
46003008	Amu-ati tuekung oen tuisuepkung tah alakloena awm nawh ; A bina taring ah Pathen lawng kutdo rip a peek ai .
46003009	Metihtiah kaimi he tah Pathen ham bii aka bi haih la ka awm u tih nangmi te tah Pathen kah lo la ni na awm u . Nangmi tah Pathen kah impui la khaw na awm u .
46003010	Pathen kah peek kutdo te ka hawna tih im sak aka thoem tangkiik angla bii ka bi tih lungdang ka suem , te sawah te thlaangtloe lawng im a sak . Tede metila ka sak u tite a-u khaw ngaithuen rip u seh .
46003011	Metihtiah Pathen lawngtah Jesuh Khrih pakhat bueng te ni lungdang la a suem tih atloe lungdang te suem thai koei la awm tlaih nawh .
46003012	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah te kah lungdangsuem sawah sui oen khaw , ngun oen khaw , lungto phutlo oen khaw impui te a sak u mai ai ; thlaangtloe hue lawngtah thing oen khaw , khawpawl oen khaw , caangying oen khaw a sak mai ai .
46003013	Ahimi pakhat rip kah biibi thoemthaina te tah Khrih Khawhin ah tueng peng vetih n'huh ai . Metihtiah te Khawhin atah thlaang boeih kah biibi te hai oen ah a tueng sak ai ; hai oen ah a noek adak vetih thoemthaina taktak te tueng ai .
46003014	Lungdangsuem sawah a sak im lawngah hai te a khoeng atah imsakung lawng kutdo a dang ai .
46003015	Tede a-u khaw im a sak te a ung thloep atah ahih tah sung ai ; tede amah ngoen tah hai dawngkah aloeih atah thlawn la awm ai .
46003016	Nangmi tah Pathen tempal bok-im la na awm u tih Pathen Muithla nangmi kaw khuiah a awm te ataktang la na ming u !
46003017	Tedawngah a-u lawngkhaw Pathen kah tempal bok-im te a phe atah Pathen lawng ahih te a phe van ai . Metihtiah Pathen kah tempal bok-im tah ciimcaih tih nangmi roeroe he ahih kah tempal bok-im la na awm u .
46003018	A-u khaw amah oen amah te thai alat u boel seh . Nangmi tim kah a-u lawngkhaw amah oen amah te he dilai siing angla thlaangcuih la a poek u atah thlaangcuih tang tang la a awm thaina ham thlaangngau-paathuu la coengg seh .
46003019	Metihtiah he dilai lawng cuihna tila a poek te Pathen mik huh atah a poei-oep mai ni . Caciim lawngah “ Pathen lawngtah thlaangcuih thli te amami kah dongtung dawngah a man sak . ” tila a thui ,
46003020	tecoengah atloe caciim lawngah , “ Bawipa lawngtah thlaangcuih thli kah poekna he apoeioep ni tila a ming ” tila te a thui baal .
46003021	Tedawngah a-u khaw thlaanghing kah saithaina akawng alam dawngah oekthloen u ham awm nawh . Ataktang atah soeprep boeih he nangmi kah koe-ava la ni a awm :
46003022	Pawl , Apollos oen Piter khaw , he dilai khaw , duekna oen hingna khaw , tahe san he khaw , hai ben kah aka law koei san khaw seh he thli boeih he nangmi kah koe-ava ni ,
46003023	Nangmi tah Khrih kah koe-ava la na awm u tih Khrih tah Pathen koe la awm .
46004001	Nangmi lawngah kaimi he Pathen kah awlhuep awltak khoembelkung , Khrih kah tuihyoeih-thlaang la nan poek u ham awm .
46004002	Te ang tuihyoeih-thlaang ham awlpui pakhat tah a bawipa tengah uep-awm la awm ham te ni .
46004003	Tahe ah nangmi lawngkhaw , thlaangtloe lawngkhaw kai kah kawng he thlaanghing siing angla na thui u atah n'tu la khaw ka ngaai mai nawh ; kamah lawng pateng khaw ka thui thai nawh .
46004004	Ka kawpoek tah ciim acaih ngoen ta , tede te tila ka thui te ka thawlh nawh tila thuingaihna nawh ni . Bawipa khat bueng lawng ni ka sawah awl a cek thai ai .
46004005	Tedawngah atue a pha thlan ah nangmi lawng a-u khaw awl cek u boel . Hukhueng awlcekna tah Bawipa a law vengah ni a awm hun ai ; ahih lawngtah thlaanghing thinkaw ah ahuepla a poek thli te a pho sak vetih yiinna khuikah awlhuep thli te aangna dawngah a tueng sak ai . Teveng atah thlaang boeih lawng amah kah a taring ah Pathen kah koehna te a dang ai .
46004006	Maya manau thli , nangmi kah theenna hamla he ang boeih he Apollos oen kamah he nuehtahna la ka hawna tih kavan thui . He tila ka thui he tah , “ Phung-alam te pooeng voelh boel ” tila a thui te nangmi lawng na mingna ham ni . Nangmi a-u khat lawngkhaw pakhat te tah koeh pakcal boel langtah atloe pakhat te tah thuitheet soeh aih boel .
46004007	Nangmi te thlaangtloe lak ah asangluelh la a-u lawng n'sai ? Na khueh soeprep boeih he Pathen peek nawh aw ? Na khueh na toen u te ayoe peek kutdo nawh angla metila na oekthloen u thai ?
46004008	Nangmi lawng na ngoe soeprep boeih te na khueh tang tang u poen aw ? Na bawi na len u tangtang aw ? Kaimi tah sengpahrang la ka coengg u nawh de nangmi ta sengpahrang la na coengg u poen aw ? Nangmi oen haih kaimi khaw sengpahrang la coengg thaina ham nangmi te sengpahrang la na coengg u tangtang ham ka ngaih .
46004009	Metihtiah kaimi celtuih thli he rangpui haiah ngawn ham koei thlaang , dilai oen vaan kah vanthlaang thli oen thlaangphun boeih lawng dan mailai ham a hukhueng koek la Pathen lawng n'khueh tila ni ka poek poen .
46004010	Kaimi he Khrih hamla thlaangngau la ka awm u ; tede nangmi tah Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen ah thlaangcuih la na awm u ! Kaimi tah ka tha yoek sut , tede nangmi tah na tha ra u ! Kaimi tah thlaang kah hep-ahap la ka awm u , nangmi tah hinyah koei la na awm u !
46004011	Tahe vengah khaw buhpawng tuihalh oen ka rera u ; hinaak himbai pawn sawi ka buen ka naak u ; thlaang lawngah kaimi n'tam u ; ahuen atloe tloe la ka pooeng reroe u ;
46004012	thatlawh thaboep la bii ka bi u tih ka buen ka naak u . Thlaang lawng n'tap-voep vengah yotheen kam-awmna oen ka phuehsawm u ; thlaang lawng n'heemtek vengah sut ka duen pe u ;
46004013	Thlaang lawng thekha la n'sai vengah awlding oen ka thung pe u . Kaimi tah he dilai kah kawhnot vaiking la ka awm u ; Tahe toe khaw he dilai ah thlaang kah tuiilehkap thlaang la ka awm u !
46004014	Nangmi he yah sak hamla ka ngaih dawngah nawh tih ka lungna ca-anau angla toelthaam ham ka ngaih dawngah ni kavan thut .
46004015	Metihtiah nangmi kah Khrihca khawsakna dawngah doenkung thli thongha na khueh u mai cakhaw na Pa tah pakhat bueng ni na khueh u . Metihtiah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla na hingna dawngah Khrih Awlthang Theen nangmi tengah kavan khuenna rang oen na pa tah kai ni .
46004016	Tedawngah kai kah khawboe ramlang he na oett u hamla kan ceel u .
46004017	He tila ka kamthlah u dawngah ni Timote he kavan tuih , ahih tah Khrihca khawsakna dawngah ka lungna uep-awm ka capa ni . Ahih lawng atah kai lawng ka vai tih peng tawm khrihcabu tengah ka cang puei Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah hingna athaai atungpui te avan thui koep ai .
46004018	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah kai lawng nangmi te n'hill adawng tlaih manawh tila na poek u tih na oekk u .
46004019	Tecakhaw Bawipa lawng a ngaih atah nangmi tengla yue ka law vetih te kah aka oekthloen u thlaang thli lawng a thui awl bueng muehla huham tharana a khueh u te khaw kamah lawng ka huh ai .
46004020	Metihtiah Pathen Ram he tah awlhong paikaa mai nawh tih huham tharana ni .
46004021	Nangmi tengah cungpoelh oen aw ka law ai ? tih nawh atah lungna , kawdawna oen aw ka law ai ? Ame ang na ngaih u ?
46005001	Nangmi tim ah te lukih thlaang thli lawng pateng khaw a yahna koei rih awm tangkiik mai hutaa tawngpa thawlhna awm tila ka yaak . Thlaang pakhat lawngtah a manuthawn oen ip haih tila avan thui u !
46005002	Tedawngah metila nangmi na oekk u thai dai lauh mai ? Tetih ohla nangmi tah na kaw the u vetih te ang thaihu aka sai thlaang thli te namami kah bu khui kalawng na hek u ham awm de ta .
46005003	Kai he ka pum ngoen tah nangmi oen ah athla hlang la ka awm de thinkaw oen tah nangmi tengah ka awm ; tedawngah nangmi tengah aka awm angla rih awm thaihu aka sai thlaang thli sawah mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah awl ka cek poen . Nangmi thik at la na pum u vengah te mami oen aka awm haih Bawipa Jesuh kah tharana rang oen ah ka thinkaw oen nangmi tengah ka awm .
46005005	Bawipa khawhin ah a muithla lawng thlawnna a dangna ham a pum te phe hamla te thlaang te Seitan kut ah pe uh .
46005006	Nangmi lawngah na oekthloen u ham awm roe nawh ! Nangmi lawngah , “ Tawlru yoehca lawng ta-ekk hawl at te a rawi sak . ” a ti awl te na ming u .
46005007	Nangmi lawngah aciimthlaula na awmna u ham thawlhna tawlru ruem te hoett uh . Te atah tawlru aka thuum nawh takawi thaaithikla na awm u ai , te tila nangmi na awm tangtang tite ataktangla ka ming . Metihtiah mami kah Kaantaak Poei te oepsoeh la awm poen , mami kah Kaantaak Poei tuuca Khrih te Luciik la thawthueng u poen tih mami kah Kaantaak Poei sai ham oepsoeh la awm poen .
46005008	Tedawngah mami kah Kaantaak Poei te thawlhna tawlru ruem oen athe-arana te thuum ohla tawlru aka thuum nawh takawi , aciim acaih awltak takawi oen ah sai u sih .
46005009	Nangmi tengah kavan thut ca-pat dawngah te thlaanghalh paadak thlaang thli oen pawlneeng nawh ham kavan thui poen .
46005010	Te tila ka thui te thlaanghalh paadak thlaang , apueh asawm aka ngaih thlaang , thlaanghuuen paacaan thlaang thli , kutsaimuei aka bok thlaang thli oen pawlneeng u boel tila ka thuingaihna nawh ni . Te ang thlaang thli teng kalawng thloeng u sih ti mai kawinih he dilai he ceh taak ngala ham ni a awm poen ai .
46005011	Ka thuingaihna tah khrihca la ka awm ti van de thlaanghalh paadak , apueh asawm aka ngaih moek , kutsaimuei aka bok , thlaang thuitheet thlaang , yuuruui thlaang , thlaanghuuen paacaan thlaang la aka awm hue oen ah pawlneeng haih u boel tila ka thuingaihna ni . Te ang thlaang oen tah caak awkk ham pateng ngawl haih u roe boel .
46005012	Ataktang atah Khrihcabu khuiah aka awm nawh thlaang thli awlcek ham te kai kah biibi nawh ni . Ahimi te Pathen lawng awl a cek ai . Tede namami bu khuikah thlaang thli te tah nangmi lawng awl na cek ham koei nawh aw ? Caciim lawngah , “ Namami bu khuikah thlaangthe thli te hek uh . ” tila a thui de lah koen .
46006001	Nangmi khat oen khat Khrihca paya oen awlpuungna a awm vengah lumlai te Pathen thlaang thli thui sak ohla metila lukih thlaang awlcekkung thli tengla na ceh u ?
46006002	Pathen thlaang thli lawngah dilai he awl a cek ai tite na ming u nawh aw ? Te tila te dilai he awl cek hamla na awm u maiah lumca laaica mai te awl na tloek thai u nawh aw ?
46006003	Mami lawng vanthlaang thli te awl cek ham awm tite na ming u nawh aw ? Tedawngah he dilai hing khuikah thaihu tah awlcek tare ham awm ta !
46006004	Te ang lumlai te a awm atah Khrihcabu oen aka betpha u nawh thlaang tengla te na cet u vetih na thui sak u ai aw ?
46006005	Na yak u nawh aw ! Khrihca pueipaw khat oen khat laklaw ah awlpuungna a awm vengah lumlai aka thui thai namami bu khuiah thlaangcuih pakhat tah awm macawi .
46006006	Khrihca khat oen khat taya na cawi u tih oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang te lumlai na tloek sak u aroeh mai !
46006007	Nangmi lawng upadi oen tuhkaina ben ah awlpuungna na khueh u dawngah te na dok dingri poen tite a tueng sak . Ka dok poen na ti u mai kawinih namami ham theen nawh ai aw ? Na thaihu van rot batt u cakhaw nangmi ham theen bet nawh ai aw ?
46006008	Tetih ohla nangmi lawngtah namami kah maya manau pakhat teng mai ah khaw athe ara te lat na sai u tih pakhat kah thaihu te na rot pe u !
46006009	Pathen Ram te thlaangthe lawngtah paang manawh tite ataktangla na ming u ta . Namami oen namami te thailat u khoeng boel : Thlaanghalh paadak thli , kutsaimuei aka bok thlaang thli , samphaih thlaang thli , hutaa puei oen tawngpa puei oen ah aka thawlh thlaang thli ,
46006010	thlaang kah thaihu aka rot thli , apueh asawm aka ngaih moek thlaang thli , yuu aka ruui thlaang thli , thlaang aka theet thli , thlaanghuen thli tah a-u khaw Pathen Ram te pang manawh .
46006011	Thlaang khatsut tah te tila te thoem na awm u . Tede nangmi tah na thawlhna avan ciim sak poen ; Nangmi ngoen tah Pathen tengah na tlungmu u poen ; Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen kah Muithla rang oen ah nangmi tah Pathen oen na roeproei u poen .
46006012	Thlaang khatsut lawngah , “ Kai lawngtah me ang thaihu khaw ka sai thai ” na ti u . Na sai thai u ngoen ta , tede nangmi hamla soeprep boeih he theen luem nawh . Kai lawng me ang thaihu khaw ka sai thai tila ka thui thai van ta , tede kai tah me ang thaihu lawngkhaw sal la n'sai thai manawh .
46006013	Thlaang khatsut lawng atah “ Caak awkk he bungpui hamla awm tih bungpui he tah caak awkk hamla ni . ” na ti u . Soeng mai ngoen ta ; tede Pathen lawngtah aboetna te a pha sak bok ai . Thlaanghing pum he cuk-halh thawlhna ah hawna ham nawh ni , Bawipa biibina ah hawna ham ni , Bawipa lawng ni pum he a cawm acah .
46006014	Pathen lawng Bawipa te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih mami khaw amah kah huham tharana oen n'thawh sak van ai .
46006015	Nangmi kah pum he tah Khrih kah pum vangg ni tite na ming u . Kai lawngah Khrih kah pum vangg te ka lawh vetih pum yooei thlaanghalhnu la ka sai ai aw ? Ka sai roe manawh !
46006016	Pum yooei thlaanghalhnu tengah tabaw thlaang te tah ahih oen pumtaksa pakhatla awm tite na ming u nawh aw ? Caciim lawngah , “ Ahih rawi tah pumtaksa pakhat la awm ai , ” tila aciimphanla a thui .
46006017	Tede Bawipa oen aka tuhkai u thlaang tah muithla ben ah Bawipa oen pumkhatla awm .
46006018	Cuk-halh thawlhna te kuemsuem uh . Atloe thawlhna lawngtah thlaang kah a pum te rawk sak aih nawh ; tede cuk-halh thawlhna aka sai thlaang lawngtah amah pum roe te a thawlh sak poen .
46006019	Nangmi kah pum te tah namami kaw khuiah aka awm Pathen kah peek Ciim Muithla a awmna tempal bok-im ni tite na ming u nawh aw ? Nangmi tah namami kah koe la na awm u nawh tih Pathen kah koe la ni na awm u ;
46006020	nangmi te aphu oen ni n'lai u . Tedawngah na pum te Pathen kah ruep-awmna ham hawna uh .
46007001	Ka tengah capat oen nan doet u akawng alam te tahe ah kavan thui ai . Tawngpa pakhat he yu lawh muehla a awm te theen .
46007002	Tede cuk-halh thawlhsaina ayahawh aih dawngah tawngpa boeih lawng yu a khueh ham theen tih hutaa boeih lawngkhaw vaa a khueh ham theen .
46007003	Tawngpa lawng vaa pakhat la a awmna te soep sak selangtah hutaa lawngah yu pakhat la awmna te soep sak seh , te tila te pakhat kah ngoena dawngah pakhat lawng ngai-khuekna pe seh .
46007004	A yu lawngah amah pum kah bawi la awm nawh , tede a pum kah bawi tah a vaa te ni ; tetih van angla a vaa lawngah amah pum kah bawi la awm nawh tih a pum kah bawi tah a yu te ni .
46007005	Nangmi lawng kawlkalh thangthuina ham ah kawvaina na khueh u atue bueng te nawh atah namami khat oen khat kah ngaihna te thana u boel ; tecoeng atah na awm nooek la te awm koep uh . Te atah na kuemsuem thai u vetih Seitan kah suek-halhna te na taa u thai ai .
46007006	He tila kavan thui he awlpeek aana angla ka thui nawh , tede nangmi kawngaihna vai angtoekla ni ka thui .
46007007	Atak tang atah nangmi boeih he kai angla na awm u atah ka ngaih ngaai ; tede thlaang boeih lawngah Pathen tengkah kutdo lakloe te rip a khueh u .
46007008	Tahe ah a yu , a vaa aka khueh nawh thlaang thli oen huhai patal la aka awm thlaang thli tengah kavan thui tah kai angla namah bueng poe na awm u atah namami ham theen bet ai .
46007009	Tede namami kah ngaihna te na kuemsuem thai u nawh atah na yu lo u lang vaa sa uh . Cuk-halh hurthok la awm lak atah yu lawh vaa sak te theen bet .
46007010	Yu khueh , vaa khueh thlaang thli ham thui hamla awlpeek ka khueh , te tah kamah tengkah nawh tih Bawipa kah awlpeek ni : A yu lawngah a vaa te maa boel seh ;
46007011	tede a vaa te a maa atah vaa sak tlaih ohla poe awm seh , tetih nawh atah a vaa oen ah roep hih koep seh ; a vaa lawngkhaw a yu te thlaak roe boel seh .
46007012	Thlaangtloe hue tengah kavan thui tah ( kamah lawng ni ka thui , Bawipa lawng nawh ni ) : Khrihca tawngpa pakhat lawng oengca la aka awm nawh a yu te a khueh tih a yu lawngah ahih oen awm poe ham a ngaih atah thlaak boel seh .
46007013	Tecoengah Khrihca hutaa pakhat lawng oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang te a vaana tih a vaa lawngah ahih oen awm poe ham a ngaih atah maa boel seh .
46007014	Metihtiah oengca la aka awm nawh a vaa te a yu oen tuhkaina rang oen ah Pathen lawng a do tih oengca la aka awm nawh a yu te Khrihca a vaa oen tuhkaina rang oen ah Pathen lawng a do . Tetih nawh kawinih a ca thli te lukih ca anau thli angla awm u hau ai ; tede te tila a awm u dawngah ahimi te Pathen lawng a do poen .
46007015	Te cakhaw oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang pakhat lawngah Khrihca a yu mai khaw , a vaa mai khaw maa ham a ngaih atah maa mai seh . He ang kawng atah Khrihca a yu lawng mai khaw , a vaa lawng mai khaw yalpawla sai seh . Nangmi ngaimawng ngaitoe la awm ham ni Pathen lawng n'khue u .
46007016	Khrihca la aka awm hutaa nang , ka vaa he ka thlawn thai manawh tite metila na thui thai ? Khrihca la aka awm tawngpa nang ka yu he ka thlawn thai tlaih manawh tite metila na thui thai ?
46007017	A-u khaw Bawipa lawng kutdo a peek tih Pathen lawng a khue vengkah angla te a awm u ham awm . He tah Khrihcabu boeih ah ka cang puei phung-alam ni .
46007018	Yahhuivuen aka reet thlaang te Pathen lawng a khue atah yahhuivuen reet la a awmna miknoekna te hoett boel seh ; yahhui-vuen aka reet nawh thlaang te Pathen lawng a khue atah yahhui vuen te reet han boel seh .
46007019	Metihtiah yahhuivuen reet oen reet nawh te n'tu la khaw coengg nawh ; Pathen kah awlpeek vai he ni awlpui la a awm .
46007020	Thlaang boeih lawngah Pathen lawng n'khue u vengkah angla te awm uh .
46007021	Pathen lawng nang n'khue vengah sal la aw na awm ? N'tu poei aih nawh ; tede loeih ham atawng aleeng atah loeih ham sai .
46007022	Metihtiah Bawipa lawng a khue Sal pakhat he Bawipa kah thlaangcuem la awm poen ; tetih van angla thlaangcuem a-u khaw Khrih lawng a khue atah ahih kah saltamnaa la ni a awm .
46007023	Pathen lawng nangmi te aphu oen n'lai poen dawngah thlaanghing kah saltamnaa la te awm u boel .
46007024	Maya manau thli , nangmi te amah lawng n'khue coeng vengkah na awm u angla te pakhat rip lawng Pathen oen pawlneeng uh .
46007025	Tahe ah thlaanghoeng la aka awm thli kawng ca thut oen nan doet u te kavan thui ai . Bawipa tengkah awlpeek tah ka khueh nawh , tede Bawipa kah reenna rang oen uep-awm thlaang pakhat la ka awm van angla ka poekna he kan peek u .
46007026	Tihin hang kah raina he poek vengah tawngpa hue ham tah tahe veng-kah angla a awm u atah theen bet tila ka poek .
46007027	Na yu na lawh poen aw ? Tetih atah na yu oen te pek hih boel . Na yu na lawh thlan atah na yu tlap hanlan boel .
46007028	Tede na yu na lo mai cakhaw thawlhna na sai moenih ; hutaa thlaanghoeng lawng vaa sa mai cakhaw thawlhna a sai moenih . Tede yu aka lo , vaa aka sa thlaang thli lawng hin roekk ah a tawng u patang raina dawng kalawng nangmi te loeih sak hamla ka ngaih dawngah ni .
46007029	Maya manau thli , ka thuingaihna tah he tila ni : atue san hlang awm hang tlaih manawh , tedawngah tahe kalawng tah yu khueh thlaang lawngah yu khueh nawh thlaang angla awm seh ;
46007030	aka rap thlaang thli lawng kawthe nawh thlaang angla awm seh ; aka nui thlaang thli te kawhoe nawh thlaang angla awm seh ; thaihu aka lai thlaang thli lawng a lai thaihu te ka koe nawh ni a ti angla te awm seh ;
46007031	dilai thaihu aka hawna thlaang thli lawngah aka hawna nawh angla awm u seh . Metihtiah he dilai he tahe vengkah angla asan awm tlaih manawh .
46007032	Nangmi he lakuengna kalawng loeih sak hamla ka ngaih . Yu aka lo nawh thlaang pakhat lawngtah Bawipa kah kawhoe bueng te a yawm dawngah Bawipa bii dawngah te ngaithuen .
46007033	Tede yu aka lo thlaang lawngtah a yu te awmngaih sak ham a ngaih tih dilai thaihu dawngah nguenthuen ;
46007034	Tedawngah ahih te kawngaihna pahih lawngah a doek . Vaa aka sa nawh hutaa , tihnawhtah hulaa cuem lawngtah a pum oen muithla pahih bok la peek ham a ngaih dawngah Bawipa kah bii dawngah nguenthuen ; tede vaa aka khueh hutaa tah a vaa te kawhoe sak ham a ngaih dawngah dilai thaihu dawng nguenthuen .
46007035	Nangmi te bawm ham ka ngaih dawngah ni he he kavan thui . Kai lawng nangmi te khaang khak hamla ka yawm nawh . Te lak ah aka doeng tih aka soeng te nangmi sai sak ham ka ngaih tih atloe-abang awm tlaih ohla Bawipa kah bii dawngah namah oen namah te na peek u ngala ham ni .
46007036	Yuvaa hih hamla a kang tangte te yuvaa nawh ham a poek atah he tila awm seh : tawngpa lawng hutaa te yuna ham tuueng aleng nawh tila a poek de , te kah hulaa a ngaihna te tlo aih tih yuna ham a poek atah a ngaihna angla yuvaa hih seh . He dawngah thawlhna awm nawh .
46007037	Tede te tila sai ham ngah ngah tongnolh muehla tawngpa lawng yu lawh nawh ham a kaw a melh rap tih a ngaihna a thinkaw te a taa thai tih sai ham koei te anepla a poek heet ngoen poen atah te hutaa te a yuna nawh ah theen .
46007038	Tedawngah a kang tangte hutaa te aka yuna thlaang lawngah thaihu theen ni a sai , tede akang tangte te aka yuna nawh thlaang lawng atheen ngaai te a sai .
46007039	Vaa aka sa hutaa pakhat he a vaa te a hing khui atah hoerpoengla awm nawh ; tede a vaa te a duek atah amah kawngaih tawngpa te ahoerpoengla a vaana thai , tede ca tah a vaa te Khrihca la a awm atah theen .
46007040	Tecakhaw a awm noek angla amah bueng a awm atah awmngaih bet ai . Te tah kamah kah poekna ni , kai khaw Pathen Muithla ka khueh tila ka poek .
46008001	Kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u caak awkk kawng cathut oen nan doet u te tahe ah kavan thui ai . Ahimi lawngah , “ Mami boeih he cuihhoena n'khueh , ” tila a thui u te soeng ngoen . Te cakhaw te ang cuihhoena lawngtah thlaang te a oekk athloen sak tih a halang sak , tede lungna lawngtah thlaang te asoem asai tih a roeng sak .
46008002	A-u khaw ‘ Ka ming van poen ’ tila aka poek u lawngah a ming ham koei te ming tangtang nawh .
46008003	Tede Pathen aka lungna thlaang te tah Pathen lawng a ming .
46008004	Tedawngah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk kawngah te : kutsaimuei he tah aka awm tangtang nawh thaihu yuengah a khueh u tite mami lawng m'ming u ; Pathen pakhat bueng ni a awm tite mami lawng m'ming u .
46008005	Vaan ah khaw dilai ah khaw “ pathen thli , ” a ti u te awm mai cakhaw , tecoengah “ pathen thli ” oen “ bawipa thli , ” awm moen mai cakhaw ,
46008006	mami ham tah Pathen pakhat bueng ni a awm , ahih tah soeprep boeih saikung la awm tih ahih hamla mami tah n'hing u ; tecoengah Jesuh Khrih Bawipa pakhat bueng te awm , ahih rang oen ah soeprep tah sai la awm tih ahih rang oen mami he n'hing u .
46008007	Tede thlaang boeih lawng awltak he ming u nawh . Thlaang khatsut tah tihin toe ah kutsaimuei bokna lawng a ceeng khak poen dawngah te ang caak awkk te a caak u vengah kutsaimuei kah buh , an la te ahimi lawng tahe toe ah a poek mangkhak u hun ; ahimi kah athe athetheen mingna thinkaw te a tha yoek sut tih te kah caak awkk lawng ahimi te ciim acaih sak nawh tila a poek u .
46008008	Tecakhaw caak awkk lawngah Pathen oen mami tuhkaina te roeng sak nawh ; mami lawng n'ca nawh cakhaw mami kah sungna khat khaw awm nawh , mami lawng n'ca oe cakhaw mami ham athawnna khat khaw awm nawh .
46008009	Tede nangmi kah yalpawna lawng oengna tha aka yoek thlaang thli te thawlhna khuiah a tlimna la a coeng hau nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
46008010	Thuina mai ah athe atheen pekbona thinkaw tha aka yoek thlaang pakhat lawngah nangmi ‘ Cuihhoena ’ aka khueh hue lawng kutsaimuei bokna tempal khuiah na caak na awkk u te hu kawinih kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u caak awkk te caak ham thapeek angla awm nawh ai aw ?
46008011	Tedawngah tha aka yoek thlaang na maya manau , Khrih lawng a duek thil thlaang thli te nangmi kah ‘ Cuihhoena ’ lawngah te a rawk sak poen ai !
46008012	He tila te Khrihca maya manau thli sawah thawlhna na sai u tih athe-theen pekbona thinkaw tha aka yoek thlaang thli te boengha na caak sakna rang oen Khrih sawah thawlhna na sai la awm .
46008013	Tedawngah caak awkk lawng maya manau thli te a thawlh sak atah maya manau thli thawlhna dawngah a tlim u nawh ham luciik sa te metuek ah khaw ka ca koep tlaih manawh .
46009001	Kai he yalpaw thlaang nawh aw ? Kai lawngah mami kah Bawipa Jesuh te ka hu nawh aw ? Nangmi he ta , Bawipa dawngah kai kah biibi phu athaih apaai thli nawh aw ?
46009002	Thlaangtloe lawng atah kai he celtuih pakhat la poek u nawh mai cakhaw nangmi lawngtah celtuih la nan poek u . Metihtiah Bawipa oen pum-khatla na hing u dawngah kai he celtuih pakhat van ni tite nangmi lawngah na tueng sak u .
46009003	Kai he thlaang kah coel-acaa la ka awm vengah kamah oen kamah ka phungtuna tah he ni :
46009004	Bii ka bi dawngah he caak awkk te ka dang van ham tuueng nawh aw ?
46009005	Kai lawngah atloe celtuih thli oen Bawipa kah a manau oen ah Piter mi angla yin ka cehna ah Khrihca la aka awm yu-aca te ka ceh puei thai van nawh ai aw ?
46009006	Barnabas oen kai bueng lawngah aw ka hingna ham bii ka bi hih ai ?
46009007	A-u lawng nuem amah tangka oen raalkap bii a bi ? Lotoen thlaang a-u nuem a lo khuikah misur thaih te caak ohla aka awm ? Tuudoen a-u nuem amah kah tuu suuktui te awkk muehla aka awm ?
46009008	Kai lawngah he ang thli he hin roekk kah huhna oen nuehtahna ka thui nawh , metihtiah Phungawl lawngkhaw hetih toeng toeng la ni a thui .
46009009	Mosi kah Phungawl dawngah , “ Vaitaw taal pakhat te caang na tiil sak vengah a kaa te khuem pe rap boel ” tila a thui . Pathen lawng vaitaw taal kawng aw a thui ?
46009010	Te tila a thui te kaimi he thuingaihna tang tang nawh aw ? Kaimi ham ni a thut . Laithawl aka sai thlaang oen caang aka aat thlaang lawngah a huh ham tuueng caangthaih te a ngaiuep tih a bi u .
46009011	Kai hih lawngah muithla caangti te nangmi tim ah ka tuh poen . Nangmi tengkah thaihu apuung ataai te kaimi lawng ka ah u te yahawh aih aw ?
46009012	Thlaangtloe lawng nangmi tengkah te ang thaihu te dang hamla a ngaiuep u atah kaihih lawngah yahawh ngaai te ka ngaiuep nawh ai aw ? Tede kaihih lawng te tila saithaina te ka hawna hih nawh . Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen lawngpui ah kanghalh-na khat khaw a awmna nawh ham soeprep boeih ah ka ueh hih .
46009013	Tempal bok-im khuiah bii aka bi lawng Tempal bok-im kah caak awkk te a dang u van tih bokna-thaang dawngah luciik buulna aka nawn thlaang lawngkhaw luciik sa te thoem a bawn van tite na ming u .
46009014	Tetih van angla awlthang theen aka thui thlaang thli lawngkhaw awlthang theen phawngna dawng kalawng bung-khuutna dang hamla Bawipa lawng a khueh .
46009015	Tede he saithaina he khatca khaw kai lawng ka hawna nawh , te ang sai thaina te kamah ham tahe ah ka ngaih dawngah ca kavan thut moenih . Te lak atah duek lamha ka ngaih ngaai ! Ka thangpawmna u he a-u lawngkhaw awl poeila a sai ham te ka ngaih nawh !
46009016	Awlthang Theen ka thui dawng maiah ka thangpawm u ham awm nawh . Atak tang atah awlthang theen phawng ham roe la ni awl m'peek . Kai lawng awlthang theen ka phawng nawh kawinih metihtlukla kai ham mueirihtamyiin la a awm !
46009017	Kamah lawngah bii he ka tuek tih ka bi kawinih aphu dang hamla ka ngaiuep suide ; he bii he bi hamla Pathen lawng m'peek dawngah ka bi ham koei roe la ka bi .
46009018	Te atah thapang n'tu ka dang ? Ka bii phu te tah thapang lawh ohla Awlthang Theen ka phawng thaina oen awlthang theen bii ka bi dawngah kamah ham dang koei te ka bih nawh he ni .
46009019	Kai tah a-u kah saltamnaa la khaw ka awm nawh , kai tah thlaangcuem ni ; tede thlaang yahawh te ka doek thaina ham kamah oen kamah thlaang boeih kah sal la ka awm .
46009020	Judah thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham Judah thlaang angla ka awm ; tecoengah Mosi kah Phungawl huiah aka awm thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham , Phungawl huiah ka awm tlaih nawh de aka awm angla te ka awm van .
46009021	Tetih van la te Judah thlaang thli kah Phungawl dau ah aka awm Gental thlaang thli te lawh thai ham ahimi angla ka awm . He tila ka awm he Pathen kah phungawl te ka vai nawh ka tila thuingaihna moenih ; ataktangla Khrih kah phung awl huiah ka awm .
46009022	Oengna tha aka yoek thlaang thli tengah bii ka bi vengah ahimi te lawh thaina ham ahimi tha aka yoek sut angla ka awm . Metila khaw acoengg thai khoem atah avaang athal mai khaw thoem ka thlawn ai nuem ka ti dawngah thlaang boeih tengah ahimi angla ka awm van .
46009023	He ang thli boeih he awlthang theen kawngah ni ka sai , awlthang theen dawngkah yotheen kam-awmna te rek-ara thaina ham ni .
46009024	Loehlang heengna poei ah thlaang yahawh lawngah loeh u de pakhat lawng ni kutdo a dang tite na ming u . Tedawngah kutdo huh hamla heeng u lah .
46009025	Loehlangna hengna poei ah thuum ham aka ngaih boeih lawngah atlawh hlangla amah oen amah phep u , aka cak poe nawh raipai lumuek te dang hamla te tila a sai u ; tede mami lawngtah tlumtloei thai nawh dungyan aka cak poe te dang hamla ni n'sai u .
46009026	Tedawngah kai tah mengtengna lansak te pha ham adoengla ka heeng phaat ; thoekna poei ah kut thluem oen thlaang phak phak aka thoek thlaang angla ni ka awm .
46009027	Thlaangtloe te loehlangna ah thuum ham ka ceel coengah loehlangna ah kamah he n'thoek hau nawh ham ka pum he atlawhla ka phep oepsoeh .
46010001	Maya manau thli , Mosi hu aka vai mami kah patuer thli tengah thaihu aka thoeng te na poek u hamla ka ngaih . Ahimi boeih te muui lawngah a thiing khoep tih Tuitunlii Seen ah te ading asuekla kaa u thai .
46010002	Ahimi lawngah Mosi kah hubang la muui oen ah tuitunlii khuiah baptisma a dang u .
46010003	Ahimi boeih lawng muithla takawi te a caak u tih ,
46010004	muithla tui te a awkk u . Ahimi oen haih aka cet muithla lungnu dawngkah tui te a awkk u ; te lungnu te tah Khrih amah te ni .
46010005	Tede ahimi tim kah thlaang yahawh sawah Pathen tah a kaw hoe nawh , tedawngah ahimi kah rawkk te divinlangre ah a darh u khonghak .
46010006	Te ang thli boeih te tahe ah mingna miknoek la awm . Ahimi lawng thaihu the te a ngaih u angla mami lawngtah ngaih nawh ham ;
46010007	ahimi timkah thlaang vaang lawng kutsaimuei te a bok u angla mami lawngtah bok nawh ham ngaithuen sakna ni . Caciim lawngah , “ thlaang thli lawng caak awkk hamla poei ah te ngawl u tih yuu awkkna , cuk-halh thawlhna poei la te a coengg sak u . ” tila a thui .
46010008	Ahimi timkah thlaang vangg lawng hutaa tawngpa thawlhna a sai u van angla mami lawngtah sai ham awm nawh , te tila a sai u dawngah thlaang thongkul thongthum hin at ah duek drek u .
46010009	Mami lawng Bawipa te noekdak hamla awm nawh , thlaang vangg lawng te tila a sai u dawngah ruul lawngah a tuk dingkang tih duek u .
46010010	Thlaangvaang lawng angla te mami lawng a caitoek ham awm nawh , te tila a caitoek u dawngah ahimi te Duekna Vanthlaang lawng a ngawn u .
46010011	Te kah thaihu boeih ahimi tengah aka thoeng te thlaangtloe thli kah noekna ham oen mami kah ngaithuenna ham ni ahimi lawng a thut . Metihtiah atue aboet tawm vengah he mami n'hing u dawngah ni .
46010012	A-u khaw acakla ka pai ngoen tila aka poek thlaang lawngah a tlim thawlh nawh ham ngaithuen seh .
46010013	Nangmi sawah aka law noekna te thlaang boeih tengah aka thoeng noekdakna van mai ni . Tede Pathen tah awlkam cak tih nangmi lawng na taa thai nawh toe atah noekna te van thoeng sak aih manawh ; nangmi tengah noekdakna avan pha vengah ueh thaina ham tharana te m'peek vetih loeihna hamla lawngpui avan roek ai .
46010014	Tedawngah ka lungna ka puei thli , kutsaimuei te bok u boel ;
46010015	Nangmi tah kaw aka poek thai thlaang la na awm u dawngah ni kavan thui u ; kavan thui he namami lawng pekthlee uh .
46010016	Mami lawng Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil n'thui tih Bawipa Thlembuh veelna ah boengloeng n'hawna tih te khui-kah misurtui n'awkk te Khrih thisen dawngah mami n'cuutna ni . Tecoengah mami lawng takawi te n'eh tih n'caak u te mami lawng Khrih pum dawngah cuutna ni .
46010017	Takawi thluem at awm tih , te takawi thluem at te n'cuut u dawngah mami he thlaangmi la tah yahawh mai cakhaw pumkhatla ni n'awm u .
46010018	Israel thli te poek u lah ; Luciik la a nawn te aka ca boeih tah Pathen kah bokna-thaang dawngah biibina ah te thuum u .
46010019	He tila ka thui he kutsaimuei , tihnawhtah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn caak awkk te atheenna khaw awm van tila ka thuingaihna aw ?
46010020	Tetih nawh ni ! Kai lawng ka thui ngaihna tah he ni . Lukih thli kah bokna-thaang dawngah Luciik thawthuengna te tah raai thli tengah a nawn u ni , Pathen tengah a nawn nawh ni . Nangmi te raai thli oen tuhkai sak ham te ka ngaih nawh .
46010021	Nangmi lawngah Bawipa kah boengloeng oen raai kah boengloeng te khaw na aw renten thai nawh vetih Bawipa kah caboi oen raai thli kah caboi te khaw vai at la na veel thai manawh .
46010022	Mami lawng Bawipa te thatlai sak ham n'ngaih u aw ? Ahih lak ah tha-awm thara ngaai la aw m'mah oen m'mah he m'poek u ?
46010023	Ahimi lawngah , “ Me ang thaihu khaw kaimi lawng sai thai koei ni , ” ti u . Soeng ngoen ta , tede soeprep boeih sai he tah theen luem nawh . “ me ang thaihu khaw kaimi lawng sai thai koei ni . ” ti u , tede soeprep boeih he hoeikhangna awm luem nawh .
46010024	A-u khaw amah kah theenna ham bueng te tlap boel selang thlaangtloe kah theenna te khaw tlap seh .
46010025	Athetheen mingna kawpoek cawm-aam dawngah awl doet re muehla meh dawr kah a yoeih meh boeih te badipla ca u hawn .
46010026	Metihtiah Caciim lawngah , “ Dilai oen dilai dawng aka awm thaihu boeih he Bawipa koe ni . ” tila a thui .
46010027	Oengca la aka awm nawh thlaang lawng buh pan la n'khue tih na ceh atah awl kaa doet muehla na haiah avan toen boeih te kammueh la ca hawn .
46010028	Tede thlaang pakhat khat lawngah , “ He tah kutsaimuei tengah a nawn u luciik thawthueng sa ni , ” a ti atah aka thuikung kah athetheen mingna kawpoek acaihna ham te kah caak awkk te ca mai boel ,
46010029	Athe atheen mingna kawpoek ka ti te nangmi kah kawpoek nawh tih thlaang kah kawpoek ni ka ti . Thlaang khatsut lawngah , “ Te tih atah thlaangtloe kah athe atheen pekbona kawpoek lawng ka yalpawna he n'tu hamla avan kang khak ai ?
46010030	Kai lawng caak awkk , hamla Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui tih te kah awm ngaih awl ka thuina caak awkk kawngah te a-u lawng kai he athela a thui ai ? tila nan doet u mai ai .
46010031	Theen ngoen ta , na sai boeih te khaw , na caak na awkk te khaw seh apum boeih la Pathen ruep-awmna ham sai uh .
46010032	Judah thlaang khaw , Gental thlaang khaw , Pathen Khrihcabu khaw , awlpuung kaacaan thuitheetna a awmna nawh ham te tila te na khawsakna te awm sak uh .
46010033	Ka sai angla sai u van ; ka sai boeih he thlaang boeih kah kawhoena ham ni ka yawm , kamah ham theenna te ka poek nawh tih thlawnna te a dangna u thai ham thlaang boeih kah theenna te ni ka poek .
46011001	Tedawngah kai lawng Khrih kah khawboe ramlang te ka oett van angla nangmi lawngkhaw kai kah khawboe ramlang he oett u van lah .
46011002	Nangmi lawng kai he nan poek khuep u tih na kut dawngah kan peek cangpueina te na vai u dawngah kan koeh u .
46011003	Tede nangmi te ming sak ham ka ngaih tah Khrih tah tawngpa boeih kah a luu la awm , a vaa he tah a yu kah a luu la awm tih Pathen tah Khrih kah a luu la awm ti he ni .
46011004	Tedawngah tawngpa lawngah rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a thangthui vengah khaw , Pathen awlthang a phawng vengah khaw a luu te a muui atah Khrih te thaang a the sak .
46011005	Tecoengah hutaa pakhat lawngah rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a thangthui vengah khaw , Pathen awlthang a phawng vengah khaw a luu te a muui nawh atah a vaa te thang a the sak ; te ang te tah luu-ngong hutaa oen atloe-abangna awm nawh .
46011006	Hutaa lawng a luu te a muui nawh atah a sam te luu-ngawng la vawkk ngala seh . Hutaa ham tah sam vawkk khaw , luu-ngawng khaw yahna koei la a awm dawngah hutaa lawng a luu muui seh .
46011007	Tawngpa he tah Pathen kah muei-asam oen ruep-awmna te tuengsakkung la a awm dawngah tawngpa lawng a luu muui hamla ngoe nawh .
46011008	Metihtiah tawngpa he hutaa pum dawngkah sai nawh tih hutaa ni tawngpa pum dawngkah a sai .
46011009	Tawngpa he hutaa hamla sai nawh tih hutaa he ni tawngpa hamla a sai .
46011010	Tedawngah vanthlaang thli te hinyahna la hutaa he a vaa kah ukna aana khuiah awm tite tuengsakna ham hutaa lawng a luu te muui seh .
46011011	Tecakhaw Bawipa ah mami hingna dawngah hutaa he amah poek ah tawngpa ohla awm thai nawh tih tawngpa khaw amah poek ah hutaa mueh la tah awm thai nawh .
46011012	Metihtiah hutaa he tawngpa dawngkah a sai , tetih van angla tawngpa khaw hutaa lawng ni a cuun van ; soeprep boeih he a sai tih aka awmsakkung tah Pathen ni .
46011013	Hutaa he rangpui lawng Pathen a bokna ah a luu a muui muehla Pathen tengah a thangthui te hutaa pakhat ham roeproei aw tite namami lawng poek uh .
46011014	Dilai khawsakna dawngah tawngpa lawng asanla sam a thlung te ; yaraula awm tih ,
46011015	tede hutaa lawng sam asanla a thlung te a thlaang theenna la awm . A sam sanhlang te a luu muina ham ni a peek .
46011016	Tede a-u lawngkhaw he kawngah awl oelh ham a ngaih atah kaimi lawngkhaw , Pathen Khrihcabu thli lawngkhaw , Pathen bokna ah phung alam atloe khueh thloei nawh .
46011017	He tila kavan thui u vengah he nangmi te kan koeh thai nawh , metihtiah nangmi lawng Pathen bok ham na pum u te atheenna lak ah athe ni a thoeng sak ngaai .
46011018	Lamhacuek ah nangmi lawngah Pathen bok ham na pum u vengah te bu la pekbona awm tila te ka yaak tih te tah soeng mai cawini ka ti .
46011019	( Asoengna ben ah aka awm thlaang thli te aciimla huhna ham ah nangmi tim ah pekbona a awm te soeng mai . )
46011020	Nangmi lawngah thik at la na pum u vengah nangmi lawng na caak na awkk u te Bawipa Thlembuh nawh ni .
46011021	Metihtiah na caak u vengah te namah kah buh an te na caak na awkk u tih khatsut tah a bung a pawng vengah khatsut tah yuu te ruui u poen .
46011022	Nangmi lawng na caak na awkk na ham im na khueh u nawh aw ? Te tila na awm u te Pathen kah Khrihcabu te yah bai ham na ngaih u tih voetna aka awm thlaang thli te yahpawh sak ham na ngaih u aw ? He kawngah he nangmi tengah kai lawng n'tu avan thui ai tila na ngaiuep u ? Nangmi te kan koeh ai aw ? Kan koeh roeroe nawh mue !
46011023	Metihtiah Bawipa teng kah ka huh te ni nangmi te patoeng kan cang puei u . Thlaang kut ah a peekna yiin ah te Bawipa Jesuh lawng takawi te a lawh tih ,
46011024	Pathen tengah awmngaih awl a thui coengah takawi te a eh tih , “ He tah ka pum ni , nangmi ham ni . Kai he poe nan mingna poepa u ham he tila sai uh . ” tila a thui .
46011025	Te tih van angla thlembuh a caak u coeng khoeng ah boengloeng te a lawh tih , “ He boengloeng he tah ka thisen oen ka cak sak Pathen kah awlkam paipi athaai ni . Nangmi lawng na awkk u veng roekk ah kai he nan ming poena ham sai uh . ” tila a thui .
46011026	He kah thuingaihna tah takawi te na caak u veng roekk ah , boengloeng dawngkah te na awkk u veng roekk ah amah a law thlantoe Bawipa kah duekna te na phawng u tila thuingaihna ni .
