51003018	Yu-aca thli na vaa thli kah awl te ngaai uh , te tah Khrih thlaang la na awm u dawngah na sai ham koei ni .
51003019	Vaa-aca thli na yu ruk-awm thli te lungna u lang ahimi te awltlawh oen voemtoei u boel .
51003020	Ca-anau thli , Khrih thlaang la na awm u dawngah na nu oen na pa te yoeyahla hinyah uh , te tah Pathen kah kawngaih ni .
51003021	Nu-apa thli , na ca thli te a thin sa sak u boel , tetih atah ahimi te a kaw boet u hau ai .
51003022	Sal thli aw , soeprep boeih ah dilai hankah na manghai bawi hue kah awl te ngaai pe uh . Nangmi lawng ahimi kah kawtlaakna te na ngaih dawngah a mik-huh bueng ah a awl te ngaai mai ohla Bawipa hinyahna oen ah na thinkaw tangtang oen a awl ngaai pe uh .
51003023	Bii na sai roekk ah thlaanghing ham nawh tih Bawipa ham ni ka bi ti u langtah na thinkaw tangtang oen bi uh .
51003024	A thlaang thli ham a khueh pe kutdo te Bawipa lawng nangmi m'peek ai tite hilh u boel . Bii na bi pe Manghai Bawi tangtang tah Khrih ni .
51003025	Tedawngah a-u khaw athe aka sai boeih tah athe thaihu sai phu te a dang van ai , metihtiah Pathen lawngtah thlaang boeih te avanpila awl a cek dawngah ni .
51004001	Manghai Bawi hue , na sal thli te asoengla , adoengla aphangla , voemtoei uh . Nangmi khaw vaan ram ah Manghai Bawi na khueh u van te hilh u boel .
51004002	Thangthuina dawngah tlungmu u lang , na thangthui u vengah huertuela awm uh . Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil thui uh .
51004003	Te tila na thangthui u vengah Khrih awlhuep phawngthaina ham , Pathen tengkah atue theen ka dang thaina u hamla kaimi ham khaw thangthui u van . Tahe thong ah ka tlaak he khaw awlhuep ka phawng dawngah ni .
51004004	Tedawngah awlthang ka phawng ham koei te aciimphanla ka phawng thaina ham thangthui uh .
51004005	Aka oeng nawh thlaang thli tengah cuihna oen tho tat u lang atue theen na khueh boeih te hawna uh .
51004006	Nangmi kah awlthui boeih te yaak ngaih koei oen thinkaw thluembuek koeila awm selang thlaang boeih kah awl doetna te metila ka thung pe ai tite na ming u ham awm .
51004007	Kaimi lawng ka lungna ka manau , Bawipa kah bii dawngah uep-awm bii bikung , bii aka bi puei Taikhikas lawng kai kah kawng awlthang boeih he avan thui ai .
51004008	Tedawngah nangmi thathluena ham , kaimi kah khawsakna boeih aka thui hamla ahih te nangmi tengla kavan tuih .
51004009	Ahih oen haih Onisimas khaw va law van ai . Onisimas he ka lungna tih ka uepna ka manau , nangmi tim ah aka thuum van ni . He kah thaihu boeih aka coengg hang he ahih rawi lawng avan thui ai .
51004010	Kai oen thong ka tla haih Aristarkas lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u ; tecoengah Barnabas kah nganca Mark lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u . ( Mark he nangmi tengla a law atah anepla dodan ham kan uenna te na huh u poen )
51004011	Jastas aka miingna Joshua lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u . He kah thlaang pathum hue he Judah thlaang , thinkaw a thaw u tih Pathen ram ham kai oen bii aka bi haih thlaang la awm u tih ahimi lawng kai he yahawh hlang n'bawm u .
51004012	Khrih Jesuh kah tuihyoeihthlaang , namami kah paya laikoei Epafras lawng n'toei u . Ahih lawngah thinkaw tak oen nangmi ham thangthui poepa tih nangmi acakla na paina u ham , Khrihca thlaangsoep la na awmna u ham oen ah na oengna te aciimphanla na mingna u ham , Pathen kawngaih te asoepla na vaina u hamla a bih poepa .
51004013	Ahih lawngah nangmi ham khaw Laudisia oen Herapolish khaw kah thlaang thli ham khaw biirai a bi te kamah roe he aka mingkung la ka awm .
51004014	Mami lawng n'lungna Siibawi Luka oen Demas lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u .
51004015	Laudisia khaw kah maya manau thli oen Nimfa oen a im ah aka tun Khrihcabu tengah kaimi lawng n'toei u tila van thui pe uh .
51004016	He capat he na tae u coengah Laudisia khaw kah Khrihcabu hue khaw tae sak u van . Tetih van la nangmi lawng na tae ham capat te Laudisia khaw kah maya manau thli lawng nangmi ham avan pat van ai .
51004017	Tecoengah , Arkhipas te , “ Bawipa kah bii dawngah nang m'peek bii te a coeng toe van bi seh tila van thui pe uh . ”
51004018	Pawl lawng kan toei u ti he kamah kut roe oen he capat he ka thut . Thiirui oen n'khih u he van hilh u boel ! Pathen lungvatna nangmi sawah awm hawn seh .
52001001	Pawl , Silas oen Timote lawngah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah thlaang la aka awm Tesalon khaw kah khrihcabu tengah ca kavan pat u . A lungvatna , ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh .
52001002	Nangmi boeih ham Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui u poepa tih ka thangthuina u vengah khaw nangmi te kan poek u yoeyah .
52001003	Metihtiah , nangmi lawng na oengna te biibina dawngah na tuengsakna , namami kah lungna lawngah bii ruh m'bi sakna , mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih ah aka cak ngaiuepna na khueh u te Pa Pathen haiah ka hilh u nawh .
52001004	Maya manau thli , Pathen lawng nangmi n'lungna tih amah kah thlaang la awm ham n'tuek u poen .
52001005	Metihtiah Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengla kavan khuen u vengah awl bueng nawh tih huham tharana oen Ciim Muithla khaw , awltak asoengna te asoepa kavan khuen haih poen . Nangmi tengah ka awm u vengkah kaimi kah khawsakna te na ming u poen ; te tah nangmi lawng na theenna ham ni .
52001006	Nangmi lawng kaimi oen Bawipa kah moeiboe te na oett u , patangraina yahawh hlang na tawng u vengah khaw , Ciim Muithla tengkah aka law awlthang te awmngaih oen na do u .
52001007	Tedawngah nangmi tah Macidonia oen Akhaia khaw kah aka oeng thlaang boeih ham oett koeila na awm u poen .
52001008	Metihtiah nangmi teng kalawng aka cet Bawipa kawng awlthang te Macidonia oen Akhaia ram pum bueng ah nawh tih nangmi lawng Pathen na oengna kawng awlthang lawng te peng tawm ah cet khok poen . Tedawngah kaimi lawng thui ham ngoe tlaih nawh .
52001009	Nangmi tengah kamyin la ka law u vengkah kaimi metila nan do nan dan u kawng te khaw , kutsaimuei te na hoett u tih Pathen te metila na pan u tite khaw , aka soeng tih aka hing Pathen kah bii te bi ham oen ah ,
52001010	Vaan kalawng aka law ham a Capa na lamtoen u te khaw ahimi boeih lawng a thui u . A Capa Jesuh tah duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih aka law ham koei Pathen thinsana kalawng mami loeihsakkung ni .
52002001	Maya manau thli , nangmi tengah yin la ka law te apoei-oep nawh ni tite namami lawng na ming u .
52002002	Tesalon khaaw ah nangmi tengla ka law thlan vengah kaimi he Filipi khaaw ah metihtlukla n'thena u tih raina mai awm cakhaw , amah teng kalawng aka law Awlthang Theen te nangmi tengah thui hamla Pathen lawng kaimi he thincakna m'peek u .
52002003	Nangmi tengah kaimi lawng reenna kavan bih u he asoeng nawh oen kawpoek ciimna nawh oen nawh tih , a-u khaw thailatna ham te ka ngaih u nawh dawngah ni .
52002004	Pathen lawng kaimi he n'noemcai tih ueppang koei , tueng-aleng a ti dawngah Awlthang Theen thui ham bii m'peek u tih amah lawng thui sak ham a ngaih angla te ka thui u . Kaimi lawng thlaang kah kawtawngna te ka yawm u nawh tih kaimi kah poekna noekdakkung Pathen kaw te tawng ham ni ka yawm u .
52002005	Nangmi lawng na ming u angla kaimi lawngah nangmi te koehna awl ka thui u nawh , apueh ngaihmoekna te dahkhoepna awl khaw ka thui u nawh , Pathen tah kaimi kah sausi la awm !
52002006	Kaimi lawng nangmi tengkah khaw , thlaangtloe tengkah khawseh koehna te dang ham ka yawm u nawh .
52002007	Khrih kah celtuih la ka awm u dawngah te ang te nangmi tengah ka thoehtham thai ngoen ta , tede nangmi tengah ka awm u vengah te a manu lawng a ca a nau thli a dawm athlai angla nangmi te kawdaw boe-ngaaina oen kan dawm u .
52002008	Kaimi lawngah nangmi te kan lungduetna dawngah Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen bueng ohla kamami kah hingna pateng khaw peek hamla te oepsoehla ka awm u . Nangmi te kan lungduetna tangkiik u mai !
52002009	Maya manau thli , kaimi lawng thatlawh thaboepla bii ka bi u te na hilh nawh cawini ! Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen nangmi teng ka thui vengah te nangmi kah thalrih la ka awm nawh ham yiin , daai bii ka bi u .
52002010	Nangmi oengca thli oen kaimi kah benbaw benpangna he aka ciim , aka doeng tih thawlhpalhna a awm nawh te nangmi khawseh , Pathen khawseh kaimi kah sausi la na awm u .
52002011	Ana pa lawng a ca thli te a dawm a thlai angla nangmi pakhat rip te kaimi lawng kan dawm kan thlai u te na ming u .
52002012	Kaimi lawng nangmi te thathluena awl , ngaimawngna awl kavan thui u tih amah Ram oen ah ruep-awmna te paang hamla nangmi khuekung Pathen awmngaihna koei la na hingna u ham kan thuituen u .
52002013	Kaimi lawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thuina kawng atloe awm hun . Kaimi lawng Pathen awl te nangmi tengla kavan khuen vengah thlaanghing kah awl angla nawh tih , Pathen kah awl angla te na hutung u tih na do u , te tah ataktang ni . Metihtiah aka oeng nangmi tengah Pathen lawng bii a bi .
52002014	Maya manau thli , Judia ram kah Pathen khrihcabu boeih oen Khrih Jesuh kah thlaang thli lawng a tawng u te ang van te , Judah thlaangphun lawng ahimi te a heem a tek van angla nangmi khaw namami ram khui thlaang thli kah heemtekna patang te na khang u .
52002015	Judah thlaang thli tah Bawipa Jesuh oen tawngha thli te a ngawn u tih mami heemtekkung la khaw awm u . Ahimi lawng metihtlukla kaw a the sak ! Thlaang boeih kah raal la awm u .
52002016	Kaimi lawngah thlawnna awl Gental thlaang thli tengah ka thui u te toeng sak hamla ahimi lawng a yawm u . He tila te ahimi lawng thawlh poepa u tih amami kah thawlhna boeih te asoep sak u .
52002017	Maya manau thli , thinkaw lungbui oen tah m'pekbo u nawh de pumtaksa oen kawlkalh ah m'pek u vengah he kan ngaai tangkiik u tih nangmi oen huh u koep ham te ka yawm u !
52002018	Nangmi tengah law koep ham ka ngaih u . Kamah he law koep ham vaikhat cang nawh ka yawm de Seitan lawng n'kang mangkhak .
52002019	Ataktang la , a-u thlaangtloe ohla Bawipa Jesuh a law koep vengah amah haiah taana oen m'pai u vengah tah nangmi he ni kaimi kah ngaiuepna , awmngaihna oen thangpawmna la na awm u ai .
52002020	Kaimi kah ruep-awmna oen awmngaihna tangtang tah nangmi ni !
52003001	Aboetna atah ka kaw tamte u tlaih nawh tih mami bueng he Aaten khaaw ah awm u mai sih tila awl ka khueng u coengah ,
52003002	Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen thuina ah kaimi oen Pathen bii aka bi haih van , mami kah manau Timote te kavan tuih u .
52003003	He ang heemtekna patang na khang u dawngah nangmi a-u khatca khaw hu benla mel koep nawh ham , nangmi te tha thlue sak ham oen ah nangmi kah oengna te cak sak hamla ahih te kavan tuih u . Mami lawng heemtekna patang n'khang he Pathen kah kawngaihna avaang athal van ni tite namami lawng na ming u .
52003004	Nangmi tengah ka awm u vengah te mami lawng heemtekna patang n'khang ai tite kavan thui oepsoeh poen ; ka thui angla thoeng khoet tangtang tite na ming u .
52003005	Tedawngah ni Timote kavan tuih . Ka kaw tamte tlaih nawh tih nangmi kah oengna kawng te ming ham ka ngaih dawngah ahih te kavan tuih . Nangmi te Seitan lawng n'suek u vetih kaimi kah bii boeih te apoeila coengg hau ai tite ka lakueng .
52003006	Tahe ah Timote tah va meel koep poen tih nangmi kah oengna oen lungna kawng awlthang te avan khuen . Kaimi he atheen benla na poek poepa u tih kaimi lawng nangmi te huh kan ngaih u van angla nangmi lawngkhaw kaimi he huh ham na ngaih u van tite avan thui .
52003007	Tedawngah maya manau thli , kaimi lawng raina oen thekhana ka tawng cakhaw nangmi kah kawng lawngah ka tha avan thlue sak ,
52003008	metihtiah nangmi lawngah Bawipa oen pumkhatla hingna dawngah acakla na pai u poen tih tahe ah mami he n'hing tangtang poen .
52003009	Tahe atah nangmi kawngah Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil n'thui thai poen . Nangmi kawngah awmngaihna amah haiah n'huh u dawngah amah tengah awmngaih awl ka thui .
52003010	Nangmi te pumpakla kan huh thai tih na oengna dawngah angoena te tawm athap hamla thinkaw tang oen yiin daai ka bih poepa .
52003011	Nangmi tengah kaimi ka law thaina ham mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh lawngah lawngpui van roek hawn seh !
52003012	Nangmi khat oen khat khawseh , thlaang boeih na lungna u te khawseh kaimi lawng nangmi kan lungna abo van angla Pathen lawng van roeng sak tare seh .
52003013	He tila nangmi te amah lawng tha avan ra sak vetih Bawipa Jesuh amah kah thlaang boeih oen a law vengah nangmi tah Pa Pathen haiah thlaangsoep thlaangciim la na awm u ai .
52004001	Aboetna ah maya manau thli , Pathen kawhoena ham metila na hing u ham a awm tite kaimi tengah na cang u poen . Kaimi tengkah na cang u angla te na hing u hamla awm tih yahawh ngaaila na hingna tare ham Bawipa Jesuh miing oen ah kan ceel u .
52004002	Bawipa Jesuh kah saithaina aana oen thuituenna kan peek u te na ming u .
52004003	Pathen lawng nangmi te ciim sak ham oen ah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna cipp muelmang sak ham a ngaih .
52004004	Nangmi tawngpa boeih lawngah aka ciim tih hinyah koei la na yu oen benbaw benpang ham te ming uh ,
52004005	Pathen aka ming nawh thlaang hurthok angla pumsa hue-ngaihna oen hing u boel .
52004006	Tecoengah he kawngah he a-u lawngkhaw khrihca paya laikoei sawah thawlhpalhna sai boel seh , koeih vaih nawh la proeih mak boel seh . Te tila aka sai boeih tah Pathen lawng dan a peek ai tite kavan thui u tih nangmi te ngaithuenna kan peek u poen .
52004007	Pathen lawng mami he cuk-halhna dawngah bawlneeng sak hamla n'khue nawh tih aciim acaihla awm ham ni n'khue u .
52004008	Tedawngah a-u khaw he kah cangpueina he aka vai nawh tah thlaanghing te hoett nawh , tede amah kah Ciim Muithla pekung Pathen te ni a hoett poen .
52004009	Nangmi lawng aka oeng na paya laikoei thli lungna ham a kawng te capat kavan thut ham ngoe nawh . Nangmi khat oen khat lung u ham Pathen lawng namami te n'cang puei u poen .
52004010	Nangmi lawngah ataktangla Macidonia rampum kah maya manau boeih te na lungna u poen . Tedawngah maya manau thli , te tila na lungna u tare ham kan coep kan ceel u .
52004011	Kavan thui u poen angla acuep amueihla khawsak ramsak ham poek uh , namami kah bungkhutna dang ham na bii na lawh te tluep ngaithuen uh .
52004012	Te atah aka oeng nawh thlaang thli lawngah n'hinyah u vetih na ngoena boeih ah te thlaangtloe sawah pangtung ham ngoe manawh .
52004013	Maya manau thli ngaiuepna aka khueh nawh thlaang thli angla nangmi na kaw a the nawh ham aka duek thli kawng awltak te nangmi ming sak hamla ka ngaih .
52004014	Jesuh tah duek tih tho koep tite mami lawng n'tangna u , tedawngah amah te oeng ruila a ka duek boeih tah Jesuh oen haih ah Pathen lawng avan khuen koep ai tite mami lawng n'tangna .
52004015	Tahe ah nangmi kan cang puei u he tah Bawipa kah cangpueina ni . Bawipa a lawna khawhin ah mami aka hing hue lawngah he aka duek thli te n'khall lettat manawh .
52004016	Metihtiah , awlpeekna paang awl , vanthlaang ukkung kah paang awl , Pathen kah pengsara awl oen Bawipa amah te vaan kalawng va rum thuk ai Khrih oeng ruila aka duek thli te lamhala tho u vetih ,
52004017	tecoengah teveng tue ah aka hing mami tah khawhi ah Bawipa oen huh u hamla muui dawngah ahimi oen n'tun haih ai . Te tila te mami tah Bawipa oen n'awm haih poe poen ai .
52004018	Tedawngah he awl oen ah he nangmi pakhat oen khat thaphawh uh .
52005001	Maya manau thli , he ang thaihu a thoengna ham atue atang oen khawhin kawng he nangmi tengah ca thut ham ngoe nawh .
52005002	Metihtiah Bawipa a lawna Khawhin tah khawyiin ah thlaanghuuen angla law ai tite nangmi lawng atheenla na ming u .
52005003	thlaang thli lawngah , “ Soeprep boeih tah ding asuek tih ngaimawng ngaitoela awm , ” a ti u vengah bawtbet khawlai maiah raina lawng ahimi te a tlaak thil ai ! Tattloel hutaa ca-awm tlawhna lawng kawlkalh ah a pha angla te awm vetih a-u thlaang khaw deem manawh .
52005004	Tede , maya manau thli , nangmi tah yiinna khuiah na awm u nawh dawngah te khawhin lawngah nangmi te thlaanghuuen angla n'let sak manawh .
52005005	Nangmi boeih tah aangna dawngkah thlaang , khawthaih thlaang la na awm u . Mami he tah khawyiin thlaang , yiinna thlaang nawh ni .
52005006	Tedawngah mami tah thlaangtloe angla ihdut ham awm nawh , mami lawng hinghang u silang huertuela awm u sih .
52005007	Thlaang he tah khawyiin ah ni a ih u , khawyiin ah ni ahimi yuu a ruui u .
52005008	Tede mami tah khawthaih thlaang ni , huertuela awm u sih . Mami lawng oengna oen lungna te kahkawng rangphaw la daan u silang tah mami kah ngaiuep thlawnna te thiilumuek la muek u sih .
52005009	Pathen lawng amah kah thinsana patang khang sak hamla mami he n'tuek nawh , mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen thlawnna te paang ham ni n'tuek u ;
52005010	amah a law vengah mami lawng duek ah khaw-seh , hing ah khaw seh amah oen hing haih ham ahih tah mami ham duek .
52005011	Tedawngah nangmi lawng tahe ah na sai u angla te khat oen khat thaphawh u langtah khat oen khat bawmcem uh .
52005012	Maya manau thli , khrihca hingna oen nangmi thuituen tih lawngpui aka nueh , nangmi tim ah bii aka bi thlaang thli te na hinyah u ham reenna kavan bih .
52005013	Ahimi kah biibina dawngah te asangla hinyahna lang lungna uh . Nangmi khat oen khat roeproeicala awm uh .
52005014	Maya manau thli , nangmi lawngah thayong thlaang te ngaithuenna pe uh , riyawp thlaang te thincakna pe uh , tha aka yoek thlaang te bawmcem uh , thlaang boeih tengah na kaw daw sak ham kan uen u .
52005015	A-u lawngkhaw athe te athe van oen thung u boel , khat oen khat sawah khawseh , thlaang boeih sawah khaw seh theenna te sai hamla poek yoeyah uh .
52005016	Awmngaih poepa u lah ,
52005017	boet ohla thangthui uh ,
52005018	soeprep boeih ah awmngaih ciil thui uh , Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla na hingna dawngah he tila hing hamla Pathen lawng a ngaih .
52005019	Ciim Muithla te kanghalh u boel ;
52005020	Muithla kah bawnghorhna oen a thui awl te ngaai lakna ohla awm boel .
52005021	Soeprep boeih te noekdak uh , atheen te lo uh ,
52005022	athe thaihu boeih te reel-aram uh .
52005023	Ngaimawngna pekung Pathen lawng soeprep ah n'ciim sak u hawn seh , mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih a law vengah nangmi kah pum boeih , na muithla , na hingna , oen pumtaksa te amah lawng kuem selang tah thawlhpalhna boeih kalawng n'loeih sak seh .
52005024	Nangmi khuekung te tah uep-awm la a awm dawngah te tila avan sai ai .
52005025	Maya manau thli , kaimi ham khaw thangthui uh .
52005026	Aka oeng boeih te boenhui angla lungna oen toei uh .
52005027	Bawipa kah saithaina aana oen ah he capat he aka oeng thlaang boeih tengah tae pe ham reenna kavan bih .
52005028	Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh .
53001001	Pawl , Silas oen Timote lawngah mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh kah thlaang thli , Tesalon khaw kah khrihcabu tengah ca kavan pat u .
53001002	Mami kah Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah nangmi te lungvatna , ngaimawngna m'pe hawn seh .
53001003	Maya manau thli , nangmi hamla Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui u poepa . Te tila awmngaih ciil thui te aka soeng ni , metihtiah nangmi kah oengna tah roeng hang tangkiik tih nangmi pakhat oen khat na lung u te a roeng hang tare dawngah ni .
53001004	Tedawngah nangmi kawng te Pathen kah khrihcabu thli tengah kamami roe lawng ka thangpawmna u . Nangmi lawng heemtekna oen patangraina na khang tangkiik u de na ueh thai u tih na oeng u dawngah kaimi lawng ka thangpawmna u .
53001005	He ang thli boeih lawngah Pathen kah awlcekna tah doeng tila a tueng sak tih nangmi tah Pathen Ram oen ah aphu ating-atawkk thlaang la na coengg u ai . Te ham ni nangmi lawng patangraina na khang u .
53001006	Pathen lawngtah asoeng ni a sai ; nangmi patangraina aka pe thli te patangraina a peek van ai .
53001007	nangmi patangraina aka khang thli oen kaimi he khaw hoeikhangna te m'peek ai . He patangraina tah Bawipa Jesuh lawng amah kah thara vanthlaang thli oen ah ,
53001008	hairawng haialh oen a law vengah , Pathen aka hoett thlaang thli oen mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kawng Awlthang Theen aka vai nawh thli te dan a tat ai .
53001009	Ahimi lawng dungyan rawkna , dantat patangna te a khang u ai , Bawipa lawng amah kah thlaang boeih teng kah ruep-awmna oen ah amah aka oeng thlaang boeih tengkah hinyahna te dang ham ,
53001010	a lawna khawhin ah ahimi tah Bawipa teng kalawng ah thek u boeih ai . Nangmi tah kaimi lawng ka phawng awlthang te na tangna u dawngah Bawipa te ruep-awmna oen hinyahna aka pe thlaang thli tim ah na thuum u ai .
53001011	Te kawngah ni nangmi ham kaimi ka thangthui u poepa . Amah lawng nangmi n'khuena oen ating atawkk la na hingna u thai ham kaimi lawng mami kah Pathen tengah ka bih u . Pathen lawng amah kah huham tharana oen ah nangmi lawng na ngaih boeih theenna te van soep sak selangtah oengna oen bii na sai te van tluep sak seh .
53001012	He tila te mami Bawipa Jesuh miing lawngah nangmi rang oen ah ruep-awmna te a dang vetih , mami kah Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna rang oen nangmi lawngkhaw amah teng kah ruep-awmna te na dang u van ai .
53002001	Maya manau thli , mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih a lawna oen amah oen thik at la tun haihna kawngah ;
53002002	yoeikooek doek la na kawpoek thumhang sak u boel , Bawipa kah Khawhin tah law coeng poen tila aka thui thli kah awl lawngkhaw nangmi te khup plet la n'sai u boel seh tila kan uen u . Te tila a thui awl te thlaang khatsut lawng kaimi kah thuisut awl angla khaw seh , kaimi kah cathut awl angla khawseh a poek u mai ai .
53002003	Nangmi te a-u lawngkhaw n'thaina u boel seh . Metihtiah aboetna koek Raal kahna apha thlantoe , hell ah aka tla ham Thlaang The Pui te avan pha thlan khui tah te Khawhin te van pha manawh .
53002004	Ahih lawngah pathen a ti boeihboeih oen bokna thaihu boeih te a oel khak vetih amah oen amah te , te thli boeih sawah awm ai . Ahih lawngah Pathen kah Tempal bok-im khuila pateng kuun vetih ngawl ai , ‘ kai tah Pathen ni , ’ ti ai .
53002005	Nangmi lawng na hilh poen aw ? Nangmi tengah ka awm vengah he ang thli boeih he kavan thui poen de ta .
53002006	Tahe ah he he a thoeng nawh ham ah kanghalhkung pakhat awm , te tah ame ang tite nangmi lawng na ming u . Tecoengah atue apha vengah Thlaangthe Pui tah va thoeng ai .
53002007	Ahuepla Thena lawngah bii a bi poen , tede kanghalhkung te khoe la a awm thlan atah Thlaangthe Pui te va thoeng thlan ai .
53002008	Tecoengah Thlaangthe Pui te phumpho ai , Tede Bawipa Jesuh a law vengah a kaa khuikah a hill oen Thlaangthe Pui te a ngawn vetih amah kah ruep-awm aangna oen a phe ai .
53002009	Thlaangthe Pui lawng Seitan kah huham tharana oen law vetih asoeng nawh kawpoekraina oen kawpoekrai-miknoekna phun soeprep a sai vetih ,
53002010	aka rawk tih ha-ata ham koei thlaang thli sawah athe soeprep thai alatna te a hawna ai . Ahimi lawngah thlawnna hamla awltak te do u nawh tih a lungna u nawh dawngah ahimi boeih tah ha-ata boeih ai .
53002011	Tedawngah asoeng nawh te ahimi lawng a tangna u hamla ahimi tim ah bii aka sai la Pathen lawngah thawlhpalhna huham tharana te a tuih pe tih asoeng nawh te ahimi lawng a tangna u .
53002012	Awltak aka tangna nawh tih thawlhna dawngah awmtheen aka boenn thlaang boeih tah awlcekna te a dang ai .
53002013	Bawipa lawng a lungna maya manau thli , nangmi kawngah kaimi lawng Bawipa tengah awmngaih awl thui poepa ham awm . Metihtiah Muithla kah huham tharana rang oen Pathen kah aciim thlaanghing la coeng ham oen ah nangmi lawng awltak te na oengna rang oen thlawnna te na dangna u ham Pathen lawng nangmi te lamhacuekla n'tuek u .
53002014	He tila thlawnna dang ham kaimi lawng kavan thui Awlthang Theen oen ah nangmi te Pathen lawng n'khue u ; mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ruep-awmna te dang ham oen paang van ham ni n'khue .
53002015	Tedawngah maya manau thli , kaimi kah phungthuina dawngah khawseh , capat dawngah khawseh pahih bok dawngkah awltak kan cang puei u te phoeih mangkhak u langtah acakla pai uh .
53002016	Mami he n'lungna tih aboet nawh thincakna oen acak ngaiuepna te a lungvatna oen pekung mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih amah oen mami kah Pa Pathen lawngah ,
53002017	atheen te na sai u tih awltheen te thui poepa ham thincakna oen ah tharana te m'pe hawn seh .
53003001	Aboetna ah maya manau thli , nangmi tim ah Pathen awlthang te apuung ataai van angla , aloela apuungna ham thangthui uh .
53003002	Thlaang boeih lawng awlthang te a tangna u nawh dawngah , thlaangthawlh oen thlaangthe thli kut khui kalawng kaimi he Pathen lawng n'loeih sakna ham khaw thangthui uh .
53003003	Tede Bawipa tah uep-awm thlaang la a awm dawngah nangmi te tha avan ra sak vetih Thlaang The Pui kah kut khui kalawng n'phungtu ai .
53003004	Bawipa lawng kaimi he nangmi te ueppangna ham m'peek tih kan uepna , kaimi lawng kavan thui te tahe ah na sai u angla hailam ben ah khaw na sai poe u poen ai tila ka tangna .
53003005	Nangmi lawng Pathen kah lungna te khawseh , Khrih kah peek uehthaina te khawseh yaakming tare ham ah Bawipa lawng nangmi te m'mawt hawn seh .
53003006	Maya manau thli , kaimi kah thuituenna awl te aka vai nawh tih thayong tha-ngak la aka awm maya manau boeih te nangmi lawngah relram hamla mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah kaimi lawng awl kan peek u .
53003007	Kaimi lawng bii ka bi u van angla nangmi lawng na bi u van ham awm tite namami lawng atheenla na ming u . Nangmi tengah kaimi ka awm vengah te ka tha yong sut nawh .
53003008	Kaimi lawng aphu peek ohla bawmcemna te ayoela ka lo u nawh . Thatlawh thaboepla bii ka bi u ; kaimi he nangmi pakhat khat kah thalrih la awm nawh ham khawyiin khawthaih bii ka bi u .
53003009	Kaimi lawng te tila ka bi u te nangmi tengah bawmna bih thaina te ka khueh u nawh dawngah moenih ta ; kaimi lawng te tila ka bi u te tah nangmi lawng oett ham oen vai hamla ni .
53003010	Nangmi teng ka awm u vengah te kaimi lawngah , “ A-u khaw bii aka bi nawh tah buh cah u boel , ” kan tina u .
53003011	Te tila kan tina u te tah nangmi timkah thlaang khatsut tah thayong tha-ngak la awm u tih bii khaw sai ohla thlaangtloe kah biibi te rawlraak thlaang la awm khoeng tite ka yaak u dawngah ni .
53003012	Te tila aka awm thlaang thli te acuep amueihla awm ham oen ah amami kah bungkhutna bii te bi ham Bawipa Jesuh Khrih miing oen ah ngaithuenna awl ka peek .
53003013	Tede , maya manau thli , nangmi lawngtah atheen thaihu sai te ngak u boel .
53003014	He kah capat khuiah aka awm awl he aka vai nawh thlaang khaw awm mai ai . Te ang thlaang te a awm atah noek u langtah ayah laat la a awmna ham ahih oen te benbaw benpang u boel .
53003015	Tede , ahih te raal angla tah van ngaai u aih boel ; maya manau pakhat van angla te thuituen uh .
53003016	Ngaimawngna kungpui Bawipa amah lawngah metuek tue vengah khawseh along a-im phun soeprep oen ah ngaimawngna m'pe hawn seh .
53003017	He capat he kamah kut roe oen kavan thut : Kai Pawl lawngah kan toei u . Ka capat roekk dawngah he tila mik-noekna ka thut ; he tah kamah kah cathut phung poen ni .
53003018	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh .
54001001	Mami kah Thlawnkung Pathen oen mami kah ngaiuepna Khrih Jesuh rang oen ah Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la aka awm Kai Pawl lawngah :
54001002	Oengna ah ka capa tangtang la aka awm Timote nang hamla ca kavan pat . Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawngah lungvatna , reenna oen ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh .
54001003	Macidonia ram la ka ceh vengkah awl kan uen angla te Efesa khaaw ah na awm hamla ka ngaih . Thlaang khatsut lawng Efesa khaaw ah asoeng nawh oengna a cang puei u tih ahimi te na toeng sak ham awm .
54001004	Awlpuungna bueng aka thoeng sak ciil awl thli oen aka boet nawh nukaw pakaw patuer thli thoepna te ang thli te a toengna u ham thui peh ; te ang thli oen ah te oengna oen ming ham koei la aka awm Pathen khawkhanna te n'sai thai nawh .
54001005	He tila awl kan peek he mengtengna tah athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim oen oengna tangtang oen ah thinkaw ciim dawng kalawng lungna te a thoengna ham thaphawhna ni .
54001006	Thlaang khatsut lawngtah he he a hoett u tih alawng ala nawh awlpuungna benla cet u .
54001007	Ahimi lawngah Pathen kah phungawl cangpueikung la coengg ham tah a ngaih u , tede ahimi lawngah amami kah awl-thui te khaw yaakming u nawh tih aka ming ceet angla a thui thaihu kawng te khaw ming u nawh .
54001008	Phungawl he atawng aleengla hawna koei ah n'hawna atah theen tite mami lawng m'ming u .
54001009	Ming ham tah phungawl he thlaang theen thli hamla sai nawh tih phungawl phekung thli oen lumlai aka hu thli , Pathen aka ming nawh thli oen thlaangthawlh thli ham , bokna ben oen muithla ben tu la aka sak nawh thli ham , a manu oen ana pa aka ngawn thlaang thli ham , thlaang aka ngawn thli ham ,
54001010	Khawboe the thlaang thli ham , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai thlaang thli ham , tlangsum caak ngaih ah thlaang aka tu thli ham , hoem thui thli oen asoeng nawh sausi la aka pai thli ham , asoeng oengnakungpui te aka kalh thlaang thli ham ni a sai pe .
54001011	Te ang cangpueina te tah kai lawng ka thui ham koei la m'peek awlthang theen dawngah te awm tih , ruep-awm oen theenduet Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen ni .
54001012	Bii ka bina dawngah tharana pekung Khrih Jesuh mami kah Bawipa tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui . Kai he amah kah bii bi hamla tueng aleng tila a poek tih bii m'peek dawngah ka uem tangkiik .
54001013	N'cui vengah ahih te kai lawng athela ka thui , ka heem ka tek tih thekha la ka sai , kai lawng oengna ka khueh nawh dawngah n'tu ka sai ti khaw ka ming nawh , tede Pathen lawngtah kai he n'reen .
54001014	Mami kah bawipa lawngah amah kah lungvatna te yahawh hlang la ka sawah avan lun tih oengna oen lungvatna te m'peek . Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen ah te ang thli te mami kah koe-ava la awm poen .
54001015	Khrih Jesuh tah thlaangthawlh thlawn ham dilai la va law ti he tah aka soeng tangtang awl la awm tih lawh koeloe ham koei oen tangna koei ni . Kai tah thlaangthawlh boeih lak ah athe khuet ni ;
54001016	tede Pathen lawng kai he n'reen tih thlaangthawlh boeih lak ah kai aka the khuet sawah kawdawna a khueh he tah hailam ben ah amah aka oeng tih dungyan hingna aka dang ham koei thlaang boeih kah miknoekna ham ni .
54001017	Dungyan Sengpahrang , aka duek thai nawh oen mik oen huh thai nawh pakhat bueng la aka awm Pathen tengah hinyahna oen ruep-awmna tah ayoeyah la awm hawn seh ! Amen .
54001018	Ka ca Timote , n'hu vengah tawngha lawng nang kah kawng a thui angla te na tengah awl kan peek . Te awl te atheenla raal kahna ham awva la hawna lang na oengna , athetheen mingna kawpoek ciim te cak sak .
54001019	Thlaang khatsut lawng athetheen mingna kawpoek te n'tu la sak u nawh tih amami kah a oengna te a phe u .
54001020	Te thlaang thli tim ah te Himanias oen Alekzandar khaw thuum hih van tih te rawi te Seitan kut ah ka tloeng tih dan ka peek poen ; te tila te ahih rawi lawng Pathen thangthe la a thui te toeng hamla a cang hih ai .
54002001	Tedawngah lamhacuek la reenna oen awl kan uen tah , thlaang boeih ham thangthuina , reenbihna , awmngaih awl thuina te Pathen tengah sai uh .
54002002	Mami lawng ading asuekla awmna ham , Pathen hinyahna oen ngaimawngla khaw sak tih khawboe ramlang theenna oen awm thaina ham ah sengpahrang thli oen saithaina aana aka khueh boeih ham thangthui uh .
54002003	He tah aka theen tih mami Thlawnkung Pathen kah kawhoena ni .
54002004	Thlaang boeih he thlawn la awm sak ham oen ah awltak te ming sak hamla a ngaih .
54002005	Metihtiah Pathen tah pakhat bueng awm tih Pathen oen thlaanghing laklaw ah roeproeina saikung thlaanghing boeih tlang ham hingna pekung thlaang Khrih Jesuh pakhat bueng awm .
54002006	Te tah atue atang apha khuek vengah Pathen lawng thlaang boeih thlawn ham a ngaih te tueng sakna ni .
54002007	Tedawngah ni oengna oen awltak kawng awlthang te phawng ham oen ah Gental thlaangphun te cangpueikung celtuih la kai he n'tuih .
54002008	Pathen bokna huen roekk ah tawngpa hue lawng a thangthui u ham ka ngaih . Pathen tengah pum aka pe tawngpa hue lawngah thinsanna oen awlpuungna awm ohla thangthui vengah amami kut te a thueng u thai .
54002009	Hutaa hue lawngkhaw akhoek anoen atheen khoeng la hinaak himbai te a buen anaak u ham ka ngaih ; samtoel samveh te khaw alawnha aihla thloeih athlam ohla , sui kaawntheen oen khaw , latha kaawntheen oen khaw , phutlo hi-acuu oen khaw thoekcau u aih boel seh .
54002010	Tede bokna ben ah thinkaw pengnel hutaa hue lawng a sai ham tueng angla te thaihu theen saina oen thoekcau u seh .
54002011	Hutaa hue lawng awm duem selang tah awlngaaina oen cang u seh .
54002012	Ahimi te cangpueikung la awm ham oen ah tawngpa sawah ukna aana khueh ham khaw ka ngaih nawh ; Ahimi te dipsipla awm duem seh .
54002013	Metihtiah Adam te a sai lamha coengah ni Evi te a sai .
54002014	Tedawngah thailatna la aka awm te Adam nawh ni ; hutaa ni thailatna la awm tih Pathen Phungawl te a phe .
54002015	Tede hutaa lawngah acuep amueih la oengna , lungna oen ciimna dawngah acakla a awm atah camoe cuunna rang oen ah thlawnna a dang ai .
54003001	Thlaang pakhat lawng khrihca mawtkung la awm ham a ngaih atah ahih lawng biibi theen a ngaih ni tila a thui te soeng tangtang .
54003002	Khrihcabu mawtkung tah thawlhpalhna aka awm nawh tih a yu khat bueng aka khueh thlaang , mah oen mah aka uk u thai thlaang , mah oen mah kuemsuem thai thlaang , adoengla khaw aka sa thlaang , hinyah koei thlaang ; kamyin kamlai aka lungna thlaang , thlaangtloe te riingtuuk thaihoen thai thlaang seh .
54003003	Ahih tah yuu aka ruui nawh tih boethe halang nawh thlaang , boe-ngaai kawdaw thlaang , tangka aka ngaih soeh nawh thlaang seh ,
54003004	amah imkhuikaw ham atheenla khawkhanna aka sai thai oen a ca anau thli lawng hinyahna oen awl a ngaai pe thlaang seh .
54003005	Metihtiah amah imkhuikaw ham khawkhanna metila ka sai ai tite a ming nawh atah Pathen kah khrihcabu te metila a doen acaang thai ai ?
54003006	Ahih tah oengna dawngah kawpoeksoepna aka khueh thlaang seh , tetih atah Seitan angla ahih tah oekthloen u nawh vetih awlcek la awm manawh .
54003007	Ahih tah khrihcabu khuiah aka awm nawh thlaang lawngkhaw a hinyah thlaang seh , te atah a thang the nawh vetih seitan kah dong dawngah te man manawh .
54003008	Khrihcabu khuikah bawmkung thli khawseh khawboe ramlang aka theen tih kawpoek ciim aka khueh thlaang seh ; ahimi tah yuu aka aw nawh tih tangka ngaihmoekna aka khueh nawh thlaang seh ;
54003009	Ahimi tah athetheen pekbo thaina kawpoek ciim oen oengna awltak aka dung te acakla aka phoeih thlaang la a awm ham awm .
54003010	Ahimi te lamhacuek ah noekdak la awm vetih cawttbauh koei a awm nawh atah bi u seh .
54003011	A yu thli khaw khawboe ramlang aka theen , thlaang theet awl aka thui nawh , mah oen mah aka uk u thai , soeprep ah thlaangdoeng la aka awm thlaang seh .
54003012	Khrihcabu bawmkung tah a yu khat bueng aka khueh tih a ca anau thli oen imkhuikaw ham atheenla khawkhanna aka sai thai thlaang seh .
54003013	Amami kah bii te atheenla aka bi bawmkung thli tah a hinyah u vetih Khrih Jesuh a oengna kawng te raltheenla a thui thai ai .
54003014	Nangmi ham capat kavan thut vengah he nangmi tengah ayuela law ham oen nangmi te huh hamla ka ngaiuep .
54003015	Tede ka law haai nawh oh atah aka hing Pathen kah khrihcabu , tuungtang la aka pai tih awltak aka hing puei , Pathen imkhuikaw ah mami lawng metila khaw n'sak ai tite he capat lawngah avan thui ai .
54003016	Mami kah bokna dawngah aka awm alenduet awlhuep he a-u lawngkhaw oelhtaih thai manawh ; Ahih tah thlaanghing pumsa la va thoeng , soeng tangtang tite muithla lawng a tueng sak , vanthlaang thli lawng a huh u , Ahih kawng te thlaangphun boeih tengah a thui u tih dilai peng tawm thlaang lawng a oeng u , tecoengah ahih tah vaan la luui hang poen .
54004001	Hailam ben atah thlaang khatsut lawngah oengna te a hoett u ai tila Muithla lawng aciimphanla a thui ; ahimi lawngah hoem thui muithla awl te a ngaai u vetih raaithe kah cangpueina te a vai u poen ai .
54004002	Te ang cangpueina te tah thiiling haialh oen a ung sak angla athetheen pekbona kawpoek aka duek moelh sut thlaangthaipalat hoem thui hue lawngah a puung adaw sak u .
54004003	Te ang thlaang thli lawngah yu lawh vaa sak nawh ham oen khatsut caak awkk te yeh ham a cang puei u . Tede aka oeng thlaang thli oen awltak aka ming tangte thlaang thli lawngtah awmngaih oen thangthui coengah caak hamla caak awkk thli te Pathen lawng a sai .
54004004	Soeprep boeih Pathen lawng a sai he tah theen ; khat khaw hoett ham awm nawh , tede soeprep boeih he awmngaih thangthuina oen do ham awm ,
54004005	metihtiah Pathen awl lawngkhaw , thangthuina lawngkhaw Pathen kah do ham koeila te a sai .
54004006	He kah thuituenna thli he maya manau thli tengah na thui pe atah nang tah Khrih Jesuh kah atheen tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm ai ; namah oen namah muithla ben na cawm na cah u van angla te oengna awl oen aka soeng cangpueina namah lawng na vai te hawna lah .
54004007	Tede Pathen kawng alam aka awm nawh tih thui ham koeihvaih nawh ciil awl te tah reel-aram hawn . Pathen kawngaih la hing ham namah oen namah te phep uh .
54004008	Pumsa oen cangna he aphu tah awm thoem van , tede muithla ben cangna lawngtah soeprep ah aphu awm , metihtiah , tahe veng hingna ham khaw , hailam ben hingna ham khaw pahih bok hamla awl a kam .
54004009	He tah aka soeng tangtang awl la awm tih do koeloe ham oen ah tangna khaklal ham awm .
54004010	Mami lawngah he thlaang boeih thlawnkung , awlpuila aka oeng thlaang thli kah thlawnkung aka hing Pathen dawngah ngaiuepna te n'khueh u tih mami lawng patangplai oen arai acaangla bii m'bi u .
54004011	He thuituenna oen cangpueina thli he thui peh .
54004012	Roengthaai kum no la na awm dawngah nang te a-u lawngkhaw dapsit la n'hu boel seh ; tede na awlthui thingkaa khaw , na khawboe ramlang khaw , lungna , oengna oen ciimcaihna khaw aka oeng thlaang thli ham oett koei la awm seh .
54004013	Kai ka law thlantoe tah rangpui tengah Caciim teena , phungthuina oen cangpueina te yawm langtah atue na khueh boeih te hawna lah .
54004014	Tawngha thli lawng awl avan thui tih ahaamca thli lawng na sawah kut avan tloeng vengah nang lawng na dang muithla ben kutdo te dalra thlothlamna boel .
54004015	Thlaang boeih lawng nang kah na bi na lawh a roeng hang te a huhna u thai ham hawna langtah thathluela te thli te sai lah .
54004016	Namah oen namah te ngaithuen lang na cang puei te khaw ngaithuen lah . He thaihu boeih he toeng ohla sai , metihtiah nang lawng na sai atah namah oen namah khaw , na awl-thui hutung thlaang thli te khaw pahih bok la na thlawn thai ai .
54005001	Kum haam tawngpa thli te ho boel , ahimi te na pa angla hoelh amaihla voemtoei lah . Kum no tawngpa te na nau angla thloep-hoelh lang ,
54005002	kum haam hutaa thli te na nu angla ngaai langtah , kum no hutaa thli te kawpoek ciim oen na ngannu angla ngaai lang voemtoei lah .
54005003	Amah bueng ah khaw aka sa huhai thli te van hinyah .
54005004	Tede huhainu pakhat khat lawng a ca thli khawseh , tihnawhtah a ca kah ca-anau thli khaw a khueh atah amami kah imkhuikaw te bokna phung angla cawmcah ham lamhacuekla cang u seh , te tila te a manu oen ana pa khaw , nu haam pahaam thli kah cuun acahna te khaw a thung pe thai ai . Metihtiah he tah Pathen kah kawhoena ni .
54005005	Amah bueng aka awm tih ahih te cawmcah hamla aka khueh nawh huhai tumtee lawngtah a ngaiuepna te Pathen ah kang a khueh tih yiin daai thangthui tih bawmna a bih .
54005006	Tede pumsa awmtheen awmyaalna aka boenn huhai tumtee thli tah hing van ruung mai de aka duek poen ni .
54005007	Ahimi te a-u lawngkhaw a thuitheet nawh ham he kah thuituenna he thui peh .
54005008	Tede thlaang pakhat khat lawng amah kah a cakaw te awlpuila amah imkhuikaw te a cawm acah nawh atah oengna te aka hoett thlaang la awm tih aka oeng nawh thlaang lak ah pateng khaw the-eep ngaai .
54005009	Huhai pakhat te a kum sawmruk a kuep thlan atah huhai tumtee thli kah cayin cabu dawngah thuum sak boel . Cayin cabu dawngah aka thuum ham tah vai khat bueng vaa aka sa huhainu te thuum seh .
54005010	Thaihu theen saina , ca-anau thli atheenla cawm-acahna , kamyin kam lai lungna , khrihca paya laikoei thli ham bii aka yawm , khawdeng lungma thlaang aka bawm , thaihu theen saina dawngah miing theenna aka dang huhainu te thuum seh .
54005011	Tede kumno huhainu thli te cayin cabu dawngah thuum sak boel ; metihtiah ahimi tah amami kah pumsa ngaihna dawngah vaa sak ham a ngaih tih Khrih te a mangthawng taak u tih ,
54005012	Khrih tengah amami kah awlkamcuek te a phe u .
54005013	Ahimi lawngah im khat coeng im khat yingyawi paithle u tih atue atang te a poeih alak u ; te lak ah athe-eep ngaai tah thlaang a thuitheet u tih thlaang alawl ala u , thui koei nawh te a thui u .
54005014	Tedawngah mami aka raalna thlaang thli lawng mami kawng he athela thuina tue khaw a dang nawh ham kumno huhai tumtee hue lawng vaa a sak tih ca-anau khueh ham , amami kah imkhuikaw te a cawm acah u ham ka ngaih .
54005015	Metihtiah khatsut huhai tumtee lawngtah meel koep u tih Seitan hu ah bang u poen .
54005016	Tede khrihca hutaa pakhat lawng imkhuikaw ah huhai tumtee pakhat a khueh atah amah lawng cawm a cah selang tah khrihcabu kah thalrih la khueh boel seh ; tetih dengah ni amah bueng aka awm huhai tumtee thli te khrihcabu lawng a tu-acaa thai ai .
54005017	Mawtkung angla bii atheenla aka bi ahaamca lawngtah thapang te arepla a dang ham awm , awlpuila phungthuina oen cangpueina aka yawm lawng thapang a dang ngaai ham awm .
54005018	Metihtiah caciim lawngah , “ vaitaw te caang a tiil lii vengah a kaa cuett pe boel , ti tih bii aka bi lawng thapang te a dang ham awm , tila a thui .
54005019	Ahaamca thawlh a peel u te aka mingkung sausi pahih , pathum a awm nawh atah hutung pe boel .
54005020	Thlaangtloe hue lawngkhaw thawlh sai a rihna van ham thawlhna aka sai boeih te rangpui haiah toelthaam peh .
54005021	Na saina boeih dawngah a-u tengah khaw pekbona oen mik-hai dan muehla na sai ham , thuituenna he nang lawng na vai hamla Pathen oen Khrih Jesuh oen ah aciim vanthlaang haiah ceetceet kan uen .
54005022	Bawipa kah biibina ah pumpeekna sai ham a-u tengah khaw tot-alet la na kut van tloeng praap boel . Thlaangtloe kah thawlh saina dawngah thuum boel ; nang tah acuemsuekla va awm lah .
54005023	Nang tah na sa a ding nawh taitu dawngah tui bueng te aw boel lang na bung a raawina ham misurtui te ayawl akaai tah bet ah aw mai hawn .
54005024	Thlaang khatsut kah thawlhna tah tueng pheng tih amami haiah a thawlhna lawng awlcekna ah cet doen poen ; tede thlaangtloe khatsut kah thawlhna tah hu-aha dengah tueng .
54005025	Tetihvan angla thaihu theen sai he khaw tueng pheng tih huh thai koeila aka awm thlan te khaw thuh thai la awm manawh .
54006001	Sal tamnaa la aka awm thli lawngah namami kah bawimanghai thli te hinyah peek tueng koeila a poek u ham awm , te dengah ni a-u lawngkhaw Pathen miing oen kaimi kah cangpueina te athela a thui nawh ai .
54006002	Bawimanghai thli te khrihca la a awm u atah ahimi khaw mami kah maya manau la awm van poen ti u boel selang sal thli lawngah te hinyah ohla awm u boel seh . Ahimi kah bii te atheenla a bi pe tare ham awm . Metihtiah ahimi kah biibina rang oen hoeikhangna aka dang te tah ahimi lawng a lungna khrihca thli van ni .
54006003	He thaihu thli he nang lawng cang puei langtah thui peh . A-u khaw mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah aka soeng awl oen mami kah bokna phung cangpueina oen ah aka vai u nawh oengnakungpui alakloe te aka cang puei tah ,
54006004	Oekk-thloen u tih n'tu khaw aka ming nawh thlaang ni . Ahih lawngah awllung kawngah oelhtaih u ham oen tawhsi ngaihna kawpoek theen nawh te a khueh tih , he lawngah uett-eena , awlpuungna , thekhana , atheen nawh uepvoetna , aboet tlaih nawh awlpuungna te a thoeng sak ,
54006005	he tila aka awm thli tah kawpoek soeng tlaih nawh tih awltak te aka khueh tlaih nawh thlaang poen ni . Ahimi lawngah bokna he kuirang la coenggna lawngpui la a poek u .
54006006	Thlaang lawngah amah kah a khueh duen oen ah ngaikhuekna te a awm atah bokna lawngah thlaang he kuirang thlaanglen la a coengg sak tangtang .
54006007	Mami lawng dilai dawngla n'van khuen u khat khaw awm nawh ! Dilai dawngkah n'tu n'khuen thai ai ? Khat khaw n'khuen thai manawh !
54006008	Tedawngah mami lawng caak awkk oen hinaak himbai n'khueh atah tete mami ham khoek mai poen .
54006009	Tede kuirang la coengg ham aka ngaih thli tah suek-halhna khuiah tla u , ngau-athuuna soeprep oen rih awm hue-ngaihna dong dawngah man u tih te lawngah ahimi te sungna oen rawkna benla te a ceh puei .
54006010	Metihtiah tangka ngaih soeh aih he tah athe phun soeprep a thoengna kungpui ni . Thlaang khatsut tah tangka khueh moek a ngaih dawngah oengna te a ceh taak u tih kawthena acungkuem oen a thinkaw lungbui a rek sak u .
54006011	Tede nang tah Pathen kah thlaang la na awm dawngah he thaihu thli boeih he rel-aram hawn . Doengna , Pathen hinyahna , oengna , lungna , uehthaina oen kawdawna te khueh hamla yawm lah .
54006012	Oengna loeh-lang taana poei ah na tha khueh boeih oen heng lang dungyan hingna te namah ham lo lah ; Pathen lawng nang n'khue tih mingpueikung sausi thlaang yahawh haiah na oengna te acakcala na phawng te tah dungyan hingna te huh sak ham ni .
54006013	Thaihu boeih hingna pekung Pathen haiah khaw , Pontias Pilat haiah a oengna acakcala aka phawng Jesuh haiah nang he awl kan uen .
54006014	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah Khawhin te a pha thlantoe awl kan peek he atheenla vai .
54006015	Amah a lawkoepna tah bawi boeih kah Bawi , sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang , aka theenduet tih pakhat bueng ukkung la aka awm Pathen lawngah atue atang a khoek tluep vengah avan pha sak ai .
54006016	Ahih bueng he ni aka duek thai nawh ; a-u lawngkhaw a tengah yoeii mare thai nawh aangna khuiah te awm . Ahih te a-u lawngkhaw hu vai nawh ; a-u lawngkhaw hu thai manawh . Amah tengah hinyahna oen dungyan ukna aana tah awm hawn seh ! Amen .
54006017	He hing khuiah thaihu thaiha khuehtoenna oen aka len muep thli te oekthloen nawh ham van thui peh . Te ang ueptapna aka awm nawh thaihu khuehtoenna dawngah ngaiuepna khueh u boel seh . Tede mami awmngaihna ham haih muehla soeprep pekung Pathen dawngah te ngaiuepna khueh u seh .
54006018	Ahimi lawngah atheen thaihu sai ham , bii theen te bina oen kuirang la awmna u ham , moeihoeihla thlaangtloe a do adan thaina u ham van thui peh .
54006019	He tila te ahimi lawngah kaawntheen te amami ham a tung asep u vetih te tah hailam ben ham akung cak ai . Te tila ahimi lawng hingna te a dang thai vetih te tah hingna tangtang la awm ai .
54006020	Timote , nang lawng khoem abeel ham na kut dawngah avan tloeng boeih te atheenla kuem . Pathen hinyahna aka awm nawh awlthuina oen ngau-athuu awlpuungna , thlaang khatsut lawng asoeng nawh la , “ Cuihna ” a ti u te reel-aram hawn .
54006021	Thlaang khatsut lawng atah te ang cuihna te ka khueh ti u tih oengna lawngpui te a hang u poen . Pathen kah lungvatna nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh .
55001001	Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen awl avan kam hingna mami lawng n'khueh te phawng hamla tuih la aka awm , Pathen kah kawngaihna oen Khrih Jesuh kah celtuih la aka awm kai Pawl lawngah ,
55001002	Ka lungna ka capa Timote nang tengah ca kavan pat : Pa Pathen oen mami Bawipa Khrih Jesuh lawngah nang te lungvatna , reenna , oen ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh .
55001003	Patuer thli lawngah bii a bi pe angla kai lawngkhaw thinkaw ciim oen ka bi pe van Pathen tengah awmngaih awl ka thui . Yiin oen daai ka thangthuina dawngah nang te kan poek yoeyah tih awmngaih ciil ka thui .
55001004	Nang kah mikphi te ka hilh nawh tih awmngaihna oen ka betoet thaina ham nang te huh ham ka ngaih tangkiik .
55001005	Na nuhaam Loisi oen na nu Yunis lawng a khueh oengna tangtang te ang van te nang lawngkhaw na khueh van tila ka poek , tahe ah khaw na khueh tite ka tangna .
55001006	Tedawngah , na sawah kut kavan tloeng vengah Pathen kah peek kutdo te na hing sak poe hamla koep kavan thui .
55001007	Metihtiah Pathen kah peek Muithla lawngah mami he riyawp thlaang la n'sai nawh ; ahih kah Muithla lawngtah mami he huham tharana , lungna , mah oen mah kuemsuemna oen ah m'betoet sak dai .
55001008	Tecoengah mami kah Bawipa kawng te thui hamla yak boel ; Khrih kawngah thong aka tla kai kah kawngah khaw yak boel . Pathen lawng tharana m'peek angla te Awlthang Theen hamla khawdeng patang khang hawn .
55001009	Pathen lawng mami he amah thlaang la awm ham n'thlawn tih n'khue u , te tah mami kah saina dawngah nawh tih , a lungvatna tah atue a tong thlan veng kalawng Khrih Jesuh rang oen m'peek poen ,
55001010	tede tahe tah , mami Thlawnkung Khrih Jesuh a lawna rang oen te lungvatna te avan tueng sak poen . Ahih lawng ah duekna tharana te aboet sak poen tih aka duek thai nawh hingna te awlthang theen rang oen avan tueng sak poen .
55001011	Pathen lawng Awlthang Theen phawngkung la kai he celtuih la khaw , cangpueikung la khaw n'khueh poen ,
55001012	te dawngah ni kai lawngah he ang khawdeng patang he ka khang . Tede kai tah ka ngaai mawng , metihtiah kai lawngah a-u ka uepna tite ka ming tih ka kut dawngah avan tloeng thaihu te tah te Khawhin toe ah amah lawngah anepla avan kuem ai tite ka tangna .
55001013	Kai lawng kan cang puei aka soeng awl te acakla phoeih lang nang lawng na vai ham oen oett ham koeila te khueh , Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah mami kah thaihu la aka awm oengna oen lungna dawngah te acakla awm .
55001014	Mami khuiah aka hing Ciim Muithla kah tharana rang oen ah nang tengah avan tloeng thaihu theen te anepla kuem-akawl .
55001015	Asia ram khuiah aka awm thlaang boeih lawngah , Fikela oen Hamokin lawngkhaw kai he n'thlah sut u poen tite nangmi lawng na ming u .
55001016	Onisiforas lawngah boehoengla ka kaw avan hoe sak dawngah Bawipa lawng a imkhuikaw te reen hawn seh . Ahih lawngtah thong ka tlaak khaw yah puei nawh ,
55001017	Rom khaaw la avan pha tih a paipuek ah kai he n'huh thlantoe n'tlap khiing .
55001018	Te khawhin ah Bawipa lawng ahih te reen hawn seh ! Efesa khaaw ah kai ham metihtlukla bii a bi tite nangmi lawng atheenla na ming u .
55002001	Ka capa nang tah Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhat la awmna rang oen n'dang u lungvatna dawngah acakla awm lah .
55002002	Mingpueikung Sausi boehoeng kah haiah ka thui cangpueina te na yaak poen . Thlaangtloe te patoeng aka cang puei thai van ueppangkoei thlaang tengah te thui peh .
55002003	Khrih Jesuh kah thincak raalkap la na awm van angla khawdeng patang te khang hawn .
55002004	Raalkap bii aka bi lawngtah raalbawi te a kaw hoe sak ham a ngaih tih raalkap la aka awm nawh thlaangthoet kah bii dawngah te poei apah tawmban nawh .
55002005	Loehlangna poei ah aka loeh u thlaang pakhat lawng loehlangna phung-alam te a vai nawh atah kutdo dang thai nawh .
55002006	Thatlawh thaboep la bii aka bi lotoen thlaang lawngah amah lo kah caangthaih te a caak lamha ham awm .
55002007	Awl kavan thui he atheenla poek , metihtiah he awl he boeih yaakming thaina te Bawipa lawng m'peek ai .
55002008	Awlthang theen dawngkah ka thui angla Devid cadil duekna kalawng aka tho koep Jesuh te hilh boel .
55002009	Metihtiah kai lawng Awlthang Theen ka phawng dawngah patang ka khang tih lumlai aka hu thlaanghuuen angla thiirui oen n'khih u . Tede Pathen kah awl tah thiirui oen khit thai nawh .
55002010	Tedawngah Pathen kah thlaangtuek thli lawngtah Khrih Jesuh teng kalawng aka law thlawnna te a dang u tih dungyan ruep-awmna te a pangna u ham patang raina boeih boeih he ka ueh .
55002011	Adangkah awl he aka soeng ni : “ Amah oen n'duek haih atah amah oen n'hing haih van ai .
55002012	Mami lawng ueh thai mangkhak atah mami khaw amah oen haih ukkung la n'awm ai . Amah te n'hoett atah mami he n'hoett van ai .
55002013	Mami lawng uep-awm la n'awm nawh cakhaw Ahih tah uep-awm la awm yoeyah , metihtiah ahih tah amah oen amah te thai-alat u thai nawh . ”
55002014	He he na thlaang thli tengah thui pe langtah awllung awllep mailai ah oelh u khiing nawh ham Pathen haiah ngaithuenna te peh . Tede atheen thaihu nawh ni , awl a hutung thlaang thli te ni a rawk sak khoeng .
55002015	Nang tah bii aka yah puei nawh , Pathen kah awltak te asoengla aka cangpueikung la na awm van angla Pathen kawtlaakna te na dangna ham yawm lah .
55002016	Pathen hinyahna aka awm nawh tih ngau-athuu awl oelhna te reel-aram lah , te ang awlkaa lawngah te Pathen teng kalawng athlathloeila ni thlaang a thak khoeng mai .
55002017	Te ang cangpueina te tah thi-asa aka rong sak vueihacang-ing oen ah lo u . Te ang thaihu aka cang puei thlaang pahih rawi te tah Himenia oen Filitas ni .
55002018	Ahih rawi lawng awltak lawngpui te a ceh taak hih tih , thawhkoepna tah awm coeng poen , tila a thui hih dawngah thlaang khatsut kah oengna te plet-plawng la a sai hih .
55002019	Tede Pathen lawng lungdang a suem te tah cak khak tih hinghuen thai nawh , te sawah te he awl he a thut : “ Bawipa lawng amah kah thlaang la aka awm te a ming ” tila khaw , “ Bawipa kah thlaang la ka awm a ti lawngtah athe saina te a toeng ham awm , ” tila te a thut .
55002020	lmpui phulum khuiah um , am thaihu acungkuem awm : khatsut te tah sui , ngun oen a sai tih atloe te tah thing oen a sai khaw awm tih amlai oen a sai khaw awm ; khatsut tah khawniingtuikaa ah hawna ham tih atloe te tah awmthoet awmroelh ah hawna ham ni .
55002021	A-u khaw athe thaihu boeih te a ceh taak tih aciim acaihla aka awm tah bii phutlo dawngah a hawna ai , metihtiah ahih tah thloeng u tih thaihu theen sai ham oepsoehla aka toen u tih a bawipa kah hawna koeila a awm dawngah ni .
55002022	Roengthaai thawhthuem kah pumsa ngaihna te vai boel langtah thinkaw ciim oen Bawipa a khue tih bawmna aka bih thlaang thli oen ah thik at la doengna , oengna , lungna oen ngaimawngna dang hamla yawm lah .
55002023	Tede ngau-athuuna oen mingtung plau nawh awlpuungna te reel-aram hawn ; te ang lawngtah tawhsina ni a thoeng sak tite nang lawng na ming .
55002024	Bawipa kah tuihyoeihthlaang tah tawhsi u ham awm nawh . Ahih tah thlaang boeih aka reen , kawdaw thlaang , cangpueikung saya theen la awm ham ni ,
55002025	amah aka ngaih nawh thlaang thli te lunghoeih lungpaih la toelthaam ham awm . Tetih atah ahimi te Pathen lawngah thawlh yutna atue theen a peek vetih awltak te a ming u ai .
55002026	Tecoeng atah ahimi lawng a cuih a khueh u vetih ahimi te aka tu khak tih amah kah kawngaih vai sak ham aka saikung Seitan kah dong dawngah man nawh vetih loeih ai .
55003001	Hukhueng koek khawhin tah raina atue poen ni tite hilh boel .
55003002	Thlaang lawngah he , amah ham bueng poekna , ngaihmoekna , a khueh u vetih oekthloenna oen amah oen amah pawmsang u ai ; ahimi tah thlaang thekhana , a manu oen ana pa awl aka ngaai nawh , lungvatna aka ming nawh tih bokna ben tula aka ngaai nawh thlaang la awm u ai ;
55003003	ahimi tah reenna aka khueh nawh , thlaangtlung-pathang , thlaang thuitheet thlaang , boethe halang thlaang , halang cingpoh thlaang la awm u vetih ahimi lawng thaihu theen te a thina ai ;
55003004	ahimi tah awl aka cak nawh thlaang , maru-marat thintoi thlaang , kawpoek sang oen aka hoell u thlaang la awm u vetih ; Pathen te lungna lak ah awmtheen awmyaal boenn-atlaak te a lungna ngaai ai ,
55003005	ahimi lawngah bokna phung he asaw ahan ah a phoeih u , tede akhuiben kah tharana tangtang te tah a hoett u . Te ang thlaang thli te tah reel-aram hawn .
55003006	Ahimi khatsut lawngah thlaang im thlaang lo ah kuun u tih a kaw aka cak nawh hutaa-tumphai , amami kah thawlhna thalrih lawng a namm tih pumsa ngaihna phun soeprep lawng a mawt hutaa hue te tah doelh a thloeih tih a tuuk u thai ,
55003007	te hutaa hue lawng awltak te cang hamla a yawm poepa u , tede ahimi tah awltak te metuek khaw aka ming thai tlaih nawh poen ni .
55003008	Janni oen Jambri lawng Mosi te a oelh a taih hih angla he thlaang thli lawngkhaw awltak te a oelh a taih u , ahimi tah a kawpoek lawng bii aka bi tlaih nawh lungmong thlaang la awm u tih oengna ben ah dok u poen .
55003009	Tecakhaw ahimi kah saina te tah athlathloeila pha manawh , metihtiah thlaang boeih lawngah ahimi metihtlukla a ngau-athuu u tite a ming ai . Janni oen Jambri khaw te tila ni a awm hih van .
55003010	Tede nang lawngtah kai kah cangpueina , khawboe ramlang oen ka hingna dawngah ka mengtengna te na vai poen . Nang lawngtah ka oengna , kawdawna , lungna , uehthaina ,
55003011	heem-atek la ka awmna oen patang ka khangna boeih te na ming poen . Antiok , Ikoniam oen Listra khaaw ah mueirihtamyiin , khawdeng patang heemtekna ka sawah aka thoeng te nang lawngah boeih na ming . Tede Bawipa lawng te ang thli boeih dawng kalawng n'loeih sak .
55003012	A-u khaw Khrih Jesuh oen pumkhatla awmna rang oen Pathen kawngaih la hing ham aka ngaih tah heemtekna patang te a khang ai ;
55003013	tede thlaang the thli oen thlaangthaipalat thli kah the-arana tah khuet la khuet ai ; thlaangtloe te athai alatna vetih amah te khaw a thai alatna u van ai .
55003014	Tede nang tah , na cang tangte tih acakla na oeng awltak dawngah te awm poe lah . Nang cangpueikung thli a-u tite namah lawng na ming ;
55003015	Na camaw veng kalawng ah Aciim Baibal awl na ming poen tite hilh boel . Te Caciim lawngah Khrih Jesuh oengna rang oen thlawnna benla mawtkung cuihna te m'peek thai .
55003016	Caciim boeih he Pathen hillsang la awm tih awltak cangpueina ham , toelthaamna ham , thawlhpalhna te tlaihvawngna ham , asoengla khawsakna ham ah thuituenna la aphu awm ,
55003017	te ah ni Pathen bii aka bi thlaang lawngah thoemthaina soep vetih thaihu theen phun soeprep sai hamla phawlip te asoepcala a khueh ai .
55004001	Thlaangduek oen thlaanghing awl aka cek ham koei Khrih Jesuh oen Pathen haiah awl ceetceet kan uen . Metihtiah ahih tah Sengpahrang angla uk ham law koep ai .
55004002	Tedawngah awlthang te thui lah , ( atue atang alawlh amaih ah khaw , alawlh amaih nawh ah khaw ) awlthang te thui ngaikhoek . A yaakming thaina ham thui peh , toel-thaam ham angoe atah siim langtah , thaphawh ham angoe atah thathluena awl thui peh , kawdaw thinsan oen cang puei .
55004003	Thlaang rangpui lawngah asoeng oengnakungpui cangpueina te hutung ngaih nawh la a awmna atue atang te apha ai , tede amami kah ngaihna te a vai vetih amami kah yaak ngaih bueng te aka thui hamla cangpueikung yahawh hlang te amami ham a cawi ai .
55004004	Ahimi lawng awltak te hutung ohla a mangthawng taak vetih ciil awl mailai te hutung ham a ngaih u ai .
55004005	Tede nang tah me ang akawng alam dawngah khawseh namah oen namah te kuemsuem uh , patang palai te ueh hawn , Awlthang Theen phawngkung la na awmna bii te bi langtah Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang la na awm van angla na bi koei boeih te sai .
55004006	Kai ham tah ka hingna he luciik la thawthueng ham atue apha poen ; he dilai hingna he ceh taak ham tahe ah atue khoek poen .
55004007	Loehlangna poei ah khaw ka tha khueh boeih oen ka yawm poen , athla hlang aboet kheng toela ka heeng poen ; oengna te ka phoeih rapsaat poen .
55004008	Tahe tah , adoengla aka hing thli a peek taana kutdo lawng te kai he n'ring poen , te kutdo te tah , Bawipa lawngah , te Khawhin ah te m'peek ai , kai bueng he m'pe manawh , amah a lawna te lungna oen a lamtoen thlaang boeih te a peek ai .
55004009	Ka tengah ayuela law ham van yawm .
55004010	Dema lawngtah dilai he a thintlawhna dawngah kai he n'ceh taak tih Tesalon khaw la cet poen . Kresen tah Galati ram la cet tih Titas tah Dalmatia ram la cet .
55004011	Luka bueng he ka tengah awm . Mark te van law puei , ahih tah kai he bii aka bawmkung ni .
55004012	Taikhikas tah Efesa khaaw la ka tuih .
55004013	Na law vengah Troas khaaw kah Karpas im ah ka ceh taak angki dung te van khuen ; cabu thli te khaw van khuen , awlpuila saphaw oen a sai te van khuen .
55004014	Thiide Alekzandar lawngah ka sawah raina avan sai ; amah kah a saina angla Bawipa lawng kutdo a peek ai .
55004015	Ahih tengah te namah oen namah ngaithuen uh , metihtiah ahih lawngah mami kah awlthang te a oelh khaklal .
55004016	Lamhacuek awlcekna ah kamah oen kamah ka phungtu u vengah te a-u khat lawngkhaw m'pai puei nawh ; n'ceh taak boeih u . Ahimi sawah athela Pathen lawng poek mai boel seh !
55004017	Tede kai lawngah awlthang asoepla ka phawng thaina ham oen ah Gental thlaang boeih lawng a yaakna ham Bawipa lawng n'awm puei tih tharana m'peek , tedawngah duekna dawng kalawng ka loeih .
55004018	Bawipa lawng athe-arana boeih kalawng n'loeih sak tih amah kah vaan Ram ah te adingsuekla n'ceh puei ai . Amah tengah ruep-awmna dungyan toe awm hawn seh ! Amen .
55004019	Priscilla oen Akuila khaw , Onisitoras cakaw khaw kan toei u .
55004020	Erastas tah Kawrin khaaw ah awm tih Trofimas tah atlawh dawngah Militas khaaw ah ka ceh taak .
55004021	Sikding a pha thlan ah law hamla van yawm . Jubulas , Puden , Linu oen Klaudia mi lawngkhaw atloe khrihca boenhui boeih lawng nang te n'toei u .
55004022	Bawipa tah na thinkaw lungbui ah awm seh . Pathen lungvatna nangmi boeih sawah awm seh .
56001001	Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang oen Jesuh Khrih kah celtuih kai Pawl lawng ca kavan pat . Pathen lawng a tuek thlaang thli kah oengna cak sak ham oen mami kah bokna oen awltak cangna ah ahimi te mawt hamla tuek la ka awm tih n'tuih .
56001002	Mami kah bokna tah dungyan hingna ngaiuepna dawngah kung a sut . Hoem awl aka thui nawh , Pathen lawng dilai a suen thlan veng kalawng he hingna he mami peek ham awl a kam poen tih ;
56001003	atue akhoek tluep vengah te dungyan hingna te amah lawng awlthang dawngah avan tueng sak . Kai he ng'uepna dawngah bii he m'peek tih mami thlawnkung Pathen kah awlpeek angla kai lawng ka phawng .
56001004	Mami cuutna u oengna dawngah ka ca taktakla aka awm Titas , nang tengah ca kavan pat . Pa Pathen oen mami thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih lawngah lungvatna , ngaimawngna te m'pe hawn seh .
56001005	Krit tuisanglak ah kan ceh taak he tahe toe sai ham angoe thaihu thli te sai ham oen khaaw roekk ah khrihcabu ahaamca khueh sak ham ni . Awl kan uen te hilh boel .
56001006	Ahaamca tah cawtbauh aka awm nawh thlaang seh ; ahih tah a yu khat bueng aka khueh thlaang , a ca thli khaw Pathen aka oeng thlaang la awm u vetih cingpoh halang oen awl ngaaina nawh ben ah miing aka tueng nawh thlaang la awm seh .
56001007	Metihtiah Khrihcabu mawtkung tah Pathen kah biitungpui khuehkung la a awm dawngah cawttbauh aka kap nawh thlaang seh . Ahih tah amah oen amah thoemthai koek la aka ngaai u nawh , thin aka toi nawh , yuu aka aw nawh , khawpaw rang-au la aka awm nawh , tangka ngaihmoekna aka khueh nawh thlaang seh .
56001008	Ahih tah kamyin aka lungna oen thaihu theen aka ngaih thlaang seh . Ahih tah amah oen amah kuemsuem thai , thlaangdoeng , thlaangciim oen khawboe aka theen thlaang seh .
56001009	Oengnakungpui oen avai u la ueppang koei , awlthang te acakla aka phoeih thlaang seh . Teah ni ahih lawng aka soeng cangpueina oen tha a peek thai vetih asoeng cangpueina aka oelhtaih thli kah thawlhpalhna khaw a tueng sak thai ai .
56001010	Metihtiah , awlpuila Judah bokna kalawng Khrihca la aka kuun thli tim ah awlhong awlhii oen thlaangtloe te a oelh ataih tih thlaang aka thailatna yahawh ngaai awm .
56001011	Te ang thlaang thli te awlthui toeng sak ham angoe ; metihtiah , ahimi lawng cang puei koei nawh te a cang puei dawngah imkhuikaw boeih te a thek u , te tila a cang puei boeih te yaraula aka awm tangka dang ngaih maiah ni .
56001012	Amah Krit thlaang , amami kah tawngha thli khuikah pakhat awltak aka thui lawng a thui vengah “ Krit thlaang thli tah hoem aka thui poepa athe satluung oen thayong thlaang , caruutpui thli ni ”
56001013	tila a thui he soeng tangtang . Tedawngah , he kawng ah he ahimi te atlawh ngaaila toelthaam lah , tetih atah ahimi lawng sa aka ding oengna te a khueh u vetih ,
56001014	Judah thli kah ciil awl mailai oen awltak aka hoett thli tengah aka thoeng thlaanghing awlpeek thli te pawm u tlaih manawh .
56001015	Thlaangciim hamla tah soeprep boeih he ciim , tede tuiilehkap thlaang thli oen oeng nawh thlaang thli hamla tah a lungbui oen athe atheen mingna thinkaw tuiilehkap lawngah te n'tu khaw ciim sak nawh .
56001016	Amami lawngtah Pathen ka ming ti u de a saina oen a hoett u , thaihu theen khat khaw sai ham aka koeih tlaih nawh thlaang thli poen ni .
56002001	Tede nang lawngtah asoeng oengna-kungpui oen avai u la cang puei .
56002002	Tawngpa kum haam hue te amah oen amah kuemsuem uh , asoeng oengna dawngah awm uh , lungna oen uehthaina khueh uh , tila te thuituen .
56002003	Tetih van la te kum haam nunu thli te khaw hutaa kah awm ih phung angla aciim hingna oen aka awm hutaa la awm ham thuituen . Ahimi lawng thlaang theetkung oen yuu kah saltamnaa la awm u boel seh . Ahimi lawng thaihu theen te cang puei seh ,
56002004	hutaa kum no nunu thli te a vaa a ca thli te a lungna ham ,
56002005	amah oen amah kuemsuem u ham oen aciim acaihla awm ham , a vaa thli kah awl aka ngaai , imkhuikaw khuutcemkung thai hutaa theen thli la a awm u thai ham thuituen . Teahtah Pathen tengkah aka law awlthang te a-u lawngkhaw athela thui manawh .
56002006	Tetih van la te kum no tawngpa thli te khaw amah oen amah kuemsuem u thai ham thaphawh lah .
56002007	Soeprep boeih ah namah roeroe he khawboe ramlang theen ben ah oett koeila awm . Hinyah koei la awm lang na cangpueina dawngah ataktangla awm .
56002008	Oelhtaih thai nawh aka soeng awl te hawna lah , te tih atah mami kawng he athela thui ham khat khaw khueh nawh vetih na raal thli te yah-laat la awm ai .
56002009	Sal thli lawngah a bawipa thli kah awl ngaai pe selang soeprep boeih ah ahimi te a kaw hoe sak seh . Ahimi lawng a bawi thli kah awl te thung u boel seh ,
56002010	a thaihu thli khaw huen pe u boel seh . Te lak atah ahimi lawng thlaang theen la a awmna , ueppang koeila a awm u te tueng sak u seh , teah ni ahimi kah saina boeih dawngah mami thlawnkung Pathen kawng cangpueina te a thangpawm u ai .
56002011	Metihtiah , Pathen lawng thlaang boeih kah thlawnna hamla a lungvatna te avan tueng sak poen .
56002012	Te lungvatna lawngtah Pathen tula sak ohla hingna , dilai thaihu ngaihmoekna te hoett ham , mah oen mah kuemsuemna , doengna oen he dilai dawngah Pathen kawngaih la hingna oen awm ham mami te n'thuituen .
56002013	Te tila te mami kah bawilen Pathen oen thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih kah ruep-awmna va tueng ngai ai tila n'ngaiuep awmngaihna Khawhin te n'ring u .
56002014	Mami he athe-arana boeih dawng kalawng thlawn ham oen mami he thlaang ciim la sai tih amah bueng kah koe la awm ham oen ah theenna te thinkaw thluembuek oen aka sai ham , amah kah hingna roe te mami hamla a peek .
56002015	He awlkaa thli he cang puei langtah na awlthui hutung thli te tha na peek tih na toelthaam vengah saithaina aana na khueh boeih te haw nah . Nang te a-u lawngkhaw dapsit la n'hu roe boel seh .
56003001	Na thlaang thli lawng ukkung thli oen aana khuehkung thli kah awl a ngai u tih ahimi te a hinyahna u ham oen thaihu theen sai ben ah oepsoehla a awm poepa ham thui peh .
56003002	Ahimi lawng a-u kah athe-arana khaw thui nawh ham , tede adingsuekla roeproeicala awm tih thlaang boeih tengah kawdawna te tueng sak poepa ham thui peh .
56003003	Metihtiah n'hu vengah mami khaw ng'ngau u tih awl ngaai nawh lawnghang la ng'awm u . Pumsa ngaihna oen awmtheenna soeprep kah sal la ng'awm u . Mami kah hingna he uett-eena oen thaihu naai ah mami lawng n'hawna ; Mami te thlaang tloe lawng n'thina tih ahimi te mami lawng n'thina van .
56003004	Tede , mami thlawnkung Pathen kah lungna oen reenna te a tueng veng kalawng tah ,
56003005	mami he ahih lawng n'thlawn poen . Te tah mami kah thaihu theen saina dawngah nawh tih a lungna oen ni mami he ahih lawng n'thlawn . Ciim Muithla rang oen athaaila cuunna oen athaaila hingna pekung lawng n'silh dawngah ni .
56003006	Pathen lawng mami thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih rang oen mami sawah acoeihpokla Ciim Muithla te avan toi tih ,
56003007	a lungvatna rang oen Pathen oen mami roeproei ham oen ah mami kah ngaiuep dungyan hingna te khueh thaina ham ni .
56003008	He awl tah awltak ni . He kah awl he awlpuila na khueh ham ka ngaih , Pathen aka oeng thlaang thli lawngtah thlaang boeih boeih ham thaihu theen saina ben ah amami kah atue atang te a hawna ham awm , te tah aka theen tih aphu aka awm ni .
56003009	Tede tula aka coeng nawh awlpuungna patuer hue kah phunthoepna , tawhsina oen phungawl kawngah oelhtaihna te reel aram lah . Te ang thli te tula aka coeng nawh tih aphu aka awm nawh ni .
56003010	Pekbona aka sai thlaang te ayawlkoek ah voei hih ngaaithuenna pe lang tecoeng atah ngaaina tlaih boel .
56003011	Te ang thlaang te tah thlaangthe ni tila na ming tih a thawlhna thli lawng ahimi kah asoeng nawh te a tueng sak .
56003012	Artima nuem , nawhtah , Tikhikas nuem na tengla kavan tuih vengah Nikopolis khaw ah ka tengla va lawh . Te ah te sikca khui puet ah awm ham ka kamthlah .
56003013	Thlaangcal Zenas oen Apollos te khawlawng la a cehna hih ah atheenla bawm lang te rawi kah ngoena boeih te soepsa peh .
56003014	Mami kah thlaang thli te bii theen a bi tih angoe taktak dangna ham cang puei uh . Ahimi lawng poei-oepla awm mailai u boel seh .
56003015	Kai oen aka awm haih boeih lawng nang te n'toei u . Pathen kah lungvatna tah nangmi boeih tengah awm seh .
57001001	Khrih Jesuh kawngah thongtla kai Pawl oen mami kah manau Timote lawng puei paw oen bii bi haih la aka awm Filemon oen ,
57001002	Na im ah aka tun Khrihca thli oen ngannu Apphia oen raalkap puei Arkhipas tengah ca kavan pat .
57001003	Pa Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng a lungvatna , ngaimawngna m'pe u hawn seh .
57001004	Ka manau Filemon , ka thangthui veng roekk ah nang kawng ka thui tih ka Pathen tengah awmngaih ciil ka thui .
57001005	Metihtiah Pathen kah thlaang boeih na lungna oen Bawipa Jesuh na oengna kawng ka yaak dawngah ni .
57001006	Ka thangthuina tah aka oeng thlaang la ng'awm u angla nang oen kaimi kah pawlneengna lawng Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawng mami hingna ah aka awm yotheenna cungkuem te a dung ngaai la yaakmingna khueh ham ni .
57001007	Ka lungna ka manau , nang kah lungna lawng awmngaihna yahawh hlang m'peek tih ka tha avan thlue sak . Pathen kah thlaang boeih te nang lawng a kaw na hoe sak poen .
57001008	Tedawngah he kawng ah he Khrih ah na maya la ka awm van angla na sai koei te sai ham tong-aa muehla nang he awl kan peek thai mai de ta .
57001009	Tede , kan lungna dawngah reenna kavan bih . Jesuh Khrih kah laipai , tahe Jesuh Khrih kawng ah thongtla kai Pawl lawng reenna kavan bih .
57001010	Tedawngah , thong ka tlaak vengah he Muithla ben ah ahih kah anna pa la ka awm tih Khrih ah ka capa la aka awm Onisimas yuengla na tengah reenna kavan bih .
57001011	N'hu vengah tah nang hamla ahih he cawmthawkk nawh , tede tahe tah nang oen kai ham la cawmthawkk poen .
57001012	Tahe ah namah tengla ahih he kavan tuih koep de ka thinkaw tah ahih tengah awm .
57001013	Awlthang theen kawngah thong ka tlaak veng he ah nang yuengah kai bawmcemkung la ahih he ka tengah awm sak ka ngaih .
57001014	Tede , nang te amangkhakla kai he bawmcem sak ham ka ngaih nawh , te lak ah namah kawthawh oen sai sak ham ni ka ngaih . Tedawngah namah kah kawtlaak nawh atah n'tu khaw ka sai manawh .
57001015	Onisimas he nang teng kalawng a phengter kawlkalh he thik at la namah tengah awm poe ham mai cawi ni .
57001016	Tahe ah ahih tah sal mailai tlaih nawh ni , tede ahih tah sal lak ah atheen ngaai Khrih ah mami kah lungna boenhui la ni a awm poen . Kai hamla tah ahih he aphu awm tangkiik , nang ham tah sal pakhat la khaw Khrih ah boenhui pakhat la khaw metila aphu a awm tare ai .
57001017	Tedawngah kai he biibipuei la na poek atah kai nan do ham koei angla te ahih he do koep lah .
57001018	Na sawah ahih lawng thawlhpalhna a sai tih laiba mai khaw a awm atah kai kah laiba la khueh mai hawn .
57001019	He he kamah kut roe oen kavan thut , Kai Pawl lawng kan sah koep badai . ( Na hingna roe nan peek ham na ba te thui koep ham ngoe mai nawh )
57001020	Tedawngah ka manau , Bawipa mik-hai te yahna mai lang kavan bih he tah reenna oen van sai mai ; Khrih ah boenhui pakhat angla ka kaw van hoe sak mai .
57001021	He ca dawngah ka thut angla kavan bih he na sai ngaai ai tila ka tangna tih yahawh ngaai pateng na sai tangtang ai tila ka ming .
57001022	Tecoengah kai hamla a huen pakhat ah pahoei roekbah oepsoeh , nangmi boeih kah thangthuina te Pathen lawng avan thung vetih kai he nangmi tengla m'pha sak koep ngai ai tila ka ngaiuep dawngah ni .
57001023	Jesuh Khrih kawng ah kai oen thong aka tla haih Epafras lawngkhaw nang te n'toei ,
57001024	Te tila te kai kah biibipuei Mark , Aristarkas , Demas oen Luka mi lawng nang te n'toei u .
58001001	Yan veng atah Pathen lawng patuer thli tengah voei yahawh hlang aphunphun la tawngha thli teng kalawng awl a thui .
58001002	Tede , tahe atue boetna ben atah a capa rang oen mami tengah awl avan thui . A Capa rang oen ah khawhipuempa he Pathen lawng a sai tih aboet lam ah thaihu soeprep khuehkung la ahih te Pathen lawng a tuek .
58001003	Ahih tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna aangna aka tueng sak tih Pathen amah coenggna oen aka lo u taktak ni . Huham tharana aka awm awl oen khawhipuempa he a khawl acuui tih a cak sak . Thlaanghing ham thawlh khawdawp ngaaina oen thawlh ciimna a sai coengah , vaan ah Huham Thara sangkoek Pathen kah bantang ben ah te ngawl .
58001004	Pathen lawng a Capa miing a sak he tah vanthlaang thli kah miing lak ah asang van angla a capa khaw vanthlaang thli lak ah bawilen ngai .
58001005	Pathen lawngah a vanthlaang a-u khat khaw , “ Nang tah ka Ca la na awm tih tihin ah Kai tah nang kah na Pa la ka awm poen ” tina vai nawh . Tecoengah me ang vanthlaang khaw “ Kai tah ahimi kah ana Pa la , ka awm vetih ahimi tah ka Ca la awm ai , ” tina vai nawh .
58001006	Tede Pathen lawng a Capa camiing awmthang dilai dawng avan tuih vengah , “ Pathen kah vanthlaang boeih lawng ahih te a bok u ai ” tila a thui .
58001007	Tede vanthlaang kawng tah , “ Pathen lawng amah kah vanthlaang thli te yilh la a sai tih , a tuihyoeihthlaang thli te haialh angla a sai , ” tila a thui .
58001008	A Capa kawng tah Pathen lawng : “ Aw Pathen , namah kah ram tah dungyan toe cak ai ! Nang lawngtah na thlaang thli te doengna oen na uk ai .
58001009	Nang lawngtah adoeng te na ngaih tih aka soeng nawh te na thina . Tedawngah nang kah Pathen la aka awm Pathen lawng nang te n'tuek tih na paya laikoei thli a peek lak ah hinyahna oen awmngaihna te nang m'peek tila a thui .
58001010	Tecoengah Ahih lawng “ Bawipa , nang lawng acuekca ah dilai he na suen tih namah kut oen vaan khaw na sai .
58001011	Te thaihu tah khum boeih cakhaw , nang tah na cak yoeyah ai ; Te thli boeih tah himbai angla pawn boeih ai .
58001012	Nang lawngah te thli te angki angla na tliim vetih himbai angla te thli tah thawleng u boeih ai . Tede nang tah amah moepoela na awm tih Na hinglung khaw boet tlaih nawh ” tila a thui .
58001013	Pathen lawng a vanthlaang thli te : “ Na raal thli he na khowpha huiah khowtloengna la ka khueh thlantoe ka bantang ben ah ngawl ” tina vai nawh .
58001014	Tetih atah , vanthlaang thli he a-u te ang kai ? Ahimi tah Pathen kah bii aka bi muithla la awm tih thlawnna aka dang ham koei thli te bawm hamla Pathen kah a tuih thlaang thli ni .
58002001	Tedawngah atloe abang la mami lawng m'phelh nawh ham n'yaak tangte awltak te acak tare la phoeih mangkhak ham awm .
58002002	Vanthlaang teng kalawng mami kah patuer thli tengah a peek awlthang te tah aka soeng awl ni tite tueng tih , te awl te ngaai nawh tih aka vai nawh boeih tah ating atawkk la dantatna te a dang ai .
58002003	Te atah hetih aihla aka lenduet thlawnna he mami lawng n'tu la n'sak nawh atah metila mami he sa a sueng ai ? Bawipa amah lawng he thlawnna he lamhacuekla a phawng tih aka ya boeih lawngah soeng tila mami tengah a tueng sak poen .
58002004	Te tila te ahimi kah sausi te soeng tila a tuengna ham Pathen lawngah miknoekna oen kawpoekrai phun soeprep te a sai tih Ciim Muithla kah kutdo thli te amah kawngaih angla a rek ara .
58002005	Mami lawngah n'thui u dilai , hailam ben ah aka law ham koei dilai thaai te uk hamla Pathen lawng vanthlaang he khueh nawh .
58002006	Caciim dawngah ahuen pakhat ah , “ Aw , Pathen thlaanghing he metih nuem a ti aih tih na poek khuep ; Thlaang mailai he metila nuem a awm tih na doen na cang ?
58002007	Vanthlaang thli lak ah aheem bet la kawlkalh ah na khueh ; ruep-awmna oen hinyahna lumuek te na muek sak ,
58002008	thaihu boeih sawah ukkung la na sai ” tila a thui lat . Pathen lawng thlaanghing he , “ thaihu boeih ukkung la a sai ” tila awm . Thaihu boeih ti vengah me ang thaihu khaw thuum poen . Tede tahe ah thlaanghing lawng thaihu boeih ukkung la awm nawh ti he huh thai la awm .
58002009	Tede mami lawngah Pathen kah lungvatna oen thlaang boeih ham duek hamla vanthlaang thli lak ah ahem bet la aka awm Jesuh te n'huh u . Te tila te duekna patang a khangna rang oen tahe atah ruep-awmna oen hinyahna lumuek te a muek poen tite n'huh u .
58002010	Thaihu soeprep boeih a sai tih doenkung Pathen lawng amah kah ruep-awmna te a ca thli lawng a paangna hamla Jesuh te patang khangna oen thlaangsoep la a sai te tah tueng tang tang . Metihtiah Jesuh tah thlawnna dang ham aka mawtkung ni .
58002011	Jesuh lawngtah thlaang kah thawlh-na te a ciing sak tih thawlhna ciingsakkung oen amah lawng thawlhna a ciing pe sak thlaang boeih te lawng ana Pa pakhat ni a khueh u . Tedawngah Jesuh lawng te thli te amah kah maya manau tila khue hamla yak nawh .
58002012	Ahih lawng Pathen tengah , “ Nang lawng na sai te maya manau thli tengah ka thui ai , Ahimi a tunna ah nang te kan thangpawm ai , ” tila a thui .
58002013	Tecoengah ahih lawng , “ Pathen te ka uepna ai ” ti . Tecoeng baal ah , “ Pathen kah peek ca-anau thli oen he ah he haih ka awm ” tila khaw a thui .
58002014	Te tila ca-anau a tina thlaang thli te tah thi-asa oen aka awm thlaang thli ni . Jesuh amah khaw ahimi angla thi-asa oen awm tih ahimi kah thlaanghing pumsa coenggna angla awm van . Te tila a awm te tah amah kah duekna rang oen duekna sawah huham tharana khuehkung Raaibawi te phe ham tih ,
58002015	duekna te a rih u dawngah hingkhui puet ah sal la aka awm thli te a loeih sak .
58002016	Te tila te ahih lawng vanthlaang thli te bawmcem nawh tite aciimphanla a tueng sak . Caciim lawngah , “ Abraham kah cadil thli te a bawm , ” tila a thui lat .
58002017	Tedawngah soeprep boeih ah maya manau angla awm ham roe la angoe tih te tila a awm te tah thlaang boeih kah thawlhna te khawdawp ngaai hamla Pathen bii a bina ah uep-awmna oen reenna aka khueh Khawsoeih Bawi la awm ham ni .
58002018	Amah roeroe lawng suek-halhna oen patang khangna te a tawng poen dawngah tahe ah suek-halhna aka tawng thli te a bawm thai .
58003001	Pathen kah thlaangkhue , Khrihca thlaangciim maya manau thli ! Mami kah bokna phung ben ah Khawsoeih Bawi la awm ham Pathen lawng avan tuih Jesuh kawng te poek u lah .
58003002	Mosi lawng Pathen kah im ah amah kah bii bina dawngah uep-awm la a awm van angla Jesuh khaw he bii he bi hamla tuekkung Pathen tengah uep-awm la awm .
58003003	Imsakung lawng im lak ah hinyahna te a huh . Te tila te Mosi lak ah Jesuh lawngah asang ngaai hinyahna te a dang ham tuueng .
58003004	Im boeih he tah thlaang lawng a sak , thaihu boeih he tah Pathen lawng a sak .
58003005	Mosi tah tuihyoeihthlaang la a awm van angla Pathen im khuiah uep-awm biibikung la awm tih Pathen lawng hailam ben ah a thui ham te khaw a thui thai .
58003006	Tede Khrih tah Pathen im khuiah ukkung uep-awm a Capa la awm . Mami lawng ngaiuepna dawngah thincakna n'khueh tih uepvoetna a awm nawh atah mami tah amah kah im ni .
58003007	Tedawngah Ciim Muithla lawng avan thui angla , “ Te hin ah Pathen awl te , na yaak u atah , na thin thah sak u boel ;
58003008	Na patuer hue lawngah Pathen te a oelh ataih u tih Ramhum huhang ah a noek adak u van angla te awm u boel ;
58003009	Pathen lawng , “ Kum sawm lii khui puet ah ka sai thaihu thli te a huh u de , teah te kai n'noekdak u tih n'oelhtaih u ;
58003010	Tedawngah ahimi sawah ka thinsa tih , ‘ Ahimi tah , a awl cak u nawh tih ka awlpeek khaw vai hamla a thana .
58003011	Kai tah ka thin a sa dawngah awl ka taap tih : “ Ahimi lawng mevengah khaw kai lawng ka peek duemna ram la te kuun manawh ! ’ ka tina ” tila a thui .
58003012	Oengca maya manau hue , nangmi tim ah aka hing Pathen te mangthawng taak ngaihna thinkaw lungbui the khueh nawh ham oen tangna hamla aka ngaih nawh thlaang khatca khaw na awm hau nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
58003013	Te lak atah , nangmi te thawlhna lawng thai a latna nawh ham , thinthah la na awm u nawh hamla , caciim lawngah , “ Tihin , ” a ti te mami oen tuhkaina a awm khui atah hin roekk ah pakhat oen khat bawmcem yoeyah uh .
58003014	Metihtiah mami lawng acuekca veng kah ngaikhuekna n'khueh te aboettoe acakla m'phoeih rapsaat atah mami boeih tah Khrih oen bii bi haih la ng'awm u .
