58003015	Caciim lawngah , “ Tihin ah Pathen awl te na yaak u atah na thin thah sak u boel , Na patuer hue lawngah Pathen awl a eek u van angla awm u boel ” ti .
58003016	A-u lawng Pathen awl te a yaak coengah ahih awl te a eek kai ? Ahimi tah Iyipt ram kah Mosi lawng a mawt thlaang thli te ni .
58003017	A-u sawah Pathen he kum sawmlii khui a thin a sa ? Thawlhna a sai u tih ramhum huhang ah aka duek thli sawah ni .
58003018	Pathen lawngah awl a taap tih . “ Kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram la te ahimi lawngah meveng khaw kuun u manawh ” a tina vengah te a-u hue a tina kai ? Awl aka ngaai nawh hue te ni a tina .
58003019	Tedawngah ahimi lawng duemna ram khuiah a kuun thai nawh he tah ahimi lawng a tangna u nawh dawngah ni tila m'miing u .
58004001	Tahe atah , Pathen lawng duemna huen a thui te pha thaina ham awlkamna m'peek poen . Te kah awlkam sut duemna khuiah te pha ohla awm hau nawh ham ngaithuen u sih .
58004002	Metihtiah ahimi lawng a yaak u angla , mami lawng Awlthang Then te n'yaak u poen . Tede , Ahimi lawng a yaak u awlthang te oengna oen a do u nawh dawngah ahimi ham hoeikhangna awm nawh .
58004003	Tede mami lawngtah n'tangna tih Pathen lawng a kam duemna te n'huh u . Pathen lawng , “ Ka thin sa tih , ‘ kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram ah te ahimi lawng meveng khaw kuun manawh ! ’ tila awl ka taap tih ka thui . ” a ti angla te awm tangtang . Dilai a suen cuek vengah bii a coeng boeih poen de ahih lawng te tila te a thui .
58004004	Metihtiah Caciim dawng ahuen pakhat ah khawhin hin rihna kawng te “ Arih hin ah Pathen tah bii boeih te a coeng tih duem ” tila a thui .
58004005	Asawkah akawng angla a thui koep tah : Kai lawng ka peek ham koei duemna ram ah te meveng khaw kuun manawh ” ti .
58004006	Awlthang Theen te lamhala aka ya hue lawng a tangna u nawh dawngah duemna te dang u nawh . Tede , thlaangtloe aka dang hamla thlaang awm .
58004007	He kawngah Pathen lawng , “ Tihin ” tila a thui te , khawhin tloe pakhat a khueng pe tite a tueng sak . Kum yahawh a awm coengah asawkah thui la aka awm te caciim dawngah a awm van angla Pathen lawng Devid hawna oen , “ Tihin ah Pathen awl na yaak u atah , na thin thah sak mangkhak u boel , ” tila a thui .
58004008	Pathen kah awlkam duemna te Joshua lawng thlaangping te pe kawinih Pathen lawng atloe khawhin kawng te thui manawh .
58004009	Tedawngah , Pathen tah arih hin ah a duem van angla Pathen thlaang thli hamla duemna khawhin , hin at awm hun .
58004010	Pathen tah amah bii bina kalawng a duem van angla te Pathen awlkam duemna te aka dang boeih tah amah kah bii bina kalawng duem van ai .
58004011	Tedawngah awlkam duemna te dang thaina ham atlawh ngaaila tha huer u sih . Ahimi lawng oengna a khueh u nawh dawngah duemna a dang nawh angla te mami tah pakhat khaw te tila awm u boel sih .
58004012	Pathen kah awl tah hing tih bii a bi , voeivaang aka hatt samsen lak ah khaw hatt ngaai . Hingna oen muithla a humna toe , ruhcong oen thling athawkk a humna toela a pek abo thai . Thlaanghing lungbui kah ngaihna oen poekna boeih te khaw a ming thai .
58004013	Pathen haiah thuh phah thai thaihu khat khaw awm nawh ; Pathen thaihu sai boeih lawng amah mik huh ah daih u vetih tueng pheng ai . Mami lawng m'mah kah sai boeih te a tengah n'thui ai .
58004014	Tedawngah mami lawng oengna te acakla phoeih rap u sih . Metihtiah , Pathen Capa Jesuh tah mami kah aka lenduet Khawsoeih Bawi la awm tih Pathen a awmna la te cet poen .
58004015	Mami kah Khawsoeih Bawi he mami kah tharana nawh dawngah reenna aka khueh thai nawh khawsoeih aih moenih ta . Mami kah khawsoeih Bawi he mami angla suekna phun soeprep aka tawng van ni , tede thawlhna tehca khaw sai nawh .
58004016	Tedawngah , lungvatna a awmna huen Pathen kah bawingawlh coen tengla cawh u sih . Te huen atah n'ngoe vengah mami bawm ham lungna oen lungvatna te n'dang ai .
58005001	Khawsoeih Bawi boeih he tah a tawngpa puei timkah a tuek tih amami yuengah Pathen bii bikung la a khueh . Ahih lawng thawthuengna oen thawlh huihthlutna te a sai .
58005002	Amah khaw asoepna nawh a phun phun a awm van dawngah cuihhoena aka khueh nawh thlaang thli oen thawlhpalhna aka sai thlaang thli sawah kawdawna a khueh thai .
58005003	Te tila te amah khaw voetna a khueh van dawngah thlaangping kah thawlhna bueng ham ohla amah kah thawlhna dawngah khaw luciik buulna thawthueng ham angoe .
58005004	A-u khaw amah oen amah te hinyah koei khawsoeih bawi la tuek u thai nawh . Aaron te Pathen lawng a khue tih Khawsoeih Bawi la a awm van angla Pathen kah khuena bueng oen ni khawsoeih bawi la a coengg thai .
58005005	Tetih van la te Khrih lawngkhaw amah ngaih ah hinyah koei khawsoeih bawi la coengg nawh . Pathen lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang tah ka Capa la na awm ; tihin ah Kai tah na Pa la ka awm poen ” a tina .
58005006	Tecoeng huentloe pakhat ah , “ Nang tah Melkhizedek kah bii te tomthlepkung dungyan khawsoeih la na awm ai ” a tina .
58005007	Jesuh lawng dilai dawng a hing veng-ah duekna kalawng amah aka thlawn-thaikung Pathen tengah rung-arap tih mikphi haapcang ruila thangthuina oen a bih . Ahih tah boe a ngaai tih pum a peek dawngah a thangthuina te Pathen lawng a yaak .
58005008	Tecakhaw Pathen Capa la awm de , Pathen awl aka ngaai thlaang la coengg ham ah patang khangna oen a cang .
58005009	Ahih lawngah thlaangsoep la a awm coengah amah awl aka vai thlaang boeih ham dungyan thlawnna a kungpui la awm tih ,
58005010	Pathen lawng , “ Melkhizedek kah bii tomthlepkung khawsoeih bawi la na awm poen , ” a tina .
58005011	He kawng he thui hamla yahawh hlang awm mai de , nangmi lawng yaakming thaina na khueh u nawh tih thuicaih ham rai tangkiik .
58005012	Nangmi he tahe vengah cangpueikung saya la pateng na awm u ham khoek thlai poen de , Pathen kah awl te akungcuek kalawng nangmi cang puei ham thlaangtloe te tahe toe na ngoe u hun . Nangmi lawngah buh tangtang te na caak u thai ham awm poen de tahe toe ah suuktui na awkk u khaak hun .
58005013	A-u khaw suuktui aka aw hun te tah camoe la awm hun tih asoeng oen asoeng nawh mingna khueh thai thlan hun .
58005014	Buh aka haam te tah kum haam thlaangsoep ham ni ; ahimi lawngtah tuukkiik u tih athe atheen te a pek abo thai .
58006001	Tedawngah haila cawh u sih , lamhacuek kah khrihca kawng cangna te ceh taak u poen silang tah aka soep cangna ben la te cawh u sih . Aphu aka awm nawh bii ceh taak tangte te khaw , Pathen oengna te khaw , akung kalawng tong koep tlaih boel sih ;
58006002	baptisma kawng cangna oen kuttloengna kawng , thlaang-duek thawhkoepna kawng oen dungyan awlcekna kawng thli te akung kalawng tong koep tlaih boel sih .
58006003	Haila cawh u sih ! Pathen lawng sai a ti atah : te ang boeih te n'sai badai .
58006004	Amami kah oengna aka hoett thli te metila thawlhna a yut koep ai ? Ahimi tah Pathen kah aangna khuiah awm u poen , vaan kutdo te khaw ateng alai u poen tih ahimi lawng a huh koei Ciim Muithla khaw a dang u poen ;
58006005	Ahimi lawngah Pathen awl a tuui-athlim khaw a ming tih aka law ham koei atue atang san kah tharana te khaw a ming u poen .
58006006	Te tila a ming u lal maiah ahimi lawng oengna te a hoett u ! Ahimi te thawlh yut sak koep ham coengg thai tlaih nawh , metihtiah ahimi lawng Pathen capa te thinglam dawng a ngawn koep u tih thlaangtim paalak ah yah a pawh sak u .
58006007	Rawtui khawtlan a yawn tih lotoen thlaang thli hamla aphu aka awm cangphung aka tawi sak dilai te tah Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna a peek .
58006008	Tede , thliing-ahang oen bel hawng aka po sak dilai te tah aphu awm nawh ; Pathen lawng a tap avoep vetih hai dawngah a phum ai .
58006009	Ka paya thli he tila nangmi tengah awl kavan thui de nangmi kawngah ka ngai mawng , nangmi lawng yotheen kam-awmna atheen ngaai thlawnna na khueh u te kaimi lawng ka ming .
58006010	Pathen he atuueng aleeng nawh Pathen aih nawh ni . Nangmi lawng bii na bi u te khaw , amah na lungna u te tueng sak ham Khrihca na puei na paw bawmna na peek u tih tahe toe ah na do na dan u te khaw Pathen lawng hilh manawh .
58006011	Nangmi lawng na ngaiuep u te ataktang la acoenggna ham nangmi lawng bawmcem ngaihna thinkaw thluembuekna te aboettoe khueh poe uh tila ka ngaih .
58006012	Thayong thlaang la na awm u ham ka ngaih nawh , tede oengna , reenna a khueh tih Pathen lawng a kam pe te aka dang thlaang thli angla ni awm sak ham ka ngaih u .
58006013	Pathen lawng Abraham tengah awlkamna a sai vengah amah awlkam te sai hamla awl a taap . Te tila awl a taap vengah te amah lak ah alenduet khat khaw a awm nawh dawngah amah miing te a hawna .
58006014	Ahih lawngah Abraham nala , “ Nang tengah awl ka kam , yotheen kam-awmna kan peek vetih na cadil nauha ka puung ka daw sak ai ” a tina .
58006015	Abraham lawng kawdaw thinsan oen a ring tih Pathen lawng awl a kam te a dang .
58006016	Thlaang pakhat lawng awl a taap vengah amah lak ah aka lenduet thlaang pakhat khat kah miing te a hawna atah te awltaapna lawng awlpuungna boeih te a dip a der sak .
58006017	Pathen lawng a mengtengna te thlauh tlaih nawh tite amah kah awlkamna aka dang ham koei thlaang thli tengah aciimphanla tueng sak ham a ngaih , tedawngah a awlkam te awltaap oen a cak sak .
58006018	Tecoengah , he thaihu pahih awlkamna oen awltaap he tah thlauh thai koei nawh tih he kawngah Pathen lawng a hoem thui thai nawh . Tedawngah amah tengah ngaimawng ngaitoela aka awm mami lawng , mami haiah avan toen ngaiuepna te acakla phoeih ham n'tha thlue u .
58006019	He ngaiuepna tah mami lawng hingna hamla thiilungdue angla awm . Te ngaiuepna tah mami ham kuepyingna oen ngaimawngna la a awm dawngah vaan tempal bok-im kah baiyaan te a pooengvoelh tih huen ciim koek alungkir la te kuun .
58006020	Te kah huen ciim koek te mami m'pha thlan ah mami yuengla Jesuh lawng a pha poen tih Melkhizedek kah bii tomthlepkung la dungyan khawsoeih bawi la awm poen .
58007001	Melkhizedek he tah Salem seng-pahrang la awm tih Tloeng Khoelh Pathen kah khawsoeih la khaw awm . Abraham lawng raal a teek tih sengpahrang palii hue te a taana huen kalawng a law koep vengah Melkhizedek lawng a do tih ahih te yotheenna oen a phueh a sawm .
58007002	Abraham lawng raal kut kah avan khuen boeih thaihu paha ah pakhat te ahih a peek ( Melkhizedek kah a miing , lamhacuek thuingaihna tah , “ Doengna Sengpahrang , ” ti ngaihna tih ahih tah Salem kah sengpahrang la khaw a awm dawngah ahih kah miing he “ Roepna Sengpahrang , ” tila khaw a thuingaihna ni . )
58007003	Melkhizedek kah a manu oen ana pa oen ah an patuer hue kah akawng alam cathut khaw awm nawh ; ahih kah a cuunna oen a duekna akawng alam cathut khaw awm nawh . Ahih tah Pathen Capa angtoekla awm tih ; dungyan khawsoeih la poe awm .
58007004	Tedawngah ahih he metihtlukla a lenduet tite nangmi lawng na ming u . Mami kah patuer miingthang Abraham lawng pateng raal kut dawngkah a lawh boeih thaihu paha ah pakhat te ahih a peek .
58007005	Levi cadil thli khawsoeih la aka awm hue lawng Israel thlaangphun tengah paha ah pakhat te Phungawl angla a cawi thai . Te tah amami nam , amami thlaangphun Abraham cadil thli van ni .
58007006	Melkhizedek he Levi cadil nawh ni , tede Abraham tengkah paha ah pakhat te a lawh tih Pathen kah awlkam aka dang Abraham te yotheen kam-awm oen a phueh asawm .
58007007	Yotheen kam-awmna pekung tah yotheen kam-awm peek la aka awm thlaang lak ah aka lenduet ni tite ngaithliwhna awm nawh .
58007008	Khawsoeih hue kah akawng atah , paha ah pakhat te aka duek thai thlaang lawng a cawi , tede Melkhizedek kawng atah caciim lawng a thui angla aka hing thlaang lawngah paha ah pakhat te a cawi .
58007009	Tecoengah Abraham lawng paha ah pakhat a peek vengah ( Levi cadil thli lawngkhaw paha ah pakhat a peek ) Levi lawngkhaw a peek tila n'thui thai .
58007010	Metihtiah Levi te cuun thlan de ahih kah patuer Abraham tah Melkhizedek oen a huh hih vengah te Abraham pum khuiah awm poen tila n'thui thai .
58007011	Israel thlaang phun tengah Phung-awl te a peek vengah Levi thlaang phun khawsoeih hue te akung la asut tih a peek . Tahe ah Levi phun khawsoeih hue kah bii bi te soep kawinih , Aaron phun thui ohla Melkhizedek kah bii te tomthlepkung la khawsoeih phun tloe a law ham ngoe manawh .
58007012	Khawsoeih la awmna te a thaw aleng u atah phungawl te khaw thawleng ham a ngoe .
58007013	He thaihu kawng a thui awl lawng a tueng sak tah mami kah bawipa he Levi phun nawh ni , thlaangphun tloe la awm tih ahih phun khuikah a-u khat khaw khawsoeih bii bi nawh .
58007014	Ahih tah Judah phun kalawng va law tite thlaang boeih lawng a ming , tede Mosi lawng khawsoeih kawng a thui vengah Judah phun kawng he thui nawh .
58007015	Melkhizedek angla atloe khawsoeih pakhat va pho ti he caih tare .
58007016	Ahih tah thlaanghing kah sai phung alam oen phung angla khawsoeih la coengg nawh , tede aboetna aka awm nawh hingna tharana rang oen ni a coengg .
58007017	Metihtiah caciim lawngah , “ Nang tah Melkhizedek kah bii tomthlepkung dungyan khawsoeih la na awm poen ai , ” tila a thui .
58007018	Phung-alam aruem te tah tharana khueh nawh tih hoeikhangna a awm nawh dawngah hoett la awm poen .
58007019	Metihtiah Mosi kah Phungawl lawng thaihu khat khaw asoepla sai thai nawh . Tahe atah mami lawng Pathen oen yoeiina ham atheen ngai ngaiuepna te m'peek poen .
58007020	Tecoengah Pathen kah awltaap khaw awm hun . Thlaangtloe hue tah khawsoeih la a awm u vengah te ang awltaap te awm nawh .
58007021	Tede Jesuh he awltaapna oen khawsoeih la a awm vengah Pathen lawng ahih te , “ Bawipa lawng awltaapna a sai poen tih a kawpoek thaw-aleng tlaih manawh : ‘ Nang tah dungyan khawsoeih la na awm poen ai ” a tina .
58007022	He tila alakloela a awm he tah Jesuh te atheen ngaai paipi aka caksakkung la te a sai .
58007023	Tecoengah atloe alakloena awm hun ; khawsoeih tloe yahawh awm maide ahimi tah a duek u dawngah amami kah bii te poe bi u thai nawh .
58007024	Tede Jesuh tah dungyan a hing dawngah amah bii khawsoeih la awmna te thlaangtloe kut ah pe nawh .
58007025	Tedawngah amah teng kalawng Pathen teng aka law hue te tahe ah khaw , yoeyahla a thlawn thai , metihtiah ahih tah dungyan hing tih ahimi ham Pathen tengah reenna aka bih pe hamla awm .
58007026	Tedawngah Jesuh tah mami kah ngoena aka soep sak Khawsoeih Bawi ni . Ahih tah ciim ; thawlhpalhna khueh nawh tih thawlhna khaw ahih dawngah awm nawh ; ahih te thlaangthawlh tim kalawng a thloeng tih vaan khawhi sawah a pawmsang hang poen .
58007027	Ahih tah atloe khawsoeih bawi hue oen lo u nawh ; Ahih lawngah lamhacuekla amah kah thawlhna oen thlaangping kah thawlhna dawngah khawhin roekk ah thawthueng ham ngoe nawh . Ahih lawngah amah oen amah te vai at ah akhoekkoengla dungyan ham thawthuengna pakhat a sai poen .
58007028	Mosi kah Phungawl lawngtah aka soep nawh thlaang te khawsoeih bawi la awm ham a sai ; tede Phungawl coengah aka law , Pathen lawng awl a taap tih a sai awlkam te lawngtah dungyan aka soep khawsoeih la a Capa te a khueh poen .
58008001	Kaimi lawng awlpui la ka thui u tah vaan ah Huham tharakoek Pathen kah ngawlhcoen bantang ben ah aka ngawl Khawsoeih Bawi pakhat mami lawng n'khueh u ti he ni ka thui u .
58008002	Ahih lawngtah Huen Ciim Koek khuiah Khawsoeih Bawi angla bii a bi tih , te huen te tah thlaanghing lawng a sak nawh Pathen lawng a sak riim-im tangtang ni .
58008003	Khawsoeih Bawi boeih boeih tah thaihu peek thli oen boiava thawthuengna te Pathen tengah nawn hamla a khueh , tetih van la te mami kah Khawsoeih Bawi lawngkhaw thaihu nawn hamla a khueh van .
58008004	Dilai dawngah he awm kawinih khawsoeih la awm poe manawh , metihtiah Judah Phungawl lawng a kuek angla kutdo thli nawnkung la khawsoeih thli awm .
58008005	Ahimi kah khawsoeih bii te tah vaan ah ataktangla aka awm thaihu kah muei asam oen mueithlip mueithla bueng mai ni . Mosi lawngkhaw te tila ni a sai . Ahih lawngah Riim-im te ka sa ai a ti vengah Pathen lawng , “ Tlaangsawm ah kan huh sak muei-asam angla te thaihu soeprep te sai hamla hilh boel ” a tina .
58008006	Tede tahe ah ahimi kah bii lak ah asangduet khawsoeih bii te Jesuh a peek poen . Pathen oen thlaanghing laklaw ah Jesuh lawng a sai paipi tah atheen ngaai van angla , awlkam dawngah akung asut tih khawsoeih la a awm te khaw sangduet .
58008007	Lamhacuek kah paipi te avoet-na awm nawh kawinih apabena paipi te sai ham ngoe manawh .
58008008	Tede Pathen lawng a thlaang thli kah thawlhna te a huh tih , “ Bawipa lawng he tila a thui , Israel thlaangphun oen Judah thlaangphun oen ah paipi thaai ka saina khawhin te a pha ai .
58008009	Te kah paipi te tah ahimi kah patuer thli a kut ah ka tuuk tih Iyipt ram kalawng kavan mawt vengkah ahimi oen ka sai paipi angla awm manawh . Ahimi oen ka sai paipi dawngah uep-awm la a awm nawh dawngah , ahimi te ka mangthawng taak ; tila Bawipa lawng a thui .
58008010	Tecoengah Bawipa lawng , “ Aka law ham koei khawhin ah Israel thlaangphun oen he tila paipi te ka sai ai ; Kai lawngah kamah kah phungawl thli te a thinkaw ah Ka khueh pe vetih a lungbui ah ka thut pe ai . Kai tah ahimi kah Pathen la ka awm vetih ahimi tah ka thlaangphun la awm ai .
58008011	A-u lawngkhaw a pilnam tengah khawseh , ram khuikah thlaang tengah khawseh , “ Bawipa te ming uh ’ tila cang puei nawh vetih thui pe tlaih manawh . Metihtiah camaw oen patawng ahimi boeih lawng kai he m'ming u poen ai .
58008012	Ahimi kah thawlhna te khawdawp ka ngaai vetih a sai thawlh boeih te ka hilh pe poen ai ” tila a thui .
58008013	Te tila awlkam thaai kawng a thui dawngah lamhacuek awlkam te Pathen lawng aruem araw la a coengg sak tih aruem araw oen apawn apit thaihu te tah kawlkalh ah ha-ata poen ai .
58009001	Lamhacuek kah paipi lawngtah bokna phung alam a khueh tih thlaanghing lawng a sak bokna huen te khaw a khueh .
58009002	Riim-im te a sak u tih adauben kah pakhat te Huen Ciim ti u . Te kah a khuiah te haivangna awm tih Pathen tengah takawi a nawnna caboi khaw awm .
58009003	Baiyaan apahihna a hu ben ah te Huen Ciim Koek a ti u Riim-im te awm .
58009004	Te kah a khuiah riimtuui huihthlutna sui oen a sai boknathaang , sui oen a prang heet Awlkamna Kong te awm . Te kong khuiah manna takawi a khuehna sui tui-um , aramno aka cawn Aaron kah cawnghol oen ah awlpeek thutna lungpeel pahih te a khueh u .
58009005	Te kah Kong sawah te phe aka phuer cherubim kutsaimuei te awm . Te tah Pathen he ah awm tila tuengsakna ni . Te kah cherubim lawng te thawlh khawdawp-ngaaina ahuen sawah phe a phuer . Tede tahe ah te ang thaihu te asoepbirla thuina atue nawh ni .
58009006	Te kah bokna phung-alam thaihu tah he tila awm . Khawsoeih hue tah amami kah bi ham koei te sai ham la hin roekk ah Riim-im adauben la te cet u .
58009007	Tede , Khawsoeih Bawi bueng te Riim-im khuila kuun tih , te tila te kum khat ah vai-at bueng ni a kuun . Ahih lawngah thisen te a khuen tih amah ham khaw , ming ohla thawlhna aka sai thlaangping ham khaw Pathen tengah a nawn .
58009008	He tila phung-alam oen saina dawng kalawng Ciim Muithla lawng aciimphanla n'cang puei tah adauben Riim-im te a awm hun roekk atah Huen Ciim Koek khuila kuunna lawngpui te awng u thlan hun ti he ni .
58009009	He tah nuehtahna tih tahe veng kah atue atang he a khi ngaihna ni . A thuingaihna tah Pathen tengah a nawn u kutdo thaihu oen boiava oen thawthuengna lawng Pathen aka bok thlaang thli kah thinkaw te ciim sak thai nawh tila thuingaihna ni .
58009010	Te ang thli te caak awkk oen ciimcaihna poei bueng oen ni a sai mai . He ang thli tah asaw ahan kah phung-alam boeih ni , Pathen lawng phung-alam athaai a sai thlantoe ah a hawna mai ni .
58009011	Tede he kah aka awm tangte phung-alam thaihu theen sawah Khrih tah Khawsoeih Bawi la law poen . Ahih lawng bii a bina riim-im te tah bo ngaai tih soep ; te tah thlaanghing kut oen a sak riim-im nawh tih he kah sai la aka awm dilai oen khaw tuhkai u nawh .
58009012	Jesuh lawngah riim-im Huen Ciim Koek khuila vai khat ah dungyan ham akhoekkoengla a kuun vengah me-ee thi oen vaitaw thi te luciik la nawn ham khuen nawh ; amah kah thisen te ni a khuen tih mami ham dungyan hingna te avan sai .
58009013	Phung-alam lawng a kuek angla aka ciim nawh thlaangping sawah , me-ee thi , vaitaw taal thi oen vaitaw a canaica kah athloi te a heh u tih , te lawng atah phung-alam ben ah aka ciim nawh ahimi te acaih sak .
58009014	He tila ciimna te a awm tangtang atah , Khrih thisen lawngtah metihtlukla he lak ah aciim acaih sak ngaai ai ! Dungyan Muithla rang oen ah aka soep luciik la amah oen amah te Pathen tengah nawn u poen . Aka hing Pathen kah bii te mami lawng bi thaina ham hoeikhangna aka awm nawh phung-alam vaina rang oen ciim acaih nawh athe atheen mingna thinkaw te a thisen oen a ciim sak ai .
58009015	Tedawngah Pathen kah a thlaangkhue thli lawngah dungyan yotheen kam-awmna Pathen lawng awl akam sut te a dangna ham Khrih lawngah paipi athaai te a sai . Te tila a dang he tah , ahimi lawng lamhacuek paipi khuiah a awm u vengkah a sai thawlhna boeih kalawng thlaangping te a duekna oen a loeih sak dawngah ni .
58009016	Ropangna awl he tah ropangna awl aka thuikung te a duek coengah ni a hawna .
58009017	Metihtiah ropangna awl he aka thuikung a hing vengah tah cak nawh ; ahih te a duek coengah ni a cak .
58009018	Tedawngah ni lamhacuek kah paipi te khaw thisen oen a cak sak .
58009019	Mosi lawng lamhacuek ah Phungawl khuiah aka awm awlpeek boeih te thlaangping tengah a phawng pe . Tecoengah vaitaw oen me-ee kah a thi te a lawh tih tui oen a thoekk , hissop thingpe dawngah paangpawn a piin te a hawna tih Phungawl cabu oen rangpui sawah a heh .
58009020	Mosi lawng , “ He tah , nangmi lawng na vai hamla Pathen kah peek paipi acakna thisen ni ” a tina .
58009021	Tetih van toeng toeng la thisen te Riim-im oen bokna ben ah a hawna thaihu boeih sawah Mosi lawng a heh .
58009022	Ataktang atah Phungawl lawng a kuek angla thaihu cungkuem he thisen oen ciim tih thisen bueng oen ni thawlh khawdawp ngaaina a awm .
58009023	Vaan ah ataktang la aka awm thaihu thli kah mueithlip lawng te tila ciim sak ham angoe . Tede , vaan kah thaihu atak tang amah roe lawngah te atheen ngaai luciik thawthuengna a kuek .
58009024	Metihtiah vaan ah ataktangla aka awm kah mueithlip , thlaang kah sai Huen Ciim khuila te Khrih tah kuun nawh . Ahih tah vaan roe la te cet tih tahe ah te ah te mami yuengla Pathen haiah te a pha .
58009025	Judah thlaangphun hue kah Khawsoeih Bawi lawngtah ramsa thisen oen khawkum roekk ah Huen Ciim Koek khuila kuun . Tede Khrih tah amah oen amah te nawn u hamla voei yahawh cet nawh ,
58009026	te tila te sai ham ngoe kawinih dilai suen cuek veng kalawng voei yahawh hlang patang a khang poen ai . Ahih lawng amah oen amah te luciik la thawthuengna rang oen thawlhna aciingna ham san boeih kah aboetna atue a pha tawm veng he ah vaikhat ah akhoek koeng la ahih tah va law .
58009027	Thlaang boeih he vai at tah duek ai , tecoengah Pathen lawng awl a cek ai .
58009028	Tetih toengtoeng la thlaang yahawh kah thawlhna aciingna ham Khrih lawngkhaw vaikhat tah luciik la nawn u . Ahih tah apabela law koep ai , te ngoen tah thawlhna ciing sak ham tlaih nawh tih amah aka lamtoen hue te thlawn ham poen ni .
58010001	Judah hue kah Phungawl he tah ataktang thaihu kah aka soep tih uepna koei muei-asam nawh ni ; te tah aka law ham koei atheen thaihu kah mueithlip mai ni . A sai u nooek thawthuengna te khawkum khawhaal a nawn u yoeyah . Te tih atah , metila Phungawl lawngah te , he ang thawthuengna oen ah Pathen tengla aka law thlaang thli te thlaangsoep la a sai thai ai ?
58010002	Pathen aka bok thlaang thli te amami kah thawlhna kalawng ciim sak taktak kawinih , ahimi lawng thawlhna ka khueh tila te poek nawh vetih , luciik thawthuengna boeih te a toeng poen ai .
58010003	Te cakhaw , he tila khawkum khawhaal luciik thawthuengna lawng atah thlaang thli te a thawlhna ming sak ham mai ni .
58010004	Metihtiah vaitaw thi oen me-ee thi lawngah thawlhna he ciing sak thai tangtang nawh .
58010005	Tedawngah he kawngah he Khrih lawng dilai la ka law ai a ti vengah te Pathen tengah : “ Nang lawngah luciik oen thaihu nawn te na kuek nawh , tede kai hamla thlaangpum ni navan hoel sut poen .
58010006	Nang tah bokna-thaang sawah boiava oen huihthlutna te na ngaai khuek ti nawh tih thawlh ciingna ham thawthuengna khaw ngaikhuek thindeeng la awm nawh .
58010007	Tedawngah kai lawng , Phungawl cabu dawngah kamah kawng-alam a thut angla te , “ Aw Pathen , na kawngaih te sai hamla he ah ka awm ; ka tina , ” tila a thui .
58010008	Lamhacuek ah a thui tah , “ Nang lawngah luciik khaw , nawn thaihu khaw , bokna-thaang dawngah boiava huihthlutna khaw , thawlhthlamna luciik thawthuengna khaw na ngaih luem nawh tih na kaw khaw hoe baal nawh ” ti . He luciik thawthuengna boeih he Phungawl lawng a kuek angla a nawn de he tila a thui toengtoeng ni .
58010009	Tecoengah ahih lawng , “ Aw Pathen , na kawngaih te sai ham he ah ka awm ” a tina . Tedawngah thawthuengna aruem boeih te a hoett tih Khrih thawthuengna oen ayueng a theng poen .
58010010	Pathen lawng sai sak a ngaih te Khrih lawng a sai tih vaikhat ah akhoek koengla amah pum te a nawnna rang oen mami boeih tah thawlhna kalawng n'ciim poen .
58010011	Judah khawsoeih boeih lawng khawhin roekk ah amami kah bii te a bi u tih a sai nooek luciik te voei yahawh hlang a nawn u ; te luciik thawthuengna lawng metuek khaw thawlhna te ciim sak thai nawh .
58010012	Tede Khrih lawngtah thawlh-thlamna ham luciik thawthuengna vai at a nawn tih te tah dungyan ham khoek poen . Tecoeng atah Pathen kah bantang ben ah te ahih tah ngawl poen .
58010013	Pathen lawng ahih kah a raal thli te a khowtang ah khowtloengna la a khueh thlantoe tah te huen kalawng tahe ah a ring .
58010014	Te tila te vai at thawthuengna oen thawlhna aka ciim thlaang thli te dungyan ham thlaangsoep la a sai poen .
58010015	Tecoengah Ciim Muithla lawngkhaw amah kah sausi te mami tengah avan tueng sak . Ahih lawng lamhacuek ah ,
58010016	“ Hai ben atah ahimi oen he tila paipi ka sai ai , Kamah kah Phungawl te a lungbui ah ka khueh pe vetih a thinkaw ah ka thut pe ai ” tila a thui .
58010017	Tecoengah a thui koep baal tah , “ Ahimi kah thawlhna oen athe a sai te ka hilh pe poen ai ” ti .
58010018	Tedawngah he tila khawdawp ngaaina a awm coeng atah thawlh aciimna ham luciik thawthuengna te ngoe tlaih nawh .
58010019	Tedawngah maya manau hue , Jesuh kah duekna rang oen Huen Ciim Koek khuila te mami lawng yalpawla n'kuun thai poen .
58010020	Ahih lawngah lawngpui thai , aka hing lawngpui te baiyaan khui kalawng mami ham avan awng poen , te kah baiyaan tah amah pum te ni .
58010021	Mami lawngah Pathen im ukkung khawsoeih alenduet te n'khueh u .
58010022	Tedawngah mami lawng tuiciil oen silh la aka awm “ pum ” mami pum oen ah , thawlhna kalawng aka ciim athetheen mingna kawpoek lungbui oen ah , thinkaw tak oen oengcakna oen ah Pathen tengla yoeii u lah sih .
58010023	Awlkam aka cak Pathen tah uep-awm la a awm dawngah mami lawng ngaiuepna n'khueh u te acakla phoeih mangkhak u sih .
58010024	Mami lawngah theenna te sai ham oen ah lungna te tueng sak ham pakhat oen khat bawmcem u silang pakhat oen khat thintlo u sih . Te lak atah , nangmi lawng Bawipa Khawhin tah yoeii poen tila na ming u dawngah pakhat oen khat thaphawh u tare sih .
58010025	Thik at la huhtun pumna sai nooek te thlaangtloe hue lawngah a hoett u angla mami lawngtah hoett boel sih . Te lak atah , nangmi lawng Bawipa Khawhin tah yoeii tare poen tila na ming u dawngah khat oen khat thaphawh u sih .
58010026	Mami lawng awltak te ming coengah mengtengna oen thawlhna te n'sai u khuep atah luciik thawthuengna khatca khaw awm tlaih nawh .
58010027	Te lak ah aka awm tah , aka law ham koei Awlcekna oen Pathen aka raalna thli ungna ham koei rih-awm haialh te ni rih oen thuen ruila ring ham a awm mai poen .
58010028	A-u khaw Mosi kah Phungawl aka vai nawh te tah , thlaang pahih tihnawhtah pathum kah thuina rang oen thawlhna awm tila awl a tloek atah reen ohla a ngawn u .
58010029	Te pateng khaw te tila a awm atah Pathen Capa tula aka sak nawh tih ahih te thawlhna kalawng aka ciim sak Pathen kah lungvatna khuehkung Muithla te athe akhana atah te thlaang te metila a sai ai ? Ahih lawng a yawkk ham koei dantatna tah metihtlukla athe-eep ai tite poek u hawn !
58010030	Metihtiah , “ Kai lawngah luu ka lo ai , kai lawngah kut ka thung ai , ” tila khaw seh , “ Bawipa lawng a thlaang thli te awl a cek ai ” tila aka thui te mami lawngah m'ming u .
58010031	Aka hing Pathen kut khuiah tlaak ham tah arih awm tangkiik mai poen !
58010032	N'hu vengah thaihu metila a awm tite poek u lah . Pathen kah aangna nangmi teng avan pha pek vengah te raina phun soeprep na tawng u de , te raina lawng nangmi te n'taa nawh .
58010033	Nangmi lawng alakvai atah rangpui haiah thekhana oen heemtekna te na tawng u . Alakvai vengah thlaangtloe hue tetih van la thekha heemtekna a tawng u vengah nangmi lawngkhaw thekhana tawng van ham oepsoehla na kamtoen u .
58010034	Nangmi lawng thongtla thli te patang na khang puei tih na khueh thaihu boeih te avan rot u vengah na sung na deuh te awmngaih oen na ueh u . Metihtiah te ang thli lak ah atheen ngaai dungyan thaihu awm tila na ming u dawngah ni .
58010035	Tedawngah na thin hoepp sak boel , thincak thin-awmna lawngah kutdo bo hlang n'huh sak ai .
58010036	Pathen kah kawngaih te na sai thaina ham oen ah amah awlkam thaihu te na dangna u ham thinsan kawdaw oen awm uh .
58010037	Metihtiah Caciim lawng , “ Kawlkalh bawtbet coengah aka law ham koei lawngah law ai ; Ahih tah uelh manawh .
58010038	Tede , ka thlaangdoeng thli tah oengna oen hing ai ; A-u khaw hu benla aka nawng tah , ahih tengah ka kaw hoe manawh ” tila a thui .
58010039	Mami tah hu benla aka nawng koep thlaangpal paathaam nawh ni . Mami tah oengna aka khueh tih thlawn la aka awm thlaang ni .
58011001	Oengna khueh ti he tah , mami lawngah ngaiuep thaihu te awm tangtang tih mik huh nawh thaihu te ataktang la awm tila tangna he ni .
58011002	Yan vengkah thlaang thli lawng oengna oen ni Pathen kaw a tawng u .
58011003	Pathen awl lawng huh thai nawh khui kalawng huh thai he a sai tih Pathen kah awl lawng khawhipuempa he a sai tila mami lawng yaakming he tah oengna oen ni .
58011004	Abel lawngah Kain lak ah atheen ngaai Pathen teng thaw a thueng he oengna oen ni . Oengna rang oen ahih te Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng la a pawm , metihtiah Pathen lawng ahih kah kutdo te a do pe dawngah ni . Abel tah duek coeng poen de a oengna lawng tahetoe awl a thui .
58011005	Enok he duek ohla , Pathen tengla aka pawm hang he tah oengna ni . Pathen lawng ahih te a pawm hang poen dawngah a-u lawngkhaw ahih te hu tlaih nawh . Caciim lawngah , Enok he vaan la a pawm hang thlan vengah Pathen kaw a tawng poen , tila a thui .
58011006	A-u lawngkhaw oengna oen nawh atah Pathen kaw te tawng thai nawh ; metihtiah a-u khaw Pathen tengla aka law lawng Pathen tah awm tih amah aka tlap boeih te kutdo a peek tite a oeng ham awm .
58011007	Noah lawng a huh thai nawh hailam ben kah thaihu kawng Pathen lawng ngaithuenna a peek awl te aka yaak sak tah oengna ni . Ahih lawngah Pathen awl te a ngaai tih amah oen a imkhuikaw thlawnna hamla lowng pakhat te a sai . Tedawngah dilai te dan tat la a awm vengah Noah lawngtah oengna rang oen aka law doengna te Pathen tengkah a huh .
58011008	Pathen lawng Abraham te a khue vengah awl a ngaai tih Pathen lawng kan pe ai a tina awlkam ram la te aka ceh sak tah oengna ni . Ahih lawngah mela ka ceh tite ming ohla amah kah ram te a ceh taak .
58011009	Pathen kah awlkam ram ah te oengna oen ram tloe thlaang angla khaw a sak . Pathen tengkah awlkam aka dang van Isak oen Jakob angla riim-im a sak tih awm .
58011010	Metihtiah Abraham lawng yoeyahla aka cak khawpui , Pathen lawng anuen ataak tih a sai khawpui te a lamtoen .
58011011	Abraham tah patawng aih poen tih Sarah khaw ca-anau khueh thai nawh koeila awm poen de , Abraham he pahaam la aka sai tah oengna ni . Pathen lawngtah a awlkam te a sai ai tila a oeng mangkhak .
58011012	Abraham tah thlaangduek angtoekla awm poen de ahih pakhat dawng kalawng cadil nauha vaan kah aisi yoeh la , tuitunlii keeng kah divinlai yoeh la yahawh .
58011013	Ahimi boeih lawngah oengna oen duek u . Ahimi lawngah Pathen kah awlkam thaihu thli te paang u nawh . Tede athla kalawng a dan u tih a uem u . Ahimi lawng dilai sawah ram tloe thlaang angla , thlaangpoeng angla ka awm ti u .
58011014	Te tila aka thui hue lawngah amami kah ram pakhat a tlap ti te a tueng sak .
58011015	Ahimi lawng a ceh taak ram te poek khuep u tlaih nawh ; A ceh taak ram te poek u kawinih mel koep hamla atue theen khaw a dang u ngoen .
58011016	Ahimi lawng atheen ngaai ram , vaan benkah ram te ni a ngaai u . Pathen lawng ahimi ham ram pakhat te a roekbah pe dawngah ahimi lawng Pathen te a Pa tila a khue u vengah Pathen tah yak nawh .
58011017	Pathen lawngah Abraham te a noek adak vengah a capa Isak te luciik la aka nawn sak te tah oengna ni . Pathen lawng Abraham tengah ni awl a kam , tede a capa khueh duen pakhat te luciik la nawn ham kamtoen oepsoeh .
58011018	Pathen lawng Abraham nala te , “ Kai lawng peek hamla awl ka kam cadil nauha te tah Isak dawng kalawng ni apuung ataai ai ” a tina .
58011019	Abraham lawngtah Pathen lawng Isak he duekna kalawng a thawh sak thai tila a poek tih a peek angla Abraham lawng a capa Isak te duekna kalawng a dang koep tila n'thui thai .
58011020	Isak lawngah Jakob oen Esau nala te avoel avai ah yotheenna na dang hih ai tila oengna oen awl a kam .
58011021	Jakob lawng a duek thlan ah Josep kah a ca thli te oengna oen yotheenna rip a peek . Ahih lawngah a cawnghol dawngah kuituung tih Pathen te a bok .
58011022	Josep lawng a duek tawm ah , Iyipt ram kalawng Israel thlaang thli a pooengna te a thui tih amah kah rawkk kuemkawl ham a thuinuet te oengna oen ni .
58011023	Mosi he a cuun coengah a manu oen ana pa lawng thla thum khui puet ah oengna oen a thuh a elh . Ahih rawi lawng lungna aka kap camaw te a huh hih vengah sengpahrang kah aana eek ham te rih hih tlaih nawh .
58011024	Mosi lawng a roeng hang atah sengpahrang canu kah capa tila khue hamla aka ngaih sak nawh te tah oengna ni .
58011025	Ahih lawng thawlhna dawngah kawlkalhca awmtheen boenn lak ah Pathen thlaang thli oen patang khang ham te a ngaih dai .
58011026	Messiah ham khawdeng patang khang he tah Iyipt ram kah kaawn-ava , khawh-rang boeih lak ah aphu awm ngaai tila a poek . Metihtiah ahih lawngah hailam ben kah kutdo te a mikloeh na .
58011027	Mosi lawng sengpahrang kah thinsana te rih tlaih ohla Iyipt ram a pooeng taak te tah oengna rang oen ni . Huh nawh Pathen te ahih lawng hu nooek ang a ti maila mel koep ham a thana .
58011028	Israel thlaang thli kah a camiing hue te Thlaangngawn Vanthlaang lawng ngawn nawh hamla thawhka dawngah thisen a thluk tih a Kaantaak te oengna oen ni .
58011029	Israel thlaang thli te lanhak ah aka cet angla Tuitunlii Seen ah a kat sak te tah oengna ni . Iyipt thlaang thli lawng a kat u van veng atah ahimi te tui lawng a liw boeih tih duek .
58011030	Israel thlaang thli lawng Jeriko khaw te khawhin hin rih khui laam-eet tih a cungvel u coengah vawngkulh thli a tlim boeih te tah oengna oen ni .
58011031	Thlaanghalhnu Rahab lawngah Israel thlaang raalyam thli te beroepna oen a do dawngah Pathen awl aka ngaai nawh thlaang thli oen ngawn haih ohla sa a sueng he oengna oen ni .
58011032	Ka thui hun ai aw ? Kideon , Barak , Samson , Jepta , Devid , Samu-el mi oen tawngha thli kawng te thui ham atue khoek nawh .
58011033	Oengna oen ah ram tawm te a teek u tih a taa u . Ahimi lawng asoeng thaihu te a sai u tih Pathen kah awlkam te a dang u . Sathueng thli kah a kaa te a khuem rap u tih ,
58011034	rih-awm tangkiik hairawng haialh te a thih u tih samsen oen tloekna kalawng loeih u . Ahimi tah a tha yoek sut de a tha ra u ; Ahimi tah ceem thawhna ah tluung-athang u tih ram tloe kah raal thli te a padauh boeih .
58011035	Oengna rang oen ah hutaa thli kah a cakaw thlaang duek thli te hing koep u . Thlaangtloe hue lawngtah atheen ngaai thawh koep hingna te a ngaih u dawngah loeihna te lawh ngaih ohla a thana tih heemtekna oen duek u .
58011036	Khatsut hue te nuihbu kamring la a sai u tih cungpoelh oen a bawh u , khatsut hue te thiirui oen a khih u tih thong ah a thlaak u .
58011037	Ahimi te lunghawh oen a de u , thlawh oen pahih la a ah poet u tih khatsut te samsen oen a tloek u . Ahimi tah a khawdeng u dawngah tuu phaw oen me-ee phaw te a bai a naak u tih rera u , thekha heemtekna oen a ngawn u .
58011038	Dilai he ahimi hamla atheenna roe awm nawh ! Thlaangpooeng poedoe thli angla ramhum huhang oen tlaangsawm ah cet awm u tih lungkaw khuiah , longhoi dung ah , ungrawm khuiah rera u .
58011039	He kah thlaang boeih he amami kah oengna dawngah metihtlukla thangpawm ham a awm ! Tede ahimi lawngah Pathen awlkam te dang u nawh .
58011040	Metihtiah Pathen lawng mami hamla khawkhanna atheen ngaai avan poek dawngah ni . A mengtengna tah ahimi lawngah mami oen thik at la ng'awm u dengah asoepna te a dang u thai ai ti he ni .
58012001	Tedawngah he yoeh aih la sausi yahawh lawng mami he n'yaawl khoep poen dawngah mami cehna lawngpui ah kanghalhkung thaihu soeprep boeih oen mami pum ah aka bat mangkhak thawlhna boeih te dul u silang tah mami haiah avan khueh lansak benla te loehlang u silang heng u sih .
58012002	Mami kah oengna atongna kalawng aboetna toe apangtungna thinglam dawng duekna te rih nawh ! Te thinglam dawng duekna voel ah awmngaihna lawng a ring poen dawngah thinglam dawng duekna te yahpawhna tila poek nawh tih tahe ah Pathen kah bawi ngawlhcoen bantang ben ah te ngawl poen .
58012003	Patang a khangna boeih te poek u lah ; Thlaangthawlh thli kah thina a ueh roe te mah ! Tedawngah nangmi lawng kawboetna oen thathepak la awm u tlaih boel .
58012004	Metihtiah nangmi lawng thawlhna oen na khoelh u vengah he tahe toe atah duekna tangtang oen tah na maneng u thlan .
58012005	Pathen lawng a ca-anau thli nangmi tengah thapeekna awl avan thui te na hilh u poen aw ? “ Ka ca , Bawipa lawng nang n'siim vengah ngaithuen lah , nang te n'toelthaam vengah na kaw boet sak boel .
58012006	Metihtiah Bawipa lawngtah a lungna boeih te a siim tih a ca la a pawm boeih te tah dan a peek . ” tila a thui .
58012007	Nangmi lawng patang na khang te na Pa kah dantatna tila poek hawn ; nangmi kah patang khangna lawng nangmi te Pathen lawng a ca thli la a poek poen tite a tueng sak . Ana pa lawng dan a peek nawh a ca khat khaw awm kai aw ?
58012008	A ca-anau boeih te dan a peek tih nangmi te dan m'peek nawh atah nangmi tah a ca tangtang nawh tih halhca ni tila thuingaihna awm .
58012009	Mami kah thlaanghing m'pa kawng te poek u lah ; ahimi lawng mami te m'phep u de mami lawng n'hinyah u , tedawngah mami kah muithla ben ah m'Pa te metihtlukla a awl ngaai pe tare tih hinyah ham a awm !
58012010	Mami kah thlaanghing m'pa lawngtah amami lawngah soeng a ti angla mami te kawlkalhca ah dan m'peek u ; tede Pathen lawngtah mami theenna ham oen amah kah ciimna te mami lawng dang van hamla ni dan m'peek .
58012011	Mami he dan n'tat tih patang khang vengah te kawhoena ohla mami te kaw avan the sak . Te cakhaw dantatna oen thuituen la aka awm thli lawng ahu la tah thlaangdoeng la hingna dawngkah ngaimawngna kutdo te a dang u .
58012012	Tedawngah ayaihoella aka awm na baan thli te asaw la thueng hang langtah thloet aka thuen na tankhuk thli te cak sak u lah !
58012013	Lawngpui doeng ah cet poe u lah , te atah na khow aka yuei te kheem poe nawh vetih hoeih lat poen ai .
58012014	Thlaang boeih oen roeproeicala awm ham yawm u lang aciim hingna oen hing hamla yawm uh , metihtiah aciim hingna nawh atah a-u lawngkhaw Bawipa te hu manawh .
58012015	Pathen kah lungvatna te a-u lawngkhaw mangthawng taak nawh ham ngaithuen uh . Thingkha thing lawng roeng hang tih asue oen thlaang te raina boehoengla a peek angla a-u khatca khaw awm u boel .
58012016	A-u khaw hutaa tawngpa thawlhna sai u boel . Muithla ben te n'tu la aka sak nawh Esau angla awm u boel ; Ahih lawngtah amah kah camiing la a awmna te buh vai at caak la a yoeih mai poen .
58012017	Na ming u angla hu-aha la ngoen tah ana pa kah yotheenna te paang koep ham a ngaih ; tede paang tlaih nawh poen . Metihtiah ahih lawng mikphi baw ruila tlap cakhaw a sai tangte te thawleng thai tlaih nawh .
58012018	Israel thlaang thli a law u angla nangmi lawng kut oen tek thai Sinai Tlaang la te na law u nawh . Te tlaang te tah hairawng haialhna , yiin samangting oen muui a yiin riit la yaalna , thlipui thliphoe thawhna oen ,
58012019	pengsara tum awl oen ah tuen apauna awl yaakna tlaang ni . Te kah tuenpau awl te Israel thlaang thli lawng a yaak u vengah te awl te yaak koep tlaih nawh ham a bih u ,
58012020	metihtiah , “ Ramsa khaw , te tlaang te aka caawt sarui tah lungto oen de mat la awm ai ” tila a thui awlthlaw te ahimi lawng a ueh thai tlaih nawh dawngah ni .
58012021	Te kah a huh u te tah saringrup la a awm dawngah Mosi lawng , “ Ka rih uuet ah ka thuen ! ” tila a thui .
58012022	Tede nangmi ngoen tah Zaion Tlaang vanthlaang toeklek toekna oen a awmna , vaan Jerusalem aka hing Pathen kah khawpui la te na law u .
58012023	Vaan ah miing thut la aka awm Pathen kah a ca camiing hue awmngaih kawhoe la a tunna ah nangmi tah na law u . Thlaang boeih awlcekkung oen thlaangdoeng thli kah muithla thlaangsoep la aka sai Pathen tengla te na law u .
58012024	Abel thisen kah sai lak ah thaihu theen ngaai te a thisen dueina oen aka sai , awlkam thaai roekbahkung Jesuh tengla nangmi tah na law u .
58012025	Tedawngah nangmi tengah awl thuikung hue kah awl te oelhtaih nawh ham ngaithuen uh . Dilai dawngah awlthang thuikung hue kah awl te hutung ham aka ngaih nawh tah loeih u nawh . Vaan kah awl aka thui te mami lawng mangthawng taak atah metila mami n'loeih pai ai !
58012026	Tevengah te a awl lawng dilai te a hinghuen sak , tede tahe ah awl a kam tah , “ Dilai bueng nawh tih vaan te khaw ka hinghuen sak koep ai , ” ti .
58012027	“ Ka hinghuen sak koep ai , ” tila a thui awl lawngah a tueng sak tah amah lawng a sai thaihu boeih tah hinghuen vetih thoeih kang ai , hinghuen thai nawh thaihu thli te tah cak vetih awm poe ai tite aciimphanla a tueng sak .
58012028	Tedawngah awmngaih u lah sih , metihtiah mami lawng hinghuen thai nawh ram te m'pang u poen . Mami lawng uem u silang tah amah kawhoena koei hinyahna oen rihsakna oen ah Pathen te bok u sih ;
58012029	metihtiah mami kah Pathen tah thlaang aka phe thai tangtang hai ni .
58013001	Khrihca maya manau la na awm u van angla pakhat oen khat lung u poe lah .
58013002	Na im ah kamyin kamlai pah sak u lang dodan ham hilh u boel . Te tila kamyin te a im ah aka pah sak lawngah ming mai ohla vanthlaang te a pah sak u .
58013003	Thong ah aka tla thli te van hilh u boel , namami te ahimi oen thong aka tla haih angla te poek uh . Patang aka khang thli te van hilh u boel , namami te ahimi angla patang aka khang van angla te poek uh .
58013004	Yu lawh vaa sakna he thlaang boeih lawng hinyah ham awm . Yuvaa lawngah khat oen khat uep-awm la awm ham awm . Pathen lawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai oen samphaih thlaang boeih te awl a cek ai .
58013005	Tangka he ngaih moek aih u boel lang na khueh duen oen te haan u mai hawn . Metihtiah Pathen lawng “ Nang te kan ceh taak sut nawh vetih kan khueh sut manawh ” ti .
58013006	Tedawngah mami lawng thincakna oen ah , “ Bawipa tah kai aka bawmkung ni , Lakuengna roe ka khueh nawh . Thlaangtloe lawng ka sawah n'tu a sai thai ai ? tila thui u sih .
58013007	Nangmi tengah Pathen awl aka thui lamhacuek mawtkung thli te hilh u boel . Ahimi kah hingna oen a duekna te poek u langtah ahimi kah oengna te oett u lah .
58013008	Jesuh Khrih tah n'thlem , tihin , dungyan toe amah moepoe la awm .
58013009	Cangpueina alakloe phun soeprep lawng nangmi te lawngpui doeng kalawng atloe abang la m'phelh sak boel seh . Thinkaw tharana he caak awkk kawng phung-alam vaina oen dang ohla Pathen kah lungvatna dawng kalawng dang ham theen ; he ang phung-alam aka vai thli te amami kah a vai phung-alam lawng bawmcem nawh .
58013010	Judah thlaangphun kah bokna huen ah bii aka bi khawsoeih hue lawng mami kah bokna-thaang dawngah a nawn u luciik sa te khatca khaw ca thai nawh .
58013011	Judahthlaang Khawsoeih Bawi lawngah ramsa thisen te thawlh-thlahna luciik la Huen Ciim Koek ah nawn ham a khuen ; tede bawi-ava pum te tah rehbukk kah adauben ah hai oen a tih .
58013012	Te tila a awm dawngah Jesuh lawngkhaw amah thisen oen thlaang boeih ciimna hamla khawpui adauben la te duek .
58013013	Tedawngah rehbukk adauben ah amah tengla te cet u silang ahih kah yarau a phueih te phuei u van sih .
58013014	Metihtiah he dilai han ah mami hamla huencak khawpui awm nawh ; mami lawng aka law ham koei khawpui te ni n'lamtoen u .
58013015	Tedawngah amah thangpawmna te mami kah luciik angla Jesuh rang oen Pathen tengah nawn poepa u sih . Te thangpawmna tah huikaa oen ah thawthuengna tih ahih tah Bawipa ni tila phawngna ni .
58013016	Nangmi lawng pakhat oen khat bawmcemna oen atheen sai hamla te hilh u boel , metihtiah he ang he tah Pathen te kaw aka hoe sak thawthuengna ni .
58013017	Nangmi aka mawtkung thli kah awl te ngaai u lang ahimi kah awl thui te vai uh . Ahimi lawngah amami kah biibina kawng te Pathen tengah thui ham koei la a awm dawngah duemdawng ohla nangmi kah hingna te a doen a cang u . Nangmi lawng a awl na ngaai pe u atah ahimi lawngah awmngaih kawhoe la bii te a bi u ai ; a awl te na ngaai pe u nawh atah ahimi lawng kawthe ruila bii te a bi u vetih nangmi ham hoeikhangna awm manawh .
58013018	Kaimi ham thangthui yoeyah uh . Asoeng thaihu te sai hamla ka ngaih yoeyah u dawngah athe atheen pekbona thinkaw ciim te ka khueh u tila ka ming .
58013019	Pathen lawngah nangmi tengla kai he ayuela n'tuih koep ham ah thinkaw thluembuekcala thangthui ham kan ceel u .
58013020	Tuudoen Bo la aka awm mami kah Bawipa Jesuh lawngah amah kah thawthueng duekna rang oen dungyan la awlkamna te a cak sak poen dawngah Pathen lawng ahih te duekna kalawng a thawh sak poen .
58013021	Nangmi lawngah ngaimawngna akung Pathen kah kawngaih te na sai u thai ham thaihu theen na ngoe boeih te m'pe hawn seh ; Jesuh Khrih rang oen amah kawngaih te mami kaw khuiah sai hawn seh . Jesuh tengah ruep-awmna tah dungyan toe ayoeyahla awm hawn seh ! Amen .
58013022	Maya manau thli , thathluena awl ka thui he na vai u hamla kan ceel u . He capat kavan thut he san aih nawh .
58013023	Mami kah manau Timote te thong khui kalawng a thlah u poen tite nangmi ming sak ham ka ngaih . Ka tengla avan pha yue atah nangmi kan hip vengah ahih te kavan law puei ai .
58013024	Nangmi kah mawtkung boeih oen Pathen kah thlaang boeih te kaimi kah toeina awl he van thui peh . Itali ram kah maya manau hue lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u .
58013025	Pathen lungvatna nangmi boeih sawah awm hawn seh .
59001001	Pathen oen Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang Jeem lawngah dilai peng tawm ah aka yan khonghak Pathen thlaang thli te kan toei u .
59001002	Ka maya manau thli , nangmi tengah raina soeprep a law vengah te yotheenna ni tila poek mai hawn ;
59001003	Metihtiah te ang noekdakna te na oengna oen na taa u vengah tah uehthaina te na khueh u .
59001004	Nangmi lawng voetna awm ohla aka soep tangtang thlaangsoep la na awm u thai ham , na tlim hau nawh ham aboet toela ueh u hawn .
59001005	Tede nangmi tim ah cuihna aka voet te a awm atah Pathen tengah thangthui seh , Pathen lawng ahih te a peek ai , metihtiah Pathen lawngtah thlaang boeih te moeihoeihna oen reenna oen ah a peek .
59001006	Tede nangmi lawngah uepvoetna khueh muehla oengna oen thangthui uh . Uepvoetna aka khueh thlaang tah yilh lawng a yawng tih aka tat mailai tuitunlii kah tuisambaak oen lo u .
59001007	Te ang thlaang lawngtah a thinkaw melh rap nawh tih a saina boeih ah kawpoek a thlumthle dawngah Pathen tengkah thaihu khatca khaw ka dang ai tila a poek ham awm nawh .
59001009	Khrihca khawdeng thlaang pakhat te Pathen lawng a pawmsang hang atah awmngaih selang ,
59001010	Khrihca kuirang thlaang pakhat te Pathen lawng a dangla a thlaak thuk atah awmngaih seh . Metihtiah kuirang thli tah ramhum kah raipai angla tlumtloei ai .
59001011	Khaw a thoeng hang atah raipaikung te khawling lawng a kaang tih yai , a pai khaw reem , tlumtloei tih atheenna khaw ha-ata . Tetih van la kuirang thli lawng bii a tok athlue u lii vengah pal atham ai .
59001012	Noekdakna a tawng vengah acak rap uep-awm la aka pai tah yotheen a dawng u , metihtiah te ang noekdakna te a taa thai tih Pathen lawng amah aka lungna thlaang thli ham awl a kam hingna te kutdo la a dang ai .
59001013	Te ang noekdakna te thlaang lawng a tawng vengah , “ Suekna he Pathen tengkah va law ” tila thui boel seh . Metihtiah Pathen tah athe lawngah suek thai nawh tih a-u khaw Pathen lawngah suek nawh .
59001014	Tede thlaang pakhat lawng suekna a tawng ti he tah amah kah athe ngaihna lawng a mawt tih dong dawngah a man sak ni .
59001015	Tecoengah amah kah athe ngaihna te a kaw khuiah suen tih thawlhna te a cuun ; te thawlhna tah roeng hang tih duekna te a cuun .
59001016	Ka lungna maya manau thli , poek thawlh u boel !
59001017	Kutdo theen boeih oen aka soep kutdo ayoe peek boeih he vaan kalawng aka law ni : vaan kah aangna Saikung Pathen teng kalawng ni a law , ahih tah thawleng u nawh , hoei-athal u nawh tih yiinna khaw thoeng sak nawh .
59001018	Pathen lawng amah kah thaihu sai aka hing boeih khuiah lamhacuek huen ah awm ham awltak awl oen ah amah kawngaih angla mami he n'sai poen .
59001019	Ka lungna maya manau thli , he he hilh u boel ! Thlaang boeih lawngah awl hutung ham a tat loe sak seh , tede awl thui ham tah a tat hiing sak selang thinsana ben atah a tat yaai u seh .
59001020	Thlaanghing kah thinsana lawng Pathen kah a mengteng doengna te thoeng sak thai nawh .
59001021	Tedawngah nangmi lawng tuiilehkap moeiboe boeih oen athe khawboe ramlang boeih te hoett u loeih . Pathen tengah te nawn u langtah nangmi aka thlawn thai na lungbui khuiah avan ling awl te do u lah .
59001022	A awl te hutung doek hong mai oen namah oen namah te thai-alat u boel . A awl te ataktangla hawna lah .
59001023	A-u khaw a awl te hutung hong la hutung doek tih ataktangla aka hawna nawh tah thlalang dawngah dan u tih amah muei te aka hu thlaang oen ni a lawh u .
59001024	Ahih lawngah atheenla dan u tih a ceh coeng atah metila ka awm tite a hilh pahoei .
59001025	Tede a-u khaw thlaang aka loeih sak aka soep phungawl dawngah te anepla dan u tih a harukna , hutung hong la hutung doek tih hilh pahoei mai ohla ataktangla a hawna atah te thlaang te a saina boeih ah Pathen lawng yotheenna a peek ai .
59001026	Bokna ben ah ka tlungmu tangkiik mai tila aka poek thlaang awm aw ? Ahih lawng a laai te a khoem thai nawh atah ahih kah bokna te aphu awm nawh tih amah oen amah te ni athai-alat u khoeng mai .
59001027	Pa Pathen lawngah aciim acaih bokna oen bokna tangtang la a poek tah , khawdeng lungma aka khang cadah harah thli oen huhai tumtee thli cawm acahna oen ah he dilai thawlhna tuiilehkap dawng kalawng mah oen mah kuemsuemna he ni .
59002001	Ka maya manau thli , ruep-awmna akung , mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih te aka oeng thlaang la na awm u dawngah , thlaang he asaw ahan kah na huhna dawngah meveng khaw nangmi lawng voemtoei u boel .
59002002	Thuina maiah kuirang thlaang pakhat lawng sui kutcabuen te a buen tih bainaak theen oen nangmi na tunna ah va law , khawdeng thlaang pakhat khaw bainaak pawn apit oen va law .
59002003	Nangmi lawngah bainaak theen oen aka law te na hinyah u tih ahih nala te , “ He kah ngawlhcoen theen dawngah ngawl , ” na tina u tih khawdeng thlaang te tah , “ Teah te pai hawn , tihnawhtah cirawng ah ka khaw tengah he ngawl mai , ” na tina u atah ,
59002004	nangmi he mami tim ah pekthlena aka sai tih athe poekna oen awltloekna aka sai la na awm u .
59002005	Maya manau thli aw , hutung u lah ! Pathen lawngah he dilai dawngkah khawdeng thlaang thli he oengna ah kuirang la awm ham , amah aka lungna thlaang thli ham a kam pe vaan ram te pang hamla a tuek .
59002006	Tede nangmi lawngtah khawdeng thlaang te haithelatt la na khueh u ! A-u lawngah nangmi te thekha la awlcekkung hai la te raat m'mawt u ? Kuirang thlaang thli de lah koen !
59002007	Nangmi m'peek u miing theen te ahimi lawngah athela a thui u .
59002008	Caciim dawngah aka awm Vaan Ram kah phungawl , “ Namah oen namah na lungna u van angla na imbe te lungnah , ” a ti te na vai atah thaihu doeng te nangmi lawng na sai .
59002009	Tede nangmi lawngah thlaang te asaw ahan kah a tuengna angla pekthlena na khueh u atah nangmi tah na thawlh u tih phungawl lawngah nangmi te phungawl phekung la ni n'huh poen .
59002010	A-u lawngkhaw phungawl pakhat te a phe atah apum boeih la phungawl te a phe poen ni .
59002011	Metihtiah , “ Samphaih boel ” tila aka thuikung lawng ni , “ Thlaang ngawn boel , ” tila te a thui . Nang lawngah na samphaih nawh de thlaang na ngawn atah phungawl phekung la nang tah na awm poen .
59002012	Mami loeihna pekung phungawl lawng awl a cek ham koei thlaang angla te awl thui u lang bii te bi uh .
59002013	Metihtiah reenna aka khueh nawh thlaang te Pathen lawng awl a cek vengah reen van manawh ; tede awlcekna te tah reenna lawng a taa .
59002014	Maya manau thli , thlaang pakhat lawng oengna ka khueh ti de saina oen a tueng sak nawh atah atheenna awm aw ? Te oengna lawng ahih te a thlawn thai aw ?
59002015	Thuina maiah maya manau hutaa khaw , tawngpa khaw , hinaak himbai angoe tih caak awkk aka khueh nawh ti mai lah sih .
59002016	Ahimi lawng a hingna hamla angoe te na peek nawh maiah , “ Pathen lawng yotheen kam-awmna m'pe seh ! Lum-up la awm langtah ahah la ca uh ! ” tila nangmi lawng ahimi na tina te n'tu theenna a awm ?
59002017	Te tila te oengna khaw awm van : Tedawngah oengna bueng awm tih saina athum nawh atah aka duek ni .
59002018	Tede thlaang khatsut lawng , “ Thlaang pakhat lawngah oengna a khueh tih atloe pakhat lawng saina a khueh , ” ti ai . Awl ka thungna tah , “ Saina awm ohla thlaang lawng oengna a khueh thaina te van tueng sak lah . Kai lawngtah ka oengna te saina oen kavan tueng sak ai , ” ti he ni .
59002019	Nangmi lawngah Pathen pakhat bueng awm ti he na tangna u . Theen ngoen ! Raai thli lawngkhaw a tangna u tih rihna oen thuen u .
59002020	Nangmi thlaangngau hue ! Saina aka awm nawh oengna he apoei ni tite kavan tueng sak ham aw na ngaih u ?
59002021	Mami kah patuer Abraham he metila Pathen oen roeproeina te a dang ? A capa Isak te boknathaang dawngah Pathen tengah luciik la a nawn tih te kah a saina rang oen ni roeproeina te a dang .
59002022	Nangmi lawng na ming thai nawh aw ? Ahih kah oengna oen saina lawng thik at la bii a bi ; ahih kah oengna te a saina lawngah asoep sak .
59002023	Tedawngah caciim lawng , “ Abraham lawng Pathen te a tangna tih te a oengna rang oen ah Pathen lawng ahih te thlaangdoeng la a do , ” tila a thui te soep tangtang .
59002024	Tedawngah thlaanghing he oengna bueng oen nawh tih saina rang oen ah Pathen oen roeproeina a dang ti he nangmi lawng na ming u .
59002025	Thlaanghalhnu Rahab khaw te tila te awm . Ahih lawngah Israel thlaang raalyam thli te a do tih lawngpui tloe kalawng ceh hamla ahimi te a bawm , te tila a saina rang oen ah ahih tah Pathen oen roeproeina te a dang .
59002026	Tedawngah muithla a awm nawh atah pum he duek , tetih van angla saina aka awm nawh oengna tah duek .
59003001	Maya manau thli , nangmi thlaang yahawh lawngah cangpueikung la na awm u ham awm nawh . Metihtiah kaimi cangpueikung hue he thlaangtloe lak ah atlawh ngaaila awlcekna ka dang u ai ti he nangmi lawng na ming u .
59003002	Mami boeih lawngah thawlhpalhna te hau n'sai poepa . Awlcal thingkaa ah aka cal thawlh nawh tah thlaangsoep la awm tih a pum araw boeih te aka uk thai thlaang la awm .
59003003	Marang lawngah mami awl te a ngaaina hamla a kaa te rui oen n'cuett pe tih mami kah ngaihna benla te n'ceh sak .
59003004	Tecoengah tuisangphaw ke poek u lah : bo khuengdeng tih tha aka ra yilh lawng ni a ceh sak thai , tede tapaih tehca mai oen ah a hoei thai tih aka mongkung kah a ngaihna ahuen la te cet .
59003005	Te tila te hui-alaai he khaw awm van : tehca mai de khuengding khuengdeng la te oekthloen thai . Haihli tehca mai lawngah ramhum rammawl khawpahpuem a ung sak te poek u lah !
59003006	Te tila te laai he hai oen lo u . Thawlhpalhna dilai la khaw laai he awm . Mami kah pum dawngah ahuen a neet tih mami kah pum-araw boeih ah athe-ara te a puung sak . Mami kah hingna he hai oen a tih boeih , te kah hai te tah hell khui kalawng aka law nawn hai te ni .
59003007	Thlaanghing lawngah ramsa hing atloe boeih he a phep thai , ramsa aka sann thli oen va boeih khaw , aka cawlh ramsa boeih oen nga boeih khaw a phep thai .
59003008	Tede laai he aka phep thai a-u khat khaw awm nawh . Laai he tah athe thaihu , uk thai la aka awm nawh duekna sue oen ah betoet .
59003009	Mami lawngah laai he Bawipa oen Pathen te koehna ham khawseh , Pathen mueisam oen aka lo u mami kah thlaangpuei khaw tapvoepna hamla n'hawna u .
59003010	Kaa pakhat khui kalawng ah koehna awl oen tapvoepna runkhuen pansi awl te thoeng . Maya manau thli aw , te tila a awm ham nawh ni !
59003011	Tuibaap pakhat dawng kalawng tui aka tuui oen tuikha thoeng haih nawh .
59003012	Maya manau thli , thaidut-thing dawngah olif te thaih nooek nawh ; misur thing dawngah khaw thaidut te thaih nooek nawh , tui aal lawngkhaw tui aka tuui te thoeng sak thai nawh .
59003013	Nangmi tim ah mingna aka khueh thlaangcuih pakhat mai khaw awm aw ? A awm atah atheen hingna oen ah tueng sak seh . Cuihna , boe-ngaaina , atheen a saina oen ah tueng sak seh .
59003014	Tede , na kaw khuiah thlaang uett-eena , thlaang thina , namah ham bueng poekna te na khueh u atah namami kah cuihna dawngah oekthloenna oen ah awltak te oelhtaih u boel .
59003015	Te ang cuihna te tah vaan kah aka law nawh ni ; te ang te dilai cuihna ni , te tah muithla ben kah nawh tih raaithe ben kah cuihna ni .
59003016	Uett-eena oen mah ham bueng poekna te a awmna roekk atah roeproeina nawh oen athe phun soeprep khaw awm van .
59003017	Tede saw benkah cuihna tah atloe boeih lak ah ciim , te tah ngaimawngna , boe-ngaaina oen beroepna la awm , te tah reenna oen betoet tih atheen saina athaih theen te a thaih sak ; te lawngtah thlaang pekthlena khueh nawh tih thlaang theen la khaw sa u nawh .
59003018	Roepna saikung thli lawng roepna oen a tuh amu-ati dawngkah athaih apai tah theenna te ni .
59004001	Nangmi tim kah tawhsina oen bawh-apaina he ame kalawng a law ? Namami kah pumsa awmtheen awmyaal ngaihna dawng kalawng law tih , te thli te nangmi kaw khuiah boet ohla raal u poepa .
59004002	Nangmi lawng thaihu na ngaih u , tede na ngaih thaihu te na khueh thai nawh , tedawngah thlaang ngawn ham oepsoehla na kamtoen u ; nangmi lawng thaihu khueh toen ham na ngaih tangkiik u , te ang thli te na dang u nawh , tedawngah na tawh na thaam u tih na bawpp u the . Nangmi lawng na ngaih thaihu na khueh u thai nawh he tah Pathen tengah na bih u nawh dawngah ni .
59004003	Nangmi lawng na bih u van de na dang u nawh , metihtiah nangmi lawngah namami kah pumsa awmtheen awmyaalna ah hawna hamla thaihu te na bih u tih nangmi kah poekna thinkaw te atheen nawh dawngah ni na dang u nawh .
59004004	Nangmi uep-awm nawh thlaang hue ! Dilai oen ah beroep u he Pathen kah raal la awm tite na ming u nawh aw ? A-u khaw dilai kah paya beroep la awm ham aka ngaih tah amah oen amah te Pathen kah raal la sai u .
59004005	Caciim lawngah , “ Pathen lawng mami kaw khuiah avan khueh muithla tah rih-awm hue-angaihna oen betoet , ” tila a thui te a thui ngaihna tangtang awm nawh tila poek hau u boel .
59004006	Tede Pathen kah peek lungvatna tah a tha ra tare ngaai . Caciim lawngah , “ Pathen lawngtah aka oekthloen u thlaang thli te a oel tih boe-ngaai thlaang thli te a reen , ” tila a thui angla ni a awm .
59004007	Tedawngah Pathen kawngaih te vai u lah . Raaibawi te hek u lah , tetih atah nangmi teng kalawng atloela heeng badai .
59004008	Pathen tengah yoeii u lah , ahih tah nangmi tengla law vetih va yoeii van ai . Nangmi thlaangthawlh hue na kut te sil u lah ! nangmi thlaangdoeng la aka sa u thli , na lungbui thinkaw te ciim sak u lah !
59004009	Kawthe oen awm uh , ko-paang u langtah rap uh ; nangmi kah nuih calna te rahna oen thawvel u lah , na awmngaihna te kawthe ngaihangna la coengg sak uh !
59004010	Nangmi lawngah namah oen namah te Bawipa haiah boe-ngai u lah , tetih atah nangmi te amah lawngah m'pawmsang badai .
59004011	Maya manau thli , nangmi pakhat oen khat thuitheet u boel . A-u khaw khrihca maya manau te a thuitheet tih awl aka cek tah Phungawl te a thuitheet tih awl a cek poen ni . Nang lawngah Phungawl te awl na cek atah , nang tah Phungawl te aka vai thlaang pakhat la na awm tlaih nawh tih awlcekkung la ni na awm poen .
59004012	Pathen bueng ni phungawl pekung oen awlcekkung la a awm . Ahih bueng lawng ni thlaang he a thlawn thai tih a phe thai . Nang ta a-u la na ngaai u railai aih tih na thlaangpuei te awl na cek ?
59004013	“ Tihin ah nuem , thangvuen ah nuem , khawpui pakhat ah yin cet u sih , te ah te kum khat mai khaw awm u silang tah tangthung tangleng silang tangka yahawh dang u sih , ” aka ti nangmi hue tahe ah ka awl he hutung u lah .
59004014	Thangvuen ah na hingna metila a awm ai ti pateng khaw nangmi lawng na ming u nawh ! Nangmi tah kawlkalh ah thoeng hang tih kawlkalh ah aka auh mai tuikhu oen ni na lawh u .
59004015	Nangmi lawngah : “ Bawipa lawng a kawngaih tih mami n'hing u atah tete sai sih , he he sai sih . ” tila ni na thui u ham a awm .
59004016	Tede tahe ah nangmi lawngtah na hal-auh u tih na oekk na thloen u ; he ang oekthloenna boeih te tah aka soeng nawh ni .
59004017	Tedawngah , atheen thaihu te sai ham ni tila aka ming thlaang lawngah sai ohla a awm he tah thawlhna ni .
59005001	Kuirang thlaang len thli , tahe ah awl kavan thui he hutung u lah ! Nangmi sawah aka law koei raina dawngah te rap u lah !
59005002	Nangmi kah kaawn-ava boeih te khaw honn kang poen tih hinaak himbai khaw kuum-akeet lawng a caak boeih poen .
59005003	Nangmi kah sui oen ngun te a ekk lawng a caak tih , te kah a ekk thli te tah nangmi oelhtaihkung sausi la awm vetih nangmi kah thi asa te hai-alh lawng a caak angla te avan caak ai . Nangmi lawngah khawhin aboetna ben ah ni kaawn-ava te na tung na sep u poen he !
59005004	Nangmi kah lo khuiah bii aka bi te thapang na pe u nawh . Ahimi kah laise awl te hutung lah ! Nangmi kah caang aka att thli paang awl te Bawilen koek Bawipa Pathen lawng a yaak poen .
59005005	Nangmi tah he dilai dawngah kawngaih soepna oen awmngaihna oen ah na hing u . Meh-ngawnna khawhin ah sak-awm paduukla ngawn ham namah oen namah te purh athaula na cawm na cah u .
59005006	Nangmi lawngah thawlhna aka awm nawh thlaang thli te thawlh na peel u tih na ngawn u , ahimi lawngtah nangmi te n'tu khaw n'thung nawh .
59005007	Tedawngah maya manau thli , Bawi-pa a law thlantoe thinsan kawdaw oen awm uh . Lotoen thlaang pakhat lawngah a lo khuikah caangthaih yuun hamla meveng toe kawdaw oen a lamtoen puet tite poek u lah . Ahih lawngah rawtui a law cuek veng kalawng khawcui boet toe kawdaw thinsan oen a lamtoen .
59005008	Nangmi khaw na kaw te daw sak u van lah . Bawipa a lawna khawhin te ayoeica poen dawngah na ngaiuepna te cak sak uh .
59005009	Maya manau thli , Pathen lawng nangmi te awl cek nawh hamla nangmi khat oen khat thuitheet u boel . Awlcekkung tah va yoeii poen , oepsoehla awm poen .
59005010	Maya manau thli , Bawipa miing oen awl kavan thui , nangmi lawng tawngha thli te hilh u boel , Ahimi lawng kawdaw thinsan oen patang a khang u te nangmi lawng oett u lah .
59005011	Ahimi lawngah patang a khang u thai dawngah yotheenna aka dang thlaang ni ka ti u . Jobah kah kawdaw thinsanna te na yaak u poen tih aboet ben ah Pathen lawng ahih a peek te khaw na ming u . Metihtiah Bawipa tah reenna oen thlaang kah hailam ben poekna oen ah betoet .
59005012	Maya manau thli , atloe boeih lak ah awlkamna na sai u vengah awl taap u boel . Nangmi lawngah vaan phoei oen khawseh , dilai phoei oen khawseh , atloe tloe phoei oen khawseh awl taap u boel . “ Oeih ” tila thui na ngaih atah , “ Oeih ” ti bueng te mah thui mai hawn ; “ Moenih ” tila thui na ngaih atah “ Moenih , ” ti bueng mah thui mai hawn . Te tila na thui u atah Pathen kah awlcekna dawng kalawng na loeih ai .
59005013	Nangmi tim ah raina aka tawng na awm aw ? A awm atah thangthui seh . Awmngaih thlaang ta , awm aw ? A awm atah ahih lawng koehna laa te sa seh .
59005014	Nangmi tim ah thlaangtlo awm aw ? A awm atah ahih lawng khrihcabu kah ahaamca thli te khue seh , Bawipa miing oen olif situi te van koelh selang tah thangthui seh .
59005015	Oengna oen thangthuina lawng thlaangtlo te a hoeih sak ai , Bawipa lawng ahih te sa a ding sak vetih thawlhna a sai te khaw khawdawp a ngaai pe ai .
59005016	Tedawngah nangmi lawng na thawlhna te pakhat oen khat tengah phawng u lang khat oen khat hamla te thangthui uh , te atah nangmi na hoeih u ai . Thlaangdoeng kah thangthuina tah huham tharana awm .
59005017	Elijah he mami angla thlaang pakhat van ni . Ahih lawngah khaw akaangna ham thinkaw tak oen a thangthui vengah kumthum coengah kum vangg dilai dawng khawkaang .
59005018	Elijah lawngah a thangthui koep vengah tah khawtlan tih dilai lawngah khaw abuh ram a saai sak .
59005019	Maya manau thli , nangmi tim ah thlaang pakhat lawng awltak lawngpui te ahang tih aka phell te thlaangtloe pakhat lawng avan law puei koep atah ;
59005020	he he hilh u boel : a-u khaw thlaang-thawlh pakhat te lawngpui a hangna kalawng aka mel puei tah , thlaangthawlh kah muithla te duekna kalawng a thlawn tih thawlhna toeklek nawh dawng kalawng khawdawp-ngaaina aka saikung la awm .
60001001	Jesuh Khrih kah celtuih kai Piter lawngah -- Pontas peng , Galati peng , Kappadocia peng , Asia oen Bitinia peng ah thlaangpoeng poedoe angla aka awm tih aka yan khok Pathen kah thlaangtuek thli tengah ca kavan pat .
60001002	Jesuh Khrih awl te na ngaai tih amah kah thisen oen ciim sak hamla Pathen kah mengtengna angla nangmi tah tuek la na awm u tih amah Muithla lawng thlaangciim la n'sai u . Lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah asoepbirla awm hawn seh .
60001003	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah ana Pa oen Pathen te mami lawng uem u lah sih ! Metihtiah aka lenduet a lungna lawngah Jesuh Khrih te duekna kalawng a thawh sakna rang oen mami he hingna a thaai m'peek poen . Tedawngah mami tah aka hing ngaiuepna oen m'betoet u ,
60001004	Pathen lawng a thlaang thli hamla a khueh pe yotheen kam-awmna yahawh hlang te pang van hamla n'ngaiuep u . Te yotheen kam-awmna te tah amah lawng nangmi ham vaan ram ah avan kuem tih te huen atah honn thai nawh , rong-athaang thai nawh tih muingen thai nawh .
60001005	Atue boetna apha vengah tueng sak hamla a khueh oepsoeh thlawnna te oengna rang oen ah Pathen kah huham tharana lawng akhoem abeel tih nangmi ham vaan ah avan khueh ro na pang ham koei ni .
60001006	Nangmi lawng khawdeng patang phun soeprep te na khang u dawngah tahe veng kawlkalhca tah na kaw the u de , thlawnna kawngah he awmngaih u lah .
60001007	He ang raina na tawng u he nangmi kah oengna te ataktang oen ataktang nawh te noekdakna ham ni . Phe thai koei la aka awm sui pateng khaw hai oen ah anoekdak ta ; tedawngah sui lak ah aphu aka awm ngaai nangmi kah oengna lawng raina he ueh thai ham ah noekdak la awm . Te dengah ni Jesuh Khrih a tuengna Khawhin ah nangmi lawng thangpawmna , ruep-awmna oen hinyahna te na dang u ai .
60001008	Nangmi lawng amah te na hu u nawh de na lungna u , tahe ah na hu u nawh de na tangna u . Tedawngah awl oen thui thai nawh awmngaihna alentloe oen asang koek kawhoena te na khueh u ,
60001009	Metihtiah nangmi lawng amah oengna dawngah mengtengna muithla thlawnna te na dang u poen dawngah ni .
60001010	He thlawnna kawng he tawngha thli lawng acek-aneh la a doet adap tih a tlap u . Pathen lawng nangmi peek ham a ngaih kutdo kawng te a thui oepsoeh .
60001011	Ahimi lawngah , te kutdo te meveng tue ah a awm vetih metuek tue ah a law ai tite ming hamla a yawm u tih tahe veng atue he ahimi kaw khuiah aka awm Khrih Muithla lawngah a khi pe . Muithla lawngtah Khrih lawng patang khang ham koei oen ah , te tila patang a khang dawngah dang ham koei ruep-awmna te a thui oepsoeh poen .
60001012	Tawngha thli lawng bii a bi u he tah amami kah hoeikhangna ham nawh tih nangmi kah hoeikhangna ham ni tite Pathen lawng a thui pe . Nangmi tengah awlthang aka thui laipai thli oen tawngha thli lawngah a thui oepsoeh a kawng alam te vaan kah avan tuih Ciim Muithla tharana huham oen ah avan phawng poen tih tahe ah nangmi lawng na yaak u poen . He kah thaihu kawng he vanthlaang thli lawng pateng khaw yaakming ham a ngaih u .
60001013	Tedawngah bii bi hamla na thinkaw te roekbah oepsoeh uh . Ahuertuela awm u lang , Jesuh Khrih a tueng vengah na dang ham koei lungvatna kutdo dawngah na ngaiuepna te khueh uh .
60001014	Pathen awl te ngaai uh , nangmi lawng n'tu khaw na ming u nawh vengah namami kawngaih la na hing u angla te hing u tlaih boel .
60001015	Nangmi khuekung Pathen te aciim van angla nangmi khaw na saina boeih dawngah aciimla awm uh .
60001016	Caciim lawngah , “ Kai tah ka ciim dawngah nangmi khaw aciimla awm uh , ” tila a thui .
60001017	Nangmi lawng Pathen tengah na thangthui u vengah ahih te a Pa tila na khue u , ahih lawng atah thlaang boeih te a saina taring ah pekbona awm ohla awl a cek . Tedawngah he dilai dawng na hing khuiah he amah te hinyahna langtah hing u lah .
60001018	Nangmi lawng na patuer hue tengkah na pang patoeng hoeikhangna aka awm nawh hingna kalawng aphu a peek tih n'loeih sak te nangmi lawng na ming u . Te tah sui , ngun angla mui-angen thai koei thaihu nawh ni .
60001019	Te thaihu tah angaw aha awm nawh tih cawttbauh kap nawh tuuca oen aka lo u aphu aka tlo Khrih kah luciik thawthuengna te ni .
60001020	Ahih te tah dilai suen thlan vengah Pathen lawng a tuek poen tih he kah atue khawhin aboetna tue vengah nangmi ham avan tueng sak .
60001021	Amah rang oen Pathen te nangmi lawng na oeng u tih , Pathen lawng amah te duekna kalawng a thawh sak tih ruep-awmna te a peek ; tedawngah nangmi kah oengna oen ngaiuepna tah Pathen dawngah cak khak .
60001022	Tahe ah nangmi lawng awltak te na vaina rang oen nangmi tah na ciim u poen tih oengca na puei na paw thli te lungna taktak oen na lungna u poen , tedawngah nangmi khat oen khat thinkaw tak oen lung u tare lah .
60001023	Tedawngah aka hing tih dungyan aka cak Pathen awl rang oen nangmi tah na thangthaai u poen ; aka duek thai nu oen pa kah ca-anau angla nawh tih aka duek thai nawh kah ca-anau la na awm u .
60001024	Caciim lawngah , “ Thlaang boeih he sul-aram angla ni a awm , ahimi kah ruep-awmna boeih tah raipai angla awm , sul-aram khaw au tih reu , raipai khaw tlumtloei ,
60001025	tede Bawipa kah awl tah yoeyahla cak ” tila a thui . Nangmi tengah avan phawng u awlthang theen tah he poen ni .
60002001	Tedawngah namami kah the-arana boeih , hoem awl thuina , thai-alatna , uett-eena , awlthe awlkha te hoett u loeih .
60002002	Camoe thangpek angla awm u langtah muithla ben kah suuktui ciim te hall yoeyah uh , muithla ben suuktui ciim te na awkk u atah na roeng hang vetih thlawn la na awm u ai .
60002003	Caciim lawngah , “ Bawipa tah thlaang reenkung ni tite namami roe lawng na ming u poen ” a ti angla te awm .
60002004	Bawipa tengah law u lah , ahih tah aka hing lunghiim thlaanghing lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett de Pathen lawng aphu aka tlo lunghiim la a tuek poen .
60002005	Nangmi khaw aka hing lunghiim angla law u langtah , namami roe te muithla ben kah tempal bok-im sakna la sai u lah . Te huen ah te aciim khawsoeih angla bii na bi u vetih Pathen lawng a do ham koei muithla ben kah luciik te Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen tengah na nawn u ai .
60002006	Tedawngah caciim lawng , “ Kai lawngah lunghiim phutlo pakhat ka tuek , te lunghiim te Zaion ah imkil lungdang suemna la ka khueh ; a-u khaw ahih te aka oeng tah metuek veng khaw a kaw boet manawh , ” tila a thui .
60002007	He Lunghiim he aka tangna mami ham tah phutlo tangkiik la awm , tede aka tangna nawh thlaang thli ham tah ; “ Imsakung hue lawng aphu aka awm nawh angla a hoett u lunghiim tah , te thli boeih lak ah awlpui koek lunghiim la awm poen . ” tila a thui .
60002008	Caciim atloe pakhat lawngah , “ He lunghiim tah thlaang a ploengna lunghiim la awm ai , he lunghiim lawng ahimi te a tlim sak ai . ” tila a thui . Ahimi lawngah awl te a tangna u nawh dawngah ploeng u ; he tah ahimi hamla Pathen kah kawngaih roe ni .
60002009	Tede nangmi tah a tuek thlaangphun , seng-pahrang kah khawsoeih , thlaangphun ciim , Pathen kah thlaangphun la na awm u . Yiinna khui kalawng amah kah aangna khuila nangmi khuekung Pathen lawng kawpoekrai a sai te thui sak ham nangmi te n'tuek u .
60002010	N'hu veng atah nangmi he Pathen kah thlaang la na awm u nawh de tahe atah nangmi he amah kah thlaang la na awm u poen ; anoekbuet atah Pathen kah reenna te na ming u nawh de tahe atah a reenna te na dang u poen .
60002011	Ka lungna paya thli , he dilai han ah kamyin kamlai oen thlaangpoeng poedoe angla aka awm nangmi tengah reenna kavan bih ! Muithla oen aka raal u poepa pumsa ngaihna lawngah nangmi te n'taa u hau boel seh .
60002012	Nangmi kah khawboe ramlang he Pathen aka ming nawh thlaang thli tim ah atheen soeh ham awm , ahimi lawng nangmi te athe saikung la m'peel mai cakhaw nangmi kah moeiboe theen te a huh u vetih Pathen a lawna Khawhin ah amah te a thangpawm u badai .
60002013	Bawipa te na hinyah u van angla saithaina aana aka khueh ukkung thlaang boeih kah a awl te ngaai pe uh : saithaina aana sangkoek khuehkung sengpahrang sangluel kah awl te ngaai pe uh ,
60002014	athe saikung thli dan tat ham oen theenna aka sai thli koeh hamla a khueh ram uk-bawi hue kah awl khaw ngaai pe uh .
60002015	Metihtiah amah ngaih la awl sah sah aka cal thlaangngau paathuu hue te nangmi kah thaihu theen saina lawng a awl phah sak seh tila Pathen lawng a ngaih ni .
60002016	Nangmi lawngah ahoeng ahoett la aka awm thlaang angla khaw sa uh ; tede nangmi lawng ahoeng ahoett la na awmna te athe-ara thlipdahna ham hawna u boel , Pathen kah sal angla khaw sa uh .
60002017	Thlaang boeih te hinyah uh , aka oeng na puei na paw te lungna uh , Pathen te rih u lang sengpahrang sangluel te khaw hinyah uh .
60002018	Nangmi tuihyoeihthlaang thli aw , namami kah bawi manghai awl te ngaai u langtah ahimi tengah hinyahna te tueng sak uh . Reenna a khueh tih kaw aka poek thai bawi manghai hue bueng ohla tluunghuel bawi manghai hue te khaw hinyah uh .
60002019	Nangmi lawngah Pathen kawngaih te na ming u dawngah patang khang koei nawh te awl puung muehla na ueh u atah Pathen lawng nangmi te yotheen kam-awmna m'peek ai .
60002020	Nangmi lawng namami kah saithawlhna dawngah patang khang koei bawh-apaina patang te na khang u atah metila koeh ham koeila a awm ai ? Tede asoeng thaihu na sai lal maiah nangmi lawng patang na khang oh atah Pathen lawng yotheenna m'peek ai .
60002021	He tila awm ham ah Pathen lawng nangmi te n'khue u , metihtiah Khrih amah roe lawngah nangmi ham patang a khang tih amah khowleh thuih ham te nangmi kah oett koeila avan ceh taak .
60002022	Ahih tah thawlhna khat khaw sai nawh , me veng khaw hoem awl thui vai nawh .
60002023	Awlthe awlkha oen asal aphaam u vengah te ahih lawng awlthe awlkha oen thung nawh ; patang a khang vengah thlaang te hih-ahuut nawh , tede adoengla awl cekkung Pathen te ni a uepna .
60002024	Mami lawng thawlhna ah duek tih doengna ah hing hamla Khrih amah lawng a pum dawngah mami thawlhna te thinglam dawng a phueih poen . Ahih kah boengha ngaw oen nangmi tah na hoeih u poen .
60002025	Nangmi tah lawngpui aka hang tuu oen na lo u , tede tahe tah nangmi kah hingna Doenkung Tuudoen hu ah bang hamla nangmi te m'mel sak koep poen .
60003001	Tetih van angla nangmi yu-aca hue lawngah na vaa thli kah awl te na ngaai ham awm . Te dengah ni na vaa thli tim ah Pathen awl aka tangna nawh pakhat khat te a awm atah nangmi kah moeiboe lawng a taa vetih a oeng ai . Nangmi lawng awl kam at khaw thui ham ngoe manawh ,
60003002	metihtiah nangmi kah khawboe ramlang te metila a ciim tih hinyah koei la a awm te ahimi lawng a huh u ai .
60003003	Nangmi kah na thlaang theenna te asaw ahan kah cawng acahna , na sam thloeih-thlam te ang thli , khawh-arang oen thoekcauna te ang thli , hi-acuu buen anaakna oen thoeicamna te ang thli dawngah awm ham nawh ni .
60003004	Te lak ah Pathen mik huh ah phutlo koek thlaangtheenna tangtang tah nangmi kah thinkaw khuiah aka awm boe-ngaaina oen kawdawna dawngah ni a awm .
60003005	Metihtiah yan veng kah Pathen aka uepna hutaa thli kah a thlaang theenna tah a vaa thli kah awlngaaina dawngah awm .
60003006	Sarah tah te tila awm ; Ahih lawng Abraham kah awl a ngaai tih ahih te bawipa a tina . Nangmi lawng theenna te na sai u tih rihna tu khaw na khueh u nawh atah ahih kah canu la tahe ah na awm u .
60003007	Tetih van angla nangmi tawngpa hue lawng yu-aca oen thik-at la awm haih u lang ahimi te tha aka ra nawh ni tite yaakming uh . Ahimi te hinyahna oen voemtoei uh , metihtiah ahimi lawngkhaw Pathen kah hingna kutdo te nangmi oen thik-at la dang haih van ham ni . Na thangthuina te kanghalhna khat khaw a awmna nawh ham te tila te sai uh .
60003008	Hukhueng ah awl uen hamla ka ngaih tah ; Nangmi boeih lawng thinkaw lungbui poekna te khat la kang khueh uh , maya manau angla khat oen khat lung u langtah reenna oen boe-ngaaina oen ah awm uh .
60003009	Nangmi lawng athe te athe van oen ah , tapvoepna te tapvoepna van oen ah thung u boel ; te lak atah yotheen kam-awm peekna oen thung uh , metihtiah Pathen kah awlkam yotheen kam-awmna te nangmi peek hamla ni amah lawng n'khue u .
60003010	Caciim dawngah , “ A-u khaw hing khuiah awmngaih hamla a ngaih tih atue theen huh ham aka ngaih tah , awlthe thui te kuemsuem selang hoem awl thui te toeng loeih seh .
60003011	Ahih lawngah athe te mangthawng taak selang atheen te sai lah seh ; ahih lawngah thinkaw lungbui boeih oen roeproeina te tlap seh .
60003012	Metihtiah Pathen lawng thlaangdoeng te a doen-acaang tih ahimi kah thangthuina te a hutung ; tede athe-ara te aka sai te tah Pathen lawng a mangthawng taak ” tila a thui .
60003013	Nangmi lawng theenna te sai ham thinkaw a thluembuek tang atah a-u lawng nuem patang raina te m'peek tang ai ?
60003014	Tede nangmi lawngah doengna na sai u lal maiah patang na khang u atah nangmi tah yotheenna aka dawng thlaang ni ! A-u khaw rih u boel , lakueng khaw lakueng u boel .
60003015	Tede na thinkaw lungbui oen Khrih hinyah uh , na Bawipa la khueh langtah hinyah u lah . Nangmi lawng na kaw khuiah ngaiuepna na khueh u te thuicaih hamla pakhat khat lawng nangmi te n'doet u atah meveng tue ah khaw ahimi kah awldoet te thung hamla oepsoehla awm uh .
60003016	Tede awldoetna te kawdaw awlding oen hinyahna oen ah thung pe uh . Khrih kah hubang la na awm u dawngah nangmi kah khawboe ramlang theen te athela aka thui thli lawng amami kah awlthui han ah ayah toe la a awmna u ham thinkaw te ciim sak uh .
60003017	Athe sai dawngah patang khang lak ah Pathen kawngaih la a awm atah theenna sai dawngah patang khang te theen ngaai .
60003018	Metihtiah Khrih tah thlaangthawlh boeih yuengla vai at ah akhoek koeng la duek poen , nangmi te Pathen teng ceh puei ham thlaangthawlh yueng la thlaangdoeng te duek . Ahih te pumsa ben atah duek de , muithla ben atah hing koep tih ,
60003019	muithla ben kah amah hingna oen muithla thongtla thli tengla cet tih awlthang a phawng pe .
60003020	He muithla thli tah Noah lawng tuisangphaw a sai vengah Pathen lawng thinsan kawdaw oen a ring khiing de awl aka ngaai tlaih nawh hue te ni . Tuisangphaw khuila aka kuun thlaang a yawlca , apum boeih la pareet hue te tui dawngkah a thlawn ,
60003021	te tah tahe ah nangmi kah thlawnna baptisma miknoekna te a thuinuetna ni . He baptisma he tah pum dawngkah ciimcaih nawh te silhna nawh tih athe atheen pekbona kawpoek theen oen Pathen tengah awlkam saina ni . Jesuh Khrih thawhkoepna rang oen ah nangmi tah te baptisma oen n'thlawn u .
60003022	Ahih tah vaan la luui tih Pathen bantang ben ah te awm tih vanthlaang boeih oen vaan ah saithaina aana khuehkung boeih oen ah huham tharana boeih te a uk .
60004001	Khrih lawng amah pum dawngah patang a khang poen dawngah nangmi lawngkhaw ahih kah thinkaw a khueh te ang te khueh u van lang na tha thlue sak u lah ; metihtiah a-u khaw pumsa dawngah patang aka khang tah thawlhna oen bawl-aneeng u tlaih nawh .
60004002	Tedawngah tahe kalawng tah dilai dawngah hingna na khueh khui roekk tah thlaanghing kah kawngaihna ohla Pathen kah kawngaihna lawng nangmi te n'uk u seh .
