60004003	Pathen aka ming nawh thlaang thli lawng a sai u angla te nangmi lawng sai van hamla atue atang akhoek anoen te n'hu vengah na hawna u poen . Nangmi lawng na hingna te sai koei nawh yahpawhna , cuk-halhna , yuu ruuina , yuukung tai la ah so-atena , cingdoek halangna , tuiilehkap kutsaimuei bokna dawngah na hawna u poen .
60004004	Tahe atah nangmi lawng Pathen aka ming nawh thlaang thli kah khawpaw rang-au la a hingna dawngah te na thuum pe u tlaih nawh dawngah a kawpoek rai u tih tedawngah nangmi te n'thui theet u .
60004005	Tede thlaangduek oen thlaanghing awlcek ham oepsoeh la aka awm Pathen tengah ahimi lawng a hingna oen a saina boeih te a thui u ai .
60004006	Tedawngah ni Awlthang Theen he thlaangduek thli tengah khaw a thui pe . Thlaang boeih awl a cek van angla ahimi khaw pumsa la a hing vengah te awl cek la awm poen ; te cakhaw ahimi tengah awlthang theen a thui pe he tah muithla ben kah a hingna lawngah te Pathen a hing van angla ahimi hingna hamla ni .
60004007	Thaihu boeih kah aboetna tah yoeii poen . Tedawngah thangthuina khueh thaina ham ah mah oen mah kuemsuem u langtah a huertuela awm uh .
60004008	Atloe boeih lak ah pakhat oen khat thinkaw tak oen lung uh , metihtiah lungna lawngtah thawlhna boeih te a khuk a dah dawngah ni .
60004009	Kawhuet cakbat ohla pakhat oen khat im yin luui sak uh .
60004010	Nangmi pakhat rip he Pathen kutdo atloetloe kuemkung theen la na awm u van angla Pathen teng kah na dang kutdo te thlaangtloe kah theenna hamla hawna uh .
60004011	Thaihu soeprep dawngah Jesuh Khrih rang oen Pathen lawng thangpawmna te a dang thaina ham a-u lawngkhaw awl a thui atah Pathen awlthang te thui seh ; A-u lawngkhaw bii a bi atah Pathen lawng a peek tha-awm tharana oen bi seh , ruep-awmna oen huham tharana tah dungyan toela amah tengah awm hawn seh . Amen .
60004012	Ka lungna ka paya thli , aka tlo tangkiik noekdakna patang na khang u dawngah nangmi sawah aka awm noek nawh thaihu va thoeng tila na kawpoek rai sak u boel .
60004013	Te lak atah Khrih kah patang khangna te na khang u van dawngah awmngaih u lah . Te ah ni ahih kah ruep-awmna a tueng vengah nangmi lawng awmngaihna oen na betoet ai .
60004014	Khrih hubang la na awm u dawngah nangmi te n'thui theet u atah na kaw hoe sak u lah ; he tah Pathen Muithla ruep-awmna oen aka be muithla te nangmi sawah awm ti ngaihna ni .
60004015	Nangmi pakhat khat lawngah patang raina na khang u te , thlaang ngawnna , huen-acanna , lumlai huhna , thlaangtloe kah kawng-alam rawlraakna dawngah patang khang u boel .
60004016	Tede khrihca la na awm u dawngah patang na khang u oh atah yak u roe boel , nangmi lawng Khrih miing te na lengkoena u dawngah Pathen te koeh u lah .
60004017	Awlcekna tongnan hamla atue khoek poen tih Pathen kah thlaang thli te lamhacuekla awl a cek ai . Mami tengah lamhacuek la awlcekna a tongnan oh atah Pathen tengkah Awlthang Theen aka oeng nawh thlaang thli tare metila aboetna a awm ai te ?
60004018	Caciim lawngah , “ Thlaangdoeng ham pateng thlawnna te a rai atah ; Pathen khueh nawh thlaangthawlh ham tah metihtlukla a rai ai te , ” tila a thui .
60004019	Tedawngah Pathen kah kawngaih la a awm dawngah khawdeng patang aka khang hue lawng awlkam aka thlauh nawh ahimi saikung Pathen tengah amah oen amah te nawn u ngala seh .
60005001	Khrihcabu ahaamca thli kai khaw ahaamca pakhat la ka awm van angla nangmi tengah reenna kavan bih u . Kai tah Khrih kah patang khangna te hukung la ka awm tih aka law ham koei ruep-awmna te khaw pang van hamla ka awm dawngah nangmi tengah reenna kavan bih .
60005002	Pathen peek tuuping te aka khaal tuudoen la awm u lah , thathe huut la awm ohla , Pathen kawngaih angla thathlue thakaw la tuu te doen uh . Bii bi phu dang ngaih maiah bi mailai ohla bi ngaihna thinkaw tang oen ah bi uh .
60005003	Nangmi kut dawngah avan khueh tuu thli te uk khangrang aih boel langtah tuuping kah oett koei la te awm ham yawm uh .
60005004	Tedawngah Tuudoen Ahaam koek te a tueng vengah a aangna aka duek yum thai tlaih nawh ruep-awmna bawilumuek te nangmi lawng na dang u ai .
60005005	Te tih van la te nangmi roengthaai kumno hue lawng ahaamca thli kah awl te na ngaai u ham awm . Nangmi boeih lawngah boe-ngaaina himbai te bai u langtah pakhat oen khat bawmcem u lah ; metihtiah caciim lawngah , “ Pathen lawng aka oekthloen u te tah amah khak tih boe-ngaai thlaang teng atah mik-hai a thlampaan sak , ” tila a thui .
60005006	Tedawngah atue akhoek vengah Pathen lawng nangmi te pawmsangna ham namah oen namah boe-ngaai lang amah kah huham thara kut dawngah tloeng u hawn .
60005007	Nangmi te amah lawng n'doencang poen dawngah nangmi kah lakuengna boeih te amah pum ah hal u hawn .
60005008	Huertue la awm uh , ngaithuen lang awm uh ! Nangmi kah raal , Raaibawi Seitan tah ngeh hamla sa aka tlap tih aka kaawk soeh sathueng angla yingyo soeh poen .
60005009	Nangmi lawng na oengna dawngah te acakla awm u lang Seitan te balkhawng uh . Metihtiah na ming u angla dilai pum ah aka awm oengca pueipaw thli khaw he ang khawdeng patang he a khang u van .
60005010	Tede nangmi lawng atue soetca ah patang na khang u kawlkalh coeng atah lungvatna boeih kah Pathen , Khrih ah pumkhat la awmna rang oen amah kah dungyan ruep-awmna te paang van hamla nangmi khuekung Pathen amah lawng nangmi te thlaangdoeng la n'khueh vetih acakla pai thaina oen tha-awm tharana te m'peek ai .
60005011	Amah tengah huham tharana tah yoeyahla awm hawn seh ! Amen .
60005012	He capat atoica he Silas kah bawmna rang oen nangmi tengah kavan thut , ahih he uep-awm khrihca maya manau la ka poek ni . Nangmi tengah thaphawhna awl thui ham ka ngaih tih nangmi lawng na dang u lungvatna tah Pathen tengkah tangtang ni tila aka mingkung la ka awm . Te lungvatna dawngah acakla pai uh .
60005013	Pathen lawng a tuek Babilon khaaw kah khrihcabu lawngkhaw , ka capa Mark lawngkhaw nangmi te n'toei u .
60005014	Nangmi khat oen khat khrihca lungna oen mok u langtah voemtoei u lah . Khrih ah aka awm nangmi boeih sawah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh .
61001001	Jesuh Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang oen celtuih Simon Piter lawng mami kah Pathen oen Thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih kah doengna rang oen kaimi angla aphu aka tlo oengna aka dang van nangmi tengah :
61001002	Pathen oen mami kah Bawipa Jesuh te na mingna rang oen ah lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah asoepla nangmi tengah awm hawn seh .
61001003	Pathen amah kah ruep-awmna oen atheenna pang van hamla mami khuekung Jesuh Khrih mingna rang oen Pathen hinyahna oen ah hing hamla mami kah ngoe soeprep boeih te Pathen kah tharana huham oen m'peek poen .
61001004	Te tila amah lawng peek ham awlkam aka bo hlang tih aphu aka tlo kutdo te mami m'peek poen . He kutdo rang oen mami aka phe thai dilai pumsa ngaihna kalawng na loeih u thai vetih Pathen pumsa te na cuut u thai van ai .
61001005	Tedawngah he kawngah he na oengna dawngah theenna te thap u lang , na theenna dawngah mingna oen thap uh ;
61001006	na mingna dawngah te mah oen mah kuemsuemna oen thap uh ; mah oen mah kuemsuemna dawngah uehna oen thap uh , uehna dawngah Pathen hinyahna oen thap uh ;
61001007	Pathen hinyahna dawngah te boenhui angla thintlawhna oen thap uh , boenhui angla thintlawhna dawngah lungna oen thap uh .
61001008	He thli he nangmi lawng na ngoe thaihu ni , he ang he yahawh ngaai na khueh u atah mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih na mingna dawngah tha avan thlue sak vetih theenna avan thoeng sak ai .
61001009	Tede a-u khaw te thaihu aka khueh nawh tah a huhna aka toica tangkiik mikpum thlaang ni ; ahih lawngah aruem kah thawlhna boeih kalawng n'ciim sak tite a hilh ni .
61001010	Tedawngah maya manau hue , Pathen kah khuena oen tuekna te acakna poe ham tha huer tare uh ; te tila tha na huer u atah thawlhna dawngah na tlim u manawh .
61001011	He tila te mami kah Bawipa oen Thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih kah dungyan ram ah nangmi kuun thaina te m'peek u ai .
61001012	Tedawngah nangmi lawng he kawng he na ming u tangte poen tih awltak na dang u dawngah acakla na pengnel u poen de he kawng he kan yaak sak poepa hun ai .
61001013	Ka hing khui roekk atah he kawng he nangmi kan yaak sak poepa hamla aka soeng ni tila ka poek .
61001014	Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng aciimphanla ka tengah avan thui poen angla he aka duek thai pum he tah ka dul yue poen ai tila ka ming .
61001015	Tedawngah Kai ka duek coengah he thaihu thli he na ming u poepa hamla ka sai thai khui tah nangmi ham lawngpui ka roek ai .
61001016	Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih tharana huham oen a lawna te kavan thui u vengah thlaang lawng a suen coplap ciil awl te kavan thui nawh . Kaimi lawng a bawilenna te ka mik roeroe oen ka huh u .
61001017	Ruep-awm Sawsangkoek teng kalawng “ Ahih he ka lungna ka Capa ni , ahih sawah ka kaw hoe tangkiik tila ahih tengah awl va law tih Pa Pathen lawng hinyahna oen ruep-awmna a peek vengah te kaimi khaw te huen ah te ka awm u .
61001018	Amah oen aciim tlaangsawm ah ka awm u vengah vaan kalawng awl a law te kamami roe lawng ka yaak u .
61001019	Tedawngah tawngha thli lawng a thui u awl te kaimi lawng ka tangna tare u . Nangmi lawng te awl te atheenla na khuui na ciing u ham awm , metihtiah khawthai tih aisi tumpa nangmi thinkaw khuiah a aang thlantoe yiinna khuiah aka vang hai-im oen lo u .
61001020	Tecakhaw he thli boeih coengah caciim dawng tawngha thli kah thuisut awl te a-u lawngkhaw amah poek ah thuicaih thai nawh tite ming uh .
61001021	Metihtiah tawngha thli kah thui oepsoeh awl he thlaanghing kawngaih-na oen law mailai nawh , tede thlaang he Ciim Muithla lawng a ceemtuh dawngah ahimi lawng Pathen tengkah awl aka law te a phawng u .
61002001	Yan veng Israel thlaang thli tim ah asoeng nawh tawngha thli pho . Tetih van angla nangmi tim ah asoeng nawh cangpueikung thli va thoeng ai . Ahimi lawng thlaang thek-yakna asoeng nawh oengnakungpui te avan khuen u vetih ahimi aka tlangkung Manghai Bawi te a hoett u ai , te tila amami sawah kawlkalhca ah rawkna te a pha sak ai .
61002002	Te tila a awm u lal maiah pateng ahimi kah athe khawboe ramlang te thlaang yahawh lawng a oett u vetih ahimi lawng athe a sai u dawngah awltak lawngpui te thlaangtloe lawng athela a thui ai .
61002003	Aka soeng nawh cangpueikung hue lawngtah amami kah apueh ngaih soeh te dang ham a ngaih u dawngah a suen coplap ciil te nangmi tengah avan thui ai . Aruem veng kalawng tahe toe ahimi Awlcekna te awm oepsoeh poen tih ahimi aka Phekung tah huertuela hak !
61002004	Pathen lawngtah thawlhna aka sai vanthlaang thli te thlung nawh tih ahimi te hell khuila a voeih , yiinna khuiah ahimi te thiirui oen a khih tih awlcekna khawhin te a ring u .
61002005	Pathen lawngtah yan kah dilai khaw thlung nawh tih Pathen tula aka sak nawh thlaang kawngah dilai dawng tuiliw a law sak , doengna aka thui Noah oen thlaangtloe pasarih hue bueng te a thlawn .
61002006	Pathen lawng Sodom oen Gomorrah khawpui te dan a peek tih hai oen a phe . Te tah Pathen tula aka sak nawh thli hamla miknoekna a sai .
61002007	Khawboe ramlang the tih phung aka khueh nawh thlaang thli lawngah a thekhana thlaangdoeng Lot te tah a loeih sak .
61002008	Te thlaangdoeng tah thlaangthe thli tim ah khawhin roekk khaw a sak tih ahimi kah athe moeiboe oen saina te a huh tih a yaak vengah a kaw the tih a thin phat .
61002009	Tedawngah Bawipa lawngtah amah aka ming thlaang thli te ahimi kah patang khangna kalawng loeih sak ham khaw , thlaangthe thli te Awlcekna Khawhin ah metila dan tat ham ti khaw a ming ,
61002010	awlpui la tah amami kah tuiilehkap pumsa cuk-halhna oen Pathen kah aana n'tu la aka sak nawh hue te ni . He kah asoeng nawh cangpueikung thli he a thin cak u tih halang u , sawben vaan ah aka awm ruep-awm te khaw hinyah u nawh , ahimi lawng te thli te asal aphaam dai .
61002011	He kah asoeng nawh cangpuei-thawlhkung thli lak ah tha awm thara ngaai vanthlaang thli pateng Pathen haiah ahimi te thawlh a peel vengah tapvoep awl thui u nawh .
61002012	Tede , he thlaang thli lawngtah , tuuk tih ngawn doek ham aka thang ramsa sann angla poekna mailai oen thaihu a sai u ; ahimi lawng a ming u nawh thaihu khat mai dawngah khaw tapvoep awlkha a thui u . Ahimi tah ramsa sann angla ngawn la awm ai .
61002013	Ahimi lawng thlaangtloe sawah raina a thoeng sak angla amami sawah raina oen a thung pe van ai . Ahimi ham tah nawmna ti he hingthuntaang ah pumsa kah hue-ngaihna soeprep sai he ni . Amami kah thailatna lawngpui ah te awmtheen u tih nangmi oen buh a veel haih u vengah khaw , haithelatt oen yarau aka thoeng sak la awm u .
61002014	Ahimi lawng thlaanghalhnu nawhtah atloe te bueh hamla ngaih u nawh ; amami kah thawlh saina dawngah a kaw riim u nawh . Ahimi lawng oengna tha aka yoek thlaang thli te thawlhna dong dawngah a man sak . A thinkaw tah apuehngaihna oen betoet . Ahimi tah Pathen kah kawsi aka yawkk thlaang poen ni .
61002015	Ahimi lawng lawngdoeng te a ceh taak u tih lawngpui a hang u poen ; ahimi lawngah Beor Capa Balaam lawngpui te a vai u , Ahih tah athe saina oen tangka huh ham a ngaih tih ,
61002016	amah te a thawlh dawngah toelthaam la awm . Amah kah marang lawng thlaanghing awl la cal tih te tawngha kah a ngau avawk oen a sai te a toeng sak .
61002017	He ang thlaang thli tah tui aka kak sawkca angla awm , thlipui lawng a yawng mailai tuikhu oen lo u ; Pathen lawng ahimi ham adungkoek yiinna khuiah huen a khueh pe sut poen .
61002018	Ahimi lawng oekthloenna oen awlpoei awlpit te a thui u tih , thawlhpalhna aka ceh taak pek thlaang thli te tuukna ham asoeng nawh pumsa hue-ngaihna te a hawna .
61002019	Ahimi lawng te thlaang thli te loeihna a dang ai tila awl akam pe u de , amami pateng rawkna moeiboe kah sal la awm u , thlaang he ahih aka taa thaihu kah sal la awm .
61002020	Thlaang he mami Bawipa oen thlawnkung Jesuh Khrih a mingna rang oen dilai tuiilehkap kalawng a loeih u coengah te dilai tuiilehna lawng a tuuk koep tih a taa atah te thlaang te lamhacuek kah lak ah ahukhueng ah the-eep ngai .
61002021	Doengna lawngpui te ming coengah ahimi a peek u aciim awlpeek te mel taak koep lak atah doengna lawngpui te ming nawh ngala kawinih ahimi ham theen ngaai sui de .
61002022	“ Ui lawngah a lawkk a caak koep ” tina awl oen “ Awk lawngah tui thluk coengah nawng a nelh koep ” tila a thui tatuk-awl soeng tangtang ti he ahimi lawng a tueng sak .
61003001	Ka lungna ka paya thli , tahe nangmi tengah ca kavan pat he voeihihna capat poen ni . Capat pahih bok dawngah ka ngaihna tah nangmi thinkaw khuiah poekna ciim awm sak hamla ni , tedawngah nangmi tengah he thaihu he kavan thui u .
61003002	Yan vengkah tawngha thlaangciim thli lawng a thui awl te oen nangmi kah celtuih hue teng kalawng nangmi teng peek la aka awm Bawipa oen thlawnkung tengkah awlpeek te na ming khuep u ham ka ngaih .
61003003	Lamhacuek ah nangmi lawng na ming u ham tah atue khawhin aboet ben ah ngoen tah a hingna te amami kah pumsa ngaihna lawng a uk thlaang khatsut law ai . Ahimi lawng nangmi te n'nuihna u vetih ,
61003004	“ Ka law koep ai ” tila awl a khueh de lah koen ? mela a awm kai ? mami kah Pahaam thli khaw duek boeih poen , tede soeprep boeih he dilai suen cuek veng kah a awm nooek angla ni a awm ! ” ti u ai .
61003005	Pathen lawng yan vengah a awl oen ah vaan oen dilai a suen ti he ahimi lawng aka ming nawh angla awm u . Dilai he tui khui kalawng tui oen a sai tih ,
61003006	te dilai ruem te tui toengtoeng tuiliw tui oen a phe .
61003007	Tede tahe ah aka awm vaan oen dilai he hai oen phe hamla Pathen lawng a awl oen a thlung hun ni . Pathen tula aka sak nawh thlaang thli awlcek tih phena khawhin veng ham te thli te a thlung hun .
61003008	Tede ka lungna ka paya thli , he thaihu pakhat he hilh u boel ! Bawipa huh atah hin at he kum thong khat angla awm tih kum thong khat he hin at angla awm .
61003009	Thlaang khatsut lawng a poek angla Bawipa he amah awlkamna soep sak ham a tat a hiing aih moenih , Nangmi te amah lawng n'reen u dawngah ni . Metihtiah ahih lawngtah khatca khaw phe ham ngaih nawh tih thlaang boeih lawng a thawlhna yut u seh ti he a ngaih .
61003010	Tecakhaw Bawipa Khawhin tah thlaanghuuen angla law ai . Te Khawhin atah vaan lawng vupaang awl oen auh ai , vaan khawhi kah aka awm boeih khaw ung vetih a phe boeih ai , dilai oen dilai dawng aka awm boeih te kawlkalh ah auh poen ai .
61003011	He tila thaihu boeih he phe ham a awm dawngah nangmi lawng me ang thlaang la na awm u lah ai ? Nangmi tah hingna aka ciim tih Pathen tengah pum aka pe thlaang la na awm u ham awm .
61003012	Vaan te ung tih phe la a awmna oen vaan khawhi te a lingsona oen atui la atleena khawhin Pathen Khawhin te ayuela law ai tila nangmi lawng na lamtoen u vengah he te tila awm hamla na yawm u ham awm .
61003013	Tede mami lawngtah Pathen awlkam vaan thaai oen dilai thaai doengna a awmna im te n'lamtoen u .
61003014	Tedawngah ka paya thli , te Khawhin te na lamtoen u vengah Pathen huh ah aka ciim tih cawttbauh kap ohla awm ham yawm u lang amah oen roeproeicala awm uh .
61003015	Mami lawng n'lungna maya Pawl lawng , Pathen kah peek cuihna te hawna oen nangmi tengah ca avan pat angla Bawipa lawng mami sawah kawdawna a khueh he tah mami he thlawn ham a ngaih dawngah atue atang avan soeng ni tila poek uh .
61003016	He kawng he a thut roekk ah a capat boeih boeih dawngah te he ni a thui . Ahih kah capat dawngah akawng alam khatsut tah yaakming ham rai tih cuihhoena aka khueh nawh oen kawthlawp thlaang thli lawngtah , Caciim dawngkah awl te atloetloe la a thui u angla te asoeng akam nawh la a thuicaih u . Tedawngah ahimi lawngah amami kah rawkna te a thoeng sak u .
61003017	Tede ka paya thli , nangmi lawngtah he kawng he na ming u poen . Tedawngah phung awl tula aka sak nawh thli kah thawlhpalhna lawng nangmi te m'mawt thawlh nawh ham oen ah namami kah aka cak paihuen dawng kalawng na thoeih na nawng u nawh ham ngaithuen uh .
61003018	Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lungvatna oen mingna dawngah roeng hang uh . Amah tengah ruep-awmna tah tahe kalawng ayoeyah awm hawn seh . Amen .
62001001	Acuekca veng kalawng aka awm tangte hingna Awl kawng te nangmi tengah ca oen kavan thut u . Te kawng te kaimi lawng ka yaak u , mik oen ka huh u tih ka kut oen ka tek u .
62001002	He hingna he huh thai la ava coengg vengah kaimi lawng ka huh u , tedawngah Pa oen aka awm haih tih mami tengah avan tueng sak dungyan hingna kawng te nangmi tengah kavan thui u .
62001003	Kaimi lawng ka huh u tih ka yaak u te nangmi tengah khaw kavan phawng u . Pathen oen a Capa Jesuh Khrih oen ah kaimi lawng ka khueh pawlneengna dawngah nangmi khaw na thuum thaina ham kaimi lawng ka huh tih ka yaak te nangmi tengah khaw kavan phawng u .
62001004	Kaimi kah awmngaih asoepna hamla he ca he kaimi lawng kavan thut u .
62001005	Tahe ah , a Capa teng kalawng ka yaak u tih nangmi tengah kavan phawng u awl tah he ni : Pathen tah aangna la awm tih ahih dawngah yiinna roeroe awm nawh .
62001006	Tecoengah mami lawng ahih oen pawlneengna ka khueh n'ti u tih yiinna khuiah ng'awm u atah mami tah awlkaa oen khawseh , saina oen khawseh , hoem awl ni n'thui u .
62001007	Tede ahih tah aangna la a awm angla mami lawng aangna ah ng'awm u atah pakhat oen pakhat pawlneengna mami lawng n'khueh u tih a Capa Jesuh thisen oen soeprep thawlhna kalawng mami n'silh poen .
62001008	Mami lawng thawlhna ka khueh nawh n'ti u atah m'mah oen mah he , thailatna u tih mami khuiah awltak awm nawh .
62001009	Tede mami lawng thawlhna boeih te Pathen tengah m'phawng u atah ahih tah a awlkam cak tih thaihu doeng a sai dawngah mami thawlhna boeih te khawdawp a ngaai vetih mami kah sai thawlh boeih te avan ciim sak ai .
62001010	Mami lawng ka thawlh nawh n'ti u atah Pathen te hoem thui la n'sai u tih amah awl te khaw mami khuiah awm nawh .
62002001	Ka ca ka nau thli nangmi lawng thawlhna na sai u nawh hamla he ca he kavan thut ; tede pakhat khat lawng thawlhna a sai hau atah , Pa , tengah mami yuengla aka bih ham thlaangdoeng Jesuh Khrih n'khueh u .
62002002	Metihtiah , Khrih amah roe he mami kah thawlh khawdawp ngaaina Luciik la awm tih mami kah thawlhna bueng nawh tih thlaang boeih kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai .
62002003	Mami lawng Pathen kah awlpeek te n'vai atah amah te m'ming u tite aciimla m'ming .
62002004	Thlaang pakhat khat lawng ahih te ka ming ti de , a awlpeek te a vai nawh atah te ang thlaang tah hoem aka thui tih ahih dawngah awltak awm nawh .
62002005	Tede , a-u khaw a awl te a vai atah Pathen kah lungna oen ahih te soep tangtang poen . Pathen oen mami pumkhatla ng'awm tite mingna tah he tila ni ,
62002006	a-u lawngkhaw Pathen oen pumkhatla ka awm a ti atah Jesuh Khrih angla awm van ham awm .
62002007	Ka lungna ka paya thli , nangmi tengah kavan thut awlpeek he athaai nawh ni ; acuekca kalawng nangmi lawng na khueh tangte awlpeek ruem te ni . Te awlpeek ruem te tah na yaak tangte awl te ni .
62002008	Tede nangmi tengla kavan thut awlpeek he athaai ni ; metihtiah he tah athaai ni tila asoengna tah Khrih ah huh la awm tih nangmi dawngah khaw huh la awm . Metihtiah yiinna tah khum tih aangna tangtang te aang poen .
62002009	A-u khaw aangna khuiah ka awm ti tih , a maya manau te a thina atah tahe toe ah yiinna khuiah awm hun .
62002010	A-u khaw a maya manau te a lungna atah aangna khuiah awm tih thlaangtloe thawlh sak ham ahih khuiah tu tehca khaw awm nawh .
62002011	Tede a-u khaw a maya manau te a thina atah yiinna khuiah awm hun ; yiinna khuiah yingyawi tih te yiinna lawng mik a pum pe sak dawngah meben la ka ceh ti khaw ming nawh .
62002012	Ka ca ka nau thli Khrih rang oen nangmi kah thawlhna te khawdawp a ngaai poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut .
62002013	Papa thli aw , acuekca kalawng aka awm ahih te na ming u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut . Cadawng caloe thli nangmi lawng Raaibawi te na taa u poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut .
62002014	Ka ca ka nau thli nangmi lawng Pa te na ming u poen dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan thut . Papa thli , acuekca kalawng aka awm ahih te na ming u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan pat . Cadawng caloe thli nangmi tah na tha a ra u dawngah nangmi tengah he ca he kavan pat . Pathen awl te nangmi khuiah awm tih Raaibawi te na taa poen .
62002015	Dilai oen dilai thaihu he khat khaw thintlawhna u boel . Dilai he na thintlawhna u atah Pa te na thintlawhna u nawh .
62002016	Dilai thaihu soeprep , pumsa ngaihna , thlaang lawng a huh tih a ngaih thaihu , he dilai dawngkah thaihu soeprep thlaang lawng a phoekthloerna khatca mai khaw Pa teng kah aka law thaihu nawh ni .
62002017	Dilai oen dilai thaihu thlaanghing lawng a ngaih he tah khumpel boeih , tede Pathen kawngaih aka sai tah dungyan hing ai .
62002018	Ka ca ka nau thli atue boetna yoeii poen ! Khrih kah raal law ai tila na yaak u ; tahe ah Khrih kah raal thli yahawh hlang thoeng poen , tedawngah atue boetna yoeii poen tila mami lawng m'ming u .
62002019	He thlaang thli he mami kah pawlneengna khuiah aka awm tangtang nawh ni , tedawngah mami he ahimi lawng n'ceh taak u poen ; ahimi te mami pawlneengna khuikah tangtang kawinih mami tengah awm poe van ai . Tede ahimi tah khatca khaw mami pawlneengna ah aka awm tangtang nawh ni tite aciimphanna ham mami he n'ceh tak u .
62002020	Tecakhaw nangmi tah Khrih lawngah Ciim Muithla te na sawah avan toi u poen , tedawngah nangmi boeih lawng awltak te na ming u .
62002021	Tedawngah nangmi tengah ca kavan thut he awltak te na ming u nawh dawngah nawh tih , nangmi lawng awltak te na ming u tih awltak dawng kalawng hoem awl va thoeng vai nawh tite nangmi lawngkhaw na ming u van dawngah ni .
62002022	Tetih atah a-u nuem hoem-thuikung ? Jesuh tah Messiah nawh ni tila aka thui te hoemthuikung la awm . Te ang thlaang te tah Khrih kah raal ni , Pa oen Capa te aka hoett thlaang ni .
62002023	A-u khaw Capa aka hoett tah Pa te khaw a hoett : A-u khaw Capa te aka do tah Pa te khaw a do .
62002024	Tedawngah nangmi lawng acuekca kalawng na yaak u awl te na kaw khuiah khueh uh . Te awl te na khueh u atah Capa oen Pa oen ah pumkhatla nangmi poe na awm u ai .
62002025	He tah Khrih amah roe lawng mami peek ham awl a kam dungyan hingna he ni .
62002026	Nangmi thailatna ham aka yawm hue kah akawng te nangmi tengah kavan thut .
62002027	Tede nangmi ham tah Khrih lawngah a Muithla te nangmi sawah avan toi poen . Nangmi kaw khuiah a Muithla te a awm atah , nangmi cang puei ham a-u khat khaw na ngoe u tlaih nawh . Metihtiah amah Muithla lawngah soeprep boeih kawng te nangmi n'cang puei u tih te cangpueina tah soeng taktak , aka thawlh nawh ni .
62002028	Ka ca thli , amah oen pumkhatla awm uh , metihtiah amah a tueng vengah mami tah raltheenna oen m'be u vetih amah a lawna Khawhin ah ayahtoela a teng kalawng thuh-elh u ham ngoe tlaih manawh .
62002029	Nangmi lawng Khrih tah thlaangdoeng tila na ming u ; tedawngah a-u khaw thaihu doeng aka sai tah Pathen kah a ca thli ni tite na ming u ham awm .
62003001	Pathen lawng ningmi n'lungna tangkiik he poek u lah ! A lungna tah bo tangkiik tih mami he Pathen amah kah Ca-anau ti poen , te tila te awm tangtang . He kawng ah ni dilai lawng mami he m'ming u nawh : Pathen khaw ming u nawh .
62003002	Ka lungna ka paya thli , tahe ah mami tah Pathen kah ca-anau la ng'awm u poen , tede hai ben ah mami he n'tu oen n'lawh u ai ti he tah m'ming thlan hun . Tede Khrih a law vengah Khrih amah oen n'lo u ai tila m'ming u , metihtiah ahih tah amah roeroe la te mami lawng n'huh ai .
62003003	A-u khaw Khrih ah he ang ngaiuepna aka khueh lawngtah Khrih aciimcaih van angla amah oen amah te aciimcaihla awm van .
62003004	A-u khaw thawlhna aka sai tah Pathen kah phungawl te a phe , metihtiah thawlhna tah phungawl phena he ni .
62003005	Khrih tah thawlhna ciim sak hamla law tite na ming u , ahih dawngah thawlhna roe awm nawh .
62003006	Tedawngah Khrih oen pumkhatla aka awm thlaang boeih lawngtah thawlhna sai taitu nawh ; tede a-u khaw thawlhna aka sai poepa lawngtah ahih te hu nawh tih aka ming nawh ni .
62003007	Ka ca thli , nangmi te a-u khat lawngkhaw n'thaina boel seh ! Khrih tah thlaangdoeng la a awm angla a-u khaw doengna aka sai boeih tah thlaangdoeng van ni .
62003008	A-u khaw thawlhna aka sai poepa tah Seitan thlaang ni , metihtiah Seitan tah acuek veng kalawng thawlhna a sai roe poen . He kawng ah he Seitan kah sai boeih te phe ham ni Pathen Capa tah a law .
62003009	A-u khaw Pathen kah ca-anau la aka awm tengah Pathen kah pumsa tah ahimi dawngah awm tih thawlhna te sai poepa nawh . Metihtiah Pathen tah ahimi kah ana Pa la a awm dawngah ahih lawng thawlhna sai taitu nawh .
62003010	Pathen kah ca-anau thli oen Seitan kah ca-anau thli a lawhna hih nawh noekna tah he tila ni : a-u khaw asoeng thaihu aka sai nawh boeih , thlaangtloe te aka lungna nawh boeih tah Pathen kah ca-anau thli nawh ni .
62003011	Acuekca veng kalawng na yaak u awl te tah he ni : mami pakhat oen khat lung u sih ti he ni .
62003012	Mami he Kain angla awm ham nawh ni ; ahih tah Raaibawi kah thlaang la awm tih a manau kheet Abel te a ngawn . N'tu ah Abel te Kain lawng a ngawn ? Metihtiah ahih lawng thaihu te athawlhla a sai , tede a manau lawngtah thaihu te adoengla a sai dawngah ni .
62003013	Tedawngah maya manau thli dilai thlaang lawng nangmi te n'thina u atah na kawpoek rai sak u boel .
62003014	Mami tah duekna n'ceh taak u poen tih hingna khuila n'kuun poen tite m'ming u ; te tila m'mingna tah mami lawng maya manau n'lungna dawngah ni . A-u khaw lungna aka khueh nawh tah duekna khuiah ni a awm hun .
62003015	A-u khaw a maya manau te a thina atah thlaang aka ngawn ni , thlaang aka ngawn thli tah a khuiah dungyan hingna awm nawh tite na ming u .
62003016	Lungna he me ang nuem tila m'mingna tah he tila ni : Khrih lawng mami hamla a hingna te a peek . Tedawngah mami lawngkhaw maya manau thli hamla hingna he peek van hamla awm !
62003017	Thlaanglen kuirang lawng a maya manau kah a voetna te a huh vengah a thinkaw a khaih khoep atah metila Pathen ka lungna a ti thai ai ?
62003018	Ka ca ka nau thli mami kah lungna he tah awlkaa hong mai ohla bii lawh thawhtatna dawngah aka tueng lungna taktak la a awm ham awm .
62003019	Tedawngah mami lawng awltak dawngah ka awm tite he tila m'ming u ai . Pathen haiah khaw ngaitluepla n'awm u ai .
62003020	Mami kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lawng mami te n'salphaam mai cakhaw Pathen tah mami kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lak ah bo ngaai tih ahih lawngtah soeprep boeih a ming tite mami lawng m'ming u .
62003021	Tedawngah ka lungna ka paya thli , mami he m'mah kah athetheen mingna thinkaw lawng n'salphaam nawh kawinih mami tah Pathen haiah raltheenna n'khueh u .
62003022	Mami lawng amah kah awlpeek te n'vai tih a kawngaih te n'sai dawngah mami lawng amah tengkah m'bih boeih te n'dang u .
62003023	Te a awlpeek tah a Capa Jesuh Khrih te mami lawng n'tangna tih mami tengah Khrih amah awlpeek angla pakhat oen khat n'lung u he ni .
62003024	A-u khaw Pathen kah awlpeek te aka vai tah Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen ah pumkhatla awm . Te tila mami tengah Pathen kah peek Muithla rang oen ah Pathen tah mami oen pumkhatla awm tite m'ming u .
62004001	Ka lungna ka paya thli , Muithla ka khueh tila aka thui boeih te tangna u boel , tede ahimi kah Muithla khueh te Pathen tengkah aka law tang aw tite noekdak uh . Metihtiah , tawngha rawlrap thli , yahawh hlang dilai han ah yingyo u poen .
62004002	Pathen benkah Muithla ni tila ming thaina ham tah he tila ni ; a-u khaw Jesuh Khrih tah thlaanghing pumsa la va law tila aka ti boeih lawngtah Pathen tengkah aka law Muithla te a khueh .
62004003	Tede , a-u khaw Jesuh kawngah te tila aka pawm nawh tah Pathen tengkah Muithla te khueh nawh . Ahih kah khueh muithla te tah Khrih raal tengkah ni ; nangmi lawng te ang te va law ai tila na yaak u poen tih tahe dilai dawngah awm poen .
62004004	Tede ka ca ka nau thli nangmi tah Pathen thlaang la na awm u tih tawngha rawlrap thli te na taa u poen , metihtiah nangmi khuiah aka awm Muithla tah dilai koeva la aka awm thlaang thli kah muithla lak ah ahu-aham a awm ngaai dawngah ni .
62004005	Te kah tawngha rawlrap thli lawngtah dilai thaihu thli kawng he a thui u tih dilai koeva la a awm u dawngah dilai lawng a awl te a hutung .
62004006	Tede mami tah Pathen thlaang ni . A-u khaw Pathen aka ming lawngtah kaimi awl he a hutung u , a-u khaw Pathen thlaang la aka awm nawh lawngtah kaimi awl he hutung u nawh . He tila he awltak Muithla oen thawlhpalhna muithla laklaw kah alakloena te mami lawng n'thui thai u .
62004007	Ka lungna paya thli , lungna tah Pathen teng kalawng a law dawngah mami pakhat oen pakhat lung u sih . A-u khaw lungna aka khueh tah Pathen kah a ca la awm tih Pathen te a ming u .
62004008	A-u khaw lungna aka khueh nawhtah Pathen te ming nawh , metihtiah Pathen tah lungna ni .
62004009	Pathen lawng a Capa khueh duen khat bueng te mami ham dilai la avan tuihna rang oen a lungna te a tueng sak tih ahih rang oen mami lawng hingna khuehna ham ni .
62004010	Lungna ti he tah he tila ni : mami lawng Pathen n'lungna te nawh ni , tede amah lawng mami he n'lungna tih mami kah thawlhna khawdawp ngaaina ham a Capa avan tuih he ni .
62004011	Ka lungna ka paya thli , he tih aih la mami he Pathen lawng n'lungna atah mami khaw pakhat oen khat lung u van ham awm .
62004012	Pathen te a-u lawngkhaw hu noek nawh , tede pakhat oen khat n'lung u atah Pathen tah mami oen pumkhatla awm tih a lungna tah mami dawngah soep .
62004013	A Muithla te mami m'peek poen dawngah mami tah Pathen oen pumkhatla ng'awm u tih amah khaw mami oen pumkhatla awm tite aciimphanla m'ming u .
62004014	Ana Pa lawngah a Capa te dilai thlawnkung la avan tuih te hukung oen thlaangtloe tengah thuikung tah kaimi ni .
62004015	A-u khaw Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tila a phawng atah ahih te Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen ah pumkhatla awm .
62004016	Te tila Pathen lawng mami n'lungna te kamami roeroe lawng ka ming u tih ka tangna u . Pathen tah lungna ni , a-u khaw lungna dawngah aka awm tah Pathen oen pumkhatla awm tih Pathen khaw ahih oen pumkhatla awm .
62004017	Awlcekna Khawhin ah mami lawng raltheenna khueh thaina hamla lungna tah mami dawngah avan soep sak poen ; he dilai ah mami hingna tah Jesuh kah hingna oen avai u dawngah te raltheenna te ng'khueh ai .
62004018	Lungna dawngah rihsakna awm nawh . Aka soep lungna lawngtah rihna boeih te biit aha-ata sak . Tedawngah rihsakna aka khueh thlaang tah lungna asoepbir te khueh thlan hun . Metihtiah rihna lawngtah dantatna oen bawngyawng haih .
62004019	Pathen lawng mami n'lungna lamha dawngah mami lawngkhaw n'lungna van .
62004020	A-u lawngkhaw Pathen ka lungna ti de a maya manau te a thina mangkhak atah hoem aka thui thlaang ni . Amik oen a huh maya manau pateng khaw a lungna nawh maiah ahih lawng a huh thai nawh Pathen te lungna thai manawh .
62004021	Khrih lawng mami tengah m'peek a awlpeek tah “ A-u khaw Pathen te a lungna atah a maya manau te lungna seh ” a ti te ni .
62005001	A-u khaw Jesuh Khrih tah Messiah ni tila aka tangna tah Pathen kah a ca ni . A-u lawngkhaw ana Pa te a lungna atah , ana Pa kah a ca thli te khaw a lungna .
62005002	Mami lawng Pathen kah ca-anau thli n'lungna tite mingna tah he tila ni ; mami lawng Pathen amah te n'lungna tih a awlpeek n'vai he ni .
62005003	Metihtiah mami lawng Pathen n'lungna tila thuingaihna tah a awlpeek thli n'vai he ni . Ahih kah awlpeek te tah mami ham rai aih mai nawh ,
62005004	metihtiah Pathen kah ca-anau boeih lawngtah dilai a taa thai . Mami lawng oengna rang oen dilai n'taa u .
62005005	A-u lawng dilai a taa thai ? Jesuh tah Pathen Capa ni tila aka tangna thlaang bueng lawngah a taa thai .
62005006	Jesuh Khrih tah amah kah Baptisma huhna tui oen a duekna thisen oen ah aka law ni . Ahih tah tui bueng oen law nawh tih pahih bok la tui oen thisen oen ah va law . He tah soeng tangtang tila Muithla amah roe lawng sausi a deeng , metihtiah Muithla tah awltak la a awm dawngah ni .
62005007	He kawngah sausi pathum awm .
62005008	Te tah Muithla , tui oen thisen he hue ni . He pathum hue lawng avan at rip la sausi a deeng u .
62005009	Mami lawngtah thlaang kah sausi deeng te n'tangna u ; tede Pathen kah sausi deeng tah a tha ra ngaai tih a Capa kawng te Pathen amah lawng sausi a deeng poen .
62005010	A-u khaw Pathen Capa aka tangna boeih lawngtah he sausi he lungbui khuiah a khueh ; tede a-u khaw Pathen te aka tangna nawh lawngtah Pathen lawng a Capa kawng a thui te a tangna nawh dawngah Pathen te hoemthuikung la a coengg sak .
62005011	Te sausi tah he ni : Pathen lawng mami he dungyan hingna m'peek poen tih te hingna tah a Capa dawngah awm .
62005012	A-u khaw a Capa te aka khueh lawngtah hingna te a khueh ; a-u khaw Pathen Capa te aka khueh nawh tah hingna te khueh nawh .
62005013	Pathen Capa aka tangna nangmi lawng dungyan hingna na khueh u te na mingna u ham he kah ca he nangmi tengah kavan thut .
62005014	Mami lawng amah kawngaih angla me ang thaihu khaw m'bih u atah a hutung tite aciimphanla m'ming u dawngah Pathen haiah raltheenna mami lawng n'khueh u .
62005015	Mami lawng amah tengah m'bih vengah a hutung tangtang tila m'ming u veng kalawng tah amah tengah m'bih boeih te khaw m'peek tila m'ming u baal .
62005016	Na maya manau lawng duekna toe aka mawt nawh koei thawlhna a sai te na huh u atah nangmi lawng Pathen tengah thangthui pe uh . Pathen lawng ahih te hingna a peek ai . He tah duekna toe aka pha sak nawh thawlhna aka sai thli ham ni . Tede duekna toe aka pha sak thawlhna awm , te kawngah te nangmi lawng Pathen tengah thangthui uh ka ti nawh .
62005017	Sai thawlh boeih he thawlhna ni , tede duekna toe aka pha sak nawh thawlhna awm .
62005018	Pathen kah ca-anau la aka awm lawngtah thawlhna sai poepa nawh tite m'ming u , metihtiah Pathen Capa lawng a hih te ading asuekla a khueh tih Raai Bawi lawngah raina pe thai nawh .
62005019	Dilai pum he Seitan kah ukna khuiah awm de mami tah Pathen kah thlaang la ng'awm tite m'ming u .
62005020	Pathen Capa tah va law tih Pathen tangtang te mami lawng mingna hamla mami tengah yaakmingna te m'peek poen tite m'ming u . A Capa Jesuh Khrih oen pumkhatla awmna dawngah Pathen taktak oen mami pumkhatla m'awm u . Ahih tah aka soeng Pathen taktak la awm tih dungyan hingna la awm .
62005021	Ka ca ka nau thli aka soeng nawh pathen thli teng kalawng tloeng u lah .
63001001	Ahaamca teng kalawng-Ka lungna hinyah koei Nutakhong oen a ca thli tengah : Kai bueng lawng kan lungna nawh tih awltak aka ming boeih lawngtah n'lungna ,
63001002	Metihtiah awltak tah mami khuiah awm tih mami tengah ayoeyah awm ai .
63001003	Pa Pathen oen Pa kah Capa Jesuh Khrih lawng lungvatna , reenna oen ngaimawngna te m'pe selang awltak oen lungna tah mami tengah awm yoeyah seh .
63001004	Pa lawngah mami awl m'peek angla na ca thli khatsut tah awltak dawngah a hing u te ka huh vengah ka awmngaih tangkiik .
63001005	Tedawngah ka lungna Nutakhong pakhat oen khat boeih lung u sih . He he awlpeek thaai kavan thut moe nih ; he tah acuekca veng kalawng yaak tangte awlpeek te ni .
63001006	He kah lungna tila ka thui ngaihna tah Pathen kah awlpeek te vai tih mami lawng hing ham awm ti ngaihna ni . Te awlpeek te tah acuekca veng kalawng boeih na yaak u poen angla lungna oen awm boeih uh ti he ni .
63001007	Jesuh Khrih tah thlaanghing pumsa la law tila aka tangna nawh thlaang , thlaangthaipalat thli dilai pum ah cet khonghak poen . Te ang thlaang te tah thlaangthaipalat oen Khrih kah raal ni .
63001008	Tedawngah nangmi lawng ngaiuepna oen na bi u te sungdeuh nawh ham oen ah na mami kah kutdo te asoepla na dang thaina ham ngaithuen lang awm uh .
63001009	A-u khaw Khrih kah cangpueina dawngah aka awm nawh tih te voel ah aka cet lawngtah Pathen te khueh nawh . A-u khaw cangpueina dawngah aka awm khak tah pahih bokla Pa oen Capa te a khueh .
63001010	Tedawngah a-u khaw pakhat khat nangmi tengah law tih he kah cangpueina he avan khuen nawh atah na im ah pah sak u boel ; “ Na sawah ngaimawngna awm seh ” tila khaw tina boel .
63001011	Metihtiah a sawah ngaimawngna awm seh tila aka ngaih tah ahih kah thaihu the saina dawngah bii bi puei la aka thuum van poen ni .
63001012	Nang tengah awl thui ham yahawh tangkiik awm de caram dawng catui cahaang oen ka thut nawh vetih mami awmngaih kawhoena asoepna ham ah nangmi oen pumpakla awlthui ham kamyin la nangmi teng law ham ka cai .
63001013	Na lungna na nau kah a ca thli lawng nang te n'toei u .
64001001	Ahaamca teng kalawng-Ka lungna Kaia , ataktangla ka lungduet tengah :
64001002	Ka lungna ka puei , soeprep boeih te anepnoeila a awmna ham oen sadingla na awm thaina ham ka thangthui . Muithla ben ah sadingla na awm tila ka ming .
64001003	Nang tah awltak ben ah ueppangla na awm tih awltak dawngah na awm yoeyah tila khatsut Khrihca maya manau thli a law u vengah avan thui u tih ka awmngaih tangkiik .
64001004	Ka ca thli te awltak dawngah awm u tila ka yaak thloei ah kai awmngaih sak tare ngai atloe awm nawh .
64001005	Ka lungna ka puei , Nang tah na pueipaw Khrihca thli ham Bii na bina ah ahimi mingtung mingnawh mai ham khaw ueppang tangtang la na awm .
64001006	Nang kah lungna kawng te ahimi lawng he kah Khrihcabu tengah a thui u poen . Ahimi khawlawng la poe a cehna u ham Pathen kah kawtlaakla bawmcem u de .
64001007	Ahimi lawng Khrih kah bii bina ah khawlawng ceh a tongcuek u vengah aka oeng nawh thli tengah bawmcemna thaihu khat khaw lawh ohla khawlawng cet u .
64001008	Tedawngah ahimi kah awltak bii he aka bi puei thlaang la awm van ham mami Khrihca thli lawng khaw he ang thlaang hue he tah bawmcem ham awm .
64001009	Khrihcabu tengah ca atoica kavan thut ; tede ahimi kah mawtkung la awm ham aka ngaih Diotrifi lawngtah ka awlthui he n'tu la khaw ngaai manawh .
64001010	Tedawngah kai ka law atah a sai thaihu boeih oen mami kawng a thui boeih te oen a hoem thui boeih te ka daih pe badai . Tecoengah he bueng muehla Khrihca maya manau thli a law ah khaw ahih lawng do nawh , ahimi te do ham aka ngaih thli te khaw a khang pe tih Khrihcabu khui kalawng ahimi te hek hamla a yawm mangkhak .
64001011	Ka lungna ka puei , athe thaihu te oett boel lang atheen thaihu te oett lah . A-u khaw thaihu theen aka sai tah Pathen thlaang la awm ; A-u khaw thaihu the aka sai tah Pathen te hu nawh .
64001012	Demetrias kah theenna he thlaang tawm lawng a thui ; awltak roe lawng ahih kah theenna he a thui . Mami lawngkhaw atheenna te n'thui u tih kai lawng ka thui he soeng tila na ming u .
64001013	Nang tengah awl thui ham yahawh tangkiik awm , tede caram dawng catui cahaang oen thut ham ka ngaih nawh .
64001014	Nangmi te ayuela huh ham ka ngaih , tevengah pumpakla mami lawng awl n'thui u badai .
64001015	Nangmi tengah ngaimawngna awm hawn seh . Kaimi kah paya boeih te pumpakla rip van toei .
65001001	Jesuh Khrih kah tuihyoeihthlaang oen Jeem kah manau Juda lawng Pathen lawngah a khue thlaang-thli , Jesuh Khrih lawng a thlipdah tih Pa Pathen kah lungna khuiah aka awm thli tengah :
65001002	Reenna , ngaimawngna oen lungna tah asoepbirla nangmi kah koeva la awm hawn seh .
65001003	Ka lungna ka paya thli , mami lawng n'dang rip thlawnna kawng he nangmi tengah ca oen thut hamla ka yawm . Pathen lawng a thlaang thli tengah vaikhatla khoekkoeng ham a peek oengna dawngah acakla pai ham nangmi tengah ca thut pahoei tih thaphawh ham ka poek .
65001004	Metihtiah Pathen n'tu la aka sak nawh thlaang khatsut ming mai muehla mami tim ah ahuepla va kuun u tih amami kah cuk-halhna te thlipdahna ham Pathen kah lungvatna kawng awlthang te akhuppalet la a thui u tih mami kah pakhat bueng bawimanghai oen Bawipa la aka awm Jesuh Khrih te a hoett u . He ang thlaang thli tah dan a tat ai tila caciim lawngah aruem veng kalawng a thui oepsoeh poen .
65001005	He ang thli boeih he na ming u poen de , Bawipa lawng Israel thlaang thli he metila Iyipt ram kalawng vai khat tah a loeih sak tih , tede hukhueng atah aka tangna nawh thlaang thli a duek sak boeih te ming sak koep ham ka ngaih .
65001006	Amami kah awmna huen a hoett tih , amami kah khuehtoen saithaina ari amawng khuiah aka awm nawh vanthlaang thli te poek u lah : Pathen lawng awlcekna Khawhin pui ah ahimi te dantatna peek ham dungyan thiirui oen a piin tih yiinna khuiah a khueh .
65001007	Sodom oen Gomorrah oen ah a tengvaai kah khawpui thli , te kah aka awm thlaang thli lawngkhaw vanthlaang thli angla thawlh u tih hutaa tawngpa thawlhna , asoeng nawh hutaa puei oen , tawngpa puei oen ah a thawlh u te poek uh : Ahimi kah dungyan hai dantat patang khang te thlaang boeih ham ngaithuenna la awm .
65001008	Tetih toengtoengla , tahe kah thlaang thli lawngkhaw mang ka man ti u tih amami pum dawngah thawlhna a sai u ; ahimi lawng Pathen kah aana te a hadalhna tih vaan asawsang kah ruep-awm thli te a thuitheet u .
65001009	Vanthlaang ukkung Maikal lawng pateng he tila sai nawh . Mosi rawkk te a-u lawng a lawh ai tila Seitan oen oelhtaih u tih a tawh athaam u vengah awlthe awlkha oen Seitan te Maikal lawng tapvoep ngam nawh , tede “ Bawipa lawng nang ng'ho ” a tina .
65001010	Tede he kah thlaang thli lawngtah amami kah yaakming nawh pakhat khat te the a phoei thil u ; ramsa angla amami kah thang puei cuihna oen a ming u thaihu thli lawngah ahimi te a phe u poen .
65001011	Ahimi ham khawmap tangkiik ! Kain kah lawngpui te ahimi lawng a vai u poen . Tangka ngaih dawngah Balaam kah thawlh saina te ang van ah te amami oen amami phuum u . Korah kah ceem raal thawh angla tho u tih ahih angla phe u boeih poen .
65001012	Ahimi lawng yahtaal pawk-arh la a caak a awk u tih nangmi kah lungna poeibuh veelna ah aka ciim nawh muenmawi oen lo u . Amami bueng ham te a poek u . Ahimi tah yilh lawng a yawng mailai khawtlantui aka awm nawh khawmai oen lo u . Atue atang ah pateng khaw aka thaih nawh thingkung thli oen lo u , ayung ruila phuk bangtlang tih aka duek roepsoet thingkung oen lo u .
65001013	Ahimi tah tuitunlii kah tuiphu oen lo u , ahimi kah yahpawhna thli te tuihawm angla pho . Ahimi tah aka cet mailai aisi oen lo u tih ahimi hamla Pathen lawng adungkoek yiinna ah dungyan huen a khueh pe poen .
65001014	Adam kalawng a pasarihna cadil Enok lawngah ahimi kawng te yan veng ka lawng he tila a thui oepsoeh poen :
65001015	“ Thlaang boeih te awlcek hamla , Pathen tula ka sak nawh thlaangthawlh boeih oen Pathen tula sak ohla a sai thawlhna boeih oen ah Pathen te tula sak ohla saringrup awl oen asal aphaamna boeih sawah dantat hamla Bawipa tah amah kah aciim vanthlaang toeklek toekna yahawh oen law ai ” tila ti .
65001016	He thlaang thli lawng caitoek khuep u tih thlaangtloe te a theet u ; amami kah athe kawngaih te a vai u ; amami oen amami te pawmsang u tih amami ngaihna dang ham tah thlaangtloe te thluethlue a koeh u .
65001017	Tede , Ka paya thli , mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah celtuih thli lawng n'hu vengah nangmi tengah avan thui u te hilh u boel .
65001018	Ahimi lawng avan thui tah “ Atue boetna khawhin apha veng atah nangmi nuihbu kamring la aka thui thlaang thli , Pathen te tula sak ohla amami kawngaih aka vai thlaang law ai , ” tila a thui te ni .
65001019	He ang thlaang thli he tah pekbona saikung amami kah pumsa ngaihna oen aka piin u tih Muithla aka khueh nawh thlaang thli ni .
65001020	Tede ka paya thli , nangmi tah namami kah aciim oengna dawngah namami oen namami tawm athap patoeng uh . Aciim Muithla tharana oen thangthui uh .
65001021	Mami Bawipa Jesuh Khrih lawng reenna rang oen dungyan hingna m'peek ham te na ring u van angla Pathen kah lungna dawngah awm uh .
65001022	Uepvoetna aka khueh thlaang thli tengah reenna khueh uh ;
65001023	Hai khuikah thlaang thli te rot u langtah thlawn uh ; thlaangtloe tengah te rihna oen reenna khueh uh , tede ahimi kah pumsa ngaihna thawlh noknakna himbai te tah thina uh .
65001024	Nangmi na tlim nawh hamla aka doen thai , nangmi thawlhna a ciing sak tih awmngaihna oen amah Bawilen ruep-awmna haiah kuun thaina pekung ;
65001025	Mami kah Bawipa Jesuh Khrih rang oen pakhat bueng la aka awm Pathen , mami thlawnkung sawah acuekca kalawng khawseh , tahe ah khawseh ruep-awmna , tharana oen saithaina aana tah dungyan toela awm hawn seh . Amen .
66001001	He cabu he tah Jesuh Khrih lawng a phawng thaihu kawng thutna ni . He awlphawng tah aka thoeng yue ham koei te a tuihyoeihthlaang thli tengah tueng sak ham Pathen lawng a peek . Khrih lawngah he thaihu thli he a tuihyoeihthlaang Johan te ming sak hamla vanthlaang te a tuih tih ,
66001002	Johan lawng a huh thaihu boeih te a thui . Pathen tengkah awlthang oen Jesuh Khrih lawng a phawng awltak tah he ni .
66001003	He cabu aka tae thli tah a kam awm phoeih tih tawngha kah awlthang awl aka hutung thli oen he cabu khuiah a thut he aka vai tah yotheen a dawng u . Metihtiah he thaihu boeih a thoengna ham atue tah yoeii tengkek poen .
66001004	Johan teng kalawng , Asia ram khuiah aka awm Khrihcabu pasarih tengah : Aka awm lii , aka awm poen tih aka awm poe ham koei Pathen teng kalawng amah ngawlhcoen hai kah Muithla pasarih teng kalawng ,
66001005	duekna kalawng lamhacuekla aka tho , thincak sausi la aka awm , dilai sengpahrang boeih ukkung la aka awm Jesuh Khrih teng kalawng lungvatna oen ngaimawngna tah nangmi tengah awm hawn seh . Mami n'lungna tih a duekna oen mami he thawlhna kalawng aka loeih sak tih ,
66001006	ana Pa oen Pathen kah bii te bi thai ham mami he sengpahrang la khawseh Khawsoeih la khaw seh aka saikung Jesuh Khrih tengah ruep-awmna oen huham tharana tah dungyan toe awm yoeyah hawn seh ! Amen .
66001007	Bueh lah ! ahih tah muui dawng kalawng va rum thuk ! thlaang boeih lawng a huh ai , amah te cai oen aka thun hue lawngkhaw a huh u ai , Dilai sawkah thlaang boeih lawng rungrap u ai . Te tila awm roe hawn seh .
66001008	“ Kai tah lamhacuek , oen hukhuengkoek ni tila aka awm lii , aka awm coeng poen tih aka awm poe ham koei Thara koek Bawipa Pathen lawng a thui .
66001009	Kai tah nangmi kah maya Johan ni . Jesuh kah hubang la ka awm van angla a Ram khuiah aka awm hue kah patang khangna aka ming haih na puei na paw van ni . Pathen kah awl oen awltak , Jesuh lawng a phawng te ka thui dawngah Kai he Patmos tuisanglak ah n'khueh .
66001010	Bawipa Hin ah Muithla lawng ka sawah n'tlaak thil tih pengsara awl angla angaihhlangla aka riing awl te ka hu ben ah ka yaak .
66001011	Te awl lawng , “ Na huh thli he ca oen thut lang na thut cabu te he kah khawpui pasarih Efesa , Samarna , Perkamum , Tiatira , Sardis , Filadelfia oen Laudisia ah aka awm Khrihcabu hue tengah pat peh , " tila a thui .
66001012	Te tila awl aka thui te huh hamla ket ka maang tih ka bueh vengah sui haivangna pasarih ka huh .
66001013	Te haivangna pasarih laklaw ah thlaanghing oen aka lo u pakhat pai , a khowsai toe aka pha baidung te a bai tih a raang dawngah sui cihin oen yeen u .
66001014	Ahih kah sam tah tuumul angla rawsawng angla bawk tih a mik tah hai angla alh ;
66001015	a khow rawi tah hai dawng a thloei ruhum tuicii , a thuut heet angla thlupthlup pang tih a awl tah liksaituitlaak tuenn awl angla riing .
66001016	Ahih lawng a bantang kut ah aisi pasarih a pawm tih a kaa dawng kalawng voeivaang aka hatt samsen va thoeng . A mik-hai tah hingthun khawmik angla aang .
66001017	Ahih te ka huh vengah thlaangduek angla a khowkung ah ka tlim . A bantang kut te ka sawah a tloeng tih , “ Rih boel ! Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhuengkoek la ka awm :
66001018	Kai tah aka hing ni ! Kai tah ka duek , tede tahe ah kai tah dungyan toe yoeyahla ka hing poen . Kai lawng duekna oen thlaangduek khaaw celkhui sawah ukna aana ka khueh .
66001019	Tedawngah nang lawng na huh thaihu boeih tahe ah aka awmlii thaihu thli oen hai ben ah aka thoeng ham koei thaihu thli pahih bok la thut lah .
66001020	Ka bantang kut dawngah na huh aisi pasarih oen sui haivangna pasarih kah thuingaihna awlhuep tah he tila awm : aisi pasarih hue he tah Khrihcabu thli pasarih kah vanthlaang tih haivangna pasarih tah Khrihcabu pasarih ni .
66002001	“ Efesa khaaw , Khrihcabu tengah he tila thut lah : A bantang kut ah aisi pasarih aka pawm tih sui haivangna pasarih tim ah aka yingyawi kah awl te tah he tila ni .
66002002	Kai lawng na sai boeih te ka ming ; Metila thatlawh boep la bii na bi tih kawdaw oen na awm te khaw ka ming . Nangmi lawng thlaangthe sawah Khawdawp na ngaai thai nawh te ka ming tih celtuih la awm nawh de celtuih la ka awm aka ti te na noek na dak u tih , thlaangthaipalat ni tila na huh u te ka ming .
66002003	Nang tah na kaw daw , kai kawngah nang lawng patang na khang te na kaw boet nawh .
66002004	Tede ka kaw a lawna nawh pakhat awm : nang lawngah acuekca kah nan lungna angla tahe ah nan lungna tlaih nawh poen .
66002005	Metihtlukla adangla na tlaak thuk te poek lah ! Na thawlhna te yut u lang acuekca kah na sai angla te sai lah . Nangmi lawng na thawlhna te na yut u nawh atah Nangmi tengla ka law vetih nangmi kah haivangna te huen tloe la kavan pawng poen ai .
66002006	Tede koeh ham pakhat tah awm : Nikolas hubang hue lawng a sai u te kai lawng ka thina van angla nangmi lawngkhaw na thina u van .
66002007	“ Tedawngah yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Muithla lawng Khrihcabu hue tengah a thui he ya hawn seh ! “ Taakung la aka awm thli tah Pathen dum khuikah hingna thingthaih te caak thaina nawl ka peek ai ” ti .
66002008	“ Smarna khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah : “ Lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek la aka awm ; duek tih aka tho koep kah awl uen tah he tila awm .
66002009	Patang raina na tawng te ka ming ; na khawdeng te khaw ka ming , tede nang tah kuirang tangtang ! Judah thlaang nawh de , Judah thlaang la ka awm aka ti hue lawng na thaang a the sak u te ka ming ; Ahimi tah Seitan kah thlaang ni !
66002010	Nang lawng patang khang ham koei me ang khaw rih boel . Hutung lah ! Seitan lawng nangmi noekdakna ham thlaangvaang te thong ah a thlaak ai ; nangmi kah patang khangna te hin ha khuiah boet ai . Duek toela kai ham uep-awm la awm lah ; taana kutdo la hingna kan pe ai .
66002011	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawng atah Muithla lawngah Khrihcabu thli tengah a thui awl he ya hawn seh ! “ Taakung la aka awm thli tah voeihih duekna kalawng loeih poen ai , ” ti .
66002012	Perkamum khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah : “ He awl tah voei vang aka hatt samsen khuehkung kah awl ni .
66002013	Ame huen ah na awm tite ka ming ; Seitan lawng a bawi ngawlhcoen a khuehna huen ni . Ka sawah uep-awm la na awm dawngah kai hamla uep-awm sausi la aka awm Antipas te Seitan a awmna huen ah a ngawn u vengah pateng kai nan oengna te na hoett nawh .
66002014	Tede na sawah ka kaw a lawna nawh thaihu ayawlca awm : te tah nangmi tim ah Balaam kah cangpueina aka vai thlaang khatsut awm ; Israel thlaangphun te thawlhna khuila mawt ham kutsai-muei thawthuengna caak awkk te caak ham hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen ah thawlh hamla Balaam lawngah Balak te a cang puei .
66002015	Tetih van angla Nikolas kah cangpueina aka vai thlaang khatsut nangmi tim ah awm .
66002016	Tedawngah tahe ah thawlhna yut u loeih ! Thawlhna na yut u nawh atah nang tengah ka law yue vetih te thlaang hue te ka kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng samsen oen ka tloek ai .
66002017	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh ! “ Taakung la aka awm thli tah thuh elh la aka awm manna takawi te ka peek ai . Ahimi boeih te lungto abawk pakhat ah rip ka peek ai , te dawngkah a thut miing athaai te a-u lawngkhaw thuingaihna ming nawh vetih te lungto aka dang hue bueng lawng ni a ming ai .
66002018	Tiatira khaaw Khrihcabu kah van-thlaang tengah he tila thut lah ! “ Pathen Capa , a mik rawi hai angla alh tih a khow rawi tah ruhum thuut heet angla thlup aka pha kah awl uen tah he tila awm .
66002019	Kai lawng na sai boeih te ka ming . Lungna na khueh te ka ming . Acuek vengkah lak ah atlawh ngaaila tahe ah na bi te khaw ka ming .
66002020	Tede na sawah ka kaw a lawna nawh tah he ni : amah oen amah Pathen kah celtuih la ka awm aka ti hutaa Jezebel te nang lawng na thlahphaam sut te ni . Ahih lawng a cangpueina rang oen ka thlaang thli te hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen kutsaimuei thli thawthuengna caak awkk te caak hamla a mawt thawlh .
66002021	A thawlhna yut ham atue ka peek , tede ahih lawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna kalawng thawlh yut ham ngaih nawh .
66002022	Tedawngah ahih te ihkhun dawngah ka voeih sut vetih te ah te ahih oen samphaih haih thlaang thli te anat ngaaila patang a khang ai . Ahimi lawngah te hutaa oen athe thaihu a sai te a yut u nawh atah tahe roe ah patang ka khang sak ai .
66002023	Ahih kah a hubang hue te khaw ka ngawn boeih vetih tevengah kai tah thlaang boeih kah poekna oen kawngaihna mingkung tila Khrihcabu boeih lawng a ming ai . Nangmi pakhat rip he na saina taring ah kan thung ai .
66002024	“ Tede Tiatira khaaw kah thlaang-tloe hue lawngtah athe cangpueina te na vai u nawh tih thlaangtloe hue lawngah Seitan kah awlhuep dung a ti u te khaw na cang u nawh . Nangmi te atloe thalrih khatca khaw phueih sak ham ka ngaih nawh .
66002025	Tede na khueh u tangte te kai ka law toe acakla phoeih uh .
66002026	Taakung la aka awm thlaang oen ka kaw ngaihna aboet toe aka sai thlaang tah a Pa teng kah ka dang saithaina aana te ka peek van ai , thlaangphun tloe sawah thiicungpoelh oen uk ham oen ah ahimi te dilai am angla adiik anuui la de ham ah ukna aana te khaw ka peek ai . Aisi tumpa khaw ahimi te ka peek ai .
66002029	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl te ya hawn seh . ” a tina .
66003001	Sardis khaaw Khrihcabu kah van-thlaang tengah he tila thut lah : “ Pathen kah Muithla pasarih oen aisi pasarih khuehkung kah awl tah he tila awm . Nang lawng na sai te ka ming ; nang tah aka hing angla na thaang theen , tede nang tah na duek tite ka ming !
66003002	Tedawngah hinghang langtah na khueh hun thaihu thli te a duek boeih taktak thlan ah na tha thlue sak koep uh . Nang lawng na sai thaihu te ka Pathen haiah soep thlan hun tite ka ming .
66003003	Tedawngah nang n'cang puei tangte thli oen na yaak tangte thli te hilh boel ; te thli te vai langtah na thawlhna yut loeih . Nang lawng na hinghang nawh atah thlaanghuuen angla na teng ka law vetih ka lawna atue pateng na ming manawh .
66003004	Tede Sardis khaaw ah aka awm thlaang ayawl lawngtah na himbai te aciimcala na khueh u hun . Himbai bawk bai oen kai oen ah n'yingyawi haih u ai .
66003005	Taakung la aka awm hue lawngtah he ang himbai bawk a bai u vetih ka thlaang ni ka tina ai .
66003006	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh !
66003007	“ Filadelfia khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah : “ He awl he tah aka ciim tih ataktang la aka awm tengkah awl ni . Ahih tah Devid kah caabi tukung la awm tih , ahih lawng thawhka a awng veng atah a-u lawngkhaw khai khoep thai nawh vetih ahih lawng thawhka a khaih khoep atah , a-u lawngkhaw awng thai manawh .
66003008	Nang lawng na sai te ka ming ; nang lawng tha-awm tharana yoehca ni na khueh de kai lawng kan cang puei te na vai tih uep-awm la kai ham na awm te kan ming . Na haiah thawhka pakhat kavan awng poen , te tah a-u lawngkhaw khai khoep thai manawh .
66003009	Hutung lah ! Judah thlaang la ka awm ti u tih Judah thlaang tak nawh hoem thui hue te tah Seitan kah thlaang thli te nangmi haiah kavan law sak vetih na khow kungah ka buekuep sak ai . Nang kan lungna te ahimi boeih lawng a ming ai .
66003010	Thinsan kawdaw oen ueh hamla awl kan peek te na vai u dawngah , dilai sawkah thlaang boeih noekdakna hamla dilai dawngah aka law ham koei patang raina atue ah kan loeih sak ai .
66003011	Kai tah ka law yue ai . Nang kah taana kutdo te a-u lawngkhaw avan rot nawh ham na khueh thaihu te atheenla kuemkawl uh .
66003012	Taakung la aka awm tah ka Pathen kah tempal bok-im tuung la ka liing vetih ahih lawng tempal bok-im te metuek vengah khaw thoeih taak manawh . Vaan kah ka Pathen teng kalawng aka law , Jerusalem thaai ka Pathen kah khawpui miing thaai oen ah ka Pathen kah a miing te ahih pum dawngah ka thut ai . Ahih pum dawngah ka miing a thai te khaw ka thut baal ai .
66003013	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui he ya hawn seh !
66003014	“ Laudisia khaaw Khrihcabu kah vanthlaang tengah he tila thut lah : “ Pathen lawng a suen thaihu boeih kah akungcuek la aka awm tih uep-awm oen ah ataktang sausi la aka awm Amen teng kah awl uenna tah he tila awm .
66003015	Nang lawng na sai boeih te ka ming ; Nang tah ading khaw na ding nge nawh tih aling khaw na ling nge nawh te kan ming . Nang he ading tihnawhtah aling pakhat khat la na awm ham ka ngaih !
66003016	Tede nang tah aling khaw na ling nge nawh , ading khaw na ding nge nawh tih pawl-oep la na awm dawngah nang tah ka kaa khui kalawng kan tha poen ai !
66003017	Nang lawngah , “ Kai tah ka bawi ka len tih ka voetna awm nawh ; ka ngoe boeih te ka khueh ’ , na ti . Tede nang tah metihtlukla na khawdeng tih reen kap la na awm te na ming nawh ! Nang tah na khawdeng , atliing ayaal la na awm tih na mik pum de lah koen .
66003018	Tedawngah bawilen kuirang taktang la na awmna ham kai teng kah sui tuiciil te lai hamla poekna theen kan peek . Atliing ayaal yaraula na awm te khukdahna ham oen ah na buen ham khaw , na mik a tuengna ham miksii te khaw lai baal .
66003019	Kai lawngtah ka lungna thlaang boeih te ka toel ka thaam tih dan ka tat . Tedawngah na tha thlue sak lang na thawlhna yut lah .
66003020	Hutung lah ! Thawhka ah ka pai tih ka khooek ; a-u lawngkhaw ka awl a yaak tih thawh a awng atah , a im khuila ka kuun vetih ahih oen buh ka caak haih vetih ahih khaw kai oen ah buh a caak haih van ai .
66003021	Kai tah taakung la ka awm tih tahe ah a Pa kah a bawingawlhcoen tengah ka ngawlh van angla , taakung la aka awm thli te ka bawingawlhcoen sawah kai oen haih ngawlhna nawl te ka peek ai .
66003022	“ Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah Khrihcabu thli tengah Muithla lawng a thui awl he ya hawn seh ! ”
66004001	He coengah atloe huhthlaam ka huh tih vaan ah thawhka aka awng u pakhat te ka huh . Acuek vengkah ka yaak tih awl akavan thui pengsara awl tuen angla aka riing awl lawngah , “ He la he law hang lah , he coengah aka thoeng ham koei te kan huh sak ai . ” tila a thui .
66004002	Kawlkalh ah Muithla lawng pahoei ng'awm puei tih vaan ah bawi ngawlhcoen pakhat awm , te ngawlhcoen dawngah thlaang pakhat ngawl .
66004003	Ahih kah mik-hai tah lungto phutlo jaspa oen karnelian angla aang tih bawi-ngawlhcoen tengvaai ah te emaral lungto araawng angla aka awm malpacung te awm .
66004004	Te kah bawingawlhcoen te atloe bawi ngawlhcoen pakul palii lawng a veel , te kah bawingawlhcoen dawngah himbai bawk a bai tih suilumuek aka muek ahaamca pakul palii ngawl u .
66004005	Bawi-ngawlhcoen dawng kalawng khaw thlappha tih khawhumm awl oen rekk tlaak awl va thoeng . Bawingawlhcoen haiah haithoei pasarih aka vang te awm tih te haithoei tah Pathen Muithla pasa-rih ni .
66004006	Bawingawlhcoen haiah tuikhal angla ciil tih thlalang tuilii oen aka lo u te awm . Te kah bawingawlhcoen a teng avai ah ramsa hing palii lawng a veel khoep tih te ramsa hing tah a hu a haiah a mik hooeng la awm .
66004007	Ramsa hing lamhacuek pakhatna te tah sathueng oen lo u , apahihna tah vaitaw oen lo u tih a pathumna te tah thlaanghing mik-hai oen aka lo u mik-hai a khueh tih apaliina te tah aka sawng lii tuhuum oen lo u .
66004008	Ramsa hing palii boeih lawngah phe paruk rip a khueh u tih akhui oen adau ah mik hooeng la betoet . Ahimi lawngah yiin oen daai toeng tlaih ohla : “ Aciim , aciim , aciim tah Bawilen koek Bawipa Pathen ni , Ahih tah aka awm poen , aka awm lii oen aka awm poe ham koei ni , ” tila laa a sak u .
66004009	Ramsa hing palii lawng bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl tih dungyan dungyan toe aka hing te ruep-awmna , hinyahna oen awmngaihna oen ah a thangpawm u .
66004010	Te tila a thangpawm u vengah ahaamca pakul palii lawng bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl haih te buekuep u tih dungyan dungyan toe aka hing te a bok u . A suilumuek thli te bawi-ngawlhcoen haiah a tloeng u tih ,
66004011	“ Kaimi kah Bawipa oen Pathen ! Nang lawngah ruep-awmna , hinyahna oen huham tharana te dang hamla tuueng ta-ngak , Metihtiah soeprep thaihu he nang lawng na sai tih na kawngaih angla , te thli te na awm sak tih na hing sak , ” tila a thui u .
66005001	Bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl lawng a bantang kut ah cayaawl pakhat a pawm te ka huh . Te cayaawl tah khatben khatbang ah ca a thut boeih tih tacik pasarih oen a heen .
66005002	Tecoengah tha aka ra tangkiik vanthlaang pakhat ka huh tih te vanthlaang lawng , “ A-u nuem he thawhcang heen aka phe tih cayaawl thlam ham aka tuueng ? ” tila angaihhlangla a paang awl te ka yaak .
66005003	Tede te cayaawl te thlam tih akhuiben bueh ham koei vaan ah khaw , dilai dawngkhaw , dilai dangah khaw a-u khatca khaw awm nawh ,
66005004	Te cayaawl te aka thlam ham oen akhuiben aka bueh ham khatca khaw a huh u nawh dawngah thloekthloek ka rap .
66005005	Tevengah ahaamca pakhat lawng , “ Rap boel , Bueh lah ! Judah phun khuikah Sathueng , Devid cadil aka lenduet lawngah taana a khueh poen tih thawhcang pasarih te a phe thai tih cayaawl te a thlam thai . ” tila avan thui .
66005006	Tecoengah tuuca pakhat bawingawlhcoen alungkir ah pai tih ramsa hing palii oen ahaamca thli lawng a veel khoep te ka huh . Te tuuca tah ngawn tangte angla awm . Te tuuca lawng ki pasarih oen mik pasarih a khueh tih ; te mik pasarih tah dilai pum ah tuih la aka awm Pathen Muithla pasarih te ni .
66005007	Tuuca lawng cet tih bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl kah bantang ben kut ah a pawm cayaawl te a lawh .
66005008	Te tila a lawh vengah te ramsa hing palii hue oen ahaamca hue pakul palii tah tuuca haiah buekuep u . Pakhat rip lawngah tingtoeng pakhat rip a khueh u tih riimtuui oen ah aka bepir sui boengloeng pakhat rip a pawm u , te riimtuui tah Pathen thlaang thli kah thangthuina ni .
66005009	Ahimi lawng , “ Nang tah cayaawl te lawh ham oen tacik te phe tih thlam hamla na tuueng roe . Metihtiah n'ngawn u tih nang kah Luciik duekna oen thlaangphun soeprep , awlcawm awlcee , ram tawm oen namtawm te Pathen ham na lai poen .
66005010	Nang lawng ahimi te mami kah Pathen bii aka bi ham khawsoeih la khaw sengpahrang la khaw na sai poen dawngah ahimi lawng dilai he a uk u poen ai , ” tila laa thaai te a sak u .
66005011	Tecoeng ka bueh koep vengah vanthlaang toeklek toekna nawh kah awl te ka yaak ! Ahimi lawngah bawingawlhcoen te khaw , ramsa hing palii oen ah ahaamca hue te a veel tih pai u ,
66005012	angaihhlangla laa a sak u tih : “ A ngawn u Tuuca lawngah Huham tharana oen kuirangna , Cuihna oen tharana , hinyahna oen ruep-awmna oen ah thangpawmna tah dang hamla tuueng ta-ngak , ” ti u .
66005013	Tecoengah vaan ah aka awm boeih oen dilai dawngah khaw , dilai dangkah aka awm boeih , tuitunlii ah aka awm boeih oen Khawhipuempa kah aka hing boeih lawng : “ Bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl tuuca tengah thaangtheenna oen hinyahna , ruep-awmna oen tharana tah yoeyahla dungyan toe awm hawn seh , ” tila laa a sak te ka yaak .
66005014	Ramsa hing palii hue lawngah te , “ Amen ! ” tila a thui u tih ahaamca hue lawng buekuep u tih a bok u .
66006001	Tecoengah tuuca lawng tacik deng pasarih khuikah lamhacuek tacik deng a awng te ka huh tih ramsa hing palii khuikah pakhat lawng khawhumm awl angla aka humm awl oen “ Law lah ” a ti awl te ka yaak .
66006002	Ka bueh vengah marang bawk pakhat ka huh . Te marang aka cit lawngah li pakhat a pawm , ahih te bawilumuek pakhat a peek u . Taakung la aka awm lawng taa hamla aka cet angla te cet .
66006003	Tecoengah tuuca lawng tacik deng pahihna te a awng tih ramsa hing pahihna lawng , “ Law lah ” a ti awl te ka yaak .
66006004	Tecoengah atloe marang seen pakhat va thoeng . Marang aka cit tengah te thlaanghing pakhat oen khat ngawn u the ham , dilai ah raal thawh sakna aana te khaw a peek . Ahih te samsen bo hlang a peek .
66006005	Tuuca lawngah tacik deng pathumna te a awng vengah ramsa hing pathumna lawng , “ Law lah ” a ti awl te ka yaak . Ka bueh vengah marang muuem pakhat ka huh . Marang aka cit lawng te a kut dawngah cawi a pawm .
66006006	Ramsahing palii tim kalawng awl aka thoeng pakhat ka yaak tih , “ Hin at kah thapang phu ah sangvut tah suum at , balii tah suum thum peek la awm . Tede olif thingkung oen misur dum thli tah phe boel ti .
66006007	Tecoengah Tuuca lawng tacik deng apaliina te a phe tih a awng , ramsa hing apaliina lawng , “ Law lah ” a ti awl te ka yaak .
66006008	Ka bueh vengah marang pawlvawkk pakhat te ka huh . Te marang aka cit te Duekna a miingna tih a hu ah Hell lawng a vai tawkkhak . Ahimi te dilai thloep lii ah thloep at te raalpui oen khaw , khawkha oen khaw , tlawhnatna oen khaw , ngawn hamla ukna aana a peek .
66006009	Tecoengah Tuuca lawng apa-ngaana tacik deng te a awng . Pathen awl a phawng u tih uep-awm sausi la a awm dawngah a ngawn u thlaang thli kah Muithla thli te bokna-thaang huiah ka huh .
66006010	Ahimi lawng angaihhlangla pang u tih , “ Aka ciim tih aka doeng Thara koek Bawipa ! Kaimi aka ngawn dilai thlaang thli he awlcek nawh tih dan tat ohla metuek toe nuem na awm hun ai ” ti u .
66006011	Ahimi te baidung bawk pakhat rip a peek tih , ahimi angla ngawn ham aka awm biibipuei thli oen maya manau thli asoep thlantoe kawlkalh ah duem hamla a thui pe u .
66006012	Tecoengah Tuuca lawng tacik deng parukna te a awng te ka huh . Likluei angaih-hlangla hinghuen tih khawmik khaw himbai pawn amuuem angla muuem tih thla khaw apum boeih la thisen angla ling .
66006013	Thlipui lawng a hinghoek tih thaidut thaih munkang a thing dawngkah a rul angla vaan kah aisi thli khaw dilai la tla .
66006014	Vaan khaw cayaawl angla yaawl u tih ha-ata boeih oen tuisanglak boeih khaw a awmna huen kalawng thoeih boeih u .
66006015	Tecoengah dilai han sengpahrang boeih ukkung thli boeih oen raalbawi boeih , kuirang thlaanglen thli oen huham tharana boeih oen ah thlaangtloe boeih , saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem boeih lawngah tlaang kah lungnu thlip oen lungkaw khuiah thuh u boeih .
66006016	Ahimi lawngah tlaang oen lungnu nala te “ kaimi he n'naam langtah bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl kah mik huh oen Tuuca kah thinsana kalawng ng'thlip u lah !
66006017	Ahimi kah thinsana rih awm khawhin tah avan pha poen , a-u lawng a ueh thai ai ? ” tila paang u .
66007001	Tecoengah dilai akil palii ah aka pai vanthlaang palii te ka huh . Ahimi lawng dilai saw oen tuitunlii ah khaw , thingkung thlii dawngah khaw , khaw-athli nawh ham dilai a kil palii kah yilh te khak a tuuk u .
66007002	Tecoeng ah aka hing Pathen kah tacik deng aka pawm vanthlaang pakhat lawng khawcuuk ben kalawng a law hang te ka huh . Ahih lawng dilai oen tuitunlii sawah patang khang sak thaina aka khueh vanthlaang palii hue te angaihhlangla paang tih a khue .
66007003	Te kah vanthlaang lawng , “ Ka Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli kah a tal ah thawhcang ka heen thlan ah nangmi lawng dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah thingkung thli sawah raina pha sak u boel de , ” tila a thui .
66007004	Tecoengah Pathen kah thawhcang oen a heen thlaangmi tah thong yakhat coeng thong sawmlii coengah thong lii a awm te avan thui . Te thli tah Israel thlaangphun paha thlaihih khuikah tih ,
66007005	Judah phun , Riubin phun , Kad phun , Asher phun , Naptali phun , Manasseh phun , Simeon phun , Levi phun , Issakar phun , Zebulun phun , Josep phun , oen Benjamin phun , ni . Phun khat dawngkah thlaang thongha thlaihih te thawhcang heen la awm .
66007009	Tecoeng atah ka bueh vengah a-u lawngkhaw a toek lek nawh thlaangping te ka huh . Ahimi tah awlcawm awlcee aka thui nam tawm oen phun soeprep peng tawm ram tawm kah aka law boeih tih Ahimi lawng himbai bawk bai oen samtoe a pawm u tih bawingawlhcoen oen Tuuca haiah pai u .
66007010	Ahimi lawng , “ Thlawnna tah bawingawlh-coen dawng aka ngawl Pathen oen Tuuca teng kalawng ni a law ” tila paang u .
66007011	Vanthlaang boeih lawng bawingawlhcoen oen ahaamca hue oen ah ramsahing palii te a veel khoep tih pai u . Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen haiah buekuep u tih Pathen te a bok u tih ,
66007012	“ Amen ! Thaangtheenna , ruep-awmna , cuihna , awmngaihkoehna , hinyahna , huham tharana oen tha-awmna tah Pathen kah koeva la dungyan dungyan toe awm hawn seh ! Amen ! ” tila a thui u .
66007013	Ahaamca thli tim kah pakhat lawngah , “ Himbai bawk aka bai hue he a-u hue kai ? ahimi he ame kalawng a law u ? ” tila kai te n'doet .
66007014	Kai lawng , “ Ka ming nawh , Bawipa , Nang lawng ni na ming , ” ka tina . Ahih lawngah , “ He kah thlaang hue he tah mueirihtamyiin heemtekna kalawng aka loeih thli ni , Ahimi lawng Tuuca thisen oen a himbai te a suk u tih aciim sak u poen .
66007015	Tedawngah ahimi lawng Pathen kah bawingawlhcoen haiah pai u tih yiin oen daai tempal bok-im ah bii te a bi pe u . Bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl lawngah ahimi te a awm puei vetih a thlip adah poen ai .
66007016	Ahimi lawngtah buhpawng tuihalh khaw ming koep u tlaih manawh ; ahimi te khawling lawngkhaw kaang nawh vetih aling a-alh lawngkhaw daw yet tlaih manawh .
66007017	Metihtiah bawingawlhcoen alungkir ah aka awm Tuuca te tah ahimi doenkung tuudoen la awm vetih hingna tuibaap la te a ceh puei ai . Pathen lawngah ahimi kah mikphitui boeih te a huih pe poen ai , ” tila avan thui .
66008001	Tuuca lawng tacik deng pasa-rihna te a awng vengah vaan ah khawnoek tentan yunyan dipsiditla awm .
66008002	Tecoengah Pathen haiah aka pai vanthlaang pasarih te ka huh tih pengsara pasarih te a peek u .
66008003	Atloe vanthlaang pakhat riimtuui huihthlutna pakhat aka pawm te law tih bokna-thaang tengah te pai . Bawingawlhcoen haiah aka awm sui oen a sai bokna-thaang dawngah Pathen thlaang boeih kah thangthuina oen nawn haih ham riimtuui yahawh hlang ahih te a peek .
66008004	Huihthlutna haikhu tah Pathen haiah aka pai vanthlaang kut dawng kalawng Pathen thlaang thli kah thangthuina oen ah asawla luui haih .
66008005	Tecoengah vanthlaang lawngah riimtuui beeldung te a lawh tih bokna-thaang dawngkah haialh te akhuila a sang coengah dilai la a voeih . Khaw humm tih rekk tla , khaw thlappha tih likluei hinghuen .
66008006	Tecoengah vanthlaang pasarih lawng pengsara pasarih tum hamla kamthlah u .
66008007	Lamhacuek vanthlaang lawng pengsara te a tum vengah thisen oen aka thoekk u hai oen reel te dilai la tla . Dilai thloep thum ah thloep at , thingkung thloep thum ah thloep at oen ramtliim khaw ung boeih .
66008008	Vanthlaang pahihna lawng pengsara te a tum vengah tlaang angla aka bo thaihu pakhat te tih hai angla aka alh te tuitunlii khuila tla . Tuitunlii thloep thum ah thloep at te thisen la coengg boeih tih ,
66008009	tuitunlii khuiah aka hing boeih thloep thum ah thloep at te duek boeih tih tuisangphaw thloep thum ah thloep at te rawk boeih .
66008010	Tecoengah vanthlaang pathumna lawng pengsara a tum vengah haithoei hairawng angla aka alh aisi pakhat vaan kalawng tuiva oen sawkca thloep thum thloep at dawngah tla .
66008011	( Te aisi tah “ Khahiik ” a miingna ) Tui thloep thum ah thloep at tah tuikha la coeng boeih tih , te tila khahiik aih dawngah tui aka aw thlaang boehoengla duek .
66008012	Tecoengah vanthlaang apaliina lawng pengsara a tum vengah khawmik thloep thum ah thloep at tah see tlaih nawh tih thla khaw thloep thum ah thloep at , aisi thloep thum ah thloep at vaang tlaih nawh . A aangna thloep thum ah thloep at auh boeih . Yiin thloep thum ah thloep at , daai thloep thum ah thloep at ah aangna te awm tlaih nawh .
66008013	Tecoeng ka bueh vengah vaan asanghlang khawhi ah aka sawng tuhuum pakhat lawng angaihhlangla , “ khawmap ! khawmap ! vanthlaang atloe pathum hue lawng pengsara a tum veng atah dilai thlaang boeih hamla metihtlukla khaw amap ai ” tila a paang awl te ka yaak .
66009001	Tecoengah vanthlaang pa-ngaana lawng pengsara a tum vengah vaan kalawng dilai la aisi pakhat a tlaak thuk te ka huh , te kah aisi tengah aka boet nawh ungrawmdung awngna caabi te a peek .
66009002	Ungrawmdung te aisi lawng a awng vengah haikhu te vahhai haikhu angla thoeng hang . Te haikhu lawng khawmik oen yilh te a yiin sak khoep .
66009003	Te kah haikhu khui kalawng khaurang thli va thoeng tih dilai la rum thuk , te kah khaurang thli te celkhui ta-ai angla tharana te a peek .
66009004	Te kah khaurang thli te dilai han kah ramtliim khaw thingkung rawkung oen atloe thingkung khaw , phe ham awl pe nawh tih a tal ah Pathen kah tacik deng aka awm nawh thlaang thli bueng ni te thli lawng a phe thai ai .
66009005	thlaang thli he ngawn hamla tah khaurang thli te awl pe nawh . Tede thla ngaa khuiah ngan bawh tah a peek vetih celkhui ta-ai kah atah tlawh angla tlo ai .
66009006	Te kah thla ngaa khuiah thlaang thli lawng duekna te a tlap u ai , tede duekna te dang u manawh ; duek ham a ngaih u suide ahimi te duekna lawng a reel ai .
66009007	Te khaurang thli tah raal kah ham , kamthlah oepsoeh marang oen lo u ; te thli tah a luu dawngah suilumuek oen aka lo u te a muek tih a mik-hai thli tah thlaanghing mik-hai angla awm .
66009008	Te thli kah a sam tah hutaa kah sam oen lo u tih a naw thli tah sathueng naw oen lo u .
66009009	A raang dawngah thii-rangphaw oen aka lo u te a daan tih a phe humm awl tah raaltukna ah aka cet marang-lengg thli kah tuenpau awl oen lo u .
66009010	Te kah khaurang thli lawng celkhui ta-ai kah a mai angla aka sum pikyik te a khueh tih thla ngaa khuiah thlaang nganbawh yaak sak thaina a sue awm .
66009011	Ahimi lawng ukkung sengpahrang a khueh u tih te ukkung tah boet nawh ungrawmdung ukkung vanthlaang te ni . A miing tah Hebru awl la Abaddon a miingna tih Krik awl la tah Apollion a miingna . ( thui ngaihna tah “ phekung ” tina ni . )
66009012	Lamhacuek kah mueirihtamyiin pakhatna tah boeih poen ; He coengah mueirihtamyiin pahihna law hun ai .
66009013	Tecoengah aparukna vanthlaang lawng pengsara te a tum vengah Pathen haiah aka awm sui oen a sai bokna-thaang kah akil palii kalawng awl pakhat aka law te ka yaak .
66009014	Te awl lawngah pengsara aka tum vanthlaang aparukna te , “ Yufratis tuivapui ah a khawh mangkhak vanthlaang palii hue te thlah loeih , ” a tina .
66009015	Vanthlaang palii hue te a thlah u . Ahimi te he kum , he thla , he khawhin kah atue atang roe ah dilaipum kah thlaangmi thloep thum ah thloep at te ngawn hamla aka awm oepsoeh thlaang hue poen ni .
66009016	Marang aka cit raalkap tah apum boeih la millian yahnih awm tila avan thui .
66009017	Huhthlaam ka huhna dawngah marang thli oen marang aka cit thli lawng hai angla a lingduuk , safaiar lungto phutlo khawcil angla a hiing , kat angla engpawn la aka awm rangphaw a khueh u te ka huh . Marang luu thli tah sathueng luu oen ah lo u tih te thli kah a kaa khui kalawng hairawng , haikhu oen kat haialh va thoeng .
66009018	Marang thli kah kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng hai , haikhu oen kat haialh tlawhtahaw pathum lawngah thlaanghing thloep thum ah thloep at te a ngawn boeih .
66009019	Marang thli kah huham tharana tah a kaa oen a mai dawngah awm . A mai thli tah ruul angla a luu awm tih te a mai te thlaang nganbawh peekna ham a hawna .
66009020	He kah tlawhtahaw ah aka duek nawh tih aka deem thlaang hue lawngah amami kah sai cawplap thaihu te hoett u nawh . Ahimi lawng raaithe a bok te khaw toeng nawh tih mik aka tueng nawh , haa aka pang , aka tatvuet thai nawh sui , ngun , ruhum , lungto , thing oen a sai kutsaimuei a bok te khaw toeng u nawh .
66009021	Ahimi lawngah thlaang ngawnna , mu-uih caakna , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen huencaanna te khaw yut u nawh .
66010001	Tecoengah tha aka ra vanthlaang atloe pakhat vaan kalawng a rum thuk te ka huh . Ahih lawngah muui oen yaawl u tih a luu te malpacung oen a yeen ; A mik-hai tah khawmik oen lo u tih a khow rawi tah aka alh hai tuung angla awm .
66010002	A kut dawngah cayaawl ayiit pakhat a dai phak tih a pawm . A bantang khow oen tuitunlii te a caawt tih a voei khow oen dilai te a caawt ,
66010003	Sathueng kaawk awl angla angaihhlangla te paang . Te tila a paang coengah khawhumm awl pasarih lawng avan roei .
66010004	Khawhumm pasarih kah awlthui te thut hamla ka kamthlah vengah vaan kah awl lawngah “ khawhumm pasarih kah awl te awlhuep la khueh , thut boel de ! ” a ti te ka yaak .
66010005	Tecoengah tuitunlii oen dilai dawngah aka pai vanthlaang ka huh te lawngah a bantang kut te vaan benla a phawh tih , dungyan , dungyan toe aka hing tih vaan , dilai oen tuitunlii oen ah soeprep thaihu saikung ,
66010006	Pathen miing oen ah awlkamna a sai . Vanthlaang lawngah , “ Diw aih tlaih manawh !
66010007	Pathen lawng amah kah tuihyoeih tawngha hue tengah a thuisut angla Vanthlaang pasarih lawng pengsara a tum vengah a kamthlahna awlhuep te soep badai ” tila a thui .
66010008	Tecoengah vaan kah awl ka yaak pakhat lawngah avan thui koep baal tih “ Cet langtah dilai oen tuitunlii sawah aka pai vanthlaang kut dawngkah cayaawl a dai phak te lo lah ” n'tina .
66010009	Vanthlaang tengla te ka cet tih , cayaawl yiitca te m'peekna ham ka bih . Vanthlaang lawng , “ lo langtah ca lah ; na bung khui atah khahiik vetih na kaa dawng tah khawitui angla didip ai ” ti .
66010010	A kut dawngkah cayaawl yiitca te ka lawh tih ka caak , ka kaa dawngah khawitui angla didip tih ka bung khui atah khahiik sut .
66010011	Tecoengah van-thlaang lawng “ Pathen lawng peng tawm ram tawm thlaangphun boeihboeih awlcawm awlcee oen ah sengpahrang thli kawng a thui awl te nang lawngah na thui pe koep ham awm , ” tila avan thui .
66011001	Tecoengah tahna cungkui angla aka awm caapu thing pakhat te kai m'peek tih , “ Cet lang Pathen kah tempal bok-im oen bokna-thaang te tah lah , tempal bok-im khuiah Pathen aka bok thli te khaw toek lah .
66011002	Tede tempal bok-im adauben kah talawng te hooep de , tah boel , metihtiah te huen te thlaangphun tloe thli a peek tih , ahimi lawng Aciim Khawpui te thla sawmlii thla hih khui a khow oen a caawt u ai .
66011003	Kai lawng sausi la thlaang pahih ka tuih ai , ahih rawi lawng tlamhi te a bai hih vetih khawhin thongkhat yahnih sawmruk khui Pathen awl te a phawng hih ai . ” tila a thui .
66011004	Te sausi pahih te tah dilai Bawipa haiah aka pai olif thing pahih oen haiim pahih te ni .
66011005	A-u lawngkhaw te sausi pahih te nganbawh peek ham aka ngaih tah ahih rawi kah kaa khui kalawng aka thoeng hai oen a raal thli te boeih a ngawn ; a-u lawngkhaw te rawi te nganbawh peek ham aka yawm boeih te tah he tila a ngawn boeih ai .
66011006	Ahih rawi lawngah Pathen awl a phawng vengkah atue atang khuiah khawtlan nawh ham ah vaan te khaihkhoep ham aana a khueh . Ahih rawi lawng sawkca tuiva tui khaw thisen la coengg sak ham aana a khueh ; Te rawi lawngah amah ngaih vengah dilai he tlawhtahaw phun soeprep oen tlawh sak ham aana a khueh baal .
