66011007	Te rawi lawng Pathen kah awlthang te a phawng hih coeng atah aka boet nawh ungrawmdung khui kalawng satluung te thoeng hang vetih te rawi te a teek ai . Te rawi te a taa vetih a ngawn ai .
66011008	ahih rawi kah a rawkk te a bawipa a ngawnna khawpui kah noekna a miing tah Sodom , tih-nawhtah Iyipt tila awm .
66011009	Ram boeih , thlaangphun boeih , awlcawm awlcee aka cal oen nam tawm lawngah hin thum coeng hin vaang toe ah ahih rawi kah a rawkk te a bueh u vetih up hamla a khang khak u ai .
66011010	He tawngha pahih lawng thlaanghing sawah patang khangna broela a thoeng sak dawngah , he tawngha pahih a duek dawngah dilai thlaang thli tah awmngaih u ai , pakhat oen khat kutdo pe u the vetih taana poei a sai u ai .
66011011	Khawhin hin thum coeng hin vaang adiw coengah Pathen tengkah hingna hill law tih te rawi kah a kaw khuiah kuun , te rawi lawng tho tih pai hih . Te rawi te aka hu boeih tah a phuu hluih tho tih caalla a rih u .
66011012	Tecoengah tawngha rawi lawng , “ He la va luui hang ! ” tila angaihhlangla a tina awl te a yaak hih . A raal thli kah mik huh roe maiah muui dawngah te vaan la luui hang .
66011013	Teveng tue roe ah te likluei angaihhlangla hinghuen tih khawpui thloep ha ah thloep at tah rawk boeih tih thlaang thongsarih duek . Aka awm hun thlaang thli lawng lakueng u tih vaan ah aka awm Pathen kah alenna te a thangpawm u .
66011014	Mueirihtamyiin pahihna tah boeih poen ; Tede apathumna mueirihtamyiin , te va thoeng yue ai .
66011015	Tecoengah pasarihna vanthlaang lawng pengsara a tum tih angaihhlangla aka humm vaan kah awl lawng , “ Dilai ukna huham tharana tah mami kah Bawipa oen amah kah Messiah tengah tahe ah awm poen tih dungyan toela a uk poen ai ! ” tila a thui .
66011016	Tevengah bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl ahaamca pakul palii hue lawngah buekuep u tih Pathen te a bok u ,
66011017	“ Thara koek Bawipa Pathen , Nang tah tahe ah aka awm lii oen aka awm coeng la na awm ! Na bawilenna huham thara te na hawna tih uk hamla na tong poen dawngah kan uem tangkiik !
66011018	Tahe kah atue he tah na thinsa a lawna atue tih thlaangduek thli awlcekna atue la a awm dawngah , Pathen a ka bok nawh thli tah a thinsa tangkiik . Tahe kah atue he tah na tuihyoeih tawngha thli oen na thlaang thli boeih , nang aka hinyah ayiit abo boeih kutdo peekna atue ni . Dilai aka phekung thli phena ham atue tah avan pha poen ! ” tila a thui .
66011019	Tevengah vaan ah aka awm Pathen tempal bok-im te awng u tih Tempal bok-im khuikah Awlkam Kong te tueng . Tecoengah khaw thlappha tih rekk tla , khaw humm , likluei hinghuen tih reelnu thoei .
66012001	Tecoengah vaan dawngah kawpoekrai noekna bohlang pakhat va tueng . Hutaa pakhat lawng khawmik te himbai la a bai , thla te a khow oen a caawt tih aisi paha thlaihih aka awm bawilumuek te a muek .
66012002	Camoe awm tawm-alel tih ca awm tlawh oen paang .
66012003	Vaan ah atloe kawpoekrai noekna pakhat va tueng . Ruultluung bohlang alingduuk pakhat , luu pasarih oen ki paha thlaihih a khueh tih a luu dawngah bawilumuek pakhat rip a muek .
66012004	Ahih lawngah vaan kah aisi thloep thum ah thloep at te a mai oen ah a khawl tih dilai la a voeih . Ruultluung lawngah camoe te a awm atah doelh pahoei hamla a ca awm tawm-alel hutaa haiah te pai .
66012005	Tecoengah thlaangphun boeih te thii cungpoelh oen uk hamla a capa te hutaa lawng a cuun . Tede camoe te a rot pe tih Pathen oen a bawingawlhcoen tengla a khuen .
66012006	Te hutaa tah Pathen lawng aroek abah pe sut ramhum huhang la te viil u vik . Te huen ah ahih te khawhin thongkhat yahnih sawmruk khui a cawm acah u .
66012007	Tecoengah vaan ah raalpui tho . Maikal oen a vanthlaang thli lawng Ruultluung te a teek u tih ruultluung lawngah khaw , ahimi te a vanthlaang thli oen a teek u van ;
66012008	Tede ruultluung tah sung tih amah oen a vanthlaang thli lawng vaan ah awm ham dang u tlaih nawh .
66012009	Dilai pum thailatnakung Seitan , tihnawhtah Raaibawi aka miingna suenyan kah ruultluung bohlang te a vanthlaang thli oen dilai la avan thlaak haih .
66012010	Tecoengah vaan ah angaihhlang paang awl te ka yaak tih , “ Pathen kah thlawnna tah tahe ah law poen ! Pathen lawng sengpahrang angla amah huham tharana te a tueng sak poen ! Tahe tah Messiah lawng amah aana te a tueng sak poen ! Metihtiah Pathen haiah pai tih yiin , daai ah mami kah maya manau thli thawlh aka peelkung te vaan adaubenla a voeih poen .
66012011	Mami kah maya manau thli lawng Tuuca kah thisen rang oen amami lawng a thui awltak oen khaw Seitan te a taa poen ; ahimi lawng a hingna peek tih duek ham toe a hep u poen .
66012012	Tedawngah nangmi vaan oen vaan ah aka awm boeih lawng awmngaih u lah ! tecakhaw dilai oen tuitunlii hamla tah khawmap tangkiik mah aw ! Metihtiah Raaibawi tah nang hih tengla va law thuk tih atue soetca bueng ni a awm tite a ming vengah a thin so sut poen . ” tila a thui .
66012013	Ruultluung lawng , kai he dilai la dawng thuk la ka awm poen tila a ming vengah , a ca tawngpa aka cuun hutaa te a hu ah khek a vai .
66012014	Te hutaa lawng a awmna ramhum huhang la a sawng thaina ham tuhuum bohlang kah a phe pahih te a peek , ruultluung lawng a teek thai nawh ham te huen ah te kumthum coeng kum vaang doencang la awm .
66012015	Tecoengah ruultluung lawngah hutaa te tui yawh sak ham a kaa khui kalawng tuiliw te nawl a tha .
66012016	Tede dilai lawngah a kaa angg tih ruultluung kaa khuikah aka law tuiliw te a doelh boeih tih hutaa te a bawm .
66012017	Ruultluung tah hutaa sawah te a thin sa soeh tih hutaa kah cadil aka deem hue , Pathen kah awlpeek boeih aka vai oen Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak acakla aka phoeih boeih te teek hamla cet .
66012018	Ruultluung tah tuitunliikeeng ah te pai .
66013001	Tecoengah tuitunlii khuikah sa-tluung aka thoeng hang te ka huh . Te satluung lawngah ki paha oen luu pasarih a khueh tih ki pakhat dawngah bawilumuek pakhat rip a muek u tih a luu dawngah Pathen asal aphaamna miing pakhat rip awm .
66013002	Te satluung tah kaithleng oen lo u , a khow thli tah vawm khow oen lo u tih a kaa tah sathueng kaa oen lo u . Ruultluung lawngah kaithleng te amah kah tharana , a bawingawlhcoen oen aka bo koek ukna aana te a peek .
66013003	Satluung kah a luu pakhat tah duek puei koei boengha a caak angla awm de a boengha te hoeih koep poen . Dilai thlaang boeih tah a kawpoek rai u tih satluung hu ah bang u .
66013004	Ruultluung tah amah kah aana te satluung tengah pekung la a awm dawngah thlaang boeih lawng ruultluung te a bok u . Ahimi lawngah , “ Satluung oen a-u nuem aka lo u ? A-u lawng nuem ahih te a teek thai ai ? ” ti u tih satluung te khaw a bok u .
66013005	Te satluung lawng oekthloenna oen Pathen salphaam ham khaw , thla sawmlii coeng thla hih khui aana khueh ham te a dang .
66013006	Ahih lawngah Pathen oen Pathen miing te khaw , a awmna ahuen amawl oen vaan ah aka awm hue te khaw a tap avoep .
66013007	Pathen kah thlaang thli te teek ham oen ahimi te taa hamla khaw , thlaangphun boeih , ram tawm boeih , awlcawm awlcee oen namtawm sawah ukna aana te khaw a peek .
66013008	Dilai a suen thlan ah miing thut la aka awm tih ngawn la aka awm tuuca kah hingna cabu khuiah a miing aka thuum nawh dilai thlaang boeih lawngah satluung te a bok u ai .
66013009	Yaakna haa aka khueh lawngtah ya hawn seh !
66013010	A-u khaw sal la khuen ham aka awm te tah a khuen ngaikhoek ai ; a-u khaw samsen oen ngawn hamla aka awm te tah a ngawn ngaikhoek ai . He vengah Pathen kah thlaang thli lawng ueh thaina khueh tih uep-awm la awm ham angoe .
66013011	Tecoengah atloe satluung dilai khui kalawng a thoeng hang te ka huh . Te lawngtah tuu ki oen aka lo u ki pahih a khueh tih ruultluung angla awl a thui .
66013012	Ahih lawng lamhacuek satluung kah ukna aana boeih te amah hai roe ah te a hawna . Duek puei koei boengha a caak tih aka hoeih koep lamhacuek kah satluung te amangkhakla dilai thlaang thli te a bok sak .
66013013	Satluung pahihna lawngah kawpoekraina alentloe te a sai . Thlaang boeih kah mik huh roe ah vaan kalawng dilai la hai a tlaak sak .
66013014	Ahih lawngah lamhacuek kah satluung haiah sai sak ham a peek kawpoekraina te a saina rang oen dilai han thlaang boeih te athai alatna . Samsen oen tloek la awm tih boengha a caak de aka hing lamhacuek satluung te hinyah peekna la ahih kah kutsaimuei pakhat dilai thlaang thli te a sai sak .
66013015	Kutsaimuei lawng awl a thui thaina ham oen amah te aka bok nawh thli a duek sak thaina ham ah apahihna satluung lawng lamhacuek satluung kah kutsaimuei te hill sang thaina te a peek .
66013016	Te satluung lawngah thlaangyiit oen thlaangbo khaw , kuirang thlaanglen oen khawdeng harah khaw , saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem khaw , thlaang boeih te a tal ah , tihnawhtah a bantang kut ah noekna te amangkhakla a khueh sak .
66013017	Te noekna te aka khueh nawh tah a-u khaw thaihu te lai thai nawh tih yoeih thai la khaw awm nawh . Te noekna tah satluung miing tihnawhtah satluung miing yuengla a hawna nambar ni .
66013018	He dawngah he cuihna hawna ham angoe . Cuihna aka khueh thli lawngtah satluung nambar kah thuingaihna te a toek asam thai ai . Te nambar tah thlaang pakhat kah miing yuengla a hawna tih te nambar te tah yaruk sawmruk paruk ni .
66014001	Tecoengah ka dan hang vengah Zaion Tlaang ah tuuca aka pai te ka huh ; ahih kah miing oen ana Pa kah miing a tal ah aka thut thlaang thong yakhat coeng thong sawmlii palii hue tah tuuca oen awm haih u .
66014002	Khawhumm awl angla liksaituitlaak awl angla aka riing , vaan kah awl pakhat te ka yaak . Te awl tah tingtoeng aka tum thai thli kah tingtoeng awlding oen lo u .
66014003	Te kah thlaang ting yakhat coeng thong sawmlii palii hue lawngah bawingawlhcoen haiah khaw , ramsa hing palii oen ahaamca thli haiah te pai u tih ahimi lawng laa thaai te a sak u . Thlaang boeih timkah tlang tangte la aka awm thlaang bueng nawh atah te kah laa thaai te thlaang tloe a-u lawngkhaw sa thai nawh .
66014004	Te thli tah amah oen amah kuemsuem u tih hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai nawh cadawng cuem la awm u tih tuuca a cehna roekk ah a vai u . Ahimi te tah thlaang boeih tim kah tlang tangte la awm u tih Pathen oen Tuuca tengah a nawn lamhacuek ni .
66014005	Ahimi tah hoem awl thui vai nawh ; cawttbauh roe kap nawh .
66014006	Vaan alaklung ah atloe vanthlaang pakhat aka sawng te ka huh . Ahih lawngah dilai thlaang boeih nam tawm boeih oen thlaangphun boeih , awlcawm awlcee oen ram tawm boeihboeih ah phawng hamla dungyan awlthang theen a phueih tih ,
66014007	Ahih lawngah angaih-hlangla , “ Pathen te hinyah lang a alenna te koeh uh ! metihtiah ahih lawng thlaangphun boeihboeih awlcekna atue tah a pha poen . Vaan oen dilai , tuitunlii oen ah sawkca tuiva saikung te bok uh ! tila a thui .
66014008	Vanthlaang pakhatna te a pahihna vanthlaang lawng avan thoei tih , “ Hutaa te tlim poen ! Aka lentloe Babilon khawpui te tlim poen ! cuk-halhna misur yuusang te thlaang boeih a tuul poen ! tila a thui .
66014009	Tecoengah atloe vanthlaang pathumna lawng acuek kah pahih rawi te avan thoei tih , “ A-u khaw satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei te aka bok tih a kut dawngah tihnawhtah a tal ah noekna aka khueh tah ,
66014010	Pathen kah thinsana misuryuu , a thinsana boengloeng khuiah tharana abepirla a thloen misuryuu te a awkk ai ! Aka aw boeih te tah aciim vanthlaang thli oen tuuca haiah kat haialh dawngah a heem atek ai .
66014011	Te heemtekna haikhu tah boet ohla asaw la luui hang . Satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei aka bok tih satluung kah noekna miing aka khueh boeih ham tah khawyiin khawdaai aphoengna roe awm manawh . ” tila angaihhlangla a thui .
66014012	Pathen kah awlpeek aka vai thli oen Jesuh tengah uep-awm la aka awm Pathen thlaang thli lawngah tahe vengah ueh thaina khueh angoe .
66014013	Tecoengah vaan kah awl pakhat ka yaak tih , “ He he thut lah ! tahe kalawng atong vetih Bawipa kah bii te a bi dawngah aka duek tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni ” tila a thui . Muithla lawngkhaw , “ Oeih , soeng tang tang ! Bii rai bina kalawng duem u poen ai . Metihtiah a biibi phu tah ahimi oen awm haih poen ai , ” tila a thui .
66014014	Tecoengah ka dan vengah muui bawk aka yaal te ka huh , te muui sawah thlaanghing oen aka lo u te ngawl , a luu dawngah suilumuek te a muek tih a kut dawngah vin hatt te a pawm .
66014015	Tecoeng atah atloe vanthlaang pakhat tempal bok-im khui kalawng va thoeng tih muui dawngah aka ngawl tengah te “ Na pawm vin hatt te hawna lang caang te aat loeih ; dilai dawngkah caang hiin boeih poen ! ” tila angaihhlangla a thui .
66014016	Tecoengah mui sawah aka ngawl lawngah a pawm vin hatt te dilai dawngah a vawkveek tih caang te a ah .
66014017	Tecoengah atloe vanthlaang pakhat vaan kah tempal bok-im khuikah law tih ahih lawngkhaw vin hatt a pawm te ka huh .
66014018	Tecoengah hai aka ukkung atloe vanthlaang pakhat bokna-thaang ben kalawng va law . Ahih lawngah vin hatt aka pawm vanthlaang nala te “ Na vin hatt te hawna lang dilai dawngkah misur dum khuiah aka awm misur te aat loeih , metihtiah misur thaih tah mun boeih poen ! ” tila angaihhlangla te a tina .
66014019	Tedawngah vanthlaang lawng a pawm vin hatt te dilai sawah a vawkveek tih misurdum khuikah misur thaih te a ah tih Pathen kah thinsana misurtui suina khuiah a sang .
66014020	Misur thaih te khawpui adauben kah misurtui suina ah a neet tih misurtui suina khui kalawng thisen va thoeng , meng yahnih toela laawng tih pe ngaa yunyan dung .
66015001	Tecoengah vaan ah atloe kawpoek rai noekna bohlang tlawhtahaw pasarih te vanthlaang pasarih lawng avan khuen te ka huh . Te kah tlawhtahaw tah hukhuengna poen tih Pathen kah thinsana aboetkoek a tuengna poen ni .
66015002	Tecoengah hai oen aka thoekk u tih thlalang tuitunlii oen aka lo u thaihu te ka huh . Satluung oen ahih kah kutsaimuei oen ah a miing yuengah nambar aka khueh boeih aka taakung thli te ka huh . Ahimi tah thlalang tuitunlii tengah pai u tih Pathen lawng a peek tingtoeng te a pawm u .
66015003	Ahimi lawngah Tuuca kah laa oen Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang Mosi kah laa te a sak u : “ Bawipa Pathen Thara koek , metihtlukla na Lenduet tih na thaihu sai he kawpoek rai la a awm , Thlaangphun boeih kah sengpahrang , nang kah lawngpui tah metihtlukla asoeng tih adoeng !
66015004	Bawipa , nang te rih ohla a-u nuem aka awm tang ai ! Na lenna te phawng hamla a-u lawng nuem a thana tang ai ? Nang bueng ni na ciim , Na sai boeih tah doeng tih thlaang boeih lawng a huh dawngah thlaangphun boeih na haiah law vetih nang te m'bok u ai . ” tila Laa a sak u .
66015005	Tecoengah vaan ah tempal bok-im awng u tih a khuiah Pathen awlkamna aka awm Riim-im te ka huh .
66015006	Vanthlaang pasarih , tlawhtahaw pasarih a pawm tih tempal bok-im khui kalawng va law , ahimi lawngah aciimbiitla aka awm thling thling aka aang himbai te a bai tih a raang te sui cihin oen a yeen u .
66015007	Tecoengah ramsahing palii khuikah pakhat lawngah dungyan aka hing Pathen kah thinsana oen aka be suibeeldung pasarih te vanthlaang pasarih te a peek .
66015008	Tempal bok-im tah Pathen kah ruep-awmna oen huham tharana haikhu oen betoet tih vanthlaang pasarih lawng avan khuen tlawhtahaw pasarih te aboeih thlantoe a-u khaw tempal bok-im khuila te kuun thai nawh .
66016001	Tecoengah tempal bok-im khuikah awl lawngah vanthlaang pasarih nala te , “ Cet langtah Pathen kah thinsana beeldung pasarih te dilai dawngah hok thuk ! ” a tina te ka yaak .
66016002	Tecoeng atah lamhacuek vanthlaang lawng cet tih amah kah beeldung te dilai dawngah a hok . Satluung kah noekna tacik deng aka khueh thli oen ahih kah kutsaimuei aka bok tengah rih awm tangkiik buthlut tlawh la thoeng .
66016003	Apahihna vanthlaang lawngah amah kah beeldung te tuitunlii sawah a hok . Tui te thlaangduek kah thisen angla coengg tih tuitunlii ah aka hing boeih te duek .
66016004	Apathumna vanthlaang lawngah amah kah beeldung te tuiva boeih oen sawksipp boeih ah a hok tih thisen la boeih coengg .
66016005	Tui ukkung vanthlaang lawngah , “ Aka awm lii oen aka awm poen , Aw , Aciim Pathen , nang kah awlcekna tah doeng ! ” tila a thui te ka yaak .
66016006	Ahimi lawngah Pathen thlaang thli oen tawngha thli kah thisen a laawng sak , tedawngah ahimi lawng a awkk hamla thisen te na peek poen . Ahimi lawng a dang ham koei te ni a dang u van ! ” tila a thui .
66016007	Tecoengah bokna-thaang dawngkah awl lawngah , “ Bawipa Pathen Tharakoek ! Nang kah awlcekna boeih he tah soeng tih doeng ! ” tila a thui te ka yaak .
66016008	Apaliina vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te khawmik sawah a hok tih khawmik lawng thlaang thli te alingna oen ung sak thaina te a dang .
66016009	Khawmik lawng alingsona oen ahimi te a ung sak tih ahimi lawng he ang tlawhtahaw sawah aana khuehkung Pathen miing te a tap avoep u . Tede ahimi lawng thawlhna te yut u nawh tih Pathen bawilenna te koeh u nawh .
66016010	Tecoengah pa-ngaana vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te satluung kah bawingawlhcoen dawngah a hok . Satluung kah ram pum te yiinna lawng a khuk muelh tih te ram kah thlaang thli lawng patang a khang uett ah a lai te a kueh u .
66016011	Ahimi lawng patang a khang , buthlut a tlawh u dawngah Pathen miing te a tap avoep u . Tede ahimi lawngah athe lawngpui te hoett u nawh .
66016012	Tecoengah aparukna vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te Yufratis tuivapui dawngah te a hok . Tuivapui te kak rup tih khawcuuk ben kalawng aka law sengpahrang thli ham lawngpui a awng pe .
66016013	Tecoengah aciim nawh muithla ukong oen aka lo u pathum te ka huh . Te thli tah ruultluung kaa khui kalawng , satluung kaa khui kalawng , tawngha rawlrap kaa khui kalawng ah va thoeng .
66016014	Te thli tah raaithe kah muithla la awm u tih kawpoekraina te a sai u . He kah muithla pathum hue tah Thara koek Pathen Khawhin pui ah thik at la raal tuk ham , dilai pum kah sengpahrang boeih tengla ceemphawh hamla cet .
66016015	“ Hutung lah ! Kai tah thlaanghuuen angla ka law ai ! Thlaangtim paalak ah yah pawh nawh ham oen atliing ayaalla a yingyawina nawh ham ahuertuela awm tih a hinaak himbai te aka kuem tah yotheen aka dawng ni .
66016016	Tecoengah muithla hue lawng sengpahrang thli te thikat la a tun sak tih te huen te Hebru awl la tah Amekidon ti u .
66016017	Apasarihna vanthlaang lawng amah kah beeldung te yilh dawngah a hok . Tempal bok-im khui , bawingawlhcoen dawngkah angaihhlangla awl pakhat va thoeng tih , “ Boeih poen ! ” tila a thui .
66016018	Tecoeng atah khaw thlappha tih , khaw humm , rekk tla tih likluei angaihhlangla hinghuen . Thlaanghing sai cuek veng kalawng he ang likluei he hinghuen nooek nawh ; he ngoen tah likluei boeih lak ah aka tlo koek ni !
66016019	Aka bo koek khawpui te thloep thum la rek tih ram boeihboeih kah khawpui thli tah rawk kang poen . Pathen lawng Babilon khawpui te a hilh dam tih amah boengloeng dawngkah misuryuu , a thinsana misuryuu te a awkk sak poen .
66016020	Tuisanglak boeih tah auh tih tlaang boeih khaw ha-ata boeih poen .
66016021	Vaan dawng kalawng cawi yakhat tluk aka rih reel bohlang lawngah thlaanghing sawah te tla . Rih-awm tangkiik tlawhtahaw reelnu a tlaak dawngah Pathen te thlaanghing lawngah a tap avoep u .
66017001	Tecoengah beeldung pasarih aka pawm vanthlaang pasarih timkah pakhat te ka tengla law tih , “ Law lah , tuivapui tengah a sak , aka lentloe khawpui miingthang thlaanghalhnu te metihtlukla dantat la a awm ai ti te kan huh sak ai .
66017002	Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng ahih oen samphaih u tih dilai thlaang boeih lawng ahih kah cuk-halhna misuryuu te a awkk u ” tila a thui .
66017003	Muithla rang oen vanthlaang lawngah kai te ramhum huhang la n'ceh puei . Te huen ah satluung seen awrh dawng aka ngawl hutaa te ka huh . Satluung kah a pum tawm ah Pathen asal aphaamna ca te a thut . Te satluung lawngah luu pasarih oen ki paha a khueh .
66017004	Te hutaa lawngah alingdiik oen alinghuih himbai te a bai a naak tih sui , ngun , lungto phutlo , latha oen thoekcau u . A kut dawngah hutaa tawngpa thawlhna phu tuiilehkap thaihu oen samphaih raamna oen ah aka bepir sui boengloeng te a pawm .
66017005	A tal ah , “ Dilai dawngkah thawlh tuiileh-kap oen thlaanghalhnu boeih kah a manu , Babilon Khawpui , ” tila thuingaihna awlhuep miing te a thut .
66017006	Te hutaa lawng Pathen thlaang thli kah thisen oen Jesuh ah thincakla a awm dawngah ngawn la aka awm hue kah thisen a ruui u te ka huh . Te hutaa te ka huh vengah kawpoek la rai tangkiik .
66017007	Vanthlaang lawngah , “ N'tu ah na kawpoek a rai ? Te hutaa oen hutaa lawng a cit luu pasarih oen ki paha aka awm satluung thuingaihna awlhuep te kavan thui ai .
66017008	Nang lawng na huh satluung te n'cui atah hing de , tahe tah hing tlaih nawh ; Ahih tah boetna aka awm nawh ungrawm khui kalawng thoeng hang vetih ngawn la awm ai . Dilai he a suen thlan veng kalawng hingna cabu khuiah miing aka thuum nawh dilai han thlaang thli lawng , n'hu vengah hing de tahe ah aka hing tlaih nawh tih aka hing koep ham koei satluung te a huh u vengah a kawpoek rai u ai .
66017009	He dawngah cuihna oen ming thaina angoe . Luu pasarih he tah hutaa lawng a ngawlhna tlaang pasarih ni . Sengpahrang pasarih te khaw a thuingaihna ni .
66017010	Ahimi khuikah pa-ngaa tah tlim poen , tahe ah pakhat lawng a uk tih atloe pakhat te tah va law thlan ; ahih te law cakhaw kawlkalh ni a uk ai .
66017011	N'hu vengah hing tih tahe aka hing tlaih nawh satluung tah apareetna sengpahrang la awm . Sengpahrang pasarih khuiah thuum van tih ahih tah duek hamla te va thoeng .
66017012	Nang lawng na huh ki paha he tah ukna aka khueh thlan sengpahrang paha ni ; tede ahimi tah satluung oen thik at la khawnoek pakhat khuiah uk rip van hamla aana aka dang thlaang thli ni .
66017013	He kah sengpahrang paha boeih lawng mengtengna khat bueng kang a khueh u tih ahimi lawng satluung tengah amami kah tharana huham oen aana te a peek u .
66017014	Ahimi lawngah Tuuca te a teek u ai , tede tuuca oen amah lawng a khue tih a tuek thlaang thli oen uep-awm hubang thlaang thli lawngah ahimi te a taa ai , metihtiah ahih tah bawi boeih kah Bawipa oen sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang la awm , ” tila te a thui .
66017015	Vanthlaang lawngah , “ kai tengah Thlaanghalhnu lawng a ngawlhna tui he tah pengram boeih , thlaang boeih , thlaangphun boeih oen awlcawm awlcee ni .
66017016	Nang lawng na huh satluung oen ki paha lawngah thlaanghalhnu te a thina u ai ; Ahimi lawngah thlaanghalhnu kah a khuen boeih te a rot pe u vetih atliing ayaalla a ceh taak u ai ; ahih kah a thi asa te a caak u vetih hai dawngah a tih ai .
66017017	Metihtiah Pathen kah awl asoep thlantoe tah , ahimi lawng amami kah thara huham ukna te satluung tengah kaw at la a peekna u thai ham Pathen lawng ahimi kah thinkaw khuiah amah kah kawngaihna te a khueh pe .
66017018	Nang lawngah hutaa na huh te tah dilai sengpahrang boeih ukkung alentloe khawpui ni , ” tila a thui .
66018001	He coengah atloe vanthlaang pakhat vaan kalawng a rum thuk te ka huh . Ahih lawng saithaina aana bo hlang a khueh tih a aangna lawng dilai pum a thue rawngtheng .
66018002	Ahih lawng angaihhlangla paang tih : “ Hutaa te tlim poen ! Babilon khawpui tah tlim poen ! Te khawpui tah raaithe thli oen muithla ciimcaih nawh thli awmna ahuen la tahe tah coeng poen ; tuiilehkap oen thina koei va phun soeprep a khuiah awm u .
66018003	Metihtiah thlaangphun boeih lawng ahih kah misuryuu te a awkk u poen , ahih kah cuk-halhna misuryuusang te a awkk u poen . Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng ahih oen ah cuk-halh samphaihna a sai u tih a kuemsuem u thai nawh apueh ngaihna lawng dilai dawngkah thaihu yoeikung thli te a len sak poen , ” tila a thui .
66018004	Tecoengah vaan kah awl tloe ka yaak , “ Law uh , ka thlaang thli aw ! Ahih teng kalawng law u loeih ! Ahih kah thawlhna dawngah baawl u boel ; Ahih kah yawkk ham koei dantatna dawngah thuum u boel !
66018005	Metihtiah ahih kah thawlhna tah khat sawah khat tlingtloen u tih vaan angla sang ; Ahih kah tharana te Pathen lawng a poek khuep .
66018006	Ahih lawng nangmi thekhana angla ahih te thekhana u van ; A saina boeih dawngah arepla thung pe uh . Nangmi lawng na awkk ham te athiipla a sai van angla ahih lawng a awkk ham boengloeng te khuibok ah athiipla sai pe u van .
66018007	Amah oen amah thangpawm u tih a awmtheenna taring ah patang raina oen kopaangna te pe u van . Metihtiah a kaw dang oen ah , ‘ Sengpahrang bawinu la ka ngawl , Kai tah huhainu nawh ni Kawthena mevengah khaw ka ming roe manawh , ’ ti .
66018008	He tila a ti dawngah hin at maiah ahih te tlawhtahaw lawng a tlaak thil ai , tlawhnatna , kawthe rungrahna oen khawkhana lawng a tlaak thil ai . Ahih awlcekkung Bawipa Pathen tha aka ra lawng ahih te hai dawng a tih ai . ” ti .
66018009	Dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli , ahih oen hutaa tawngpa thawlhna oen ah cuk-halhna dawngah aka baawlneeng haih hue lawng ahih a ungna hairawng dawngkah haikhu te a huh u vengah , te khawpui te a rah u ai .
66018010	Ahih kah patang khangna te ahimi lawng a rih u dawngah athlahlangla pai u . Ahimi lawng , “ Khawmap tangkiik ! Rih awm tangkiik mah aw ! Aka lenkoek oen tha aka ra koek Babilon khawpui ! khawnoek pakhat khui maiah dantat la na awm poen ! ” ti u .
66018011	Dilai saw kah thaihu yoeikung thli lawngkhaw ahih te a rah u tih lungnat a yaak u , metihtiah ahimi kah thaihu te a-u khatca lawngkhaw lai tlaih nawh .
66018012	Ahimi kah , sui , ngun , lungto phutlo oen latha ; hisa haldoel oen kut tah hi-acuu himbai hinguih , pu hisa oen himbai lingdiik ; thingcang phutlo phun soeprep , vueinaw oen a sai thaihu cungkuem oen ah thingphutlo , ruhum , thii oen ah lungto abawk oen a sai thaihu ,
66018013	Thingsa thing , brue , huihthlutna riimtuui , mura oen farankinsen ; misuryuu oen olifsitui , sangvutvaai , vaitaw , panaa oen tuu , marang oen ranglengg thli , saltamnaa oen thlaanghing khaw lai u thai nawh .
66018014	Thaihu yoeikung thli lawng ahih nala te , “ Nang lawng khuehtoen ham na ngaih kaawn theen boeih tah ha-ata kang poen tih na bawina oen awmtheenna boeih tah khum poen , meveng khaw te ang kaawn theen te na dang koep tlaih manawh ! ” a tina u .
66018015	Te khawpui khuiah tangthung tangleng tih kuirang la aka coeng thaihu yoeikung thli lawng ahih kah patang khang te a rih u vetih athlahlangla pai u ai .
66018016	Ahimi lawng rap u vetih lungphit laithai ruila , “ Khawmap tangkiik ! Aka lentloe khawpui , Nang ham rih awm tangkiik mah aw ! Hisa haldoel himbai hinguih oen himbai lingdiik na bai na naak tih sui awi-anaak , lungto phutlo awi-anaak oen latha oen ah na thoek na cau u !
66018017	Tede khawnoek khat khui maiah na bawi na rengna tah ha-ata boeih poen ! ” tila rap ai . Tuisangphaw boeih uktemkung thli oen khawlawng cet thli tuisangphaw dawngah bii aka bi boeih tuitunlii ah biibina oen bungpui riilcang aka khuut boeih lawng a thlahlangla pai u tih ,
66018018	te khawpui a ungna hai-alh haikhu te a huh u vengah , “ He ang alentloe khawpui angla atloe khawpui awm nooek nawh ! ” ti u .
66018019	Ahimi lawng a luu dawngah laivaai oen phull u tih rungrah oen lungphit laithai ruila , “ Khawmap mai poen ! He khawpui ham rih awm tangkiik mah aw ! Tuitunlii ah tuisangphaw oen thaihu aka yooei boeih lawng ahih kah bawina oen kuirang la coengg u ! tede khawnoek pakhat khui maiah a bawi a rengna a auh boeih mai , ” ti u .
66018020	Vaan nang , te khawpui rawk dawngah awmngaih lah ! Pathen kah thlaang thli oen celtuih thli oen ah tawngha thli awmngaih u lah ! Nangmi sawah a saina boeih dawngah Pathen lawng ahih te awl a cek poen !
66018021	Tecoengah thara tangkiik van-thlaang pakhat lawng caang a neetna lungto sumngawl teh van aka bohlang lungto pakhat te a lawh tih tuitunlii khuila a dawng thuk , “ He tila Babilon khawpui tah dawng thuk la awm vetih meveng khaw huh koep la awm tlaih manawh .
66018022	Riingding tingtoeng awlding oen laa sak awl theen , a tum phiviit awlding oen ah pengsara tum awl te meveng khaw yaak la awm tlaih manawh !
66018023	Hai-im dawngkah haivang te metuek khaw na khuiah hu u koep tlaih manawh ; Cadawng yulokung oen tuemnu hulaa vaa sak awmtheen awl meveng khaw na khuiah ya tlaih roe manawh . Nang kah tangthung tangleng thli tah dilai pum ah huham thara aka awm koek ni , aka soeng nawh miklet thoemna oen dilai pum ah huham tharana aka awm koek ni , aka soeng nawh miklet thoemna oen dilai thlaang boeih na thai na latna poen .
66018024	Tawngha thli oen Pathen thlaang thli oen ah dilai dawngah a ngawn thlaang boeih kah thisen te khawpui khuiah a huh u dawngah Babilon tah dan a tat poen .
66019001	Tecoengah vaan ah thlaangping kah vupaang awl angla ka yaak tih , “ Pathen tah koeh u lah ! Thlawnna , ruep-awmna oen tharana tah mami kah Pathen amah koe ni .
66019002	Ahih kah awlcek tah doeng tih soeng . Dilai he cuk-halhna oen aka phekung thlaanghalhnu te ahih lawng dan a tat poen . Pathen kah tuihyoeihthlaang boeih te a ngawn dawngah ahih te dan a tat poen , ” tila vupaang u .
66019003	Ahimi lawng paang u koep tih , “ Pathen tah koeh u lah ! Khawpui a ungna hairawng dawngkah haikhu tah ayoeyahla dungdung tho hang , ” ti u .
66019004	Ahaamca kulpalii hue oen ramsa hing palii hue lawng buekuep u tih bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl Pathen te a bok u . Ahimi lawng , “ Amen ! Pathen tah koeh u lah ! ” ti u .
66019005	Tecoengah te kah bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng awl pakhat va law tih , “ Amah kah tuihyoeihthlaang thli oen a thlaang boeih ayiit abo , amah aka hinyah thlaang boeih , mami kah Pathen te koeh u lah ! ” ti .
66019006	Tecoengah thlaangping kah paang awl angla liksaituitlaak awl angla , khawhumm rekk tlaak awl angla ka yaak . “ Bawipa tah koeh u lah ! Mami kah Bawipa , Thara Pathen tah Sengpahrang la a awm dawngah koeh u lah !
66019007	Awmngaih u silang tah awmtheen boenn u lah sih ; alenna te koeh u lah sih ! Tuuca kah yului poei atue tah khoek poen , a lawh ham koei tuemnu hulaa lawngkhaw coekroekla thloeihthlam u poen .
66019008	Ahih lawng a buen anaak ham thlipthlip aka aang hisa haldoel te khaw a peek poen , ” ti u . ( Hisa-haldoel ti he tah Pathen thlaang thli kah thaihu theen a sai te ni )
66019009	Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng ka tengah , “ He he thut lah ; Tuuca yului poei kah a ceel thlaang hue tah yotheen aka dawng thlaang ni , ” n'tina .
66019010	Ahih te bok ham a khow kungah ka buekuep , tede ahih lawng , “ He tila sai boel ! Kai tah nang oen atloe aka oeng hue oen ah Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak aka phoeih rapsaat hue angla tuihyoeihthlaang pakhat van ni . Pathen mah bok lah ! ” n'tina . Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak lawng ni tawngha thli kawthawhna a peek .
66019011	Tecoengah vaan aka awng u te ka huh tih , te ah te marang bawk pakhat awm . Te marang bawk aka cit te tah Uep-awm oen Awltak a miingna ; doengna oen awl a cek tih ceemraal khaw a tloek .
66019012	Amik rawi tah haialh oen lo hih tih a luu dawngah bawi-lumuek yahawh hlang te a muek . Amah bueng lawng a ming doek tih thlaangtloe a-u lawngkhaw thuingaihna a ming nawh miing te a pum dawngah a thut .
66019013	Ahih lawng thisen oen a nok baidung te a bai . A miing tah “ Pathen Awl ” a miingna .
66019014	Vaan raalkap thli lawng hisa haldoel aciimbiit abawk te a bai u tih , marang bawk te a cit u tih a hu ah a vai u .
66019015	A kaa dawng kalawng samsen aka hatt pakhat va thoeng , te oen ah ram boeihboeih te a taa ai . Ahih lawngah thii cungpoelh oen ahimi te a uk vetih Bawilen Pathen thinsana misur neetna khuiah misur te a neet ai .
66019016	A himbaidung oen a phai dawngah : “ sengpahrang boeih kah Sengpahrang oen bawi boeih kah Bawi , ” tila a thut .
66019017	Tecoengah vanthlaang pakhat khawmik dawngah aka pai te ka huh . Ahih lawng khawhi ah aka sawng va boeihboeih te , “ Law u lah , Pathen kah bawilen buhlawi veel hamla va tun u lah !
66019018	Law u langtah sengpahrang thli , raalbawi thli oen raalkap thli kah thiasa te ca u lah , marang thli oen marang aka cit thli kah thiasa oen ah thlaang boeih kah thiasa , saltamnaa oen thlaangcuem thli kah thiasa , thlaang yiit thlaang bo boeih kah thiasa te ca u lah ! ” tila angaihhlangla paang .
66019019	Tecoengah marang aka cit thlaang oen ah a raalkap thli te teek hamla satluung oen dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli oen ah a raalkap thli a tun kueng te ka huh .
66019020	Satluung oen ah ahih kah haiah kawpoekraina aka sai tawngha rawlrap te a tuuk haih tih thong ah a thlaak u . ( Te kah tawngha rawlrap tah satluung miknoekna aka khueh thli oen satluung kah kutsaimuei aka bok thli te kawpoekrai saina oen aka thailatnakung te ni ) Satluung oen tawngha rawlrap te pahih bokla kat hai-alh khuiah a hing sailapla a dawng .
66019021	Marang aka cit thlaang kah a kaa dawng kalawng aka thoeng samsen oen ahimi kah raalkap boeih te a ngawn ; Va boeih lawng ahimi kah thiasa te ahahla a caak u .
66020001	Tecoengah vanthlaang pakhat lawng boetna aka awm nawh ungrawm dung te awngna caabi oen thiirui arih hlang a kut dawng a pawm tih a rum thuk te ka huh .
66020002	Ahih lawng-ah suenyan kah ruultluung Raaibawi tihnawhtah Seitan te a tuuk tih kum thong khat khui khawh hamla thiirui oen a piin .
66020003	Vanthlaang lawngah ruultluung te aboetna aka awm nawh ungrawm khuila a voeih tih ungrawm te a khaih khoep , kum thongkhat aboeih thlan atah nam tawm thlaang thli te thailatna tlaih nawh ham tacik a deng rap poen . Tecoeng atah kawlkalhca a thlah koep ai .
66020004	Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen thli te ka huh tih , te bawingawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl hue tah awlcekna aana a peek te ka huh . Jesuh lawng a phawng awltak oen Pathen awl te a thui u dawngah a ngawn thlaang thli kah muithla boeih khaw ka huh . Ahimi lawngah satluung oen satluung kah kutsaimuei te khaw bok u nawh tih a tal ah khaw , akut dawngah khaw satluung kah miknoekna te khueh u nawh . Ahimi tah hing koep u tih Khrih oen sengpahrang angla kum thongkhat khui a uk u .
66020005	( Atloe thlaangduek thli tah kum thongkhat a boeih thlan khui tah hing u nawh hun ) . He tah thlaangduek thawhna lamhacuek ni .
66020006	He kah thlaangduek thawhna lamhacuek ah aka thuum thli tah awmngaih u tih yotheen aka dawng tangkiik ni . A pabe duekna lawng ahimi sawah n'tu aana tehca khaw khueh tlaih nawh ; Ahimi tah Pathen oen Khrih kah khawsoeih la awm u vetih Khrih oen kum thongkhat khuiah ukkung la awm haih poen ai .
66020007	Kum thongkhat te a boeih coengah , Seitan te thong khui kalawng a thlah u ai ,
66020008	dilai pum khawboet ram boet ah aka darh u thlaangphun boeih te thailatna ham cet ai , te tah Gog oen Magog te ni . Seitan lawngah ahimi te apum boeih la ceem thawh sak ham a cawi vetih te thli tah tuitunlii keeng kah divin lai yoeh la yahawh .
66020009	Ahimi tah dilai pum ah darh khonghak tih Pathen thlaang thli a awmna huen oen Pathen lawng a lungna khawpui te a veel khoep u . Tede vaan kalawng hai tla thuk tih ahimi tah ung thloep .
66020010	Tecoengah ahimi aka thailatna Raaibawi te satluung oen tawngha rawlrap thli a voeihna huen kat hai-alh khuila a dawng ; te huen ah ahimi tah dungyan toela yiin oen daai patang a khang ai .
66020011	Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen abawk bohlang oen te kah bawi-ngawlhcoen dawngah aka ngawl thlaang te ka huh . Dilai oen vaan tah ahih teng kalawng aloela thoeih nawng tih khum boeih poen .
66020012	Tecoengah thlaangduek ayiit abo bawingawlhcoen haiah a pai u te ka huh . Cabu thli te a daih , tecoengah cabu tloe hingna cabu te a daih u . Te cabu dawngah amami kah saina khawboe ramlang a thut pe van angla thlaangduek thli te awl a cek u .
66020013	Tecoengah tuitunlii lawng amah khuiah aka duek te a peek . Duekna oen celkhui khaw lawngkhaw thlaangduek a tuuk te a peek . Thlaangduek boeih te amami kah a saina angla awl a cek .
66020014	Tecoengah duekna oen celkhui khaw te haialh khuila a voeih . ( He kah haituilii tah apabe duekna ni . )
66020015	Hingna cabu dawngah a miing a thut nawh thlaang boeih te tah haituilii khuila a voeih u .
66021001	Tecoengah vaan thaai oen dilai thaai ka huh , lamhacuek kah vaan oen dilai tah khum poen tih tuitunlii khaw awm tlaih nawh .
66021002	Aciim khawpui Jerusalem thai tah a vaa oen huh u hamla roekbah u tih coekroekla aka thloeihthlam u tuemnu hulaa angla Pathen tengkah vaan kalawng a law thuk te ka huh .
66021003	Bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng awl angaihhlangla a thui te ka yaak : “ Tahe tah Pathen im te thlaanghing tengah awm poen ! Pathen tah ahimi oen awm haih vetih ahimi tah Pathen kah thlaang la awm poen ai . Pathen amah roe te ahimi oen awm haih vetih ahimi kah Pathen la awm poen ai .
66021004	Ahimi kah mikphi boeih te Pathen lawng a huih pe poen ai . Te huen atah duekna roe awm tlaih nawh vetih kawthe lungnat yaakna , rungrahna oen tlawhnatna khaw awm tlaih manawh . Thaihu ruem boeih tah khum kang poen , ” ti .
66021005	Tecoengah bawingawlhcoen dawng aka ngawl lawngah te , “ Tahe tah thaihu cungkuem soeprep te athaaila ka sai pan boeih poen , he kah awl he thut lah , metihtiah he awl boeih he tah soeng tangtang tih uepna koei awl ni , ” tila a thui .
66021006	Tecoengah ahih lawngah , “ Bii ka coeng poen ! Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek , atongcuekna oen aboetna koek ni . A-u khaw tui aka hall tah hingna tuibaaptui te ayoela ka awkk sak ai .
66021007	Taakung la aka awm boeih lawngtah ka tengkah thaihu he a dang ai : Kai tah ahimi kah Pathen la ka awm vetih ahimi tah kai kah ca anau la awm ai .
66021008	Tede riyawp thlaang thli , paipi aka thleep thlaang thli , tuiilehkap thinkaw aka khueh thli , Thlaang aka ngawn thli , thlaanghalh paadak thli , Caamna oen mu-uih caakna aka hawna thli , kutsaimuei aka bok thli oen ah hoem awl aka thui boeih hamla ahuen amawl te tah kat hai-alh te ni , te tah apabe duekna ni , ” tila a thui .
66021009	Vanthlaang pasarih timkah pakhat , tlawhtahaw aboetna koek pasarih oen aka bepir beeldung pasarih aka pawm te ka tengla law tih , “ Law lah , Tuuca kah a yu , tuemnu hulaa te kan huh sak ai ” n'tina .
66021010	Muithla rang oen ah vanthlaang lawng kai te tlaang sang cungcikdik la te n'ceh puei . Ahih lawngah Jerusalem Aciim Khawpui Pathen tengkah vaan kalawng aka law thuk ,
66021011	Pathen kah ruep-awmna oen aka aang te n'huh sak . Te khawpui tah lungto phutlo Jaspa angla aang tih Kristol angla ciil .
66021012	Te khawpui tah thawhka paha thlaihih oen vawngkulh asanghlang awm tih thawhka toetkung vanthlaang paha thlaihih awm . Te thawhka dawngah te Israel thlaangphun paha thlaihih hue kah miing te a thut .
66021013	Te vawngkulh te khawcuuk ben ah thawhka pathum , aluen ben ah thawhka pathum , akaak ben ah thawhka pathum , khawtlaak ben ah thawhka pathum rip awm .
66021014	Khawpui kah vawngkulh te tah lungto paha thlaihih dawngah lungdang a suem tih Tuuca kah celtuih paha thlaihih kah miing te a thut .
66021015	Ka tengah awl aka thui vanthlaang lawng khawpui oen thawhka thli oen ah vawngkulh te tahna hamla , tahna sui cungkui pakhat a pawm .
66021016	Te khawpui tah ateng palii oen akil palii awm tih ayoei adang van-at la awm . Vanthlaang lawngtahna cungkui oen a tah vengah ayoei adang oen asang tah meng thongkhat ya-ngaa rip awm .
66021017	Vanthlaang lawng amah kah a pawm tahna oen vawngkulh te khaw a tah tih asang te pe yahnih thlairuk awm .
66021018	Vawngkulh te Jaspa lungto phutlo oen a sai , khawpui te tah suituicii oen a sai tih thlalang angla ciil .
66021019	Khawpui a thungna vawngkulh lungdangsuem lungto te tah lungto phutlo phun soeprep oen a thoek acau . Lamhacuek lungdangsuem lungto tah Jaspa lungto tih , apabena tah sapfaiar lungto ; apathumna tah aakat lungto , apaliina tah imaral lungto ;
66021020	apa-ngaana tah onik lungto , aparukna tah karnelian lungto , pasarihna tah krisolaih lungto , pareetna tah beril lungto , pakuana tah topas lungto , pahana tah khalsidoni lungto , thlaikhatna tah tarta lungto , thlaihihna tah ametis lungto phutlo oen a sai .
66021021	Thawhka paha thlaihih te latha paha thlaihih oen a sai tih thawhka pakhat te latha pakhat oen a sai . Khawpui khuikah lawngpui tah suituicii oen a sai tih thlalang angla ciil .
66021022	Te khawpui khuiah tempal bok-im ka hu nawh , metihtiah Thara koek Bawipa Pathen oen Tuuca tah te kah tempal bok-im la awm poen .
66021023	Te khawpui dawngah khawse oen thlavaang khaw ngoe tlaih nawh , metihtiah Pathen kah ruep-awmna te aang poen tih tuuca te haivang la awm poen .
66021024	Dilai dawngkah thlaangphun boeih lawngah te aangna oen ah yingyawi u vetih dilai dawngkah sengpahrang thli lawng amami kah khawh-rang kaawn thli te khawpui khuila a khuen u ai .
66021025	Khawpui kah thawhka thli te tah khawyungkhun a awng ; te khawpui ah khawyiinna a awm tlaih nawh dawngah thawhka te khai manawh .
66021026	Thlaangphun boeih lawngah a ruep-awmna oen a bawilenna boeih te khawpui khuila te a khuen u .
66021027	Tede , te khawpui khuiah aka ciim nawh tah khatca khaw kuun thai manawh , yarau thaihu aka sai thli oen hoem awl aka thui boeih khaw kuun thai manawh . Tuuca kah hingna cabu khuiah miing aka thuum thli bueng khawpui khuiah kuun thai ai .
66022001	Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng hingna tui a laawngna tuiva te khaw n'huh sak . Te tuiva tah thlalang angla ciilrikla awm tih Pathen oen Tuuca kah bawingawlhcoen dawng kalawng va laawng tih khawpui khui alaklung ah te laawng .
66022002	Te tuiva keeng khatben khatbang ah hingna thingkung te awm , kum khat ah voei thlaihih thaih tih thla khat ah voei khat thaih poepa tih te thingkung kah aram te tah thlaangphun boeih kah hoeihna la awm .
66022003	Pathen lawngah a tap avoep thaihu khatca khaw te khawpui khuiah awm manawh . Pathen oen Tuuca kah bawingawlhcoen tah te khawpui khuiah awm tih amah kah a tuihyoeih-thlaang thli lawngah ahih te a bok u .
66022004	Ahimi lawngah Pathen mik-hai te a huh u vetih ahih kah miing te a tal ah a thut ai .
66022005	Khawyiin awm tlaih nawh tih ahimi lawngah hai-im khaw , khawse khaw ngoe tlaih nawh , metihtiah Bawipa Pathen te ahimi kah aangna la awm vetih ahimi tah sengpahrang angla dungyan dungyan toe ukkung la awm poen ai .
66022006	Tecoengah vanthlaang lawng ka tengah , “ He awl tah awltak tih ueppangna koei awl ni . Tawngha thli te amah Muithla oen aka be sak Bawipa Pathen lawng adiw thlan ah aka thoeng koei thaihu te amah kah tuihyoeih-thlaang thli tengah aka thui hamla vanthlaang thli avan tuih poen , ” tila a thui .
66022007	Jesuh lawng , “ Hutung lah ! Kai ka law yue poen ai : He cabu khuikah tawngha awl aka vai thli tah yotheen a dawng u ! ” tila a thui .
66022008	Kai Johan lawngah he thaihu boeih he ka yaak tih ka huh poen . Te thli te ka yaak tih ka huh coengah he thaihu boeih huhsakkung vanthlaang te bok hamla a khow kungah ka buekuep .
66022009	Tede ahih lawngah , “ Te tila sai boel ! Kai khaw nang oen nang kah maya manau tawngha thli oen ah he cabu khuikah awl aka vai thlaang boeih kah pueipaw van ni . Pathen te mah bok lah ! ” tila a thui .
66022010	Tecoengah ahih lawng , “ He ang thli boeih he a thoengna ham atue ayoeica poen dawngah he cabu khuikah tawngha awl he ahuepla khueh boel .
66022011	Thlaangthe lawngah therana te sai poe mai de selang tah tuiilehkap thlaang te tah kawlot-thahnai la awm poe mai de seh ; Thlaangdoeng te tah doeng poe mai de selang tah , aka ciim thlaang te tah ciim poe mai de seh . ” tila a thui .
66022012	Jesuh lawng , “ Hutung lah ! Kai tah ka law yue poen ai ! Thlaang boeih te a saina taring ah peek rip hamla Kai lawng kutdo kavan khuen ai .
66022013	Kai tah lamhacuek oen hukhueng koek , atongcuekna oen aboetna koek la ka awm , ” tila a thui .
66022014	Amami kah himbai te aciimla aka suk tah yotheen a dawng u , ahimi tah hingna thingthaih te a caak thai vetih khawpui thawhka khuiah kuun thai u ai .
66022015	Te cakhaw cet thawlh lawnghang thli , caam oen mu-uih caakna aka hawna thli , hutaa tawngpa thawlhna aka sai thli , thlaang aka ngawn thli , kutsaimuei aka bok thli , saina oen khawseh , hoem awl thui oen khawseh thlaangthaipalat thli tah khawpui adauben ah awm u ai .
66022016	“ Kai Jesuh lawng Khrihcabu khuiah aka awm nangmi tengah he thaihu boeih he aka hoe la kamah kah vanthlaang te kavan tuih poen . Kai tah Devid cadil tih aka aang tumpa ni . ” tila a thui .
66022017	Muithla oen tuemnu hulaa lawng-ah , “ Law lah ! ” tila a thui . A-u khaw he awl aka ya boeih lawngtah , “ Law lah ! ” tila thui van seh . A-u khaw tui aka hall tah law uh ; A-u khaw aka ngaih boeih tah hingna tui he ayoela lo uh .
66022018	He cabu dawngkah tawngha awl aka ya thlaang boeih te kai Johan lawng arapcatla ngaithuenna kan peek u : a-u lawngkhaw he cabu dawngkah tawngha awl he khatca khaw a tawm athap atah , he cabu khuiah a thui tlawhtahaw te Pathen lawng ahih sawah dantatna la a hawna ai .
66022019	A-u lawngkhaw he cabu dawngkah tawngha awl he khatca khaw a hoett atah he cabu khuiah a thui ahih kah dang ham koei hingna thingthaih caak thaina oen Aciim Khawpui khuiah kuun thaina te Pathen lawng a hoett pe van ai .
66022020	He thaihu boeih sausi dengkung lawng , “ Oe , Ataktang ! Kai tah ka law yue poen ai ! ” tila a thui . Tetih mai hawn seh . Bawipa Jesuh , law mai hawn loeih !
66022021	Bawipa Jesuh Khrih kah lungvatna tah thlaang boeih sawah awm seh . Amen .
